title: Sakshi, Deepak eye Meham seat
content: 1 2 Rohtak: Rio Olympics bronze medallist wrestler Sakshi Malik and former India men’s kabaddi captain Deepak Niwas Hooda are likely to contest the assembly elections in Haryana. Sakshi hails from Mokhra village in the Meham assembly constituency, while Deepak has been raised at Nindana village, which too falls in Meham constituency. Even as Sakshi has not been vocal about her plans, Deepak has already announced his intention to run for the Meham seat during a press conference. According to sources, Sakshi will only contest if she is nominated by the Congress party . Sakshi’s mother, Sudesh, however, declined to comment on the matter, stating she was not ready to discuss it with the press. Former chief minister and leader of opposition in Haryana assembly Bhupinder Singh Hooda also refrained from confirming Sakshi’s candidacy, saying the party will decide on the right candidate at an appropriate time. Mokhra village, largely dominated by the Maliks, is one of the largest villages in the Meham constituency. Currently, Meham is being represented by independent MLA Balraj Kundu in the assembly. He had defeated Congress candidate Anand Singh Dangi in the 2019 state elections. Sources said four-time MLA Anand Singh Dangi, a close ally of Hooda, was lobbying to get the Congress ticket for his son Balram. Meanwhile, talking to TOI, Deepak expressed his desire to enhance the region’s...

title: ETEC de Santos, SP, abre processo seletivo para professores; veja como se inscrever
content: Os interessados podem se inscrever no período de , Não será cobrada taxa de inscrição. Segundo publicado no Diário Oficial do Estado, o cargo é disponibilizado para função de professor do Ensino Médio e Técnico e busca formar cadastros de docentes para , com objetivo de atender a necessidade de excepcional interesse público. Alunos da Etec Dona Escolástica Rosa tiveram aula inaugural no auditório da Etec Aristóteles Ferreira em Santos (SP) — Foto: Renan Fiuza/G1 A remuneração prevista é de R$ 21,40 por hora-aula, correspondente ao padrão I - A, da escala salarial de professor de ensino médio e técnico, referente ao número de aulas efetivamente ministradas. Ainda segundo o edital, a seleção busca formar cadastro reserva para o docente da área de Língua Inglesa. Para participar, é necessário ter graduação completa em nível superior. Os critérios de seleção serão avaliados em duas etapas: prova de títulos, mediante análise do exame de memorial circunstanciado, além de prova objetiva, composta por métodos pedagógicos. A convocação e o dia de aplicação da prova objetiva ainda serão divulgados, mas estão previstos para ocorrer entre 5 e 26 de setembro. Já o resultado da avaliação está previsto para ocorrer até 27 de setembro. O processo tem validade de um ano, a partir da homologação, e pode ser prorrogado. VÍDEOS: g1 em 1 minuto...

title: Iniciativa sobre control de divisas en Bolivia desata rechazo y temor en sector privado
creator: Carlos Salazar
content: La Paz, 14 ago (Xinhua) — La propuesta del Gabinete Social Extraordinario de Bolivia para imponer un control estricto sobre las divisas provenientes de exportaciones bolivianas provocó hoy miércoles una ola de rechazo por parte de empresarios, exportadores y productores. La propuesta del gabinete social incluye además medidas como el apoyo a la industria nacional y la promoción del ahorro en dólares. Durante la reunión celebrada el martes entre representantes del Gobierno y más de 30 dirigentes de organizaciones sociales en la Casa Grande del Pueblo, sede del Ejecutivo, se debatió sobre la actual coyuntura económica, la escasez de diésel, el tipo de cambio del dólar y las dinámicas de exportación e importación. El secretario ejecutivo de la Central Obrera Boliviana (COB), Juan Carlos Huarachi, destacó la necesidad de tomar medidas urgentes para enfrentar la crisis; sin embargo, la respuesta no se hizo esperar desde la Confederación de Empresarios Privados de Bolivia (CEPB), el Instituto Boliviano de Comercio Exterior (IBCE) y la Cámara de Industria, Comercio, Servicios y Turismo de Santa Cruz (Cainco). En un comunicado, la CEPB señaló que estas medidas «causan más incertidumbre, zozobra y preocupación en los agentes económicos y agravan la ya delicada situación del país». «Una medida como la planteada por la COB generaría la destrucción del aparato...

title: 64 அடி உயர தூக்கு தேர் கவிழ்ந்தது பக்தர்கள் உயிர் தப்பினர்
content: விழுப்புரம்: விழுப்புரம் மாவட்டம் கண்டாச்சிபுரம் அடுத்த கடையம் கிராமத்தில் பழமையான சூலபிடாரியம்மன் கோயில் அமைந்துள்ளது. இங்கு 2 வருடங்களுக்கு ஒருமுறை ஆடி மாதங்களில் தூக்கு தேர் திருவிழா நடைபெறுவது வழக்கம். கடந்த 2022க்கு பிறகு நேற்று முன்தினம் இரவு விநாயகர் கோயில் திடலில் இருந்து 64 அடி உயரம், 3 டன் எடை கொண்ட தூக்கு தேர் தயார் செய்யப்பட்டு, தேரில் சூலபிடாரியம்மனை வைத்து 300 வாலிபர்கள் தோளில் சுமந்து கடையம் கிராமத்தில் ஊர்வலமாக சென்றனர். நேற்று காலை தேர் நிலைக்கு வந்தபோது, இடது பக்கமாக தேரை தூக்கி நடந்து வந்த வாலிபர்களின் கால் தெருவில் இருந்த தண்ணீரில் வழுக்கி தேர் இடது பக்கம் சாய்ந்து மின்கம்பிகள் மீது கவிழ்ந்தது. முன்னெச்சரிக்கையாக மின்சாரம் நிறுத்தப்பட்டதாலும், பக்தர்கள் விலகி சென்றதாலும் உயிரிழப்புகள் ஏதும் இல்லாமல் 2 பேருக்கு மட்டும் சிறு காயங்கள் ஏற்பட்டது. கவிழ்ந்த தேரை அரை மணி நேரத்தில் மீண்டும் எடுத்து தோளில் சுமந்து கொண்டு சூலபிடாரியம்மன் கோயிலுக்கு சென்றனர். இச்சம்பவம் அப்பகுதியில் பரபரப்பை ஏற்படுத்தியது.

title: 〈大賣空〉交易奇才再出手,預測美國選舉前夕最具潛力的投資策略
creator: YuShan C.
content: 美國總統大選逼近,市場如同風暴前夕的寧靜。全球經濟的不確定性和政府債務的急劇上升,大眾對美國國債的安全性開始產生疑問。在這關鍵時刻,〈大賣空〉交易奇才角色 Porter Collins 發表驚人見解,2008 年成功預見次貸危機,如今又看到哪些良機? 美國國債長期以來被視為全球最安全的投資之一,主要原因是美國政府的信用和其支付債務的能力,隨著美國債務水準的攀升,這一觀點正在受到挑戰。大眾開始重新評估美國國債做為避險資產的角色。 雖然美國國債仍然是全球資本市場的基石,但其相對吸引力正在下降。特別是在低利率和高債務的雙重壓力下,大眾可能會尋求其他的安全資產,如黃金、白銀和比特幣等。Collins指出,過高的政府債務可能會削弱美元的價值,影響國債的吸引力。他認為未來一段時間內,黃金的回報率將超過美國國債。 (Source: Statista ) Collins的預測指出,未來黃金的回報率將超過美國國債,這一觀點引發了對黃金在投資組合中重要性的重新評估。歷史上,黃金一直被視為保值資產和避險工具,尤其是在全球經濟不確定性增加的背景下,其吸引力愈加明顯。根據最近的數據,黃金的回報率已經超越了美國國債,這是50年來首次出現這種情況。 美國國債的收益率因為聯邦儲備系統自2022年以來的緊縮政策而上升,導致其價格受到壓力。相對而言,黃金在2024年初的回報率達到15%,顯示出其做為避險資產的強勁表現。全球經濟的不確定性和通貨膨脹壓力是推動黃金價格上升的主要因素。各國央行採取超寬鬆的貨幣政策,市場上的流動性過剩,資金湧入黃金市場,推動其價格上漲。此外,地緣政治風險和市場波動性增加也促使大眾轉向黃金以尋求避險。這些因素綜合起來,使得黃金在未來一段時間內具有強勁的增值潛力。 (Source: tradingview ) 美國目前的赤字和債務水準已達到歷史新高。政府赤字是指政府支出超過收入的部分,通過發行國債來彌補。 在這種情況下,政府必須支付大量的利息,進一步加劇財政壓力。高水準的債務可能會導致大眾對政府償債能力的信心下降,而影響國債的收益率和市場穩定性。持續的政府赤字對美元的影響不容小覷。 隨著美國印鈔量的增加,貨幣供應量也大幅上升,可能導致美元貶值。美元做為全球儲備貨幣,其價值的下降將對全球經濟造成深遠影響。貨幣貶值不僅會引發國內通貨膨脹,還會削弱美國在國際市場的購買力,進一步打擊經濟。 從歷史經驗來看,過度的政府債務確實可能引發經濟危機。2008年的次貸危機和歐債危機均可證明。目前美國的債務水準已達到警戒線,任何一個經濟或政治因素的突變,都可能引發市場恐慌,造成金融市場的劇烈波動。持續的高債務水準將對美元和整個經濟體系造成壓力,大眾應密切關注這一動態。 然而,這是否會引發新的經濟危機,則取決於多方面因素,包括政府的政策應對、市場的反應以及全球經濟環境的變化。在不確定的市場環境中,投資者保持靈活和警覺是成功的關鍵,定期評估風險管理策略,並根據市場變化進行調整,以確保其投資組合的穩定性和增長潛力。 (首圖來源: Pixabay )

title: 또 152km'칠색조'→위기엔 탈삼진→6이닝 무4사구 9K 2실점 QS. 충격의 역전패에도 에이스 탄생 재확인[대전 포커스]
creator: 권인하 기자
content: [대전=스포츠조선 권인하 기자]충격적인 역전패였다. 5-2로 앞선 7회말 1점을 내주고 8회말 대거 6점을 내주며 마무리 유영찬을 결국 쓰지 못하고 한화 이글스에 5대9로 패했다. 6연승 바로 앞에서 멈추고 만 LG는 마침 KIA 타이거즈가 키움 히어로즈에 1대2로 역전패해 4게임차를 유지했다. 그래도 LG 트윈스에게 희망이 있는 것은 확실한 에이스가 있다는 것. 바로 엘리에이저 에르난데스가 두번째 등판에서도 호투를 펼쳤다는 점이다. 에르난데스는 14일 대전 한화생명이글스파크에서 열린 한화와의 원정경기에서 6이닝 동안 6안타(1홈런) 무4사구 9탈삼진 2실점으로 첫 퀄리티스타트를 기록했다. 지난 8일 잠실 두산 베어스전서 5이닝 2안타(1홈런) 1보넷 7탈삼진 1실점을 기록한 것 보다는 안타수가 많긴 했지만 여전히 빠른 템포로 한화 타자들을 공격적인 피칭으로 잡아내면서 시원시원한 모습을 보여 동료들에게 또한번 신뢰를 쌓았다. 이날도 역시 '칠색조' 피칭을 했다. 93개의 공으로 6이닝을 소화한 에르난데스는 이날 최고 152km의 직구를 39개를 뿌렸고, 134km의 스위퍼를 16개, 145km의 커터를 11개, 125km의 커브를 8개, 149km의 투심(싱커)을 7개, 140km의 슬라이더를 6개, 140km의 체인지업을 6개 기록했다. 자신이 던지는 7가지 구종을 다양하게 구사하면서 한화 타자들을 잠재웠다. 좌우 코너에 꽂히는 공이 많았지만 두산전보다는 가운데로 몰리는 공들이 더러...

title: Хельсинки ведёт переговоры о продаже принадлежащей россиянам Helsinki Hall
content: Администрация Хельсинки уже начала переговоры по продаже спортивно-концертного комплекса Helsinki Hall, которым владеют российские бизнесмены. Об этом написала газета Helsingin Sanomatам. По информации издания, арена Helsinki Hall принадлежит находящимся под санкциями Евросоюза российским бизнесменам и . При этом земля под зданием принадлежит городу. Helsinki Hall не функционирует с начала 2022 года. Владельцам предложили комплекс продать. Был установлен срок, и 30 июня он истёк. По сведениям газеты, мэрия уже ведёт переговоры о продаже из-за санкций неплатежеспособного комплекса. Как сообщало , власти Финляндии решили рассмотреть возможность экспроприации, изъятия, недвижимости россиян, заявил премьер-министр . Он добавил, что в стране владений россиян. В этой связи власти намерены разработать меры, позволяющего государству вмешиваться в сделки с недвижимостью до их заключения.

title: El ayuntamiento de Puebla arregló 17 fachadas de viviendas en el Centro Histórico
creator: Mariana Valenzuela
content: Este miércoles, el Ayuntamiento de Puebla informó que dio mantenimiento en 17 fachadas del Centro Histórico de la capital poblana, ubicadas en las avenidas 3 y 5 Oriente, entre el bulevar 5 de Mayo y la calle 6 Sur, así como en inmuebles situados en la 6 Sur entre 3 y 5 Oriente. El Ayuntamiento señaló que estas intervenciones han requerido una inversión total de 806 mil pesos, pues para arreglarlas la dependencia tuvo que realizar una instalación eléctrica en los muros de las fachadas, retirar vegetación parásita, restituir aplanados de cal y arena, limpiar de recubrimientos en las fachadas y grietas así como aplicar pintura hidrofugante. La gestión del edil municipal, Adán Domínguez Sánchez, señaló que estos esfuerzos buscan preservar el Patrimonio Histórico y mejorar la imagen urbana del Centro Histórico de la ciudad, así como el impulso del turismo y el comercio local. Con estas acciones, el Ayuntamiento de Puebla reafirmó su compromiso con la preservación del patrimonio y el fortalecimiento de la actividad económica en la zona

title: Buscan evitar caos urbano en torno al AIFA y El Insurgente
content: El reto que enfrentan los tres niveles de gobierno en materia de desarrollo urbano en los alrededores de grandes obras como el Aeropuerto Internacional Felipe Ángeles y el Tren Interurbano El Insurgente es coincidieron funcionarios, académicos y urbanistas en un foro realizado en la capital del Estado de México. El titular de la Secretaría de Desarrollo Urbano e Infraestructura del Estado de México, , manifestó que el gobierno estatal trabaja para impulsar un desarrollo urbano sostenible con sentido social. Durante su participación en el segundo foro , el funcionario indicó que debe lograrse una gestión sostenible del suelo a través de la planeación del territorio. El evento fue organizado por la Secretaría de Desarrollo Agrario, Territorial y Urbano, la Universidad Autónoma del Estado de México y la Asociación Nacional de Instituciones de la Enseñanza de la Planeación Territorial, el Urbanismo y el Diseño Urbano. Indicó que este propósito tiene que prevalecer en las zonas de influencia de las grandes obras emblemáticas del gobierno federal, tales como el , ubicados en las zonas metropolitanas de los valles de México y de Toluca, respectivamente. Ante el titular de la Sedatu, quien inauguró los trabajos del foro, el Secretario Carlos Maza subrayó la importancia de la planeación territorial, al asegurar que esta estrategia permite hacer uso responsable...

title: Jamaica declares southern state of emergency after Sunday night killings
creator: sport@thedailyherald.com (Editorial Dept.)
content: Jamaica's Prime Minister Andrew Holness is pictured during the 44th Regular meeting of the Caribbean Community CARICOM in Nassau, The Bahamas, on February 17, 2023. File photo credit Reuters/Dante Carrer. KINGSTON, Jamaica--Jamaican Prime Minister Andrew Holness on Wednesday declared a state of emergency in the Caribbean nation's southern Clarendon parish after eight people were killed in separate gun attacks on Sunday night, including a seven-year-old boy. "This is an opportunity for the government to mobilise fully to have a very serious focus on gangs," Holness told a press conference at his office. "We cannot allow murders to be normalised in our country." The prime minister did not immediately detail what regulations would be imposed, but these can typically involve nightly curfews, longer detention periods without formal charges and the ability by police to search properties without warrants. Holness said he hoped the measure would prevent reprisal killings, saying intelligence had warned there was a "very high probability" of retaliation attempts. Five people have been arrested so far in relation with Sunday's shootings, Holness said. Jamaica last year ranked as the second-deadliest country in the Latin American and Caribbean region, according to a study by Insight Crime, with 60.9 homicides per 100,000 people, second only to the small island state of St. Kitts and...

title: Japan PM Kishida, once a safe pair of hands, fumbles top job
creator: NEWS WIRE
content: TOKYO - Japan’s Prime Minister Fumio Kishida was seen as a safe pair of hands when his party installed him three years ago, but he soon became a liability as scandals and inflation eroded his popularity. Kishida, 67, will step down next month after announcing on Wednesday he was pulling out of a contest for leadership of the ruling Liberal Democratic Party and ahead of a general election scheduled by October next year. A father-of-three and keen baseball fan, Kishida is the scion of a Hiroshima political family and has a low-key presence sometimes taken for a lack of charisma. Taking office in 2021, Kishida touted his listening skills and promised a fresh stimulus package to revive the virus-hit economy, now the fourthlargest in the world. He vowed to tackle Japan’s demographic crisis and promote a more equitable “new capitalism”, but these policies remained vague, as did his plans to pay for them. Seeking to reduce oil and gas imports, under Kishida Japan has steadily been bringing its nuclear power stations -- shut down after the 2011 Fukushima disaster -- back online.

title: CBSE urged to fine Shela school 5L for hiding fire incident
content: Ahmedabad: The Ahmedabad rural district education officer (DEO) has written to the Central Board of Secondary Education ( CBSE ), urging the authorities to take “stern action against Shanti Asiatic School in Shela and impose heavy penalty” for attempting to conceal a fire incident that occurred at the school on July 11. The letter by Ahmedabad rural DEO Krupa Jha states the school did not inform the students, their parents or the DEO’s office about the fire. When the matter came to light following a protest by the parents the next day, the management tried to cover up the incident by terming it a drill. The parents had staged the protest after they learned about the fire from their children. Initially, the school authorities claimed that it was a minor fire and was doused within five minutes. However, the parents alleged that the management attempted to conceal the incident by calling it a “drill”. Upon learning about the protest, Jha inspected the school premises and ordered an inquiry into the allegations made by the parents. “We have found the school guilty and urged the CBSE to levy the maximum penalty of Rs 5 lakh on the school management,” Jha told TOI. title: Cops recover ₹91L in Kesco cyber fraud case, 6 arrested
content: Kanpur: In a significant breakthrough, police have recovered Rs 91.22 lakh and returned it to Kesco through the court in connection with a cyber fraud case. The incident involved the tampering of Kesco's payment gateway, resulting in a loss of approximately Rs 1.68 crore. The recovery efforts were led by a team under the supervision of the deputy commissioner of police (Crime). As per the communique issued by the Commissionerate office, the incident was reported on July 27, 2023, by Rajeev Ranjan, the regional head of ICICI Bank. Cyber criminals had stolen around Rs 1.68 crore from customers who made bill payments and recharges on the Kesco website between June and July 2023. The perpetrators altered the URL of the payment gateway, diverting the funds to their own accounts. Following the report, a case was registered under charges of breach of trust, fraud, and violations of the IT Act. Kesco consumers pay their electricity bills online through the ICICI Bank gateway. After payment, the bank transfers the money to Kesco's account. However, approximately Rs 1.68 crore deposited by 1905 consumers was not received by Kesco. Later, it was discovered that the ICICI Bank gateway had been tampered with, and the funds were transferred to another account. A large number of consumers had made payments, but the amount had not been transferred to the bank. The cyber crime Branch...

title: Cuauhtémoc Blanco le desea suerte a Margarita González
content: El gobernador Cuauhtémoc Blanco Bravo le deseo suerte a la gobernadora electa Margarita González Saravia , y dio estar contento con su decisión de elegir a personas de su equipo de trabajo para formar parte del gabinete 2024-2023 . “Les deseamos suerte, que le vaya muy bien en estos seis años que va a estar como gobernadora” , indicó Blanco Bravo. ➡️ Noticias útiles en el canal de WhatsApp de El Sol de Cuernavaca ¡Entérate! González Saravia sumó a la actual directora del Cobaem, Karla Herrera , a su equipo de trabajo como secretaria de educación y también se ha señalado que Mirna Zavala , exsecretaria de administración (2018 –2021) podría integrarse al nuevo gabinete. Local Margarita González revela a integrantes de su gabinete Asimismo, el mandatario estatal reiteró que se va contento y deja finanzas sanas al estado de Morelos, lo cual lo deja muy tranquilo a unos días de que se separe del cargo. “Dejo finanzas sanas, no endeudé, ni en Cuernavaca cuando fui presidente municipal, ni como gobernador. Creo que es lo más importante y la gente es la que más sufre todo esto porque pues a veces no tienes para hacer obras, entonces dejamos finanzas sanas y estamos muy tranquilos” , agregó. El gobernador Cuauhtémoc Blanco le deseó suerte a la gobernadora electa, y le recomendó sumar más policías para atender el tema de seguridad También aseguró que de ser...

title: পঞ্চগড়ে ঘরে ঢুকে দুই সন্তানসহ মাকে কুপিয়ে হত্যা
content: পঞ্চগড়ের আটোয়ারী উপজেলায় মা ও দুই ছেলেকে কুপিয়ে হত্যা করেছে দুর্বৃত্তরা। ধারাল অস্ত্র দিয়ে তাদের শরীরের বিভিন্ন স্থানে আঘাত করে হত্যা করা হয়েছে বলে জানিয়েছে পুলিশ। বুধবার (১৪ আগস্ট) রাতে উপজেলার বলরামপুর ইউনিয়নের কুরুলিয়া এলাকায় এই ঘটনা ঘটে।নিহতরা হলেন- ওই এলাকার কাপড় ব্যবসায়ী সেলিমের স্ত্রী তাসলিমা আক্তার (৩৫), ছেলে সৈকত (১২) ও সায়হাম (৯)। ব্যক্তিগত শত্রুতার জেরে এই হত্যাকাণ্ড ঘটতে পারে বলে ধারণা করছে পুলিশ।পুলিশ ও স্থানীয়রা জানায়, পার্শ্ববর্তী বোদা বাজারে কাপড়ের দোকান করেন সেলিম শেখ। রাত ১১টার দিকে বাড়ি ফিরে দেখতে পান প্রধান ফটকের দরজা খোলা। আরো একটু সামনে এগিয়ে ড্রয়িং রুমে দেখতে পান স্ত্রীসহ দুই সন্তানের রক্তাক্ত মরদেহ পড়ে রয়েছে। পুরো ঘর রক্তে মাখা। এ সময় তিনি চিৎকার করলে আশপাশের লোকজন ছুটে আসে। খবর পেয়ে সেনাবাহিনী, পুলিশ ও প্রশাসনের কর্মকর্তারাও ঘটনাস্থলে ছুটে আসেন। ঘরের দরজার পাশেই সায়হাম একটু দূরে সৈকত ও তার মায়ের মরদেহ পরে ছিল। একটি ঘরের কাপড় চোপড় ছিল এলোমেলো। বাড়ির এক পাশের ছোট টিনের দরজা ভেঙে প্রবেশ করে দুর্বৃত্তরা। পালিয়ে যায় প্রধান ফটক দিয়ে। ফটকের হ্যাজবলে রক্তের দাগ রয়েছে। ওই বাড়ি থেকে অন্য বাড়িগুলো বেশ দূরে অবস্থিত। এই প্রতিবেদন লেখা পর্যন্ত সিআইডি পুলিশের সদস্যরা ক্রাইম সিন সংগ্রহ করছিলেন।সেলিম শেখ বলেন, আমি বাড়ি ফিরে দেখি দরজা খোলা। ঘরের সামনে যেতেই দেখি আমার স্ত্রী ও দুই সন্তানকে নিমর্মভাবে হত্যা করে ফেলে রাখা হয়েছে। আমি চিৎকার করলে আশপাশের লোকজন ছুটে আসে। আমি আমার স্ত্রী সন্তান হত্যার বিচার চাই।বোদা পৌরসভার...

title: బస్సులో ఎల్లిపాయ పొట్టు తీయడం తప్పా?
creator: vishnu P
content: హైదరాబాద్‌, ఆగస్టు 14 (నమస్తే తెలంగాణ): బస్సుల్లో మహిళలు ఎల్లిపాయల పొట్టు తీయడం తప్పెలా అవుతుందని పంచాయతీరాజ్‌, గ్రామీణాభివృద్ధి, మహిళా శిశు సంక్షేమశాఖల మంత్రి సీతక్క ప్రశ్నించారు. మహిళలు తమ ప్రయాణ సమయాన్ని వృథా చేసుకోకుండా పనులు చేసుకుంటున్నారని పేర్కొన్నారు. కొందరు కుట్లు, అల్లికలు చేసుకుంటున్నారని పేర్కొన్న మంత్రి.. కూరగాయలు అమ్ముకున్నా తప్పేమీ లేదని అన్నారు. రాజేంద్రనగర్‌లోని ప్రొఫెసర్‌ జయశంకర్‌ తెలంగాణ రాష్ట్ర వ్యవసాయ విశ్వవిద్యాలయం ఆడిటోరియంలో బుధవారం జరిగిన స్త్రీనిధి క్రెడిట్‌ కో ఆపరేటివ్‌ ఫెడరేషన్‌ లిమిటెడ్‌ 11వ సర్వసభ్య సమావేశానికి ముఖ్య అతిథిగా సీతక హాజరయ్యారు. ఈ సందర్భంగా ఆమె మాట్లాడుతూ ఉచిత ప్రయాణాన్ని అవహేళన చేస్తూ కొందరు వీడియోలు రూపొందించి తప్పుడు ప్రచారం చేస్తున్నారని, మహిళా సాధికారతను తట్టుకోలేకే ఆ పథకంపై దుష్ప్రచారం చేస్తున్నారని విమర్శించారు. మహిళలకు చేయూతనిస్తుంటే ఎందుకంత అక్కసు వెళ్లగక్కుతున్నారని ప్రశ్నించారు. సచివాలయంలో ప్రారంభమైన మహిళా శక్తి క్యాంటీన్లను జిల్లాలకు విస్తరిస్తున్నట్టు తెలిపారు.

title: North Darfur’s remaining hospital risks closure as Sudan’s civil war intensifies
creator: NEWS WIRE
content: KHARTOUM - The last operating public hospital in Sudan’s North Darfur state is at risk of closure, Doctors Without Borders (MSF) warned Wednesday, amid fierce fighting between the country’s rival military factions that have left more than 18,000 people dead and 33,000 injured. Civil war between the Sudanese Armed Forces (SAF) and the Rapid Support Forces (RSF) broke out in April last year and has intensified in El Fasher, the North Darfur capital, since May when the paramilitary RSF group encircled the city. The MSF-supported Saudi Hospital in El Fasher has suffered extensive damage following the continued bombardment of the city over the last week, leaving it barely functional, MSF said. At least 15 people were killed in those attacks and more than 130 others were wounded, it added. The facility is the last remaining public hospital in the city with the capacity to treat the wounded and perform surgery, according to MSF. On Sunday, another attack on the hospital hit the surgical ward, killing a patient carer and injuring five others. “Sunday’s attack on Saudi Hospital – which is the largest hospital in North Darfur state – makes it crystal clear that the warring parties are making no efforts to protect health facilities or the civilians inside them. Patients fear for their lives as a result of the relentless attacks,” Michel Olivier Lacharité, head of MSF’s emergency...

title: Retired clerk sent to jail for 4 years
content: Rajkot: A Rajkot court has convicted Hiralal Chavda , who retired as a clerk from the labour commissioner’s office , for taking a bribe of Rs 7,500 in 2015. Principal district judge V B Gohil sentenced 68-year-old Chavda to four years in jail and a Rs 2,000 fine. The case involved a bribe Chavda solicited in 2015 from one Jay Trivedi, who had applied for a licence to recruit labour for the company he was employed with. Trivedi’s application in the labour commissioner’s office was not processed in a timely manner. When Trivedi inquired about the delay, Chavda demanded a bribe of Rs 7,500, saying that Rs 5,000 was for a senior officer, Rs 2,000 for himself and Rs 500 for a peon. Trivedi reported the matter to the anti-corruption bureau (ACB), which set a trap for Chavda. Chavda was caught accepting the bribe in a garden outside the labour commissioner’s office. The investigation revealed the involvement of a peon named Mohan Kataria, but there was no evidence of the senior officer’s involvement. A chargesheet was filed against Chavda and Kataria, but Kataria died during the trial, leading to abatement of the case against him. Throughout the trial, Chavda’s defence argued that Trivedi had called Chavda to the garden and forcefully put the cash in his pocket. District govt pleader S K Vora argued, “There was no reason for this govt officer to go outside his office to discharge his...

title: '불닭' 웃고 '짜파게티' 울었다...K-라면 전성기 엇갈린 2분기
content: 이 전 세계적 '불닭볶음면 신드롬'에 힘입어 올해 2분기에도 역대급 호실적을 달성했다. 폭발적 수출 증가세로 인해 영업이익 증가율이 100%를 또 넘었다. 반면 한때 K-라면 대표 주자였던 은 영업이익이 20% 가까이 급감하는 실망스러운 성적표를 받아들었다. K-라면 수출 호조에 삼양식품·농심· 등 K-라면 3사의 몸집은 함께 커지고 있지만 영업이익에 따라 표정이 갈리는 분위기다. 삼양식품·농심·오뚜기 등 국내 라면 3사가 14일 2분기 실적을 발표했다. 매출과 영업이익 모두 '쌍끌이'에 성공한 곳은 삼양식품이 유일하다. 삼양식품은 역대 최대 실적을 또다시 경신했다. 연결기준으로 매출 4244억원, 영업이익 894억원을 기록했다. 전년 동기 대비 매출은 48.7%, 영업이익은 103.2% 증가했다. 어닝 서프라이즈를 기록했던 1분기와 비교해도 매출과 영업이익이 각각 10%, 11.6% 늘었다. 폭발적 성장세는 역시 수출에서 나왔다. 2분기 해외매출은 3321억원으로 처음으로 3000억원을 돌파했다. 1년 전보다 74.9%나 늘었다. 이로써 삼양식품 전체 매출에서 해외가 차지하는 비중은 78%까지 확대됐다. 특히 미국 법인 삼양아메리카는 까르보불닭볶음면 인기에 힘입어 전년 동기 대비 125% 증가한 7140만 달러(약 972억원) 매출을 달성했다. 삼양식품 관계자는 “아시아 중심이었던 수출 초기와 달리 최근에는 미국, 유럽 등이 해외부문...

title: X「Grok」画像生成できるように 月額980円からの有料ユーザー限定 MidjourneyではなくFlux.1で
content: SNSサービスXは8月14日、生成AI「Grok」の新バージョン「Grok-2 mini」のベータ版導入を開始した。月額980円からの有料ユーザー限定機能で、画像生成にも対応する。 「Flux.1」を使った画像生成に対応 https://t.co/2QIqApWk0Y — xAI (@xai) August 14, 2024 GrokはXの関連企業xAIが開発するAIアシスタント。Xの有料プラン(X Premium/X Premium+)のユーザーであれば、Xのブラウザー版やiOS/Androidアプリから利用できる。 同社によると今回公開されたGrok-2 miniは、コンパクトなサイズを保ちつつ、速度と回答の品質のバランスが取れた高性能なモデルとのこと。推論、読解、数学、科学、コーディングを含む一連の学術ベンチマークでは、OpenAIの「GPT-4o」やAnthropicの「Claude 3.5 Sonnet」と同等または若干劣る程度の成績を収めているほか、グーグルの「Gemini Pro 1.5」に対しては全カテゴリーで性能が上回ったとしている。 ただし、ベンチマークテストはあくまで1つの指標に過ぎないため、実際の利用シーンでは性能差が異なる場合もあることには注意したい。 Grok-2 miniは旧バージョンで提供されてきたテキスト生成に加えて、画像の生成にも対応。GPT-4oなど、画像生成機能を備えた競合製品との機能差が縮まった。 画像生成に用いるAIモデルには、Black Forest Labsの「FLUX.1」を採用。こちらは8月1日に発表されたばかりの新しいモデルで、パラメーター数は120億。Stable Diffusionの共同開発者らが開発に携わり、高速かつ高品質な画像生成と、商用利用可能な点が特徴だ。 日本語プロンプトにも対応するが制約も 8月14日現在、X Premiumに加入した筆者のアカウントで確認した画像生成機能の性能や制約は、以下のとおり。 まず、プロンプト(AIへの指示文)については日本語も使えるが、あくまで「一応対応している」というレベル。テキスト生成と異なり、画像生成では英語を使ったプロンプトの方が、Grokへ正確に指示を伝えることができるようだ。 つぎに生成画像の解像度については1080x768px固定されており、プロンプトで別の解像度を指示しても無視されてしまう。フルHDや4Kなど、より高解像度の画像が必要なシーンでは、残念ながら利用できない。 画像の生成速度については、筆者が試した8月14日15時頃の時点では概ね10秒以下で生成できており、サーバー側で処理をする画像生成AIとしては十分に速いと感じた。今後も常にこのレベルの生成速度を維持できるなら、当面はストレスなく使えそうだ。 一方でベータ版ということもあってか、Grokから画像を出力した旨のテキストが返ってきても、肝心の画像が表示されないケースが割と頻繁に発生した。また、生成した画像の共有リンクはX...

title: आज का वृश्चिक राशि का राशिफल 15 अगस्त 2024: सफलता और मुनाफा दिलाएगा दिन, जीवनसाथी भी करेंगा सहयोग
content: Scorpio Horoscope Today, 15 august 2024: आज वृश्चिक राशिवालों का करियर : वृश्चिक राशि वालों के लिए आज का दिन व्यापारिक कार्यो में अच्छे परिणामों को दर्शाने वाला रहेगा। साथ ही आज आप अपने व्यापार से जुड़ी जो भी योजना बनाएंगे वह सभी सफल होती जाएंगी। यह योजनाएं आपको भविष्य में भी लाभ दिलाएंगी। सरकारी नौकरी से जो लोग जुड़े हैं उन्हें आज अपने काम पर अधिक ध्यान देना होगा। वरना आप किसी मुसीबत में फंस सकते हैं। आज शत्रुओं से भी थोड़ा बचकर रहें। लोग आपको कार्यस्थल पर नीचा दिखाने की कोशिश कर सकते हैं। व्यापारियों को आज अपने व्यापार को आगे बढ़ाने के लिए अपने पिता के साथ बातचीत करने की जरूरत है। उनकी सलाह आपके लिए उपयोगी साबित होगी। वहीं, प्राइवेट सेक्टर में काम करने वाले जातक आज छुट्टी का लुत्फ उठाते नजर आएंगे। आज वृश्चिक राशिवालों का पारिवारिक जीवन : घर परिवार में धार्मिक यात्रा हेतु प्लान बनाया जा सकता है। कोई आध्यात्मिक चर्चा आदि भी देखी जा सकती है। आज जीवनसाथी का पूरा सहयोग भी आपको मिलेगा। शाम के समय आज आप अपने परिवार के साथ देव दर्शन आदि के लिए जा सकते हैं। परिवार के साथ आप काफी मनोरंजन और आनंदपूर्वक समय बीताएंगे। आज आपकी सेहत : स्वास्थ्य अच्छा बना रहेगा और किसी ना किसी बीमारी को लेकर मानसिक वहम की स्थिति बनी रहेगी। आपको सलाह है कि खुद पर तनाव को हावी न होने दें और मानसिक बंदिशे भी देखी जाएंगी। आज वृश्चिक राशि के उपाय : आज केले के पेड़ की परिक्रमा करें और चने की दाल अर्पित करें।

title: Here We Go!...몸값 '11배' 가격으로 떠난다
creator: iyulje93@fourfourtwo.co.kr (한유철 기자)
content: [포포투=한유철] 바비 클라크가 리버풀을 떠나 잘츠부르크로 향한다. 유럽축구 이적시장 전문가 파브리시오 로마노는 15일(한국시간) 자신의 SNS를 통해 "클라크가 리버풀을 떠나 펩 레인데르스 감독이 이끄는 잘츠부르크로 이적한다. 이적료는 1000만 파운드(약 174억 원)이며 17.5%의 셀온 조항이 포함돼 있다"라고 전했다. 이적이 확정될 때 쓰이는 시그니처 멘트인 'Here We Go'도 잊지 않았다. 클라크는 잉글랜드 국적의 유망한 자원이다. 중앙 미드필더 및 2선과 3선을 모두 소화할 수 있는 멀티 자원이며 순간적인 스피드와 드리블, 축구 센스를 바탕으로 온더볼 상황에서 강점을 드러낸다. 피지컬도 준수하고 활동량도 왕성하며 동료와의 연계 능력도 좋다. 버밍엄 시티와 뉴캐슬 유나이티드 유스를 거쳐 2021년 리버풀에 합류했다. 리버풀 연령별 팀에서 차근차근 성장했다. 2021-22시즌엔 U-18 프리미어리그에서 23경기에 나와 13골 5어시스트를 올리는 등 공격적인 역량을 드러냈다. 2022-23시즌엔 프리미어리그2로 승격했고 3선에서 주로 활약하며 팀을 이끌었다. 이 시즌 프리미어리그(PL)와 잉글랜드 풋볼리그컵(EFL컵) 등 프로 무대를 경험하기도 했다. 2023-24시즌엔 1군에 더욱 자주 얼굴을 비췄다. 컵 대회 포함 12경기에서 1골 2어시스트를 기록했고 스파르타 프라하와의 유럽축구연맹(UEFA) 유로파리그(UEL) 16강 2차전에선 선발로 나와 1골 1어시스트를 올리며 팀의 6-1...

title: Avanza TJAM por una justicia accesible para la gente
creator: Redacción/Quadratín
content: ZAMORA, Mich., 14 de agosto de 2024.- Con la inauguración del nuevo inmueble de su Defensoría Jurídica Regional en Zamora, hoy, el Tribunal de Justicia Administrativa de Michoacán (TJAM) avanzó en su objetivo de “hacer más accesible la justicia para toda la gente de nuestra entidad”, afirmó su magistrado presidente, Hugo Gama Coria. En un comunicado se informó que acompañado por representantes de los Poderes en el estado, así como por autoridades estatales y locales, el Pleno del TJAM inauguró el nuevo espacio, que no sólo amplía el patrimonio del organismo constitucional autónomo, sino que, en específico: “Nos permitirá ofrecer el servicio público de impartición de justicia en mejores condiciones, a la población de 29 municipios de esta región”, explicó el magistrado presidente, en referencia a Jiquilpan, La Piedad, Sahuayo, Tangancícuaro y otras demarcaciones. “Este Tribunal tiene un espíritu, el de proteger a los ciudadanos contra los actos de las autoridades”, comentó a su vez el gobernador constitucional del estado, Alfredo Ramírez Bedolla, durante la inauguración. El ejecutivo michoacano reconoció la valía de esta rama de la justicia, aun cuando “nos ha representado recursos por más de mil millones de pesos, que hemos destinado a pagos de sentencias del Tribunal derivadas de servicios y adquisiciones que no cubrió la administración...

title: Iran launched cyberattack on U.S. political campaigns, Google says
content: Iran launched cyberattack on U.S. political campaigns, Google says Iran has launched a sweeping, months-long cyberattack targeting both the Democratic and Republican presidential campaigns, according to a new report by Google. Nicole Sganga has details.

title: EEUU | Estos son los requisitos y sueldo para trabajar como vigilante en Miami
creator: Zulay Camacaro
content: Para ser vigilante o guardia de seguridad en los EEUU los aspirantes deben cumplir con una serie de requisitos o condiciones. De acuerdo con el portal de empleo Indeed, un guardia de seguridad patrulla y monitorea variedad de entornos como centros comerciales, escuelas o bancos. Además, lugares de entretenimiento, instalaciones deportivas, museos públicos y hospitales. Lea también: Nueva Jersey | ¿Quiénes reciben pagos SNAP de hasta $581 en agosto? El salario de un guardia de seguridad en Miami es variable debido a varios factores como la experiencia, la ubicación y el tipo de empresa para la cual trabaje. El salario promedio de un vigilante en Miami se ubica aproximadamente entre $ 25.000 y $ 30.000 al año. Estos límites salariales pueden variar en función de la oferta y la demanda laboral en la región. En este sentido, los vigilantes pueden obtener algunos beneficios adicionales, como bonos por desempeño, o pagos por turnos nocturnos o días festivos. Se recomienda que los interesados en trabajar como vigilante en Miami, averigüen qué empresas de seguridad hay en la zona, requisitos que exige y salarios que ofrece. Es importante que los aspirantes piensen en la posibilidad de capacitarse y obtener certificaciones adicionales que aumenten sus posibilidades de empleo y salario potencial. En EEUU los salarios de un vigilante pueden variar de acuerdo a la ubicación...

title: Виктор Цой: 10 фактов из жизни легендарного музыканта, о которых мало кто слышал
content: 34 года назад, 15 августа 1990 года, погиб один из самых ярких отечественных рок-музыкантов – Виктор Цой (родился 21 июня 1962 года). Он всегда был в центре внимания при жизни, а после смерти стал настоящей легендой. Корреспонденты amic.ru собрали 10 фактов о музыканте, которые нельзя встретить в музыкальной энциклопедии. 1. Мало кто знает, что единственной работой в кино, которой Цой действительно гордился, была роль каратиста Моро в фильме Рашида Нугманова "Игла". Биографы группы "Кино" связывают это с тем, что Нугманов, по сути, предложил Цою сыграть самого себя. А вот не менее культовая "Асса" в личной классификации музыканта попала в разряд "Папиного кино" (в этот список попадал вообще любой образчик советских массовых или коммерческих картин). Своё собственное участие в "Ассе" Цой считал ошибкой. "Я не мог угадать, каким будет конечный результат, – рассказывал Цой, – всё это на совести режиссёра. Я лишь рад, что смотрюсь максимально отдельно от всего, что происходит в этой картине". Действительно, его фамилия в титрах значилась в числе первых – сразу после Сергея Бугаева, Татьяны Друбич и Станислава Говорухина. Однако присутствует в кадре Виктор в общей сложности не больше пяти минут. 2. Цой кочегаром не был. "Цой – кочегар" для тех, кто лично знал музыканта, такой же оксюморон, как и "Цой на мотоцикле". Этот миф успешно культивировал Алексей...

title: Telcos Must Embrace Data-Driven Strategies To Enhance Customer Experience
creator: Justus Adejumoh
content: Customer experience (CX) plays a crucial role in determining success in today’s interconnected world of modern telecommuni­cations. As consumers increasingly de­mand seamless connectivity and personalised service, innovative CX solutions must become a top priority for telecom companies looking to stand out in a highly competitive market. Previously, pricing and network quality were the primary factors for customer retention, but now CX has emerged as equally im­portant. Adopting a new approach to managing telco CX requires em­bracing a comprehensive platform equipped with tools to streamline interactions, anticipate needs, and deliver personalised experiences. Fundamentally, data-driven analysis plays a crucial role in improving customer satisfaction, and an enhanced CX ultimately aids in customer retention. When organisations effectively leverage this valuable source of insight, they gain a significant competitive advantage. However, despite having abun­dant data, most telecom operators are not exploiting the full poten­tial of analytics and insight-driven personalisation. This oversight prevents them from achieving a true competitive advantage and maximising reve­nue growth. Customer expectations can be met by plugging advanced data an­alytics into every stage of the CX journey, and given the complexity of telecom data, ensuring accura­cy and consistency across various...

title: Salur aduan jika harga barang naik
creator: ROSKHOIRAH YAHYA
content: SHAH ALAM - Pengguna disaran menyalurkan aduan kepada pihak berkaitan sekiranya terdapat kenaikan harga barang secara drastik berikutan kenaikan gaji penjawat awam. Naib Presiden dan Penasihat Undang-Undang Persatuan-Persatuan Pengguna Malaysia (Fomca), Datuk Indrani Thuraisingham berkata, segelintir pengguna dilihat lebih gemar membuat keluhan tanpa mengambil tindakan. Menurutnya, terdapat banyak platform untuk pengguna membuat aduan antaranya Kementerian Perdagangan Dalam Negeri dan Kos Sara Hidup (KPDN) dan Pusat Khidmat Aduan Pengguna Nasional (NCCCC). Sebagai pengguna bijak kita seharusnya sentiasa pantau harga barang, kalau rasa naik secara mendadak segera buat aduan. “Kalau hanya harap pemantauan daripada pihak berkuasa kita risau ia tidak dapat dilaksanakan secara menyeluruh,” katanya kepada Sinar Harian. Tambah Indrani, usaha kerajaan menaikkan gaji penjawat awam adalah untuk membantu golongan itu mengurangkan kos sara hidup. “Kalau gaji naik maksudnya kerajaan prihatin tentang masalah penjawat awam. Jadi peniaga tak boleh ambil kesempatan kerana ia akan jejaskan tujuan kerajaan membantu rakyat berpendapatan rendah dan medium. “Penalti atau denda lebih tinggi perlu dikenakan kepada peniaga yang melanggar Akta Kawalan Harga dan Anti Pencatutan,” katanya. Tunku Zain rasmi pameran Silang Budaya Harmoni Malaysia 2024 Masalah ketidaksuburan pasangan suami isteri pengaruhi...

title: Empresa china establece "licencia por infelicidad" para otorgar días libres
creator: Jerald Jimenez
content: Yu Donglai, magnate y presidente de la cadena minorista china Pang Dong Lai, introdujo una política innovadora para sus empleados: la “licencia por infelicidad infeliz” , para darles días libres. La medida permite a los trabajadores tomar hasta 10 días de licencia remunerada si no se sienten felices. El objetivo es fomentar un mejor equilibrio entre la vida laboral y personal. También te puede interesar: ¿Cuánto recibirán en agosto las familias con hijos en Nueva York de acuerdo a su ingreso? La política fue anunciada durante la Semana de Supermercados de China 2024, un evento de gran relevancia en el que se reúnen los principales empresarios del país: “Quiero que cada miembro del personal tenga libertad ". Una publicación compartida por El Kilombo (@el_kilombo) "Todos tenemos momentos en los que no estamos contentos, así que si no estás contento, no vengas a trabajar”, declaró Yu Donglai, según reportó el medio local South China. El fundador de Pang Dong Lai explicó que la licencia de 10 días es una oportunidad para que los empleados se tomen el tiempo necesario para recuperar su bienestar emocional. Tampoco se deberán preocupar por la pérdida de ingresos. “La dirección no puede negar esta licencia. Denegarla es una infracción”, añadió el magnate de la cadena de supermercados. La iniciativa fue recibida con entusiasmo tanto por los empleados como por...

title: Ex-BDO of Suliapadaheld for graft
Bất ngờ về tung tích nghi phạm Ukraine trong vụ phá hoại đường ống Nord Stream
content: Cuộc điều tra vụ tấn công vào đường ống dẫn khí đốt Nord Stream (Dòng chảy phương Bắc) là ưu tiên hàng đầu của chính phủ Đức. Phát biểu tại cuộc họp báo tại Berlin, liên quan đến thông tin các công tố viên Liên bang Đức đã phát lệnh bắt giữ một huấn luyện viên lặn người Ukraine bị nghi ngờ đóng vai trò trong vụ phá hoại đường ống Nord Stream và người này được biết đến lần cuối là ở Ba Lan nhưng hiện được cho là đã biến mất. Phó phát ngôn viên Chính phủ Đức Wolfgang Buechner cho biết: “Cuộc điều tra về vụ phá hoại đường ống dẫn khí đốt Nord Stream là ưu tiên hàng đầu của Chính phủ Đức.” Mặc dù không cho biết liệu Đức có liên hệ với Ba Lan hay Ukraine về vấn đề này hay không, ông Wolfgang Buechner nhấn mạnh rằng cuộc điều tra của Đức đối với một số cá nhân không làm xấu đi mối quan hệ giữa Đức với Ukraine. Trước đó, báo “Sueddeutsche Zeitung” dẫn cuộc điều tra chung của đài truyền hình “ARD và báo Die Zeit,” đưa tin rằng Công tố viên Liên bang Đức đã phát lệnh bắt giữ một huấn luyện viên lặn người Ukraine bị nghi ngờ có vai trò phá hoại đường ống dẫn khí đốt Dòng chảy phương Bắc. title: UK weather maps show 42C Iberian heat bomb to rip through Britain and Europe with north-south divide
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Paige Ingram)
content: The UK is finally basking in the summer heat, with temperatures soaring to 34.8C in Cambridge on Monday. The warm weather looks set to stay for a while, according to upcoming forecasts . WXcharts' new weather maps have shown a significant rise in temperatures in Iberia towards the end of the week. Holiday hotspots such as Lisbon and Madrid are expected to reach just below 40 degrees next week. On Tuesday, August 20, southern Spain will see temperatures skyrocket, with Seville hitting a staggering 38.4C, Madrid reaching highs of 35.6C, and Badajoz touching a sweltering 40.1C at 3pm. The increase in temperatures in Spain and Portugal is good news for Brits, as the heatwave is expected to drift North over the next few days. READ MORE: Prince Harry swerves potentially awkward Prince William reunion due to unfortunate reason While much of Southern England can expect rainfall and cooler weather towards the end of this week, things are looking brighter and warmer for next week. On Tuesday, a band of rain will sweep across the UK from west to east, dampening the end of August. However, the Bank Holiday weekend is set to brighten up from Wednesday onwards with parts of the South East and London predicted to reach temperatures around 24-25 degrees. London is expected to peak at 25.7C on Thursday, August 22, and 28.1C on Friday, August 23. Manchester , Liverpool, and Leeds are also set...

title: 배우 김지석-이주명 열애 "따뜻한 시선으로 바라봐 달라"
content: 배우 김지석(43)과 이주명(31)이 교제 중이다. 이주명의 소속사 YG엔터테인먼트는 14일 "(이주명이) 김지석과 열애 중"이라며 "따뜻한 시선으로 바라봐달라"고 밝혔다. 아울러 이주명은 이날을 끝으로 YG엔터테인먼트와의 전속 계약이 만료돼 김지석의 소속사인 에일리언컴퍼니로 소속을 옮기기로 했다. 김지석은 2001년 그룹 '리오' 소속 가수로 데뷔했고, 이후 배우로 전향해 영화 '국가대표'(2009), 드라마 '또 오해영'(2016) '동백꽃 필 무렵'(2019) 등에 출연했다. 2016년 데뷔한 이주명은 드라마 '스물다섯 스물하나'(2022)와 '모래에도 꽃이 핀다'(2024) 등에 출연하며 얼굴을 알렸다. 최근 개봉한 영화 '파일럿'에 출연하며 스크린에도 데뷔했다. 연합> [c 세계일보 & Segye.com, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

title: I-Day honour for UT’s 5-year-old mountaineer
டெல்லியில் இன்று சுதந்திர தின நிகழ்வில் கோவை அரசு பஸ் கண்டக்டரை கவுரவிக்கும் ஜனாதிபதி முர்மு: புற்றுநோய் பாதித்தபோதும் 5.5 லட்சம் மரக்கன்று நடவு செய்ததற்கு பாராட்டு
content: கோவை: பல்வேறு இடங்களில் 5.5 லட்சம் மரக்கன்றுகளை நடவு செய்த கோவை அரசு பஸ் கண்டக்டர் யோகநாதனை டெல்லியில் குடியரசு தலைவர் மாளிகையில் நடக்கும் சுதந்திர தின விழா நிகழ்வில், ஜனாதிபதி கவுரவிக்க உள்ளார். இதற்காக, அவர் நேற்று டெல்லி புறப்பட்டு சென்றார். கோவை கணபதி பகுதியை சேர்ந்தவர் யோகநாதன் (59). இவர் தமிழ்நாடு அரசு போக்குவரத்து கழகம் மருதமலை கிளையில் பஸ் கண்டக்டராக உள்ளார். கடந்த 38 வருடங்களாக பொது இடங்கள், அரசு பள்ளிகள், கல்லூரிகள், பல்கலைக்கழங்கள் ஆகியவற்றில் மரக்கன்றுகளை நட்டு பராமரித்து வருகிறார். தற்போது வரை 5.5 லட்சம் மரக்கன்றுகளை நட்டதில், 3.5 லட்சம் மரங்கள் வளர்ந்துள்ளன. கோவை மட்டுமின்றி தமிழகத்தின் பல்வேறு மாநிலங்களிலும், வெளிமாநிலங்களிலும் மரக்கன்றுகளை நடவு செய்துள்ளார். இதுதவிர, மரம் நடுதல் குறித்து விழிப்புணர்வை பள்ளி, கல்லூரி மாணவர்கள் மற்றும் பொதுமக்களிடம் ஏற்படுத்தி வருகிறார். இலவசமாக மரக்கன்றுகளை வழங்குதல், அழிந்து வரும் அரிய வகை மரங்களை மீட்டு எடுத்தல் போன்ற பணிகளையும் செய்து வருகிறார். ஒவ்வொரு திங்கட்கிழமையும் இதை செய்து வருகிறார். தனது விடுமுறை நாட்களிலும் மரக்கன்று நடவு பணிகளில் ஈடுபடுவார். இவருக்கு புற்றுநோய் பாதிப்பு ஏற்பட்ட நிலையிலும், தொடர்ந்து மரக்கன்றுகளை நடவு செய்து வருகிறார். இவரது பணிக்காக பல்வேறு விருதுகளை பெற்றுள்ளார். கடந்த 2008ல் அப்போதைய துணை குடியரசு தலைவர் ஹமீது அன்சாரி பசுமை போராளி விருதை வழங்கினார். தமிழ்நாடு அரசின் சுற்றுச்சூழல் விருது, பெரியார் விருது, மத்திய நீர்வளத்துறை காலநிலை போர்வீரர் விருதுகளை பெற்றுள்ளார். 2015ல்...

title: Série C: Volta Redonda acerta com atacante do ASA-AL
creator: Joao Chaves
content: Volta Redonda, RJ, 14 (AFI) – Ainda não anunciado, o atacante Keliton , de 24 anos, vai reforçar o elenco do Volta Redonda na reta final do Campeonato Brasileiro da Série C . O jovem chega por empréstimo até o final da competição. NOVIDADE! Futebol Interior agora está nos Canais do WhatsApp. Participe agora! Keliton pertence ao ASA, de Arapiraca, que foi eliminado na segunda fase da Série D e não tem mais calendário na temporada. O atacante de lado de campo fez 27 partidas pelo alvinegro na temporada, com dois gols marcados e uma assistência, e chega à cidade fluminense nesta quinta-feira (15), para fazer exames médicos e assinar contrato. O Volta Redonda foi o quinto clube a se garantir nos quadrangulares da Série C. Com 31 pontos em 17 jogos, tenta terminar no G-4, e tem dois desafios pela frente. Na segunda-feira (19), às 20h, visita a Ferroviária na Fonte Luminosa, em Araraquara, pela 18a rodada. Depois, vai receber o Figueirense no Raulino de Oliveira.

title: Surat Edaran Status Siaga Darurat Karhutla Berlaku Hingga 31 Desember 2024, Ini Isinya
content: – Bupati Kabupaten Kotawaringin Timur (Kotim) Halikinnor mengeluarkan surat edaran tentang Status Siaga Darurat Bencana Kebakaran Hutan dan Lahan (Karhutla) 2024. Surat Keputusan Bupati Kotawaringin Timur Nomor 188.45/0402/Huk BPBD/2024 ini berlaku sejak 18 Juli 2024 hingga 31 Desember 2024, dan dapat diubah sesuai kebutuhan. “Surat ini dikeluarkan agar seluruh instansi terkait bisa mengupayakan pencegahan dan kesiapsiagaan menghadapi potensi Karhutla,” ujarnya, Rabu (14/8). Dalam edaran tersebut, Halikinnor meminta Camat, Lurah, dan Kepala Desa untuk mengimbau warga agar tidak membuka lahan dengan cara membakar. Selain itu, mereka diinstruksikan untuk memasang baliho himbauan dan melakukan koordinasi dengan TNI, Polri, serta Badan Penanggulangan Bencana Daerah (BPBD) untuk pencegahan dan kesiapsiagaan menghadapi potensi kebakaran. “Pembakaran hutan dan lahan merupakan tindakan kejahatan. Oleh karena itu, setiap orang dan pelaku usaha perkebunan yang membuka dan/atau mengolah lahan dengan cara membakar dapat dikenakan sanksi pidana,” tegasnya. Surat edaran ini juga mencakup pemeriksaan kesiapan pihak swasta, termasuk perusahaan besar sawit dan pertambangan, serta Hak Pengusahaan Hutan dalam hal penanganan kebakaran. Penanggulangan kebakaran harus didukung dengan baik, terutama di wilayah yang mengaktifkan Pos Lapangan Kesiapsiagaan Kebakaran Hutan dan Lahan.(sli). – Bupati...

title: El debut soñado de Mbappé, 'MVP' Bellingham y la comparación con el ataque de 2014: "No tenemos límite"
creator: Abraham P. Romero
content: Kylian Mbappé era un hombre feliz ayer sobre el césped del Estadio Nacional de Varsovia. El francés fue titular con el Real Madrid en su primer partido oficial y vio portería para sentenciar al Atalanta . "Es una gran noche. Esperaba este momento desde hace mucho tiempo. Jugar con este escudo, con este equipo, ganar un título... Aquí hay que ganar siempre", analizó después del duelo. Y es que se trata del primer título europeo para Mbappé, que en todas sus temporadas en Francia no había conseguido levantar ninguno. Quizás por eso, Carvajal , segundo capitán por detrás de Modric , se apresuró a darle la copa después de levantarla junto al croata al cielo de Polonia. Para el delantero galo, este Madrid " no tiene límite ". "Es un placer jugar aquí. Tenemos a los mejores jugadores en todas las posiciones. Somos el Real Madrid y no tenemos límite", dijo, y tampoco se quiso poner un techo de goles. "¿50? Si puedo marcar 50, pues 50 . Lo importante es ganar". A unos metros, Florentino Pérez , arquitecto de este SuperMadrid , no podía ocultar su alegría. "Es una victoria y un título que nos dará mucha energía para una temporada larga y complicada", aseguró, antes de alabar la " universalidad " de su equipo. "Tenemos una gran plantilla y así nos lo reconocen los aficionados de todo el mundo, desde la gira por Estados Unidos a esta Supercopa en Polonia". " He...

title: Self-confidence along with determined effort key to success: DC Divya Prabhu
content: Dharwad: To achieve big things in life, a goal is must and then determined efforts with self-confidence is key to success , said deputy commissioner Divya Prabhu. Inaugurating a science exhibition on the eve of 78th Independence Day organised by the KE Board’s Central School in Malamaddi here on Wednesday, she said nothing is impossible if there is dedication to pursue the goal with self-confidence. She said parents should identify the field of interest of their child and encourage him/her to pursue the efforts to reach the goal instead of imposing their whims on the child. The children on their part should have self-confidence and zeal to achieve the goal, she added. Stating that fast changing technology is shortening the memory span of human beings and care should be taken to ensure that basic human memory power does not diminish with the use of technology, Divya hailed the K E Board’s institutions for encouraging students with innovative programmes. President of KE Board Professor Mahadev Joshi presided over the function. Chairman Shrikant Patil welcomed. Secretary DS Rajpurohit introduced the chief guest. KE Board’s Central School principal Ashwin Kumar proposed a vote of thanks. The exhibition will be open for public viewing till Thursday evening. title: Malaitans pleased with MPs’ reconciliation
creator: Moffat Mamu
content: MALAITANS have welcomed the reconciliation ceremony between Members of Parliament (MPs) from Malaita Province within the Opposition, Independent groups and the Government on Monday. News of the reconciliation has generated positive remarks from the public, especially Malaitans. The reconciliation was held in Honiara at the Paul Tovua Complex at the National Parliament in Honiara. The ceremony allowed the political leaders to reconcile their differences over the past years and during the 2024 National General Election campaign period. MP for Aoke-Langalanga and Leader of the Opposition, Mathew Wale, who spoke on behalf of the Malaita MPs of the Opposition, apologized for the derogatory remarks he uttered against Malaita MPs of the government in the past, including the recent election campaign period. Member of Parliament for East Malaita and Minister for Infrastructure Development, Manasseh Maelanga, in turn conveyed apology on behalf of the Malaita MPs in the Government for statements made against Malaita MPs in the Opposition. A West Kwara’ae elder Nathaniel Maegwari, who is amongst the Malaitans who welcomed the reconciliation said, the decision taken by the Malaita MPs to resolve their political differences was timely as Malaita celebrate its 41 Second Appointed Day today. He said, the reconciliation by Malaita’s MPs was what many Malaitans, including himself, have been...

title: University offers support to academic whose daughter was killed at home
creator: Savannah Meacham
content: A university is offering support to an academic after his daughter was allegedly murdered by his wife on Queensland’s Gold Coast. Dr Yun Wang called emergency services after finding his 10-year-old daughter Sophie unresponsive at their Emerald Lakes home in Carrara on Tuesday night. Police are seen at a crime scene in Carrara on the Gold Coast. Credit: AAPIMAGE Paramedics attempted to revive the girl, but she was declared dead at the scene. The girl’s mother, 46-year-old Yingying Xu, was arrested at a nearby street and subsequently charged with murder. The girl’s father is an associate professor in chemistry and forensic science at Griffith University, which is offering Dr Wang and his colleagues support. “We are deeply saddened to hear about the tragic death of the daughter of a valued member of the Griffith community,” a university spokesperson said in a statement. “Our thoughts are with the family and friends at this incredibly difficult time.” Police have described the crime scene as “incredibly confronting” for first responders. “In my 15-year career as a detective, it’s one of the most confronting scenes that I have seen,” Detective Acting Inspector Kent Ellis said.

title: 岸田文雄意外辭職日本首相!用數據看他的3年執政
creator: 中央社
content: 岸田2021年9月底當選自民黨第27任總裁(黨主席),3年任期到今年9月屆滿,自民黨在此之前將舉行總裁選舉。由於自民黨目前在參議院及眾議院掌握多數席次,在這種情況下,其總裁通常都會在國會的首相指名選舉中獲指名為首相,當選總裁意謂著將成為下一任首相。 但在輿論普遍不支持尋求連任的壓力下,岸田今天在首相官邸召開記者會,宣布將不會參選預定9月將舉行的自民黨總裁選舉。從2021年10月4日上任首相,岸田到自民黨新任總裁產生後卸任首相時的任期約3年。 執政逾千天,二戰後首相第8人 岸田執政到今天1046天,預估到9月30日時為1093天,在二次大戰後的35名首相中,岸田是第8位在任時間逾千天的首相。 如果只看21世紀的日本首相,岸田在位期間長度僅次於安倍晉三與小泉純一郎,排名第3。 民調在20%多低檔徘徊 日本經濟新聞最近一次民調顯示,今年7月岸田內閣支持率為28%,從自民黨內派閥爆發政治獻金申報違法醜聞後,岸田內閣從2023年12月起的民調始終維持在2字頭低檔,甚至今年2月及6月還以25%的數字「觸底」。 岸田內閣支持率在剛上任的2021年10月為59%,執政生涯高峰出現在2022年5月的66%,之後雖走下坡,但在2023年4月又反彈回升到52%,不過,此後逐步下滑未再見明顯起色。 日經指數整體走高,日圓持續走貶 日本股市日經平均指數從岸田上任時的2萬8000點左右,到今年3月時一度漲破4萬點,時隔約34年再現1989年泡沫經濟時期的高峰水準。 日經平均指數甚至在今年8月出現過一天暴跌幅度創歷史新高的情況,然後隔天又快速反彈出現最大漲幅。 美元兌日圓從岸田上任時的2021年10月為1美元兌換約110日圓持續走貶,到今年4月29日出現睽違34年貶破160日圓的情況,導致日本政府與日本銀行從4月底到5月出手干預匯市。 今年6月到7月日圓一度再貶到1美元兌換161日圓水準,創下約37年半來新低,日本政府與日銀再度出手干預。 外交走訪32國,防衛預算增加 岸田過去近3年共出訪32個國家,其中最多的是訪美8次,並於今年4月獲邀以國賓身分訪美,成為9年來首位日本首相。 印度太平洋也是岸田經常出訪的目的地,其中赴印度及印尼各3次,也訪問過新加坡2次。岸田意圖讓外界意識到中國擴張海洋等對安全保障帶來的憂慮,並深化跟各國的合作。 岸田7月也在東京舉行「太平洋島國峰會」(PALM),強化與南太島國間關係。 日本政府2022年通過安全保障相關3份文件,決定將原本只占國內生產毛額(GDP)不到1%的防衛相關經費擴編到2%。 在岸田政府之前,日本防衛相關經費約5兆日圓,根據防衛大臣木原稔日前公布的數字,2024年度編列數增加到8兆9000億日圓。 本文轉載自2024.08.14「中央社」,僅反映作者意見,不代表本社立場。 延伸閱讀 熱門 請往下繼續閱讀

title: Gas leakage: Patients rush out of hospital
Exjefe de inteligencia de Carabineros se querella contra fiscal Palma y pareja de la ministra Ángela Vivanco por cohecho y soborno
creator: Paulina Toro
content: Gonzalo Blu era el director de inteligencia de Carabineros cuando se ejecutó la Operación Huracán, esa donde la policía implantó chats falsos en los teléfonos de varios dirigentes de organizaciones mapuche radicales. Carlos Palma fue el fiscal a cargo de la investigación sobre ese montaje. Luis Hermosilla fue el abogado y asesor del segundo gobierno de Sebastián Piñera que monitoreó esa indagatoria para La Moneda. Ahora todos ellos vuelven a compartir causa judicial, aunque en roles distintos. Este lunes 12 por la noche, Gonzalo Blu -quien se retiró de Carabineros en marzo de 2018 con el grado de general- ingresó al sistema judicial una querella por cohecho y soborno en contra de Carlos Palma y de Gonzalo Migueles, pareja de la ministra de la Corte Suprema, Ángela Vivanco. Palma y Migueles están en calidad de imputados en la causa que comanda la Fiscalía de Los Lagos, la que se abrió por una querella presentada por el penalista Fernando Leal. El origen de la causa es un reportaje publicado por CIPER (ver aquí: “ Chats de Hermosilla revelan gestiones de la pareja de la suprema Ángela Vivanco en la última nominación de fiscal nacional” ). En noviembre de 2022, Carlos Palma era candidato a dirigir el Ministerio Público, pero La Moneda escogió como su primera opción al fiscal José Morales. En ese contexto es que se iniciaron conversaciones para que Palma...

title: ‘Drowning Dry’ Review: A Penetrating Lithuanian Drama Depicts a Family Tragedy Through Multiple Fragments
creator: Jordan Mintzer
content: Part of the appeal of Lithuanian director Laurynas Bareisa’s subtly powerful second feature, ( ), is that you never know if what you’re watching is taking place in the present, past or future. Time slips back and forth in a way that constantly pulls the viewer out of their comfort zone, although never at the expense of the story. If anything, the fragmented narrative only deepens the sense of tragedy that looms over this sober tale of two families whose summer holiday winds up going terribly wrong. And yet, things seem to start off pleasantly enough for Ernesta (Gelmine Glemzaite), who heads off to a lakeside country home with her husband, Lukas (Paulius Markevicius, at times a dead ringer for Klaus Kinski) and younger son. They’re accompanied by Ernesta’s sister, Juste (Agne Kaktaite), her husband, Tomas (Giedrius Kiela, who starred in Bareisa’s first feature, ) and their daughter, who looks to be about the same age as Ernesta’s kid. As the families unpack their bags and settle into peaceful country life, some tension does already hang in the air: Lukas, an MMA fighter whose championship bout opens the film, managed to walk away victorious but also with a severe whipping. Ernesta seems to have had enough of seeing her husband getting knocked around, and she keeps her distance from him during the opening scenes, tending to his wounds but otherwise ignoring him in the bedroom....

title: Tras años de aislamiento total: Corea del Norte abriría sus fronteras al turismo internacional a fines de 2024
creator: Valentina Sánchez Cárdenas
content: Dos compañías de viajes con conexiones con el país aislado hicieron anuncios online por separado este miércoles, en los que dijeron a grupos de turistas que se les permitiría visitar la ciudad montañosa de Samjiyon, el supuesto lugar de nacimiento del difunto líder norcoreano Kim Jong Il. (CNN) – Corea del Norte reabrirá el turismo internacional limitado a fines de 2024, casi cinco años después de cerrar por completo las fronteras del país debido a la pandemia de COVID-19, según anunciaron dos compañías de viajes con conexiones con el país aislado. Koryo Tours , con sede en Beijing, y KTG Tours , con sede en Shenyang, hicieron anuncios online por separado este miércoles, en los que dijeron a grupos de turistas que se les permitiría visitar la ciudad montañosa de Samjiyon, el supuesto lugar de nacimiento del difunto líder norcoreano Kim Jong Il. “Hemos recibido la confirmación de nuestro socio local de que el turismo en Samjiyon y probablemente en el resto del país se reanudará oficialmente en diciembre de 2024”, dijo Koryo Tours, y agregó que el itinerario y otros detalles se finalizarán “en los próximos días y semanas”. En una publicación aparte en Facebook , KTG Tours también señaló que las fechas exactas de los recorridos aún no se habían confirmado. “ Hasta ahora solo se ha mencionado Samjiyon , pero creemos que PY (Pyongyang) y otros...
