title: Thai court sacks PM Srettha Thavisin over ethics case
creator: NEWS WIRE
content: BANGKOK - Thailand’s Constitutional Court sacked Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin on Wednesday, branding him dishonest in a ruling in an ethics case that throws the kingdom into fresh political turmoil. The judges ruled 5-4 that Srettha breached regulations by appointing a cabinet minister with a criminal conviction. The ruling comes a week after the same court dissolved the main opposition Move Forward Party (MFP) and banned its former leader from politics for 10 years. Srettha’s appointment showed he “has no honesty and breached ethical standards,” Judge Punya Udchachon said in reading the court’s judgment that “the ministerial position of the prime minister is terminated under the constitution”. The court ruled that Srettha must have known about lawyer Pichit Chuenban’s 2008 conviction when he appointed him, Punya said. Srettha leaves office after less than a year in the job -- the third prime minister from the Pheu Thai party to be kicked out by the Constitutional Court. Thai politics has endured two decades of chronic instability, marked by coups, street protests and court orders, much of it energised by the long-running battle between the military, pro-royalist establishment and progressive parties linked to Pheu Thai patriarch Thaksin Shinawatra. Deputy Prime Minister Phumtham Wechayachai will replace Srettha as a caretaker until parliament meets to choose a replacement....

title: AS abraza la deportividad en La Vuelta un año más
creator: Daniel Miranda
content: El pasado año, en el arranque de La Vuelta en Barcelona, los ciclistas y aficionados observaban con caras de ilusión los maillots clásicos de la carrera: el rojo de líder, el verde de los puntos, el de lunares de la montaña, el blanco de los jóvenes... Y aparecía uno nuevo, simbolizando un abrazo, por el que los presentes mostraban curiosidad: “¿Y este?”. Era la pregunta más habitual para los que llegaban de nuevas a la ronda española. Se trataba del maillot solidario , que se estrenó en 2023 y que, ya consolidado, repetirá en este 2024. Impulsado por la iniciativa de AS Deporte en Positivo, este distintivo sirve para premiar la deportividad en carrera entre los corredores y, al mismo tiempo, apoyar la labor de la ONG española Bicicletas Sin Fronteras (BSF), que proporciona este medio de transporte escolar a niños y jóvenes vulnerables en Senegal (9.000 alumnos, entre los que el rendimiento escolar aumentó el doble)-. Entre los ganadores de este maillot hubo perfiles muy dispares: de gregarios a líderes de equipo, de jóvenes promesas a ciclistas con gran experiencia... Pero todos ellos fueron elegidos por gestos y actitudes merecedoras de un reconocimiento que va más allá de lo deportivo y que ayuda a visibilizar los valores humanos del ciclismo y del deporte. Esta prenda pasó de ser desconocida a un reclamo para los equipos. “El Maillot Solidario en La...

title: Ini Hal-Hal yang Wajib Diperhatikan Peserta CPNS 2024 agar Lolos SKD CAT
content: Dokumen yang harus disiapkan calon pegawai negeri sipil (CPNS) yang akan bertugas di Ibu Kota Negara (IKN) Nusantara. BPOM merilis daftar formasi CPNS 2024 untuk lulusan D3, D4, S1, dan S2 Kemenkumham merilis daftar formasi CPNS dan PPPK untuk seleksi calon aparat aparatur sipil negara 2024. Pendaftar bisa mulai mempersiapkan diri menghadapi tahapan seleksi CPNS 2024, terutama terkait dengan dokumen-dokumen penting. Kisaran gaji petugas Pasukan Pengibar Bendera Pusaka (Paskibraka) upacara Hari Ulang Tahun (HUT) RI ke-79. Badan Kepegawaian Negara (BKN) mengumumkan jadwal seleksi pengadaan calon pegawai negeri sipil (CPNS) 2024. Daftar pemprov hingga pemkot di Indonesia yang sudah umumkan jumlah formasi CPNS dan PPPK 2024 Memahami formasi CPNS di daerah Anda adalah langkah penting pertama dalam mempersiapkan diri untuk seleksi CPNS. Berikut ini beberapa penyebab gagal lolos seleksi atau tidak memenuhi syarat (TMS) pada seleksi administrasi CPNS dan PPPK. Pelaksanaan seleksi CPNS 2024 diklaim transparan, pelamar diminta tidak mudah percaya calo.

title: Escándalo en campaña de Petro: rechazan tutela que pedía acelerar la investigación en la Cámara de Representantes
creator: Licsa Gómez
content: El Tribunal Administrativo de Cundinamarca declaró improcedente una tutela contra la Comisión de Investigación de la Cámara de Representantes en la que se pedía darle trámite a una denuncia por no investigar la posible violación de topes en la campaña a la Presidencia de la República de Gustavo Petro en 2022. La acción legal interpuesta el 6 de junio de 2024 por el Foro Colombia Libre, tenía como argumento principal la supuesta omisión del reporte de un aporte de $500 millones realizado por la Federación Colombiana de Educadores (Fecode) ante el Consejo Nacional Electoral (CNE) . Sin embargo, la respuesta no se obtuvo de manera rápida por parte de la Comisión de Investigación y Acusación de la Cámara de Representantes, lo que impulsó a los denunciantes a acudir a la justicia. Ahora puede seguirnos en Facebook y en nuestro WhatsApp Channel . En la tutela, el foro pedía a dicha comisión del Congreso presentar, “a la mayor brevedad, el proyecto de acusación o de preclusión de la investigación contra el Presidente de la República, Gustavo Petro Urrego, en la Plenaria de la Cámara para que los honorables representantes decidan”. No obstante, la Sección Segunda del Tribunal rechazó la petición al considerar que esa no era la instancia adecuada para ordenar las medidas a la Comisión de Acusaciones. “ Decidir sobre el impulso de esa queja les implicaría...

title: ‘อดีตบิ๊ก ศรภ.’ บอกไม่ต้องรอนานทักษิณเตรียมชื่อนายกฯ ใหม่ไว้มากว่า 1 เดือนแล้ว!
creator: Thongsak
content: พฤหัส, 15 สิงหาคม 2567 สภาพอากาศวันนี้ THAILAND 34°C/28°C LINE : @THAIPOST พฤหัส, 15 สิงหาคม 2567 15 ส.ค.2567 - พล.ท.นันทเดช เมฆสวัสดิ์ อดีตหัวหน้าศูนย์ปฏิบัติการพิเศษ ศูนย์รักษาความปลอดภัยแห่งชาติ (ศรภ.) โพสต์เฟซบุ๊กระบุว่า การพ้นจากตําแหน่ง นายกฯของคุณเศรษฐา นั้น ไม่ได้เกิดจากการกระทํา ของฝ่ายอื่นเลย ดังนั้นใครที่เชียร์เพื่อไทย หรือใครที่โกรธศาลรัฐธรรมนูญมาเมื่อสัปดาห์ที่แล้ว ก็อย่าไปโทษคนอื่นเลยครับ เพราะมันเกิดขึ้นมา จากความใจอ่อนของคุณเศรษฐาเอง ที่ไม่กล้าขัดใจคุณทักษิณ ก็แค่นั้นเอง ในขณะเดียวกันคุณเศรษฐา ก็โชคดี ที่พ้นจากเรื่องดิจิทัลวอลเล็ต ซึ่งประชาชน ก็โชคดีตามไปด้วย เพราะรัฐบาลใหม่ อาจจะให้เงินสดแทนเงินดิจิทัล ซึ่งน่าจะแจก เฉพาะกลุ่มผู้มีรายได้น้อยหรือไม่มีรายได้เท่านั้น ส่วนใครจะมาเป็นนายกฯแทนนั้น ขึ้นอยู่กับคุณทักษิณ จะตัดสินใจว่า (1) ตัวเอง อยากอยู่อย่างสงบหรือไม่ หรือ (2) อยากอยู่แบบตื่นเต้นทุกวัน ถ้าคุณทักษิณ อยากอยู่อย่างสงบ ก็ให้โควตา นรม. แก่พรรคภูมิใจไทยไป แล้วต่อรองเอากระทรวงสําคัญไว้ โดยมอบให้คุณอุ๊งอิ๊ง เข้ามาเรียนรู้ในตําแหน่ง รมว.กระทรวงอะไรก็ได้ ควบตําแหน่งรองนายกฯ ในทางกลับกัน ถ้าคุณทักษิณอยากอยู่แบบตื่นเต้น เดินอยู่บนเส้นทางที่ไม่ฉลาดนัก ก็มอบให้คุณชัยเกษม ซึ่งถ้าตั้งขึ้นมาเป็น นรม. ก็น่าจะอยู่ได้ไม่เกิน 6 เดือน หรือให้คุณอุ๊งอิ๊งขึ้นมาเป็น ก็อาจใช้เวลานานกว่าคุณชัยเกษมนิดนึง ซึ่งใครขี้นมาก่อน ก็เสี่ยงคุกหนักหน่อย คุณชัยเกษมจึงน่าจะได้เป็นก่อน และอาจเสี่ยงติดคุกติดตารางก่อน เรื่องใครเป็นนายกฯนั้น คุณทักษิณ แกเตรียมตัวไว้สักเดือนหนึ่งได้แล้วมั้ง...

title: BJP leaders who attended B’gavi meet are not rebels: Simmha
content: Mysuru: Former BJP MP Pratap Simmha on Wednesday contended that BJP leaders who attended the Belagavi meeting are not rebels. Speaking to reporters, he said BJP leaders Ramesh Jarkiholi and Basanagouda Patil Yatnal are not party rebels, nor is he working against the party. “We met and discussed the preparations to hold a padayatra against the state Congress govt from Kudalasangama to Ballari against the financial irregularities in Karnataka Maharshi Valmiki Scheduled Tribes Development Corporation,” he stated. The padayatra will be held from Sept 17, he added. He said that the party leaders have requested the high command to give permission to hold the padayatra and argued that senior party leaders, including the state unit chief BY Vijayendra, will take part in the rally. “As senior leaders, mainly Yatnal, invited me to attend the meeting, I took part in it to share my experiences regarding the Mysuru Chalo padayatra, which concluded recently in the city. The leaders who attended the meeting are not rebels but sincere party workers,” he claimed. He said that he has reoriented his focus on state politics on the directions of the party high command. To a query on the criticism of state health minister Dinesh Gundu Rao against him for meeting Gowri Lankesh murder accused and calling him his friend, Simmha hit back, saying Congress high command Sonia Gandhi and Rahul Gandhi are...

title: சோனை கருப்பண்ண சாமிக்கு 2,000 மது பாட்டில் படையல்
content: தேனி: சின்னமனூர் அருகே சோனை கருப்பண்ண சாமிக்கு 2 ஆயிரம் மது பாட்டில்களை கொண்டு படையல் போடப்பட்டது. தேனி மாவட்டம், சின்னமனூர் அருகே குச்சனூரில் பழமை வாய்ந்த சுயம்பு சனீஸ்வர பகவான் கோயில் உள்ளது. இக்கோயிலில் ஆடிப்பெருந்திருவிழா மிக விமரிசையாக நடைபெறும். இந்தாண்டு கோயிலில் ரூ.3 கோடி மதிப்பீட்டில் கும்பாபிஷேக திருப்பணிகள் நடைபெறுவதால் விழா நடத்த அனுமதி வழங்கப்படவில்லை. பக்தர்கள் மட்டும் சனிக்கிழமைகளில் தரிசனம் செய்து வருகின்றனர். ஆடிப்பெருந்திருவிழாவின் 4, 5வது சனிக்கிழமைகளின் இடைவெளியில், சனீஸ்வர பகவான் கோயிலின், உபகோயிலான சோனை கருப்பண்ணசாமிக்கு மது படையலுடன் சிறப்பு பூஜை நடைபெறும். இந்த சிறப்பு பூஜை, கடந்த 12ம் தேதி இரவு நடந்தது. இதையொட்டி குதிரை வாகனத்தில் சிறப்பு அலங்காரத்தில் சுவாமி எழுந்தருளினார். பக்தர்கள் காணிக்கையாக வழங்கிய 2 ஆயிரத்திற்கும் மேற்பட்ட மது பாட்டில்கள் படையலிட்டு பூஜை செய்யப்பட்டது. பக்தர்கள் வழங்கிய 47 ஆடுகள், 27 கோழிகள் பலியிடப்பட்டு, அசைவ விருந்து பரிமாறப்பட்டது. நள்ளிரவு 12 மணி வரை நடந்த பூஜையில் ஏராளமான பக்தர்கள் கலந்து கொண்டு சுவாமி தரிசனம் செய்தனர்.

title: કાર્યક્રમ:ગીરગઢડા તાલુકા યુવા ઉત્સવ 2024 ગીરગુંજન વિદ્યાલયમાં થયો સંપન્ન
content: જિલ્લા યુવા અને સાંસ્કૃતિક પ્રવૃત્તિઓની કચેરી દ્વારા ગીરગઢડા તાલુકા યુવાઉત્સવ 2024 કન્વીનર દિલિપભાઈ માલકીયાના નેતૃત્વમાં 12 ઓગસ્ટના વિશ્વ યુવા દિવસે ગીરના નૈસર્ગીક વાતાવરણ ્ને વરસાદી મીઠડી સોડમ સાથે શ્રી ગીરગુંજન વિદ્યાલય- મહોબતપરામાં યોજાયો હતો. જે

title: Town that celebrates freedom at midnight
creator: Manoj Chaurasia
content: Patna: Every year on August 14, as the clock strikes midnight, citizens of Purnia town and nearby areas assemble around Jhanda Chowk to jubilantly hoist the tricolour with enthusiasm and fanfare. The tradition that started on the midnight of August 14, 1947, still continues till today. Purnia is possibly one of the few places in the country which celebrates Independence Day during midnight itself. People recall the interesting story behind the start of this practice. “A group of freedom fighters and citizens were awake till late night at a radio shop near Jhanda Chowk to listen to the formal announcement of India getting Independence in 1947. Finally, that moment came at 12.01pm. Soon after listening to the announcement, people danced with joy on the street. Soon local folks arranged a bamboo and flag from a khadi shop and hoisted it. Since then, this practice has been going on without fail,” social activist Govind Das told the TOI over phone on Wednesday. This time again, local residents have made arrangements to celebrate the Independence Day with great enthusiasm. “It will be a gala function this time. We will play drums, burst crackers and distribute sweets to celebrate the occasion,” said an ebullient RK Sharma associated with social work. In due course, the place where flag hoisting ceremony took place during midnight, was named as “Jhanda Chowk”. The citizens are now...

title: Pasaran saham Malaysia terbaik dalam kalangan negara ASEAN – JP Morgan
creator: ZAKKINA WATI AHMAD TARMIZI
content: 15 Ogos 2024, 9:30 am PETALING JAYA: Pasaran ekuiti Malaysia menunjukkan prestasi yang baik apabila mencatatkan pulangan sekitar sembilan peratus, tertinggi dalam kalangan negara ASEAN, menurut institusi kewangan terkemuka dunia, J.P. Morgan. Sebagai perbandingan, pasaran saham keseluruhan ASEAN yang diukur oleh MSCI ASEAN telah menurun sebanyak empat peratus. J.P. Morgan berkata, reformasi dasar, pelaburan dalam pusat data dan pembinaan infrastruktur menjadi faktor utama yang memacu Malaysia selari dengan pandangan untuk 2024, namun ia berkembang pada kadar yang jauh lebih kukuh daripada jangkaan. “Semua ini, digabungkan dengan pengeluaran dana domestik membawa kepada penilaian semula yang ketara terhadap KLCI/MSCI Malaysia (MXMY). “Penempatan pelabur asing di Malaysia masih rendah, tetapi menunjukkan potensi kenaikan yang lebih besar. “Kami semakin positif terhadap prospek ekuiti Malaysia berdasarkan faktor pendorong tersebut dan menaikkan sasaran asas KLCI kepada 1,650 daripada 1,500 sebelum ini,” menurut nota penyelidikan. J.P Morgan berkata, sektor dan pilihan utamanya termasuk pembinaan, utiliti, teknologi, penjagaan kesihatan dan pelabuhan. “Bagaimanapun, kami mengakui cabaran seperti rasionalisasi subsidi, ketidakstabilan luaran dan potensi impak pilihan raya Amerika Syarikat (AS) yang akan datang boleh menyebabkan perbelanjaan pengguna yang lebih lemah, dolar AS lebih...

title: Staff shuffles at News Corp with launch of State and Communities Mastheads division
creator: Tess Connery
content: News Corp Australia has officially launched its State and Communities Mastheads division, led by managing director and publisher, Mark Reinke . Reinke has appointed John Lehmann to the newly-created role of commercial director of the State and Communities Mastheads, which includes the Herald Sun, The Daily Telegraph, The Courier-Mail, The Advertiser as well as regional, rural and community titles. In this expanded role, Lehmann remains in his existing role of managing director, NSW. “Our audiences are the millions of aspiring Australians who want the best for their families and their communities,” Lehmann said. “They are highly engaged and motivated and our state mastheads offer clients the ability to reach consumers who are making important purchasing decisions every week. By focusing on each state and its unique needs, there is a real opportunity for business growth and differentiates us from other media in the market.” Laura Maxwell has been appointed managing director, Queensland. She was most recently the CEO of Stuff Group , New Zealand’s largest news publisher. Maxwell will join News Corp Australia in November and replaces Jason Scott who has been appointed executive editor, sport network. Agostino Giramondo takes on the role of managing director, Victoria and Tasmania. He replaces Peter Zavecz who recently retired. Prior to this role, Giramondo was general manager of...

title: Choi Tae Joon Acts Like A Protective Older Brother To Geum Sae Rok In Upcoming Romance Drama
creator: eclipse01
content: KBS 2TV’s upcoming drama “Iron Family” has shared a new glimpse of Choi Tae Joon ’s character’s transformation! “Iron Family” is a new “romantic black comedy” about a family that has run a laundry business for three generations. Geum Sae Rok will star as Lee Da Rim, the youngest daughter of the Cheongryeom Laundry family, who suffers from a rare illness that progressively narrows her vision. Kim Jung Hyun will play Seo Kang Joo, an executive director at Jiseung Group, who belongs to the richest family in the Cheongryeom neighborhood but struggles to earn the approval of his father. Choi Tae Joon will play the role of Cha Tae Woong, a part-time worker at Cheongryeom Laundry. Abandoned by his parents at birth, Cha Tae Woong grew up in an orphanage and always had to fend for himself. With nowhere to go after becoming a legal adult, Cha Tae Woong was a lost soul wandering aimlessly until Go Bong Hee (Park Ji Young)—the daughter-in-law of the Cheongryeom Laundry family—helped him get back on his feet and find his first stepping stone towards adult life. Newly released stills from the upcoming drama capture the changes in Cha Tae Woong after he meets the Cheongryeom Laundry family. In contrast to his dark, empty gaze and unkempt hair from before, Cha Tae Woong adopts a more clean-cut look and exudes a bright, confident aura after getting a job at Cheongryeom Laundry and becoming...

title: Begini Kata Kylian Mbappe setelah Cetak Gol dalam Debut dan Bawa Real Madrid Juarai Piala Super Eropa 2024
content: Real Madrid berhasil menjuarai Piala Super Eropa 2024 setelah menang 2-0 atas Atalanta. Kylian Mbappe mencetak gol dalam debutnya. Striker Real Madrid, Vinicius Junior dapat tawaran fantastis dari klub Arab Saudi, lebih dari satu miliar Euro atau Rp17,2 triliun untuk 5 tahun. Kylian Mbappe akan melakukan debutnya bersama Real Madrid di Piala Super Eropa 2024 (UEFA Super Cup 2024) melawan Atalanta, Kamis dinihari nanti. Striker berbakat Real Madrid, Vinicius Junior, mendapatkan tawaran fantastis dari klub Arab Saudi. Ia ditawar lebih dari satu miliar Euro. Berikut profil dan karier Vinicius. Pertandingan Real Madrid vs Atalanta di final Piala Super Eropa akan digelar di Warsawa, Polandia, Kamis dinihari WIB, 15 Agustus 2024. Duel Real Madrid vs Atalanta di final Piala Super Eropa akan berlangsung di Warsawa, Polandia, Rabu malam waktu setempat atau Kamis dinihari WIB. Duel Real Madrid vs Atalanta bertemu dalam ajang Piala Super Eropa 2024 di Stadion Narodowy. Mengapa Los Blancos lebih diunggulkan? Klub Spanyol Real Madrid membawa para pemain terbaiknya, termasuk Kylian Mbappe, untuk pertandingan Piala Super Eropa melawan Atalanta. Striker Real Madrid Vinicius Junior dilaporkan mendapat tawaran senilai lebih dari satu miliar euro dari Arab Saudi untuk kontrak lima tahun. Duel Real Madrid vs Atalanta dalam laga Piala Super EUFA pekan depan, Kamis dinihari WIB.

title: నలుగురికి కీర్తి చక్ర
creator: bharath kumar
content: న్యూఢిల్లీ, ఆగస్టు 14: స్వాతంత్య్ర దినోత్సవం సందర్భంగా సాయుధ బలగాలు, కేంద్ర సాయుధ పోలీసు బలగాలకు చెందిన 103 మందికి శౌర్య పురస్కారాలు లభించాయి. ఈ మేరకు రాష్ట్రపతి ద్రౌపది ముర్ము బుధవారం ఆమోదం తెలిపారు. ఇందులో నాలుగు కీర్తి చక్ర, 18 శౌర్య చక్ర పురస్కారాలు కాగా, 63 సేనా పతకాలు(శౌర్య), 11 నౌ సేనా పతకాలు, ఆరు వాయు సేనా పతకాలు ఉన్నాయి. మరణానంతరం ముగ్గురికి కీర్తి చక్ర పురస్కారాలు, నలుగురికి శౌర్య చక్ర దక్కనున్నాయి. సైనిక ఆపరేషన్‌లలో విశేష సేవలు అందించినందుకు గానూ 39 మెన్షన్‌ ఇన్‌ డిస్పాచ్‌లకు సైతం రాష్ట్రపతి ఆమోదం తెలిపారు. ఇందులో మరణించిన సైనిక జాగిలం కెంత్‌ కూడా ఉంది. పతకాలు, పురస్కారాల స్థాయి కానప్పటికీ ప్రదర్శించిన శౌర్య ప్రతాపాలకు మెన్షన్‌ ఇన్‌ డిస్పాచ్‌ అనే గుర్తింపును ఇస్తారు. కాగా, శౌర్య పురస్కారాల్లో ఎక్కువగా సీఆర్పీఎఫ్‌ సిబ్బందికే దక్కాయి. సీఆర్పీఎఫ్‌కు సేవలందించిన 52 మంది శౌర్య పురస్కారాలకు ఎంపికయ్యారు. శాంతి సమయంలో ఇచ్చే రెండో అత్యున్నత శౌర్య పురస్కారమైన కీర్తి చక్రకు ఆర్మీకి సేవలు అందించిన నలుగురు ఎంపికయ్యారు. రాష్ట్రీయ రైఫిల్స్‌ 19వ బెటాలియన్‌కు చెందిన కర్నల్‌ మన్‌ప్రీత్‌ సింగ్‌(మరణానంతరం), 56వ బెటాలియన్‌కు చెందిన మేజర్‌ మల్ల రామగోపాల్‌ నాయుడు, 63వ బెటాలియన్‌కు చెందిన రైఫిల్‌మ్యాన్‌ రవికుమార్‌(మరణానంతరం), జమ్ము కశ్మీర్‌ పోలీసు శాఖలో డీసీపీగా పని చేసిన హుమయున్‌ ముజమ్మిల్‌ భట్‌(మరణానంతరం)కు కీర్తి చక్ర పురస్కారాలు దక్కాయి. శాంతికాలంలో ఇచ్చే మూడో అత్యున్నత శౌర్య పురస్కారమైన శౌర్య చక్ర పురస్కారం ఆర్మీకి సేవలు అందించిన కర్నల్‌ పవన్‌ సింగ్‌, మేజర్‌ సీవీఎస్‌ నిఖిల్‌,...

title: Docs write, perform song for soldiers
content: Surat: A group of seven doctors from Valsad turned stage artists to perform a song written by a doctor in honour of the country’s soldiers. Taking out time from their busy schedules, the group choreographed a dance in a short time to take the message to a large audience. The group now plans to reach more doctors with their initiative. The group will upload a video of their performance to send their message to soldiers on Independence Day. Dr Bhadra met a BSF jawan six years ago when a company of the force was travelling on the national highway through Valsad and a soldier suddenly faced a medical emergency. He was taken to the hospital and needed emergency surgery. While being discharged, the jawan hoisted the national flag on August 15 at a school run by Dr Bhadra. During their conversation, he described the sacrifices soldiers make in protecting the country. Inspired, Dr Bhadra thought of writing a song. Being a tracker, Dr Bhadra visited border areas in the northern states, Kutch, and Rajasthan. Witnessing the conditions and dedication of the soldiers, he penned the song, “Tiranga Hamari Shaan Hai, Hum Bharat Ke Wo Sainik Hai, Tiranga Hamari Jaan Hai”. “The song was ready three years ago and was composed along with Subhash Pandit. Recently, we planned to perform it on stage with dance and I thought to involve doctors so they can further spread awareness about the sacrifices...

title: Woman wins payout after ‘sexsomnia’ rape case dropped
content: A woman has received £35,000 in compensation after her rape case was dropped amid claims she could have had an episode of “sexsomnia”. Jade Blue McCrossen-Nethercott, 32, contacted police in 2017, telling them she thought she had been raped while asleep. She said she had woken up half-naked, finding her necklace broken on the floor. But charges were dropped by the Crown Prosecution Service (CPS) days before a trial was due to begin after lawyers for the alleged perpetrator claimed Jade had sexsomnia - a medically recognised, but rare, sleep disorder that causes a person to engage in sexual acts while asleep. Jade has now received compensation from the CPS, which said it has “apologised unreservedly”. It added that it was “committed to improving every aspect of how life-changing crimes like rape are dealt with”. Jade said the CPS had “taken me to the darkest points of my life”, and that it felt “like a big triumph to be able to hold them accountable”. Her lawyers, from the Centre for Women's Justice, said it was "extremely rare" for the CPS to make a payout like this. In 2017, after a night out with friends, Jade woke up on a sofa with a feeling she had been raped while she slept. Within hours, she had reported it to the police. The suspect offered no comment when questioned and the CPS made the decision to charge him with rape. But in 2020, just days before the trial was due...

title: கோவை வழித்தடத்தில் கொச்சுவேலி - பாட்னா இடையே சிறப்பு ரயில்
creator: Din
content: கோவை, ஆக. 14: கேரள மாநிலம் கொச்சுவேலியில் இருந்து பிகாா் மாநிலம் பாட்னாவுக்கு கோவை வழித்தடத்தில் ஒருவழிச் சிறப்பு ரயில் இயக்கப்படுவதாக, ரயில்வே நிா்வாகம் சாா்பில் தெரிவிக்கப்பட்டுள்ளது.

title: "Shut it down": Vancouver thrift store lashes out over $300K crime costs
creator: Claire Fenton
content: A longtime Vancouver thrift store along the Granville Entertainment District strip is lashing out against governments over the ongoing business costs it claims are due to a nearby affordable housing site. Wildlife Thrift Store is on the corner of Granville and Drake, and its owners are calling for action after they say the staff turnover, stress, and financial costs have reached a boiling point. “The last three years, our business has spent over $300,000 to cover the recent, mandatory costs of security guards and broken windows. This is a ‘new cost of doing business’ we have been forced to pay in order to keep employees safe and keep up with the ongoing damage to our building,” it wrote on Instagram. “In 2021, The Howard Johnson Hotel on Granville Street was converted to house those experiencing homelessness, mental health and addiction — the EXACT demographic our business aims to help through regular quarterly donations and has in Vancouver for over 23 years now. All of those dollars 💸 COULD have gone/be going to the charities we benefit.” The store is not a registered charity. However, its website suggests it has donated more than $150,000 to charities such as Coast Mental Health, The Gathering Place, and the Greater Vancouver Food Bank in 2024 alone. “The Lower Mainland is vast — there are superior, less harmful locations to help patients than the centre of our beautiful...

title: إقرار أمريكي إسرائيلي بفشل جيش الاحتلال في غزة.. "احتمالات إضعاف حماس تضاءلت"
content: نقلت صحيفة "نيويورك تايمز" عن مسؤولين أمريكيين وإسرائيليين قولهم، إن "احتمالات إضعاف حماس تضاءلت بشكل أكبر"، مبينة أن "إسرائيل حققت كل ما تستطيع تحقيقه على الصعيد العسكري في غزة ". وأوضح المسؤولون أنه "لا يمكن استعادة الرهائن المحتجزين في غزة بالوسائل العسكرية". وأضاف المسؤولون أن "إسرائيل حاولت إلحاق الضرر بشبكة الأنفاق في غزة، لكنها فشلت في تدميرها"، مبينة أن "شبكة الأنفاق أثبتت أنها أكبر مما توقعته إسرائيل، وهي وسيلة فعالة لحماس". اظهار أخبار متعلقة ووفقا للصحيفة، فإن "مسؤولين في البنتاغون يعتقدون أن إسرائيل لم تثبت بعد قدرتها على تأمين مناطق سيطرتها في غزة". وأكد المسؤولون، أن الدبلوماسية هي السبيل الوحيد الذي سيمكن إسرائيل من استعادة المحتجزين. وفي عدة مناسبات، أقر جيش الاحتلال باستحالة تحقيق الهدف الرئيسي من عدوانه الوحشي على قطاع غزة، وهو تدمير حركة المقاومة الإسلامية "حماس"، مشددا على أن حماس فكرة لا يمكن تدميرها. وفي حزيران/ يونيو الماضي، قال المتحدث باسم جيش الاحتلال، دانيال هاغاري، إن "الحديث عن تدمير حماس هو بمثابة ذر للرماد في أعين الجمهور، وذلك لأنها مغروسة في قلوب الناس". وأضاف في لقاء أجرته معه القناة "13" العبرية، منتقدا قيادات الاحتلال السياسية التي تدعو للقضاء على حركة المقاومة، أن "حماس فكرة، ولا يمكنك تدمير فكرة، يجب على المستوى السياسي أن يجد بديلا لها وإلا فستبقى". وشدد هاغاري على أن الاحتلال "يدفع ثمناً باهظاً في الحرب، لكننا لا يمكن أن نبقى صامتين"، مشيرا إلى أنه "لا يمكن إعادة كل الأسرى...

title: Jim Cramer reviews how declining companies can turn things around
content: watch now VIDEO 2:48 02:48 'You should thank' Howard Schultz for firing Starbucks CEO Narasimhan, says Jim Cramer Mad Money with Jim Cramer CNBC's Jim Cramer on Wednesday discussed several companies whose stocks have recently seen declines, explaining whether they can turn around their business. "Look, we can bemoan companies that can't shoot straight. Or we can look at, say, what Larry Culp did when he came in and saved GE from collapse. We can see the immediate faith the market places in Brian Niccol to turn around Starbucks," he said. "This can be done — the companies have to stop fighting it, though." Cramer first considered Starbucks, saying companies that want to improve need a major change at the top, stressing that the coffee retailer "is going to become the model" for success after announcing Tuesday that it had tapped Niccol, CEO of Chipotle , to lead the company. The stock soared on the news. To Cramer, it had become clear that Starbucks was a "great company with loyal customers and not-so-hot management." Disney is also "salvageable," because it has many valuable franchises and, with the right management, can succeed, he argued. But when it comes to former Dow Jones Industrial Average stock Walgreens , he said the company may be too damaged to execute a turnaround. Despite his faith in CEO Tim Wentworth, Cramer said the executive may have been tasked with the...

title: આક્રોશ:સોનપરામાં વીજ તંત્રએ તોતિંગ બીલ ફટકાર્યા ક્રોધિત ગ્રામજનો અંધારામાં જન્માષ્ટમી ઉજવશે
content: ડોળાસા નજીકના સોનપરા ગામના લોકોએ ઊના પીજીવીસીએલના ત્રાસથી કંટાળી જન્માષ્ટમીના દિવસે તમામ વીજધારકો પોતાના વીજ મીટર છોડાવી ઊના કચેરી ખાતે જમા કરાવી આગવી ઢબે વિરોધ કરશે. ગીરગઢડાના સોનપરા ગામે તાજેતરમાં ઊના પીજીવીસીએલ દ્વારા વહેલી સવારે દરેક ઘરમાં દરવાજા સોનપરા ગામના લોકો જણાવી રહ્યા છે કે, ઊના વીજ કંપનીના અમુક અધિકારીઓની મનમાનીનો ભોગ ગામના ગરીબ લોકો બન્યા છે. તેમજ અમુક લોકો પર વીજ ચોરીના કેસ પણ દાખલ કરવામાં આવતા સોનપરા ગામના લોકો માનસીક ત્રાસનો ભોગ બન્યા છે. જેને લઈ આગામી 6 ઓગસ્ટને જન્માષ્ટમીના દિવસે લોકો અંધારે જન્મોત્સવ ઉજવશે. અને પોતાના વીજ મીટર ઉતારી ઊના કચેરીમાં જમા કરાવી અનોખી રીતે પોતાનો આક્રોશ વ્યકત કરશે. શું કહે છે સરપંચ ? સોનપરાના સરપંચ ડો. ઉમેશભાઈ વાઢેરે કહ્યું હતું કે, અમારા ગામના એવા ગરીબ લોકો વીજ તંત્રનો શિકાર બન્યા છે જેને સરકારે મફત ગેસ તો આપ્યો છે પણ બાટલો ભરવાના પૈસા તેઓ પાસે નથી જેથી લાકડા બાળીને રસોઈ બનાવી રહ્યાં છે. જેથી ગ્રામ પંચાયત અને લોકોની માંગ છે કે, આ તમામ લોકો સામે થયેલ વીજ ચોરીની ફરિયાદ પાછી ખેંચવામાં નહી આવે તો વીજ તંત્રનો બહિષ્કાર કરી પોતાના મીટર વીજ કંપનીની ઊના કચેરીમાં જમા કરાવી દેશે એવી ચિમકી પણ ઉચ્ચારી હતી.

Megyn Kelly Applauds ‘Late Show’ Crowd for ‘Humiliating’ Kaitlan Collins With Laughter: ‘They Knew That Was a Farce’ | Video
creator: The Wrap
content: Megyn Kelly applauded Stephen Colbert’s “Late Show” audience for laughing at Kaitlan Collins on Kelly said on her SirusXM show Wednesday that despite Colbert’s “left-wing New York audience,” they knew the late night host calling CNN’s news coverage objective while interviewing Collins on Monday was a “farce.” “She [Kaitlan Collins] is on CNN, she goes over to get the lovely treatment from Stephen Colbert on how amazing she and how amazing CNN is,” Kelly said. “And the left-wing New York City audience brought some truth to the matter ... Unbelievable. How humiliating and good for that audience. They knew that was a farce.” Watch the “Megyn Kelly Show” segment below: The laughter came Monday while Collins was talking about Donald Trump reeling in the wake of President Joe Biden’s choice to drop out of the election in favor of Vice President Kamala Harris. She pointed out he couldn’t find a usual avenue of attack for someone a couple decades younger than him. “I know you guys are objective over there, that you just report the news as it is,” Colbert followed without irony. What followed was laughter from the studio audience that seemed to surprise both Collins and Colbert. “Is that supposed to be a laugh line?” she asked. “It wasn’t supposed to be,” Colbert said, “but I guess it is.” Watch the “The Megyn Kelly Show” clip in full above and Colbert’s interview with Collins below....

title: Capturan a secretario de Gobierno de ciudad colombiana por liderar banda de ‘narcos’
creator: EFE
content: Bogotá – Las autoridades colombianas, con el apoyo de la DEA, capturaron al secretario de Gobierno de Maicao, la segunda ciudad del departamento de La Guajira (norte), con fines de extradición por encabezar una banda de narcotraficantes que enviaba cocaína a Estados Unidos y Centroamérica, informó este miércoles la Policía. La Policía colombiana dijo en un comunicado que Kevin Simón López «utilizaba su investidura de servidor público para ocultar su actuar delictivo, dado que se desempeñaba como Secretario de Gobierno y en la actualidad estaba designado como Alcalde encargado del municipio de Maicao». López fue capturado en Maicao, mientras que otras cinco personas, también solicitadas en extradición por Estados Unidos, fueron arrestadas en Riohacha y en Cúcuta, la capital del departamento de Norte de Santander, por ser parte de la banda de narcotraficantes liderada por López. Las detenciones son el punto final de una investigación que se extendió dos años y que permitió la incautación de más de seis toneladas de estupefacientes, siete armas de fuego y 36 capturas trasnacionales de ciudadanos venezolanos, dominicanos y colombianos. Ellos, según la Policía colombiana, hacían «parte de la cadena logística en el transporte marítimo de cocaína, desde la alta Guajira hacia Centroamérica, y con la que se obtuvo suficiente material probatorio que puso al...

title: “Esperamos el compromiso del Congreso para que se elimine esta práctica nociva”: Profamilia sobre la ley contra matrimonio infantil
content: Este miércoles, la prohibición del matrimonio infantil en Colombia quedó a solo un debate de convertirse en ley de la República. La Comisión Primera del Senado aprobó este proyecto de ley, denominado ‘Son niñas no esposas’, que busca eliminar el matrimonio infantil y las Uniones Tempranas Forzadas, MIUTF. Se trata del noveno intento en la que los defensores de las niñas, niños y adolescentes en el país se unen para convertir este asunto en ley de la república y la primera vez que la discusión avanza a este nivel del debate legislativo. Así las cosas, el articulado queda ahora en manos de la plenaria del Senado. Varias asociaciones dedicadas a luchar por los derechos de los niños celebraron este importante paso. Una de estas es Profamilia, entidad que acompaña a niños y jóvenes en el ejercicio pleno de sus derechos sexuales y reproductivos, contribuyendo a la equidad y la reducción de la pobreza. Marta Royo, directora ejecutiva y representante de Profamilia, recuerda que desde el 2007 se ha buscado en el país un cambio en el Código Civil para que no se permita más el matrimonio infantil. Ahora, tras ocho proyectos “que en el pasado no lograron ni siquiera ser discutidos, podemos afirmar que finalmente se está logrando afianzar un compromiso de los congresistas con la protección y garantía de los derechos de las niñas, niños y adolescentes”. Para Royo,...

title: UAE-based fintech Yuze rises $30m
[단독] 한동훈 "간첩법 개정 당연히 당론 추진해야"...21일 법 개정 토론회 참석
content: 국민의힘이 간첩을 잡아도 처벌 못 하는 현행 간첩법 개정을 당론으로 추진할 전망이다. 국민의힘 한동훈 대표는 15일 세계일보에 “간첩법 개정은 당연히 당론 추진해야 할 사안”이라고 밝혔다. 한 대표는 장동혁 최고위원이 21일 국회에서 주최하는 간첩법 개정 입법 토론회에도 참석할 계획이라고 했다. 장 최고위원이 주최하는 토론회는 ‘간첩을 간첩죄로 처벌하지 못하는 대한민국, 이대로 괜찮은가’라는 주제로 열릴 예정이다. 한국안보형사법학회 박광민 회장이 좌장을, 오산대 김재현 교수(경찰행정학)가 발제를 맡기로 했다. 관련 주제 토론자로는 법무부 공공형사과 이웅희 검사와 한국형사정책연구원 윤해성 박사, 유창준 전 국가정보원 국가안보국장이 나서기로 했다. 장 최고위원은 통화에서 “한 대표와 상의하며 준비 중인 토론회”라며 “사실상 지도부 차원에서 하는 것이라고 볼 수 있다”고 말했다. 또 “이번 토론회를 계기로 야당에도 법 개정을 빨리하자고 얘기할 것”이라고 했다. 일명 간첩법은 형법 98조를 말한다. ‘적국’을 위해 간첩 행위를 하거나 ‘적국’을 위한 간첩 행위를 방조하는 경우 사형, 무기 또는 7년 이상 징역에 처한다는 내용이다. 군형법 13조에도 비슷한 취지 조항이 있다. 어길 시 사형 또는 무기징역이다. 현행 간첩법의 맹점은 대한민국의 ‘적국’이 정전 상태로 대치 중인 북한뿐임을 간과하고...

title: Construye ONG en Cacahuatepec casas tradicionales a damnificados por Otis
creator: tere
content: Acapulco, Guerrero, 14 de agosto de 2024.- La organización Cooperación Comunitaria construye viviendas tradicionales en los Bienes Comunales de Cacahuatepec a personas que se vieron afectadas por el impacto del huracán Otis, en octubre pasado. En un recorrido por la zona se observó la construcciones hechas de adobe, pero reforzadas para resistir un sismo, y que han sido edificadas con base a las necesidades de sus habitantes. La coordinadora de la organización, Isadora Hastings García dijo que ya conocían la zona de los Bienes Comunales y decidieron apoyar a los damnificados. Precisó que en una primera etapa esperan construir 23 casas tradicionales hechas con material de la región y con ayuda de los habitantes. Isadora Hastings informó que se trabaja de manera simultánea en las comunidades de Cruces de Cacahuatepec y El Cantón y esas viviendas aproximadamente tienen una inversión de 230 mil pesos. Una de las beneficiadas es Clarita Zenaida Antonio, quien con sus siete hijos vivían en una casa de palos y cartón de 48 metros cuadrados, cuyo techo de lámina voló Otis. Su vivienda quedó a punto de caerse. Ahora, ella vivirá en una casa de 110 metros cuadrados con tres cuartos, un patio y una cocina que se le construirá. Clarita explicó que junto con sus hijos y la ayuda de sus vecinos acarrearon unos dos carros de grava, así como el adobe. Se mostró feliz y...

title: Terkenal Humanis dan Pluralis, Anwar Hafid Rangkul Umat Hindu Majukan Sulteng
content: - Sulawesi Tengah (Sulteng) Anwar Hafid semakin mendapat tempat di hati masyarakat berbagai kalangan. Sosoknya yang dan pluralis merangkul masyarakat Hindu memajukan Sulteng. Kepemimpinannya yang inklusif dan penuh perhatian terhadap menjadi alasan utama mengapa banyak pihak memberikan dukungan kepadanya. Dukungan tersebut datang dari Parisada Hindu Dharma Indonesia (PHDI) Provinsi Sulteng. “Apresiasi kami kepada Pak Anwar Hafid karena kami berharap kedepan Sulteng dipimpin seseorang yang humanis dan pluralis,” kata Ketua PHDI Sulteng I Wayan Sudiyana, Rabu (14/8/2024). Sudiyana mengatakan, ini pertama kali dukungan PHDI diberikan kepada seorang calon Gubernur Sulawesi Tengah. Bukan tanpa alasan, Sudiyana mengatakan, Anwar Hafid memiliki kedekatan luar biasa dengan umat Hindu. “Ini memang yang pertama, ini karena hubungan beliau umat hindu sangat baik,” ujarnya. Kedekatan tersebut diartikan Sudiyana bahwa, Anwar Hafid adalah sosok yang tidak pernah membeda-bedakan latar belakang umat. Meski minoritas, Sudiyana mengatakan, Anwar Hafid sudah sangat jelas mengakomodir setiap kebutuhan masyarakat hindu. “Pandangan kami beliau sangat mengakomodir semua umat, termasuk kami umat Hindu meskipun kami minoritas,” tandasnya. Selain itu, rekam jejak di Morowali juga mempengaruhi dukungan besar ini. Anwar Hafid sukses memberikan insentif bagi seluruh pemuka agama ketika dahulu memimpin...

title: பெண்ணை கொன்றுவிட்டு முதியவர் தற்கொலை: கள்ளக்காதல் தகராறில் நடந்ததா?
content: திட்டக்குடி: வீட்டில் தனியாக இருந்த பெண்ணை கத்தியால் குத்தி கொலை செய்துவிட்டு, முதியவர் தூக்கிட்டு தற்கொலை செய்து கொண்ட சம்பவம் பரபரப்பை ஏற்படுத்தி உள்ளது. கடலூர் மாவட்டம், திட்டக்குடி பெருமுளை கிராமத்தை சேர்ந்தவர் சின்னபொண்ணு (50). இவரது மகன்கள் மணிகண்டன், மணிமாறன் இருவருக்கும் திருமணமாகி அதே கிராமத்தில் வசித்து வருகின்றனர். கணவர் இறந்துவிட்டதால் சின்னபொண்ணு திட்டக்குடியை அடுத்துள்ள வதிஷ்டபுரம் பகுதியில் வாடகைக்கு வீடு எடுத்து 5 மாதமாக வசித்து வந்துள்ளார். இந்நிலையில், அவரது மூத்த மகன் மணிகண்டன், நேற்று காலை தாயை பார்க்க வீட்டுக்கு சென்றுள்ளார். அப்போது வீட்டின் முன்பக்க கேட் பூட்டி இருந்தது. மாற்றுச்சாவியால் திறந்து உள்ளே சென்று பார்த்தபோது, சின்னபொண்ணு ரத்த வெள்ளத்தில் கீழே இறந்து கிடந்தார். அருகில் 70 வயது முதியவர் ஜன்னலில் சேலையால் தூக்கிட்டு பிணமாக தொங்கிய நிலையில் இருந்துள்ளார். இதை பார்த்து அதிர்ச்சி அடைந்த மணிகண்டன், திட்டக்குடி காவல் நிலையத்திற்கு தகவல் கொடுத்தார். போலீசார் நடத்திய விசாரணையில், தூக்கில் இறந்து கிடந்தவர் பெரம்பலூர் மாவட்டம் லாடபுரம் பகுதியை சேர்ந்த சதாசிவம் (70) என்பதும், அப்பகுதியில் உள்ள பள்ளியில் வாட்ச்மேனாக வேலை பார்த்து வந்ததும், 2 மாதத்திற்கு முன் வயது மூப்பு காரணமாக வேலையில் இருந்து விலகியதாகவும் தெரியவந்தது. சின்னபொண்ணு மார்பு மற்றும் முதுகு பகுதியில் கத்தியால் குத்தி கொலை செய்யப்பட்டிருந்தார். கள்ளக்காதல் தகராறில் முதியவர் பெண்ணை கொலை செய்து தானும் தூக்கிட்டு தற்கொலை செய்து கொண்டாரா அல்லது வேறு ஏதேனும் காரணமா என போலீசார்...

title: Siapa Penguasa Kelas Welter setelah Terence Crawford: Jaron Ennis Raja Baru 66,6 Kg?
content: Siapa penguasa tinju kelas welter setelah naik kelas welter super? Apakah raja baru di kelas 66,6 kilogram? Hanya ketika Anda melihat apa yang tersisa dari divisi welterweight yang ditinggalkan Terence Crawford, Anda akan mulai mendapatkan pemahaman yang lebih baik tentang mengapa ia ingin meninggalkannya. Meskipun tidak kekurangan talenta, kelas welter 66,6 kg tentu saja kekurangan bintang, bahkan yang potensial, dan oleh karena itu Crawford, pada usia 36 tahun, tidak dapat membuang-buang waktu di divisi yang telah ditaklukkan. Ia harus mengejar lawan dan bukannya menunggu mereka muncul, dan hal ini ia lakukan pada 3 Agustus, saat melengserkan Israil Madrimov, pemegang gelar kelas menengah junior WBA, di Los Angeles. Sejak saat itu, Crawford tentu saja telah dikaitkan dengan berbagai pertarungan dan lawan lainnya, namun sebagian besar dari mereka berada di atas kelas welter, dengan beberapa di antaranya bertarung di kelas menengah atau bahkan kelas menengah super. Sementara itu, pada hari Senin, Organisasi Tinju Dunia mengumumkan bahwa Crawford mengosongkan gelar kelas welter WBO-nya untuk tetap berada di kelas welter super atau, mungkin, menjelajah lebih jauh. Apa pun itu, apakah Crawford memilih untuk tetap berada di kelas menengah junior atau menjadi kelas menengah super untuk satu malam, yang jelas sekarang adalah bahwa pekerjaannya telah selesai di kelas welter. Di kelas...

title: Liga de Portoviejo dio el primer golpe en la semifinal provincial de ascenso
creator: Carlos García
content: En la primera semifinal del torneo provincial de ascenso, el conjunto de Liga de Portoviejo superó 0-4 a Jipijapa FC. Dicho encuentro se jugó la tarde de este miércoles 14 de agosto del 2024 en el estadio Arturo Zavala, de Jipijapa. El cuadro portovejense mostró su papel de favorito en esta llave desde los primeros minutos. A los 7′, Edwin Méndez cobró un tiro libre y el colombiano Jhoján Riasco remató de cabeza y superó al golero Miguel Micolta. Sin embargo a los 32′, Riasco marcó la segunda con un remate de pierna izquierda, tras una asistencia de Efrén Proaño. Ocho minutos después, Liga anotó la tercera por medio de Jefferson Castro en esta primera semifinal provincial de ascenso. El juninense aprovechó un pivoteo de Jackson Landazuri y con remate de izquierda venció al golero Micola. La segunda semifinal del torneo de ascenso es el domingo En el segundo tiempo, Liga bajó las revoluciones, mientras su rival quiso aprovecharse de aquello pero no fue efectivo. A los 64′, el paraguayo César Espínola por medio de un tiro libre superó al golero Micolta. En esta acción el balón se incrustó al ángulo superior derecho del arco que defendía el golero de Jipijapa. La revancha se jugará este domingo desde las 15h00, en el estadio Reales Tamarindos. El ganador de esta serie accede a la final única del torneo de ascenso. Por su parte, La Paz derrotó por 0-2 a...

title: El Real Madrid firma su sexta Supercopa al vencer 2-0 al Atalanta, Mbappé un debut soñado
creator: Hondudiario Redacción
content: *** El triunfo engrosa las ya de por sí pobladas vitrinas madridistas. Supercopa de Europa conquistada y gol de Kylian Mbappé en su estreno (2-0). El guion ideal del Real Madrid para lograr, contra el Atalanta italiano, su sexto título en el torneo se cumplió; aunque para ello tuvo que escapar de la incertidumbre que le generó un primer tiempo con poco brillo y empezar a dar muestras de su mejor versión en el segundo. Se encontró el conjunto blanco en el arranque con un rival de ideas claras; intenso en la presión, dispuesto a salir cuando podía a la contra en grupo y rápido, desprovisto de complejos para buscar el contacto cuerpo a cuerpo a la mínima necesidad. Una amarilla antes de los diez minutos contuvo el ímpetu en general y el de Éderson en particular, vital en el eje del centro de campo toda vez que su compañero de faena, el capitán Marten de Roon, estaba entregado en cuerpo y alma a su papel de sombra de Jude Bellingham. Anulado el inglés, a los suyos les faltó chispa para sacar el balón desde atrás y agitar el ataque. Llegaron entonces gestos esporádicos de desesperación entre los de arriba, con problemas para encontrar continuidad en sus acciones y generar peligro. Así, a la media hora el vigente campeón de Europa solo se había acercado en un golpeo desde dentro del área de un volátil Mbappé, tapado por la defensa; y en un centro desde la...

title: Judge tells Google to brace for shakeup of Android app store as punishment for running a monopoly
creator: Michael Liedtke, The Associated Press
content: A federal judge on Wednesday indicated he will order major changes in Google’s Android app store to punish the company for engineering a system that a jury declared an illegal monopoly that has hurt millions of consumers and app developers. Over the course of a three-hour hearing in San Francisco, U.S. District Judge James Donato made it clear that the forthcoming shake-up he is contemplating will probably include a mandate requiring Google's Play Store for Android phones offer consumers a choice to download alternative app stores Donato has been weighing how to punish the Google since last December when following a four-week trial. The verdict centered on Google's nearly exclusive control over distribution of apps designed for Android phones and the billing systems for the digital commerce occurring within them — a system that generates billions of dollars in annual revenue for the company. In protesting the judge's potential requirements, Google has raised the specter of consumers' devices being infected by malicious software downloaded from third-party app stores, triggering “security chaos.” But Donato repeatedly hammered on the need for a major overhaul of the Play Store, even if it causes Google headaches and huge bills that the company has estimated could run as high as $600 million, depending on what the judge orders. “We are going to tear the barriers down, that is...

title: Man fatally shot during police search of Edmonton home, watchdog investigating
creator: The Canadian Press
content: Alberta's police watchdog is investigating after officers fatally shot a man in a southeast Edmonton home. Police in the provincial capital say they and RCMP officers with a specialized provincial internet child exploitation unit were executing a search warrant early this morning. They say officers were speaking to the suspect inside and he stabbed a member of the Edmonton Police Service. That resulted in officers firing their weapons. Paramedics declared the suspect dead at the scene. One officer was taken to hospital with non-life-threatening injuries.

title: 21세기 천재타자의 운명, 돈이 가른다, 저지와 오타니가 기준 '진짜 7억달러' 모를 일[스조산책 MLB]
creator: 노재형 기자
content: [스포츠조선 노재형 기자]할 스타인브레너 뉴욕 양키스 구단주는 지난 5월 17일(이하 한국시각) YES네트워크에 "우리는 소토가 남은 커리어를 이곳에서 보냈으면 하는 바람이 있다. 그 점에 대해서는 의심의 여지가 없다. 다만 에이전트 스캇이 시즌 중 계약을 꺼리고 나도 그렇다. 집중력을 방해하기 때문"이라면서도 "그러나 스프링트레이닝 때 말했지만 이건 매우 독특한 사안이고, 소토는 아주 특별한 선수다. 시즌 중 양측이 이야기를 나눈다고 해도 놀랄 일이 아니다. 일정 시점이 되면 그렇게 할 가치가 있다고 생각한다"고 밝혔다. 올해 말 FA 시장에 나가는 소토와 시즌 중 언제라도 연장계약을 할 수 있다고 밝힌 것이다. 그의 에이전트인 스캇 보라스가 절대 하지 않는 일을 할 수 있다고 공언했으니, 라이벌 구단들은 적잖이 당황했을 것이다. 양키스의 위세와 돈이라면 보라스의 고집도 눌러버릴 것 같은 두려움 때문이다. 더구나 그 직후 당사자인 소토가 미네소타 트윈스전을 마치고 "문은 항상 열려 있다. 모두들 그의 전화번호, 모든 연락 방법을 알고 있다. 누구에게, 어디로 전화해야 할 지 안다. 난 야구에 집중하고 있고, 난 우리가 우승하도록 돕는 게 가장 중요하다"고 밝혔다. 스타이브레너의 발언에 화답한 것인데, 여기에서 '그'는 보라스다. 소토는 지난해 12월 트레이드를 통해 샌디에이고 파드리스에서 양키스로 이적한 이후 현지 언론들에 계약에 관한 이야기는...

title: Las tecnológicas Pixart Argentina y Qualcomm (EEUU) estudian instalar una planta en Panamá
creator: EFE
content: Ciudad de Panamá – La desarrolladora de software y hardware Pixart Argentina y la multinacional estadounidense Qualcomm, especializada en la producción de semiconductores, exploran la apertura de una planta en Panamá, informó este miércoles el Gobierno del país centroamericano. Pixart Argentina busca expandir su producción de computadoras utilizando tecnología de Qualcomm, líder global en la producción de semiconductores, dijo el Ministerio de Comercio e Industrias (Mici) de Panamá en un comunicado en el que informa sobre un encuentro de su titular, Julio Moltó, con representantes de ambas tecnológicas. Moltó sostuvo «un encuentro clave para el desarrollo del clima de innovación tecnológica de Panamá», con el cofundador y CEO de Pixart Argentina, Gabriel Ortiz, y con el director para América Latina de Qualcomm, Gabriel Dutra. Panamá «ofrece una plataforma única para expandir nuestra producción y distribuir nuestros productos en América Latina y el mercado de Estados Unidos», expresó Ortiz, de acuerdo con la información oficial. En una primera etapa, «creemos que el modelo de negocios adecuado para Panamá, en el contexto de la Ley de Semiconductores vigente en Estados Unidos, sería fabricar un producto terminado desde el diseño, pasando por el subensamblaje de circuitos impresos, sus fuentes de poder, teclado, monitor, el manejador de disco, por medio...

title: Gas station to be constructed on Portmore leg of Highway 2000
content: ST CATHERINE, Jamaica— TransJamaican Highway Limited (TJH) announced on Wednesday that RUBIS Energy will be constructing a gas station on the Portmore leg (T2) of Highway 2000 East-West. TJH, the developer of the six-lane carriageway, said in a news release that the gas station should be opened in 2025. “The service station on T2 is designed to enhance the customer experience on the highway. We do anticipate that they will be able to fill up with RUBiS Energy petrol or diesel but also enjoy the services of the convenience store,” explained TJH Quality and Maintenance Engineer Manager, Melbourne Lyn-Cook. “The Portmore highway corridor services 30,000-40,000 vehicles daily and we know our commuters will take advantage of the rest stop, pick up groceries or food or snacks at the restaurant on the way home in the evenings,” Lyn-Cook added. This station will be the second on Highway 2000 East-West after Total Jamaica Limited opened a service station on the eastbound Old Harbour ramp in St Catherine in 2019. The gas station will be contained on 0.4 hectares of land, west of the current Highway 2000 East-West sales and administrative offices, the release said. “The station will not impact the national heritage site at Fort Augusta,” TJH said. Motorists coming from Kingston will enter the gas station from where the parking lot is currently located. Lyn-Cook explained that, on...

title: Free power for agri pumps of 1.63L farmers in Nagpur & Wardha dists
creator: Viraj Deshpande
content: Nagpur: The chief minister Baliraj Free Electricity Scheme is set to benefit approximately 1.63 lakh farmers from the Nagpur circle of Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Company (MSEDCL), comprising Nagpur and Wardha districts. The state govt had recently issued a GR declaring free electricity to farmers who own agricultural pumps up to 7.5 HP capacity for the next five years. Around 90,654 farmers from Nagpur and 72,558 farmers from Wardha will be entitled to free electricity. MSEDCL stated that in accordance with the GR, by the end of March 2024, a cumulative of 47.41 lakh agricultural pump consumers across the state were provided electricity through MSEDCL. “Agricultural pump consumers constitute 16% of the aggregate electricity consumers across all categories in the state, and approximately 30% of the total power consumption is attributed to the agricultural sector,” stated MSEDCL. The discom company elaborated that the total annual electricity consumption of agricultural consumers stands at 39,246 MU. Currently, as per the directives issued by the Maharashtra Electricity Regulatory Commission, 3-phase electricity is supplied to agricultural pumps throughout the state in a cyclical manner for 8 hours during the night or 8 hours during the day. title: ¡TEPJF aprueba a Sheinbaum como presidenta electa de México!
creator: Agencias
content: La Sala Superior del Tribunal Electoral del Poder Judicial de la Federación (TEPJF) determinó por unanimidad este miércoles la validez de la victoria de Claudia Sheinbaum como presidenta electa de México para el periodo 2024-2030. Gracias a esta aprobación, la exjefa de gobierno de la Ciudad de México se convierte en la primera mujer que ocupará este cargo en México. Una vez confirmado el triunfo de Sheinbaum, el TEPJF entregará la constancia de presidenta electa en una sesión solemne que se realizará este jueves 15 de agosto. A la par de la aprobación de las elecciones, el Tribunal avaló el cómputo final de la elección presidencial, en el que Claudia Sheinbaum, candidata por los partidos Morena, PT y Partido Verde, alcanzó 35 millones 924 mil 519 de votos, que representan el 59.7% de la votación. En su dictamen, el TEPJF sostuvo que la elección se llevó a cabo bajo los principios constitucionales de certeza, legalidad, imparcialidad y máxima publicidad en todas las etapas del proceso electoral. Ante las fallas en el proceso electoral, como la elección adelantada de las candidaturas, lo que representó un fraude a la ley; la intervención del presidente Andrés Manuel López Obrador y el impacto del crimen organizado, se pronunciaron la magistrada Janine Otálora y el magistrado Reyes Rodríguez Mondragón, sin considerar que estas fueran preponderantes en...

title: Biden’s Gaza cease-fire plan teeters on brink ahead of high-stakes talks
creator: John Hudson
Susannah George
Karen DeYoung
Shira Rubin
content: JERUSALEM — On the eve of critical negotiations aimed at ending the war in Gaza, the United States finds itself in an unenviable position: relying on the goodwill of Israel and Hamas, which have resisted a deal for months, and fearing that another setback could trigger an Iranian attack that risks widening the conflict beyond anyone’s control. The warring parties all have incentives to upend the planned talks in Doha, Qatar, on Thursday, described by President Biden’s aides as a “final stage” bid to end a war that has killed tens of thousands of Palestinians and to secure the release of hostages captured by Hamas on Oct. 7. There are 115 hostages still held in Gaza, Israeli officials say; more than 40 are already dead. Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is under pressure from members of his far-right cabinet to reject what they call a “surrender deal,” and he has been accused by his critics, including some hostage families, of extending the war for his own political survival. Advertisement Ghazi Hamad, a member of the Hamas negotiating team, confirmed to The Washington Post on Wednesday that the group will not attend the Thursday talks, accusing Netanyahu of using them “as a cover to continue his aggression against our people.” Looming over the negotiations are threats by Iran and Hezbollah, still seething over the twin assassinations of Hamas leader Ismael Haniyeh and...

title: Flawed CPR likely shifted baby’s organs, say docs in ‘shocking’ case
creator: Steffy Thevar
content: Pune: The doctors couldn’t believe what they were seeing. It was Aug 6, and on the surgery table before them was a one-year-old child whose liver was completely upside down and pushed inside the thorax. Other organs were not in their place either: the large intestine, appendix, part of the stomach and the right kidney were all crammed into the chest cavity, pushing against the lungs and even shifting the heart to the other side. Baby Raadiya had been in this condition for a year, according to the parents. In fact, she had been gasping for air since birth. Congenital diaphragmatic hernia (CDH) is a birth defect that occurs in about one in 2,500-3,000 live births worldwide. It’s a condition in which a break in the diaphragm causes abdominal organs to move into the chest. But in Raadiya’s case doctors found abnormal internal damage. It was their interview with the parents that uncovered a possible cause — she was very likely administered flawed CPR at birth. Raadiya, the parents said, was born at a primary health centre in Bihar’s Samastipur district, in a village called Shiura. She was critical at birth. “My child was gasping for air so the doctors had to give her CPR,” mother Raunak Parveen said. “She had to be fed via tubes too, but the tube was not fixed properly because when we fed her milk, it leaked out of the tube that was inserted into her chest. Later, the doctors...

title: நெடுஞ்சாலைத்துறை சார்பில் உதவியாளர் பணியிடத்துக்கு 180 பேருக்கு நியமன ஆணை: முதல்வர் மு.க.ஸ்டாலின் வழங்கினார்
content: சென்னை: தமிழ்நாடு முதலமைச்சர் மு.க.ஸ்டாலின் நேற்று தலைமைச் செயலகத்தில், தமிழ்நாடு அரசுப் பணியாளர் தேர்வாணையத்தின் வாயிலாக தொகுதி II-A பணிக்கான நெடுஞ்சாலைத் துறையின் உதவியாளர் பணியிடத்திற்கு தேர்வு செய்யப்பட்ட 180 நபர்களுக்கு பணிநியமன ஆணைகளை வழங்கினார். ஒரு மாநிலத்தின் பொருளாதார வளர்ச்சிக்கு சாலை உட்கட்டமைப்பு வசதிகள் முக்கிய பங்கு வகிக்கிறது. இத்தகைய முக்கியத்துவம் வாய்ந்த நெடுஞ்சாலைத் துறையின் பணிகள் தொய்வின்றி நடைபெற காலிப் பணியிடங்கள் உடனுக்குடன் நிரப்பப்பட்டு வருகின்றன. இந்த அரசு பொறுப்பேற்ற மே 2021 முதல் இதுநாள் வரை நெடுஞ்சாலைத்துறை சார்பில் 414 இளநிலை வரைதொழில் அலுவலர்கள், 33 உதவிப் பொறியாளர்கள், 66 இளநிலை உதவியாளர்கள், 48 தட்டச்சர்கள், 6 சுருக்கெழுத்து தட்டச்சர் நிலை-III, 4 தணிக்கை உதவியாளர்கள் ஆகியோர் தமிழ்நாடு அரசுப் பணியாளர் தேர்வாணையத்தின் வாயிலாக நேரடி நியமனத்திலும், 45 இளநிலை உதவியாளர்கள், 3 உதவி வரைவாளர்கள், 9 தட்டச்சர்கள், 27 பதிவுரு எழுத்தர்கள் மற்றும் 24 அலுவலக உதவியாளர்கள் ஆகியோர் கருணை அடிப்படையிலும் பணிநியமனம் செய்யப்பட்டுள்ளனர். அதன் தொடர்ச்சியாக, தமிழ்நாடு அரசுப் பணியாளர் தேர்வாணையத்தின் வாயிலாக நெடுஞ்சாலைத் துறையின் உதவியாளர் பணியிடத்திற்கு தேர்வு செய்யப்பட்டுள்ள 180 நபர்களுக்கு பணி நியமன ஆணைகளை வழங்கிடும் அடையாளமாக முதலமைச்சர், நேற்றைய தினம் 10 நபர்களுக்கு பணிநியமன ஆணைகளை வழங்கினார். இந்த நிகழ்ச்சியில், அமைச்சர் எ.வ.வேலு, தலைமைச் செயலாளர் சிவ் தாஸ் மீனா, நெடுஞ்சாலைகள் மற்றும் சிறு துறைமுகங்கள் துறை அரசு செயலாளர் செல்வராஜ், நெடுஞ்சாலைத்துறை...

title: NICL settles 1st health claim through NHCX
content: Kolkata: The National Insurance Company Ltd ( NICL ) has become the first PSU insurer to settle a health claim through the national health exchange ( NHCX ). It has done it with Paramount Health Services & Insurance TPA on Wednesday. The case was executed at RN Tagore Institute of Cardiac Sciences in Kolkata’s Mukundapur, said Paramount senior VP Shamita Paul. “It is a historical event. It could finally happen because of the diligent efforts of our head office team and Paramount,” said Sanchali Lal, NICL chief manager in Kolkata. “We are now confident that after a few more cashless cases, we can gradually move over to NHCX platform. This is just the beginning,” said Paramount MD Nayan Shah. Priyamita Ghosh, a veteran in PPN enrolment committee of NICL, said: “The first baby step towards complete digitalisation has already been initiated.” Ajitha Rajagopalan, manager, NICL IT department, added that the Ayushman Bharat ID was the key for NHCX integration. We also published the following articles recently Mosquitoes bite into health insurance claims A study by Policybazaar showed that nearly a third of health insurance claims in Mumbai were due to seasonal diseases like dengue, malaria, gastroenteritis, influenza, and bronchitis. These illness claims usually peak during specific seasons, with treatment costs ranging significantly. Though avoidable through better hygiene, these...

Action 13 gets answers for NE Harris Co. neighbors plagued by leaning trees since Beryl
creator: Nick Natario
content: HOUSTON, Texas (KTRK) -- Despite concerns from neighbors and school leaders, it was when Action 13 got involved that leaning trees blocking a roadway would be removed. The large debris piles aren't the only clue Hurricane Beryl blew through a northeast Harris County neighborhood. Tall trucks showcase the other sign strong winds impacted this road as they brushed leaning trees going down the street. "It could kill somebody, honestly. It really could," Meghan Kolacmy said. "That's a big tree." Kolacmy has been trying to remove the trees for a month before her kids get hurt. "It looks like it's nice and fun to climb, right? But the fact of the matter is it might come down if they try to get on it," Kolacmy explained. She contacted 311 four times about the two trees in the county's right-of-way that are leaning across the road, but her calls weren't returned. SEE MORE: About 50% of Houston-area trees took hit from Beryl winds "Not an email, a voicemail, anything," Kolacmy said. She's not alone. Sheldon Independent School District officials told ABC13 they also contacted the county two times because its buses couldn't safely go down the street. "I see my neighbor pushing her daughter in a wheelchair down the street, and it hurt my 'mom heart,'" Kolacmy said. "That's unacceptable. I felt like I had to do something." The street is in Harris County Precinct 2 Commissioner Adrian...

title: Alberto Fernández formalizó su renuncia al PJ, tras ser imputado: «Con mi alma lastimada»
creator: Daniel Quilodrán
content: Alberto Fernández formalizó este miércoles su renuncia a la presidencia del Partido Justicialista (PJ) . Hoy fue imputado por el delito de «lesiones graves doblemente agravado por el vínculo y contexto de género y amenazas» . Asimismo, el PJ porteño le pidió su renuncia al partido. “En el marco de la denuncia por presunta violencia de género a partir de la cual estoy siendo investigado en la justicia Federal, vengo a elevar mi renuncia indeclinable al cargo de presidente del partido justicialista orden nacional con el que oportunamente me honrara ”, comienza la carta que envió al Consejo partidario. En la misiva volvió a negar las acusaciones y se postuló como defensor de “la igualdad de géneros y respeto a las diversidades”. «Tengo el deber y la necesidad de manifestar que esta decisión la tomo con el único propósito de no involucrar al partido en el que siempre milité en los hechos que falsamente se me endilgan. Deseo que ninguna esquirla del linchamiento mediático al que estoy siendo sometido pueda lastimar a este partido en el que militan hombres y mujeres que tanto hicimos por la igualdad de géneros y respeto a las diversidades», aseveró el exmandatnario. Seguidamente, expresó su deseo de que actue la Justicia en el caso. « Con mi alma lastimada por tanto escarnio y siendo víctima de una cruel operación que también lastima a mis hijos, saludo a cada...

title: Festival Timbalaye 2024 afianza herencia africana en Cuba
creator: Dai Liem Lafá Armenteros
content: Este año está dedicada a los Cabildos de Nación, las Casas Templo y al 30 aniversario de la declaratoria de la Ruta de las Personas Esclavizadas, según comentó hoy ante la prensa el director del evento Ulises Mora. Explicó que Timbalaye recorrerá desde Pinar del Rio hasta Guantánamo, sea de forma presencial o virtual, y se ha organizado a pesar de todas las limitaciones impuestas a Cuba por el bloqueo de Estados Unidos, el cual impacta también fuertemente la cultura. Por su parte, Irma Castillo, miembro del comité organizador, refirió que el festival tiene líneas de trabajo enfocadas en Cuba, el turismo y los intercambios culturales. Precisó que, en general, el trabajo del evento se divide en foros internacionales, programa de becas, festival, programa de solidaridad y editorial Timbalaye. Resaltó que las actividades se realizarán fundamentalmente en La Habana, con destaque en el barrio de Pogolotti, donde la rumba, ritmos y sonoridades de herencia africana están bien presentes con exponentes activos; aunque también habrá participación en otras provincias. Castillo agregó que la cita cuenta con el apoyo de la Asociación Semi di Pace y la Asociación Nacional de Amistad Italia-Cuba en esta edición. Recordó además que en mayo pasado, tuvo lugar el VII Foro Internacional Timbalaye, un evento de impacto socio cultural que se desarrolló en las ciudades...

title: Alcaraz, operación número uno
creator: Albert Sancho
content: Con ese gen ganador que ya tiene increíblemente desarrollado a sus 21 años, Carlos Alcaraz se despidió de los Juegos Olímpicos con una plata, una sueño para cualquier deportista, y entre lágrimas, porque él no es un deportista más. El español, insaciable, quería el oro a toda costa. Djokovic, finalmente, se lo arrebató en otra final para el recuerdo. Ahora, desde este jueves (no antes de la 1:00 de la madrugada, por Movistar Deportes) y sin el serbio, el prodigio de El Palmar iniciará el esprint final de la temporada en el Masters 1.000 de Cincinnati. Y lo hará con la misma hambre de siempre. En sus primeras declaraciones después de brillar en la arcilla olímpica de Roland Garros, Charly ahorró en cautela: en lo que queda de año, su objetivo es recuperar el número uno del ranking. El veterano Gael Monfils (37 años y 46o del mundo), que este miércoles superó a Popyrin (7-5 y 6-3), será el primer obstáculo. “Ser el número uno es el objetivo todo el tiempo y la race es un ranking importante para mí. Si acabo la temporada número uno de la race , posiblemente también sea número uno del ranking. Estoy centrado en ir a cada torneo a desplegar mi mejor tenis, hacer buenos resultados y escalar”, dijo Alcaraz , casi darse tiempo para disfrutar de su plata en unos Juegos que vivió muy intensamente. Tanto a través de las redes sociales, celebrando cada...

Falcons address biggest need with massive Patriots trade
creator: Eric Smithling, Yardbarker
content: The Atlanta Falcons may have found a solution to arguably their biggest problem. On Wednesday, NFL insider Jordan Schultz reported that the Falcons "are close to finalizing a trade" with the Patriots to acquire outside linebacker Matthew Judon. BREAKING: The #Patriots are close to finalizing a trade that will send 4x Pro Bowl pass rusher Matthew Judon to the #Falcons , per multiple sources. The deal is in the final stages and expected to be finished soon. pic.twitter.com/kB5ztWIjKg Fellow NFL insider Ian Rapoport shared that the Falcons were sending a 2025 third-round pick to the Patriots. The addition of Judon is a home run for a team that desperately needed help generating pressure. The Falcons lost their two most productive pass-rushers, Calais Campbell and Bud Dupree, in free agency, and rookie third-round pick Bralen Trice was placed on injured reserve on Sunday after suffering a knee injury in Atlanta's preseason Week 1 loss to the Dolphins. Per Sports Info Solutions data provided by The 33rd Team , the Falcons ranked 30th in pressure rate last season (32 percent). Judon was limited to four games (two starts) due to a torn biceps injury but still managed four sacks and 16 total pressures, per Pro Football Focus . In 2022, Judon had 15.5 sacks, tied for the fourth-most in the league. He joins a talented defense led by safety Jessie Bates III, corner A.J. Terrell and...

title: Interponen denuncia penal contra ejidatarios que bloquearon la autopista Tlaxco-Tejocotal: Segob
creator: Yadira Llaven Anzures
content: Tras los cierres carreteros de la semana pasada, que incluyó la México-Puebla y el Arco Norte, la Secretaría de Gobernación del estado de Puebla confirmó este miércoles que hay una denuncia penal contra ejidatarios por bloqueo al tramo Tlaxco-Tejocotal, que fue interpuesta por la concesionaria y Carreteras de Cuota. Al término de la inauguración de Ciudad Universitaria 2, el funcionario estatal concedió una entrevista para declarar que estos bloqueos dejaron una alta reflexión a todos los ciudadanos. En primer lugar, comentó que el derecho a la libre manifestación debe existir, pero no cuando perjudique a terceros de una manera tan compleja como lo que sucedió con el cierre simultáneo de cuatro autopistas que cercaron a la ciudad de Puebla durante cinco días. Incluso, señaló que los empresarios han hecho una manifestación y hablan de un monto muy importante de recursos económicos por pérdidas , y por ello dijo también debe haber denuncias. En segundo término, Aquino Limón reveló que, a consecuencia de estos cierres, el gobierno del estado ya analiza tomar medidas que eviten esta situación. El titular de la Segob argumentó que los afectados tienen todo el derecho a denunciar y a buscar que alguien se haga responsable de sus pérdidas. Más allá de la parte legal, Javier Aquino dijo que se deben evolucionar en los criterios. El pasado 6 de agosto,...

title: Huala y la seguridad vial: “La educación como primer paso”
creator: diario3
content: La senadora Victoria Huala (PRO) se reunió con Pedro Scarpinelli, director ejecutivo de la Agencia Nacional de Seguridad Vial, en la que abordó varios temas como el reclamo por la Autovía en la ruta nacional 5 desde Luján a Santa Rosa y la aplicación de la Revisión Técnica Obligatoria en la capital pampeana. La senadora pampeana le compartió al funcionario nacional el proyecto de Ley que tiene por objetivo la puesta en marcha de Campañas de Concientización Vial Permanentes , una herramienta que en los últimos años no ha tenido el uso o la masividad necesaria para ser eficaz y colaborar en la búsqueda de disminuir los siniestros, evitar personas lesionadas y pérdidas de vidas por hechos viales. “La seguridad vial tiene un orden de pasos a seguir para reducir al máximo posible los siniestros, ese orden consiste en primer lugar en la educación y la concientización vial, en segundo lugar en el control por parte de los organismos encargados y en tercer lugar la sanción y el cumplimiento de las penas ”, expresó Huala. Ambos también compartieron su visión respecto al proyecto que tiene presentado la legisladora de aumento de penas en delitos ocurridos en circunstancias de siniestros viales. En el marco del trabajo que viene realizando la Agencia de Seguridad Vial, su director compartió con la legisladora del PRO información respecto a la importancia de trabajar...

title: Gana Yucatán el Premio Nacional de Pesca y Acuacultura Sustentables 2024
creator: Redacción 24 Horas
content: El Gobernador de Baja California Sur Víctor Manuel Castro Cosío y Octavio Almada Palafox, Comisionado Nacional de Acuacultura y Pesca, entregaron a la empresa de Yucatán, HULKIN el reconocimiento del Primer Lugar del Premio que destaca las innovaciones y buenas prácticas en el desarrollo del sector pesquero, así como el impacto positivo en las comunidades y en los recursos marinos. El premio destacó a la empresa HUL KIN S.A. DE C.V. como un faro de excelencia, demostrando que es posible armonizar el progreso económico con la conservación ambiental. Para el CEO de la empresa, Moisés Rosado Castillo, Profesional de marketing graduado del Tec de Monterrey con 15 años de experiencia laboral en la industria pesquera, tiene claro el equilibrio natural sin que se comprometan los recursos: “Creamos nuevas formas de innovar en el entorno empresarial sostenible. Al trabajar juntos con el gobierno y la sociedad civil, impactamos en nuestros desafíos sociales y ambientales para cambiar positivamente la vida de muchas personas en este planeta”. La empresa HUL KIN ha innovado con la plataforma www.pulpomaya.com donde presenta sus 3 pilares para sus clientes: Sustentabilidad, Trazabilidad y Calidad Suprema. HUL KIN S.A. title: Rescataron otro ciervo en la planta de Vicentin: piden investigar la existencia de cotos de caza en la región
creator: El Ciudadano
content: Una cierva cayó a un pozo de seis metros de profundidad, fue rescatada por la Policía Ecológica en la planta de la firma Vicentin en Ricardone y recibió los primeros tratamiento para su recuperación en la clínica del doctor Carlos Cossia. Se desconoce el origen del animal pero se estima que podría haber escapado de algún coto de caza de la región. La cierva tenía una fractura de mandíbula producto del golpe al caer y su estado era delicado al no poder alimentarse. Luego de recibir las primeras atenciones de urgencia fue trasladada a la facultad de Ciencias Veterinarias de la Universidad Nacional de Rosario en la ciudad de Casilda. El experimentado veterinario, uno de los primeros profesionales que asistió al animal, dijo que ya fueron rescatados cerca de 40 ciervos en la región en el último tiempo y pidió investigar los motivos a las autoridades de las provincias de Santa Fe y Entre Ríos.

title: Colo Colo se la juega por sus hinchas: confirma nueva alianza con Metro de Santiago
creator: Felipe Pavez Farías
content: Colo Colo superó a Junior de Barranquilla y dio el primer golpe en la llave de octavos de final de Copa Libertadores . El Cacique con anotación de Vicente Pizarro cerró el duelo de ida con ventaja y buscará en la revancha del próximo martes avanzar a los cuartos de final. Una noche que los hinchas albos difícilmente podrán olvidar. Pero las alegrías dentro de la cancha también se reflejaron fuera de ella, con el buen comportamiento de los fanáticos. Por su parte, desde el Cacique retribuyeron este apoyo y extendieron el servicio de Metro hasta la media noche . ver también Las estaciones Mirador y Pedrero abrieron sus puertas para que los garriros pudieran retornar sin problemas a sus hogares. Un tema que destacó Aníbal Mosa. “Nuestra gerencia de operaciones se contactó con el Metro para que se extendiera el horario. Colo Colo tuvo que pagar un valor para mantener esa estación abierta y lo hacemos felices para que nuestros hinchas puedan retornar a sus hinchas ”, expresó en entrevista con Dale Albo. Colo Colo confirma nueva alianza con Metro de Santiago El Presidente de Blanco y Negro reveló que se realizará una nueva alianza con el Metro para beneficiar directamente a los hinchas albos. “ De aquí en adelante lo vamos a seguir utilizando. title: Student flaunts 3 pistols, held
content: Amritsar: Police apprehended a BSc (agriculture) student who was flaunting three illegal pistols in his new SUV in an upscale area in Punjab’s Amritsar on Wednesday. They also recovered the weapons he was displaying in his Mahindra Thar. Amritsar police commissioner Ranjit Singh Dhillon said a police team stopped a Thar in the Ranjit Avenue area. Upon search, police recovered three .30-bore pistols from the occupant. Two pistols were tucked in the ‘dubb’ (waistband of the pants) while the other was in his Thar, Dhillon said. The accused, Harswaroop Singh, a resident of village Nawaen Pind, is a BSc agriculture student of Khalsa College and belonged to an influential family. tnn We also published the following articles recently Mahindra Thar Roxx design revealed: Difference from 3-door Thar explained Mahindra and Mahindra revealed the Thar Roxx, a five-door version of the Thar SUV, ahead of its August 15, 2024 launch. Available in black and Everest White, the Roxx features a double-stacked six-slot grille, LED projectors, C-shaped DRLs, a panoramic sunroof, and advanced interior updates. Engine options include a 2.2-litre diesel and 2.0-litre turbo-petrol. title: B.C. adds $2.65B for Fraser Valley Highway 1 improvement initiative
creator: The Canadian Press
content: The British Columbia government is providing $2.65 billion for upgrades to Highway 1 through the Fraser Valley in an effort to relieve traffic congestion and ease daily commutes between the communities of Langley and Abbotsford. The funding will go toward upgrades between Mount Lehman Road west of downtown Abbotsford to Highway 11 on the opposite side of the city. The money builds on $2.34 billion in funding approved last fall for upgrades between Mount Lehman Road and 264th Street in the Township of Langley. A statement from the Ministry of Transportation says that work will begin this year and include four new interchanges, as well as the rebuilding of several highway overpasses to boost the clearance height for commercial vehicles. It says procurement for work stemming from the latest funding will begin next year, with major construction starting in 2026 and wrapping up in 2031. The ministry says the Fraser Valley Highway 1 improvement program will eventually see the route expanded through the Sumas Prairie in Abbotsford toward Chilliwack.

title: Hurricane Ernesto expected to gain strength as it heads toward Bermuda
content: Hurricane Ernesto expected to gain strength as it heads toward Bermuda Hurricane Ernesto is gaining strength in the Caribbean after drenching Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands. Now the storm is moving north into the Atlantic, where it's expected to continue strengthening as it heads toward Bermuda. CBS News national correspondent Manuel Bojorquez and WCBS chief weathercaster Lonnie Quinn have more.

title: Dulces con metanfetamina fueron distribuidos entre personas sin hogar en Nueva Zelanda
'Neglectful' parents slammed as babies in nappies seen crawling down road after crash
creator: Mataeo Smith,Zasha Whiteway-Wilkinson
content: It is unknown whether there was a kids car seat in the vehicle at the time of the crash (Image: Instagram) Motorists were left horrified as they witnessed two toddlers, dressed only in nappies, teetering dangerously along the motorway after being thrown from a car during a horrific crash. The terrifying incident took place on Interstate 10's East Freeway at Freeport in Texas , where a two-car collision resulted in one vehicle rolling over multiple times, ejecting an adult and two small children onto the road. The distressing scene has sparked widespread outrage online, with many blaming the parents. Footage captured reveals one toddler struggling to stand while the other appears dazed and confused. Fortunately, neither child appeared to have suffered life-threatening injuries, but authorities are investigating. Social media users have been quick to criticise the parents for what appears to be a failure to secure the children properly in car seats. The video has gone viral across the internet. Comments range from relief that the children miraculously survived to anger, with calls for the parents' arrest for potential neglect, according to Mirror US. function loadOvpScript(){let...

title: Ellos fueron los enemigos del Mayo Zambada durante su vida criminal
creator: Ernesto Jiménez
content: Cuando Ismael El Mayo Zambada comenzaba a forjar su nombre como uno de los principales líderes del narcotráfico mexicano tuvo que enfrentarse a uno de sus principales rivales en el mundo criminal: Ramón Arellano Félix estuvo a punto de asesinarlo en más de una ocasión. Ramón y su hermano Benjamín estaban al frente del Cártel de Tijuana y tenían una relación de cooperación con los otros cárteles que traficaban cocaína y marihuana utilizando esa frontera de Baja California; pero todo cambio en 1992 cuando El Mayo Zambada acumuló una deuda de varios millones de dólares. El periodista Jesús Blancornelas recogió este pasaje de la historia del narco mexicano en su libro El Cártel ; ahí narra como durante una reunión del ‘consejo de jefes’ del Cártel de Tijuana , Ramón informó que El Mayo Zambada les debía 20 millones de dólares por traficar droga sin pagar el debido impuesto a los Arellano Félix: “¡Mátenlo!”, ordenó. Aunque Benjamín Arellano Félix quería negociar, Ramón fue contundente y ofreció 3 millones de dólares a quien asesinara al Mayo Zambada . En los años siguientes el capo sinaloense fue víctima de varios ataques que incluyeron un coche bomba que estalló en una de sus casas en Culiacán. El Mayo Zambada salió ileso de esa guerra, mientras que Ramón Arellano Félix fue asesinado en febrero de 2002 cuando asistió al Carnaval de...
