title: Dan de alta al niño Jorge Gael, quien sobrevivió a choque en el que murieron sus padres
creator: Jorge López Landó
content: Fotografía: Archivo Ha pasado por seis cirugías y ya se recupera en casa de sus abuelos Por Teófilo Alvarado | 5:36 pm 14 agosto, 2024 Ya se encuentra en casa de sus abuelos el niño que sobrevivió a la muerte de sus padres, cuando un camión embistió el auto Enel que viajaban los tres el pasado 18 de junio. Jorge Gael fue dado de alta del Hospital Infantil de Especialidades hace un par de semanas y desde entonces se encuentra en recuperación en el domicilio. Fue sometido a seis cirugías y todavía no han concluido, sin embargo, ahora los cuidados se los proporcionan sus abuelos y demás familiares en un ambiente hogareño. El accidente referido ocurrió en el cruce de avenida Antonio J. Bermúdez y calle Volta, donde un camión de transporte de personal que daba servicio a la maquiladora Adient 3, cortó el paso a un automóvil Nissan Versa y lo impactó, empujándolo contra un poste. Ahí quedó prensado el automóvil donde viajaba la familia compuesta por Vanesa Sandoval Saucedo de 42 años y Marco Palomo Chávez de 48, así como Jorge Gael de 7 años. Los progenitores de Jorge Gael fallecieron, pero él sobrevivió, a pesar de que el presunto responsable del choque huyó del lugar sin darle ayuda, dejándolo con la cadera y piernas fracturadas. Carlos Humberto T.R., el chofer del camión, se entregó unos días después y fue vinculado a proceso penal por los...

title: Trump to slam Harris on inflation ahead of major policy roll-out
creator: NEWS WIRE
content: WASHINGTON - Donald Trump will tear into the Biden administration’s economic record Wednesday, just days before Kamala Harris unveils her economic agenda in her first major policy speech as the Democratic Party’s presidential nominee. Trump’s campaign said he would deliver remarks in the city of Asheville, in the crucial battleground state of North Carolina, on the “economic hardships created by the HarrisBiden administration.” “Hard-working Americans are suffering because of the Harris-Biden administration’s dangerously liberal policies,” the campaign said in a statement. “Prices are excruciatingly high, and the cost of living has soared -- leaving those on a fixedincome unsure of how they are going to afford a basic standard of living in the future.” Harris replaced President Joe Biden on the Democratic ticket last month, and has since been riding a tidal wave of enthusiasm, speaking to packed arenas and eclipsing Trump’s polling leads -- leaving the Republican scrambling to reset. More Americans trust the vice president to handle the economy than Trump, at 42 percent to 41 percent, according to research by the University of Michigan, in the first major poll of the election to show the Republican behind on the issue.

content: The Shade - Official Trailer Twenty-year-old Ryan struggles with a debilitating anxiety disorder following his father's death. Together with his two brothers, he must fight to break the destructive cycle threatening their family as ancient darkness closes in on them.

title: ஜொ்ஸி எண் ‘16’ விடுவிப்பு: ஸ்ரீஜேஷுக்கு ஹாக்கி இந்தியா கௌரவம்
creator: DIN
content: இந்திய ஹாக்கி அணியின் முன்னாள் கோல்கீப்பா் பி.ஆா்.ஸ்ரீஜேஷ் சமீபத்தில் ஓய்வுபெற்ற நிலையில், அவரை கௌரவிக்கும் விதமாக அவரின் ஜொ்ஸி எண் ‘16’-ஐ ஹாக்கி இந்தியா அமைப்பு புதன்கிழமை விடுவித்தது. இந்திய ஹாக்கியின் சீனப் பெருஞ்சுவா் என்று அழைக்கப்படும் ஸ்ரீஜேஷ், கோல் போஸ்ட்டில் அரண்போல் செயல்பட்டுவந்தாா். இவரைக் கடந்து கோலடிப்பதென்பது, எதிரணியினருக்கு எப்போதுமே சவாலாக இருந்தது. கடந்த 18 ஆண்டுகளாக இந்திய அணியின் பல்வேறு வெற்றிகளிலும், சாதனைகளிலும் அவா் முக்கியப் பங்காற்றியுள்ளாா். ஒலிம்பிக் ஹாக்கியில் 40 ஆண்டுகளுக்குப் பிறகு 2020 டோக்கியோ ஒலிம்பிக்கில் பதக்கம் வென்ற இந்தியா, தற்போது பாரீஸ் ஒலிம்பிக்கிலும் அதே வெண்கலத்தை தக்கவைத்தது. 36 வயதான ஸ்ரீஜேஷ் ஏற்கெனவே அறிவித்ததுபோல் பாரீஸ் ஒலிம்பிக்குடன் ஓய்வுபெற்றாா். இந்நிலையில், ஒலிம்பிக் பதக்கம் வென்ற இந்திய ஹாக்கி அணியினரை கௌரவிக்கும் நிகழ்ச்சி தில்லியில் புதன்கிழமை நடைபெற்றது. இதில், பாரீஸ் ஒலிம்பிக்கில் 2 வெண்கலப் பதக்கங்கள் வென்று சாதனை படைத்த துப்பாக்கி சுடுதல் வீராங்கனை மனு பாக்கரும் கௌரவிக்கப்பட்டாா். நிகழ்ச்சியில் பேசிய ஹாக்கி இந்திய செயலா் போலாநாத் சிங், ‘ஸ்ரீஜேஷ் தற்போது இந்திய ஜூனியா் ஹாக்கி அணியின் பயிற்சியாளா் ஆகவிருக்கிறாா். அவரை கௌரவிக்கும் விதமாக அவரின் ஜொ்ஸி எண் 16 விடுவிக்கப்படுகிறது. சீனியா் அணியில் வேறு எந்த வீரருக்கும் இனி ஜொ்ஸி எண் 16 ஒதுக்கப்படாது. எனினும், ஜூனியா் அணியில் அந்த எண் ஜொ்ஸி தொடரும்’ என்றாா். ஹாக்கி இந்தியா தலைவா் திலிப் திா்கி பேசுகையில், ‘இது ஸ்ரீஜேஷுக்கு பிரியாவிடை கொடுக்கும்...

title: Fountain Wins On 21st Hole, Advances In U.S. Am
content: Peter Fountain , a senior at the University of North Carolina this past spring, made two long putts on Wednesday to advance to the round of 32 in the 2024 United States Amateur at Hazeltine National Golf Club in Chaska, Minn. Fountain made a 40-footer for birdie on the first playoff hole this morning to conclude stroke play and advance to match play, and a 35-footer for birdie to beat Vanderbilt's Jackson Van Paris on the third extra hole in their afternoon match. Fountain, a Raleigh native, was the 2021 ACC champion and first-team All-America and started on four straight UNC teams that finished in the top five in the NCAA Championships. Van Paris, from Pinehurst, led 1 up after the first and third holes, but Fountain went ahead on the fifth and never trailed again. Fountain led 2 up with two holes to play but Van Paris won the final two holes of regulation to square the match. Fountain plays Patrick Sheehan (Penn State) in the round of 32 on Thursday morning. In another round of 64 matchup pitting a pair of All-Americas, UCLA's Omar Morales won the 18 th hole to edge UNC's David Ford , 1 up. Morales led 2 up through 11 before Ford won the 12 th and 14 th holes to pull even. They halved the next three holes before Morales won the final hole with a par.

title: Kin of jail inmates given tricolours, Ashoka sapling
content: Kanpur: The families of the inmates lodged in the district jail were urged to instal the national flag at their respective residences on the occasion of Independence Day as a part of the ‘ Har Ghar Tiranga ’ initiative. They were also given a sapling each of the Ashoka tree under the plantation drive held to celebrate I-Day. ADJ/Secretary of the District Legal Services Authority, Farrukhabad, Sanjay Kumar extended an invitation to the families of the jail inmates to instal the tricolour. Jail Superintendent Bhimsen Mukund said that under the ‘Har Ghar Tiranga campaign’ the visitors were asked to adorn the prisoners’ residences with the tricolour. The tricolours flags have been stitched by the jail inmates, and the saplings provided to the visitors were also nurtured in the jail’s nursery. A tricolour procession was also orchestrated for all the visiting officers and employees within the jail premises. The procession was inaugurated by Sanjay Kumar. The Tiranga Yatra commenced from the jail, with each visitor being bestowed with one tricolour and a sapling. Jailer Girish Kumar, deputy jailers Vaibhav Kushwaha, Mukesh Gaur, Omprakash, Saroj Devi, Krishna Kumari, head jail border Lajjaram, Ajab Singh, Jail Border Sanjay Singh, Sonu, Gaurav, Ankit, Shahrukh, Sachin, Vikas, and Neeraj played pivotal roles in organising the yatra. Women Jail warders Rohini, Priyanka, Nagma, Jolie,...

title: Origin Energy year profit surges as power bills rise
creator: Marion Rae
content: Power giant Origin Energy has posted a surge in full-year profit as households struggle to pay bigger electricity and gas bills. or signup to continue reading Origin, one of the largest suppliers to the east coast domestic gas market, on Thursday reported a net profit of $1.397 billion for the year to June 30, up from $1.055 billion a year earlier. Chief executive Frank Calabria said the balance sheet remains strong, with good cash generation supporting an increase in returns to shareholders and enabling capital to be reinvested into renewables and energy storage. Origin forecast higher electricity demand on electrification, uptake of electric vehicles and the expansion of data centres. Business and industrial arm Origin Zero more than doubled the number of customers wanting more than electricity or gas, selling them EV packages, digital insights and demand management. Underlying earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortisation (EBITDA), a measure of core company profitability, rose to $3.528 billion, from $3.107 billion. The underlying profit increased to $1.183 billion, $436 million higher than the prior year, on higher earnings in the Energy Markets and Integrated Gas divisions. "We are acutely aware of the pressure on household budgets at this time given the rising cost of living," Mr Calabria said He said Origin was supporting its most vulnerable customers...

title: Dangerous tree that killed B.C. firefighter flagged beforehand, report finds
creator: Alanna Kelly
content: A damning WorkSafeBC report following the 2023 death of a BC Wildfire Service firefighter points to inadequate supervision, training and also a “normalization” of risk within the agency. Devyn Gale, 19, was working at a fire near Revelstoke on July 13, 2023, when she sustained fatal injuries after being struck by a burning cedar tree while conducting fire suppression. According to WorkSafeBC’s incident investigation report, two firefighters who were working with Gale raised concerns about the tree prior to it coming down. The report said one firefighter observed three trees of note the day before, on July 12: one of them fell overnight, another had a dead or broken tree limb from the top and the third cedar was burning from the inside out and the top had already fallen. "The two standing cedars were identified as being dangerous trees,” reads the report. "Firefighter 2 and Firefighter 4 brought forward concerns about them.” One of the firefighters even expressed a “no-work zone.” Such a zone wasn’t established and a dangerous tree assessment was not performed, according to WorkSafeBC. “The only hazard-mitigating instructions being to keep a heads-up approach,” reads the report, noting that meant to “remain alert and stay away from it if they felt uncomfortable.” The current standard in B.C. for dealing with dangerous trees includes removing the whole tree or the dangerous part...

title: Presentan el WTA 500 GDL OPEN con las mejores tenistas del mundo
content: Del 9 al 15 de septiembre se vivirá una fiesta del tenis en la Perla Tapatía con el Guadalajara Open que contará con la presencia de las mejores tenistas del mundo. Entre ellas la recién campeona olímpica en París 2024, la china Qinwen Zheng, número 7 del ranking. Gustavo Santoscoy, Director del torneo, aseguró que el torneo de este año superará al del 2023, contando con la participación de 3 tenistas ubicadas en el top 10, con Maria Sakkari y Danielle Collins acompañando a Zheng en las mejor rankeadas que jugarán en la capital jalisciense. Podría interesarte: Deportes Chivas adelantará partido de Liga MX tras eliminación en Leagues Cup “Este torneo no va a ser la excepción, va a ser un gran torneo. Somos la única empresa que ha conseguido el 125, 250, 500, 1000, Finals en dos ocasiones. Cada torneo representa algo importante y es diferente”. A pesar de ya tener la lista de las jugadoras que participarán, tienen 3 wild card disponibles por lo que se podrían seguir sumando jugadores de gran nivel para complementar la cartelera. “Hoy tenemos 3 wild card. Nos vamos a esperar a la última semana del US Open y seguramente esa lista no va a bajar de las 53 del mundo, así que el mejor tenis lo vamos a tener aquí”. Sobre la participación de las tenistas mexicanas, Gustavo Santoscoy aseguró que no se han acercado aún para participar en el evento, pero no...

title: ચીમકી:ખેડૂતે કહ્યું,"મારી જમીન સરખી માપી આપો, નહીં તો હું આપઘાત કરીશ'
content: જૂનાગઢ જિલ્લામાં વર્ષ 2017માં કરવામાં આવેલી સરકારી જમીન માપણીમાં વિસાવદર તાલુકાના ઢેબર ગામના મનસુખભાઈ હરિભાઈ મોવલીયા નામના ખેડૂતની જમીનના નકશા અને ક્ષેત્રફળ ફરી ગયા હતાં. જેની જાણ તેમને વર્ષ 2019 માં થતા તેઓએ જૂનાગઢ જમીન માપણી કચેરીનો સંપર્ક સાંધી વા તેમજ છતાં છેલ્લા 6 વર્ષથી તેમને કોઈ સંતોષકારક જવાબ કે તેમની સમસ્યા હાલ ન થવાથી તેઓ સહ પરિવાર સાથે ડિસ્ટ્રિક્ટ લેન્ડ રેકોર્ડ ઇન્સ્પેક્ટરની કચેરીએ રજૂઆત કરતા રહ્યા છે. તેમ છતાં કોઈ ઉકેલ નહીં આવતા તેઓ મંગળવારે લેન્ડ રેકર્ડ ઇન્સ્પેક્ટરની કચેરી બહાર પલાઠી વાળીને બેસી ગયા હતા અને જો તેમને નહીં સાંભળવામાં આવે તો તેઓ આપઘાત કરી લેશે તેવી ચીમકી આપી હતી.આથી ડિસ્ટ્રિક્ટ લેન્ડ રેકર્ડ કચેરીના ઇન્સ્પેક્ટરે તેમની સાથે સંવાદ કરી તેમની સમસ્યા એક વર્ષમાં ઉકેલાઈ જશે તેવી હૈયાધારણા આપતા તેઓ ત્યાંથી રવાના થયા હતા. ફરીથી માપણી કરી અપાશે ​​​​​​​આ બાબતે મેં મારા સર્વેયરને બોલાવીને પણ ખેડૂતની હાજરીમાં રૂબરૂ ચર્ચા કરી લીધી છે. અત્યારે વરસાદી માહોલ હોવાથી માપણી શક્ય નથી. જેથી યોગ્ય સમયે ખેડૂતને ન્યાય મળી રહે તે દિશામાં કાર્યવાહી કરવામાં આવશે. > ડો.એ.આર.ગુંદીઘરા, લેન્ડ ઇન્સ્પેક્ટર

title: Mann recalls role of freedom fighters, says trying to fulfil their aspirations
content: Chandigarh: In his Independence Day message, Punjab chief minister Bhagwant Mann remembered the state’s role in the freedom struggle and later its contribution to make the country self-reliant in food production. Mann also listed the initiatives taken by his government, including setting up of Aam Aadmi Clinics, 300 units of power to domestic consumers, taking canal water to different parts of the state, launch of ‘Sarkar Tuhade Dwar’ scheme, Sadak Suraksha Force, Farishtey scheme and zero tolerance against corruption. “Punjab has special reasons to remember this day with reverence because no one can deny the unparalleled contributions of Punjab in bringing about the historic moment of Independence of this great nation as 80% of the great warriors, who made supreme sacrifices for attaining freedom, belonged to Punjab,” he said. He added, “So from day one from assuming the charge of office, the AAP govt has been making strenuous efforts to fulfil the aspirations of our great freedom fighters . Due to the concerted efforts of our govt, Punjab has today emerged as a frontrunner state in the country and an unprecedented era of progress, prosperity and peace is being witnessed in the state.” “A new revolution has been embarked in the state with the sole aim of providing clean, efficient, responsive and transparent governance to the people and we are making every effort to restore...

title: சிவில் சப்ளை டிஜிபியாக சீமா அகர்வால் நியமனம்
content: சென்னை: தமிழ்நாடு சிவில் சப்ளை சிஐடி அந்தஸ்து உயர்த்தப்பட்டு டிஜிபியாக சீமா அகர்வால் நியமனம் செய்யப்பட்டுள்ளார். தமிழ்நாடு உள்துறை செயலாளர் தீரஜ் குமார் நேற்று வெளியிட்ட அறிக்கையில் கூறியிருப்பதாவது: தமிழ்நாடு சீருடைப் பணியாளர் தேர்வாணைய இயக்குநராக இருந்த சீமா அகர்வால் புதிதாக உருவாக்கப்பட்ட சிவில் சப்ளை சிஐடி டிஜிபியாக நியமனம் செய்யப்பட்டுள்ளார். ஏற்கனவே சிவில் சப்ளை சிஐடி பிரிவு கூடுதல் டிஜிபி அந்தஸ்தில் இருந்தது. அது தற்போது டிஜிபி அந்தஸ்துக்கு உயர்த்தப்பட்டுள்ளது. இவ்வாறு கூறப்பட்டுள்ளது.

title: Rekam Jejak Kepala BPIP: Sweeping Cadar Hingga Sebut 'Agama Musuh Pancasila'
creator: Hasanul Rizqa
content: REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, JAKARTA -- Badan Pembinaan Ideologi Pancasila (BPIP) menghebohkan publik lantaran keputusannya yang tidak memfasilitasi jilbab untuk Paskibraka Nasional terkuak. Walaupun banjir kritikan dari antara lain Majelis Ulama Indonesia (MUI), Nahdlatul Ulama (NU), dan Muhammadiyah, Kepala BPIP Yudian Wahyudi tetap bergeming dan tidak mengubah aturan yang ada. Sebagai informasi, sejak tahun 2022 Pasukan Pengibar Bendera Pusaka (Paskibraka) Nasional tidak lagi berada di bawah naungan Kementerian Pemuda dan Olahraga (Kemenpora) RI, melainkan di bawah BPIP. Ini sesuai amanah Peraturan Presiden Nomor 51 Tahun 2022 tentang Program Pasukan Pengibar Bendera Pusaka. Banyak pihak, termasuk alumni Paskibraka masa sebelum 2022, heran dengan perubahan kebijakan terkait busana Muslimah. Sebab, pada tahun-tahun sejak permulaan Era Reformasi hingga 2021, Muslimah yang menjadi petugas Paskibraka Nasional diperbolehkan untuk mengenakan jilbab. Irwan Indra selaku pembina Paskibraka Nasional 2021 sampai-sampai menuding, kewajiban copot jilbab bagi Paskibraka tahun ini akibat ulah BPIP. "Bahkan, ada (Muslimah) yang sudah sejak SD dan SMP memakai jilbab harus dicopot karena ikut Paskibraka 2024," kata Irwan kepada Republika , Rabu (14/8/2024). Dalam keterangan pers, Yudian Wahyudi berdalih, setiap calon Paskibraka 2024 sudah menandatangani surat pernyataan di atas materai Rp 10 ribu....

title: SLP entre los 10 mejores del Liga Mundial Juvenil de Karate
content: La delegación de San Luis Potosí logró posicionar a varios de sus atletas ente los 10 mejores de la Liga Mundial Juvenil 2024 de Karate (Youth League WKF 2024) que se celebró en Cancún y que contó con la participación de 57 países. Entre los potosinos que más destacaron en el evento se encuentran Frida Nicole Hernández quien logró la medalla de bronce, Aylin Yamilet Reyna con un 5to. sitio su hermano Orlando Reyna con un 7mo. Y Rubén Sánchez en 9no. Lugar. Los resultados de los potosinos en esta competencia fueron los siguientes : Frida Nicole Hernández Yáñez participó en U14 - 52KG, comenzó con una derrota ante España (9-4), pero logró avanzar a repechaje al ser finalista, donde venció a Canadá (4-0) y se adjudicó la medalla de bronce tras ganar a Chile (5-4). Dafne Yaretzi Hernández Vázquez participó en Cadete +61KG y ganó su primer combate contra Chile (6-5) pero fue eliminada en su siguiente enfrentamiento ante Alemania. Por su parte Valeria Linette Juárez Martínez compitió en Cadete +61KG donde logró una victoria en su primer combate contra Estados Unidos (7-6), pero fue derrotada por Canadá en su segundo combate (9-1). En Junior -76KG participó Rubén Sánchez Montenegro, quien después de perder su primer combate frente a Croacia (6-0), se mantuvo en competencia hasta el repechaje, donde fue derrotado por Guatemala (6-5). title: Taliban curbs on women’s rights spark mental health crisis: UN
creator: NEWS WIRE
content: UNITED NATIONS - Three years of Taliban rule in Afghanistan has led to the striking erasure of women from public life, which is also reflected at the community and household levels, a senior official with the UN agency championing gender equality has said. Alison Davidian, UN Women Country Representative in Afghanistan, briefed correspondents in New York on their latest report addressing the plight of women and girls since the Taliban returned to power in August 2021. She described this period as three years worth of countless decrees, directives, and statements targeting women and girls stripping them of their fundamental rights and eviscerating their autonomy. Taliban edicts have denied girls from getting an education beyond the sixth grade and banned women from working for non-governmental organization (NGOs). Three years ago, the world was watching a takeover that was lives streaming horror after horror, she said, speaking via videoconference from Kabul. And three years later, while the world attention may have turned elsewhere, the horrors have not stopped for Afghan women and girls, but nor has their conviction to stand against the oppression. The UN Women report details trends based on consultations with thousands of women across Afghanistan – from provincial capitals to rural areas since the Taliban return. “And the first most striking trend is the erasure of Afghan...

title: Las habilidades laborales, un reto de todas y todos
content: En materia de crecimiento y empleo, Jalisco se encuentra en un camino sin retorno, decidimos avanzar y ser competitivos en el desarrollo económico, nos mantenemos como los mejores a nivel nacional en atracción de inversiones, como detonadores de fuentes de empleo; para seguir en esta ruta, se requiere que las y los trabajadores cultiven nuevas habilidades laborales, ahí está el gran desafío en todos los sectores de producción. Debe quedarnos claro que hay tareas a realizar por parte de cada uno de los sectores productivos, autoridades y sindicatos; con esto quiero decir que tanto trabajadoras como trabajadores, deberán poner su esfuerzo, tiempo y apertura para que la capacitación sea continua, eso permitirá descubrir nuevas habilidades, además de reforzar las detectadas. Al sector educativo corresponde ir un paso adelante en los programas; a nosotros facilitar los procesos, impulsarlos y hacer que sean una realidad con políticas públicas adecuadas. Cuenten con nosotros para seguir promoviendo y sin descanso la capacitación como un elemento fundamental del día a día, la cual debe estar conectada a la aplicación de la tecnología en positivo. En los últimos años, Jalisco ha emergido como un importante centro tecnológico y de innovación, hay quienes nos han calificado como el Silicon Valley de México. Es por ello que nuestro desafío actual es la brecha de...

title: [SC리뷰] '돌싱특집' 22기 영숙 '교제 3일만에 결혼→초고속 이혼, 결혼식도 안해' (종합)
creator: 조민정 기자
content: [스포츠조선 조민정 기자] 영숙이 자신의 놀라운 사연을 공개해 화제를 모았다. 14일 밤 방송된 SBS Plus, ENA 예능 프로그램 '나는 솔로(SOLO)'에서는 돌싱녀 영숙의 이야기가 그려졌다. 22기 영숙은 고등학교 동문이었던 남성과 우연히 10년 만에 재회한 후, 단 3일 만에 결혼을 결심했다고 전해 놀라움을 자아냈다. 더욱이, 신혼부부 전세 자금을 마련하기 위해 혼인신고를 했으나, 상견례나 결혼식 없이 단 2주간의 신혼 생활만 했다는 사실에 MC들조차 말을 잇지 못했다. 영숙은 신혼 초기에 겪었던 갈등을 설명하며, "신혼집이 채 정리도 안 되고 꾸미지도 않은 상태에서 재정적인 문제와 종교적 갈등 때문에 매일 싸웠다"고 말했다. 그녀는 이어서 "저는 종교가 있지만, 없다고 해도 무방할 정도였다. 그러나 전 남편은 종교적인 시간을 꼭 함께해야 한다고 강요했다"며, 종교적 마찰이 이혼의 주요 원인 중 하나였다고 밝혔다. 영숙은 앞으로의 연애에 대해서는 "종교적 갈등은 절대 원하지 않는다"며, 종교적인 문제를 피하고 싶다는 바람을 전했다. 조민정 기자 mj.cho@sportschosun.com

title: Kehlani Requests Restraining Order Against Ex, Accuses Him of Abuse amid Child Custody Battle
creator: People
content: Last week, Kehlani's ex Javaughn Young-White filed for full custody of their 5-year-old daughter Adeya Nomi Gabe Ginsberg/Getty ; Frazer Harrison/Getty is taking action against her ex amid a custody battle over their daughter. On Friday, Aug. 9, the "After Hours" singer, who uses she/her and they/them pronouns, filed a temporary restraining order against her ex in the Los Angeles County Superior Court, according to documents obtained by PEOPLE. Now, Young-White, 27, is prohibited from contacting Kehlani and their 5-year-old daughter Adeya Nomi directly or indirectly, including by phone or email. He must also stay at least 100 yards away from them, their home, workplace and child care facility at all times. While the restraining order is in effect, Kehlani, 29 — who dated Young-White from 2018 to 2019 — maintains full physical and legal custody of Adeya. In the documents, a judge also ruled that "there is a risk that [Young-White] might take the children without permission" because he Has a history of "abuse" and "not cooperating" with Kehlani. Related: Per the terms of the restraining order, Young-White is also prohibited from traveling with Adeya outside California, he can't apply for passports or other travel-related documents and cannot possess or purchase firearms and ammunition. A hearing for the restraining order request will be held on Sept. 3. The day prior, Kehlani...

title: Rly exhibition displays pangs of partition
content: Patna: The East Central Railway (ECR) on Wednesday observed the ‘ Partition Horrors Remembrance Day ’ (Vibhajan Vibhishika Smriti Diwas) at different stations falling under jurisdiction of the ECR. To mark the day, ECR GM Chatrasal Singh felicitated a freedom fighter Nand Deo Prasad and jointly inaugurated a photo exhibition at the ECR headquarters in Hajipur. “The exhibition has a collection of rare pictures, news clippings and news articles published during that period, shedding light on the ‘horrors of partition.’ The younger generation will learn more about the history behind pangs of the partition,” Singh said, adding that the exhibition showcased sacrifices of the countrymen to achieve freedom from the shackles of British colonialism. The railways also organised photo exhibitions at several major stations to make people aware about the importance of August 14, 1947, which witnessed a horrific saga of human migration, manslaughter and immense sufferings. We also published the following articles recently Northern railway observes 'Partition Horrors Remembrance Day' at 23 railway stations under Ferozepur division The Ferozepur Division of Northern Railway observed 'Partition Horrors Remembrance Day' with exhibitions at 23 railway stations. August 14 marks the anniversary of India's partition in 1947, resulting in mass displacement and loss of lives. Activities included...

title: Éducation : Barthélémy Dias lance la reconstruction du CEM Ousmane Socé Diop pour 740 millions CFA
creator: Dakaractu
content: Le maire de la ville de Dakar a lancé ce mercredi, les travaux de reconstruction du Collège d'Enseignement Moyen (CEM) Ousmane Socé Diop de Dieuppeul Derklé, marquant une étape significative pour l'éducation locale. Le coût de ce projet ambitieux, s'élève à 740 millions de francs CFA. Le maire de la commune de Dieuppeul Derklé, le collectif des parents d'élèves et des anciens élèves de l'établissement étaient présents pour assister à cet acte de la ville de Dakar. Cette initiative vise à améliorer les conditions d'apprentissage et à offrir un environnement scolaire moderne et adapté aux besoins des élèves.

title: #Mpox vuelve a ser emergencia de salud pública mundial: OMS
content: Internacional La Organización Mundial de la Salud (OMS) ha declarado nuevamente al mpox, anteriormente conocido como viruela del mono, como una emergencia de salud pública de alcance internacional . Esta decisión se tomó después de que un brote en la República Democrática del Congo (RDC) se extendiera a otros 12 países africanos, incluyendo Uganda, Kenia, Ruanda y Burundi. En lo que va del año, se han reportado más de 14,000 casos y 524 muertes , lo que ha generado una preocupación global. El brote en la RDC se originó a partir de una cepa endémica, conocida como clado I, pero la aparición de una nueva variante, el clado Ib, ha acelerado la propagación del virus a través del contacto cercano , incluido el contacto sexual. La situación es especialmente alarmante en África, donde los Centros para el Control y Prevención de Enfermedades de África han registrado un aumento del 160% en los casos sospechosos en comparación con el año anterior. ?️ Director General de la OMS declara el brote de #ViruelaSímica emergencia de salud pública de importancia internacional. i️ Lee más: https://t.co/zCj2fAJZqD #mpox pic.twitter.com/BWMeV4kQ1Y Además de la RDC, países como Sudáfrica, Costa de Marfil, Camerún, Liberia y Nigeria también han reportado casos. La República Centroafricana fue el último país en declarar un brote el 1 de agosto. La OMS ha destacado que...

title: Inflation drops below 3% for first time since 2021
content: Inflation drops below 3% for first time since 2021 The Labor Department reported Wednesday that consumer prices rose just 2.9% in July, the first time the year-over-year inflation rate has dropped below 3% since March of 2021. However, despite the good economic data, for many Americans monthly expenses such as rent, auto insurance and electricity remain stubbornly high. Jo Ling Kent reports.

title: Hurricane Ernesto batters Puerto Rico
content: Hurricane Ernesto batters Puerto Rico Hurricane Ernesto brought heavy flooding to Puerto Rico Wednesday, leaving hundreds of thousands of homes and businesses without power. It is expected to strengthen before it takes aim at Bermuda as early as Friday. Manuel Bojorquez reports from Puerto Rico.

title: Confirma Sala Guadalajara del TEPJF la anulación de la elección del Ayuntamiento de Ocampo
creator: Yuliana Nieto
content: En su reciente Sesión Pública, la Sala Regional Guadalajara del TEPJF resolvió diversas impugnaciones en contra de resoluciones emitidas por el Tribunal Estatal Electoral de Chihuahua (TEE), entre las cuales, determinó confirmar la anulación de la elección del Ayuntamiento de Ocampo. Con lo anterior, queda firme la resolución del TEE, en la que, se ordenó al Congreso del Estado y al Instituto Estatal Electoral, a que tomen las medidas necesarias para la celebración de elecciones extraordinarias para dicho Ayuntamiento. Por otra parte, la Salga Guadalajara desechó los medios de impugnación promovidos por el Partido Movimiento Ciudadano y una ciudadana, por presentarse de manera extemporánea, en dichos juicios, se pretendía controvertir las sentencias del TEE, que confirmaron los acuerdos mediante los cuales se realizaron las asignaciones de regidurías de representación proporcional (RP) de los municipios de Delicias, Guachochi, Cuauhtémoc, Matachí, López, Morelos, Aquiles Serdán, Moris, Julimes, San Francisco de Conchos, Santa Isabel, Cusihuiriachi, Janos, Coronado y Matamoros, por tal motivo al desecharse los medios, se quedan firmen las asignaciones de regidurías de RP de los mencionados Ayuntamientos.

content: Much warmer and drier weather will settle in Colorado toward the end of the week. Denver will see highs near 90 starting Friday, sticking with us through the weekend. Scattered storms make a comeback Sunday and next Monday.

title: PF investiga suspeita de corrupção e lavagem de dinheiro no Tribunal de Justiça do Maranhão
content: Os agentes cumpriram 55 mandados de busca e apreensão expedidos pelo . Apreenderam computadores, carros de luxo, dinheiro e joias em endereços de alguns dos investigados. A Polícia Federal não informou os nomes deles. Polícia apreende joias nas casas de investigados por suspeita de corrupção e lavagem de dinheiro no Tribunal de Justiça do Maranhão — Foto: Reprodução/TV Globo Ainda de acordo com a PF, o grupo aliciava pessoas com pendências no Banco do Nordeste para entrarem com ações contra o banco solicitando indenizações milionárias. E que, dentro do TJ, havia manipulação para as ações caírem nas mãos dos juízes ou desembargadores envolvidos no esquema. A PF afirma que o dinheiro era repartido entre os envolvidos, que são investigados por formação de quadrilha, corrupção ativa e passiva, e lavagem de dinheiro. Em nota, o Tribunal de Justiça do Maranhão declarou que colabora com a investigação. PF investiga suspeita de corrupção e lavagem de dinheiro no Tribunal de Justiça do Maranhão — Foto: Reprodução/TV Globo

title: EPS y cajas de compensación respondieron a la Contraloría y dijeron en qué gastaron $6 billones durante el covid-19

Ahora puede seguirnos en Facebook y en nuestro WhatsApp Channel . En resumen, las razones son las siguientes: No existe ninguna norma jurídica vigente que sustente esta posición. title: Anggota DPR Nilai Larangan Jilbab Paskibraka Bertentangan dengan Konstitusi
content: Kepala Sekretariat Presiden Heru Budi Hartono mengaku tidak tahu saat pengukuhan ada 18 anggota Paskibraka putri yang melepas hijabnya. Pasalnya, saat gladi menurut Heru mereka semua berhijab. Dia meminta untuk anggota Paskibra yang berhijab dibebaskan tetap memakainya. Ketua BPIP sebaiknya dipecat usai polemik larangan jilbab bagi Paskibraka perempuan. Kata KPAI soal aturan Paskibraka lepas Jilbab. Ketua Fraksi PKS di DPR, Jazuli Juwaini mengkritik keputusan BPIP soal anggota Paskibraka 2024 tanpa hijab. BPIP dinilai melanggar hak-hak beragama. Dokumen yang harus disiapkan calon pegawai negeri sipil (CPNS) yang akan bertugas di Ibu Kota Negara (IKN) Nusantara. Orang tua anggota Paskibraka 2024 protes anaknya diharuskan membuka hijab. Keberatan itu diterima oleh Pemerintah DI Yogyakarta. HDMI mendesak BPIP membatalkan aturan anggota Paskibraka 2024 tanpa hijab. Aturan itu dinilai melanggar UUD. BPIP jelaskan alasan anggota Paskibrakan putri melepas hijab karena keseregaman pakaian. Keseragaman pakaian itu diatur lewat surat edaran BPIP. Anggota Paskibraka DKI Jakarta diambil dari seluruh wilayah di Jakarta. Kisaran gaji petugas Pasukan Pengibar Bendera Pusaka (Paskibraka) upacara Hari Ulang Tahun (HUT) RI ke-79.

title: Los aciertos, los errores y los riesgos de la incursión ucraniana en Kursk
creator: The Economist
content: Por primera vez desde la Segunda Guerra Mundial, Rusia ha sido invadida. En la ocasión anterior, las tropas ucranianas del Ejército Rojo ayudaron a repeler el asalto nazi en la provincia rusa de Kursk. Ahora son los ucranianos los que avanzan por el mismo terreno. El ataque sorpresa de Ucrania, que comenzó el 6 de agosto, es audaz y osado, y podría cambiar la narrativa de la guerra. También es una apuesta que podría salir terriblemente mal. Desde el punto de vista moral y legal, Ucrania tiene todo el derecho a llevar la lucha a Rusia. Todo Estado tiene derecho a defenderse, y ese derecho no se detiene en la frontera. Rusia está librando una guerra de conquista no provocada en Ucrania y ha llevado a cabo miles de ataques contra la región ucraniana de Sumy desde el otro lado de la frontera en Kursk. Las tropas, el equipo y las bases que permiten esos ataques son objetivos legítimos. La ofensiva ucraniana en Kursk ya ha logrado algunos éxitos. Sus fuerzas han atravesado la región, han ocupado decenas de asentamientos y han tomado cientos de prisioneros. Esto ha tenido tres efectos inmediatos. Uno es levantar la moral en el país, que necesitaba un empujón: el ejército ucraniano está a la defensiva en la región del Donbas y su contraofensiva del año pasado fracasó. El segundo es mostrar a los socios internacionales que Ucrania puede recuperar la iniciativa . Es...

title: 49ers reporter: Brandon Aiyuk looked invested during practice
creator: David Bonilla, 49ers Webzone
content: Several reports have suggested that wide receiver Brandon Aiyuk wants to stay with the San Francisco 49ers, who selected him with the No. 25 overall pick in 2020. He also wants to be paid like one of the NFL's top receivers, creating a standoff between player and team that has dominated headlines all offseason. Aiyuk's appearance at Wednesday's practice was noteworthy, as the receiver hadn't been seen on the field for weeks. Aiyuk has refused to practice until his contract status is resolved to his satisfaction. With trade rumors swirling, all eyes were on him as reporters evaluated what his presence might mean. Cam Inman of Bay Area News Group offered a positive report, stating that Aiyuk looked like part of the team despite not participating in practice. Inman noted that Aiyuk started the session about 50 yards away, but as red zone drills commenced, he took a more active role. "And then you started seeing the interaction among teammates," Inman said on Bay Area radio station 95.7 The Game . "Even [GM] John Lynch came by and shook his hand and patted him on the back." It's important not to read too much into that. The last time Aiyuk was seen interacting with Lynch on the practice field was on July 31, when his lively greetings with Lynch and head coach Kyle Shanahan caused significant media buzz. "It's almost like it was the status quo, but at the same time, just watching...

title: Nuevo sueldo mínimo 2024: Ministro de Trabajo anuncia diálogo de 30 días hábiles para definir posible monto
creator: Alejandro Aguilar
content: Los resultados del informe sobre el aumento del salario mínimo en Perú serán entregados en unos 30 días hábiles, en la próxima sesión del Consejo de Ministros , anunció el titular del Ministerio de Trabajo y Promoción del Empleo (MTPE), Daniel Maurate . Este estudio evaluará los ajustes necesarios en los salarios y medidas de productividad. Durante una conferencia de prensa, el titular de la cartera detalló que el reporte será elaborado por la Comisión de Productividad y Salarios Mínimos , que integra a expertos en economía, representantes de trabajadores y empleadores. Este grupo trabajará para presentar un análisis profundo y recomendaciones informadas. El ministro subrayó la importancia de este informe es que se incluirán estudios de mercado laboral, índices de inflación y otros indicadores económicos relevantes para proponer una solución justa y equilibrada. “Una vez que tengamos el informe final, va a pasar al Pleno del Congreso y será un insumo para que, finalmente, el Gobierno emita una decisión”, mencionó a la prensa. Maurate insistió en que la meta es asegurar una propuesta que beneficie a todas las partes interesadas y sectores económicos, y que permita mejorar la productividad del país. El informe se convertirá en una herramienta clave para promover mejoras salariales fundamentadas en datos precisos y objetivos. Daniel Maurate explicó...

title: Mpox vuelve a ser emergencia internacional, las razones detrás de la decisión de la OMS
content: En las últimas semanas, hemos comenzado a escuchar nuevamente casos reportados de Mpox, la patología anteriormente conocida como viruela símica o del mono . Hoy, la Organización Mundial de la Salud (OMS) declaró la emergencia internacional como consecuencia de los brotes registrados en niños y adultos de la República Democrática del Congo, además contagios en otros 12 países de África . Su decisión se debe al riesgo de propagación de una nueva forma del virus, el cual hace dos años ya se había convertido en noticia por su relevancia global. “La detección y rápida propagación de un nuevo clado variante de Mpox en el este de la República Democrática del Congo, su detección en países vecinos que no la habían reportado anteriormente, y el potencial de una mayor propagación dentro de África y más allá es muy preocupante”, declaró el director general de la agencia sanitaria de la ONU, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus en una rueda de prensa. “Hoy se reunió el comité de emergencia y me comunicó que, en su opinión, la situación constituye una emergencia de salud pública de alcance internacional. Acepté esa recomendación. Es una situación que debería preocuparnos a todos ”, detalló el director de la entidad sanitaria internacional. Esta es la segunda vez en dos años que esta enfermedad infecciosa se vuelve una amenaza sanitaria internacional a la luz de...

title: Encuentran sustancias tóxicas en productos de Shein, AliExpress y Temu
creator: Redacción 24 Horas
content: Autoridades de Corea del Sur alertan a consumidores por hallazgo de sustancias tóxicas en productos de Shein, AliExpress y Temu . Shein, al igual que Aliexpress o Temu, son plataformas de comercio electrónico que han ganado gran popularidad en los últimos años por ofrecer ropa y accesorios a precios bajos. Sin embargo, han tenido no solo problemas con la seguridad de los productos y estafas, ya sea porque no cumplen con lo que prometen o la calidad de sus artículos son “malas”. Te podría interesar: Estas fueron las acusaciones al vocalista de Rammstein Tras esto último, es que se ha realizado un mayor escrutinio de sus prácticas comerciales y estándares de seguridad, tanto en la Unión Europea como en Corea del Sur, donde los funcionarios de Seúl realizaron inspecciones semanales de los artículos vendidos por las plataformas en línea. En el reporte realizado del 12 de julio al 9 de este mes, elaborado por el Instituto Metropolitano de Salud y Medio Ambiente de Seúl, el cual se publicó este 14 de junio en medios locales de dicha ciudad, donde se analizaron 144 productos, entre ellos 94 contenedores de alimentos, 13 cosméticos, 28 sandalias y sombreros y 9 productos sanitarios, vendidos en estos tres centros en línea, se halló que no todos cumplían con las normas legales. De acuerdo con el análisis, se encontró que 11 productos contienen niveles alarmantes de...

title: Trump slams Harris on economy ahead of major policy rollout
creator: Agence France-Presse
content: Donald Trump tore into the Biden administration's economic record Wednesday, just days before Kamala Harris unveils her plan for tackling living costs in her first major policy speech as the Democratic Party's presidential nominee. In a rambling address that was light on specifics, Trump claimed his Democratic rival would spark another Great Depression if elected and pledged that he would instead send wages soaring and "make America affordable again." "Under Kamala Harris and crooked Joe Biden, the American Dream is dead. You don't hear about the American Dream anymore -- it's dead," Trump said in Asheville, a liberal enclave in the crucial swing state of North Carolina. "Her radical liberal policies have caused horrific inflation, decimated the middle class and gutted the finances of millions and millions of American families." Consumer inflation is one of the biggest issues of the campaign, but new government figures out Wednesday showed it easing to 2.9 percent in July -- its lowest since March 2021 -- cheering those calling for a cut in interest rates. Trump conceded that inflation was "starting to maybe get under control" but also claimed that Harris "has crackled as the American economy has burned" -- possibly meaning "cackled," a word he has used to describe her laugh. Marginally more Americans trust Harris to handle the economy than Trump, according to one new...

title: Raj doctors to continue strike until govt agrees to enact law for their protection
content: 1 2 Jaipur/Kota: Resident doctors at SMS Hospital in Jaipur and at other govt hospitals in Rajasthan have decided to continue their protests even though the nationwide strike called by the Federation of Resident Doctors’ Association over the gruesome rape and murder of a doctor in Kolkata has been called off. Rajasthan doctors said they will continue their protest until the Union govt agrees to enact a law for their protection. Dr Manohar Siyol, a representative of Jaipur Association of Resident Doctors, said on Wednesday, “AIIMS Delhi has not called off the strike. We are in support of AIIMS Delhi and other institutes continuing their strike to demand a central law for protection of doctors. Resident doctors of govt medical colleges in Ajmer, Kota, Jodhpur, Udaipur and Bikaner are all on strike.” In Kota, doctors staged a protest at ESI Corporation Hospital on Wednesday against the rape and murder of the doctor in Kolkata, demanding death penalty for the culprits and enactment of a doctors’ protection Act. General secretary of All Rajasthan Serving Doctors Association, Dr Durga Shankar Saini, said 15,000 serving doctors in the state observed black day on Wednesday by wearing black armbands at work. The ongoing strike has caused difficulties for patients. To compensate for the absence of resident doctors, SMS Hospital has made alternative arrangements. Senior faculty members...

title: நாட்டின் 78வது சுதந்திர தினத்தை ஒட்டி கோட்டையில் இன்று தேசிய கொடி ஏற்றுகிறார் முதல்வர் மு.க.ஸ்டாலின்: அப்துல் கலாம், கல்பனா சாவ்லா பெயரில் விருது வழங்குகிறார்
content: சென்னை: நாட்டின் 78வது சுதந்திர தினம் இன்று கோலாகலமாக கொண்டாடப்பட உள்ளது. சுதந்திர தினத்தன்று டெல்லி கோட்டையில் பிரதமர் மோடி கொடியேற்றி உரையாற்றுவார். அந்தந்த மாநில முதல்வர்கள் தலைநகரில் தேசியக்கொடியை ஏற்றி வைப்பார்கள். அதன்படி, தமிழகத்தின் தலைநகர் சென்னை புனித ஜார்ஜ் கோட்டையில் இன்று காலை 9 மணிக்கு முதல்வர் மு.க.ஸ்டாலின் தேசியக்கொடியை ஏற்றி வைத்து உரையாற்றுகிறார். இதற்கான அனைத்து ஏற்பாடுகளும் சென்னை கோட்டையில் சிறப்பாக செய்யப்பட்டுள்ளது. முதல்வர் மு.க.ஸ்டாலின் தேசியக்கோடி ஏற்றி வைத்ததும், விழா மேடையில் தமிழ்நாட்டிற்கும், தமிழின வளர்ச்சிக்கும் பங்காற்றியவர்களை பெருமைப்படுத்த `தகைசால் தமிழர்’ என்ற பெயரிலான விருது மற்றும் விருதுடன் ரூ.10 லட்சத்துக்கான காசோலை மற்றும் பாராட்டுச் சான்று வழங்கப்படுகிறது. இந்த விருதுக்கு காங்கிரஸ் மூத்த தலைவர் குமரிஅனந்தன் தேர்வு செய்யப்பட்டுள்ளார். அதன்படி சுதந்திர தின விழா நிகழ்ச்சியின்போது முதல்வர் மு.க.ஸ்டாலின் குமரிஅனந்தனுக்கு தகைசால் தமிழர் விருது வழங்கி கவுரவிக்கிறார். அதேபோன்று, அறிவியல் தொழில்நுட்பத்தில் சிறந்து விளங்குபவர்களுக்கு டாக்டர் அப்துல் கலாம் விருது, துணிவு மற்றும் சாகச செயலுக்கான கல்பனா சாவ்லா விருது, முதலமைச்சரின் நல் ஆளுமை விருது, மாற்றுத்திறனாளிகள் நலனுக்காக மிகச்சிறந்த சேவை புரிந்தோருக்கான தமிழ்நாடு அரசு விருதுகள், மகளிர் நலனுக்காக சிறப்பாக தொண்டாற்றிய தொண்டு நிறுவனம் மற்றும் சமூகப் பணியாளருக்கான விருதுகள், சிறந்த உள்ளாட்சி அமைப்புகளுக்கான முதலமைச்சர் விருதுகள், முதலமைச்சரின் மாநில இளைஞர் விருதுகள் உள்ளிட்ட...

title: LA FOTO DEL DÍA
creator: Juan Alvarez
content: Las eses de Juan José Laparte de Marcilla, han protagonizado el tercer encierro del Pilón. Las diez vacas han completado el recorrrido en apenas un minuto y han propiciado algún golpe y revolcón en la parte final de la cuesta de arena. De hecho, los efectivos de la DYA han tenido que atender a uno de ellos, habitual del encierro, sobre el terreno, y finalmente ha sido trasladado en camilla. EFE / Jesus Diges.

title: ‘Don’t summon senior citizens for pension’
content: Panchkula: During a Samadhan camp held at the mini secretariat on Wednesday, Panchkula DC Dr Yash Garg instructed the social welfare officer to make proper arrangements to provide pension to elderly who are unable to walk. This happened after Darshan Singh, a resident of Khopar village, told the deputy commissioner that his mother is 80 years old, and is unable to walk. “My mother's pension comes at the post office, from where we collect it by putting a thumb impression. But now that has stopped, and the staff is calling my mother to the office,” Singh said. Later in the day, Gram Panchayat Masyun gave a complaint to the DC, requesting that street lights be installed at the village. We also published the following articles recently Kin clash over senior citizen pension at bank, 2 knifed in Kalyan In Kalyan, a violent dispute erupted over an elderly woman's pension, leading to a knife attack. Hajubai Parmar, a KDMC retiree, was accompanied by her grandsons Rahul and Vijay at the bank when her brother's sons claimed rights to her pension. The situation escalated outside, resulting in serious injuries to Rahul and Vijay. Police are investigating the incident. title: A bigger iMac with over 30-inch display is reportedly still in development
Reports: Patriots trading LB Matthew Judon to Falcons
creator: Field Level Media
content: The New England Patriots are trading linebacker Matthew Judon to the Atlanta Falcons for a third-round draft pick, multiple media outlets reported Wednesday night. NFL Network reported that the pick will be for the 2025 draft. Judon was entering the final season of a four-year, $54.5 million contract that was to pay him $6.5 million in base salary, and he was seeking a new deal with New England. He was spotted having an animated conversation with Patriots first-year coach Jerod Mayo during a practice session last month, one that Judon did not participate in. Of the 14 training camp practices New England has had this offseason, Judon had kept himself out of two. A bicep tear limited Judon to just four games (two starts) last season. He still managed to record four sacks along with 13 tackles. The 31-year-old Judon has played eight NFL seasons with the Baltimore Ravens (2016-20) and Patriots (2021-23), amassing 66.5 sacks, 369 tackles, nine forced fumbles and four fumble recoveries in 114 games (82 starts). Judon is a four-time Pro Bowl selection. This article first appeared on Field Level Media and was syndicated with permission.

title: Dibu Martínez toma radical decisión antes del juego Colombia vs. Argentina por las Eliminatorias; “Soy supersticioso”
content: El día 10 de septiembre, a las 3:30 p. m. (hora colombiana), la Selección Colombia de Mayores, que es dirigida por Néstor Lorenzo, se enfrentará con su similar de Argentina, que es entrenada por Lionel Scaloni. Este duelo corresponde a la octava jornada de las Eliminatorias Sudamericanas y se llevará a cabo en el estadio Metropolitano de la ciudad de Barranquilla . Es importante que la tricolor salga victorioso de este cotejo, esto para estar más cerca de la clasificación al Mundial 2026 que se va a llevar a cabo en Estados Unidos, Canadá y México. El compromiso será una especie de revancha para el combinado patrio, teniendo en cuenta que Argentina salió vencedor en la gran final de la Copa América 2024 que se disputó en territorio estadounidense. Y antes de este encuentro, un referente de la selección Argentina tomó una radical decisión. Se trata de Emiliano (Dibu) Martínez, quien milita en el Aston Villa de la Premier League de Inglaterra y que cambió de dorsal . El portero pasará a usar la camiseta número 23 y dejará la número 1. De acuerdo con él mismo, lo hace porque con el 23 ganó todos los títulos con la selección Argentina. Señaló que le quiere llevar trofeos a los aficionados del Aston Villa. “ Gané todos los títulos en la Selección con el 23, día en el cual nació mi hijo. Quiero traerle trofeos a los hinchas. Soy muy supersticioso, la...

title: Sjokoladekjempen Mars vil sluke Pringles
content: Kelloggs-konsernet – som formelt heter Kellanova – har en rekke varemerker i tillegg til Pringles og velkjente Kelloggs-produkter som corn flakes og Frosties. Budet fra Mars – som står bak velkjente sjokolader som Mamp;Ms, Milky Way, Snickers og Bounty i tillegg til Mars – verdsetter Kellanova til 36 milliarder dollar, som for tiden tilsvarer snaut 390 milliarder kroner. Kellanova-aksjen gikk opp 7,9 prosent på New York-børsen etter at budet ble kunngjort.

title: Forensic probe now must for 43 police stations in Raj
content: Jaipur: Forensic examination of crime scenes has now become mandatory in 43 police station areas in the state for offences punishable by imprisonment of seven years or more. The state govt on Wednesday issued a notification under Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita, 2023 (BNSS), which has replaced the Code of Criminal Procedure, 1973, in this regard. This provision will initially be applicable to only 43 police stations , including 14 in Jaipur. Dr Ajay Sharma, director of the state’s Forensic Science Laboratory (FSL), said this move was being considered as a pilot project to train police and forensic department before extending it to other police stations. “Using powers conferred on the govt under BNSS, the state govt has made forensic examination mandatory for crimes that have a punishment of seven years or more. This has come into effect on Aug 14,” said Sharma. According to subsection 3 of section 176 of BNSS, on receipt of every information relating to commission of an offence which is punishable with seven years’ imprisonment or more, the officer in charge of a police station shall call a forensic expert to the crime scene and also ensure videography of the process on a mobile phone or any other electronic device. The police stations to which this provisions will apply are located in Jaipur, Kota, Udaipur, Jodhpur, Ajmer, Bharatpur, and Deeg districts. The 14 police...

title: Inicia Javier Díaz participación en cumbre de alcaldes celebrada en Boston
creator: El Heraldo de Saltillo
content: « Asistir a este tipo de eventos forma parte de la preparación que se desarrolla para conformar la estrategia de gobierno que se desplegará durante mi administración» Boston.- El alcalde electo de Saltillo, Javier Díaz González, inició su participación en la «Visionarios Summit 2024 By Aceleradora de Ciudades», que se desarrolla en MIT Sloan School of Management y Harvard Kennedy School, en Boston, Massachusetts. Esta cumbre congrega a 20 alcaldes electos por primera vez y reelectos de México, y tiene por objetivo impulsar las mejores prácticas en gestión municipal a través de ponencias por parte de expertos nacionales e internacionales. Díaz González señaló que asistir a este tipo de eventos forma parte de la preparación que se desarrolla para conformar la estrategia de gobierno que desplegará durante su administración. «En estas primeras sesiones de trabajo hemos visto temas de planeación de organización y diferentes proyectos que podemos emprender y, a partir del primero de enero de 2025, implementar en Saltillo, Coahuila» expresó. En esta cumbre, académicos del MIT y de la Universidad de Harvard intercambian experiencias y profundizan en prácticas internacionales en materia de gestión de ciudades. Entre los ponentes se encuentran: Stephen Goldsmith, exalcalde de Indianápolis, experto en políticas públicas y autor de Harvard Kennedy School....

title: Petro anuncia medidas por nueva alerta de la viruela del mono
creator: ariel.lopez
content: En respuesta a la reciente declaración de emergencia sanitaria global por el virus mpox , anteriormente conocido como viruela del mono, el gobierno colombiano ha anunciado una serie de medidas preventivas para enfrentar la situación. La Organización Mundial de la Salud (OMS) emitió la alerta tras un nuevo brote detectado en la República Democrática del Congo, que ha comenzado a expandirse hacia países vecinos. El presidente Gustavo Petro , a través de su cuenta en X, hizo un llamado a la acción para fortalecer el sistema de salud del país. " El Ministerio de Salud alistará todas las medidas pertinentes ", aseguró Petro, quien enfatizó la necesidad de "unidad del Estado y de la sociedad para implementar las medidas que se tomen". En su mensaje, también destacó la importancia de asegurar que los recursos necesarios para enfrentar la emergencia no se malgasten. Petro solicitó a los alcaldes y gobernadores colaborar en la organización de los equipos de salud territorial y en el mantenimiento de los puestos de salud a nivel nacional. Su llamado a la cooperación busca asegurar una respuesta coordinada y efectiva ante la amenaza del mpox. El presidente expresó su frustración con la falta de avances en la reforma al sistema de salud que se discutió en el Congreso el semestre pasado, y que no logró ser implementada. "Sin que nos hayan dejado implementar plenamente...

title: 흉부 압박 중단 없이 심전도 분석 AI 모델 개발...환자 생존율 향상 기대
creator: 장종호 기자
content: [스포츠조선 장종호 기자] 심폐소생술 과정에서 흉부 압박을 지속하면서 심전도를 분석할 수 있는 인공지능 모델이 국내 의료진에 의해 개발됐다. 이수교 고려대학교 안산병원 응급의학과 교수 연구팀(응급의학과 이수교 교수, 중점연구사업단 정수민 연구교수)은 '인공지능을 활용한 심폐소생술 중 제세동 가능 리듬 분석' 연구 논문을 응급의학과 분야 최상위 학술지 'Resuscitation 저널'에 게재했다. 심정지 환자의 생존율을 높이기 위해서는 고품질의 심폐소생술을 지속하면서 최대한 빠르게 제세동을 시행하는 것이 매우 중요하다. 하지만 제세동 시행에 앞서 제세동이 필요한 심장 리듬, 즉 충격필요리듬 등을 파악하기 위한 심전도 분석이 반드시 필요하고, 그동안 흉부 압박은 중단될 수밖에 없다. 병원 내에서는 심전도 분석을 위해 최대 10초, 병원 밖에서는 최대 수십 초간 흉부 압박을 멈추게 된다. 흉부 압박이 중단되는 시간이 길어질수록 심정지 환자의 생존율은 낮아진다. 연구팀은 지난 2019년 9월부터 2024년 2월까지 실제 고대안산병원에서 진행된 1889건의 심폐소생술 데이터를 수집하고 흉부 압박을 멈춘 상태의 리듬을 추출했다. 이후 추출된 데이터를 기반으로 충격필요리듬과 아닌 리듬을 분류해 1차원 합성곱 신경망을 통해 인공지능에 학습시켰다. 1차원 합성곱 신경망은 이미지 형태의 데이터를 처리하는...

title: Former Penn State QB Sean Clifford to Start for Packers Sunday
creator: Joe Smeltzer, Nittany Sports Now
content: Former Penn State QB Sean Clifford is getting the start. Packers coach Matt LaFleur announced Wednesday morning that Clifford will start Green Bay’s second preseason game, which is scheduled for Sunday Night in Denver. Sean Clifford to start at QB in Packers' second preseason game https://t.co/FxaL8EMaSV pic.twitter.com/oGraYrfvPN — Around The NFL (@AroundTheNFL) August 14, 2024 Regular starter Jordan Love will not play. Clifford is in his second NFL season. Both of which have been with the Packers, who selected him in the fifth round of the 2023 Draft. The Cincinnati native played in two regular-season games as a rookie. He ended the year 1 for 1 with 37 yards, completing that pass New Year’s Eve during a win over the rival Vikings in Minnesota. Two weeks later, Clifford played in Green Bay’s Wildcard win over the Cowboys in Dallas. He took three snaps toward the end but not throwing a pass. Clifford started at Penn State for four seasons. During that time, he broke numerous school records. Clifford is Penn State’s all-time leader in touchdown passes, passing yards and completions. Clifford passed his predecessor, Trace McSorley , in all three categories in 2022. “He’s maximized that entire experience,” coach James Franklin said ahead of last year’s Rose Bowl. “He’s maximized it as a student, as a student-athlete. He’s going to go on and be a very, very successful businessman...

title: Youth arrested for beating up, robbing paan stall owner
content: Pune: A 20-year-old youth was arrested on the charge of beating up a paan stall owner and robbing him of Rs6,000 on Monday morning in the Pimple Gurav area of Pimpri Chinchwad. A video clip doing the rounds on social media platforms led the police to arrest the accused from Old Sangvi and book his accomplice. An officer from the Sangvi policesaid that both suspects on Monday went to the paan stall and started abusing the owner. They ransacked the stall and beat him up. “The duo forcibly took Rs100 from the owner. While leaving the shop, they robbed Rs6,000 from the counter and fled,” he said. The police booked the duo under section 309 (robbery) of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS). We also published the following articles recently Vasco police remove 19 illegal stalls Vasco police, acting on a complaint by the Shree Damodar Bhajani Saptah utsav committee, cleared 19 illegal stalls set up inside the mandap premises opposite to the temple. The vendors had ignored directives from Mormugao municipal council chief officer, Deepesh Priolkar, not to install shops within the mandap area, prompting the police action. title: SSPM presenta reunión sobre la prevención del delito
content: Este miércoles la Secretaría de Seguridad Pública Municipal (SSPM) llevó a cabo una reunión con representantes de distintas organizaciones dedicadas a la prevención del delito. Antonio Salas Martínez, titular de la Dirección de Prevención Social , fue quien encabezó la sesión de La Red Ciudadana de la Prevención, en la que se busca integrar un plan de trabajo para este próximo semestre del 2024. ➡️ Únete al canal de WhatsApp de El Heraldo de Juárez “Se tomaron acuerdos como la definición de la problemática central entre niñas, niños y jóvenes, así como las propuestas para que se atiendan a través de los diferentes servicios que ofrecen cada una de las organizaciones involucradas”, informó la SSPM. A la reunión asistieron representantes de Nueva Vida, Acción de Jóvenes Por la Familia, Centro de Investigaciones Desarrollo de Proyectos Sociales, Educativos y de Salud A.C., Apoyo y Cultura, y el Instituto de Ciencias del Sector Social A. C. “Entre los temas a tratar, se acordó seguir actualizando y compartiendo la información para definir la estructura interna de la mesa, respecto a sus comisiones específicas para cada uno de los integrantes de la mesa ciudadana para mantenerla vigente y actualizada”, agregó la corporación. Por su parte, Salas Martínez, Director de prevención de la SSPM, agradeció a todos los representantes de cada una de las...

title: Смех сквозь ужас // Фильм Гэбриела Абрантеша «Заклятие Амелии»
content: В российский прокат вышел фильм ужасов португальского режиссера Гэбриела Абрантеша «Заклятие Амелии». Начав свою карьеру с фестивального кино, на этот раз он пробует себя в чистом жанре, что, по мнению Юлии Шагельман, приводит к довольно обескураживающему результату. Одна из немногих зловещих сцен фильма — сцена похищения младенца у молодой матери (Алба Баптишта) Фото: Русский Репортаж Одна из немногих зловещих сцен фильма — сцена похищения младенца у молодой матери (Алба Баптишта) Фото: Русский Репортаж Гэбриел Абрантеш, художник по образованию, взял в руки кинокамеру из чистого любопытства. Сначала снимал короткометражки, две из которых получили призы на Берлинском кинофестивале, а в 2018 году вместе с соавтором, режиссером и сценаристом Дэниелом Шмидтом дебютировал в полном метре. Безумная фэнтези-комедия «Диамантино» о футболисте, прозрачно срисованном с Криштиану Роналду и переживающем острый кризис идентичности, вошла в программу Каннского фестиваля и завоевала там приз прессы, а также премию Palm Dog, которая досталась собаке из фильма. В «Заклятии Амелии», которое Абрантеш написал и поставил уже в одиночку, никаких собачек, к сожалению, нет. Зато есть актер Карлоту Котто, в «Диамантино» исполнивший главную роль, а здесь играющий аж двух персонажей. Один из них — музыкант Эдвард из Нью-Йорка, который рос сиротой и ничего не знает о своей семье. На...

title: Невозможность острова // в фильме Кристиана Спаркса
content: В российском прокате — канадский фильм Кристиана Спаркса «Остров бессмертных». Заскучав было сначала от картин сурового быта странных островитян, Михаил Трофименков постепенно увлекся, пытаясь вычислить, до какой степени изуверства дойдет фантазия авторов. Результат превзошел все ожидания. Чудеса не доводят до добра обитателей острова Фото: ПилотКино Чудеса не доводят до добра обитателей острова Фото: ПилотКино Острова в современной массовой культуре — это модно. Острова — это настолько модно, что уже банально, почти невыносимо. Действие доброй половины уже не первое десятилетие не выходящих из моды скандинавских триллеров разворачивается именно на островах. Да и британских, и отчасти французских тоже. Не говоря уже о гениальном «Острове проклятых» Денниса Лихейна, экранизированном Мартином Скорсезе. Остров обязательно должен быть северным, неприветливым. Герой должен оказаться на острове только для того, чтобы его отрезал от Большой земли хоть шторм, хоть сиреневый туман, хоть ураган. Такие предполагаемые обстоятельства свидетельствуют о тщете авторской фантазии. Клаустрофобия места действия и мощь стихии избавляют от необходимости заботиться о психологии героев и вменяемости сюжета. С острова никуда не деться. Если, конечно, есть желание его покинуть. У большинства героев фильма Кристиана Спаркса такого желания не возникает. А когда кое у кого оно возникнет,...

title: Mandi News: एफपीओ धर्मपुर का शुगर कंट्रोल मिश्रित आटा बिक्री के लिए लॉन्च
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, मंडी
content: धर्मपुर (मंडी)। धर्मपुर किसान उत्पादक संघ (एफपीओ) ने स्वतंत्रता दिवस समारोह के अवसर पर राष्ट्रीय सहकारी विकास निगम (एनसीडीसी) के मुख्यालय हौज खास, दिल्ली में श्री अन्न शुगर कंट्रोल मिश्रित आटे को बिक्री के लिए लॉन्च किया। इस उत्पाद को एनसीडीसी के उपमहानिदेशक रोहित गुप्ता ने जारी किया। इस अवसर पर एफपीओ के अध्यक्ष सत्तपाल सिंह चौहान, वरिष्ठ उपाध्यक्ष डॉ. मोहनलाल भरमौरिया, सचिव भूपेंद्र सिंह घरवासड़ा और श्री अन्न महिला एग्रो प्रोसेसिंग सेंटर की प्रभारी सरोजनी बिष्ट समेत अन्य लोग उपस्थित रहे। एफपीओ के अध्यक्ष सत्तपाल सिंह और सचिव भूपेंद्र सिंह ने बताया कि यह आटा खाद्य विशेषज्ञ डॉ. हरदयाल सिंह गुलेरिया ने मोटे अनाजों और दालों के मिश्रण से तैयार किया है। इसे घरवासड़ा में स्थापित प्रोसेसिंग केंद्र में तैयार किया गया है। एफपीओ ने धर्मपुर के विभिन्न क्षेत्रों में पांच लघु प्रोसेसिंग सेंटर स्थापित करने का भी निर्णय लिया है, जिनमें से दो पहले ही स्थापित किए जा चुके हैं।

title: Michael Rubin Had To Stop Kendrick Lamar’s ‘Not Like Us’ From Playing At His All-White Party Because Of Drake
creator: Megan Armstrong
content: attended in The Hamptons, and his presence directly impacted the party’s playlist. Rubin confirmed to that there was truth behind rumors claiming that Drake diss track “ ” was not allowed to be played at the party. “Drake’s my friend for a long time,” Fanatics CEO Rubin said. “I’m not gonna invite him and then have, you know, look, he’s obviously going through a little bit of a battle right now. I’m not gonna have him come there — I just didn’t think it was appropriate. So, I just sent a note, I said, ‘Hey, let’s not play anyone’s music that’s feuding with anyone that’s there.'” Rubin noted that Drake had not asked Rubin to prevent “Not Like Us” from playing. “The day before, we had a small barbecue for a few hours that was supposed to be thirty people [but] turned into 200 people for about ten hours,” he added. “That was the pre-game to the white party. When they turned the music on, just like in my house, they put RapCaviar, and ‘Not Like Us’ came on. It was in the middle of ‘Not Like Us.’ I’m like, ‘Get that off! Get that off!’ [Drake] was pulling up soon.” Elsewhere this week, by omitting “Not Like Us” from his 2024 summer playlist. Watch Rubin on above.

title: 'Bằng chứng thép 6' bị chê thảm hại
content: Bằng chứng thép 6 đang bị chê bai thậm tệ TVB Bằng chứng thép 6 được chiếu trên nền tảng Youku của Trung Quốc đại lục từ hôm 7.8 trước khi lên sóng TVB từ ngày 12.8. Ban đầu, tác phẩm nhận được sự mong chờ của đông đảo khán giả khi là phần mới của loạt phim ăn khách Bằng chứng thép, là một trong những dự án tiêu biểu của TVB trong năm 2024, quy tụ dàn diễn viên thực lực: Huỳnh Tông Trạch , Viên Vỹ Hào , Thái Khiết... Tại đại lục, phim đã thu hút 3 triệu lượt khán giả theo dõi nhưng rồi lượng người xem ngày càng tuột dốc vì nội dung nhàm chán, nghèo nàn, xây dựng nhân vật kém thuyết phục. Trong phần mới nhất của Bằng chứng thép, chuyên gia pháp chứng Dư Tinh Bách (Huỳnh Tông Trạch thủ vai), thanh tra cấp cao của đội phòng chống tội phạm - Tỉnh Hạo Nhiên (Viên Vỹ Hào đóng) và bác sĩ pháp y Phạm Bội Thanh (Thái Khiết) là bộ ba nhân vật "đinh", phụ trách tìm ra chân tướng trong các vụ án. Tuy nhiên, họ không thực hiện đúng sứ mệnh công lý của mình mà bị sa đà vào những vấn đề riêng tư khiến người xem tự hỏi đây thực sự là phim điều tra, phá án hay không. Bộ ba nhân vật chính trong phim khiến người xem thất...

title: Два французских пилота погибли при столкновении истребителей
creator: Нина Ягодова
content: В ходе столкновения истребителей Rafale на востоке Франции погибли два пилота. «Страна разделяет боль семей и братьев по оружию с авиабазы Сент-Дизье», — сообщил в социальной сети X президент страны По его словам, в результате авиакатастрофы погиб лейтенант Маттис Лоренс и капитан Себастьян Мабир. Президент Франции добавил, что трагедия произошла во время тренировочного полета. Ранее , что авиакатастрофа с двумя военными истребителями произошла в среду, 14 августа, на востоке Франции. Глава Министерства обороны сообщил, что речь идёт о двух истребителях Rafale. Тогда сообщалось, что с пилотами все в порядке.

title: Steam Store Is Making A Change For What Listings Can Say
creator: George Yang
content: Valve has announced that it will be changing the rules surrounding what developers and publishers can write in their store descriptions on Steam. Starting in early September, four sections on Steam store pages will be impacted: "About The Game," "Short Description," "Any Special Announcement," and "Awards." The first new rule is that no links to other websites will be allowed in those sections, including links to social media pages. This is due to the store pages already having specific link fields for common social media platforms or websites. No embedded imagery that mimics Steam store UI or buttons will be allowed either, including ones that look like wishlist buttons, game capsules, or prices. Additionally, no images, links, or widgets that point to other games on Steam will be allowed. It basically means that developers cannot use the store page description to advertise other products on Steam. Steam has implemented other changes recently, such as making it easier for players to search for particular games, as well as making game demos easier to discover.
