title: Tale of two teams: Stumbling Rockies swept by red-hot Diamondbacks
creator: Patrick Saunders - The Denver Post (TNS)
content: First, the ugly small picture. The Colorado Rockies lost 11-4 to the Arizona Diamondbacks Wednesday afternoon at Chase Field as the D-backs completed a three-game sweep and won their season-high sixth straight game. Colorado rookie starter Tanner Gordon failed to get out of the first inning, the Rockies committed three errors over the first two innings, and D-backs’ right-hander Jordan Montgomery (who entered the game with a 6.37 ERA) dominated Colorado for five of his six innings. After the Rockies cut Arizona’s lead to 6-3 in the top of the sixth, Eugenio Suarez hit a grand slam off reliever Riley Pint in the bottom of the frame to ice the game. Pint, the fourth overall pick in 2016, hit two batters and walked another before Suarez clobbered a first-pitch slider for the slam. Pint’s inability to command his fastball allowed Suarez to ambush the slider. In his limited time this season (four games, 3 1/3 innings), Pint has a 21.60 ERA. Now for the ugly big picture: These are two National League West teams heading in opposite directions. Arizona (69-53) lost 110 games in 2021, was a surprise World Series team last year, and is threatening to overtake the mighty Dodgers in the NL West this season. The D-backs have won 24 of their last 30 games. The Rockies (44-78) lost a franchise-high 102 games last season and are on pace to lose 104 games this season. Since 2023, the D-backs...

title: Georgia Sen. Jon Ossoff hears testimony on abuse of pregnant women in jails and prisons
creator: Reed Williams - The Atlanta Journal-Constitution (TNS)
content: Tiana Hill said she kept telling staff at the Clayton County Jail that she was pregnant when she was an inmate there in 2019. She could feel her baby moving inside her, and had missed her period. But she said the staff insisted she wasn’t pregnant and made fun of her. Ultimately, Hill gave birth in the jail’s infirmary, into her underwear, with male inmates walking by, she testified Wednesday before the U.S. Senate Subcommittee on Human Rights and the Law. After she gave birth, in late December 2019, she said she was placed in solitary confinement on suicide watch. “They basically put me on lockdown for having a baby in their jail,” she said in tearful testimony at the Fulton County Government Center in downtown Atlanta. “It’s like I was being punished for something I had no control over.” Hill was one of three women who testified before Georgia Sen. Jon Ossoff at Wednesday’s hearing, which was part of his investigation into the abuse of pregnant and postpartum women in state prisons and county jails. The inquiry falls under the U.S. Senate Subcommittee on Human Rights and the Law. Ossoff, who chairs the subcommittee, launched the investigation in February. Wednesday’s hearing was the second on the topic. Ossoff said Wednesday that the subcommittee has reviewed lawsuits and public reports, conducted site visits and interviewed more than 100 currently or formerly incarcerated...

title: Carretera México-Cuernavaca estará cerrada en estos horarios, fechas y zonas
creator: Carlos Ramírez
content: Este miércoles, Caminos y Puentes Federales ( Capufe ) anunció que la carretera México-Cuernavaca será cerrada en distintas zonas debido a trabajos de bacheo; sin embargo, dio a conocer los horarios y fechas . ¿Qué se sabe? De acuerdo con Capufe, la autopista México-Cuernavaca recibirá mantenimiento por lo que será necesario realizar algunos cierres parciales para tales trabajos. “Esta obra ocasionará cierres parciales de carriles en función con el avance de las tareas. Los horarios efectivos de trabajo serán de lunes a jueves ”, informó en sus redes sociales. ¿Cuándo y a qué hora cerrarán la carretera México-Cuernavaca? Será del 13 al 28 de agosto cuando la carretera México-Cuernavaca se cierre parcialmente entre los kilómetros 18 y 23 con dirección a Cuernavaca. #AVISO a las personas usuarias de la autopista #MéxicoCuernavaca . Habrá cierres parciales de carriles por trabajos de bacheo. pic.twitter.com/f1wQic6OP8 — CAPUFE (@CAPUFE) August 14, 2024 Además, el cierre se llevará a cabo durante un horario nocturno : de las 22 a las 6 horas , tiempo del centro de México. Ante esta medida, Capufe también recomendó a los conductores manejar con precaución y estar al pendiente de todos los señalamientos. Las autoridades, a su vez, pusieron a disposición el número 074 en caso de cualquier eventualidad. Cabe recordar que, actualmente, la autopista...

title: 6th KPT Squash Team C’ship kicks off with exciting matches
creator: Our Staff Reporter
content: LAHORE - The 6th KPT Squash Team Championship 2024, celebrating Pakistan’s Independence Day, commenced with vibrant matches at the KPT Sports Department’s facility. The tournament, held under the patronage of Major Mahmood R, Manager of KPT Sports, was officially inaugurated by former world champion Maqsood Ahmad, who performed the ribboncutting ceremony.On the first day of the championship, Green Gladiators delivered a commanding performance against the Pakistani Pioneers, securing a 3-1 victory. Key victories for Green Gladiators included Huzaifa Ibrahim’s decisive 3-0 win over Hassan Pracha, Abdul Basit’s 3-0 triumph against Usman Zubair, and Sameera Shahid’s 3-0 victory against Manahil. Fazal ul Rahman also contributed to the win with a 3-0 success over Tahmoor Tahir. In another gripping encounter, Independence Invincibles edged out Freedom Fighters 3-1. Kashif Khan led the charge with a 3-0 win against M Ali, while Zuhaib Khan similarly beat Abdullah Shahid 3-0.

title: What does Matthew Judon trade mean for Haason Reddick?
content: A pair of pass rushers want new contracts. One has been traded. What does that mean for the other one? It’s safe to assume the Falcons at least called the Jets about trading for Haason Reddick before doing a deal with the Patriots for Matthew Judon. Although the Jets have said they won’t trade Reddick, he’s not the kind of player who would fall into the “never trade” category. Much of what happens next for Reddick depends on what happens next for Judon. Unless the Falcons learned nothing from the Jets’ situation with Reddick, Atlanta presumably has a deal ready to replace the $6.5 million Judon is due to make this year. If/when the Judon deal is announced, the contract and the draft-pick compensation (a third-rounder) becomes the total investment made in Judon. Both are double-digit sack performers; last year, Judon’s season was cut short due to injury. Judon is 31; Reddick turns 30 next month. However it plays out, the Judon trade (and, likely, new contract) become another data point for the Jets, Reddick, and anyone interested in trading for him.

title: Cards-Colts joint practice has old-style feel as Marvin Harrison Jr. returns to Indianapolis
creator: By MICHAEL MAROT - AP Sports Writer
content: WESTFIELD, Ind. (AP) — The first joint practice between the Indianapolis Colts and Arizona Cardinals felt like a throwback day. Reggie Wayne was working on the field. Edgerrin James signed autographs for fans. Cardinals coach Jonathan Gannon spoke glowingly about the Colts ownership. And, yes, Marvin Harrison Jr. returned to the only NFL city his father ever called home. It was a big moment for the Cardinals' 22-year-old rookie receiver. “Yeah, it's kind of crazy,” Harrison said, flashing that familiar smile his father made popular. “Just really special. So happy to be here.” Like his dad, he got right down to business. Harrison wasn't exactly a prominent personality when his Hall of Fame father was catching passes from Peyton Manning and challenging Wayne to keep up with his record-breaking pace. The elder Harrison preferred to keep his private life, well, private. So the younger Harrison did most of his initial work behind the scenes. He attended periodic games, occasionally attended a training camp practice, even managed to walk on the Colts' home turf. He also attended his father's induction into Indy's Ring of Honor in 2011, dreaming of getting the opportunity to one day follow in his father's footsteps. It didn't take long to see the comparisons. The Philadelphia prep star quickly caught the attention of college scouts. During his three seasons at Ohio State, Marvin...

title: Dist gets new SP
Piden “responsabilidad compartida” ante más de 276.000 migrantes que han cruzado Honduras
creator: Hondudiario Redacción
content: *** Entre enero y el 7 de agosto, llegaron a Honduras 276.096 viajeros irregulares, de los cuales 132.177 o el 48 por ciento eran venezolanos. Más de 276.000 migrantes irregulares, la mayoría venezolanos, han cruzado Honduras este año en tránsito hacia EE.UU., según las autoridades, una cifra que ha desbordado la capacidad institucional del país y evidencia que el fenómeno requiere de cooperación regional y es una responsabilidad compartida. El coordinador del Observatorio de Migración de la Universidad Nacional Autónoma de Honduras (UNAH), César Castillo, aseguró este miércoles a EFE que la migración es una “responsabilidad compartida” entre los países de origen y destino, pues el fenómeno no se puede atender de “manera aislada” y requiere una “atención de manera regional”. Entre enero y el 7 de agosto, llegaron a Honduras 276.096 viajeros irregulares, de los cuales 132.177 o el 48 por ciento eran venezolanos, una cifra que podría aumentar en los próximos meses ante la crisis en Venezuela, de acuerdo con las estadísticas del Instituto Nacional de Migración (INM). “Es una situación preocupante, recordemos que el flujo de migrantes por el país ha aumentado en los últimos años, hace 3 años teníamos un flujo de 37.000 personas aproximadamente, después pasó a 188.000 y el año pasado tuvimos más de 500.000 personas que ingresaron al país de manera...

title: Headway charity shop in Worcester set to close in August
content: Bosses at Headway Worcestershire have announced they will close the shop in St Swithin's Street at the end of August after being unable to negotiate a new tenancy agreement with its landlord Worcester Municipal Charities. Headway's CEO Mandie Fitzgerald said: "The decision has been taken out of our hands really as the rent has been doubled. "Our tenancy agreement is due for renewal in September, and our landlord notified us four months ago about the higher rental price." Headway is an independent charity specialising in supporting people with acquired brain injuries, which has wellbeing centres across the county. However, the St Swithin's Street store is its only charity shop. "We are losing our on-street presence so we have looked at other options but rental prices are making... Matt Taylor

title: EE.UU. "está listo" para iniciar este mes los vuelos de regreso de migrantes desde Panamá
creator: Newsroom Infobae
content: Ciudad de Panamá, 14 ago (EFE).- El presidente de Estados Unidos, Joe Biden, dijo este miércoles que su país "está listo" para iniciar este mes de agosto el acuerdo con Panamá para regresar a través de vuelos a los migrantes que crucen la selva del Darién, tras sostener una reunión telefónica con su homólogo panameño, José Raúl Mulino. La Presidencia de Panamá informó a través de un comunicado que Mulino y Biden "mantuvieron hoy un diálogo telefónico en el cual abordaron distintos temas, entre ellos la crisis de Venezuela, la situación de la inmigración ilegal del Darién y el papel de Panamá como aliado estratégico en la región". Así, según la información oficial panameña, Biden "se comprometió a iniciar durante agosto la implementación del acuerdo mediante el cual se iniciarán los vuelos de repatriación de los migrantes que llegan a Panamá por la selva del Darién, cuya financiación -según el memorándum de entendimiento firmado entre ambos países- correrá por cuenta de Estados Unidos". Biden, además, señaló, que Estados Unidos "está listo" para implementar el acuerdo, el cual, según palabras de Mulino, se realizará "respetando los derechos humanos y la dignidad de las personas", destaca la misiva oficial, que agrega que ambos mandatarios acordaron tener una comunicación directa. Panamá y EE.UU. firmaron el pasado 1 de julio un...

title: Suburban New York county bans masks meant to hide people's identities - ABC News
Letters to the Editor – Thursday, August 15, 2024
creator: Fred Wesley
content: Spectacular closing ceremony The awe-inspiring Stade de France was transformed into a grand concert hall, celebrating the conclusion of the 2024 Paris Olympic Games with a spectacular closing ceremony which showcased a mesmerising display of artistry, passing the baton to Los Angeles for the next Olympics. Seen by millions, the ceremony was a captivating affair, seamlessly transitioning through various moods and featuring a touch of Hollywood glamour, including an appearance by Tom Cruise. Even the address by International Olympic Committee (IOC) president Thomas Bach, who praised the sensational Olympic Games, was touching, “These were sensational Olympic Games from the start to finish. The Games showed us what greatness we humans are capable of. You embraced each other, you respected each other even if your countries were divided by war and conflict. Thanking you for making believe in a better world for everyone.” 16 days of sports competition concluded on a high note, as team USA topped the Olympics medal standings. It’s a pity that our men’s 7s team missed out on a gold medal, while the women’s 7s team came home winless, but that’s not the end of the road. Let’s prepare well for the 2028 Olympic Games in the USA. Rajnesh Ishwar Lingam Nadawa, Nasinu Moral standards Throughout every generation, adolescents are particularly prone to straying from the path of righteousness,...

title: 27 Home Products Amazon Customers Are Loving Right Now
content: Amazon has a list of products called " Movers and Shakers ," which is pretty much just fancy talk for things that are currently ~trending,~ Here are some of the most useful and loved home products on the list this week: 1. A Bentgo bento-style lunchbox for kiddos with a built-in space for the ice pack to keep the food well and truly cold. Shoutout to all my fellow '90s babies who remember the limp cheese sandwiches when the ice pack would slide to the far reaches of your lunchbox. Today's kids don't know how good they have it. Psst. If you're thinking about back-to-school, I LOVE Bentgo's whole line, including their backpacks and lunchboxes . Promising review: " I have a few different bentgo products. I like this one in particular because it has four compartments and has the cooler part. My son has to have something in each spot of his lunchbox so the four compartments are better than the five one. The 90 opening is a little different and something to get used to. The cooler is great so I don't have to worry about if the food is staying at a safe temperature. We also use these for travel to keep snack items cool for the kids." — Nicole Price: $27.99 (available in 10 colors) — clip the $2 coupon on the product page to get this price. 2. title: MP argentino denuncia ex-presidente por violência doméstica
creator: admin3
content: Segundo promotor, relacionamento de Alberto Fernández com a ex-primeira-dama Fabiola Yañez foi "marcado por assédio psicológico e agressões físicas em um contexto de violência doméstica e de gênero".O ex-presidente argentino Alberto Fernández, de 65 anos, foi denunciado nesta quarta-feira (14/08) pelo Ministério Público do país, que o acusa de agredir e ameaçar sua ex-mulher Fabiola Yáñez, de 43 anos. Segundo o promotor Ramiro González, a ex-primeira-dama "sofreu uma relação marcada pelo assédio, abuso psicológico e agressões físicas em um contexto de violência doméstica e de gênero" por parte de Fernández, que presidiu o país entre 2019 e dezembro de 2023. Os dois se separaram após o término do mandato do político. A denúncia, que ainda precisa ser acatada pela Justiça, vem após a própria Yáñez procurar as autoridades e acusar o ex-marido, em 6 de agosto. Dois dias depois, circularam na imprensa local supostas conversas e fotos que comprovariam os abusos e abalaram o país. "Você me agride o tempo todo. É insólito. Não pode me fazer isso quando eu não te fiz nada", consta de uma das mensagens divulgadas. A reclamação de Yáñez foi protocolada após investigadores encontrarem em junho, como parte de uma investigação sobre um suposto tráfico de influência do ex-mandatário, mensagens que sugeriam os abusos por parte do então...

title: Bóng chuyền nữ Việt Nam vì sao chưa thể thắng Thái Lan?
content: 2 trận đấu quyết định giữa đội tuyển bóng chuyền nữ Việt Nam với Thái Lan trong khuôn khổ SEA V.League khép lại với chiến thắng thuộc về các tay đập xứ chùa vàng. Lần đầu là trận thắng 3-2 (25-18, 29-27, 25-23, 21-25, 13-15) sau 5 set tại Vĩnh Phúc, lần sau là tỷ số 3-1 (25-22, 25-17, 19-25, 25-15) trong cuộc tái đấu tại Nakhon Ratchasima. Thầy trò HLV Nguyễn Tuấn Kiệt giành ngôi á quân chung cuộc, cũng giống như kết quả mùa giải trước. Dưới góc nhìn của các nhà chuyên môn, thất bại vừa qua không bất ngờ nhưng có phần đáng tiếc khi có thời điểm chiến thắng đã ở rất gần, đặc biệt trong trận đấu tại Vĩnh Phúc hồi đầu tháng 8. Lần đầu tiên sau nhiều năm, bóng chuyền nữ Việt Nam có một trận đấu ngang ngửa về chuyên môn và thế trận trước kình địch số 1 ở khu vực. Đặc biệt, sự chênh lệch về trình độ cá nhân ở từng vị trí trên sân không còn khoảng cách. "Nếu trước đây, cơ hội giành chiến thắng cho Việt Nam chỉ là 20% hoặc 30%, thì ở trận vừa rồi là 50-50. Có những tiếc nuối khi đội hình không phải mạnh nhất, có dấu hiệu quá tải, suy giảm thể lực và không duy trì được hiệu quả cao trong thời...

title: Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 Possibly Delayed, Release Date Apparently Leaked
creator: George Yang
content: Kingdom Come Deliverance 2's release date may have been leaked by a retailer, and it looks like it's slated for next year rather than 2024. According to Best Buy, Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 is set to release on February 11, 2025. While Best Buy has since amended the listing and changed it to "Not Announced," Walmart still has it listed for the the same date as well. It's important to note that developer Warhorse Studios has not revealed the exact release date yet, but did previously say that it'll launch sometime later this year. However, if this listing is accurate, that means the game was possibly pushed back to 2025. The game was also confirmed to be making an appearance at Gamescom , with a gameplay teaser shown on Opening Night Live. It's possible that Warhorse Studios will announce the release date sometime during Gamescom. The game is set to launch for PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S.

title: Lima man pleads guilty to drug charges after plea offer
creator: The Lima News, Ohio
content: Aug. 14—LIMA — A Lima man charged with numerous drug and weapons charges accepted a plea offer from Allen County prosecutors and pleaded guilty to reduced charges Wednesday. Taurus Fisher, 53, pleaded guilty to second-degree and fourth-degree felony charges of marijuana trafficking; two third-degree felony charges of having weapons while under disability; and a third-degree felony charge of burglary with multiple specifications. Assistant Allen County Prosecuting Attorney Joshua Carp said Monday that after several back-and-forth offers and counter offers between his office and Fisher's defense team they had agreed on a jointly recommended prison term of 14 years for the Lima man. All gun specifications, which carry additional, mandatory prison time, would be dismissed, Carp said. After a presentence investigation, Judge Jeffrey Reed will sentence Fisher on Sept. 30. Reach Charlotte Caldwell at 567-242-0451.

title: After yearlong wait, Southwick takes down hazardous trees on North Pond shore
content: SOUTHWICK — It took over a year, but last week the three trees that were determined to be hazardous and a potential legal liability for the town were cut down in the former King’s Beach area of the North Pond Conservation Area. “I’m glad the trees were safely removed, and that we can move forward on our plans to prevent further erosion on the hillside and begin restoration activities so this property can be enjoyed as intended in the conservation restriction,” Select Board member Douglas Moglin said on Monday.

title: Trump ramps up rallies as Harris leads in several battleground states
content: Trump ramps up rallies as Harris leads in several battleground states Former President Donald Trump discussed the economy at a rally in North Carolina Wednesday but didn't provide many specifics on his policy proposals. The rally comes as Vice President Kamala Harris leads polls in several battleground states. CBS News political correspondent Caitlin Huey-Burns reports from Asheville, North Carolina, where Trump spoke. And CBS News political director Fin Gomez and Axios national politics reporter Sophia Cai join "America Decides" to discuss the state of 2024 race.

title: Lima man sentenced to prison for drug charges
creator: The Lima News, Ohio
content: Aug. 14—LIMA — A Lima man was sentenced to a mandatory 15 years in prison Wednesday in the Allen County Common Pleas Court for possession of a fentanyl-related compound, engaging in a pattern of corrupt activity, the illegal manufacture of drugs, aggravated possession of drugs and having weapons under disability. The charges also had a total of $25,000 in fines attached, but Judge Terri Kohlrieser waived the fines because Kyle Smith couldn't pay them. The prosecution wanted Smith to get 20 years minimum in prison, and Chief Assistant Prosecutor Kyle Thines said Smith has violent tendencies because at the bottom of one of the ledgers showing who owed him money, Smith wrote a paragraph about the people owing "blood debts." Thines also said it was not a typical drug user case because Smith was running a business and "kept books to keep track of his bottom line." Assistant Public Defender Stephen Chamberlain said Smith has no power or authority in the drug world, and he is not rich from selling drugs. He said the only reason why Smith was investigated was because there was a murder in the trailer park Smith lives in, and investigators were interviewing people about it. He said 20 years was too much and cited a recent assault case and another more serious drug case where 12 years were given to each. Smith apologized for his actions and said he understood he needed to be punished....

title: Trial underway for ex-politician charged in Las Vegas reporter's murder
content: Opening statements got underway Wednesday in the trial of a Las Vegas-area politician accused in the 2022 murder of an investigative reporter who wrote articles critical of him. The death of reporter Jeff German, who spent 44 years covering the city, its government and its courthouses, and the arrest several days later of Robert Telles, the former Clark County public administrator accused of killing him, stunned Sin City and the world of journalism. A 12-person jury and several alternates were finalized Tuesday. Telles, 47, has pleaded not guilty to murder and could face life in prison if convicted. He has said he didn't kill German, was framed and that police mishandled the investigation. The killing on Labor Day weekend 2022 made national headlines. German was the only journalist killed in the U.S. among 69 news media workers slain worldwide that year, according to data by the Committee to Protect Journalists. German, who lived alone, was found slashed and stabbed to death outside his home. He was 69. Police quickly circulated video of a person wearing an orange work shirt and a wide straw hat walking toward German's home on the day of the killing. Police also released images of a distinctive maroon SUV like one that a Review-Journal photographer saw Telles washing outside his home days later. Telles was arrested the following day and has been jailed ever since. Prosecutors...

title: Clima en Punta del Este: conoce el pronóstico y prepárate antes de salir
creator: Infobae Noticias
content: ¿Lloverá, será un día soleado o caerá el frío este 15 de agosto?, aquí está el pronóstico del clima para las siguientes horas en Punta del Este. El clima para este jueves en Punta del Este alcanzará los 16 grados, mientras que la temperatura mínima será de 9 grados. El pronóstico del índice de los rayos ultravioleta es de 3. En cuanto a la lluvia, la probabilidad de precipitaciones para dicha ciudad será del 0%, con una nubosidad del 70%, durante el día; y del 1%, con una nubosidad del 99%, a lo largo de la noche. En tanto, las ráfagas de viento llegarán a los 15 kilómetros por hora en el día y los 20 kilómetros por hora por la noche. Entre los vientos de Punta del Este Punta del Este , una ciudad peninsular localizada en el extremo meridional de Uruguay, se caracteriza por tener un clima de tipo templado debido a sus aguas oceánicas, lo que favorece que tenga sus cuatro estaciones bien definidas. Al ser una ciudad ubicada entre el Río de la Plata y el Océano Atlántico, esta región se diferencia por tener más vientos que otras metrópolis uruguayas, que terminan por suavizar las temperaturas durante el verano o el invierno. Los veranos en Punta del Este no son excesivamente calurosos. En enero, el mes más cálido, el termómetro señala máximas de 26 grados y mínimas de 18 grados. Por el contrario, el invierno es fresco, con cielos nublados y mucho...

title: Sonos podría relanzar su antigua app para salir de la crisis
creator: Luis Miranda
content: Tras el desastre que significó el rediseño de su aplicación para móviles, Sonos está considerando traer de vuelta la versión anterior. Un reporte señala que los altos directivos analizan un relanzamiento de la "vieja" app como medida de contención para aliviar las quejas de los usuarios. La compañía estudia diversas opciones para salir del bache. De acuerdo con un reporte de The Verge , Sonos podría revivir su aplicación S2 para iOS y Android . Esta fue la última versión que operaba antes del rediseño lanzado en mayo. Fuentes cercanas a la empresa confiaron al medio que ha habido discusiones en lo alto de Sonos para relanzar su app. La decisión parece una medida desesperada ante la crisis por la que atraviesa la compañía. Sonos construyó una nueva aplicación desde cero con el fin de simplificar la reproducción a través de sus dispositivos. Si bien la idea de optimizar parecía atractiva, la ejecución dejó mucho que desear y las críticas llovieron por millares. Sonos S2, la versión anterior de la app La crisis llegó a tal punto que Patrick Spence, director ejecutivo de Sonos, tuvo que disculparse con los usuarios . En una carta publicada a finales de julio, Spence pide disculpas a los usuarios por decepcionarlos. "Desarrollamos la nueva aplicación para crear una mejor experiencia, con la capacidad de impulsar más innovación en el futuro y con el...

title: Food dept raids 11 sweet shops, collect samples of edible items
content: Kanpur: The food security & drug administration department conducted a raid on Wednesday, targeting 11 sweet shops across the city. During the operation, the authorities procured a total of 24 samples of dry fruits, mawa, cheese, motichoor laddoo, gram flour and prepared sweets. According to assistant commissioner-II, Sanjay Pratap Singh, a specialized team comprising six members, led by chief food security officer Qayamuddin, carried out an inspection at the manufacturing premises of Thaggu ke Laddoo, situated in the Civil Lines area. The team collected samples of various ingredients such as dry fruits, sooji, mawa, and an assortment of prepared sweets from the site. During the course of the inspection, the department made observations regarding the manufacturing site's condition. It was noted that the premises lacked proper sanitation measures, exhibited signs of poor maintenance, and had visible water seepage from the roof. Additionally, the presence of spider webs and the inappropriate placement of employees' clothing at the preparation site raised further concerns. Consequently, a formal notice was issued to the proprietor of the sweet shop, mandating a satisfactory response. Failure to provide an adequate explanation would result in the initiation of legal proceedings against the shop owner. Another team, led by Ajay Kumar Singh, conducted a raid on a sweet shop and...

title: I-Day, You-Day
creator: Bachi Karkaria
content: Big B’s old tryst, small b’s new wish-list Hasina’s inglorious exit triggered recalls of India’s glorious role in freeing Bangladesh. Alas, too many countries have squandered their hard-fought for independence. Net-net, we’ve kept our tryst, ‘not wholly or in full measure, but very substantially’ – even if netas keep trying to enslave the Net. Since this Erratica has coincided with I-Day, let me go back to the Midday/midnight hour in 2002 when FM radio awoke to licence and freedom. Working briefly at that tabloid, I’d asked mellifluous Mr Bachchan if he’d launch our station with Nehru’s historic speech. ‘Sure,’ he said, ‘provided you get Sonia Gandhi’s permission’. Why? It wasn’t her property. But they’d had their infamous fall-out so arguably he didn’t want any other fall-out. We kept writing to her PS, dwarpal George, but got only, erm, radio silence. We let go of Ms G, but not of Mr B. Would he read out the as-apt Tagore poem instead? ‘Sure,’ he said, ‘provided I can record it beforehand’. But the whole point was to have him personally flagging off the FM station. ‘I’ll be there too,’ he promised. He practised till inflection-perfect; recorded; and kept his tryst with us at the midnight hour. So, here’s my take on Tagore’s 1913 prayer: ‘Where the pedestrian is without fear and can walk without head held low Where access is free Where the pavement has not been broken up into...

title: Enekia Lunyamila se une al Mazatlán Femenil para el Apertura 2024

content: Mazatlán. – El club Mazatlán FC sigue agregando elementos a su equipo femenil con la llegada de Enekia Lunyamila, originaria de Kigoma, Tanzania, por el resto del Torneo Apertura 2024 de la Liga MX Femenil. La directiva cañonera continúa buscando talento en el continente africano por las inclusiones de las sudafricanas Magaiah y Xinoxolo Cesane hace un par de temporadas. Entre su currículum deportivo, ha sido partícipe del campeonato de la Cosafa en la categoría Sub-20 y posteriormente dio el salto al selectivo mayor. title: Arshad Nadeem, Murad Sadpara and other sports stars to be honoured with National Awards
creator: Our Staff Reporter
content: LAHORE - President Asif Ali Zardari, in a prestigious announcement marking the 77th Independence Day of Pakistan, has conferred ‘National Civil Awards’ upon seven distinguished sports personalities in recognition of their remarkable contributions to the world of sports. Arshad Nadeem, the Olympic gold medalist, will be honoured with the Hilal-e-Imtiaz. Nadeem, who captured the gold medal in javelin throw at the Paris Olympics, has been celebrated for his extraordinary achievement that brought immense pride to Pakistan. His performance not only set a new benchmark but also earned him this prestigious award, acknowledging his dedication and excellence in athletics. The late Murad Sadpara, a legendary mountaineer, will be posthumously awarded the Sitara-e-Imtiaz. Sadpara, known for his formidable contributions to mountaineering, achieved numerous high-altitude feats and played a crucial role in the retrieval of the late mountaineer Hassan Shigri’s body from K2. His pioneering spirit and commitment to the sport were tragically cut short when he succumbed to a head injury on Broad Peak earlier this month. Amir Ashfaq, a blind cricketer renowned for his remarkable performances on the field, will receive the Pride of Performance Award. Ashfaq’s dedication and skill have made significant impacts in blind cricket, earning him this high honor. Imad Shakeel Butt, captain of the Pakistan...

title: Sambut Kemerdekaan RI, McD Sajikan Menu Spesial dari Ayam yang Kesehatannya Dipantau Dokter Hewan
content: Tahun ini, atau McD Indonesia untuk pertama kalinya menghadirkan menu Ayam Opor Sambal Terasi.. Menu baru dengan cita rasa khas nusantara sekaligus untuk menyambut Hari Kemerdekaan ke-79 Republik Indonesia. Menurut Associate Director of Marketing McDonald's Indonesia Caroline Kurniadjaja, menu spesial McD Opor sudah bisa dinikmati di seluruh restoran McDonald’s Indonesia mulai dari awal Agustus hingga 11 September 2024. “Kita sudah sejak tahun 2015,setiap tahunnya selalu konsisten dalam menghadirkan menu spesial yang terinspirasi dari cita rasa khas nusantara dalam rangka memperingati hari kemerdekaan. Sejalan dengan semangat ‘Dari Indonesia untuk Indonesia’ yang selalu kami usung, kami senang bisa memperkenalkan Ayam McD Opor Sambal Terasi ini," terang Caroline di gerai McD Salemba, Jakarta Pusat, Rabu, 14 Agustus 2024. Advertisement "Yang terpenting adalah bagaimana membuat konsumen itu akan semakin sering dateng ke store kami untuk mencoba menu baru yang penjualannya terbatas sampai waktu yang sudah ditentukan," tambahnya. Soal pemilihan menu , Caroline melanjutkan, jadi pilihan utama karena makanan khas Indonesia ini identik dengan momen-momen istimewa di negeri ini. Salah satunya tentu di momen Hari Raya Idul Fitri atau Lebaran yang biasanya menyajikan ketupat dengan opor ayam. "Selain momen Idul Fitri, kita merasa opor ayam ini juga cocok disajikan di momen istimewa...

title: Policías sospechosos de atropellar y matar a perro en Purral ya fueron trasladados de delegación
creator: Tomás Gómez
content: El Ministro de Seguridad, Mario Zamora, confirmó que tres de los cuatro policías sospechosos del atropello y muerte de un perro, el viernes anterior, fueron sacados de la delegación de Goicoechea donde estaban destacados. La orden forma parte de las medidas cautelares dictadas el martes por el Tribunal de Flagrancia. De paso, el jerarca señaló que se tomó la medida también como parte del proceso interno que lleva la institución contra sus funcionarios. “Desde ayer mismo también inició el proceso disciplinario administrativo con la conformación del órgano, entonces, estamos actuando con la mayor celeridad en los dos escenarios de actuación”, anotó el jerarca. Zamora detalló también que en el caso de que los sospechosos quieran pedir vacaciones, la medida dependerá de sus nuevas jefaturas. OBSERVE MÁS: Tribunal impone medidas cautelares a policías acusados de atropellar y matar a perro; juicio “express” se reanuda el lunes Policías tendrán nueva cita el lunes 26 de agosto Los hechos del perro atropellado sucedieron el viernes por la tarde y, en cuestión de horas, el video se hizo viral en redes sociales. Esa misma noche, se detuvo a cuatro policías, pero estaba por definirse si sería posible llevar el trámite por flagrancia. Esto quiere decir que por las pruebas y el momento de la detención, se hace un juicio más expedito. Por esto se dio una audiencia...

title: Panipat News: शिवाजी स्टेडियम के चारों तरफ पांच नाके, नहीं जा सकेगा कोई भी वाहन
content: पानीपत। स्वतंत्रता दिवस को लेकर पुलिस ने जिले में चौकसी बढ़ा दी है। जिले में पुलिस ने 22 नाके लगाए हैं। नाकों पर 480 पुलिस के जवान तैनात किए गए हैं। जिला स्तरीय समारोह स्थल शिवाजी स्टेडियम के चारों तरफ पांंच नाके लगाए हैं। यहां से कोई भी वाहन नहीं जाने दिया जाएगा। संदिग्ध वाहनों पर नजर रखी जा रही है। जिले में एंट्री करने वालों वाहनों की गहनता से जांच की जा रही है। शहर के चारों और आठ बड़े नाके लगाए गए हैं। एनएफएल नाका, असंध नहर नाका, रिफाइनरी के पास, टोल प्लाजा, बलजीत नगर नाका, नांगलखेड़ी, किशनपुरा के सामने व सेक्टर 29 में बड़े नाके लगाए गए हैं। यहां एक एक एएसआई के नेतृत्व में 10-10 जवानों को 24 घंटे के लिए तैनात किया गया है। शिवाजी स्टेडियम के चारों और पांच नाके लगाए गए हैं। शिवाजी स्टेडियम में आने वालों पर नजर रखी जा रही है। शहर के सभी रेस्टोरेंट, होटल, मस्जिद, मंदिर व गुरुद्वारों की जांच की जा रही है। यहां आने वाले लोगों को रिकॉर्ड खंगाला जा रहा है। हरियाणा उत्तर प्रदेश सीमा पर यमुना किनारे गश्त- 15 अगस्त के कार्यक्रम को लेकर सनौली थाना पुलिस को अलर्ट पर रखा गया है। हरियाणा में आने वाले हर वाहन की जांच की जा रही है। वाहन चालकों से पूछताछ की जा रही है। यमुना के तटीय क्षेत्र में गश्त की जा रही है। यमुना पार कर आने वालों पर भी पुलिस की नजर है। गुप्तचर विभाग को भी सक्रीय किया गया है। बाजारों पर सादी कपड़ों में पुलिस के जवान तैनात- एसपी ने बाजारों की सुरक्षा के लिए वहां भी सादे कपड़ों में पुलिस के जवानों को तैनात किया गया है। बाजारों के प्रधानों को संदिग्धों की सूचना पुलिस को...

title: Gold Silver Price on 15th August: ಚಿನ್ನದ ಬೆಲೆ ಇಳಿಕೆ, ಬೆಳ್ಳಿ ಹೆಚ್ಚಳ; ಇಲ್ಲಿದೆ ಇವತ್ತಿನ ದರಪಟ್ಟಿ
creator: TV9 Web Team
content: ಚಿನ್ನದ ಬೆಲೆ ಇಂದು ಸ್ವಲ್ಪ ಮಟ್ಟಿಗೆ ಕಡಿಮೆ ಆಗಿದೆ. ಬೆಳ್ಳಿ ಬೆಲೆ ಕೆಲವೆಡೆ ಇಳಿಕೆಯಾದರೆ, ಕೆಲವೆಡೆ ಏರಿಕೆ ಆಗಿದೆ. ಮುಂಬೈನಲ್ಲಿ ಮಾತ್ರ ಬೆಳ್ಳಿ ಬೆಲೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಅಲ್ಪ ಹೆಚ್ಚಳವಾಗಿದೆ. ಉಳಿದ ಕಡೆ ಬೆಲೆ ಸ್ವಲ್ಪ ತಗ್ಗಿದೆ. ಚಿನ್ನದ ಬೆಲೆ ಗ್ರಾಮ್​ಗೆ 10 ರೂನಷ್ಟು ಕಡಿಮೆ ಆಗಿದೆ.. ಭಾರತದಲ್ಲಿ ಸದ್ಯ 10 ಗ್ರಾಮ್​ನ 22 ಕ್ಯಾರಟ್ ಚಿನ್ನದ ಬೆಲೆ 65,550 ರುಪಾಯಿ ಇದೆ. 24 ಕ್ಯಾರಟ್​ನ ಅಪರಂಜಿ ಚಿನ್ನದ ಬೆಲೆ 71,510 ರುಪಾಯಿ ಆಗಿದೆ. 100 ಗ್ರಾಮ್ ಬೆಳ್ಳಿ ಬೆಲೆ 8,360 ರುಪಾಯಿ ಇದೆ. ಬೆಂಗಳೂರಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಚಿನ್ನದ ಬೆಲೆ 10 ಗ್ರಾಮ್​ಗೆ 65,550 ರುಪಾಯಿ ಆಗಿದೆ, ಬೆಳ್ಳಿ ಬೆಲೆ 100 ಗ್ರಾಮ್​ಗೆ 8,000 ರುಪಾಯಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಇದೆ. ಭಾರತದಲ್ಲಿರುವ ಚಿನ್ನ ಮತ್ತು ಬೆಳ್ಳಿ ಬೆಲೆ (ಆಗಸ್ಟ್ 15ಕ್ಕೆ) ವಿವಿಧ ನಗರಗಳಲ್ಲಿರುವ 22 ಕ್ಯಾರಟ್ ಚಿನ್ನದ ಬೆಲೆ (10 ಗ್ರಾಮ್​ಗೆ) ವಿದೇಶಗಳಲ್ಲಿ 22 ಕ್ಯಾರಟ್ ಚಿನ್ನದ ಬೆಲೆ (10 ಗ್ರಾಮ್​ಗೆ) ವಿವಿಧ ನಗರಗಳಲ್ಲಿರುವ ಬೆಳ್ಳಿ ಬೆಲೆ (100 ಗ್ರಾಮ್​ಗೆ) ಈ ವರ್ಷಾಂತ್ಯದೊಳಗೆ ಚಿನ್ನದ ಬೆಲೆ 70,000 ರೂ ಗಡಿ ದಾಟಬಹುದು ಎಂದು ತಜ್ಞರು ಅಂದಾಜು ಮಾಡಿದ್ದರು. ಆದರೆ, ವರ್ಷಾರ್ಧದಲ್ಲೇ ಬೆಲೆ ಆ ಗಡಿ ದಾಟಿ ಹೋಗಿದೆ. ( ಇಲ್ಲಿ ನೀಡಲಾಗಿರುವ ಚಿನ್ನ ಮತ್ತು ಬೆಳ್ಳಿ ಬೆಲೆ ನಿಖರ ಎಂದು ಖಾತ್ರಿಪಡಿಸಲು ಸಾಧ್ಯವಿಲ್ಲ. ಪ್ರಮುಖ ಅಭರಣದಂಗಡಿಗಳಿಂದ ಶೇಖರಿಸಿದ ಮಾಹಿತಿ ಇದು. ಜೊತೆಗೆ, ಈ ದರದ ಮೇಲೆ ಜಿಎಸ್​ಟಿ, ಮೇಕಿಂಗ್ ಚಾರ್ಜಸ್ ಇತ್ಯಾದಿ ಶುಲ್ಕಗಳು ಬೀಳಬಹುದು.)

title: Big Georgia county to start charging some costs to people who challenge the eligibility of voters
creator: Jeff Amy, The Associated Press
content: ATLANTA (AP) — An election board in one of Georgia's largest counties has voted to start charging people who challenge the eligibility of voters for the cost of notifying the challenged voters. Read unlimited articles for free today: Already have an account? ATLANTA (AP) — An election board in one of Georgia’s largest counties has voted to start charging people who challenge the eligibility of voters for the cost of notifying the challenged voters. The Cobb County Board of Elections and Registrations voted 4-1 on Tuesday to adopt the rule. Debbie Fisher, a Republican member of the board, was the only vote against the rule. Republican activists are challenging thousands of voters in Georgia as part a wide-ranging national effort coordinated by Donald Trump’s allies to take names off voting rolls. Most of the people they are targeting have moved away from their old address, and the activists argue that letting those names stay on the rolls invites fraud. But Democrats and liberal voting rights activists argue Republicans are challenging voters either to remove Democrats or to sow doubt about the...

title: ジャガー横田長男 海外大学費用に驚愕
content: 女子プロレスラー、ジャガー横田の夫で医師の木下博勝氏が、家族のYouTubeチャンネルを配信。木下大維志さんの進路について勝った。 現在、長野・佐久長聖高3年で寮生活を送る大維志さんは、来年から海外の大学に進学予定。「結構早い段階でTOEFLのスコアが突破したから、ほぼ進路が決まった状態」と話した。 「先生とも話して、こないだエージェントとも話して、『こういうところあるよ』って自分の希望にあったところに探してもらって、そこに行こうということで。金があればそこに行ける状態ですね。あとは3年生を卒業できればという感じですね」と続けた。 「金があれば」に反応したのが博勝氏。「寮に入る予定なんですが、ちょっと聞きましたけど、寮費と学費で、日本円で大体1年間で550万円くらいですね。めちゃ高いね。びっくり!日本の私立医大の学費より高いね。驚き。貯金しなきゃ、ヤバい」と嘆いた。 その間、顔色を変えなかった大維志さん。大学卒業後は帰国するか、現地で就職するかの道を検討するという。コメント欄には「親に感謝」という声も挙がった。 英語に関しては、全国模試で偏差値69。リスニングだけなら75を超えると自信をのぞかせた大維志さん。父は「勉強していないわりにはやりますねえ。カッコイイね」と親バカぶりを示した。

title: 広島・菊池 逆転サヨナラ3ラン
content: 「広島4-3DeNA」(14日、マツダスタジアム) 広島が菊池涼介内野手(34)の劇的な逆転サヨナラ3ランで勝利した。2点を追う九回1死一、二塁で自身9年ぶりのサヨナラ本塁打。七回には史上78人目の通算300二塁打も達成した。この日は「ピースナイター2024」として行われ、広島にとって特別な一日を最高の白星で締めた。9連戦の勝ち越しも決め、ここからもナイン一丸で突き進む。 両手を広げ、ヘルメットを脱いで歓喜の輪へ飛び込んだ。うねりのような歓声に包まれた本拠地が、大きく揺れる。菊池はチームメートと喜びを共有すると、新井監督と熱く抱擁。筋書きのないドラマを演出したヒーローは「感無量です」と喜びをかみしめた。 最高のフィナーレは2点を追う九回に待っていた。1死一、二塁で1ボールから3球連続ファウル。5球目の149キロ直球を思い切って振り抜いた。「うまく(バットに)乗せられたかなという感覚が残っていた。いい風が吹いてくれたし、入ってくれて良かった」。高く舞い上がった打球は左翼フェンスを越え、15年5月22日・ヤクルト戦以来2度目のサヨナラ弾。ファンと平和への思いを共有した一戦で活躍し「特別な日に、こういう勝ち方ができて良かった」と振り返った。 その九回は先頭・小園の二塁打から始まった。坂倉が四球を選んで一、二塁となり、中村奨に打席が巡った。犠打の選択肢もある中、中村奨はヒッティングで左飛。新井監督は「いろんなこと考えて『もう一気に行くぞ』と思って普通に打たせました」と説明。菊池はその場面を見つめながら、攻めに転じた。 「奨成がバントじゃないということは『もうどんどん行け』という監督の意思表示だと思うんで。僕もそれを見て『よし、どんどん行ってやろう』と思いました」。言葉は交わさなくても、指揮官の意図をくみ取れるのは、菊池だからこそ。ベンチの考えを共有した上で劣勢をはね返した。 七回2死では左越えに二塁打を放ち、通算300二塁打を達成。通算1625試合目での到達は、球団では前田智徳を抜いて最速となった。「1打席1打席、何とかしたいという気持ちでね、もう13年目になりますけど、そういうところは1年目から変わらない。それの積み重ねで、この数字になったかなって。まだまだ先もあるんで、使っていただいた方に感謝したい」と実感を込めた。 新井監督も「最高の結果で応えてくれました。興奮しました」と絶賛。負ければ2位・巨人にゲーム差なしに迫られていた一戦を制し、9連戦も勝ち越した。「最後まで、ひた向きに皆さんの声援を借りて全力でプレーしていきたい」と菊池。勝負の8月、仕事人がチームを押し上げる。 ◆自身2度目の劇弾! 菊池のサヨナラ本塁打は自身2度目で2015年5月22日・ヤクルト戦以来、3372日ぶり。また、広島の今季サヨナラ勝利は3度目で過去2度は【1】6月27日・ヤクルト戦【2】7月13日・ヤクルト戦。 ◆通算300二塁打 広島・菊池内野手が14日のDeNA19戦(マツダスタジアム)の七回に山崎から左越えに放って達成。プロ野球78人目。初二塁打は12年7月10日の巨人戦で内海から。

title: 日本ハム 新庄劇場2球連続スクイズ
content: 「日本ハム4-1ロッテ」(14日、エスコンフィールド) 日本ハムが勝利して2位に再浮上した。今季のロッテ戦を13勝6敗1分とし、残り5試合を残して勝ち越しを決めた。新庄政権ではリーグ戦は2年連続全球団に負け越しており、3年目で初の勝ち越しとなった。 1点を追う初回は、レイエスが左越えに11号ソロを放ち同点。二回は万波の左翼線二塁打などで無死二、三塁とし、敵失で1点を勝ち越した。 “新庄劇場”はここから。二回はさらに無死二、三塁から伏見が膝をつきながら初球スクイズを成功し「執念!!」とコメント。続く水野も1死三塁から、同じように膝をつきながら初球スクイズを決めて「寅威さんの真似をしました」とコメントした。2球連続スクイズで2点を加えて、ベンチの新庄監督は大きなガッツポーズを作って喜びを表現した。 昨年6月24日のロッテ戦(ZOZO)では、同点の九回無死二、三塁から石井の4球目のスクイズを外され、さらに1死三塁から6球目のスクイズも外された。2連続スクイズ失敗の借りを、2球連続スクイズ成功できっちり返して見せた。 先発の山崎は初回に3安打に失策が絡み1点を先制されたが、二回以降は緩急自在の投球。八回途中まで1失点に抑えて、8勝目を挙げた。

title: 元キンプリ岩橋玄樹 手首までタトゥー
content: 2021年3月いっぱいでKing&Princeを脱退し、ジャニーズ事務所も退所した岩橋玄樹が12日、SNSを更新。プールを楽しんだことを報告した。 「Summer vibes」と海を見下ろすホテルかコテージのような場所で水着姿でくつろぐ姿や、プールで水しぶきをあげる姿を公開。両腕には肩から手首まで、びっしりとタトゥーが入っており、絵画のよう。よく見ると肩に近い場所に弓を射貫くケンタウロスのようなデザイン、肘より下には美しいバラが描かれている。 ファンからは「カッコ良すぎる」「映画のワンシーンみたい」「こ、これはインスタで大丈夫なやつですか?!え?!大丈夫?!」「やっぱりダブルオーセブンのジェームズ・ボンドだよ」「背中や浮き出た血管にドキドキ」「この表情と逞しい身体とのギャップにクラクラ」「背筋すごい」「男前過ぎて、本当にドキドキ」などの声が多数寄せられている。

title: Μικρή νίκη του Spotify έναντι της Αpple για την τιμολόγηση στην ΕΕ
content: Το Spotify θα ενημερώσει την εφαρμογή του σε συσκευές Apple στην Ευρωπαϊκή Ένωση την Τετάρτη για να συμπεριλάβει τις τιμές των διαφόρων προγραμμάτων και υπηρεσιών του, τρεις μήνες αφότου ο κατασκευαστής του iPhone απέρριψε μια τέτοια κίνηση. Αυτή η απόρριψη οφειλόταν στο ότι το Spotify δεν αποδέχτηκε το δικαίωμα παροχής υπηρεσιών ροής μουσικής της Apple, τους νέους όρους που διέπουν τον τρόπο με τον οποίο οι εφαρμογές streaming στον Ευρωπαϊκό Οικονομικό Χώρο ενημερώνουν τους χρήστες για άλλους τρόπους πραγματοποίησης αγορών. Το Spotify ανακοίνωσε ότι θα εμφανίζει πλέον πληροφορίες τιμολόγησης εντός της εφαρμογής και για τους χρήστες iPhone στην Ευρωπαϊκή Ένωση. Η σουηδική εταιρεία streaming ήχου ανακοίνωσε ότι ενώ αποδέχεται τώρα αυτούς τους όρους, η εφαρμογή iOS δεν θα παρέχει στους χρήστες έναν εξωτερικό σύνδεσμο για να κάνουν αγορές, καθώς δεν θέλει να πληρώσει προμήθεια στην Apple για τέτοιες συναλλαγές. Η Apple είχε πει ότι η αποδοχή των όρων για streaming μουσικής δεν απαιτούσε εξωτερικό σύνδεσμο για πληρωμές. «Αν και αυτή είναι μια πρόοδος, πρόκειται μόνο για ένα μικρό βήμα στη μακρά πορεία προς την παροχή στους χρήστες iPhone βασικών εμπειριών προϊόντων που περιμένουν και αξίζουν στις εφαρμογές τους», ανέφερε το Spotify σε σχετική ανακοίνωσή του. Η Apple...

title: 토트넘 올해는 '무관탈출' 진심인가, 거물급 딜 최소 2명 더 진행 중
creator: 한동훈 기자
content: [스포츠조선 한동훈 기자] 토트넘이 거물급 공격수를 영입한 데 이어 최소한 두 명을 더 영입할 계획으로 알려졌다. 2024~2025시즌 프리미어리그는 오는 17일 개막하며 여름 이적시장은 현지 시간으로 30일 밤 11시에 종료된다. 영국 언론 '기브미스포츠'는 15일(한국시각) '토트넘이 솔란케 이후 두 명을 더 영입하려고 작업 중이다. 엔제 포스테코글루 감독의 두 번째 시즌에 접어드는 토트넘은 여름 이적시장이 끝나기 전에 새로운 미드필더와 윙어를 영입하려고 한다'고 보도했다. 토트넘은 여름 이적시장에서 티모 베르너, 아치 그레이, 루카스 베리발, 양민혁, 도미닉 솔란케와 계약했다. 베르너는 이미 1월부터 토트넘에 임대됐던 선수로 계약을 연장한 것이라 전력 플러스가 아닌 보존이다. 그레이와 베리발은 잠재력이 엄청난 유망주이지만 말 그대로 유망주다. 양민혁은 내년 1월에 합류한다. 사실상 확실한 보강은 솔란케 뿐이다. 솔란케는 지난 시즌 프리미어리그에서 19골을 터뜨린 최전방 스트라이커다. 작년 여름 해리 케인(바이에른뮌헨)을 팔고 전문 공격수가 없었던 토트넘은 약점 하나를 해결했다. 기브미스포츠는 '토트넘의 여름 이적시장은 아직 안 끝났다. 센터포워드 영입이 최우선 과제였다. 새로운 윙어와 중앙 미드필더를 영입하기 위해 눈을 돌렸다. 토트넘은 활기차게 열의를 보이고 있다'고 전했다. 기브미스포츠는 '토트넘은 여전히 젊지만...

creator: Martín Adames, The Associated Press

PUERTO PLATA, Dominican Republic (AP) — The second phase of Wander Franco’s trial on charges of sexually abusing a minor was delayed until Sept. 26. The decision of the court in the province of Puerto Plata, in the north of the Dominican Republic, was due to the defense team of the Tampa Bay shortstop not being notified of audiovisual evidence that was going to be shown during a hearing scheduled for Wednesday. The 23-year-old has been charged with sexually abusing a 14-year-old girl. Prosecutors filed charges in January, six months after a judge ordered he be investigated. Dominican law splits the court proceedings into a preparatory phase, a preliminary ruling and a final ruling. Franco attended the hearing with a lawyer and family members. He did not speak to reporters. Documents that prosecutors presented to a judge in July and were viewed by The Associated Press alleged Franco through his mother, Yudelka Aybar, transferred...

title: Tourist driver five times over limit: police
creator: Tim Scott
content: The driver was nearly five times the legal limit, police say. Photo: ODT files Sergeant Matt Lee, of Dunedin, said officers stopped a vehicle in Castle St at 1.25am today after observing a ‘‘strange manner of driving’’. The vehicle, driven by a 39-year-old man, contained five occupants and had ‘‘an extremely strong smell of alcohol emanating from the vehicle,’’ he said. The driver admitted to recently consuming alcohol and recorded a breath alcohol level of 1229mcg - nearly five times over the legal limit for adults. The limit is 250mcg of alcohol per litre of breath. Sgt Lee said the man told officers he had no driver’s licence and was on holiday in New Zealand from Australia. He would appear in the Dunedin District Court today charged with having a breath alcohol level of more than 400mg. Police were holding his passport until his appearance in court, Sgt Lee said. tim.scott@odt.co.nz

title: Supreme Court makes important decisions about bail
creator: GenZeditor
content: Recently, the Supreme Court of India made two important decisions about bail. Bail is when someone accused of a crime is allowed to stay out of jail while waiting for their trial. What Did the Court Say? The court said that even for serious crimes, people should usually get bail instead of staying in jail. They also said that if someone has been in jail for a long time without a trial, they should be given bail. Why Is This Important? – Some laws in India make it hard for people to get bail, especially for serious crimes. – The Supreme Court is saying that everyone has rights, even if they’re accused of a crime. – This helps lower courts know how to make fair decisions about bail. What Happens Next? – The Supreme Court still needs to decide if some parts of these strict laws are fair. – Many people are waiting in jail, hoping these decisions will help them get bail. – It’s important for the court to make clear rules so that everyone is treated fairly. Remember, the idea is that people are innocent until proven guilty, and the Supreme Court wants to make sure this idea is followed, even for serious crimes. This helps protect people’s rights and ensures that the justice system is fair to everyone.

title: إحالة موظفي الدوام المسائي للتحقيق.. كلب في مستشفى – فيديو
creator: عبدالله
content: اجتاحت مواقع التواصل الاجتماعي مقطع فيديو يظهر كلبًا يتجول داخل مستشفى الصدر بمحافظة قنا في صعيد مصر، مما دفع مديرية الصحة بالمحافظة للرد واتخاذ إجراءات صارمة بشأن الحادثة. أعلنت مديرية الصحة في قنا عن إحالة فريق العمل، ومشرفي شركة الأمن والنظافة، والمدير المناوب، ومعاون المستشفى للتحقيق على خلفية حادثة تجول الكلب داخل المستشفى. وأكد أشرف السيد، المتحدث الرسمي باسم وزارة الصحة في قنا، أن الحادثة وقعت خارج مواعيد العمل الصباحية، خلال الليل. وبناءً على ذلك، تم تكليف إدارة المراجعة الداخلية والحوكمة بمديرية الصحة بإعداد تقرير عاجل ومفصل حول الحادثة، مع إحالة جميع أفراد فريق العمل الليلي ومشرفي شركة الأمن والنظافة، والمدير المناوب، ومعاون المستشفى للتحقيق العاجل، وتوجيه أقصى عقوبة لمن يثبت تقصيره أو مسؤوليته عن الواقعة. كما تم التشديد على شركة الأمن المسؤولة عن المستشفيات بعمل إعادة توزيع لأفراد الأمن بشكل صحيح داخل المستشفيات أو أماكن تقديم الخدمات الصحية. وأهابت مديرية الصحة بالمواطنين بسرعة التواصل مع إدارة المستشفيات أو أماكن تقديم الخدمات الطبية بشكل عاجل حال ملاحظة أي مخالفة أو تقصير، أو رفع الشكوى إلى مديرية الصحة لسرعة اتخاذ الإجراءات اللازمة لتلافي تلك الملاحظات. جريدة المدينة

title: Gibran Diisukan Jadi Ketum Golkar, Agung Laksono: Tidak Ada Nama Selain Bahlil yang Maju
content: - Ketua Dewan Pakar , Agung Laksono turut angkat suara ihwal beredarnya poster maju sebagai Ketua Umum Partai Golkar. Ia pun mengaku belum menedengar nama Gibran didukung dari kader internal Golkar. Menko Kesejahteraan Rakyat ke-15 RI ini pun menegaskan ada syarat dan ketentuan yang diatur dalam AD/ART untuk menduduki jabatan Ketua Umum Golkar. Salah satunya pernah menjadi pengurus. "Saya nggak mendengar tentang hal tersebut, tentunya untuk menduduki posisi sebagai kandidat itu ada beberapa persyaratan berdasarkan AD/ART yang berlaku, hingga saat ini pernah jadi pengurus," ujar Agung saat dihubungi, Rabu (14/8/2024). Kendati demikian, Agung melanjutkan setiap kader internal kader Golkar memiliki peluang untuk maju menjadi Ketua Umum Golkar. Namun, ia mengaku nama Bahlil Lahadalia satu-satunya kader yang menguat untuk maju menjadi kandidat pemimpin partai itu hingga saat ini. "Setiap anggota Golkar selama dia memenuhi kriteria tersebut bisa menjadi kandidat gitu. Tidak ada nama lain selain dari Bahlil yang maju, yang menguat," tutur Agung. Sekadar informasi, mencuatnya nama Gibran Rakabuming Raka menjadi Ketua Umum Golkar setelah munculnya poster yang memperlihatkan dukungan dari kelompok "Koalisi Muda Pembaharuan Golkar". Poster ini dengan cepat menyebar di media sosial yang mengklaim bahwa mereka telah mengusung Gibran Rakabuming Raka sebagai calon Ketua Umum Partai Golkar...

title: Panipat News: प्राथमिक शिक्षकों ने समस्याएं गिनाईं
content: पानीपत। राजकीय प्राथमिक शिक्षक संघ का एक प्रतिनिधिमंडल जिला प्रधान रविंद्र कुमार के नेतृत्व में विभिन्न मांगों को लेकर जिला मौलिक शिक्षा अधिकारी सुभाष भारद्वाज से मिला। जिला प्रधान रविंद्र कुमार ने कहा कि बीएलओ में लगभग जेबीटी अध्यापकों की ड्यूटी लगाई जाती है जो सरासर गलत है। इस ड्यूटी में अन्य अध्यापकोंं को लिया जाना चाहिए ताकि स्कूली कार्य प्रभावित न हो। इसके साथ-साथ बीएलओ को छुट्टी के दिन कार्य करने के बदले प्रतिपूरक अवकाश दिया जाना चाहिए। जिला महासचिव राजकुमार जांगड़ा ने जिले में कार्यरत प्राथमिक शिक्षकों तथा प्राथमिक स्कूलों से संबंधित विभिन्न समस्याओं से अवगत करवाया व इनके निराकरण करवाने का अनुरोध किया। उन्होंने कहा कि जिन स्कूलों में अध्यापक सरप्लस हैं, उन स्कूलों से जरूरत वाले स्कूलों में भेजने का अनुरोध किया। उन्होंने कहा कि जिला स्तर पर मेडिकल पास करने वाली सीट को दुरुस्त किया जाए ताकि अध्यापकों को किसी समस्या का सामना न करना पड़े। जिला संघ संस्थापक सुरेंद्र राठी ने कहा कि यदि अध्यापक मानसिक तनाव से दूर होगा तो स्कूलों में अपना बहुत अच्छा कार्य कर सकेगा। जिला मौलिक शिक्षा अधिकारी ने सभी समस्याओं का निराकरण करवाने का विश्वास दिलाया और कहा कि जल्द से जल्द सभी समस्याओं को दूर किया जाएगा। इस अवसर पर राजेश पुनिया, जयदीप, जिला कोषाध्यक्ष महेंद्र सिंह, खंड बापौली प्रधान बलविंदर, खंड इसराना प्रधान प्रवेश छोक्कर, खंड पानीपत प्रधान विक्रम पन्नू, राजेंद्र सुर्खी, पूर्व राज्य उप प्रधान रमेश रावल, रवि दहिया, जितेंद्र, अनिल शर्मा, हरिओम, जयदीप व नवीन यादव मौजूद रहे।

title: BEd colleges to follow new guidelines
content: Mangaluru : The colleges offering BEd courses under Mangalore University (MU) will soon have clear guidelines in place regarding the evaluation and awarding of marks . These courses have been functioning with guidelines that were ambiguous related to these two aspects. The recently formed committee in MU has spelled out clarity regarding them. The amended guidelines have been sent for approval. There are about 15 BEd colleges with close to 1,200 students under MU. Gerald Santosh D’Souza, chairman of the committee, said that the course had some rules which had no proper explanation for which they were included. One of them is the 80% rule, which stresses that the result percentage cannot go above that. For example, if a candidate gets 90 marks and another candidate scores 70 marks, the candidate who gets 90 marks will have their marks reduced to 80, and the one who gets 70 marks is awarded the 10 marks. The guideline had no explanation, he noted. Another major change in the guidelines is in evaluation. All the BEd papers were evaluated only once, and as per the rule, they should be given a fair chance for revaluation and personal seeing of answer papers. “We have included a guideline for revaluation and personal seeing of papers,” said D’Souza, adding that the new guidelines will be followed from this academic year. title: Más de 1.300 reclusas en México reciben una segunda oportunidad para la reinserción social
creator: Newsroom Infobae
content: Ciudad de México, 14 ago (EFE).- Más de 1.300 mujeres privadas de la libertad en 11 reclusorios (cáceles) de México recibieron una segunda oportunidad para reinsertarse en la sociedad y mejorar su calidad de vida, según el informe de la organización La Cana y la Agencia de Estados Unidos para el Desarrollo Internacional (USAID), presentado este miércoles. El objetivo del programa 'Conciencia y oportunidades para mujeres privadas de la libertad' es promover la reinserción social de mujeres de 18 a 29 años, a través del desarrollo de habilidades laborales, bienestar emocional y buenas prácticas penitenciarias, expuso la directora de La Cana, Daniela Ancira. "Creemos firmemente en las segundas oportunidades, y aunque enfrentamos muchos retos, las recompensas han sido mucho mayores", comentó. Chío, de 27 años, quien salió hace cuatro meses de prisión, donde estuvo recluida por defender su vida y la de su pareja de un ataque homofóbico, compartió que ahora está por terminar el bachillerato y quiere estudiar Derecho "para ayudar a otras personas". "La Cana me cambió la vida totalmente, porque sinceramente yo pensé que no iba a salir nunca", expresó la joven que pudo visibilizar su caso en el pódcast 'Penitencia', lo que le ayudó a obtener su libertad. Recordó que cuando llegó al penal estaba "muy mal, con golpes, triste" y todos la señalaban, excepto en...

title: Supremely clear
creator: TOI Edit
content: Two SC orders within a week should settle once and for all that bail, not jail, is the norm Supreme Court’s latest order granting bail, in a case under anti-terror law UAPA, adds to its last week’s order bailing Sisodia in a PMLA (money laundering) case. Both UAPA and PMLA have special provisions for bail – negative provisions – that an accused is “not presumed innocent”. In ordinary law, presumption of innocence is a fundamental principle in grant of bail. SC’s clear signal | In Sisodia’s case, SC said that delay in trial and a long period behind bars are reason enough to grant bail, while in the UAPA case it said that “bail as rule and jail as exception is settled law” for all legislation. Taken together, the back-to-back SC rulings provide clear direction to grant of bail in cases under most stringent laws. On earlier occasions too, SC has observed that statutory restrictions on bail must not overshadow constitutional rights. For SC to direct | It is this clarity in direction to interpret controversial legislation – whose provisions are under challenge in SC – that is much required for HCs and trial courts to take their cue. Barely six months ago, another SC bench had held the reverse in another order – that in UAPA jail, not bail, is norm. It is such contradictory signals from top court that can distort how any law is interpreted. The two latest orders should settle any...

title: Rishikesh News: जम्मू कश्मीर के प्रतिनिधियों ने विकास कार्यों की सराहना की
content: जम्मू कश्मीर से पहुंचा 100 सदस्यीय ग्राम पंचायत विकास अधिकारियो का दल ने पंचायत माजरी ग्रांट में धरातल पर बनी योजनाओं का मौका मुआयना किया। जनप्रतिनिधियों ने उत्तराखंड राज्य की पंचायती राज व्यवस्था को जम्मू कश्मीर के लिए भी मुफीद बताया और गांव में हो रहे विकास कार्यों की सराहना की। ग्राम प्रधान अनिल पाल ने जम्मू कश्मीर के जनप्रतिनिधियों को ग्राम पंचायत की साफ सफाई व्यवस्था, पेयजल व्यवस्था और अन्य विकास कार्यों की जानकारी दी। मौके पर मौजूद माजरी ग्रांट प्रधान अनिल पाल, ग्राम पंचायत विकास अधिकारी सुनील दत्त, पंचायत सदस्य परमजीत कौर, रश्मि व स्वयं सहायता समूह की महिलाओं ने परंपरागत तरीके से स्वागत किया। इस दौरान सुधा देवी, रीना नेगी, आरती,पिंकी, रेनू, सुखविंदर सिंह, परमजीत सिंह, हिम्मत आदि मौजूद रहे। संवाद

Tecatita Light lanza nueva app para organizar reuniones con Google Calendar
creator: Jennifer Sánchez Dimas
content: Suscríbete a Merca2.0. Es un hecho que el verano está hecho para disfrutarlo con amigos, pero las responsabilidades diarias, como el trabajo, el gimnasio y esas juntas que podrían haber sido un correo, a menudo dificultan encontrar tiempo para socializar. Para resolver este problema, Tecatita Light ha lanzado su nueva aplicación, Momentitos App, diseñada para facilitar la coordinación de reuniones con la ayuda de Google Calendar. Y es que la cerveza se ha afianzado como una de las bebidas más consumidas y apreciadas en todo el mundo, desempeñando un rol central en diversas culturas y tradiciones. Con una historia que se remonta a milenios, sigue siendo una elección indispensable en celebraciones, encuentros sociales y momentos de ocio. Aunque su popularidad puede variar de un país a otro. En Europa, naciones como Alemania, Bélgica y la República Checa se destacan por sus profundas tradiciones cerveceras y la calidad sobresaliente de sus cervezas. Precisamente, Alemania, famosa por su vibrante Oktoberfest, y Bélgica, con su rica herencia de cervezas artesanales, ilustran cómo la cerveza está intrínsecamente entrelazada con la cultura local. Según los datos de , España es el país que lidera la lista de países con mayor consumo de cerveza con alcohol, con un 51% de los encuestados indicando que la beben regularmente. title: El CNE tilda de “panfletario” el informe ONU sobre elecciones
creator: Redacción ALMOMENTO.net
content: En un comunicado, el CNE recordó que, según lo acordado con , este documento tendría fines internos, por lo que su divulgación pública viola lo pactado y “demuestra la intencionalidad política perversa de dicha difusión, compuesta de argumentos falaces y desfigurados”. “El contenido de dicho ‘informe’ es un documento panfletario y su ‘experticia’ queda absolutamente desmoronada en vista de los pobres y fácilmente desmentibles argumentos que utilizan para tratar de deslegitimar el impecable y transparente proceso electoral realizado el 28 de julio”, señala el ente comicial. Además de desmentir reiteradamente el documento, el CNE insistió en que desde el 28 de julio se ejecutó un “ciberataque terrorista” que continua y ante el cual “se aplicaron los protocolos de contingencia” que permitieron “tener una transmisión del 80 % de las actas, con un resultado irreversible a favor” del presidente Nicolás Maduro. En vista de la falta de resultados desagregados por centro de votación, lo que contradice el cronograma establecido, el CNE indicó que “no se pudo realizar la divulgación” detallada “por ataques continuos a las plataformas de divulgación, que sí están expuestas a internet”, en alusión a la página web de la institución, que lleva 17 días caída.
