title: United Way teams with Cleveland Clinic Avon Hospital to offer free wellness classes
creator: Editorial staff
content: United Way of Greater Lorain County and Cleveland Clinic Avon Hospital announced the United We Sweat Cleveland Clinic Caregiver Series, a monthly series aimed at providing free health and wellness education in downtown Lorain. Classes will take place from 3:30 to 4:30 p.m. the third Friday of each month at United Way, 642 Broadway in Lorain. The series will run through the remainder of the year with each session featuring a new topic and expert speaker, according to a news release. The Aug. 16 session is titled Food As Medicine and will be presented by Laura Horner, a cardiac nurse and nurse case manager at Cleveland Clinic Avon Hospital, the release said. The presentation will explore the benefits of a heart-healthy diet, with a focus on the Mediterranean diet. Attendees will learn practical tips for healthy eating, such as eating the rainbow, shopping the perimeter of the grocery store and how to eat healthy on a budget, the release said. Thiere are options to attend in-person or virtually. Pre-registration is encouraged at bit.ly/4fqfiZM or by calling 440-277-6530. A free yoga class will follow the presentation at 5 p.m. “I’m proud to expand our collaboration with Cleveland Clinic Avon Hospital to uniquely offer the expertise of their caregivers to further benefit the community,” said United Way of Greater Lorain County president and CEO Ryan Aroney, in the release. “United...

title: Independence Day 2024 Live Hindi: लाल किले से PM मोदी लेंगे विकसित भारत का 'संकल्प'
Пять самых важных событий 14 августа
قصة السيدة ذات الفستان الخضاري.. يا “ليز تراس”.. تسكتين وإلا سنجلب لك الخسّ!
creator: آدم الصغير
content: هذا ما تعرّضت له السيدة -ذات الفستان الخضاري- رئيسة الوزراء البريطانية السابقة ليز تراس، خلال مشاركتها في لقاء بالولايات المتحدة، حيث كان من المفترض أن تتحدّث –وعي التي تولت السلطة لـ49 يوما- عن دعمها للرئيس السابق ترامب في سعيه إلى ولاية جديدة. وأظهر فيديو، تمّ تداوله عبر مواقع التواصل الاجتماعي على نطاق واسع، ليز تراس وهي تتنبأ بفوز ترامب خلال اللقاء، مشددة على أهمية الاقتصاد، غير أنها لم تدرك ما حدث وراء رأسها، إذ نزلت في خلفية المسرح لافتة تتضمّن صورة لرأس “خسّة” ذات عينين، مع عبارة: “لقد دمرت الاقتصاد”. وفي الحال، صعد رجل بدا قلقا، ولفت انتباهها إلى اللافتة، ما جعلها تشعر بصدمة، وتغادر المكان على الفور، قبل أن تقول: “هذا ليس مضحكا”. وقالت صحيفة “ميرور” البريطانية، إن ليز تراس كانت في قاعة “بيكليس” العامة في سوفولك عندما وقعت الحادثة، إذ كانت تروج لكتابها “عشر سنوات لإنقاذ الغرب”، وارتبط اسم ليز تراس بالخسّ، بعدما أطلقت صحيفة “ذا ديلي ستار” البريطانية عام 2022، تحدّيا مباشرا على “يوتيوب” وضعت فيه صورة رئيسة الوزراء آنذاك إلى جانب رأس خسّ، مع تعليق ساخر حول من سيصمد أطول، بالتزامن مع مطالبتها بالاستقالة من منصبها. تراس –قبل ظهور اللافتة- كانت تقول: “أنا أؤيد ترامب وأريده أن يفوز... لكن هذا ما كنت أقوله عن المرشحين الحاليين، أعتقد أن المواطن الأمريكي العادي ليس في وضع جيد والناس يصوتون على...”، وفي هذا اللحظة بالضبط، ظهرت أولا عبارة “لقد دمرت الاقتصاد”، ثم ظهرت “الخسّة الشريرة” بينما تتابع رئيسة الوزراء السابقة: “أعتقد أن مستشار بيل كلينتون...

title: India & Indiaspora
creator: TOI Edit
content: Success of diaspora in US and other countries is reason for Centre to make emigration a standalone ministry Regardless of which way US presidential elections go, there will be an Indian-origin woman in the citadel of power in Washington next Jan, whether it is as POTUS (Kamala Harris) or as Second Lady (Usha Vance). That encapsulates the power and influence the Indian diaspora has come to have on American life. From technology and business to healthcare, education and public policy, the 5.1mn-strong Indian diaspora in US – which comprises just 1.5% of its population – has punched far above its weight in the country. To take one metric, it contributes as much as 5-6% to US’s tax kitty. To take another, at $136,000, the median income of diaspora members is almost double the American population’s average. A great success story | The spread of Indian-origin people across different spheres of American life is commendable. They are also giving back to their home country, sending $26bn in remittances in 2022-23. Similar is the story for Indian migrants to West Asia, Europe and elsewhere. In fact, if the economic heft of the more than 3cr Indian migrants worldwide is taken into account, we already have a $5tn GDP. And this has not happened only because of highly skilled professionals. As a TOI story highlighted earlier this year, there is a Great Indian Outplacement at work involving...

title: Imputan a expresidente Alberto Fernández por violencia contra Fabiola Yáñez en Argentina
creator: Roberto Trejo
content: El expresidente de Argentina , Alberto Fernández , fue imputado este miércoles por el fiscal federal Ramiro González, acusado de los delitos de lesiones graves y amenazas coactivas contra la exprimera dama Fabiola Yáñez . La denuncia fue presentada por Yáñez, quien acusó a Fernández de violencia machista durante su relación , que abarcó tanto su tiempo como presidente entre 2019 y 2023, como también algunos años previos. El fiscal González solicitó recabar las primeras pruebas, basándose en fotografías y conversaciones encontradas en el teléfono de la secretaria de Fernández , como parte de una investigación por presunta corrupción en la contratación pública. Estos elementos revelaron el presunto maltrato hacia Yáñez. Fernández enfrenta cargos por lesiones graves doblemente agravadas por el vínculo y por darse en un contexto de violencia de género, así como por amenazas coactivas. Alberto Fernández habría agredido física y psicológicamente a su esposa Entre los episodios mencionados, Yáñez afirmó que en 2016 Fernández la obligó a abortar mediante coacción psicológica. En 2021, en la residencia oficial de Olivos, la habría agredido físicamente en varias ocasiones , provocándole lesiones visibles en una foto enviada a la secretaria del político. El dictamen detalla un incidente en julio de 2021, cuando Fernández, tras una discusión,...

title: Kolkata rape-murder: Pen-down strike at Rims enters 2nd day
Cuál es el canje que consiguió Camilota de Cuestión de Peso que despertó envidia en sus compañeros
creator: (Diario El Cordillerano)
content: Camila Deniz , más conocida por sus compañeros y la gente como Camilota, terminó de afianzar su fama en su llegada a Cuestión de Peso . Esto le permitió recolectar una importante suma de seguidores en sus redes sociales y por ende comenzaron a llegarle las ofertas para hacer canjes. Es sabido que los famosos que logran sumar una gran cantidad de seguidores y que se muestran activos en sus redes sociales cuentan con la posibilidad de que las marcas se acerquen para ofrecerles algunos productos a cambio de stories o publicidad. Fue así como Camilota logró comenzar a forjar su camino en las redes sociales para poder adquirir una gran cantidad de seguidores. Es que comenzó aprovechando el furor de su hermano, Thiago Medina, en su paso por Gran Hermano. Es por eso que, ahora que ella es participante de Cuestión de Peso logró terminar de asentarse. Tanto es así que en las últimas semanas logró alcanzar los más de 540 mil seguidores en su cuenta de Instagram. Esto, sumado a los distintos posteos divertidos que realiza, provocó que algunas marcas se acerquen con el fin de promocionarse y otorgándole un beneficio a ella. Es por eso que en su paso por la mesa de Juana Viale, decidió exponer cuál es el último canje que consiguió, por lo que admitió que era el que más estaba esperando y el que siempre soñó. Es por eso que en sus redes sociales expuso esto al...

title: Karachi Division win shooting ball event at I-Day Sports Festival
creator: Our Staff Reporter
content: LAHORE - Karachi Division shooting ball team emerged victorious against the District Lasbela and Hub Combined XI at the Independence Day Sports Festival, held under the patronage of Commissioner Karachi Syed Hassan Naqvi. The two-day festival, which featured shooting ball, basketball, and karate events, concluded with a vibrant awards ceremony at the Wahid Sports Complex in Korangi. The shooting ball final was a thrilling contest between Karachi Division team and District Lasbela and Hub Combined XI. The match, which was played in a best-ofthree format, saw District Lasbela taking the first set 16-8. However, Karachi Division made a strong comeback, winning the next two sets 16-10 and 16-13 to secure the victory. Key players for the winning team included Rizwan Ahmed, Farooq Nadir, Syed Mohsin Ali, Abdullah, Muhammad Shamim, Hamad Khalid, and Abdul Khaliq, who delivered outstanding performances. Despite a commendable effort from the runner-up team, with Rashid Lala and Abdul Kareem standing out, Karachi Division’s superior play led them to victory. The match was officiated by Qamar-ul-Islam Pyare, Abdul Rahim, Asim Baig, and Muhammad Ismail. The event was attended by several notable figures including Karachi Commissioner’s Sports Director Ghulam Muhammad Khan, UC-2 Landhi Chairman Qasim Khan, District Sports Officer Hub Khuda Bakhsh Baloch, and organizers like Ejaz Ahmed,...

title: రాష్ట్రం నుంచి రాజ్యసభకు అభిషేక్ సింఘ్వి
creator: Velugu Babu
content: మనతెలంగాణ/హైదరాబాద్: తెలంగాణ నుంచి రాజ్యసభ అభ్యర్థి గా అభిషేక్ మను సింఘ్వీని కాంగ్రెస్ పార్టీ ఎంపిక చేసింది. ఈ మేరకు బుధవారం ఎఐసిసి ప్రధాన కార్యదర్శి కెసి వేణుగోపాల్ ప్రకటించా రు. కె.కేశవరావు రాజీనామాతో తెలంగాణలో రాజ్యసభ స్థానం ఖాళీ అయిన విషయం తెలిసిందే. రాజ్యసభలోని 12 స్థానాల్లో ఉప ఎన్నికలకు రంగం సిద్ధమైంది. తెలంగాణ సహా తొమ్మిది రాష్ట్రాలకు చెందిన ఈ ఖాళీలకు సంబంధించి సెప్టెంబరు 3న ఎన్నికలు నిర్వహించేందుకు ఎన్నికల సంఘం (ఇసి) ఇప్పటికే షెడ్యూల్ విడుదల చేసింది. సార్వత్రిక ఎన్నికల్లో రాజ్యసభ సభ్యులు పీయూష్ గోయల్, సర్బానంద సోనోవాల్, జ్యోతిరాదిత్య సింధియా, కామఖ్య ప్రసాద్ తస(బిజెపి), మీసా భారతి (ఆర్‌జెడి), వివేక్ ఠాకుర్ (బిజెపి), దీపేంద్రసింగ్ హుడా (కాంగ్రెస్), ఉదయన్ రాజే భోస్లే (బిజెపి), కె.సి.వేణుగోపాల్ (కాంగ్రెస్), బిప్లబ్ కుమార్ దేబ్ (బిజెపి) లోక్‌సభకు ఎన్నికయ్యారు. వారి రాజీనామాలతో రాజ్యసభలో ఖాళీలు ఏర్పడ్డాయి. అలాగే తెలంగాణలో బిఆర్‌ఎస్ తరఫున రాజ్యసభ సభ్యుడిగా ఉన్న కె.కేశవరావు రాజీనామా చేసి కాంగ్రెస్‌లో చేరడంతోపాటు ఒడిశాలో బిజెడి ఎంపీ మమతా మొహంత తన పదవికి, పార్టీకి రాజీనామా చేయడంతో ఆ స్థానాలకూ ఉప ఎన్నికలు జరుగుతున్నాయి. నామినేషన్లు ప్రారంభం..సెప్టెంబర్ 3న పోలింగ్ రాజ్యసభ సభ్యుల ఎన్నికలకు కేంద్ర ఎన్నికల సంఘం నోటిఫికేషన్ విడుదల చేసింది. బుధవారం నుంచి నుంచి ఈ నెల 21వ తేదీ వరకు నామినేషన్ ప్రక్రియ కొనసాగనున్నట్లు ఇసి ప్రకటించింది. నామినేషన్ల ఉపసంహరణకు ఈ నెల 27 వరకు గడువు ఉంది. సెప్టెంబర్ 3న ఉదయం 9 గంటల నుంచి సాయంత్రం 4 గంటల వరకు పోలింగ్ జరగనుంది. అదే రోజు ఓట్ల లెక్కింపు.. ఫలితాలు...

title: Jordan Chiles Olympic medal controversy: CAS passes blame to gymnastics federation; Romania moving forward with ceremony
creator: Yahoo Sports
content: The International Olympic Committee and a court of appeals have ruled in Romania's favor, but the battle for Jordan Chiles' bronze medal isn't over. Amid USA Gymnastics' vows to take the fight the to the highest court in Switzerland, Romania announced Tuesday that it is moving forward with a medal ceremony for gymnast Ana Bărbosu. This is all in the wake of the IOC appearing to reject a Romanian proposal that all three athletes involved in the dispute be awarded bronze medals. But there's also new information about the three-person panel convened by the Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS), which ruled to strip Chiles of her medal. The chair of the panel reportedly has active ties to Romania, which would be a clear conflict of interest. Yet he was still allowed to participate in a decision that ruled in favor of Romania. CAS has responded to those reports and released a statement passing blame for the controversy to the International Gymnastics Federation (FIG). Here's the latest and the need-to-know in the ongoing gymnastics bronze-medal saga from the Paris Olympics. The chair of the CAS panel that stripped Chiles of her bronze medal, Hamid G. Gharavi, is a lawyer based in France. , Gharavi serves as legal counsel to Romania at the World Bank’s International Centre for the Settlement of Investment Disputes, and has been working with Romania for nearly 10 years. While the...

title: Where is the 2025 WNBA All-Star Game? Caitlin Clark Effect brings showcase to home of Indiana Fever next season | Sporting News
creator: Sarah Effress
content: After this year's WNBA All-Star Game in Phoenix drew a record 3.44 million viewers — more than 2 million better than the previous high from 2003—the league is taking advantage of its growth. Thanks to its stars, including rookies Caitlin Clark and Angel Reese, the WNBA is more popular than ever. The 2024 All-Star Game was one of 17 games this year with viewership above 1 million, a feat not achieved by any WNBA contest in 16 years heading into this season. With this year's All-Star Weekend success, capped off with a riveting matchup between the league's best and Team USA, the WNBA is bound to put just as much effort, if not more, into the event next year. Here's everything you need to know about next year's WNBA All-Star Game location. MORE: Caitlin Clark vs. Angel Reese is a must-watch WNBA storyline Where is the 2025 WNBA All-Star Game? The 2025 WNBA All-Star Game will take place in Indianapolis, home of Clark and the Fever, as reported by ESPN's Alexa Philippou . The city's Gainbridge Fieldhouse hosted the NBA All-Star Game in 2024, and the arena will host the WNBA edition for the first time next summer. Caitlin Clark Effect on Indiana Fever Clark's presence in Indiana very likely tipped the scales in the Fever's favor for the All-Star Game bid. The franchise drafted the Iowa phenom with the No. 1 overall pick in the 2024 WNBA Draft. Indiana's roster already featured Aliyah...

title: Dùng tiền để dành 'giải cứu' bầy chim sáo bị nhốt, cụ ông bán vé số gây xúc động
content: Những ngày qua, mạng xã hội chia sẻ đoạn clip ghi lại cảnh một cụ ông bán vé số đã ngoài 80 tuổi lấy hết tiền dành dụm, để mua lại bầy chim đang được người bán nhốt trong lồng. Sau khi mua, ông cụ thả chúng bay đi ngay trước mặt người bán. Sau khi được đăng tải lên mạng xã hội, đoạn clip khiến người xem xúc động. Nhiều cư dân mạng để lại bình luận tích cực, cho rằng dù phải lao động vất vả trong lúc tuổi đã cao, ông cụ vẫn có hành động đẹp, làm thức tỉnh nhiều người. Đoạn clip trên được anh Mai Văn Quang (SN 1993, Bình Dương) ghi lại, khi tận mắt chứng kiến hành động hiếm gặp và đầy nhân văn của cụ ông bán vé số. Theo anh Quang, sự việc diễn ra tại khu chợ Quang Vinh 1, TP Tân Uyên, tỉnh Bình Dương. Anh Quang là tiểu thương chuyên kinh doanh thịt lợn tại chợ. Sáng xảy ra sự việc, anh vừa mở cửa, dọn hàng ra bán thì thấy cụ ông bán vé số quen thuộc đến trò chuyện với người phụ nữ đang rao bán đàn chim bên vệ đường. Sau ít phút trao đổi, ông cụ đề nghị người bán thả tự do cho những con chim. Lúc đầu, người phụ nữ tỏ vẻ nửa tin, nửa ngờ. Nhưng khi thấy cụ ông thuyết phục mua bầy chim sẻ với giá...

title: Galaxy Z Flip6、Motorola razr 50 Ultra、Xiaomi MIX Flip 比一比
creator: 邱 倢芯
content: 台灣直立式摺疊機市場越來越熱鬧,除了既有的三星、Motorola 等品牌外,小米今年也在台灣市場推出了 Xiaomi MIX Flip 機款,不過隨著直立式摺疊機的選擇越來越多,這些產品又各有哪些特別之處呢? 有別於去年台灣小摺疊機都採用不同的處理器,Galaxy Z Flip6、Motorola razr 50 Ultra、Xiaomi MIX Flip 皆採用高通 Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 處理器。不過要注意的是,Galaxy Z Flip6 使用的是升頻版的 Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 for Galaxy 處理器。 ▲ Xiaomi MIX Flip(左)、Galaxy Z Flip6(中)、Motorola razr 50 Ultra(右)跑分表現。 雖然許多手機廠商都喜歡在封面螢幕尺寸上著墨,不過三星的 Galaxy Z Flip6 仍維持與去年 Galaxy Z Flip5 一樣的 3.4 吋。螢幕亮起時,封面螢幕的造型就像一個小小的檔案夾。 封面螢幕的應用方面,Galaxy Z Flip6 並沒有新增太多功能,使用者一樣可在封面螢幕中加入需要的 widget、更換自己喜歡的外觀等。特別的是,如果你不愛 Galaxy Z Flip6 內建的封面外觀選擇,也可以透過生成式 AI 來生成,而 AI 也會根據當時的天氣狀況來讓照片呈現有所變化。 另外,當使用者啟用 Galaxy AI 的雙向翻譯功能時,Galaxy Z Flip6 封面螢幕則可顯示雙方溝通所使用的語言,好讓溝通可以更順暢。 Motorola razr 50 Ultra 的封面螢幕則是從原先的 3.6 吋,提升到 4 吋。有別於 Galaxy Z Flip6 封面螢幕的獨特造型,Motorola razr 50 Ultra 的封面螢幕依然維持「滿版」設計,對於部分用戶來說,Motorola razr 50 Ultra 封面螢幕較為討喜。 針對封面螢幕,Motorola razr 50 Ultra 也提供了許多時鐘面板與可愛的外螢幕自訂項目。且 Motorola razr 50 Ultra 也提供了 moto ai 功能,使用者可以配合當天服飾穿搭生成桌布外觀。 Motorola razr 50 Ultra 封面螢幕可以直接使用 Google Gemini 功能,讓使用者不必事事都得開啟手機,僅需透過封面螢幕即可滿足大部分的應用。 小米首款進軍台灣市場的摺疊機 Xiaomi MIX Flip,其封面螢幕為 4.01 吋。有趣的是,大多數摺疊機封面螢幕僅能提供訊息通知、攝影畫面顯示等應用,但如果想要使用日常應用,都必須開啟手機內頁螢幕來使用。小米為了提供這方面的差異性,透過 Xiaomi HyperOS 針對封面螢幕操作設計,好讓使用者在不展開手機的情況下也能提供大多數的應用。 比較特別的是,Xiaomi MIX Flip 較其他兩款小摺疊機在封面螢幕的邊緣加入了子聽筒。會有這樣的設計者要在於,一般摺疊手機在收摺的狀態下雖然也能接聽電話,但是會以擴音的方式來接聽,大部分的使用者在公共場合可能就不方便接聽電話;但 Xiaomi MIX Flip 在封面螢幕邊緣加入了子聽筒後,就可在收摺的狀態下接聽電話時,依然維持通話的隱私性。...

title: La Presa Picachos alcanza casi el 75 por ciento de su capacidad: Protección Civil
content: Mazatlán, Sin.- La Presa Picachos , ubicada en el municipio de Mazatlán, se encuentra actualmente cerca del 75 por ciento de su capacidad , informó Eloy Ruiz Gastélum, coordinador de Protección Civil Municipal. A pesar de la circulación de imágenes en redes sociales que sugerían que la presa estaba rebosando, Ruiz Gastélum aclaró que estas no son actuales. Puedes leer: Jumapam realiza paro técnico en Potabilizadora Miravalles "No, no son recientes. Tengo entendido que está cerca del 75 por ciento aproximadamente", mencionó Ruiz Gastélum, señalando que las imágenes de la presa rebosando no son recientes. A diferencia del año pasado, cuando para estas mismas fechas la presa se encontraba en un 50 por ciento de su capacidad, este incremento representa una situación distinta para el manejo de los recursos hídricos en la región. Las autoridades mantienen un monitoreo constante para asegurar la seguridad de las comunidades aledañas. El funcionario no proporcionó detalles adicionales sobre posibles reportes de desbordamientos, reiterando que la situación está bajo control.

title: “먹고 싶은거 다 먹고 15kg 뺐다”...42세 서동주, 감량 비법은 ‘달밤에 이 운동’
creator: 매일경제
content: 변호사 겸 방송인 서동주(42)가 ‘오운완’(오늘도 운동 완료)을 제대로 인증했다. 서동주는 지난 12일 자신의 사회관계망서비스(SNS)에 “저는 이제 뛰어서 집 가요. 잘자요”란 글과 함께 사진을 올렸다. 사진 속 서동주는 저녁에 러닝을 마친 뒤 땀을 흘린 모습이었다. 서동주가 ‘어제의 일기’라며 올린 짧은 영상에서도 꾸준히 러닝을 하는 그의 모습이 엿보였다. 서동주는 테니스 레슨을 받는 모습을 공개하면서 “다이어트 하려 하는데 라면에 소시지, 삼각김밥, 맥주, 아이스크림까지 살뜰하게 챙겨 먹었다”며 “엄청나게 먹은 게 찔려서 달밤에 러닝했다”고 러닝에 대한 애정을 드러냈다. 앞서 서동주는 한 방송에서 15kg정도 감량했다고 밝힌 바 있다. 러닝은 걷기보다 빠른 속도로 양발이 순간적으로 바닥에서 떨어질 정도의 속도감을 유지하며 뛰는 동작 운동으로, 언제 어디서나 쉽게 할 수 있다는 장점이 있다. 또한, 걷기보다 운동 강도가 상대적으로 높고 심장, 폐, 근육 등에 강한 자극을 줘 체력 등 운동 능력을 향상시킬 수 있다. 러닝은 특히 심폐계에 적절한 자극을 줘 심폐 지구력을 높이는 전신 운동으로, 특별한 기술이나 높은 스피드를 고집해 구사하지 않고 본인만의 속도로 달리는 것이 좋다. 달리는 장소는 평탄하고 안정된 지면이 좋으며, 달리기 전에 달릴 코스와 대략적인 거리 등을 파악해 운동을 시작하는 것이 바람직하다....

title: 5 apps recomendadas para cuidar la salud mental y relajarnos
creator: Digna Irene Urrea
content: Facebook X LinkedIn WhatsApp Según cifras de la Organización Mundial de la Salud, 9 de cada 10 personas han sentido estrés durante el último año y un 40% de la población lo padece de manera constante; es decir, el estrés se ha convertido en una enfermedad silenciosa, generando repercusiones en el bienestar físico, mental y emocional. ¿Cómo cuidar nuestra salud mental a través de aplicaciones? Muchos usuarios de dispositivos móviles han comenzado a utilizar aplicaciones que les ayuden a gestionar sus niveles de estrés, mejorar sus hábitos de sueño e inclusive desconectarse un rato del mundo y las preocupaciones que los rodean , para aumentar la capacidad de regular las emociones, disminuir la tensión e incrementar el amor propio. Te puede interesar: Tres apps recomendadas para sobrellevar la menopausia Teniendo en cuenta este contexto, cada 15 de agosto se celebra el Día Mundial de la Relajación, una fecha que nos invita a dedicarle un tiempo al cuidado de la salud mental. HUAWEI se une a este llamado a través de diversas aplicaciones que puedes encontrar en AppGallery , la tienda de aplicaciones de la marca, Google Play y App Store. Relajación y Yoga Esta aplicación está diseñada para los amantes del yoga, pues cuenta con una amplia selección de accesorios, cursos gratuitos y libros de yoga diseñados para cada práctica. La herramienta te ofrece una...

title: Botafogo está escalado para enfrentar o Palmeiras; veja o time e onde assistir ao jogo
creator: redacao@odia.com.br (O Dia)
content: Rio - O Botafogo está escalado para enfrentar o Palmeiras no Estádio Nilton Santos, às 21h30 desta quarta-feira (14), pelo jogo de ida das oitavas de final da Libertadores. O técnico Artur Jorge, que tinha dúvidas na posição de centroavante , optou por iniciar a partida com Igor Jesus. Tiquinho Soares se recuperou recentemente de uma lesão no joelho direito e foi relacionado, mas fica no banco. Dessa forma, o Botafogo vai a campo com: John; Mateo Ponte, Bastos, Alexander Barboza e Cuiabano; Gregore e Marlon Freitas; Thiago Alamada, Luiz Henrique, Savarino e Igor Jesus . A partida desta noite terá transmissão ao vivo da TV Globo, da ESPN e do Star+.

title: Alan Kyerematen Criticizes Ministry of Information as “Waste Pipe”
creator: News Ghana
content: Alan Kyerematen, founder and leader of the Movement for Change, has criticized Ghana’s Ministry of Information, calling it a “waste pipe” and questioning its role and value in the current governmental structure. In a recent media engagement, Kyerematen argued that the Ministry does not effectively contribute to national development and represents a misallocation of resources. “What does the Ministry of Information do?” he asked, noting that mature economies often do not have such ministries. “It’s a waste of time. That Ministry does not add anything. I’m sorry to all my friends in the Ministry of Information. Still, you would make more money and be more productive in business than sitting in that department.” Kyerematen drew on his experience from the early 1980s, recalling his role in restructuring the Ministry of Information and establishing the Information Services Department (ISD). “When you do good work, the record is always there. My name is there, so I know what I’m talking about,” he reflected. He further suggested that the resources allocated to the Ministry of Information could be better utilized to support other crucial sectors. “You don’t need a Ministry of Information. You can save a lot of money and use it to support other important sectors,” Kyerematen concluded.

title: SM Group of the Philippines sees China as ‘formidable’ market force even amid uneasy ties
creator: Cheryl Arcibal
content: The group is looking to ramp up occupancy rates in some of its retail assets and expand the floor space in its flagship shopping mall there, according to a senior group official. The mainland’s 1.4 billion population will be a powerful source of growth, he added. “Our investments in China have been largely opportunistic,” Franklin Gomez, executive vice-president in charge of finance, said in an interview in Hong Kong on Wednesday. “We have not lost the fact that China has more than a billion consumers and they will continue to be a formidable market force.” 01:15 China posts 4.7% second-quarter growth, lower than expected The Manila-based conglomerate invests on the mainland’s property market through its 49.7 per cent-owned SM Prime, which owns eight malls in lower-tier cities, totalling 17.2 million square feet (1.6 million square metres). The occupancy rate averages about 85 per cent, Gomez said. China’s post-pandemic recovery has been hobbled by a prolonged property crisis and an underperforming stock market, hurting investment and consumer confidence. The economy grew 4.7 per cent last quarter, slowing from an annual pace of 5.3 per cent in the January-to-March quarter. Ties between China and the Philippines have been uneasy at best, amid territorial disputes that have dragged on for decades in the South China Sea. 02:49 China, Philippines differ over deal to stop clashes...

title: Ángela Ruíz habla de su participación en París 2024
creator: internet@elsiglodetorreon.com.mx (HILDA SEVILLA)
content: A los 18 años, la saltillense Ángela Ruiz Rosales ha alcanzado un logro que pocos pueden presumir, haber obtenido una medalla olímpica. La joven arquera coahuilense ganó el bronce en la disciplina de tiro con arco en los recientes Juegos Olímpicos de París, marcando un sueño cumplido en su carrera y abriendo la puerta a un futuro prometedor en el deporte internacional. Ángela, quien ahora disfruta de un merecido descanso en su ciudad natal, comparte la emoción y satisfacción que le ha dejado su participación en París. "Estar en casa de nuevo es increíble, extrañaba mucho Saltillo", comenta la joven atleta, aun con la felicidad del éxito reflejada en su rostro. Desde su llegada a la Villa Olímpica, Ángela sintió que estaba viviendo un sueño hecho realidad: "Cada momento fue pura emoción, desde que pisé la Villa hasta el último disparo en la competencia", recuerda con una sonrisa. El camino hacia el podio no fue fácil, pero su disciplina y dedicación demostraron ser la clave para alcanzar sus metas. "Cumplí muchísimos sueños en este viaje: participar en los Juegos Olímpicos, ganar una medalla, y hasta tuve la oportunidad de ir a Disney después de la competencia; realmente stoy muy contenta", comparte Ángela. El amor de Ángela por el tiro con arco nació cuando tenía apenas 9 años, acompañaba a sus hermanos a las prácticas y un entrenador la...

title: SOG jawans bust Maoist camp
content: Berhampur: Police busted a Maoist camp in Kandhamal district on Wednesday following an exchange of fire between Special Operation Group (SOG) personnel and rebels, on the eve of Independence Day. Police said several materials, including detonators and IEDs, were seized from the spot on Manik Saru hills on the Kandhamal-Kalahandi border.tnn We also published the following articles recently Fazilka police bust honey trap gang, arrest 8 including five women The Fazilka police dismantled a honey trapping and blackmailing gang in Jalalabad, arresting eight suspects, including five women and a police officer. The gang, led by Jotam Kaur from Ludhiana, lured victims into compromising situations to extort money. Authorities recovered cash, a car, and cheques from the suspects during the operation. Bhiwandi police bust gang manufacturing bogus injections for cattle The Thane crime branch in Bhiwandi uncovered a gang producing fake injections to boost milk yield in buffaloes and cows. The police raided a factory, arrested four individuals, and seized 3,315 injections worth over Rs 12 lakh. The gang leader, Jishan Shahnwaz Rathi, remains at large. The FDA is also investigating the case further. title: Panipat News: पूर्वांचल महासंघ ने विकास नगर में खोला दफ्तर
content: पानीपत। पूर्वांचल समाज के लोगों ने विधानसभा चुनाव से पहले विकास नगर में कार्यालय शुरू कर शहर की राजनीति में हवा ला दी है। इस तरह कार्यालय शुरू कर शहरी के साथ ग्रामीण अंचल के समीकरण तेज कर दिए हैं। पूर्वांचल महासंघ द्वारा विकास नगर की गली नंबर-27 में बुधवार को हवन कर कार्यालय शुरू किया। पूर्वांचल महासंघ के मीडिया प्रमुख चंदन चौहान ने बताया कि पूर्वांचल महासंघ करीब 26 संस्थाओं के साथ को-ऑर्डिनेट कर सभी संस्थाओं को मजबूत और परस्पर सहयोग कर एक साथ लेकर चल रही है। सुशील ठाकुर, लक्ष्मण सिंह व विजेंद्र यादव ने बताया कि यहां फ्री सीएससी पूर्वांचल वासियों के लिए चलाया जाएगा। पूर्वांचल वासी को बिना पैसे दिए सरकारी खर्च पर काम करना होगा। इसमें राशन कार्ड, वोटर कार्ड व आधार कार्ड शामिल हैं। इस मौके पर पूनम रामदेव, निरंजन सिंह, प्रियव्रत सिंह,रामबाबू झा, महेश कुमार वर्मा, रंजीत झा ,राम बालक कुशवाहा व अरुण सिंह उपस्थित रहे।

title: 棍網球|女子U20世錦賽 港隊全力備戰 望首仗主場贏牙買加
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 亞洲首辦的世界棍網球女子U20錦標賽,將於即日起至8月24日將在香港舉行。賽事雲集20支頂尖青少年隊伍,東道主香港將在今晚7時在旺角場鬥牙買加,力爭打響頭炮。 今次世界棍網球女子U20錦標賽,參賽球隊包括香港、衛冕冠軍美國、加拿大等,將帶來64場精彩絕倫的比賽。開幕戰、兩場4強、銅牌賽和決賽將於旺角大球場上演。另外,深水埗運動場、石硤尾公園人造草足球場、九龍仔運動場都會上演各組分組賽。 U20港隊近期積極備戰,去到西沙 Go PARK Sports 棍網球專用場地練習,以色列及加拿大同樣選址此地練習。港隊被編入D組,對手有英格蘭、日本、牙買加及愛爾蘭,每組首兩名入8強,餘下12隊將打名次賽,決賽在8月24日晚上6時30分在旺角場舉行。 今次賽事,WLTV將直播所有6 4仗。 2024世界棍網球女子U20錦標賽(只列旺角場舉行秩序) 15/8 17:00 開幕典禮 19:00香港vs牙買加 22/8 16:00準決賽 19:00準決賽 24/8 15:30銅牌賽 18:30金牌賽 (WLTV將直播全部賽事) 訂票 https://bit.ly/4dATw3H

title: Indian people making a big impact in America and other countries
creator: GenZeditor
content: Did you know that there are over 5 million people of Indian origin living in the United States? That’s a lot of people! Even though they make up only 1.5% of the US population, they’re doing amazing things in many areas like technology, business, healthcare, and education. Here are some cool facts: – Indian-Americans earn about twice as much as the average American family. – They pay a big chunk of taxes in the US, helping the country’s economy. – They’re also sending money back to India to help their families and communities. It’s not just in America – Indian people are doing great things in other countries too, like in the Middle East and Europe. All together, there are about 30 million Indians living in different parts of the world! This is really good for India because: It shows how talented and hardworking Indian people are. It helps build good relationships between India and other countries. The money sent back to India helps its economy grow. Some people think India should have a special government department to help more Indians find good jobs in other countries. This could help solve unemployment problems in India and also help countries that need more workers. The success of Indians living abroad is something to be proud of. It shows that Indian people can achieve great things wherever they go!

title: AltStore PAL drops its annual subscription thanks to a grant from Epic
creator: bfadmin
content: AltStore PAL, a third-party iOS app store that’s available in the EU, is dropping its annual €1.50 (plus tax) subscription after receiving a “MegaGrant” from developer Epic Games. AltStore originally charged the subscription to help cover Apple’s Core Technology Fee (CTF), which is a fee third-party app marketplaces have to pay for each annual app install. Epic uses MegaGrants as a way to “sponsor the development of exciting projects that may not otherwise have enough funding to fully realize,” . The grants are typically meant for smaller teams using Epic’s technologies to “bring bold, challenging, and insanely creative dreams to life,” but in this case, Epic awarded the grant for “innovation in app...

title: Vi estos tres juegos para Nintendo Switch en oferta, ahorré más de 1,000 pesos y ahora puedo jugar cientos de horas
creator: Luis Acosta
content: El amplio catálogo de videojuegos que Nintendo Switch tiene es uno de los más grandes en la historia de los videojuegos, y tres de los mejores son Mario Kart 8 Deluxe , Super Smash Bros Ultimate y Mario Party Superstars . Ahora, puedes conseguir un paquete con los tres juegos por 2,499 pesos en Amazon México. Ya que cada título ronda cerca de los 1,200 pesos de manera digital en la eShop, el ahorro es casi lo de un juego completo. Nintendo Switch paquete de juegos que incluyen Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, Super Smash Bros Ultimate, Mario Party Super Star Los tres juegos para Nintendo Switch son una selección de títulos enfocados a la pura diversión. Mientras que con Mario Kart 8 Deluxe podemos recorrer a velocidades desfrenadas las pistas de autos, con Super Smash Bros Ultimate pondremos a prueba las habilidades en el combate, y con Mario Party Superstars los mini juegos serán un escaparate para la diversión con amigos o en familia. Si además necesitas un Nintendo Switch extra o quieres uno nuevo, en Amazon México también puedes encontrar el Switch Lite por 3,150 pesos o el Switch OLED por 5,265 pesos. El paquete de juegos es vendido por un tercero pero enviado por Amazon México , por lo cual cuenta con entrega gratis para todos los usuarios, envíos más rápidos con suscripción de Amazon Prime , pagos de hasta 12 meses sin intereses y cobertura de daño opcional. title: Judge tells Google to brace for shakeup of Android app store as punishment for running a monopoly
content: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — A federal judge on Wednesday indicated he will order major changes in Google’s Android app store to punish the company for engineering a system that a jury declared an illegal monopoly that has hurt millions of consumers and app developers. Over the course of a three-hour hearing in San Francisco, U.S. District Judge James Donato made it clear that the forthcoming shake-up he is contemplating will probably include a mandate requiring Google's Play Store for Android phones offer consumers a choice to download alternative app stores Donato has been weighing how to punish the Google since last December when a jury declared the Play Store a monopoly following a four-week trial. The verdict centered on Google's nearly exclusive control over distribution of apps designed for Android phones and the billing systems for the digital commerce occurring within them — a system that generates billions of dollars in annual revenue for the company. In protesting the judge's potential requirements, Google has raised the specter of consumers' devices being infected by malicious software downloaded from third-party app stores, triggering “security chaos.” But Donato repeatedly hammered on the need for a major overhaul of the Play Store, even if it causes Google headaches and huge bills that the company has estimated could run as high as $600 million, depending on what the...

title: OMS declara brote de mpox como emergencia de salud global
creator: Redacción
content: Ginebra, 14 ago (VOA) – La Organización Mundial de la Salud ha declarado los brotes de mpox en la República Democrática del Congo y otras partes de África como una emergencia global de salud, con casos confirmados en niños y adultos en más de una docena de países y la propagación de una nueva forma del virus. Existen pocas dosis de la vacuna disponibles en el continente. A principios de esta semana, los Centros para el Control y la Prevención de Enfermedades de África (Africa CDC, por sus siglas en inglés) anunciaron que los brotes de mpox constituían una emergencia de salud pública, con más de 500 muertes, e hizo un llamado a la ayuda internacional para ayudar a detener la propagación del virus. “Esto es algo que debería preocuparnos a todos... La posibilidad de una mayor propagación en África y más allá es muy preocupante”, dijo el director general de la OMS, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus. Africa CDC señaló anteriormente que el mpox, también conocido como viruela símica, se había detectado en 13 países este año, y que más de 96 % de todos los casos y muertes se han producido en el Congo. Los casos se han disparado a 160 % y las muertes han aumentado 19 % en comparación con el mismo período del año pasado. Hasta ahora, se han producido más de 14.000 casos y 524 personas han muerto. “Estamos ahora en una situación donde (el mpox) plantea un riesgo...

title: Seven state police personnel among 19 get gallantry medals
content: Ranchi: The ministry of home affairs has recognized the bravery and dedication of seven Jharkhand police personnel by awarding them medals for gallantry on the occasion of Independence Day . Additionally, 11 police personnel have been honoured with medals for their meritorious services. A fire service personnel from the state has also been recognized with a medal for gallantry. According to a police headquarters statement, the recipients of the gallantry medal include Deepak Pandey, the current SP of Garwah who previously served as the DSP (operation), SI Vishwajit Kumar Singh, ASI Sachidanand Singh, head constable Umesh Singh, and constables Gopal Ganjhu, Subhash Das, and Ravindra Toppo. Pyare Lal Tamwar, a fire services driver, was awarded a gallantry medal. On May 16, 2023, he extinguished a dangerous fire in a coal tar tank, protecting local residents and vehicles. Fire services wing DG Anil Palta said this was the first instance of a fire personnel from the state receiving the gallantry medal. The 11 police personnel honoured for their meritorious services include head constables Salomi Minz, Sanjay Oraon, Rituraj, Rajendra Ram, Arun Oraon, and Sanjay Kumar and constables Randhir Kumar Singh, Vimal Kumar Khetri, Hema Rani Kullu, Rekha Kumari, and Sanjeev Kumar Gupta. title: Himachal: हिमाचल के चतुर्थ श्रेणी कर्मचारियों की सेवानिवृत्ति आयु बढ़ाने की तैयारी, वित्त विभाग को भेजा पत्र
creator: अमर उजाला ब्यूरो, शिमला
content: हिमाचल प्रदेश के चतुर्थ श्रेणी कर्मचारियों की सेवानिवृत्ति आयु बढ़ाने की तैयारी शुरू हो गई है। 58 से 60 वर्ष सेवानिवृत्ति आयु करने के लिए कार्मिक विभाग ने वित्त विभाग को पत्र भेजा है। विभिन्न चतुर्थ श्रेणी कर्मचारी संगठनों की मांग पर सरकार ने इस बाबत विचार शुरू किया है। हिमाचल प्रदेश हाईकोर्ट के मई 2024 को इस संदर्भ में आए आदेशों पर भी सरकार ने अमल करना शुरू कर दिया है। राज्य सरकार को प्रस्ताव भेजने से पहले कार्मिक विभाग ने वित्त विभाग से मामले को लेकर पूरी जानकारी मांगी है।

title: Football-Espagne : le père de Lamine Yamal poignardé dans un parking, mais ses jours ne seraient pas en danger
creator: Alioune Badara Mbadj
content: XALIMANEWS-Ce soir, Le média espagnol la révélé que Mounir Nasraoui, père de la jeune star du FC Barcelone, Lamine Yamal, a été poignardé dans un parking de Mataró, près de Barcelone. Transporté d’urgence à l’hôpital, son état initialement jugé grave s’est stabilisé. Mounir Nasraoui aurait été attaqué alors qu’il promenait son chien, touché dans le dos, d’après les premiers témoignages. Après l’incident, la police régionale, en collaboration avec la police municipale, a immédiatement ouvert une enquête et interrogé les témoins présents sur les lieux, rapporte Footmercato Il reste en observation à l’hôpital de Can Ruti. Et selon plusieurs médias espagnols, les jours du paternel de Lamine Yamal ne seraient plus en danger

title: President Award: हिमाचल की एएसआई रंजना को राष्ट्रपति पदक, 50 लापता बच्चों की तलाश कर घर पहुंचाया
creator: अमर उजाला ब्यूरो, शिमला
content: एचआरटीसी की बस में बम रखने का पर्दाफाश इंस्पेक्टर नागदेव ने किया था। हिमाचल में उस समय भाजपा की सरकार थी। शांता कुमार मुख्यमंत्री थे। एचआरटीसी की बस चंडीगढ़ से धर्मशाला आ रही थी। सूचना मिली कि बस में किसी ने बम रखा है। उन्होंने मैहतपुर-ऊना बैरियर में बस खड़ी कराकर बम को बाहर निकाला था। इस बस में 56 लोग सवार थे। जिला कुल्लू में सेवाएं देते हुए भांग उखाड़ो अभियान में अहम योगदान रहा है। कई चरस, अफीम वाले सलाखों के पीछे पहुंचाए। हाईकोर्ट से भागे आरोपी को भी उन्होंने पकड़ा है। वह सराहनीय सेवाएं के लिए पुरस्कार देने के लिए खुश हैं।

title: Philadelphia man pleads guilty to killing neighbor in dispute over snoring
content: Philadelphia police released a dashcam video of two armed suspects approaching a car before the driver opens fire on them. A Philadelphia man has pleaded guilty to stabbing and killing his neighbor after the neighbor threatened him over his loud snoring. Christopher Casey , 56, of Upper Morland, was sentenced in Montgomery County Court on Aug. 7 to 11.5 to 23 months in county jail followed by three years' probation after pleading guilty to the manslaughter charge and possession of an instrument of crime, according to court documents. Casey was originally charged with third-degree murder in the Jan. 14 death of 62-year-old Robert Wallace, who lived next-door in a duplex and with whom he shared a common wall. Christopher James, the man who is accused of fatally stabbing his neighbor over a "snoring" battle, gets nearly a year in prison. (Montgomery County District Attorney) Prosecutors said Casey stabbed Wallace after the other man pushed in his first-floor window and threatened to kill Casey over his snoring. Relatives of the victim said he had been unable to sleep due to the noise, and his fatigue had affected his life and ability to work. MICHIGAN FATHER OF 2 SHOT AND KILLED AFTER DISPUTE WITH NEIGHBOR OVER MULCH: ‘A GENTLE SOUL’ Casey apologized to Wallace’s family in court, calling the killing "unfortunate." title: HP Youth Congress: युवा कांग्रेस के अध्यक्ष के लिए विधानसभा अध्यक्ष के बेटे सहित 18 में होगा मुकाबला
creator: अमर उजाला ब्यूरो, शिमला
content: अखिल भारतीय कांग्रेस कमेटी ने अध्यक्ष पद के लिए पूर्व कार्यकारिणी के आठ पदाधिकारियों को हाई परफार्मेंस लिस्ट में शामिल किया है। यह आठ युवा चुनाव में सीधे अध्यक्ष पद के लिए दावेदार बन गए हैं। इनके अलावा दस युवाओं ने नामांकन किए हैं। ऐसे में अब 18 युवाओं में अध्यक्ष पद के लिए मुकाबला होगा। विधानसभा अध्यक्ष के बेटे सुनाभ पठानिया भंग की गई कार्यकारिणी में चंबा के युवा कांग्रेस अध्यक्ष थे। इन्हें पार्टी हाईकमान ने सीधे अध्यक्ष पद का चुनाव लड़ाने का फैसला लिया है। इनके अलावा कांग्रेस नेता चेतराम ठाकुर के पुत्र और जिला मंडी के पूर्व अध्यक्ष तरुण ठाकुर भी परफार्मेंस लिस्ट में शामिल हैं। अध्यक्ष पद के लिए इन दो युवाओं के अलावा जितेंद्र धीमान, एनएसयूआई के पूर्व प्रदेश छत्तर सिंह ठाकुर, डॉ. केवल कुमार, राहुल चौहान, अखिल अग्निहोत्री, अब्दुल खालिक, साक्षी शर्मा, प्रेम डोगरा, वरिंद्र जालटा, रजनीश मेहता, चंद्रमणी, अमला कश्यप, पूनम चोपड़ा, सचिन ठाकुर, अर्जुन सिंह और अनु कुमारी मराठा के बीच मुकाबला होगा। उधर, युवा कांग्रेस के महासचिव पद के लिए 47 युवाओं में मुकाबला होगा। राज्य कमेटी में एक अध्यक्ष, 12 उपाध्यक्ष और 48 महासचिव चुने जाएंगे। जिला कमेटी में 31, विधानसभा कमेटी में 27 और ब्लॉक कमेटी में 17 पदाधिकारी चुने जाएंगे।

title: Austin Dillon and Team Launch Appeal Against NASCAR Decision to Penalize Driver After Cook Out 400
content: Austin Dillon's victory at the recent Cook Out 400 at Richmond Raceway has quickly soured as NASCAR gave significant penalties to him and his team, Richard Childress Racing. The race, which descended into controversy following aggressive behavior from the driver against the likes of Joey Logano and Denny Hamlin, concluded with Dillon being stripped of playoff eligibility and other penalties that his team is now contesting. The climactic moments of the race saw Dillon, driving the No. 3 Bass Pro Shops car, take the win using tactics deemed as being "conduct detrimental to the sport." In the overtime laps, Dillon hit Logano's rear bumper, causing him to spin out. Shortly after, as Hamlin positioned his car to overtake, Dillon made contact again, causing a crash that ultimately gave him the win. In response to these actions, NASCAR stripped Dillon of the race win's playoff benefits and docked him 25 driver and owner points. Additionally, Austin Dillon's spotter, Brandon Benesch, received a three-race suspension for purportedly inciting these aggressive moves. Elton Sawyer, NASCAR's Senior Vice President of Competition, firmly stated, as : "In our view that crossed a line, without a doubt... anything that we feel like from a sanctioning body that has crossed the line... we are going to get involved." Richard Childress Racing has now expressed strong disagreement with NASCAR's...

title: Poonch News: सातवें जत्थे में पहुंचे 750 श्रद्धालु, स्वयंभू शिवलिंग का जलाभिषेक किया
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, पुंछ
content: आठवें जत्थे में 400 श्रद्धालु पहुंचे पुंछ संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी पुंछ। बूढ़ा अमरनाथ यात्रा के सातवें जत्थे में 750 श्रद्धालु पहुंचे। श्रद्धालुओं ने बुधवार को भगवान भोलेनाथ के स्वयंभू शिवलिंग का जलाभिषेक किया। वहीं आठवें जत्थे में 400 श्रद्धालु पुंछ पहुंचे। विश्व हिन्दू परिषद बजरंग की तरफ आयोजित बूढ़ा अमरनाथ की यात्रा में देश के विभिन्न भागों से सातवें जत्थे में आए श्रद्धालुओं ने भगवान भोलेनाथ के स्वयंभू शिवलिंग का जलाभिषेक और पूजन किया। वहीं देर शाम को जम्मू से निकला यात्रा का 400 श्रद्धालुओं का आठवां जत्था पुंछ नगर स्थित यात्रा मैदान पहुंचा। यहां श्रद्धालुओं को कई प्रकार के लजीज व्यंजन परोसे गए। गौरतबल है कि मंगलवार देर शाम को पुंछ पहुंचे बूढ़ा अमरनाथ यात्रा के 7वें जत्थे में श्रद्धालु पुंछ पहुंचे थे। रात को पुंछ में विश्राम करने के बाद सुबह 7 बजे पुंछ से विश्व हिंदू परिषद एवं बजरंग दल के पदाधिकारियों निशु गुप्ता, सौरभ सूदन, पंडित गोपाल कृष्ण और दीपक भल्ला की अगुवाई में 8.30 बजे बूढ़ा अमरनाथ मंदिर पहुंचे। यहां कतारों में लगकर बारी पर भगवान भोलेनाथ के स्वयंभू शिवलिंग के दर्शन करने के बाद जम्मू की तरफ लौट गए।

title: NASCAR Reports Death Of Roy McCauley As Team Penske Release Statement
content: The NASCAR community is in mourning following the announcement of Roy McCauley's passing on Wednesday evening. McCauley, a revered figure and longtime team leader for Team Penske, has left an indelible mark on the racing world. In a heartfelt statement released by Team Penske, they expressed their profound loss: "It is with great sadness that we say goodbye to someone that has given so much to our team for over twenty years." Team Penske statement on the passing of Roy McCauley. Roy McCauley's career with Team Penske was marked by numerous achievements and a dedication that resonated throughout the auto racing community. He played a pivotal role as the crew chief during Team Penske's first Daytona 500 victory in 2008 and was instrumental in overhauling the team's processes within their NASCAR assembly shop. Described as a "make it happen" kind of person, McCauley was also a gifted engineer whose innovations and leadership were central to the team's success. The loss of such a significant figure has prompted an outpouring of tributes and condolences from across the auto racing community. Team Penske further elaborated on his impact: "Roy McCauley was a 'make it happen' kind of guy. He was a gifted engineer and one of our leaders. He served as crew chief for Team Penske's first Daytona 500 victory in 2008 and then took the lead in transforming our processes within our NASCAR...

title: What does decline in sportsmanship say about our society? | The Ethical Life podcast
content: Hosts Richard Kyte and Scott Rada discuss the concerning trend of poor sportsmanship observed at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris. According to Kyte, the decline in graceful acceptance of defeat is not limited to the Olympics, but is evident across various levels of sports, from professional leagues to youth athletics. He pointed to incidents of abusive behavior from parents toward referees and players as indicative of a broader societal issue. "There's plenty of things indicating that sportsmanship is declining, and I think it's an indication that we have as a society that's more and more focusing on the outcomes themselves and not on performance," Kyte said. However, Kyte also highlighted examples of athletes who demonstrated exceptional sportsmanship, such as Noah Lyles and Josh Kerr, who were able to handle both victory and defeat with humility and grace. The discussion also touched on the role of media coverage in shaping the public's perception of the Olympics. Rada and Kyte agreed that the extensive focus on personal stories and medal ceremonies can sometimes overshadow the raw competition and diverse range of events. "I really wish American coverage spent a little more time on the sports themselves," Kyte said, suggesting that the networks should aim for a more balanced and representative portrayal of the Olympic Games. The conversation ultimately underscored the...

title: هند در تکاپوی پیمان‌های منطقه‌ای
creator: info@sharghdaily.com (sharghdaily)
content: ‌آنیل وادهوا*: پیمان‌های منطقه‌ای و شراکت با همسایگان و کشورهای آسیایی نزدیک به هند، برای این کشور اهمیت ویژه دارد. مصداق این مسئله «ابتکار خلیج بنگال برای همکاری‌های چند‌بخشی فنی و اقتصادی» موسوم به «بیمستک» است که سازمانی متشکل از کشورهای بنگلادش، هند، سریلانکا، تایلند، میانمار، بوتان و نپال به شمار می‌آید. هدف این سازمان منطقه‌ای رفع شکاف بین جنوب و جنوب‌ شرق آسیا، ارتقای ظرفیت کشورهای عضو و همچنین کشورهای منطقه خلیج بنگال و کاهش اثرات نامطلوب جهانی‌شدن با استفاده از منابع منطقه‌ای و مزیت‌های جغرافیایی است. منطقه تحت پوشش بیمستک جمعیتی حدود 1.73 میلیارد نفر را در خود جا داده و مجموع تولید ناخالص داخلی آن بیش از 5.2 تریلیون دلار است. دبیرخانه دائمی سازمان از آگوست 2014 در داکا فعال بوده و کارگروه دائمی در نشست سران راهکارهایی را ارائه می‌دهد. با اجرائی‌شدن منشور بیمستک این نهاد شخصیت حقوقی یافته و توانسته وارد گفت‌وگوی دیپلماتیک ساختارمند شود. خلیج بنگال مسیرهای تجارت دریایی بین‌المللی بین اقیانوس هند و اقیانوس آرام را به هم پیوند می‌دهد. اتصال دریایی برای تجارت و امنیت حیاتی است. کشورهای بیمستک قطب برخی محصولات و خدمات جهانی مانند پوشاک (بنگلادش)، خدمات دیجیتال (هند)، خدمات دریایی (سریلانکا)، کالاهای بادوام مصرفی (تایلند) و گردشگری (نپال و بوتان) شده‌اند. بنابراین، همکاری بیشتر بین آنها منجر به تجارت و رشد بیشتر درون سازمان بیمستک خواهد شد که روزبه‌روز بیشتر جای نهاد بی‌اثر‌شده «اتحادیه همکاری‌های منطقه‌ای جنوب آسیا» را می‌گیرد. بیمستک سازمانی بخش‌محور بوده و...

title: Ivonescimab (PD-1/VEGF) Received Priority Review from China's NMPA for First-Line Treatment of PD-L1 Positive NSCLC
content: The Second Indication of Ivonescimab in NSCLC 2L+ EGFRm NSCLC Already Approved in May 2024 HONG KONG , Aug. 15, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Akeso, Inc. (HKEX: 9926.HK) ("Akeso,") today announced that the National Center for Drug Evaluation of the State Drug Administration of the People's Republic of China (NMPA CDE) has granted priority review of the supplemental New Drug Application (sNDA) to 依达方® (ivonescimab), a first-in-class PD-1/VEGF bi-specific antibody developed by Akeso, as monotherapy for first-line treatment of PD-L1 positive (PD-L1 TPS≥1%) locally advanced or metastatic non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC). This marks the second indication for which ivonescimab has been granted priority review following the treatment of EGFR-mutant non-squamous NSCLC that has progressed after EGFR-TKI therapy, highlighting its significant clinical value. This new indication application for ivonescimab is based on the HARMONi-2 (AK112-303) study. At a prespecified interim analysis conducted by an independent Data Monitoring Committee, ivonescimab demonstrated a statistically significant and clinically meaningful improvement in PFS by blinded independent radiology review committee (BICR) compared to pembrolizumab, and the hazard ratio (HR) was significantly better than expected. There are no known Phase III clinical trials in NSCLC which have shown a statistically significant improvement...

title: Adventist HealthCare Earns Top Workplaces Recognition
creator: By Adventist HealthCare
content: Hospital System Stands Alone in D.C. Region with Its Second Consecutive Rankings GAITHERSBURG, Md. , Aug. 14, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Adventist HealthCare has again been honored as a great place to work, earning a spot on The Washington Post's list of Top Workplaces 2024 in the Washington, D.C. , region. The hospital system also ranked among the nation's best in its industry, capturing a Top Workplaces for Healthcare 2024 award. The Washington Post invited more than 8,800 employers in the Washington, D.C. , region to participate in its survey. Just 250 organizations were named to its Top Workplaces rankings across public and private industries, nonprofits and government agencies. Adventist HealthCare was the only hospital system on the list, and one of just 23 honorees with more than 1,000 employees. On the national level, Adventist HealthCare was named among the Top Workplaces for Healthcare 2024 based on employee feedback about an inclusive and supportive culture, connection between team members, employee development, clear communication, and other factors. Fewer than 3% of eligible organizations earned a national Top Workplaces industry designation. Adventist HealthCare was the only hospital system from the D.C. region to earn the national ranking. Adventist HealthCare made both the regional and national lists in 2023. "It is great to know that we are honored across the...

title: What does decline in sportsmanship say about our society? | The Ethical Life podcast
content: Episode 155: Hosts Richard Kyte and Scott Rada discuss the concerning trend of poor sportsmanship observed at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris. According to Kyte, the decline in graceful acceptance of defeat is not limited to the Olympics, but is evident across various levels of sports, from professional leagues to youth athletics. He pointed to incidents of abusive behavior from parents toward referees and players as indicative of a broader societal issue. "There's plenty of things indicating that sportsmanship is declining, and I think it's an indication that we have as a society that's more and more focusing on the outcomes themselves and not on performance," Kyte said. However, Kyte also highlighted examples of athletes who demonstrated exceptional sportsmanship, such as Noah Lyles and Josh Kerr, who were able to handle both victory and defeat with humility and grace. The discussion also touched on the role of media coverage in shaping the public's perception of the Olympics. Rada and Kyte agreed that the extensive focus on personal stories and medal ceremonies can sometimes overshadow the raw competition and diverse range of events. "I really wish American coverage spent a little more time on the sports themselves," Kyte said, suggesting that the networks should aim for a more balanced and representative portrayal of the Olympic Games. The conversation ultimately...

title: Mercato - PSG : Luis Enrique ferait le coup et boucle un gros transfert
content: Visiblement très actif sur le mercato du PSG, Luis Enrique s'implique personnellement pour convaincre certains joueurs de signer. C'était le cas pour Joao Neves il y a quelques jours, et le technicien espagnol a remis ça avec Désiré Doué. Un discours très persuasif puisqu'il a réussi à convaincre le jeune Rennais de recaler le Bayern Munich pour s'engager avec le PSG. Ces derniers jours, le mercato du PSG a connu un sacré coup d'accélérateur. Et pour cause, alors que Matvey Safonov est longtemps resté l'unique recrue du club parisien, tout s'est accéléré ces dernières heures avec les signatures coup sur coup de Joao Neves (Benfica) et Willian Pacho (Eintracht Francfort) pour respectivement 70M€ (dont 10M€ de bonus) et 40M€. Et il n'aura pas fallu attendre longtemps pour voir arriver la quatrième recrue du PSG . Mercato : Le PSG veut boucler un transfert record ! https://t.co/sJ369bJ7Kw pic.twitter.com/GwrzqjvSu5 En effet, comme annoncé par différents médias, un accord total a été trouvé entre le PSG et le Stade Rennais pour le transfert de Désiré Doué . Le montant de la transaction avoisinerait les 60M€, bonus compris, et Luis Enrique aurait eu un rôle clé pour convaincre le jeune Français de recaler le Bayern Munich comme l'affirme Fabrizio Romano qui rappelle que le technicien espagnol était déjà intervenu auprès de Joao Neves pour faire...

title: MP Weather Forecast: एमपी में 15 अगस्त को कैसा रहेगा मौसम? भोपाल- इंदौर समेत कई जिलों में गरज चमक के साथ बारिश की चेतावनी
content: भोपाल: मध्य प्रदेश में तेज बारिश का सिलसिला फिलहाल कम होता दिखाई दे रहा है। पूर्वी मध्य प्रदेश के जिलों को छोड़ दें तो बुधवार को पश्चिम मध्य प्रदेश के जिलों में कुछ जिलों में सिर्फ बूंदाबांदी हुई। छतरपुर के खजुराहो में सर्वाधिक बारिश हुई। यहां सुबह 8:30 से शाम के 5:30 तक 30 मिलीमीटर बारिश रिकॉर्ड हुई। वहीं सिवनी में भी काफी पानी गिरा। यहां दिन भर में 29 मिली मीटर बारिश दर्ज हुआ। सीधी में 16 मिलीमीटर पानी गिरा है। उमरिया में भी अच्छा पानी गिरा। यहां 27 मिली मीटर बारिश रिकॉर्ड हुई। मलाजखंड में 4, टीकमगढ़ में 7, सतना में 0.1, नौगांव में 3, मंडला में 7, जबलपुर में 8, छिंदवाड़ा में 5, पचमढ़ी में 3 और गुना में 0.4 मिलीलीटर पानी गिरा। अब तक कितना हुआ बारिश अब तक बारिश के आंकड़े को देखें तो मध्य प्रदेश में शुरू हुए मानसूनी सीजन 1 जून से लेकर 14 अगस्त की स्थिति में प्रदेश में 14% अधिक बारिश हो चुकी है। पूर्वी मध्य प्रदेश में औसत से 13% ज्यादा पानी बरस चुका है। जबकि पश्चिमी मध्य प्रदेश के जिलों में औसत से 17% अधिक बारिश दर्ज हुई है। कई जिलों में बारिश की चेतावनी मौसम विभाग ने आने वाले दिनों में भी कुछ जिलों में बारिश का अनुमान जताया है। गुरुवार को सागर, दतिया में भारी बारिश और गरज चमक की स्थिति बनने की चेतावनी जारी की गई है। वहीं मुरैना, ग्वालियर, शिवपुरी, विदिशा, राजगढ़, रायसेन, टीकमगढ़, निवाड़ी, छतरपुर, सीधी, सिंगरौली, शहडोल, अनूपपुर, डिंडोरी, दमोह, मंडला, बालाघाट, सिवनी, पांढुर्ना, छिंदवाड़ा, बैतूल, नीमच में मध्यम बारिश हो सकती है। जबकि शिवपुरी, गुना, अशोकनगर, मंदसौर, सीहोर, भोपाल,...

title: Soaring new car inventories drive down used car prices in B.C.
creator: Adam Campbell
content: A significant increase in new car inventories is cooling the heated used car market across the country. In British Columbia, new car prices have increased by 1.4 per cent year-over-year from an average of $67,827 to $68,776, according to a second-quarter report from AutoTrader released late last month. In comparison, the average price of a used car in the province has decreased by a whopping 7.5 per cent year over year – the third-lowest decline in Canada – from $43,946 to $40,651. This comes as inventory of new vehicles has ramped up by 70 per cent. The Bank of Canada, meanwhile, has been cutting its overnight rate in recent months, allowing for lower interest rates on car loans. New car interest rates from manufacturers have decreased from 6.2 per cent by the end of last year, to 5.3 per cent this past quarter. The cost of a new car in Canada is now averaging $66,807, an increase of 0.8 per cent year over year. A boost in new car sales and trade-ins have led buyers away from purchasing used cars, triggering an accumulation of used car supply, decreasing average prices of used cars by 8.3 per cent annually to $36,342 nationwide. This has opened up opportunities for buyers, especially for luxury used vehicles, which saw a 10.4-per-cent drop since the second quarter of 2023. In Canada, the three most-searched vehicles were the Ford F-150 at the top, selling new for $73,902 and...

title: ‘ಸ್ವಪ್ನಮಂಟಪ’ಕ್ಕೆ ‘ಯು’ ಪ್ರಮಾಣಪತ್ರ
creator: ​ಪ್ರಜಾವಾಣಿ ವಾರ್ತೆ
content: ನಿರ್ದೇಶಕ ಬರಗೂರು ರಾಮಚಂದ್ರಪ್ಪ ಅವರು ತಮ್ಮದೇ ಕಾದಂಬರಿಯನ್ನು ಆಧರಿಸಿ ನಿರ್ದೇಶಿಸಿರುವ ‘ಸ್ವಪ್ನಮಂಟಪ’ ಚಿತ್ರಕ್ಕೆ ಸೆನ್ಸಾರ್‌ ಮಂಡಳಿಯು ‘ಯು’ ಪ್ರಮಾಣಪತ್ರ ನೀಡಿದೆ. ಚಿತ್ರಕ್ಕೆ ಬರಗೂರು ಅವರೇ ಚಿತ್ರಕಥೆ, ಸಂಭಾಷಣೆ, ಗೀತರಚನೆ ಮಾಡಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ವಿಜಯ ರಾಘವೇಂದ್ರ ಹಾಗೂ ರಂಜಿನಿ ರಾಘವನ್‌ ಮುಖ್ಯಭೂಮಿಕೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಇದ್ದಾರೆ. ಬಾಬುನಾಯ್ಕ್ ತಮ್ಮ ಮಲೈಮಹದೇಶ್ವರ ಎಂಟರ್‌ಪ್ರೈಸಸ್‌ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಯಿಂದ ‘ಸ್ವಪ್ನಮಂಟಪ’ ಚಿತ್ರವನ್ನು ನಿರ್ಮಿಸಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ‘ಚಿತ್ರವು ಪಾರಂಪರಿಕ ಸ್ಥಳಗಳ ಮಹತ್ವ ಮತ್ತು ಸಂರಕ್ಷಣೆಯನ್ನು ಪ್ರತಿಪಾದಿಸುವ ಕಥಾವಸ್ತುವನ್ನು ಒಳಗೊಂಡಿದೆ. ಒಂದು ಹಳ್ಳಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ರಾಜನೊಬ್ಬ ನಿರ್ಮಿಸಿದ ಸ್ವಪ್ನಮಂಟಪವನ್ನು ಕೆಡವಿ ಹಾಕುವ ಪ್ರಯತ್ನವನ್ನು ಕೆಲವರು ಮಾಡಿದಾಗ, ಕಥಾನಾಯಕ ಮತ್ತು ನಾಯಕಿ ಜನರನ್ನು ಸಂಘಟಿಸಿ ಸ್ವಪ್ನಮಂಟಪವನ್ನು ಉಳಿಸಿ ಸರ್ಕಾರದ ಅಧಿಕೃತ ಸ್ಮಾರಕದ ಪಟ್ಟಿಗೆ ಸೇರಿಸುವ ಮೂಲಕ ಚಾರಿತ್ರಿಕ ಸ್ಮಾರಕಗಳ ಪರಂಪರೆಯನ್ನು ಎತ್ತಿ ಹಿಡಿಯುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಸಾಂಕೇತಿಕವಾದ ಈ ಕಥಾವಸ್ತುವು ಪಾರಂಪರಿಕ ಸ್ಥಳಗಳ ರಕ್ಷಣೆ ವಿಷಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರಾತಿನಿಧಿಕವೂ ಆಗುತ್ತದೆ’ ಎಂದಿದ್ದಾರೆ ಬರಗೂರು ರಾಮಚಂದ್ರಪ್ಪ. ವಿಜಯ ರಾಘವೇಂದ್ರ ಮತ್ತು ರಂಜಿನಿ ರಾಘವನ್ ದ್ವಿಪಾತ್ರಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಅಭಿನಯಿಸಿರುವುದು ಈ ಸಿನಿಮಾದ ಒಂದು ವಿಶೇಷ. ಸುಂದರ್‌ರಾಜ್, ಶೋಭಾ ರಾಘವೇಂದ್ರ, ರಜನಿ, ಮಹಾಲಕ್ಷ್ಮಿ, ಸುಂದರರಾಜ ಅರಸು, ರಾಜಪ್ಪ ದಳವಾಯಿ, ಅಂಬರೀಶ ಸಾರಂಗಿ, ಮೈಸೂರು ಮಂಜುಳ, ಉಮ್ಮತ್ತೂರು ಬಸವರಾಜು, ವೆಂಕಟರಾಜು, ಶಿವಲಿಂಗಪ್ರಸಾದ್, ಭಾರತಿ ರಮೇಶ್, ಗುಂಡಿ ರಮೇಶ್ ತಾರಾಗಣದಲ್ಲಿ ಇದ್ದಾರೆ. ಚಿತ್ರಕ್ಕೆ ನಾಗರಾಜ ಆದವಾನಿ ಛಾಯಾಚಿತ್ರಗ್ರಹಣ, ಸುರೇಶ್ ಅರಸು ಸಂಕಲನ, ಶಮಿತಾ ಮಲ್ನಾಡ್ ಸಂಗೀತ ನಿರ್ದೇಶನ ಮತ್ತು ತ್ರಿಭುವನ್ ನೃತ್ಯ ಸಂಯೋಜನೆ ಇದೆ. ಪ್ರಜಾವಾಣಿ ಆ್ಯಪ್ ಇಲ್ಲಿದೆ: ಆಂಡ್ರಾಯ್ಡ್ | ಐಒಎಸ್ | ವಾಟ್ಸ್ಆ್ಯಪ್ , ಎಕ್ಸ್ , ಫೇಸ್‌ಬುಕ್ ಮತ್ತು ಇನ್‌ಸ್ಟಾಗ್ರಾಂ ನಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರಜಾವಾಣಿ ಫಾಲೋ ಮಾಡಿ.

title: Auka á afköstin við dýpkun Landeyjahafnar
content: Breytingarnar eru mislangt komnar en flest á að verða klárt áður en dýpkun hefst í Landeyjahöfn í haust. „Með breytingunum ættu afköst við dýpkun að verða betri en þó er veðrið ávallt stærsta breytan í því hvernig gengur að halda Landeyjahöfn opinni,“ segir Sólveig Gísladóttir, sérfræðingur á samskiptasviði Vegagerðarinnar. Afköst aukin við dælingar Aðgerðaáætlun Björgunar miðar að því að auka afköst Álfsness við dælingar í Landeyjahöfn. Áætlunin miðar að því að ljúka þjálfun áhafnar við rétta beitingu tæknibúnaðar skipsins til að tryggja hámarksafköst þess. Auk þess verður ráðist í uppfærslu á tæknilegum búnaði skipsins til að auka afköst þess enn frekar. Frekari umfjöllun má finna í Morgunblaðinu í dag.

title: Janesville, Beloit teens charged with reckless endangerment
creator: DAILY NEWS STAFF
content: BELOIT — Two 17-year-olds, one from Janesville and the other from Beloit, are facing reckless endangerment charges after allegedly firing a flare gun at a Beloit house on Aug. 10. According to a criminal complaint, Ayden Ross of Beloit and Steven Meade II of Janesville approached a female in the 1600 block of Dewey Avenue and asked to see the baby that she was holding. A few moments after telling them to leave the property, a weapon, which was possibly a flare gun, was fired several times at the residence. creator: BY GREG THOMPSON THE NEWS-ENTERPRISE

Students and parents, who already were lined up by 7 a.m. outside Panther Academy, experienced joy, sadness, anxiousness, excitement and a gamut of other feelings as students said goodbye to their parents and the end of summer. title: What does decline in sportsmanship say about our society? | The Ethical Life podcast
content: Episode 155: Hosts Richard Kyte and Scott Rada discuss the concerning trend of poor sportsmanship observed at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris. According to Kyte, the decline in graceful acceptance of defeat is not limited to the Olympics, but is evident across various levels of sports, from professional leagues to youth athletics. He pointed to incidents of abusive behavior from parents toward referees and players as indicative of a broader societal issue. "There's plenty of things indicating that sportsmanship is declining, and I think it's an indication that we have as a society that's more and more focusing on the outcomes themselves and not on performance," Kyte said. However, Kyte also highlighted examples of athletes who demonstrated exceptional sportsmanship, such as Noah Lyles and Josh Kerr, who were able to handle both victory and defeat with humility and grace. The discussion also touched on the role of media coverage in shaping the public's perception of the Olympics. Rada and Kyte agreed that the extensive focus on personal stories and medal ceremonies can sometimes overshadow the raw competition and diverse range of events. "I really wish American coverage spent a little more time on the sports themselves," Kyte said, suggesting that the networks should aim for a more balanced and representative portrayal of the Olympic Games. The conversation ultimately...

title: “エムポックス”がコンゴ民主共和国を中心に拡大 WHOが「国際的に懸念される公衆衛生上の緊急事態」宣言
content: WHO=世界保健機関はアフリカ中部で急速に広がる「エムポックス」について、「国際的に懸念される公衆衛生上の緊急事態」を宣言しました。 WHOのテドロス事務局長は14日、アフリカ中部のコンゴ民主共和国を中心に拡大するエムポックスについて、今後アフリカ以外にも広がる可能性があるとして、「国際的に懸念される公衆衛生上の緊急事態」を宣言しました。 エムポックスをめぐっては、2022年にも欧米を中心に感染者の報告が相次ぎ、緊急事態が宣言されています。 WHOによりますと、今年に入りコンゴ民主共和国で1万5千人以上の感染が報告され、500人以上が死亡しています。 日本国内でも2022年に初の患者が確認され、これまでに248人の感染が報告されています。 エムポックスは、「サル痘」から名称が変更されたウイルス感染症です。 フジテレビ報道局が全国、世界の重要ニュースから身近な話題まで様々な情報を速報・詳報含めて発信します。 世界では今何が起きているのか――ワシントン、ニューヨーク、ロサンゼルス、ロンドン、パリ、モスクワ、イスタンブール、北京、上海、ソウル、バンコクのFNN11支局を拠点に、国際情勢や各国の事件・事故、政治、経済、社会問題から文化・エンタメまで海外の最新ニュースをお届けします。

title: Pai de Lamine Yamal, do Barcelona, é esfaqueado e internado na Espanha; suspeitos são detidos
content: Mounir Nasraoui , pai do atacante Lamine Yamal , do Barcelona e da seleção da Espanha , foi esfaqueado nesta quarta-feira (14), disseram fontes ligadas à investigação à Agência EFE . O fato ocorreu em um estacionamento no bairro de Rocafonda, na cidade de Mataró, a cerca de 30km de Barcelona. ESPN no Disney+ O Disney+ está ainda maior e melhor. Filmes, séries e os esportes da ESPN num só lugar. Conheça o novo Disney+. Nasraoui, de acordo com as fontes, foi esfaqueado e levado ao hospital universitário Germans Trias i Pujol , em Badalona, com ferimentos de diferentes graus de gravidade. A polícia da Catalunha está à frente da investigação do ataque, do qual várias pessoas teriam participado. Segundo fontes, alguns suspeitos já foram detidos. De acordo com moradores da região ouvidos pelo jornal La Vanguardia , o pai de Yamal foi cercado por alguns homens quando passeava com seu cachorro. Esse incidente levou a uma briga, durante a qual Mounir Nasraoui foi atacado com uma faca.

title: I'm considering buying 600 shares in this ASX 200 dividend gem to target $332 a month in passive income!
content: With an eye on bringing in some handy extra passive , I'm considering buying a high-yielding (ASX: XJO) stock. One that I believe will continue to deliver reliable and even increasing passive income in the years ahead. The company in question is ASX 200 ( ). Now I don't own any Rio Tinto shares at the moment. And with the 18% year to date share price retrace in mind, I'm glad I've been patient. But after closing down 2.59% at $112.43 a share yesterday, I believe the worst of the selling is likely over for the ASX 200 miner. That's coupled with my belief that commodity prices, including iron ore and copper, look to be finding a floor at current levels after some sharp falls in 2024. On the passive income front, Rio Tinto has a lengthy track record of paying two fully franked dividends a year for more than a decade. And I was pleasantly surprised by the miner's half-year , reported on 31 July. Highlights included sales revenue of US$26.80 billion for the six months, up 1% year on year. And underlying earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortisation ( ) were up 3% to US$12.09 billion. This saw management declare a fully franked interim dividend of $2.70 a share. That's up 3.5% from the FY 2023 interim dividend of $2.61 a share. Unfortunately, it's a bit too late to grab this latest passive income payout. Rio Tinto shares trade today. Investors who owned the stock at...

title: Em Campo Grande, Marina Silva diz que situação no Pantanal ainda preocupa
content: A ministra do Meio Ambiente, Marina Silva, e o ministro da Secretaria-Geral da Presidência da República, Márcio Macedo, discutiram, em Campo Grande, a construção do Plano Clima Participativo, nesta quarta-feira (14), com foco no Pantanal. Marina ressaltou que, apesar da diminuição de focos devido as chuvas e ao frio, a situação de incêndios pode piorar nos próximos dias. A agenda dos ministros era o Plano Clima, que tem o objetivo de engajar as pessoas a enviar propostas, tirar dúvidas sobre o processo e informar sobre as etapas da elaboração da estratégia que vai guiar a política climática do país até 2035. Marina Silva, que já veio várias vezes ao Estado nos últimos meses para tratar de assuntos que envolvem os incêndio no Pantanal, reforçou a importância da parceria com o governo do Estado para a formulação e implementação de políticas voltadas ao clima. Ela destacou ainda que é importante debater o Plano Clima para dar uma resposta a altura da gravidade do problema enfrentado no Mato Grosso do Sul e no Amazonas. “Agora nós vivemos essa seca intensa que vem acompanhada de incêndios , que são igualmente desafiadores”, disse. Marina ressaltou que há mais de 900 pessoas do governo federal trabalhando na prevençao e combate às chamas, além de servidores do governo estadual e prefeitura. Com as chuvas e frente fria dos últimos dias, vários...

title: AMRO ชี้เศรษฐกิจไทยโต 2.8%
content: นายวโรทัย โกศลพิศิษฐ์กุล ที่ปรึกษาด้านเศรษฐกิจระหว่างประเทศ สํานักงานเศรษฐกิจการคลัง (สศค.) เปิดเผยว่า จากการประชุมร่วมกับคณะผู้แทนจาก ASEAN+3 Macroeconomic Research Office (AMRO) พบว่า AMRO ประเมินว่าเศรษฐกิจไทยในปีนี้ จะเติบโต 2.8% และปีหน้าเติบโต 3.4% เป็นผลจากอุปสงค์ภาคเอกชน ในประเทศที่ขยายตัวดี ภาคการท่องเที่ยวที่ฟื้นตัว การเบิกจ่ายงบประมาณภาครัฐที่ปรับสูงขึ้น ซึ่งรวมถึงผลจากโครงการดิจิทัลวอลเล็ต ส่วนเงินเฟ้อทั่วไปจะยังอยู่ในระดับต่ํา โดยปรับลดลงจาก 1.3% ในปีที่ผ่านมาเป็น 0.7% ในปีนี้ จากมาตรการอุดหนุนราคาพลังงาน และราคาอาหารและสิ่งของจําเป็นอื่นๆที่ลดลง แต่คาดว่าจะเพิ่มขึ้น 1.6 % ในปีหน้า ตามผลของมาตรการอุดหนุนราคาพลังงาน ที่ทยอยหมดลงและเศรษฐกิจที่ฟื้นตัวแข็งแกร่งขึ้น “นโยบายการเงิน AMRO เห็นว่า การดําเนินนโยบายการเงินในปัจจุบันมีความเหมาะสม สอดคล้องกับการฟื้นตัวของเศรษฐกิจ และการดูแลปัญหาหนี้ครัวเรือน และการขยายตัวทางเศรษฐกิจยังมีความเสี่ยงในระยะข้างหน้า นโยบายการเงิน จึงควรสนับสนุนการฟื้นตัวทางเศรษฐกิจเพิ่มเติมหากจําเป็น AMRO ยังชื่นชมและสนับสนุนการดําเนินมาตรการต่างๆเพื่อแก้ปัญหาหนี้ครัวเรือน การปรับปรุงกลไก การค้ําประกันสินเชื่อ ให้มีประสิทธิภาพมากขึ้น” สําหรับนโยบายการคลัง AMRO เห็นควรให้ทางการลดการขาดดุลทางการคลัง เพื่อฟื้นฟูพื้นที่ทางการคลัง โดย AMRO ชื่นชมการปรับปรุงแผนการคลังระยะปานกลางที่ได้กําหนดเป้าหมายลดการขาดดุลทางการคลังที่ชัดเจน โดยการปฏิรูปการจัดเก็บภาษีจะเป็นปัจจัยสําคัญที่ช่วยให้นโยบายการคลังมีความพร้อมรับมือกับรายจ่ายจําเป็น...

title: Adventist HealthCare Earns Top Workplaces Recognition
content: Hospital System Stands Alone in D.C. Region with Its Second Consecutive Rankings GAITHERSBURG, Md. , Aug. 14, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Adventist HealthCare has again been honored as a great place to work, earning a spot on The Washington Post's list of Top Workplaces 2024 in the Washington, D.C. , region. The hospital system also ranked among the nation's best in its industry, capturing a Top Workplaces for Healthcare 2024 award. The Washington Post invited more than 8,800 employers in the Washington, D.C. , region to participate in its survey. Just 250 organizations were named to its Top Workplaces rankings across public and private industries, nonprofits and government agencies. Adventist HealthCare was the only hospital system on the list, and one of just 23 honorees with more than 1,000 employees. On the national level, Adventist HealthCare was named among the Top Workplaces for Healthcare 2024 based on employee feedback about an inclusive and supportive culture, connection between team members, employee development, clear communication, and other factors. Fewer than 3% of eligible organizations earned a national Top Workplaces industry designation. Adventist HealthCare was the only hospital system from the D.C. region to earn the national ranking. Adventist HealthCare made both the regional and national lists in 2023. "It is great to know that we are honored across the...

title: Soaring new car inventories drive down used car prices in B.C.
creator: Adam Campbell
content: Soaring new car inventories drive down used car prices in B.C. New car prices up by 1.4 per cent and used cars down by 7.5 per cent, opening doors to prospective buyers. Adam Campbell Aug 14, 2024 4:30 PM Share by Email Share on Facebook Share on X Share on LinkedIn Print Share via Text Message Cars stocked at car lots in the Richmond (BC) Auto Mall ROB KRUYT PHOTO Listen to this article 00:02:45 A significant increase in new car inventories is cooling the heated used car market across the country. In British Columbia, new car prices have increased by 1.4 per cent year-over-year from an average of $67,827 to $68,776, according to a second-quarter report from AutoTrader released late last month. In comparison, the average price of a used car in the province has decreased by a whopping 7.5 per cent year over year – the third-lowest decline in Canada – from $43,946 to $40,651. This comes as inventory of new vehicles has ramped up by 70 per cent. The Bank of Canada, meanwhile, has been cutting its overnight rate in recent months, allowing for lower interest rates on car loans. New car interest rates from manufacturers have decreased from 6.2 per cent by the end of last year, to 5.3 per cent this past quarter. The cost of a new car in Canada is now averaging $66,807, an increase of 0.8 per cent year over year. A boost in new car sales and trade-ins have led buyers away from...

title: На форуме «Армия-2024» показали новые глубоководные аппараты
creator: Богдан Степовой
content: В международном военно-техническом салоне «Армия-2024» были представлены глубоководные аппараты «Сергей Бавилин» и «Аргус-Д», а также необитаемая подводная станция «Октавис». Макет автономного глубоководного аппарата (АГА) проекта 18200 «Сергей Бавилин» презентовало Санкт-Петербургское морское бюро машиностроения «Малахит». Он был заложен 27 марта 2024 года. Так, АГА имеет размеры 9,9х4х4,3 м, масса готового к погружению аппарата составляет 53 т, а экипаж состоит из трех человек. Ключевой параметр АГА — глубина его погружения — не раскрывается. Но исходя из ранее публиковавшейся в СМИ информации, можно предположить, что она рассчитана на погружение в любой точке мирового океана без ограничений, то есть более 11 тыс. м. Используемые в настоящее время в составе ВМФ России АГА «Русь» и «Консул» имеют массу в 26 т и глубину погружения в 6500 м. Крайне интересно, какой корабль будет выступать в роли носителя аппарата «Сергей Бавилин». Имеющиеся и строящиеся в настоящее время океанографические исследовательские суда «Янтарь», «Алмаз» и «Вице-адмирал Буриличев» батискаф такой массы нести не смогут. Центральное конструкторское бюро морской техники «Рубин» представило создаваемый тяжелый АНПА «Аргус-Д», где «Д» означает «Доставщик». Также была продемонстрирована необитаемая подводная станция «Октавис». Она получила три посадочных места для размещения полезной нагрузки до...

title: Soaring new car inventories drive down used car prices in B.C.
creator: Adam Campbell
content: A significant increase in new car inventories is cooling the heated used car market across the country. In British Columbia, new car prices have increased by 1.4 per cent year-over-year from an average of $67,827 to $68,776, according to a second-quarter report from AutoTrader released late last month. In comparison, the average price of a used car in the province has decreased by a whopping 7.5 per cent year over year – the third-lowest decline in Canada – from $43,946 to $40,651. This comes as inventory of new vehicles has ramped up by 70 per cent. The Bank of Canada, meanwhile, has been cutting its overnight rate in recent months, allowing for lower interest rates on car loans. New car interest rates from manufacturers have decreased from 6.2 per cent by the end of last year, to 5.3 per cent this past quarter. The cost of a new car in Canada is now averaging $66,807, an increase of 0.8 per cent year over year. A boost in new car sales and trade-ins have led buyers away from purchasing used cars, triggering an accumulation of used car supply, decreasing average prices of used cars by 8.3 per cent annually to $36,342 nationwide. This has opened up opportunities for buyers, especially for luxury used vehicles, which saw a 10.4-per-cent drop since the second quarter of 2023. In Canada, the three most-searched vehicles were the Ford F-150 at the top, selling new for $73,902 and...

title: [르포] 英런던 주점마다 '진로 두꺼비'...하이트진로, K소주로 해외 유흥시장까지 공략
creator: 주동일 기자
content: [런던=뉴시스]주동일 기자 = "소주와 한식은 런던에서 더 이상 생소하지 않아요. 이렇게 종종 먹으러 와요." 영국 런던 영국박물관 인근 한국식 치킨집 'WING 치맥 WING'에서 식사를 즐기던 현지인 A씨(41세)가 말했다. '의식의 흐름' 기법을 만들어낸 영국의 대표적 문학 작가 버지니아 울프(1882~1941)가 집필 활동을 해 유명한 태비스톡 호텔에 위치한 이 매장은 아예 간판에 한글로 '치맥'을 표기하고, 하이트진로의 진로(JINRO) 등 K소주들을 판매하고 있었다. 어떤 소주를 마셔봤냐는 질문에 A씨는 벽에 붙은 포스터를 가리켰다. 포스터엔 하이트진로의 두꺼비 마스코트가 그려져 있었다. 영국에선 과일향을 더한 소주가 인기를 끌고 있다. 이 가게 역시 하이트진로의 참이슬 제품을 넣은 '자두 소주 슬러시'로 화제가 됐다. 지난달 기자가 찾은 런던 시내 곳곳에선 하이트진로 제품을 판매하는 가게들을 볼 수 있었다. 대표 번화가 중 한 곳인 소호거리에선 한글로 간판을 내건 '홍대포차' 역시 입구에 하이트진로의 두꺼비들을 배치했다. 실내에선 진로의 과일소주를 판매하고 있었다. 아직 저녁 식사 때까지 시간이 많이 남은 오후였지만, 가게 좌석은 대부분 손님들로 가득찼다. 현재 80여개 국가에 소주를 수출 중인 하이트진로는 2016년 '소주의 세계화'를 선포했다. 이후 전 세계 판매 채널에 소주를 입점시키고 외국인 음용 비율을 높여왔다. 이의 일환으로...

title: What does decline in sportsmanship say about our society? | The Ethical Life podcast
content: Hosts Richard Kyte and Scott Rada discuss the concerning trend of poor sportsmanship observed at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris. According to Kyte, the decline in graceful acceptance of defeat is not limited to the Olympics, but is evident across various levels of sports, from professional leagues to youth athletics. He pointed to incidents of abusive behavior from parents toward referees and players as indicative of a broader societal issue. "There's plenty of things indicating that sportsmanship is declining, and I think it's an indication that we have as a society that's more and more focusing on the outcomes themselves and not on performance," Kyte said. However, Kyte also highlighted examples of athletes who demonstrated exceptional sportsmanship, such as Noah Lyles and Josh Kerr, who were able to handle both victory and defeat with humility and grace. The discussion also touched on the role of media coverage in shaping the public's perception of the Olympics. Rada and Kyte agreed that the extensive focus on personal stories and medal ceremonies can sometimes overshadow the raw competition and diverse range of events. "I really wish American coverage spent a little more time on the sports themselves," Kyte said, suggesting that the networks should aim for a more balanced and representative portrayal of the Olympic Games. The conversation ultimately underscored the...

title: Young Filipino woman is baking her way to success
creator: Julia Jimoh
content: THUNDER BAY — Very few people have the courage to pursue their passions. After all, it can be a huge risk with unpredictable outcomes and may require a complete leap of faith. That’s exactly what Filipino-born Danielle Quilos did. She took a chance and turned something she loved into a small business. Quilos is the owner and operator of Bake-A-Wish, a home-based bakery devoted to creating custom cakes, pastries, and Filipino-inspired breads. Each design is created to complement your individual vision, style, and preferences. At Bake-A-Wish, the Ube pandesal stands out as a fan-favourite. Admired for its soft, cushiony texture and rich Ube flavour, it has quickly become popular with customers. In company with the custom cakes, this unique spin on a classic Filipino bread really shows dedication to quality and flavour. The goal of Bake-A-Wish is to satisfy people’s wishes and make every celebration feel more special. “We’re here to grant your baked wishes,” said Quilos, a self-taught baker who has always had a passion for baking but never planned on pursuing it professionally. Originally, she was studying physiotherapy in the Philippines. At the time, baking was still just a hobby. Then the COVID-19 pandemic happened and things changed. In the wake of the pandemic, Quilos made the decision to move to Canada. Initially, she planned to give up on baking and concentrate on her...
