title: Truy xuất nguồn gốc thủy sản góp phần chống khai thác IUU
content: Theo Sở Nông nghiệp và Phát triển Nông thôn (NNPTNT), Kiên Giang là 1 trong 3 tỉnh đầu tiên của cả nước mời Cục Thủy sản và đơn vị tư vấn dự án eCDT (hệ thống phần mềm truy xuất nguồn gốc thủy sản điện tử) về tập huấn, hướng dẫn ngư dân áp dụng phần mềm này vào công tác truy xuất nguồn gốc thủy sản cập cảng. Có hơn 30 năm làm nghề biển, ông Võ Ngọc Thu, ngư dân xã Lình Huỳnh, huyện Hòn Đất chia sẻ, việc sử dụng phần mềm eCDT mang lại nhiều lợi ích thiết thực, qua đó ngư dân chúng tôi cũng chung tay, góp sức tháo gỡ thẻ vàng của EC. Ngoài ra, trong đợt tuyên truyền gần đây thì Bộ đội Biên phòng tỉnh Kiên Giang còn chiếu video clip với những nội dung phản ánh nguyên nhân dẫn đến việc nguồn lợi thủy, hải sản trong nước bị cạn kiệt; thực trạng về môi trường biển, tình trạng đánh bắt tận diệt, những vụ, việc vi phạm vùng biển các nước, nguyên nhân và bài học... rất sinh động giúp ngư dân dễ tiếp thu. Theo trạm kiểm soát Biên phòng Pháo Đài (TP Hà Tiên) cho biết: Trong đợt cao điểm vừa qua, ngoài các tài liệu tuyên truyền, đơn vị còn đổi mới cách làm để bà con dễ hiểu, cùng tham gia thực hiện...

title: Aula de culinária de agosto celebra a gastronomia espanhola
creator: Bárbara Browne mesadividida@gmail.com  -  via assessoria
content: Para marcar a primeira Aula de Culinária do segundo semestre, o Clube Curitibano trouxe os renomados chefs Felipe Machoski e Vitor Verona. O evento, realizado na noite de terça-feira (13), teve como tema “Una Cena en Barcelona” e contou com pratos autênticos da culinária espanhola. Os chefs, que comandam o Officina Restô Bar e o Neko Restaurante em Curitiba, trouxeram toda a sua expertise em culinária espanhola para a aula-show. Com duas indicações como Chefs 5 Estrelas no Prêmio Bom Gourmet (2017 e 2018), tanto Machoski quanto Verona apresentam um estilo jovem, criativo, moderno e cosmopolita, que não se limita a apenas uma cultura. O prato principal da noite foi a Paella Marinera, um clássico espanhol preparado com perfeição, composto por arroz condimentado com frutos do mar, como camarões, lulas e mexilhões, acompanhados de aioli e vegetais. Como entrada, os participantes aprenderam a preparar o Bikini Espanhol, um sanduíche gourmet com queijo morro azul de Pomerode, presunto parma e maionese trufada, inspirado na famosa Sala Bikini de Barcelona. Para encerrar a noite, a sobremesa foi Crema Catalana de laranja e especiarias, uma versão espanhola do crème brûlée, enriquecida com toques de laranja, gengibre e especiarias. Aprenda a fazer o Bikini Espanhol Ingredientes: 1 xícara de leite integral gelado 1 xícara e 1⁄2 de óleo de soja sal a gosto 10 gotas...

title: Phê duyệt đồ án Quy hoạch phân khu đô thị phía Bắc, đô thị mới Cam Lâm
content: Phân khu đô thị phía Bắc, đô thị mới Cam Lâm có tổng diện khoảng 7.057 ha và đây là khu vực với mục tiêu phát triển trung tâm tổng hợp cấp đô thị.

title: Валверде: Подобни победи са много приятни
content: Халфът на Фдерико имаше основна роля за успеха с 2:0 над на финала за Суперкупата на . Уругваецът отбеляза първия гол в мача и даде импулс в играта на своя тим. След срещата той заяви, че подобни победи са много приятни. "Подобни победи са много приятни след всичката работа, която свършихме. Но искам да поздравя и съперника, който изигра страхотен вач, особено през първото полувреме. На моменти изпитвахме трудности, играта ни не вървеше и не можехме да напипаме своя ритъм. През второто полувреме обаче успяхме да намерим повече пространства, а след първия гол те трябваше да се отворят повече, което ни даде възможност да пробием тяхната защита. Така стана по-лесно да заиграем добре. В края бяхме малко уморени, но най-важна е победата и затова сме щастливи", заяви Валверде. Carlsberg "Домът на Феновете" е новата секция на Sportal.bg за игри. С регистрацията си Вие ще можете да персонализирате Вашето съдържание и да участвате в за страхотни награди. Снимки: Imago

title: Soaring new car inventories drive down used car prices in B.C.
creator: Adam Campbell
content: A significant increase in new car inventories is cooling the heated used car market across the country. In British Columbia, new car prices have increased by 1.4 per cent year-over-year from an average of $67,827 to $68,776, according to a second-quarter report from AutoTrader released late last month. In comparison, the average price of a used car in the province has decreased by a whopping 7.5 per cent year over year – the third-lowest decline in Canada – from $43,946 to $40,651. This comes as inventory of new vehicles has ramped up by 70 per cent. The Bank of Canada, meanwhile, has been cutting its overnight rate in recent months, allowing for lower interest rates on car loans. New car interest rates from manufacturers have decreased from 6.2 per cent by the end of last year, to 5.3 per cent this past quarter. The cost of a new car in Canada is now averaging $66,807, an increase of 0.8 per cent year over year. A boost in new car sales and trade-ins have led buyers away from purchasing used cars, triggering an accumulation of used car supply, decreasing average prices of used cars by 8.3 per cent annually to $36,342 nationwide. This has opened up opportunities for buyers, especially for luxury used vehicles, which saw a 10.4-per-cent drop since the second quarter of 2023. In Canada, the three most-searched vehicles were the Ford F-150 at the top, selling new for $73,902 and...

title: Tranh cãi phở Hà Nội hay phở Nam Định "xứng đáng” là di sản văn hóa phi vật thể quốc gia?
content: Trên khắp các diễn đàn mạng xã hội đang chia thành hai phe tranh cãi phở Hà Nội và phở Nam Định, phở nào có nguồn gốc trước, "xứng đáng" là di sản văn hóa phi vật thể quốc gia. PV Dân Việt đã có cuộc trò chuyện với chuyên gia ẩm thực, văn hóa xung quanh vấn đề này.

title: Monticello officer accused of possessing, reproducing images of child sexual abuse resigns
creator: TONY REID tony.reid@lee.net
content: MONTICELLO — The Monticello police officer who faces multiple charges of possessing and reproducing images of child sexual abuse has resigned. William Craig Griswold had already been placed on unpaid leave after his arrest by State Police investigators Tuesday. Monticello Police Chief Rob Bross announced the officer’s resignation in a news release late Wednesday. He said Griswold, 39, had already been the subject of an administrative investigation into his activities. “A disciplinary hearing was scheduled with the Monticello Fire and Police Commission,” Bross said. “We have now received a letter from William Griswold resigning his position with the Monticello Police Department, effective immediately. The scheduled hearing is canceled.” Bross said the Illinois Law Enforcement Training and Standards Board is aware of Griswold’s arrest and “will be made aware of this new development.” Griswold appeared in Piatt County Circuit Court on Wednesday and entered not guilty pleas to four charges alleging he had reproduced images that depict sexual abuse of children involving victims under the age of 13 . The court record shows he was denied pretrial release on public safety grounds and "to prevent the defendant’s willful flight from prosecution.” Griswold is being held in the Piatt County Jail and said he wants a jury trial. His case has been placed on the trial calendar of Judge Dana...

title: Lucas Chumbo e Pedro Scooby são campeões do torneio de ondas grandes do Rio
creator: Redação
content: Por Redação Lucas Chumbo e Pedro Scooby competiram, nesta terça-feira (14), o torneio de ondas grandes do Rio , com mais 17 competidores e foram a dupla campeã do do Itacoatiara Big Waves. Com três categorias, o campeonato teve modalidade misto, masculino e bodyboard. As duplas do masculino e misto competiram no tow-in, quando o surfista é rebocado por uma moto aquática. Os campeões fizeram um somatório de 16.83 na final do campeonato. Michaela Fregonesi venceu a categoria mista ao lado de Nando Fernandes, e Dudu Pedra levou o torneio no bodyboard.

title: Israeli strikes on Gaza leave children without parents and parents without children
creator: By WAFAA SHURAFA and SAMY MAGDY - Associated Press
content: DEIR AL-BALAH, Gaza Strip (AP) — Reem Abu Hayyah, just three months old, was the only member of her family to survive an Israeli airstrike in the Gaza Strip late Monday. A few miles (kilometers) to the north, Mohamed Abuel-Qomasan lost his wife and their twin babies — just four days old — in another strike. More than 10 months into its , Israel's relentless bombardment of the isolated territory . It has left parents without children and children without parents, brothers or sisters. And some of the sole survivors are so young they will have no memory of those they lost. The Israeli strike late Monday destroyed a home near the southern city of Khan Younis, killing 10 people. The dead included Abu Hayyah's parents and five siblings, ranging in age from 5 to 12, as well as the parents of three other children. All four children were wounded in the strike. “There is no one left except this baby,” said her aunt, Soad Abu Hayyah. “Since this morning, we have been trying to feed her formula, but she does not accept it, because she is used to her mother’s milk.” The strike that killed Abuel-Qomasan's wife and newborns — a boy, Asser, and a girl, Ayssel — also killed the twins' maternal grandmother. As he sat in a hospital, stunned into near-silence by the loss, he held up the twins' birth certificates. His wife, Joumana Arafa, a pharmacist, had given birth by Cesarean section four days...

title: Le monde en images
Điều tra sai phạm nhiều dự án điện gió ở Gia Lai
content: Loạt dự án điện gió vi phạm quy định Hiện nay, các cơ quan chức năng tỉnh Gia Lai đã phối hợp cung cấp hồ sơ, tài liệu liên quan đến các dự án điện gió hàng nghìn tỉ đồng trên địa bàn. Trước đó, Cơ quan An ninh điều tra Bộ Công an gửi văn bản yêu cầu phối hợp cung cấp thông tin, tài liệu để mở rộng điều tra vụ án “Lợi dụng chức vụ, quyền hạn trong khi thi hành công vụ” xảy ra tại Bộ Công Thương và các tỉnh, thành phố. Theo Bộ Công an, đây là vụ án do Ban Chỉ đạo Trung ương về phòng chống tham nhũng, tiêu cực chỉ đạo, theo dõi. Trong số 32 nhà máy bị điều tra, tại tỉnh Gia Lai có 4 dự án nhà máy điện gió bao gồm: Nhà máy điện gió Hưng Hải (huyện Kông Chro); Nhà máy điện gió Cửu An (thị xã An Khê); Nhà máy điện gió Ia Le 1 (huyện Chư Pưh); Nhà máy điện gió Ia Bang 1 (huyện Chư Prông). Trong tháng 8.2024, Thanh tra Chính phủ có kết luận chính thức về các sai phạm tại một số dự án điện gió tại tỉnh Gia Lai. Cơ quan này đã kiến nghị các cơ quan, đơn vị có liên quan khắc phục hậu quả sai phạm. Vi phạm về thủ tục đầu tư, đất đai Theo kết luận của Thanh tra Chính phủ, dự án Nhà máy điện gió Phát triển Miền núi do Công...

He pointed to incidents of abusive behavior from parents toward referees and players as indicative of a broader societal issue. "There's plenty of things indicating that sportsmanship is declining, and I think it's an indication that we have as a society that's more and more focusing on the outcomes themselves and not on performance," Kyte said. However, Kyte also highlighted examples of athletes who demonstrated exceptional sportsmanship, such as Noah Lyles and Josh Kerr, who were able to handle both victory and defeat with humility and grace. The discussion also touched on the role of media coverage in shaping the public's perception of the Olympics. Rada and Kyte agreed that the extensive focus on personal stories and medal ceremonies can sometimes overshadow the raw competition and diverse range of events. "I really wish American coverage spent a little more time on the sports themselves," Kyte said, suggesting that the networks should aim for a more balanced and representative portrayal of the Olympic Games. The conversation ultimately...

title: आजचे राशिभविष्य, १५ ऑगस्ट २०२४ : स्वातंत्र्य दिन विशेष, २ राशींचे पार्टनरसोबत कडाक्याचे भांडण, आर्थिक संकट कायम! वाचा गुरुवारचे राशीभविष्य
content: आज तुमचा दिवस अनुकूल असेल. काम बाजूला ठेवून तुम्ही इतर गोष्टींकडे आकर्षित व्हाल. मुलांकडून निराशाजनक बातम्या मिळतील. प्रलंबित कामे पूर्ण होण्याची शक्यता आहे. व्यवसायात सहकाऱ्यांकडून सल्ला मिळेल. मान-सन्मानात वाढ होईल. जोडीदाराकडून सन्मान मिळेल. कौटुंबिक संपत्ती मिळेल. वडिलांची तब्येत बिघडू शकते. आज भाग्य ७७ टक्के तुमच्या बाजूने असेल. गाईला हिरवा चारा खाऊ घाला. आज राजकीय दिशेने केलेल प्रयत्न यशस्वी होतील. लोकांची साथ मिळाल्याने आनंदी असाल. सरकारी योजनाचा लाभा घ्या. गर्दीच्या ठिकाणी जाणे टाळा. आर्थिक स्थिती सुधारेल. उत्पन्नाचे स्त्रोत वाढतील. कामामुळे तुमची दिनचर्या बदलेल. प्रेम जीवनासाठी वेळ काढाल. आज भाग्य ८६ टक्के तुमच्या बाजूने असेल. शिवलिंगावर दूध अर्पण करा आज कार्यक्षेत्राच्या ठिकाणी वरिष्ठांशी वाद घालणे टाळा. मुलांना परीक्षेत यश मिळेल. मुलांसोबत आज वेळ घालवाल. कुटुंबाच्या गरजा पूर्ण करण्यासाठी प्रयत्न कराल. बाहेर फिरायला जाऊ शकता. गरजेच्या वस्तू खरेदी कराल. आज भाग्य ७४ टक्के तुमच्या बाजूने असेल. पांढऱ्या वस्तू दान करा आज सामाजिक क्षेत्रात तुमची प्रतिष्ठा वाढेल. कार्यक्षेत्रात वाढ होईल. पालकांच्या मदतीने कौटुंबिक व्यवसायातील समस्या दूर होतील. व्यवसायात नफा होईल. जवळच्या व्यक्तीला भेटाला. मालमत्ता खरेदी करण्याचा विचार करत असाल तर आजचा दिवस चांगला आहे. उपजीविकेच्या क्षेत्रात प्रगती होईल. रखडलेली कामे मार्गी लागतील. आज भाग्य ६९ टक्के तुमच्या बाजूने असेल. शिव चालीसाचे पठण करा आज कामाच्या ठिकाणी लोक तुमच्या कामाने प्रभावित होतील. नवीन शत्रू तयार होतील. खरेदी- विक्रीमध्ये...

title: '외국인 근로자 건강검진을' 충남 보령시, 찾아가는 서비스
creator: 유순상 기자
content: [보령=뉴시스]유순상 기자 = 충남 보령시가 올해부터 외국인 계절근로자에게 무료 건강 검진 서비스를 제공한다. 15일 시에 따르면 올해 외국인 계절근로자 370여명을 대상으로 '찾아가는 결핵·한센병 무료 건강검진'을 실시한다. 의사소통 어려움과 검진비용 등으로 어려움을 겪는 외국인 근로자들에게 건강검진의 기회를 제공하고 질환을 조기발견, 감염원을 사전 차단하기 위해 마련했다. 대한결핵협회 대전세종충남지부와 한국한센복지협회 대전충남지부 지원을 받아 흉부X-선 촬영, 객담검사, 혈액검사 등 의 건강검진과 피부과 진료 등을 해준다. 검진결과 X-선 유소견자 등 관리 필요 외국인 근로자들에게 치료비 전액를 지원하고 완치까지 등록관리할 예정이다. 질병관리청에 따르면 지난해 외국인 결핵환자는 전년 대비 3.3% 증가했고 한센병 환자 3명 중 2명은 외국인이다. 결핵·한센병 발병 고위험국가(동남아지역)에서 유입된 외국인 환자 조기 발견 및 치료를 통한 감염병 선제적 차단이 어느때보다 중요하다. 전경희 보건소장은 “외국인 근로자들이 적절한 진료를 받을 수 있도록 지원하고, 감염병 조기 발견 및 전파 방지에 주의를 기울이겠다”며 “앞으로도 외국인 근로자들의 건강 증진을 위해 지속적으로 노력하겠다”고 말했다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Soaring new car inventories drive down used car prices in B.C.
creator: Adam Campbell
content: A significant increase in new car inventories is cooling the heated used car market across the country. In British Columbia, new car prices have increased by 1.4 per cent year-over-year from an average of $67,827 to $68,776, according to a second-quarter report from AutoTrader released late last month. In comparison, the average price of a used car in the province has decreased by a whopping 7.5 per cent year over year – the third-lowest decline in Canada – from $43,946 to $40,651. This comes as inventory of new vehicles has ramped up by 70 per cent. The Bank of Canada, meanwhile, has been cutting its overnight rate in recent months, allowing for lower interest rates on car loans. New car interest rates from manufacturers have decreased from 6.2 per cent by the end of last year, to 5.3 per cent this past quarter. The cost of a new car in Canada is now averaging $66,807, an increase of 0.8 per cent year over year. A boost in new car sales and trade-ins have led buyers away from purchasing used cars, triggering an accumulation of used car supply, decreasing average prices of used cars by 8.3 per cent annually to $36,342 nationwide. This has opened up opportunities for buyers, especially for luxury used vehicles, which saw a 10.4-per-cent drop since the second quarter of 2023. In Canada, the three most-searched vehicles were the Ford F-150 at the top, selling new for $73,902 and...

title: OSU-Lima shows off soil health, water management
creator: Cade Higgins
content: Cade Higgins | The Lima News LIMA — The Ohio State University-Lima showcased its research and development regarding soil health and water management to the USDA National Resource Conservation Service on Wednesday afternoon at the campus regenerative farm. The representatives visited OSU-Lima to see drainage water recycling with the new retention pond. Drainage water recycling is the practice of capturing excess water drained from fields, storing the drained water in a pond, a reservoir or a drainage ditch, and using the stored water to irrigate crops when there is a drought or water deficit. The pond is 8 feet deep, covers three acres and took nearly a quarter of a million dollars to construct, excluding engineering services. “We’re hoping to present some of our innovative water management practices to them,” said Vinayak Shedekar, an assistant professor at OSU-Lima and speaker, shortly before the event. He added, “If this practice was to be adopted more widely, our water quality would be benefitted.” Implementing this practice helps recycle nutrients back into the field where the crops can use them, providing a water quality benefit. The biggest challenge as Shedekar explained has to do with funding. “I’m hoping to have this conversation and for NRCS to incentivize the practice here and in the region,” he said. He said the NRCS needed to see the project and gather more data...

title: Ivonescimab (PD-1/VEGF) Received Priority Review from China's NMPA for First-Line Treatment of PD-L1 Positive NSCLC
content: The Second Indication of Ivonescimab in NSCLC 2L+ EGFRm NSCLC Already Approved in May 2024 HONG KONG , Aug. 14, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Akeso, Inc. (HKEX: 9926.HK) ("Akeso,") today announced that the National Center for Drug Evaluation of the State Drug Administration of the People's Republic of China (NMPA CDE) has granted priority review of the supplemental New Drug Application (sNDA) to 依达方® (ivonescimab), a first-in-class PD-1/VEGF bi-specific antibody developed by Akeso, as monotherapy for first-line treatment of PD-L1 positive (PD-L1 TPS≥1%) locally advanced or metastatic non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC). This marks the second indication for which ivonescimab has been granted priority review following the treatment of EGFR-mutant non-squamous NSCLC that has progressed after EGFR-TKI therapy, highlighting its significant clinical value. This new indication application for ivonescimab is based on the HARMONi-2 (AK112-303) study. At a prespecified interim analysis conducted by an independent Data Monitoring Committee, ivonescimab demonstrated a statistically significant and clinically meaningful improvement in PFS by blinded independent radiology review committee (BICR) compared to pembrolizumab, and the hazard ratio (HR) was significantly better than expected. There are no known Phase III clinical trials in NSCLC which have shown a statistically significant improvement...

title: Official Astro Boy Brick-Building Sets Get Steep Discounts At Amazon
creator: Darryn Bonthuys
content: By Darryn Bonthuys on August 14, 2024 at 4:30PM PDT GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links. If Lego ever tries to get the license for an Astro Boy set, it's going to have a pretty high benchmark to clear when compared to the kit produced by Pantasy. Not just faithful replica of the manga and anime icon , this set lets you peer into the inner workings of Astro and is on sale $70 (normally $90) at Amazon. An officially licensed replica of Astro Boy , the 1,258-piece kit has a half-mechanical design full of intricate details, and when fully assembled, the bionic boy is over 32cm tall. As a display piece, there are some fun extra touches on this Astro Boy replica, including LEDs, a small amount of articulation, and a display base to keep Astro securely in place. Pantasy has expanded its Astro line with a few more kits, in case you're looking to put together a few diorama pieces. You can get an all-white version of the model listed above for $55 in a limited-time Amazon deal, and the end result of this project is quite striking to behold. For something more casual, there's a set that'll appeal to Avril Lavigne fans, as you can build a skater boi version of Astro . This is very similar to the models listed above, but instead of seeing Astro in his default form, he's dressed to shred and comes...

title: भारत के लिए किसने जड़ा था इंटरनेशनल क्रिकेट में पहला सिक्स? आजादी से पहले की है कहानी
content: नई दिल्ली: आज कल क्रिकेट काफी ज्यादा बदल गया है। भले ही फॉर्मेट कोई सा भी हो। लेकिन बल्लेबाज हमेशा अटैकिंग क्रिकेट खेलने को ही देखते हैं। टेस्ट हो वनडे हो या टी20, अब क्रिकेट में छक्के लगना आम हो गया है। बल्लेबाज टेस्ट क्रिकेट में भी अब अटैकिंग खेलते हैं। अगर अब कोई बल्लेबाज एक ओवर में 2-3 छक्के भी लगा दे। तो उसे ज्यादा बड़ी बात नहीं माना जाता। आज कल भारत के लिए सिक्स मशीन रोहित शर्मा बने हुए हैं। वह अटैकिंग क्रिकेट खेलते हैं और जमकर सिक्स लगाते हैं। लेकिन क्या आप जानते हैं कि भारत के लिए इंटरनेशनल क्रिकेट में पहला सिक्स किसने लगाया था? अगर नहीं तो यह आर्टिकल आपके लिए ही है। आजादी से पहले अमर सिंह ने भारत के लिए लगाया था पहला छक्का इस बात से हर कोई वाकिफ है कि अंग्रेजों ने भारत पर कई साल राज किया है। भारत को अंग्रेजों से आजादी 15 अगस्त 1947 को मिली थी। अब गुरुवार को भारत अपना 78वां स्वतंत्रता दिवस मनाने जा रहा है। हालांकि भारत ने अपना पहला टेस्ट क्रिकेट मैच आजादी से पहले इंग्लैंड के खिलाफ ही खेला था। टेस्ट क्रिकेट में इन 5 सूरमा बल्लेबाजों ने जड़े सबसे ज्यादा छक्के, रोहित शर्मा लिस्ट में नहीं 1932 में भारत ने अपना पहला टेस्ट मैच इंग्लैंड के खिलाफ खेला था। इस टेस्ट मैच में ऑलराउंडर अमर सिंह ने भारत के लिए इतिहास रचा था। अमर सिंह भारत के लिए इस मैच में इंटरनेशनल क्रिकेट में पहला छक्का लगाने वाले खिलाड़ी बन गए थे। इसी के साथ उन्होंने एक और कमाल का रिकॉर्ड भी बनाया था। वह उस मैच में भारत के लिए इंटरनेशनल क्रिकेट में अर्धशतक लगाने वाले भी पहले खिलाड़ी बने थे। बता दें कि अमर सिंह...

title: God of War Ragnarok Versi PC Siap Rilis, Bagaimana Kebutuhan Spesifikasi Komputernya?
content: Film Borderlands diadaptasi dari game dengan elemen RPG, dikembangkan oleh Gearbox Software Level Infinite, entitas game naungan Tencent, membawa update beberapa game baru ke Gamescom 2024. Garena berperan sebagai sponsor Gameseed 2024, sebuah kompetisi dan inkubasi game terbesar di Indonesia. Game Honor of Kings hadirkan sejumlah pembaruan, mulai dari karakter baru Ziya hingga skin gratis dengan tema silat. Survei dilakukan terhadap 10 ribu responden itu, 500 di antaranya berasal dari Indonesia. Berikut beberapa game tactical FPS selain Valorant Game Valorant versi konsol kini tersedia di beberapa negara, yakni Amerika Serikat, Kanada, Eropa, Jepang, dan Brasil Game bertema simulasi memungkinkan pemain untuk menjalani kehidupan virtual, mengelola kota, dan merancang taman hiburan Empat mahasiswa rogram vokasi Universitas Indonesia menciptakan game Lodaya Conquest. Terinspirasi reog Ponorogo. Game open world salah satu tema dalam industri permainan video

title: EEUU| Anuncian tres fechas para el pago de dividendos por $1.312 en este estado
creator: Dayana R. Escalona G.
content: El Departamento de Ingresos del estado de Alaska anunció y confirmó tres fechas para el pago dividendos por cheque de estímulo en la entidad antes de finalizar este 2024. El alivio económico para los residentes de Alaska, es realizado por el Fondo Permanente de Dividendos (PFD) y que en 2023 se entregó por la suma de $1.312. La primeras ronda de pagos se hará efectiva el próximo 15 de agosto y el segundo depósito se espera un segundo pago el 12 de septiembre de 2024. Lea también: EEUU: ¿Qué ocurre con el pago del Seguro Social si es llevado a la cárcel? El último y tercer abono de este cheque de estímulo, se espera procesar para el 1 de octubre. Así que, si aún no has recibido alguno de estos beneficios en tu cuenta bancaria, si eres elegible aún hay chance para recibirlo. Además, del cheque de estímulo, los residentes del estado podrán recibir de forma extra unos $295 dólares como parte de un beneficio energético. Es decir, que desde octubre algunos obtendrían hasta $1.655. El monto estimado por beneficiario elegible, a este pago de impacto económico es de $1360. Los residentes recibirán la cantidad en alguna de las tres fechas antes mencionadas. El solicitante tiene que indicar como quiere el abono de este dinero, en un pago directo en su cuenta bancaria o en un cheque en físico por correo postal. El tipo de pago será determinante en la fecha que...

title: Defensoría del Pueblo reporta 287 acciones colectivas de protesta durante julio
content: 18:30 | Lima, ago. 14. La Defensoría del Pueblo reveló, durante la presentación del Reporte de Conflictos Sociales n.° 245, correspondiente al mes de julio, que en dicho periodo se registraron 287 acciones colectivas de protesta, de las cuales el 61.3 % fueron plantones o concentraciones y el 24.7% fueron marchas. Los lugares que registraron las mayores cifras de protestas fueron Lima Metropolitana (45), Arequipa (34), Cajamarca (20), Piura (17) y Lambayeque (15). Además, se registraron cinco personas heridas (tres civiles y dos policías) en el contexto de las protestas convocadas para el 27, 28 y 29 de julio en contra del Ejecutivo y el Congreso de la República. Conflictos sociales De otro lado, la institución dio cuenta de 209 conflictos sociales registrados, 159 activos y 50 latentes hasta el mes de julio, lo que representa tres casos menos que el mes anterior. Agrega que, del total de conflictos activos, hay 88 en fase de diálogo, 41 en desescalamiento, 15 en fase temprana, 15 en escalamiento y ninguno en estado de crisis. Con relación al mes anterior, se registraron cuatro casos nuevos en las regiones Apurímac, Lima Metropolitana y Loreto. De ellos, dos son de carácter socioambiental, uno por asuntos de gobierno nacional y uno por asuntos de gobierno local. title: "الأرصاد": أمطار خفيفة إلى متوسطة على المدينة المنورة
creator: واس - المدينة المنورة
content: أصدر المركز الوطني للأرصاد تنبيهًا بشأن أمطار خفيفة اليوم الخميس، على محافظتي الحناكية وخيبر، وكذلك أمطار متوسطة على المدينة المنورة ومحافظتي بدر والعيص. تشمل التأثيرات المصاحبة نشاطًا للرياح السطحية، وتدنيًا في مدى الرؤية الأفقية، وصواعق رعدية، وتساقط البرد، وجريان السيول. وأوضح المركز أن الحالة تبدأ الساعة 12 ظهرًا، وتستمر حتى الساعة 11 مساء.

title: Extreme body modification fan shows off bizarre trick he does with his nose
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Christine Younan, Rom Preston-Ellis)
content: When you dazzle your mates with an epic party trick, you're on track to become the stuff of legend. Body modification enthusiast Remy certainly knows how to impress he's gone viral for showcasing his jaw-dropping talent. The tattoo aficionado isn't shy about his love for ink, splurging a hefty £115,000 to cover his frame in body art. The Canadian dad, who boasts a following of over 95,300 on Instagram , keeps his fans hooked with frequent updates on his evolving tapestry of tattoos and modifications. Not long ago, Remy took his admirers on a trip down memory lane to the year 2021, highlighting his journey of transformation. He took to social media, posting a nostalgic image alongside his wife Sarah. His caption read: "Flashback to a bit of fun with @blixxtattoo back in 2021." In the throwback clip, the pair are seen sitting close, with Sarah effortlessly sliding her index finger through Remy's nose. Normally, such an attempt would be thwarted by the septum, but Remy, like many body mod pros, likely has it pierced clean through. Thanks to this, Sarah can thread her fingers all the way through without obstruction. But that's not all as she performs this feat, Remy then unveils another surprise: his bifurcated tongue, showing off a split right down the middle. Their video recently hit the internet, raking in heaps of praise from their followers. One fan exclaimed: "True love...

title: Bệ đỡ cho các nhà làm phim độc lập
content: Gần đây nhiều nhà làm phim độc lập còn rất trẻ của VN đạt nhiều thành tích cao ở các liên hoan phim (LHP) quốc tế uy tín. Bên trong vỏ kén vàng của đạo diễn Phạm Thiên Ân giành chiến thắng hạng mục Caméra d'Or dành cho phim đầu tay xuất sắc tại LHP Cannes 2023. Cu li không bao giờ khóc của Phạm Ngọc Lân được xướng tên Phim đầu tay xuất sắc nhất tại LHP Berlin 2024, và cũng vừa nhận giải Phim hay nhất hạng mục phim châu Á tại LHP châu Á Đà Nẵng 2024. Trước đó, điện ảnh Việt còn có Trần Thanh Huy với phim Ròm đạt giải New Currents, tương đương giải Phim hay nhất tại LHP quốc tế Busan 2019. Poster phim Cu li không bao giờ khóc ĐPCC Mới đây, nữ đạo diễn Dương Diệu Linh có tác phẩm Don't cry, butterfly (tựa Việt: Mưa trên cánh bướm ) được chọn công chiếu tại LHP Venice 2024, tranh giải phim đầu tay xuất sắc tại Tuần lễ phê bình phim (Critics' Week). Phim được các công ty tại Việt Nam, Singapore, Philippines, Indonesia hợp tác sản xuất. Nhà phê bình quốc tế Beatrice Fiorentin đánh giá về Don't cry, butterfly: "Một câu chuyện buồn vui lẫn lộn về gia đình đặt trong bốn bức tường đã trở thành một phép ẩn dụ mạnh mẽ cho xã hội đương đại". title: Apakah Hairspray Buruk untuk Kesehatan Rambut?
content: CANTIKA.COM , Jakarta - Semprotan rambut atau hairspray adalah produk kecantikan yang digunakan untuk mengunci tatanan rambut dan menambah volume. Namun, seperti halnya produk kecantikan lain yang digunakan secara teratur, Anda mungkin bertanya-tanya apakah hairspray buruk bagi rambut? Menurut dua ahli rambut, hairspray umumnya tidak bermasalah jika digunakan secukupnya. Yuk, kita simak paparan lengkapnya dari jenis, cara kerja, cara penggunaan, dan buruk atau tidak hairspray untuk rambut. Baca Juga: Cara Mencegah Rambut Rontok Akibat Keringat Alasan utama mengapa hairspray sangat efektif dalam mengunci tatanan rambut adalah karena mengandung polimer. Dalam produk hairspray , polimer dilarutkan dalam pelarut, seperti air atau alkohol. Saat Anda menyemprotkan produk tersebut ke rambut, pelarutnya menguap, meninggalkan lapisan polimer yang mengikat helaian rambut yang berbeda dan menahan rambut Anda di tempatnya. "Saat Anda menyemprotkannya, cairannya cepat menguap, meninggalkan lapisan ini," kata Dawna Jarvis, penata rambut profesional dikutip dari Byrdie , 13 Agustus 2024. Baca Juga: 5 Tips Mencegah Rambut Berkeringat - Aerosol menghasilkan semprotan yang halus dan merata serta optimal untuk menahan rambut secara menyeluruh. - Semprotan non-aerosol lebih ramah lingkungan dan sering kali memberikan daya tahan yang lebih kuat. title: Dự án chậm tiến độ, nhiều hộ dân ở Hà Nội thành "ốc đảo" của rác thải
content: Phản ánh của người dân phường Đội Cấn, quận Ba Đình, TP. Hà Nội đến Báo Lao Động, việc Dự án cống hóa mương Kẻ Khế chậm tiến độ, ngoài việc mất mỹ quan đô thị còn gây ô nhiễm môi trường . Vấn đề tồn tại lâu đã gây ảnh hưởng nghiêm trọng đến đời sống hàng ngày của người dân xung quanh. Theo bà Nguyễn Thị Tho, nhà bà đang ở nằm trong diện quy hoạch của Dự án cống hoá mương Kẻ Khế (chảy qua phường Đội Cấn và Kim Mã, quận Ba Đình, TP. Hà Nội) đã hơn 20 năm nay. Trong nhiều năm qua, gia đình bà Tho không được làm sổ đỏ , mua bán và cũng không được phép xây sửa lại mà phải duy trì căn nhà như hiện trạng để chờ quy hoạch giải tỏa. Tuy nhiên, Dự án này liên tục trì trệ trong hàng chục năm và đến năm 2023 mới bắt đầu khởi động lại một phần, nhưng đến nay lại tiếp tục bị dừng không rõ lý do. Ông Quách Hữu Trung cho biết, gia đình ông là một một trong những hộ gia đình còn lại ở ngõ 194 Đội Cấn chưa được giải tỏa cũng như giải quyết vấn đề đền bù và hiện nay đang trở thành “nạn nhân trực tiếp” phải chịu nhiều ảnh hưởng từ việc trì hoãn và giải tỏa từng phần của dự án. title: County road workers say they’re ready to leave
creator: ALEXIS ESPINOZA Contributing Writer
content: While one group of county employees received a salary increase on Tuesday morning, another group of workers stood before the Kings County Board of Supervisors pleading for fair wages. There was a desperate outcry for help to obtain those wages from workers who said there were vital members of the small crew ready to leave for work elsewhere if better wages were not secured. A trio of Road Maintenance workers, part of the county’s Public Works Department, stated that the reclassification system being discussed during closed session is not the answer to the requests for increased wages. Instead, according to the workers, it creates the opportunity for workers to put in less effort and for unqualified employees to gain positions of leadership. Ricardo Angel, who has worked with the county as a Road Maintenance Worker (RMW) III for six years, stated that the proposal to be discussed during closed sessions recommends RMWIreceive a 14% raise, RMWII receives a 10% raise while demoting RMW III to RMWII and compensating the demotion with a .5% raise. He also said the proposal suggests getting rid of the RMW IV position entirely to open three extra RMW III positions. He later stated that the raise he would receive under the suggested reclassification system is equivalent to a dime. “It sends a clear message to all of us that ‘if you don’t like it, then you can find work somewhere...

title: What does decline in sportsmanship say about our society? | The Ethical Life podcast
content: Episode 155: Hosts Richard Kyte and Scott Rada discuss the concerning trend of poor sportsmanship observed at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris. According to Kyte, the decline in graceful acceptance of defeat is not limited to the Olympics, but is evident across various levels of sports, from professional leagues to youth athletics. He pointed to incidents of abusive behavior from parents toward referees and players as indicative of a broader societal issue. "There's plenty of things indicating that sportsmanship is declining, and I think it's an indication that we have as a society that's more and more focusing on the outcomes themselves and not on performance," Kyte said. However, Kyte also highlighted examples of athletes who demonstrated exceptional sportsmanship, such as Noah Lyles and Josh Kerr, who were able to handle both victory and defeat with humility and grace. The discussion also touched on the role of media coverage in shaping the public's perception of the Olympics. Rada and Kyte agreed that the extensive focus on personal stories and medal ceremonies can sometimes overshadow the raw competition and diverse range of events. "I really wish American coverage spent a little more time on the sports themselves," Kyte said, suggesting that the networks should aim for a more balanced and representative portrayal of the Olympic Games. The conversation ultimately...

title: Monticello officer accused of possessing, reproducing images of child sexual abuse resigns
creator: TONY REID tony.reid@lee.net
content: William Craig Griswold had already been placed on unpaid leave after his arrest by State Police investigators Tuesday. Monticello Police Chief Rob Bross announced the officer’s resignation in a news release late Wednesday. He said Griswold, 39, had already been the subject of an administrative investigation into his activities. “A disciplinary hearing was scheduled with the Monticello Fire and Police Commission,” Bross said. “We have now received a letter from William Griswold resigning his position with the Monticello Police Department, effective immediately. The scheduled hearing is canceled.” Bross said the Illinois Law Enforcement Training and Standards Board is aware of Griswold’s arrest and “will be made aware of this new development.” Griswold appeared in Piatt County Circuit Court on Wednesday and entered not guilty pleas to four charges alleging he had reproduced images that depict sexual abuse of children involving victims under the age of 13 . The court record shows he was denied pretrial release on public safety grounds and "to prevent the defendant’s willful flight from prosecution.” Griswold is being held in the Piatt County Jail and said he wants a jury trial. His case has been placed on the trial calendar of Judge Dana Rhoades for Oct. 7. A pretrial hearing has been scheduled for Sept. 9. State police said the charges against Griswold were developed after...

title: 2024 Young Stars Classic single-game tickets going on sale Friday for September showdown in Penticton (Penticton)
content: Photo: Contributed The Vancouver Canucks announced on Wednesday that single-game tickets for the 2024 Young Stars Classic will be going on sale Friday, giving people the chance to see NHL prospects show off. The tournament, now in its 11th year, will take place at the Penticton's South Okanagan Events Centre from Friday, Sept. 13 to Monday, Sept. 16, 2024. Prospects from the Vancouver Canucks, Calgary Flames, Edmonton Oilers, and Winnipeg Jets are set to compete in a four-team, round-robin-style tournament. title: 被害総額5億円 記録的大雨で“壊滅的被害”受けた羽根沢温泉「紅葉館」 大量の土砂で再開のめど立たず【山形発】
content: 記録的な大雨で大きな被害があった山形・鮭川村の温泉街では、お盆の8月13日も復旧作業が続いている。被災したホテルの裏にはまだ大量の土砂が残ったままで、営業再開のめどは立っていない。 鮭川村の羽根沢温泉にある「ホテル紅葉館」。7月の記録的な大雨でホテルの裏山が崩れ、1階に土砂が流れ込んだ。 1階は、ほぼ壊滅状態。厨房の冷蔵庫やガス・流し台のほか、水や温泉をくみ上げるポンプも使えなくなった。 片付けは、7月の大雨の直後から、ホテルを経営する元木専務の友人たちが手伝ってくれていて、13日もお盆休みを利用して、中学時代の同級生がホテルの正面や道路の泥をかき出してくれた。 暑いですね。ヘドロみたいにこびりついて流れない、大変 過去にはホテルに遊びにきて泊まったり同級会をしていたという、村在住の中学の同級生・津藤佳一さん。「再開したらすぐに飲みにきて力になりたい」と、熱い思いを語った。 元木専務は復旧は“1人だと無理”と思っていたが、先輩や同級生・後輩が毎日手伝いにきてくれたおかげで、「前を向いて頑張ろう」という気持ちになれたという。 大雨からまもなく3週間、一歩一歩片付けを進めているが、ホテルの裏にはまだ大量の土砂と流木が残ったまま。 裏山には、土砂が流れ込むことを防ぐための県が管理する「治山ダム」があるが、今回の大雨では大量の土砂と流木がダムの高さを乗り越えて流れ込んだ。 裏山に残っている大量の土砂は少しの雨でもまた流れ出すおそれがあり、取り除かれるまでは営業再開はできない。 元木専務は「危険な箇所を何とか対応したいが、そこだけは自助では何ともできない。早く国や県に動いてほしい。土砂の方を対応しない限りはお客さんの安全が担保できないので、そちらが決まらない限りは再建のめどが立たない」と先行きを懸念している。 裏山にたまった土砂について、県は今後、林野庁の補助事業を使ってかき出すなど復旧作業を進める方針。 例年、お盆は満室でにぎわうはずの紅葉館。今回の被害総額は5億円に上るとみられている。 (さくらんぼテレビ) 山形の最新ニュース、身近な話題、災害や事故の速報などを発信します。

title: TikTok: o que significa ‘recatado’ na rede social?
content: No contexto do TikTok, o termo ‘recatado’ refere-se a uma atitude e estilo que envolve modéstia e reserva. Originalmente, ‘recatado’ descreve alguém que é tímido e moderado em seu comportamento e aparência. ANÚNCIO Na plataforma, esse conceito foi adaptado para representar uma abordagem mais ampla sobre como os usuários se apresentam e agem em público, destacando a importância de uma aparência limpa e de um comportamento bem considerado. Clique aqui para receber as notícias de ciência e tecnologia pelo WhatsApp O termo ‘recatado’ ganhou notoriedade na plataforma, onde os usuários começaram a explorar e compartilhar suas próprias interpretações do conceito. Um exemplo destacado é o vídeo de Jools Lebron, que já alcançou mais de 7 milhões de visualizações. Neste vídeo, LeBron discute como ser recatado se relaciona com a forma como se veste e age, sugerindo que manter uma aparência adequada, como se estivesse numa entrevista de emprego, é fundamental para incorporar essa atitude. Debate e críticas sobre conceito Apesar da popularidade de ‘recatado’, nem todos os usuários concordam com a interpretação que o termo tem no TikTok. ANÚNCIO Alguns argumentam que a forma como é apresentada na plataforma pode não capturar completamente o significado original do conceito. Outros fizeram vídeos adotando uma postura cômica em relação à polêmica, como...

title: Prince William 'desperately needs' Prince Harry, but 'tense statement speaks volumes'

content: As he bears the weight of Princess Kate's shock cancer diagnosis, Prince William is said to 'desperately need' his little brother. The heir to the throne is currently under tremendous pressure as he supports wife Kate with her recovery, all while trying to protect their three young children, Prince George , Princess Charlotte, and Prince Louis. Now a Royal expert has shared that William 'desperately needs' Prince Harry , however, it's clear that the relationship between the once 'very, very close-knit' pair is still far from comfortable, with a 'tense' 22-word statement suggesting the rift will take some time to heal. It's understood that Harry and his wife Meghan, who have made new lives for themselves across the pond in Montecito, California, were unaware of Kate's diagnosis before the princess opened up in a video statement to the nation, on Friday, March 22, sharing that she is now in the early stages of preventative chemotherapy. title: В Хельсинки продают ледовый дворец, принадлежащий русским бизнесменам
content: Город Хельсинки в настоящее время находится в процессе переговоров о продаже арены Helsinki Hall, которая принадлежит российским бизнесменам Роману Ротенбергу и Геннадию Тимченко. Мэрия Хельсинки подтвердила, что переговоры о продаже арены уже начались, и город предпринимает шаги для приобретения акций или имущества, необходимых для дальнейшей эксплуатации объекта. Санкции, введенные против России в ответ на её действия на международной арене, затронули широкий спектр бизнеса, включая спортивные и развлекательные объекты. Helsinki Hall, как один из таких объектов, оказался в сложной ситуации. В декабре 2023 года стало известно, что владельцы арены могут продать ее в соответствии со статьей, принятой вместе с 12-м пакетом санкций ЕС. Это решение было вызвано необходимостью устранить правовые и финансовые препятствия, которые возникли из-за санкций. Согласно информации, полученной от финских СМИ, компания, владеющая ареной, находится на грани банкротства. Неоплаченные счета на сотни тысяч евро и невозможность проводить финансовые операции через финские банки, которые не могут обрабатывать платежи от лиц, находящихся под санкциями, усугубляют ситуацию. Активы компании также заморожены, что делает дальнейшую эксплуатацию арены затруднительной. Представитель городской администрации Хельсинки заявил, что город активно работает над тем, чтобы приобрести необходимые...

title: Việt Nam sẽ đóng góp tích cực cho nền kinh tế số 2.000 tỉ USD
content: "Để giải phóng tiềm năng và điều hướng sự phức tạp của thời đại kỹ thuật số khu vực ASEAN cần một cách tiếp cận đa hướng, ưu tiên đổi mới sáng tạo có trách nhiệm, luồng dữ liệu liền mạch, an ninh mạng mạnh mẽ và sự tham gia có chiến lược với cộng đồng người dân di cư ra nước ngoài" - WEF nhấn mạnh. Bài viết của Diễn đàn Kinh tế Thế giới cũng lưu ý, "Hiệp định Khung về Kinh tế Kỹ thuật Số ASEAN (DEFA) dự kiến giúp ASEAN đạt được những mục tiêu này". AI được ca ngợi là công cụ có thể mang lại lợi ích cho các lĩnh vực như chăm sóc sức khỏe, nông nghiệp và tài chính nhưng cũng bị xem là mối đe dọa nếu không được kiểm soát. Do đó, các quốc gia ASEAN “cần thiết lập một khuôn khổ vững chắc cho AI có đạo đức, đảm bảo rằng việc phát triển và triển khai AI phù hợp với các nguyên tắc công bằng, minh bạch và gắn với trách nhiệm giải trình”. Để hiện thực hóa điều này, phải có các cơ chế thực thi phối hợp, hiệu quả. Bên cạnh đó, cũng cần có sự phối hợp trong chuẩn hóa quản trị dữ liệu. “Dòng dữ liệu xuyên biên giới tự do giúp thương mại và giao thương liền mạch nhưng việc địa phương...

title: No me va ganar la pobreza: Disfrazó a su amigo de bebé para entrar gratis a parque de diversiones
content: , y estos populares tiktokers lo demostraron con una travesura que no tardó en viralizarse. PUBLICIDAD Los populares argentinos lo volvieron a hacer, esta vez con su estrategia para ingresar a un parque diversiones sin pagar. “Voy a tratar de hacer pasar a Ivo al parque pero vestido de bebé”, comentaba mostrando al compañero con chupete, manta y a bordo de un cochecito. El intento surgió al ver que los menores de tres años de edad ingresaban al recinto sin tener que pagar. Vamos a ver qué pasa, decía Mou rodando el coche sin despertar la curiosidad de los empleados que controlaban el ingreso. Desde el interior del coche, Ivo filmaba este momento crucial: el ingreso. Sin ningún tipo de revisión ni problema, entraron al parque y poco después comenzaron a celebrar, “Lo logramos, lo logramos”. , además adornado con peluches, aunque no subió a la montaña rusa con su chupete aún en la boca, un detalle que desató las risas de los seguidores quienes reaccionaron en . “jajaja se dejaba el chupete”, “A esa edad son tremendos”, “Que rápido crece el nene jajajjjajaja”, “jajajaajaj apto para las que tienen 4 pibes jaja”, “Yo no lo puedo creer JAJAJAJAJAJA”, “Estallé desde el segundo uno”, “No se iba a sacar el chupete él, seguía en el papel” Otros se burlaron de Ivo quien salió del coche con dolor de espalda. “La marca del coche por favor! se ve que es irrompible...

title: ঢাকা ওয়াসার এমডি তাকসিম এ খানের পদত্যাগ
creator: বাংলা ট্রিবিউন রিপোর্ট
content: ঢাকা ওয়াসার ব্যবস্থাপনা পরিচালক (এমডি) তাকসিম এ খান পদত্যাগ করেছেন। বুধবার (১৪ আগস্ট) অনলাইন মাধ্যমে তিনি তার পদত্যাগপত্র পাঠিয়েছেন বলে জানিয়েছে একটি সূত্র। সাবেক প্রধানমন্ত্রী শেখ হাসিনার শাসনামলের অন্যতম আলোচিত চরিত্র ছিলেন এই তাকসিম। সূত্র জানায়, পদত্যাগপত্রে অসুস্থতা জনিত কারণে ওয়াসার ব্যবস্থাপনা পরিচালকের দায়িত্ব পালন করতে অপারগতার কথা জানিয়েছেন তিনি। জানা যায়, ২০০৯ সালে ঢাকা ওয়াসার এমডি পদে প্রথমবারের মতো নিয়োগ পেয়েছিলেন তাকসিম এ খান। এরপর দফায় দফায় তার মেয়াদ বাড়তে থাকে। সর্বশেষ গত বছরের আগস্টে সপ্তমবারের মতো ওই পদে আরও তিন বছরের জন্য নিয়োগ পান তিনি। দুর্নীতি, অনিয়মসহ নানা অভিযোগ থাকার পরও তাকসিমকে একই পদে দীর্ঘ সময় রাখা নিয়ে প্রশ্ন উঠে। ২০০৯ সালের পর থেকে ঢাকা ওয়াসার পানির দাম বাড়ে ১৬ বার। গত ১৫ বছরে ঢাকা ওয়াসায় একচ্ছত্র ক্ষমতার অধিকারী ছিলেন তাকসিম এ খান। গত ৫ আগস্ট শেখ হাসিনার পদত্যাগের পর থেকেই তাকসিম এ খান একদিনও নিজের দপ্তরে আসেননি। তিনি দেশে আছেন, নাকি বিদেশে চলে গেছেন, সেটিও নিশ্চিতভাবে জানা যায়নি। অবশ্য হাসিনা সরকারের পতনের পর, তাকসিমকে অবিলম্বে পদত্যাগ ও গ্রেপ্তারের দাবিতে বিক্ষোভ করেছেন ঢাকা ওয়াসার কর্মকর্তা-কর্মচারীরা। তাকসিম এ খান, তার স্ত্রী ও সন্তানেরা যুক্তরাষ্ট্রের নাগরিক। তাই অনেকেই ধারণা করছেন, তিনি হয়তো যুক্তরাষ্ট্রে পারি জমিয়েছেন। বর্তমানে বিভিন্ন প্রকল্পে ঢাকা ওয়াসার বৈদেশিক ঋণের পরিমাণ প্রায় ১৯ হাজার কোটি টাকা। কিন্তু প্রকল্প বাস্তবায়নের ধীরগতি এবং বাস্তবায়নের পর তা চালু করতে না পারার মতো কারণে সংস্থাটির...

title: Dapat Penghargaan dari Presiden Jokowi, Menteri BUMN Erick Thohir Pamer Bareng Eks Anak Buahnya
content: Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) memberikan tanda kehormatan kepada sejumlah tokoh yang dinilai berkontribusi terhadap bangsa, salah satunya Menteri Badan Usaha Milik Negara (BUMN) . Adapun, terdapat 64 tokoh yang memperoleh Gelar Tanda Jasa dan Tanda Kehormatan (GTK) di Istana Negara, pada hari Rabu (14/8/2024). Selain , terlihat pula sejumlah Menteri dan Wakil Menteri (Wamen) yang juga memperoleh gelar tersebut. Seperti Menteri Kesehatan (Menkes) Budi Gunadi Sadikin, Wakil Menteri Luar Negeri Pahala Nugraha Mansury, dan Wakil Menteri BUMN II Kartika Wirjoatmodjo. Menariknya, Budi Gunadi dan Pahala Mansury sebelumnya sempat menjadi anak buah . Keduanya sempat menjabat sebagai Wakil . Adanya pencapaian tersebut, Erick mengaku bangga mampu bekerjasama bersama keduanya saat di Kementerian BUMN. "Berbangga, kami berempat pernah bersama-sama berkontribusi untuk Kementerian BUMN. Hari ini kami dipertemukan kembali di Istana Merdeka di acara pemberian gelar tanda jasa dan kehormatan oleh Bapak Presiden ," ungkap Erick dalam unggahan akun media sosial pribadinya, Rabu (14/8/2024). "Pak Budi Gunadi Sadikin sekarang Menteri Kesehatan, Pak Pahala Nugraha Mansury Wakil Menteri Luar Negeri, dan Pak Kartika Wirjoatmodjo bersama saya di Kementerian BUMN," sambungnya. Diketahui, Presiden Joko Widodo memberikan tanda jasa dan kehormatan ini sebagai rangkaian Hari Kemerdekaan ke-79 RI. Pemberian...

title: Украинский омбудсмен рассказал об обсуждении обмена пленными с Россией
creator: Лариса Кочеткова
content: Уполномоченный по правам человека на Украине Дмитрий Лубинец заявил, что обсуждает тему обмена пленными со своей российской коллегой Татьяной Москальковой. Об этом он написал в своем Telegram-канале. «Обмен информацией продолжается. (...) Украина всегда готова продолжать обменные процессы», – написал Лубинец. При этом Москалькова официально эту информацию пока не подтверждала. Ранее сообщалось, что Россия и Украина могут на неопределенное время обмен пленными и убитыми, так как ВСУ атаковали единственный в зоне СВО АПП «Колотиловка» в Белгородской области, где происходил обменный процесс.

title: Accused sent to 10-day police remand
மயிலாப்பூர் நிதி நிறுவன ரகசிய அறையில் இருந்து மாயமான 300 கிலோ தங்கம் எங்கே என தேவநாதனிடம் கிடுக்கிப்பிடி விசாரணை
content: * வரும் 28ம் தேதி வரை சிறையில் அடைப்பு * 5 நாள் போலீஸ் காவலில் விசாரிக்க முடிவு * தேவநாதனின் நெருங்கிய கூட்டாளி தலைமறைவு சென்னை: மயிலாப்பூர் இந்து நிரந்தர வைப்பு நிதி நிறுவன கட்டிடத்தின் ரகசிய அறையில் வைத்திருந்த 300 கிலோ தங்கம் மற்றும் நிரந்தர வைப்பு முதலீட்டாளர்களின் ரூ.525 கோடி பணம் எங்கே என்று கைது செய்யப்பட்ட தேவநாதன் யாதவிடம் 2வது நாளாக நேற்றும் பொருளாதார குற்றப்பிரிவு போலீசார் கிடுக்குப்பிடி விசாரணை நடத்தினர். மோசடிக்கு உடந்தையாக இருந்த மேலும் 2 பேர் கைது செய்யப்பட்டுள்ளனர். மேலும் தலைமறைவான தேவநாதனின் நெருங்கிய கூட்டாளியை போலீசார் தேடி வருகின்றனர். சென்னை மயிலாப்பூர் தெற்கு மாட வீதியில் உள்ள ‘தி மயிலாப்பூர் இந்து நிரந்தர வைப்பு நிதி லிமிடெட்’ என்ற பெயரில் இயங்கி வந்த நிதி நிறுவனத்தில் ஆண்டுக்கு 8 முதல் 12 சதவீதம் வரை முதலீட்டு பணத்திற்கு வட்டி தருவதாக பொய்யான வாக்குறுதிகளை அளித்துள்ளனர். அதன்படி இந்த நிதி நிறுவனத்தில் தமிழ்நாடு முழுவதிலும் இருந்து 5 ஆயிரத்திற்கும் மேற்பட்டோர் நிரந்தர வைப்பு நிதியாக ரூ.525 கோடி வரை முதலீடு செய்துள்ளனர். இந்நிலையில் கடந்த ஓராண்டுக்கு மேலாக முதலீட்டு பணத்தின் முதிர்வு பணம் திரும்ப கொடுக்கப்படவில்லை. இதனால் பாதிக்கப்பட்டவர்கள் மயிலாப்பூரில் உள்ள தலைமை அலுவலகத்தை முற்றுகையிட்டு போராட்டம் நடத்தினர். இதன் தொடர்ச்சியாக பாதிக்கப்பட்ட 144 பேர் தங்களது ரூ.24.5 கோடி பணத்தை பெற்று தரக் கோரி அசோக் நகரில் உள்ள பொருளாதார குற்றப்பிரிவில் புகார் அளித்தனர். புகாரை தொடர்ந்து, நிதி நிறுவனத்தின் நிர்வாக இயக்குநர் தேவநாதன் யாதவ், மோசடிக்கு...

title: Rechaza TAS pedido de la luchadora Phogat
creator: AP
content: La apelación que presentó la luchadora Vinesh Phogat para compartir la medalla de plata después de que fue descalificada de la final de los Juegos Olímpicos tras no superar el pesaje fue rechazada por la división de París del Tribunal de Arbitraje Deportivo, confirmó el miércoles el tribunal.

title: درخواست گروه‌های فلسطینی برای اتخاذ مواضع یکپارچه در قبال مذاکرات آتش بس
content: به گزارش چهارشنبه شب به نقل از پایگاه تلگرامی جنبش مقاومت اسلامی (حماس)، جنبش حماس، کمیته های مقاومت در فلسطین، جنبش مجاهدین فلسطین و جنبش آزادگان فلسطین روز چهارشنبه با امضای بیانیه ای مشترک بر لزوم پایبندی به توافقات مذکور و یکپارچه سازی تلاش های طرف های فلسطینی به منظور تحقق اهداف مورد نظر این توافقات تاکید کردند. این گروه ها در بیانیه ای مشترک تاکید کردند که «فردای جنگ مساله ای کاملا فلسطینی است و باید تنها میان طرف های فلسطینی مورد بررسی قرار گیرد» و تلاش های رژیم صهیونیستی و دولت آمریکا یا همپیمانان آنها برای تحمیل اراده های جایگزین به صَخره ایستادگی ملت فلسطین و رشادت های مقاومت برخورد می‌کند. گروه های ملی فلسطین باتاکید بر لزوم اصلاح ساختار نظام سیاسی فلسطین و سازمان آزادی بخش فلسطین به منظور حضور تمامی طرف های ملی در چارچوب این سازمان و کمک به تحقق آرمان های ملت فلسطین در زمینه تشکیل کشور مستقل فلسطین به پایتختی قدس شریف، خواستار تحرک مردمی فوری در تمامی عرصه ها و میدان ها و پایتخت ها به منظور توقف نسل کشی در غزه و فلسطین و حمایت از قدس و مسجد الاقصی در برابر اقدامات تروریستی رژیم صهیونیستی و شهرک نشینان صهیونیست شد. چهار گروه فلسطینی یاد شده با حمایت از از عملیات های قهرمانانه مقاومتی در کرانه باختری و قدس و اراضی اشغالی سال ۱۹۴۸ فلسطین از مقاومت فلسطین در این مناطق خواستند که عملیات های مقاومتی فراگیر خود را شدت ببخشند و از مبارزان مقاومت در برابر تلاش ها برای دستگیری حمایت کنند. این گروه های فلسطینی همچنین ضمن ستایش از مقاومت ملت فلسطین در غزه و دیگر سرزمین...

title: Este domingo, el Autódromo Francisco Villa será escenario de los arrancones cuarto de milla VIP
content: Deportes / miércoles 14 de agosto de 2024 Este domingo, el Autódromo Francisco Villa será escenario de los arrancones cuarto de milla VIP ¡Vive la adrenalina! El Autódromo Internacional Francisco Villa se convertirá en el epicentro de la velocidad y la adrenalina este domingo 18 de agosto Foto: Autódromo Francisco Villa Sergio Juárez / El Heraldo de Chihuahua El Autódromo Internacional Francisco Villa, se convertirá en el epicentro de la velocidad y la adrenalina este domingo 18 de agosto, cuando el olor a llanta quemada y el rugir de los motores hagan vibrar a los aficionados en la octava fecha de arrancones cuarto de milla en su modalidad de VIP. title: Brohman furious over Boyd's Hall of Fame call
creator: AAP
content: Darryl Brohman has hit out at the NRL over Les Boyd's entry to the Hall of Fame, furious over the so-called hard man's on-field record of foul play. Brohman took to social media on Wednesday night to criticise the Hall of Fame selection, in the latest chapter of an ongoing feud between he and Boyd. Boyd was banned for nine months in 1983 when he broke Brohman's jaw with a swinging arm, spoiling the Queenslander's State of Origin debut. Brohman later attempted to sue the NSW forward, with the pair reaching an out-of-court settlement. It was one of a number of incidents through Boyd's career, including an eye-gouging charge in 1984 that effectively ended his career in Australia. "Les Boyd.....9 Months suspension for breaking my Jaw in 1983," Brohman posted on X. "12 Months for Eye gouging Billy Johnston......Gets inducted into the Rugby League Hall of Fame. Please!!!!" Boyd himself also threatened to sue Brohman in 2007, after the former Queensland representative asked Boyd's wife if she felt he was an "embarrassment" on live radio. Boyd was one of 11 men's players appointed to the Hall of Fame on Wednesday, alongside modern-day greats Cameron Smith, Billy Slater, Cooper Cronk, Benji Marshall, Johnathan Thurston, Sam Burgess and Greg Inglis. In a media release confirming his appointment, the NRL labelled Boyd as one of the game's hard men. "Boyd was one of the game's hard men...

title: Rohtak News: गाय माता को राष्ट्रमाता का दर्जा दिलाने के लिए तिरंगा यात्रा निकाली
content: रोहतक। गाय माता को राष्ट्रमाता का दर्जा दिलाने के लिए बुधवार को संतों और गोरक्षको की ओर से 78वें स्वतंत्रता दिवस की पूर्व संध्या व विभाजन विभीषिका स्मृति दिवस पर भव्य तिरंगा यात्रा निकाली गई। यह यात्रा माता दरवाजा चौक स्थित संकट मोचन मंदिर से सुबह 10:00 बजे आरंभ हुई। यात्रा को महामंडलेश्वर कपिलपुरी ने हरी झंडी दिखाकर रवाना किया। संत समाज ने बांग्लादेश में हिंदुओं पर हो रहे अत्याचारों पर रोष व्यक्त किया। उन्होंने भारत सरकार से मांग की कि जल्द कार्रवाई करके हिंदू समाज को उपद्रवियों से मुक्ति दिलाए। गोभक्तों और संत समाज ने गोमाता की जय के जयकारे लगाए । यात्रा संकट मोचन मंदिर से पुराना बस अड्डा, भिवानी स्टैंड, शांतमाई चौक, सोनीपत स्टैंड मेडिकल मोड़ से होते हुए शहीद स्मारक स्थल गेट नंबर 1 एमडीयू दिल्ली बाईपास पर संपन्न हुई। इसकी अध्यक्षता महामंडलेश्वर अनभूतानंद सूर्यवंशी महाराज ने की। -108 मीटर लंबा ध्वज आकर्षण का रहा केंद्र साध्वी मानेश्वरी देवी और महामंडलेश्वर अनभूतानंद ने बताया कि यात्रा में भारत माता, गोमाता, सरस्वती माता के स्वरूप में नन्हे बच्चे आकर्षित वेशभूषा में अपनी प्रस्तुति दी। यात्रा के साथ चला 108 मीटर लंबा ध्वज सभी के लिए आकर्षण का केंद्र रहा। उन्होंने कहा कि यात्रा का मुख्य उद्देश्य गोमाता को राष्ट्रमाता का दर्जा दिलाना है। गोमाता में 33 कोटि देवी-देवताओं का वास माना जाता है। - प्रधानमंत्री और मुख्यमंत्री को सौपेंगे ज्ञापन महामंडलेश्वर अनभूतानंद ने कहा कि गोमाता को राष्ट्र माता का दर्जा दिलाने के लिए हस्ताक्षर सहित प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी और मुख्यमंत्री नायब सैनी...

title: Pengamat Bicara Pengunduran Diri Airlangga, Singgung Cawe-cawe Politik-Kasus yang Ditangani Kejagung
content: - Pengamat politik Ikrar Nusa Bhakti mengaku terkejut dengan kabar mundur sebagai Ketua Umum Partai . Sebab, menurutnya, tidak ada peristiwa politik yang genting di internal sebelumnya. Apalagi, Ikrar mengaku juga sebelumnya telah menanyakan kepada jajaran Partai soal wacana Munaslub yang bakal digelar pada Agustus atau September, mendatang. Hal itu disampaikan Ikrar Nusa Bhakti saat sesi wawancara khusus dengan Direktur Pemberitaan Febby Mahendra Putra di Studio , Palmerah, Jakarta, Senin (12/8/2024) malam. "Saya terus terang sangat terkejut. Kenapa demikian? Itu kalau istilahnya itu out of the blue. Nggak ada angin, nggak ada hujan, nggak ada badai. Tiba-tiba dia mengundurkan diri," kata Ikrar. "Karena malamnya itu sudah sudah ada santer mengenai isu itu. Dan ternyata benar, pagi-pagi itu pengumuman itu muncul," sambung dia. Ikrar pun menduga bahwa pengunduran diri Airlangga ada intervensi politik ataupun cawe-cawe politik dari kekuatan di atasnya. Apalagi, lanjut dia, berita mundurnya Airlangga setelah bertemu Jokowi pada hari Sabtu selama kurang lebih satu jam lebih. Dia juga mendapati informasi bahwa mundurnya Airlangga ada kaitannya dengan kasus yang tengah ditangani oleh Kejaksaan Agung. Namun, dia menyayangkan bahwa kasus itu tidak bergulir sejak awal sebelum ada gonjang-ganjing Partai berlambang pohon beringin tersebut. "Dan kalau memang itu terkait dengan persoalan...

title: Thailand’s Muay Thai Summer Camp 2024 Delivers Unparalleled Inspiration with Bridger Walker
content: Thursday, August 15, 2024 The Amazing Thailand Muay Thai Summer Camp 2024, running from July 16 to 28, delivered an immersive two-week experience combining Muay Thai training with cultural exploration. A standout moment of the camp was the involvement of WBC Honorary Champion Bridger Walker, renowned for his heroic act at the age of six. The Tourism Authority of Thailand (TAT), in collaboration with the World Boxing Council (WBC) MuayThai, EVA Air, and See My Thailand travel agency, recently hosted the Amazing Thailand Muay Thai Summer Camp 2024. Held from July 16 to 28, this inaugural event combined intensive Muay Thai training with rich cultural experiences, offering participants a truly immersive experience. Participants honed their skills under the guidance of top Muay Thai trainers, who provided expert coaching and rigorous practice sessions. The camp went beyond physical training, as attendees were also introduced to Thailand’s vibrant culture through a series of engaging activities. Highlights included attending live Muay Thai matches at the iconic Ratchadamnoen and Lumpinee Stadiums, exploring famous landmarks, and participating in the sacred Wai Kru ceremony in Ayutthaya, culminating in a special certificate ceremony. These experiences not only enhanced their appreciation of Muay Thai but also deepened their connection to Thailand’s cultural heritage. A key figure at...

title: Flávio Dino suspende execução de emendas parlamentares que não tenham transparência
content: A decisão de Dino atendeu a um pedido do . As ao orçamento - aquelas em que o governo é obrigado a executar - podem ser de bancada ou individuais e incluem as chamadas emendas PIX, em que os valores são transferidos por parlamentares diretamente para estados ou municípios, sem a necessidade de apresentação de projeto ou justificativa. No começo de agosto, o ministro Flávio Dino já tinha determinado que a execução das emendas PIX teria de seguir critérios de transparência e rastreabilidade, o que gerou reações do Congresso. De acordo com o ministro, os pagamentos terão de ser interrompidos até que o governo e o Congresso criem novas regras para a execução do orçamento. e que não é compatível com a Constituição Federal a execução de emendas ao orçamento que não obedeçam a critérios técnicos de , e . Ou seja, com a decisão, o governo não é obrigado a executar uma emenda impositiva se ela não cumprir esses requisitos.

title: Umar Amin’s 177 powers Shaheens to strong position against Bangladesh A
creator: Our Staff Reporter
content: LAHORE - Umar Amin’s 32nd first-class century has put Pakistan Shaheens in a commanding position against Bangladesh ‘A’ at the close of day two of the first four-day match at the Islamabad Club on Wednesday. At stumps, Shaheens were 367 for four in 90 overs, with a first innings lead of 245 runs. Saad Khan (31 not out, 39b, 6x4s) and Kamran Ghulam (20 not out, 63b, 1x4,1x6), will resume batting on the third day, which will begin at 09.30am today. For Bangladesh ‘A’, left-arm spinner Hasan Murad bagged two wickets for 49 runs. Earlier, after resuming their first innings at the overnight score of two for no loss, the home side were dealt a blow when left-handed batter Saim Ayub returned back to the hut, scoring 11 off 28 balls, which included a four. Mohammad Huraira was the second batter to be dismissed, scoring 39 off 67 balls, hitting five boundaries. The experienced Umar was then joined by captain Saud Shakeel and the pair knitted a 195-run partnership for the third wicket. During the partnership, left-handed Umar brought up his century. He fell 23 runs short of a double-century, and was dismissed for 177 off 211 balls, smashing 23 fours and three towering sixes. After Umar’s departure, fellow southpaw Saud soon followed the centurion and was stumped off the bowling of Hasan for 76 with the scorecard reading 322 for four. title: Coral-La Pampa: 1.200 cantantes de 29 pueblos movilizan a más de 7 mil pampeanos
creator: diario2
content: Más de 7 mil pampeanos y pampeanas están participando de la edición número 22 de Coral-La Pampa , un encuentro artístico único en el país que se está llevando a cabo durante agosto y septiembre en toda la Provincia. Serán 32 conciertos en 29 localidades con la participación de 40 coros diferentes, que incluyen a unos 1.200 coreutas. “Los conciertos son a sala llena y constituyen una fiesta para el pueblo. Van los intendentes e intendentas, concejales y concejalas, y después del show se comparten momentos con el público”, resaltó Mario Figueroa, presidente de la Asociación Coral La Pampa. Hay 29 localidades que son subsedes de este encuentro federal: Adolfo Van Praet, Alta Italia, Anchorena, Arata, Ataliva Roca, Bernardo Larroudé, Ceballos, Colonia Barón, Embajador Martini, Falucho, General Acha, General Pico, General San Martín, Guatraché, Hilario Lagos, Ingeniero Luiggi, Intendente Alvear, Jacinto Arauz, Macachín, Maisonnave, Miguel Riglos, Parera, Rancul, Realicó, Santa Rosa, Toay, Trenel, Victorica y Quemú Quemú. Figueroa aseguró que para lograr este emprendimiento es fundamental el apoyo del Gobierno de La Pampa, a través de la Secretaría de Cultura. “Estas políticas de Estado presente nos permiten desarrollar actividades tan importantes para la comunidad. Sexual abuse trial of Tampa Bay Rays shortstop Wander Franco is delayed until Sept. 26
creator: By MARTÍN ADAMES - Associated Press
content: PUERTO PLATA, Dominican Republic (AP) — The second phase of Wander Franco's trial on charges of sexually abusing a minor was delayed until Sept. 26. The decision of the court in the province of Puerto Plata, in the north of the Dominican Republic, was due to the defense team of the Tampa Bay shortstop not being notified of audiovisual evidence that was going to be shown during a hearing scheduled for Wednesday. The 23-year-old has been charged with sexually abusing a 14-year-old girl. Prosecutors filed charges in January, six months after a judge ordered he be investigated . Dominican law splits the court proceedings into a preparatory phase, a preliminary ruling and a final ruling. Franco attended the hearing with a lawyer and family members. He did not speak to reporters. Documents that prosecutors presented to a judge in July and were viewed by The Associated Press alleged Franco through his mother, Yudelka Aybar, transferred one million pesos or $17,000 to the mother of the minor on Jan. 5, 2023. Franco was conditionally released on Jan. 5, four days after his arrest. The mother of the underage girl is under house arrest. Franco is charged with sexual and commercial exploitation against a minor, sexual abuse and human trafficking. Franco, who turned 23 on March 1, was in the midst of his third major league season when his career was halted in August 2023. He agreed to a...

title: Mining tax: Hemant terms SC verdict as ‘huge victory’
content: Ranchi: Supreme Court’s Wednesday ruling which gave the states authority to impose taxes on mineral rights and land having minerals has been welcomed by chief minister Hemant Soren . He said this would pave the way for the state to receive its dues of Rs 1.36 lakh-crore from the Centre. In a major victory for mineral-rich states, the Supreme Court allowed them to recover from the Centre and mining companies royalty and tax dues on mineral rights and mineral-bearing lands since April 1, 2005 over a period of 12 years. Hours after the verdict, Soren took to his X handle and said it was a “huge victory”. “The Supreme Court’s historic decision has made our demands successful. Now, Jharkhand will get its share of outstanding dues of Rs 1.36 lakh crore from the Centre,” Soren added. The CM, who had been claiming since assuming office in 2019 that the Centre was reluctant to give Jharkhand its dues, further wrote that the dues will be compensated in a phased manner over the course of 12 years. “The dues of mining royalties since 2005 will be paid. The money will be used for securing the rights of Jharkhand’s people and their welfare,” he further wrote on ‘X’. On July 25, the top court had ruled the legislative power to tax mineral rights vests in states and not Parliament. We also published the following articles recently SC allows states to collect past dues on royalty on minerals...

title: Aaron Macarthur joins MiQ as director of business development
creator: Alisha Buaya
content: MiQ has appointed Aaron Macarthur to the newly-created role of director of business development for Australia and New Zealand. In the role, Macarthur will focus on developing commercial growth opportunities across the company in Australia and New Zealand, reporting to MiQ ANZ commercial director Stuart Parker . Macarthur brings 15 years of experience in strategy, media and commercial experience to the global programmatic media partner . He also has significant media technology and product expertise across a range of verticals, including government, banking, technology, entertainment, automotive, and travel. He was most recently the founder of Convo Ink, a programmatic content business based in Sydney. Macarthur also has a background in sales with Southern Cross Austereo and News Corp Australia and has worked with Verizon and Allure Media. Parker said: “Aaron is a welcome addition to the MiQ ANZ senior commercial team. He is well-known to the business, having worked closely with our ANZ team for the past few months in a contracting role. “During that time, he quickly became a highly valued member of our ANZ operation, impressing with his commitment to innovation and performance, and his wide-scale industry partnerships. “Aaron brings a track record for securing long-term client relationships and I am confident he will leverage his expertise to identify new growth opportunities,...

title: Poonch News: 78 फुट तिरंगे के साथ नियंत्रण रेखा के करीब निकाली रैली
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, पुंछ
content: पड़ोसी देश को भारत की एकता और देश भक्ति का दिया पैगाम संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी पुंछ। स्वतंत्रता दिवस को लेकर बुधवार को भारत पाकिस्तान नियंत्रण रेखा पर स्थित मॉडल हायर सेकंडरी स्कूल सावजियां कलास्टर के स्कूलों ने मिलकर देश के 78वें स्वतंत्रता दिवस पर पहली बार 78 फुट लंबे तिरंगे के साथ रैली निकाली। रैली में मॉडल हायर सेकंडरी स्कूल सावजियां के साथ ही अन्य स्कूलों के 400 से अधिक विद्यार्थियों और शिक्षकों ने भाग लिया। रैली की अगुवाई माडल हायर सेकंडरी स्कूल सावजियां के प्रिंसिपल और कलास्टर प्रमुख अनवर खान और सावजियां पुलिस चौकी प्रभारी सुशांत सिंह सम्बयाल ने की। स्कूल से शुरू हुई 78 फुट लम्बे तिरंगे की रैली में 78 बच्चों ने तिरंगा उठा रखा था और 300 से अधिक बच्चे साथ चल रहे थे। यह रैली नियंत्रण रेखा पर पाकिस्तानी सेना की चौकियों के सामने से सावजियां, गड़ियां गली मैदान तक करीब ढाई किलोमीटर का सफर तय करने के बाद पुलिस चौकी के बाहर पहुंच कर संपन्न हुई। प्रिंसिपल अनवर खान ने बताया कि देश के 78वें स्वंतत्रता दिवस पर 78 फुट लंबे तिरंगे को लेकर रैली निकाली है। इसका उद्देश्य पड़ोसी मुल्क पाकिस्तान को यह संदेश देना है कि वह चाहे जो कुछ कर ले भारतवासियों के दिलों से देशभक्ति का जज्बा और तिरंगे का मान कभी कम नहीं कर सकता है।

title: Relatively unscathed
creator: sport@thedailyherald.com (Editorial Dept.)
content: Ernesto caused only minor damage as it passed some 45 miles south of St. Maarten on Tuesday afternoon. While the island experienced tropical-storm-force winds, rain and rough seas, their impact was not devastating for the most part. The cyclone caused considerable flooding elsewhere but ultimately spared much of the region. Many were no doubt relieved, but should keep in mind the people of Bermuda, who now face a major hurricane-hit. Keeping schools closed Monday was called premature by some, as local effects had not been expected until Tuesday. The same goes for closing businesses from Monday at 11:00pm, while – for example – St. Eustatius did so only at noon on Tuesday. Although in hindsight there may be some truth to that, one understands acting out of an abundance of caution beforehand. This way law enforcement authorities and emergency services practically had the road to themselves in their efforts to ensure disaster-management readiness. These weather systems remain hard to predict especially while still developing. Even small changes in direction, speed and strength can make a big difference. The country in any case went through its first serious threat of the Atlantic Hurricane Season 2024 and appears to have came out relatively unscathed.

title: Big Georgia county to start charging some costs to people who challenge the eligibility of voters
creator: Associated Press
content: ATLANTA (AP) — An election board in one of Georgia's largest counties has voted to start charging people who challenge the eligibility of voters for the cost of notifying the challenged voters. The Cobb County Board of Elections and Registrations voted 4-1 on Tuesday to adopt the rule. Debbie Fisher, a Republican member of the board, was the only vote against the rule. Republican activists are challenging thousands of voters in Georgia as part a coordinated by to take names off voting rolls. Most of the people they are targeting have moved away from their old address, and the activists argue that letting those names stay on the rolls invites fraud. But Democrats and liberal voting rights activists argue Republicans are challenging voters either to remove Democrats about the accuracy of elections in advance of 2024 presidential voting. Democrats have been pushing to start charging for each challenge filed, in part as an effort to deter people from targeting hundred or thousands of voters using software programs such as EagleAI or IV3 that facilitate mass challenges. A 2021 Georgia law specifically says one person can challenge an in their own county. In suburban Atlanta's Cobb County, a onetime Republican bastion that now produces Democratic majorities, the board voted only to charge for the cost of printing the challenge notice and for postage to mail it, likely to be less...

title: Pesta Rakyat Hari Jadi ke-74 Provinsi Kalsel, Paman Birin-Acil Odah Bagikan Makanan Gratis
content: Puncak Peringatan Hari Jadi Ke-74 Provinsi Kalsel berlangsung meriah dan penuh khidmat di eks kantor gubernur atau , Rabu (14/8/2024). Salah satu acara yang ditunggu masyarakat adalah yang menyuguhkan makanan gratis. Sebanyak 50 ribu porsi disediakan. Terlihat sejak pagi, ribuan orang mendatangi lebih dari 100 stan. Masing-masing stan menyediakan 500 porsi. Di antara stan terdapat Warung , Kampung Banjar, Expo Semarak 74, Expo Perbankan dan layanan kesehatan dan masih banyak lagi. Pemerintah kabupaten/kota juga ikut meramaikan dengan menyediakan makanan gratis pada acara makan bersama rakyat dengan Gubernur Kalsel H Sahbirin Noor atau . Paman Birin disertai Ketua TP PKK Kalsel Hj Raudatul Jannah atau juga sempat mengunjungi deretan stan makanan dan membagikannya kepada masyarakat. Acil Basnah, warga Pemurus Dalam Banjarmasin, mengaku sangat senang dengan makan gratis ini. “Terima kasih dan , ulun setiap tahun datang di acara hari jadi ini. Selain ada makanan gratis, bisa melihat peringatan hari jadi,” seru Acil Basnah. Dalam kesempatan itu, juga membuka Festival Wisata Budaya Pasar Terapung 2024. Pembukaan ditandai dengan peletusan meriam bambu. Selanjutnya dan menyempatkan diri menyapa para acil-acil yang berjualan di kelotok Pasar Terapung dan mengunjungi Kampung Banjar. Kampung Banjar merupakan representasi dari kehidupan dan kebudayaan masyarakat Banjar, yang ditampilkan...

title: [SC리뷰] 무명 子 하수도 청소 모습에 눈물 보인 장광 '안쓰럽다' (아빠하고 나하고)
creator: 조민정 기자
content: [스포츠조선 조민정 기자]장광과 그의 아들 장영이 오랜 갈등을 극복하고 관계 회복의 가능성을 보여주며 감동을 선사했다. 14일 방송된 TV CHOSUN '아빠하고 나하고'는 전국 시청률 3.1%(닐슨 코리아 기준)를 기록하며 종편 전체 1위를 차지했다. 분당 최고 시청률은 3.4%에 달하며 많은 관심을 받았다. 이날 방송에서 장광의 아들 장영은 수산물 도매 업체에서 일일 아르바이트를 하는 모습을 공개했다. 그는 "배우로서 일이 잘 풀리기 전까지는 단기 아르바이트를 통해 생활을 유지하고 있다"며 자신의 현실을 솔직하게 털어놓았다. 장영은 무거운 광어 박스를 옮기고, 하수도 청소까지 하는 고된 일을 하며 힘든 일상을 보냈다. 그는 "언제까지 이런 일을 해야 할지 모르겠다"며 배우 생활의 불확실성에 대한 고민을 드러냈다. 30대 초반까지 배우 생활을 포기하려고 했던 그는 "무대에서 박수를 받으면 그동안의 고생이 다 보상되는 느낌이 든다"며 연기를 포기할 수 없는 이유를 밝혔다. 장광 부부는 아들의 일터를 깜짝 방문했다. 하수도를 청소하고 있는 아들의 모습을 본 장광은 "저렇게 힘들게 일하고 있었구나. 그동안 내가 아들에 대해 잘못 생각했던 것 같다"며 눈시울을 붉혔다. 일을 마치고 함께 외식을 하며, 장영은 아빠에게 직접 대게 다리를 발라주며 변화된 모습을 보였다. 이에 장광은 "부자간에 희망의 싹이 트고 있다"며 감동을...

title: Panipat News: इंटर कॉलेज वॉलीबाॅल में महर्षि मार्केंडेश्वर यूनिवर्सिटी अंबाला बनी विजेता
content: पानीपत। प्रेम इंस्टीट्यूट ऑफ मेडिकल साइंसेज बड़ौली में दो दिवसीय इंटर कॉलेज वॉलीबॉल प्रतियोगिता में महर्षि मार्केंडेश्वर यूनिवर्सिटी अंबाला विजेता रही। उप विजेता पानीपत इंंस्टीट्यूट ऑफ इंजीनियरिंग एवं टेक्नोलॉजी की टीम रही। प्रेम इंस्टीट्यूट ऑफ मेडिकल साइंसेज बड़ौली में दो दिवसीय इंटर कॉलेज वॉलीबॉल प्रतियोगिता का बुधवार को समापन हो गया। प्रतियोगिता में पानीपत, करनाल, अंबाला व सोनीपत की सात टीमों ने हिस्सा लिया। इसमें प्रेम इंस्टीट्यूट ऑफ मेडिकल साइंसेज, गीता यूनिवर्सिटी पानीपत, इंस्टीट्यूट ऑफ टेक्नोलॉजी, महर्षि मार्केंडेश्वर यूनिवर्सिटी अंबाला व आरपीआईआईटी करनाल की टीम रही। इससे पहले मुख्यातिथि पंचायत एवं सहकारिता राज्यमंत्री महिपाल ढांडा के भाई हरपाल ढांडा ने खिलाड़ियों का परिचय लेकर प्रतियोगिता का शुभारंभ किया। उन्होंने कहा कि युवाओं को शिक्षा के साथ खेलों में भी आगे आना चाहिए। युवा आज खेलों में भी खुद को साबित कर रहे हैं। इससे पहले संस्थान के अध्यक्ष डॉ. पंकज मुटनेजा ने मुख्यातिथि का स्वागत किया। उन्होंने दीप प्रज्ज्वलित कर कार्यक्रम का शुभारंभ किया। इसके बाद खिलाड़ियों ने मैदान पर शानदार खेल का प्रदर्शन किया। जिसमें महर्षि मार्केंडेश्वर यूनिवर्सिटी अंबाला की टीम रही विजेता और पानीपत इंस्टीट्यूट ऑफ इंजीनियरिंग एवं टेक्नोलॉजी की टीम उप विजेता रही। प्रेम इंस्टीट्यूट ऑफ मेडिकल साइंसेज के अध्यक्ष डॉ. पंकज मुटनेजा, डॉ. रचना मुटनेजा, विशिष्ट अतिथि डॉ. पूनम गुप्ता, डॉ. दिनेश गुप्ता व रिटायर्ड ब्रिगेडियर जेआर सेठी ने विजेता टीम के कप्तान रजत ठाकुर को ट्रॉफी, मेडल, प्रमाण पत्र व 11...

title: Com Allianz “alugado”, Palmeiras manda jogo do Brasileirão no Brinco
creator: Arthur
content: Campinas, SP, 14 (AFI) – Sem conseguir ter uma sequência no próprio estádio, alugado para mais shows que jogos, o Palmeiras resolveu mandar o duelo contra o Cuiabá, pela 24a rodada do Brasileirão, no estádio do Guarnai, o Brinco de Ouro da Princesa, em Campinas, no dia 24 de agosto. Antes, a diretoria Alviverde optava pela Arena Barueri, comprado por uma empresa da Leila Pereira, presidente e patrocinadora do clube, que está passando por reformas no gramado e está impossibilitado de receber jogos. A comitiva do Verdão chegou a fazer uma visita ao estádio no fim do mês passado, para ver as instalações e gostou do que viu e decidiu pelo aluguel. O preço não foi informado. No dia da partida contra o Cuiabá, o Allianz Parque receberá o show da banda Natiruts. O Palmeiras até tentou remarcar a partida para o dia 26, porém o pedido foi negado pela CBF.

title: Rishikesh News: संस्कृत शोभायात्रा 17 अगस्त को
content: ऋषिकेश। श्री नेपाली संस्कृत विद्यालय सभागार में संस्कृत शिक्षकों की बैठक में उत्तराखंड संस्कृत सप्ताह के उपलक्ष्य में उत्तराखंड संस्कृत अकादमी की ओर से आयोजित संस्कृत शोभायात्रा के संबंध में चर्चा की गई। अकादमी के सचिव डाॅ. वाजश्रवा आर्य ने कहा कि 17 अगस्त को ऋषिकेश नगर में एक संस्कृत शोभायात्रा का आयोजन किया जाएगा। जिसमें संस्कृत विद्यालय, महाविद्यालयों, राजकीय, अशासकीय और निजी विद्यालयों के छात्र, अध्यापक, विभिन्न सामाजिक, धार्मिक, संस्थाओं से जुड़े लोग शामिल होंगे। शोभायात्रा के लिए एक संयोजक मंडल का गठन किया गया। जिसमें विपिन बहुगुणा, डाॅ. सुनील दत्त थपलियाल, जितेंद्र भट्ट, शांति प्रसाद मैठाणी को शामिल किया गया है। इस अवसर पर डाॅ. ओम प्रकाश पूर्वाल, डाॅ. राधामोहन दास, सुरेंद्रदत्त भट्ट, डाॅ. जनार्दन कैरवान, विनायक भट्ट आदि मौजूद रहे।
