title: Rentrée scolaire : le prix des fournitures va baisser... mais pas assez pour juguler les effets de l'inflation
content: La rentrée scolaire approche à grands pas, et avec elle, les passages en caisse et les factures à trois chiffres. Le coût du retour en classe sera globalement moins important cette année qu'en 2023, selon la Confédération syndicale des familles (CSF). Pour le collège et le lycée, il faudra compter respectivement 324 et 398 euros par élève, soit une baisse de 12,7 et de 6,8 % par rapport à l'année dernière. Alors que le cours de la pâte à papier – dont la flambée était une des principales raisons derrière la hausse des prix – a reflué de près de 30 % en 2024, l'école élémentaire ne subit pas le même sort. De 230 à 236 euros, le coût du panier moyen accuse une augmentation de 2,6 %. Efforts et combines pour économiser Si certains distributeurs jouent le jeu du recul, comme U (-6,2 % depuis 2023), Leclerc (-5,4 %) ou Carrefour (-1,5 %) selon l'UFC Que Choisir, ces baisses sont encore loin de combler l'inflation des produits de fournitures scolaires. Selon la DGCCRF, elle atteignait une hausse de 8,5 % sur un an, entre la rentrée scolaire de l'année 2022, et celle d'après. Surtout, la baisse du prix du panier moyen s'expliquerait aussi par le fait que « 40 % des répondants à l'enquête indiquent avoir des astuces pour faire baisser la note », selon la CSF. Entre autres combines, la réutilisation du matériel ou les achats en lot avec d'autres...

title: 38 millions d'euros : le leader de la grande distribution E. Leclerc condamné à une amende salée
content: « Acheter moins cher pour vendre moins cher ». Le slogan du groupe E. Lerclerc, vieux d'un demi-siècle, prononcé par son fondateur Michel Leclerc, est un atout qui permet au groupe d'être le leader du secteur de la grande distribution avec 23,8 % des parts de marché, devant Carrefour (19,7 %) et Les Mousquetaires (Intermarché... 16,7 %). Mais cette recette gagnante se fait-elle aux détriments du respect de la loi ? Le premier distributeur français a écopé ce mercredi d'une amende record de 38 millions d'euros. Cela représente 0,08 % de son chiffre d'affaires, de l'ordre de 48,6 milliards d'euros en 2023. 62 contrats signés par E. Leclerc en dehors des clous Le groupe, via sa centrale d'achat européenne Eurelec, a été sanctionné pour ne pas avoir respecté les délais des négociations avec 62 de ses fournisseurs. La filiale avait déjà été épinglée en septembre 2020 par la Direction générale de la... Challenges.fr

title: China Ciptakan Drone Terbesar di Dunia, Berpotensi Gantikan Truk dan Kereta Api
content: - membuat terobosan teknologi terbaru berupa kargo terbesar di dunia. Pesawat tanpa awak ini mampu mengangkut beban seberat dua ton. Ke depan drone ini akan mengubah sistem transportasi modern, menggantikan peran truk dan kereta api. The Sun, Kamis (15/8/2024) melaporkan, pesawat bermesin ganda ini telah melakukan penerbangan perdana pada pekan lalu di Zigong, provinsi Sichuan barat daya. Disebutkan pesawat mampu terbang dengan stabil selama 20 menit. Struktur pesawat ini sungguh luar biasa dengan lebar sayap 16,1 meter, tinggi 4,6 meter, dan ruang kargo sebesar 12 meter kubik. Pesawat futuristik ini diharapkan mendukung perluasan layanan pengiriman udara di China memanfaatkan ruang udara ketinggian rendah. Yaitu area hingga 1.000 meter di atas tanah yang berpotensi digunakan secara intensif di masa depan di seluruh dunia. Penggunaan ruang ini dapat mencakup transportasi penumpang, pengiriman kargo, dan manufaktur. Beijing telah berpacu dalam pengembangan teknologi drone untuk meningkatkan transportasi dan bisnis China. Hal ini akan menghasilkan penghapusan kendaraan seperti truk, kapal, dan kereta api. Administrasi Penerbangan Sipil China mengatakan bahwa ekonomi ketinggian rendah negara itu melampaui 500 miliar Yuan atau sekitar lebih dari 54 miliar Poundsterling pada 2023. Angka fantastis ini diproyeksikan akan melonjak lebih tinggi lagi karena diperkirakan mencapai 2...

title: Dianugerahi Bintang Mahaputera Nararya dari Presiden Jokowi, Gus Jazil: Alhamdulillah
content: jpnn.com , JAKARTA - Wakil Ketua MPR Jazilul Fawaid atau akrab disapa Gus Jazil meraih anugerah tanda jasa dan tanda kehormatan Bintang Mahaputera Nararya dari Presiden Joko Widodo ( Jokowi ). Penghargaan tersebut diserahkan Presiden Jokowi kepada Gus Jazil di Istana Negara, Jakarta, Rabu (14/8). Penghargaan tersebut ditetapkan melalui Keputusan Presiden (Keppres) Nomor 105/TK/TH 2024 tentang Penganugerahan Tanda Kehormatan Bintang Mahaputera. Gus Jazil menerima penghargaan tersebut bersama para tokoh bangsa lainnya berjumlah 64 orang yang dinilai berkontribusi dalam berbagai bidang selama masa pemerintahan selama masa kerja dalam pemerintahan Presiden Jokowi pada Kabinet Kerja 2014-2019 maupun Kabinet Indonesia Maju 2019-2024. Para penerima anugerah itu berasal dari kalangan menteri dan wakil menteri KIM, pejabat lembaga tinggi negara, pejabat pimpinan lembaga pemerintah dan non-kementerian, pejabat TNI dan Polri, WNI dengan latar belakang profesi, dan budayawan. Acara ini menjadi bagian dari rangkaian kegiatan peringatan HUT Ke-79 RI sebagai bentuk penghargaan negara atas kontribusi besar yang telah diberikan para tokoh tersebut dalam berbagai bidang selama masa pemerintahan Presiden Joko Widodo. Gus Jazil mengaku sangat bersyukur atas penghargaan bergengsi yang diraihnya dan berharap penghargaan ini bisa menjadi motivasi untuk melakukan pengabdian yang lebih besar lagi...

title: Borok Armor Terbongkar setelah KDRT Cut Intan Nabila, Istri Alvin Faiz: Mau Nagih Nahan Banget
content: - Kekerasan dalam rumah tangga atau KDRT yang dialami selebgram masih menjadi topik hangat. Ibu 3 anak itu dianiaya secara membabi buta oleh suaminya sendiri, pada Selasa, 13 Agustus 2024. Momen memprihatinkan tersebut terlihat jelas pada rekaman CCTV yang kini viral di media sosial. Intan dipukul, bahkan dicekik oleh Armor padahal belum genap sebulan melahirkan anak ketiga. Si anak ketiga, Amora Zhea Ishara turut menjadi korban. Armor tak sengaja menendang Zhea ketika menganiaya Intan. Kini Intan telah menjalani visum dan melaporkan sang suami ke polisi. Armor pun berhasil diciduk pihak kepolisian di sebuah hotel kawasan Jakarta Selatan. Bapak 3 anak tersebut resmi ditetapkan sebagai tersangka. Saat dihadirkan ke hadapan awak media, Armor membeberkan sejumlah pengakuan mengejutkan. Ia mengaku sudah melakukan KDRT sebanyak lebih dari 5 kali. Kekerasan pertama dilakukan pada 2020 silam. tanya polisi dikutip dari YouTube Intens Investigasi. jawab Armor. Sejumlah public figure tampak prihatin dengan nasib Intan.

title: Un lujo: Gabriela Sabatini y Juan Martín Del Potro volverán a las canchas en el US Open
creator: Cristian Helou
content: Los argentinos Gabriela Sabatini y Juan Martín Del Potro revolucionaron el mundo del tenis tras la noticia de que volverán a las canchas luego de ser invitados a un partido de exhibición de dobles mixto en el US Open. Se enfrentarán a la dupla de Venus Williams, quien no anunció su retiro, pero está ausente del circuito desde marzo, y Andy Roddick. La cita será en el estadio Arthur Ashe de Nueva York. Tanto Gabi como la Torre de Tandil juegon campeones del cuarto Grand Slam de cada temporada y son, junto a Guillermo Vilas, los únicos argentinos que se quedaron con ese trofeo. Gabi venció en la final a Steffi Graf, en 1990; mientras que Delpo superó a Roger Federer en una final memorable, en 2009. Por otra parte, Del Potro y Roddick se enfrentaron, de forma oficial, en cinco partidos donde el tandilense ganó cuatro, entre ellas los octavos de final de US Open 2012. Si bien el torneo comenzará el lunes 26 de agosto y se extenderá hasta el domingo 8 de septiembre , todavía no hay fecha estipulada para el enfrentamiento, pero se cree que podría darse en la primera semana de clasificación. En el cuadro principal hay siete argentinos confirmados: Francisco Cerúndolo, Sebastián Báez, Tomás Etcheverry, Mariano Navone, Federico Coria, Facundo Díaz Acosta y Camilo Ugo Carabelli. A su vez, hay once deportistas que disputarán la Qualy del abierto de Estados Unidos:...

title: All Blacks keep faith in under-siege halves as Razor recalls Rieko, ex-captain returns in unusual backrow mix
creator: Christy Doran
content: Despite coming off a shock first-up Rugby Championship loss to Argentina, All Blacks coach Scott Robertson has kept faith in his under-siege halves TJ Perenara and Damian McKenzie while making four changes for Saturday’s rematch against Los Pumas at Eden Park. The All Blacks blew a 20-15 half-time lead against Felipe Contepomi’s new-look Pumas as their composure went out the window in the final 20 minutes to go down 38-30 in Wellington. The fallout has naturally been one of raised eyebrows and scratched heads after a series of less-than-convincing home matches, where on this occasion the All Blacks couldn’t overcome their shotty performance like they did against England in July. Joel Sclavi of Argentina celebrates after upsetting the All Blacks at Sky Stadium on August 10, 2024 in Wellington. (Photo by Hagen Hopkins/Getty Images) The inclusion of Tamaiti Williams is the only change to the pack, with the Crusaders loose-head prop replacing the injured Ethan de Groot. Of more surprise is the changes in the backline, with Rieko Ioane returning to the midfield to partner Jordie Barrett in favour of the in-form Anton Lienert-Brown. Robertson has also opted for a brand new wing pairing, with Caleb Clarke and Will Jordan starting ahead of Sevu Reece and Mark Tele’a. The latter has been shifted to the bench alongside fellow first-Test tryscorer Lienert-Brown. On the bench, former...

title: Dave McCormick says stakes are high in U.S. Senate race during visit to Berks
સુવિધા:સ્મીમેરમાં 50 વોર્ડમાં માઇકથી સૂચના આપવા નવી સિસ્ટમ ઉભી કરાશે
content: દર્દી, મુલાકાતી અને તબીબો સાથે સંવાદ માટે પબ્લિક ઍડ્રેસ સિસ્ટમ પાછળ 51 લાખનો ખર્ચ કરાશેસુરત: સ્મીમેરમાં દર્દી અને તબીબોને સૂચના આપવા ઉપયોગી પબ્લિક ઍડ્રેસ સિસ્ટમ લાંબા સમયથી બંધ છે ત્યારે હોસ્પિટલ સુવિધાને આધુનિક બનાવવા પાલિકાએ નવી સિસ્ટમ લગાડવા કવાયત સ્મીમેર હોસ્પિટલને પેપર લેસ બનાવવામાં આવી રહી છે ત્યારે 50 વોર્ડમાં સીધા કંટ્રોલ રૂમથી માઇક દ્વારા દર્દી, મુલાકાતી અને તબીબોને સૂચના આપવા માટે પબ્લિક ઍડ્રેસ સિસ્ટમ વર્ષ-2004માં ઊભી કરાઇ હતી. 20 વર્ષમાં ઘણી જગ્યાએ સ્પેર પાર્ટ્સ બગડી જતાં સિસ્ટમ ઓપરેટ થતી નથી. આ સુવિધા હવે ભીડભાડ વધતાં વધુ ઉપયોગી બને તેમ હોવાથી પાલિકાએ અત્યાધુનિક સવલતો સાથે સ્મીમેરમાં મહત્વની સૂચના આપવા 50 વોર્ડમાં સિસ્ટમ ફરી ઇન્સ્ટોલ કરવા દરખાસ્ત રજૂ કરી હતી. જે અંગે બુધવારે મળનારી બેઠકમાં નિર્ણય લેવાશે.

title: 500대 기업 2분기 영업익 59조, 작년보다 두 배 증가
creator: 이인준 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스]이인준 기자 = 국내 500대 기업의 올 2분기 영업이익이 지난해 같은 기간 대비 두 배 이상 급증한 것으로 나타났다. 세계적으로 AI(인공지능) 열풍을 타고 반도체 업황이 호조를 보인 덕분이다. 15일 기업데이터연구소 CEO스코어가 국내 매출 상위 500대 기업 중 이달 14일까지 분기보고서를 제출한 334개사를 대상으로 올 2분기 실적을 조사한 결과, 이들 기업의 2분기 매출액은 779조4847억원으로 집계됐다. 전년 동기 728조6300억원 대비 7.0%(50조8547억원) 늘었다. 영업이익은 59조3911억원으로 전년 동기의 28조6836억원보다 107.1%(30조7075억원) 증가했다. 기업별로 보면 삼성전자, SK하이닉스가 '반도체 슈퍼사이클' 바람을 타고 실적이 급격히 개선됐다. 삼성전자는 2분기 영업이익이 10조4439억원을 기록, 전년 동기 6685억원에서 1462% 급증하며 전체 영업이익 1위를 지켰다. SK하이닉스도 2분기 5조4685억원의 영업이익을 기록하며 전년 동기 2조8881억원의 적자에서 대규모 흑자 기조로 전환했다. 특히 SK하이닉스는 현대·기아차를 제치고 삼성전자에 이어 영업이익 2위로 올라섰다. 이어 현대자동차(4조2791억원), 기아(3조6437억원), 한국전력공사(1조2503억원), LG전자(1조1961억원), 삼성생명(9055억원), 삼성물산(9004억원), DB손해보험(7868억원), 삼성화재(7823억원) 순으로 영업이익이 컸다. 2분기 영업적자가 가장 컸던 기업은...

title: कार में अश्लीलता का वीडियो वायरल, बाराबंकी में कांड कर रहे 2 आरोपी गिरफ्तार, जानें किस पार्टी से हैं ताल्लुक
content: India News (इंडिया न्यूज), Barabanki News: उत्तर प्रदेश के बाराबंकी में भाजपा का झंडा लगी कार में दो लड़कियों के साथ युवक का अश्लील वीडियो वायरल होने के मामले में दो युवकों को गिरफ्तार किया गया है। सोशल मीडिया पर वायरल हुए अश्लील वीडियो को लेकर प्रदेश में राजनीति भी शुरू हो गई है। दरअसल, सपा और कांग्रेस ने भाजपा पर जमकर हमला बोला था। साथ ही लोगों ने पुलिस की कार्यशैली पर भी सवाल उठाए थे। दरअसल, नगर कोतवाली क्षेत्र के लखनऊ अयोध्या एनएच 27 स्थित कालिका हवेली रेस्टोरेंट की पार्किंग में भाजपा का झंडा लगी इनोवा कार (यूपी 33 एएल 0011) में एक युवक दो लड़कियों के साथ रंगरलियां मना रहा था। सोशल मीडिया पर वीडियो हो रहा वायरल बता दें कि, कुछ लोगों ने सोमवार को सोशल प्लेटफॉर्म एक्स पर अश्लील वीडियो शेयर कर कार्रवाई की मांग की। इस मामले में पुलिस ने मंगलवार को लखनऊ के कुंदन सिंह और आशीष पांडेय को गिरफ्तार किया। इस बीच, सपा और कांग्रेस ने भाजपा का झंडा लगी कार में दो लड़कियों के साथ युवक का अश्लील वीडियो शेयर कर भाजपा पर तंज कसा था। सोशल साइट एक्स पर वायरल हुए अश्लील वीडियो पर अन्य यूजर्स ने भी आपत्ति जताई थी। ‘दोषियों को 18 अगस्त तक फांसी हो’, CM ममता बनर्जी ने की ये बड़ी मांग इससे पहले भी हुआ दुर्घटना दरअसल, अश्लील वीडियो की पुलिस जांच में पता चला कि यह इनोवा कार रायबरेली के कसेहटी राही मिल एरिया निवासी अरविंद मिश्रा की है। अरविंद को हिरासत में लिया गया तो उसने बताया कि दो माह पहले उसकी कार का एक्सीडेंट हो गया था। इसके बाद उसने यह कार लखनऊ के सेमरा बीबीडी ग्रीन सिटी निवासी गैराज मालिक...

title: Raju Talikoti is director of Dharwad Rangayana
content: Dharwad: Actor and comedian Rajesab (Raju) Talikoti has been appointed as the director of Dharwad Rangayana . The state govt has announced the appointment of six new directors to Rangayana units on Tuesday. Raju is a native of Talikoti in Muddebihal taluk of Vijayapura district. He joined theatre as a child artist at the age of seven through Khasgateshwar Natya Sangha owned by his father Maktumsab Yenkanchi (Talikoti). He has played several roles in various plays besides working as a comedian in over 35 Kannada movies. Raju said the govt has appointed him as the new director of Rangayana after recognising his service to the theatre field for over four decades. “Dharwad Rangayana is vibrant and has been holding series of plays. Efforts will be made to infuse new ideas and experiments to bring Rangayana closer to the people,” he said. He said North Karnataka is blessed with abundant raw talent and Rangayana will provide a platform for youngsters to hone their talent and promote them as leading theatre personalities. TNN We also published the following articles recently Rahul Navin appointed as director of Enforcement Directorate Rahul Navin, a 1993 batch IRS officer, was appointed as the new director of the Enforcement Directorate (ED) for a two-year term. Before his new role, Navin functioned as the Special Director of the ED. The Appointments Committee of the Cabinet had...

title: 700 millones de pesos piden ejidatarios detrás de último bloqueo a la autopista México-Puebla
content: Son 700 millones de pesos los que demandan por concepto de indemnización por derecho de vía los integrantes de 19 ejidos de Puebla , Hidalgo, Tlaxcala y Estado de México que cerraron diversas carreteras la semana pasada, informó el Secretario de Gobernación, Javier Aquino Limón , quien indicó que la entidad sería sede de las próximas reuniones entre los campesinos y el gobierno federal. ➡️ Únete al canal de El Sol de Puebla en WhatsApp y accede a la información más importante En seguimiento a las mesas de trabajo que se establecieron tras el retiro de bloqueos en el Arco Norte, la autopista y la carretera federal México- Puebla el pasado sábado, Aquino Limón expresó que no hay riesgo de que se desarrollen nuevas manifestaciones o bloqueos carreteros porque se mantiene abierto el diálogo, de tal forma que la autoridad tratará de garantizar el desarrollo de las mesas de trabajo acordadas. Posiblemente se realice aquí en Puebla una segunda mesa nacional, están pidiendo los ejidatarios que Puebla sea sede de este seguimiento y hay disposición de la federación para que aquí se desarrollen dichas mesas, recuerden que ahí solo somos interlocutores declaró. En el caso de la carretera Tlaxco - El Tejocotal , el secretario dio a conocer que se están realizando los avalúos para determinar los montos de la indemnización que reclaman los ejidatarios , no...

title: Marlins have made big decision about former Cy Young winner
creator: Anthony Franco, MLB Trade Rumors
content: The Marlins have informed Sandy Alcantara that they will not trade him during the upcoming offseason, reports Craig Mish of SportsGrid. Mish writes that the Fish are hopeful that the 2022 NL Cy Young winner will be ready to take the ball for them on Opening Day. Alcantara missed this entire season after undergoing Tommy John surgery in October. That was the first major blow in what has turned out to be a very difficult 12 months at loanDepot Park. Eury Perez went down with a Tommy John procedure of his own a week into the 2024 season. The Marlins got 12 inconsistent starts out of Jesus Luzardo; his season is over due to a stress reaction in his back. A finger injury has interrupted what might have been a step forward from Ryan Weathers. Lefty Braxton Garrett is currently down with a flexor strain and has made all of seven starts. Edward Cabrera lost a couple months in the first half. A rotation with a fully healthy Alcantara, Luzardo, Perez, Garrett and Weathers would probably be a top-10 group in MLB. The Marlins have instead lost them all for significant chunks of the season. Between that brutal stretch of starting pitching injuries and one of the worst lineups in the majors, the Marlins have had a nightmare of a year. They started 0-9, never got back to .500 and are fully amidst a rebuild. Miami shipped out Jazz Chisholm Jr., Luis Arraez, Josh Bell, Trevor Rogers, Tanner...

title: Steelers Week 1 Opponent, Falcons Land Pro Bowl OLB Matthew Judon in Massive Trade
creator: Chris Ward, Steelers Now
content: The New England Patriots are trading four-time Pro Bowl outside linebacker Matthew Judon to the Atlanta Falcons, according to Ian Rapoport of NFL Network . NFL insider Jordan Schultz reports that Atlanta is sending New England a third-round pick to the Patriots in exchange for Judon. Judon is due $6.5 million in the final year of his deal. After back and forth negotiations this summer, Judon reportedly didn’t accept New England’s offer, according to Jeremy Fowler of ESPN . Judon had an animated exchange with Patriots head coach Jerod Mayo last month when he sat out of drills. Judon, 31, is a four-time Pro Bowler with 66.5 career sacks. He spent his first five seasons (2016-2020) in the NFL with the Baltimore Ravens, recording 34.5 sacks. Judon had banner years with New England in 2021 and 2022, posting 28 sacks and earning Pro Bowl honors in both seasons. Prior to the start of the 2023 season, Judon was ranked 33rd by fellow players for the NFL Top 100 Players of 2023. He suffered a torn lower bicep in Week 4 and was placed on injured reserve. Judon will now lead a Falcons’ edge rusher group that features Arnold Ebiketie, Lorenzo Carter, Demone Harris and James Smith-Williams. He certainly will be a handful for the Pittsburgh Steelers’ tackles in Week 1. When healthy, Judon is one of the best pass rushers in the NFL. The Steelers’ Week 1 game against the Falcons in Atlanta has...

title: ‘에일리언’ 1위...‘파일럿’ 제쳤다
creator: 이다원 기자 edaone@kyunghyang.com
content: 영화 ‘에일리언: 로물루스’(감독 페데 알바레즈)가 ‘파일럿’을 제쳤다. 15일 영화진흥위원회 영화관입장권 통합전산망 집계결과 ‘에일리언: 로물루스’는 9만5358명을 모아 개봉과 동시에 박스오피스 1위에 올랐다. ‘파일럿’의 엔진은 그 탓에 멈췄다. 8만5505명이 선택해 2위로 한계단 내려왔다. 누적관객수 329만7529명이다. 개봉작 ‘행복의 나라’가 그 뒤를 이었다. 7만8401명이 관람했다. ‘트위스터스’와 ‘빅토리’는 나란히 4, 5위에 올랐다. 또한 ‘리볼버’는 톱10에서 밀려나버렸다.

title: Ông Thích Chân Quang chưa có bằng tốt nghiệp cấp 3, Đại học Hà Nội nói gì?
content: Ngày 14/8, TS Nguyễn Tiến Dũng, Phó hiệu trưởng trường Đại học Hà Nội cho biết đã nắm được thông tin Sở GD&ĐT TP.HCM phản hồi việc ông Thích Chân Quang (tên thật Vương Tấn Việt, SN 1959) không có tên trong danh sách thi và cấp bằng tốt nghiệp cấp 3 bổ túc văn hóa khóa ngày 6/6/1989. , ông Dũng nói. Theo quy định của Bộ GD&ĐT về tuyển sinh và đào tạo trình độ cử nhân, thạc sĩ và tiến sĩ, trường hợp học viên có hành vi gian lận trong việc làm hồ sơ để được cấp văn bằng, chứng chỉ (sử dụng bằng giả trong hồ sơ đăng ký) thì sẽ bị buộc thôi học. Các văn bằng nếu được cấp sẽ bị thu hồi, hủy bỏ theo quy định. Nghị định 04 của Chính phủ ban hành năm 2021 cũng quy định rõ việc xử phạt vi phạm hành chính trong lĩnh vực giáo dục. - (Khoản 3, Điều 21 Nghị định 04). Ông Thích Chân Quang. Ông Thích Chân Quang từng tốt nghiệp cử nhân ngành tiếng Anh tại trường Đại học Ngoại ngữ (nay là trường Đại học Hà Nội) vào năm 2001. Tháng 1/2019, ông Thích Chân Quang được công nhận tốt nghiệp và được cấp bằng cử nhân ngành Luật văn bằng thứ 2, hệ vừa làm vừa học của trường Đại học Luật Hà Nội, xếp hạng Giỏi. title: Shetland Creek wildfire conditions remain stable after rainfall helps lower some activity
creator: Josh Dawson
content: The BC Wildfire Service says the Shetland Creek wildfire remains stable, but fire behaviour will vary across the blaze following scattered rain showers over the past few days that have helped to lower activity. The more than 28,000-hectare blaze is burning between Spences Bridge and Cache Creek and is classified as out of control. BCWS fire information officer David Mackinnon said Wednesday that conditions have remained stable on the fire, with little growth or fire activity expected for the remainder of the day. “A big piece of that is we don't have the input from high winds or low humidities to get the fire moving,” Mackinnon said. “We expect a fairly stable fire perimeter in the next few days. We're not anticipating any significant challenges or significant growth events with the current weather forecast.” Variable fire behaviour is expected across the blaze after scattered showers in the previous days, with some areas limited to a smouldering surface fire and dryer areas seeing the potential for a surface fire with some open flames. The southwest corner remains the most active, and has helicopters and heavy equipment supporting ground crews in the area. Crews are using direct attack methods both north and south of the Laluwissin-Pasulko Forest Service Road to secure containment below the Murray Plateau. Crews are also using a sprinkler system to bolster existing...

title: ¿Cuál es la fortuna de Camila Sodi según las mediciones de riqueza de las estrellas?
creator: Aura Reyna
content: Camila Sodi , exitosa actriz y modelo mexicana, ha logrado construir una carrera sólida y multifacética en la industria del entretenimiento. A lo largo de los años ha acumulado una considerable fortuna , resultado de su participación en exitosas producciones televisivas y cinematográficas. Además de sus ingresos como actriz, su influencia en redes sociales y colaboraciones con prestigiosas marcas internacionales han contribuido significativamente a su patrimonio . ¿De cuánto es la fortuna de Camila Sodi? Camila Ía González Sodi comenzó su carrera desde niña, y siendo parte de la familia Sodi , que incluye figuras destacadas como Thalía y la historiadora Ernestina Sodi, no es sorprendente que Camila continuara el camino al estrellato. La fortuna de la actriz alcanza los 6 millones de dólares, de acuerdo con información obtenida de Celebrity Net Worth , sitio que proporciona estimaciones sobre el patrimonio y actividades financieras de celebridades alrededor de todo el mundo. Sodi, quien se describe en su perfil de instagram como una wine creator y food lover (creadora de vino y amante de la comida) es una de las fundadoras de una marca de vino artesanal llamada Indómitas . El producto está presente en diferentes establecimientos en Ciudad de México, Monterrey, Oaxaca, Colima, Valle de Bravo, Tijuana y Mérida. Están hechos a base de uvas cultivadas de manera...

title: Góðgerðarsamtök dreifðu sælgæti með metamfetamíni
content: Lögreglan á Nýja-Sjálandi vinnur að því að rekja uppruna sælgætis sem mældist innihalda mögulega lífshættulegt magn metamfetamíns. Góðgerðarsamtök í borginni Auckland dreifði sælgætinu. Fram kemur í umfjöllun BBC að hátt í 400 manns hafi fengið molana sent til sín sem hluta af matarpakka, en samtökin Auckland City Mission (ACM) aðstoða þá sem glíma við fátækt í borginni. Sælgætið var sent til samtakanna frá ónefndum aðila og það var geymt í lokuðum umbúðum, að því er talsmenn ACM greina frá. Þrír leituðu sér læknisaðstoðar Að minnsta kosti þrír einstaklingar, þar á meðal barn, hafa þurft að leita sér læknisaðstoðar vegna málsins. Enginn liggur þó á sjúkrahúsi að því er segir í umfjöllun BBC. Götuverðmæti hvers mola er sagt nema sem samsvarar um 80.000 kr. Lögreglan segir að það sé til skoðunar hvort um slys hafi verið að ræða eða hvort þetta hafi verið skipulögð aðgerð. Of snemmt sé að segja nokkuð til um það að svo stöddu. Góðgerðarsamtökin létu yfirvöld vita af málinu eftir einn einstaklingur sagði að sælgætið hefði verið undarlegt á bragðið.

title: Tin sáng 15/8: Kết luận điều tra vụ nam sinh lớp 8 ở Hà Nội bị đánh tử vong; bác thông tin 'Cháo lươn Nghệ An' là di sản phi vật thể
content: Lãnh đạo TPHCM trao hoa, bằng khen cho 5 cá nhân có hành động dũng cảm cứu người trong vụ TNGT ở chân cầu Phú Mỹ. Theo VietnamNet, UBND TP. Thủ Đức, TPHCM đã tổ chức khen thưởng đột xuất cho các cá nhân có hành động dũng cảm cứu người trong vụ tai nạn giao thông ngày 8/8 tại chân cầu Phú Mỹ. Theo đó, 5 cá nhân được tặng Bằng khen của Chủ tịch UBND TPHCM kèm theo khen thưởng cho mỗi người là 3.510.000 đồng. 5 "người hùng" được khen thưởng gồm: ông Mai Lê Duy Quang (44 tuổi, ngụ TP. Thủ Đức) là người trực tiếp lên đầu xe Volvo phá cửa kính lái, kéo người mắc kẹt ra ngoài. Ông Nguyễn Hoàng Trường (41 tuổi, ngụ TP Thủ Đức) là người lấy bình chữa cháy xịt vào trong cabin, ngăn đám cháy. Anh Vũ Thanh Tùng (27 tuổi, ngụ TP Thủ Đức) đã cùng một người khác trực tiếp cứu nạn nhân ra khỏi xe Volvo, sau đó cùng ông Quang cứu tài xế chiếc xe này. Ông Lee Geumho (44 tuổi, quốc tịch Hàn Quốc) đã trực tiếp cùng anh Tùng kéo cửa xe và cứu một người đàn ông trong tai nạn. Ông Đặng Bính Quang (50 tuổi, ngụ quận 7) là người hỗ trợ đẩy cửa xe và cấp cứu người gặp nạn. Thay mặt những người được nhận bằng khen, ông Mai Lê Duy...

title: Костюк снова одолела Лулу Сан и пробилась в 1/8 финала турнира в Цинциннати
content: Украинская теннисистка Марта Костюк (WTA 21) пробилась в 1/8 финала хардового турнира WTA 1000 в Цинциннати (США). Во 2-м раунде украинка в двух сетах одолела Лулу Сан (Новая Зеландия, WTA 64). WTA 1000 Цинциннати . Хард. 1/16 финала Лулу Сан (Новая Зеландия) – Марта Костюк (Украина) – 3:6, 5:7 Это была вторая встреча соперниц. Двумя неделями ранее Костюк переиграла Лулу Сан на старте Олимпийских игр 2024 в Париже. В 3-м раунде тысячника в США Костюк сыграет против победительницы противостояния Ига Свентек – Варвара Грачева. На старте Цинциннати 2024 первая ракетка Украины выбила Элизе Мертенс . На прошлой неделе Марта выступила на соревнованиях идентичной категории в Торонто, где дошла до 3-го раунда . На канадских кортах Костюк выиграла у Татьяны Марии и Элины Свитолиной, а затем уступила Эмме Наварро. Ранее из турнира в Цинциннати вылетела Даяна Ястремская . Помимо Костюк, Украину на этих кортах продолжит представлять Элина Свитолина и Ангелина Калинина.

title: "નામ સ્મરણનું મહત્વ" .
आज का मिथुन राशि का राशिफल 15 अगस्त 2024: दिन आपका लाभदायक रहेगा, कमाई अच्छी होगी
content: Gemini Horoscope 15 August, 2024: आज मिथुन राशि का करियर राशिफल : मिथुन राशि वालों के लिए आज का दिन व्यापारिक क्षेत्र में धन लाभ दिलाने वाला है। आपको आज कोराबार में किसी पुरानी डील से फायदा हो सकता है। आपको आज कार्यक्षेत्र से संबंधित कोई अच्छी खबर मिल सकती है जिससे आपका उत्साह कई गुणा बना रहेगा। आपका आज कोई सोचा हुआ काम पूरा होने की खुशी होगी। लोहे और धातु से संबंधित कारोबार से जुड़े लोगों के लिए दिन लाभदायक रहेगा। वस्त्रों के कारोबारी भी आज अच्छी कमाई कर सकते हैं। आज मिथुन राशि का प्रेम और पारिवारिक राशिफल : घर परिवार के मामले में आज का दिन मिथुन राशि के जातकों के लिए आनंददायक रहेगा। आप अपनी फैमिली के साथ आज सुखद और मनोरंजक पल बिताएंगे। बच्चों के साथ आज आप कहीं घूमने का प्लान बनाएंगे। आपको आज छोटे भाई बहनों से सहयोग मिलेगा। किसी पुराने मित्र या परिचित से मुलाकात होने की खुशी बनी रहेगी। आप आज फैमिली के साथ बाहर खान पान का आयोजन कर सकते हैं। आज मिथुन राशि की सेहत : मिथुन राशि के जातकों को कब्ज एवं उदर संबंधी परेशानी होने की आशंका है। आंखों में चुभन और जलन भी महसूस कर सकते हैं। वैसे आज दिन का दूसरा चरण आपके लिए अधिक अनुकूल रहेगा। आज मिथुन राशि के उपाय : आज श्रीराम रक्षा स्तोत्र का पाठ करना और मंदिर जाकर भगवान के दर्शन करना आपके लिए लाभकारी और पुण्यदायी रहेगा।

title: STF volta a julgar revisão da vida toda do INSS no plenário virtual da corte
creator: Cristiane Gercina
content: O STF (Supremo Tribunal Federal) voltará a julgar a revisão da vida toda do INSS (Instituto Nacional do Seguro Social) no plenário virtual da corte entre os dias 23 e 30 deste mês. Os ministros analisarão recurso contra decisão tomada em março deste ano, que derrubou a possibilidade de pedido da correção ao julgar duas ações de 1999 , as ADIs (Ações Direta de Inconstitucionalidade) 2.110 e 2.111 . A revisão da vida toda é um processo judicial no qual o aposentado pede a correção do benefício para incluir, no cálculo da renda previdenciária, salários antigos, de antes de julho de 1994. O processo contesta regra de transição na reforma da Previdência de 1999. Os ministros entenderam que o artigo 3o da lei 8.213, que criou o fator previdenciário, é constitucional e cogente. Com isso, a norma não pode ser derrubada para calcular o melhor benefício, aplicando a regra fixa, quando a regra de transição for menos benéfica ao segurado. O argumento é que, em alguns casos, a regra de transição da reforma de 1999 era prejudicial para os segurados que já estavam na ativa, contribuindo com o INSS. Com isso, pedia-se na Justiça a aplicação da regra definitiva, possibilidade utilizar todos os salários na conta da aposentadoria , incluindo os mais antigos. O que os ministros irão analisar agora é o pedido do Ieprev (Instituto de Estudos...

title: Shetland Creek wildfire conditions remain stable after rainfall helps lower some activity (Kamloops)
content: Photo: BC Wildfire Service A BCWS helicopter actions the west flank of the Shetland Creek wildfire near Blue Earth Lake on Aug. 12. The BC Wildfire Service says the Shetland Creek wildfire remains stable, but fire behaviour will vary across the blaze following scattered rain showers over the past few days that have helped to lower activity. The more than 28,000-hectare blaze is burning between Spences Bridge and Cache Creek and is classified as out of control. BCWS fire information officer David Mackinnon said Wednesday that conditions have remained stable on the fire, with little growth or fire activity expected for the remainder of the day. “A big piece of that is we don't have the input from high winds or low humidities to get the fire moving,” Mackinnon said. “We expect a fairly stable fire perimeter in the next few days. We're not anticipating any significant challenges or significant growth events with the current weather forecast.” Variable fire behaviour is expected across the blaze after scattered showers in the previous days, with some areas limited to a smouldering surface fire and dryer areas seeing the potential for a surface fire with some open flames. The southwest corner remains the most active, and has helicopters and heavy equipment supporting ground crews in the area. Crews are using direct attack methods both north and south of the Laluwissin-Pasulko Forest...

title: Apuesta industria mueblera de Jalisco a la sustentabilidad
content: Con la participación de 900 empresas expositoras este miércoles fue inaugurada la exposición Expo Mueble Internacional Verano y Tecno Mueble Internacional. La exposición mueblera se llevará a cabo del 14 al 17 de agosto en Expo Guadalajara y tiene como eje central la sustentabilidad. Te recomendamos: Reportan cierres viales en esta avenida de Guadalajara por socavón Expo Mueble Internacional es el evento líder en la entidad e ícono en América Latina y se espera la asistencia de más de 45 mil visitantes. El presidente de la Asociación de Fabricantes de muebles en Jalisco, Jorge Leos Gutiérrez, expresó que a través de estos 45 años la unión y el crecimiento del sector mueblero local ha llevado a impulsar estos eventos y posicionarse como la sexta potencia exportadora del país generando más de 525 mil empleos y la quinta potencia de exportaciones a nivel global por encima de Estados Unidos, Canadá y otros países. “Hoy Expo Mueble Internacional Verano y Tecno Mueble Internacional 2024, representan un hito significativo en nuestro camino con un espacio de exhibición de más de 60 mil metros cuadrados, este evento es el escenario donde se gestarán nuevas ideas, se forjarán conexiones comerciales y se presentarán avances tecnológicos que definirán el futuro de nuestra industria” , dijo el titular de Afamjal. Señaló que se viene una era de oportunidades sin...

title: Модрич стал самым титулованным игроком в истории «Реала»
content: Полузащитник Лука Модрич после победы «Реала» над «Аталантой» (2:0) в матче за Суперкубок УЕФА стал самым титулованным игроком в истории мадридского клуба. Для хорвата этот трофей стал 27-м в составе «сливочных». Вторыми в этом списке располагаются Даниэль Карвахаль и Начо, у которых по 26 трофеев с «Реалом». Замыкают тройку Карим Бензема и Марсело — 25. В среду, 14 августа, «Реал» в шестой раз завоевал Суперкубок УЕФА — это рекорд среди всех клубов. По пять раз обладателями трофея становились «Барселона» и «Милан», «Ливерпуль» — четыре раза.

title: Transfer Talk: Napoli's Osimhen wants move to PSG - ESPN
content: Open Extended Reactions The summer transfer window is open! Transfer Talk brings you all the latest buzz on rumours, comings, goings and, of course, done deals! TOP STORY: Napoli's Osimhen eyeing move to PSG Despite interest from Chelsea, Napoli forward Victor Osimhen would prefer a move to Paris Saint-Germain before the transfer window shuts, reports Sky Sports Deutschland's Florian Plettenberg. Osimhen has attracted significant attention from across Europe, with Napoli reportedly happy to part ways with the Nigerian forward this summer. It is reported that while Chelsea are seeking to strike a deal for the 26-year-old, Osimhen is not pushing for a move to the Premier League, which sees Chelsea lag behind PSG in the race. The tweet also reveals that Arsenal have held an interest, with the Gunners making a "loose approach" earlier in the window, however it is not known whether they are still pursuing a move. Whilst PSG remains Osimhen's preferred destination this summer, this move may not materialise. It is reported that PSG cannot move forward with a deal whilst they have Randal Kolo Muani and Gonçalo Ramos on the books. The latter has previously been linked with a move to Atlético Madrid, whilst Kolo Muani reportedly attracted attention from Borussia Dortmund earlier in the window. title: Premier League hopes 'referee's call' can help fix VAR - ESPN
content: The Premier League has launched a six-point plan which it hopes will improve VAR, including using "referee's call" to try to give better understanding of decisions to fans and players. While the VAR will still be looking to identify a "clear and obvious error," the Premier League wants to put the emphasis on the referee, underpinning a high threshold, rather than use the judgement of the video assistant. A high threshold for intervention means that the "referee's call" will stand unless readily available evidence can demonstrate there has been a clear mistake. The six-point plan aims to achieve: - Improve clarity of threshold for VAR intervention: "referee's call" - Reduce delays to the game: introducing semi-automated offside - Improve the fan experience: pilot referees announcing decisions, increase messaging, lobby the IFAB for use of live VAR audio/video - Improve VAR... Dale Johnson

title: All you need to know for LaLiga 2024-25: Madrid, Mbappe, more - ESPN
content: Open Extended Reactions It's back! The Premier League isn't the only major European league kicking off its 2024-25 campaign this weekend, as Spain's LaLiga also joins the fray. It has been a huge summer for the Spanish top flight, too, with Kylian Mbappé finally making his move to Real Madrid, Barcelona undergoing profound changes in a bid to keep up, and plenty of splashy signings at Atletico Madrid as they also look to close the gap and contend again. With storylines galore up and down the table, ESPN's LaLiga reporters break down the big talking points heading into the new campaign. 1. Champions Real Madrid have signed Kylian Mbappé. Are they unstoppable? Real Madrid won the league by 10 points last season. As if that wasn't impressive enough, they did it without their first-choice goalkeeper, Thibaut Courtois, without the player then viewed as their best defender, Éder Militão -- both absent for most of the campaign with ACL tears -- and without the elite No. 9 that most observers felt their squad was lacking. Since that coronation, they've added the world's deadliest forward, Kylian Mbappé, who signed on as a free transfer from Paris Saint-Germain. A core group of maturing players -- Eduardo Camavinga, Aurélien Tchouaméni, Federico Valverde and Vinícius Júnior -- are improving year by year. Madrid have the most-hyped young player in European football, Arda...

title: Beam signing marks progress for Theodore Roosevelt Presidential Library
creator: LeAnn M. Stasiowski
content: MEDORA, ND — State officials and guests gathered Wednesday at the Theodore Roosevelt Presidential Library construction site for a beam signing ceremony, marking a significant milestone in the project’s four-year campaign toward completion. The project has raised over $270 million in private donations, surpassing the initial $100 million needed to unlock a $50 million state endowment. Gov. Doug Burgum, a vocal advocate for the endowment, emphasized that the state controls the $50 million, generating investment earnings. He highlighted that the library is on track for a grand opening on July 4, 2026, coinciding with the nation’s 250th birthday. “This historic milestone that we have today is one of many that we’re going to have as this great project moves forward,” Burgum said during the Wednesday, Aug. 14 ceremony. “We’re on a journey to create the best presidential library in the nation. There are 14 others; this will be the best. This will have the biggest impact on generations to come, and it’s going to be a library worthy of carrying the name of our 26th president of the United States, Theodore Roosevelt.” Sen. John Hoeven, who has played a key role in advancing the library’s establishment, attended the ceremony. Hoeven’s efforts include passing legislation that enabled the Theodore Roosevelt Presidential Library (TRPL) Foundation to purchase U.S. Forest Service land in...

title: Anak Veteran Tinggal di Bunker Bekas Perang Kemerdekaan di Surabaya, Ini Kisahnya
content: - Seorang wanita lanjut usia (lansia) tinggal di bekas perang di Jalan Rajawali, Krembangan, . Wanita tersebut bernama Endang Supatmiati (68). Bunker tersebut merupakan tempat yang direbut orangtuanya dari tentara Belanda. Berdasarkan pantauan , bungker perang itu terletak di kantor Korps Cacat Veteran Republik Indonesia (KCVRI) . Tepatnya, berada di tengah area perkampungan. Endang mengaku sudah menempati bungker tersebut sejak lahir sekitar tahun 1956. Sebelumnya, dia tinggal bersama kedua orang tuanya yang dulunya merupakan perang. Ayahnya yang bernama Mustamin Tutut Wardoyo merupakan seorang Kapten TNI Angkatan Darat (AD) E. Sedangkan ibunya, Sumiati, merupakan perawat di Rumah Sakit Pegirian, . "Orang tua, bapak sama ibu dulunya tinggal di sini (bunker). Terus ada saya anak nomor empat dan delapan saudara," kata Endang ketika ditemui di Jalan Rajawali, Rabu (14/8/2024). Terlihat dari luar, tersebut memiliki pintu besi dengan ukuran lebar sekitar 1 meter dan tinggi 2 meter. Selain itu, ada dua buah lubang berukuran 55 sentimeter di dinding. Kemudian, ada tangga menurun ketika baru membuka pintu dalam tersebut.

title: Ngành du lịch chuẩn bị tăng tốc về đích mùa cao điểm khách quốc tế
content: Tín hiệu tích cực Hàn Quốc tiếp tục là thị trường gửi khách lớn nhất của Việt Nam với gần 2,6 triệu lượt. Trung Quốc xếp ở vị trí thứ 2, đạt 2,1 triệu lượt. Hai thị trường đứng đầu đóng góp gần 50% tổng số khách quốc tế đến Việt Nam. Top 10 thị trường đứng đầu là Đài Loan (Trung Quốc), Mỹ, Nhật Bản, Malaysia, Australia, Ấn Độ, Campuchia, Thái Lan. Động lực tăng trưởng chủ yếu đến từ châu Á với các thị trường có mức tăng ấn tượng ở khu vực Đông Bắc Á như Trung Quốc (+190%), Hàn Quốc (+37%), Nhật Bản (+34%), Đài Loan (+76%). Các thị trường châu Âu vẫn gia tăng so với tháng 6, dù đang mùa thấp điểm. Theo đánh giá của Cục Du lịch Quốc gia Việt Nam , đây là tín hiệu rất tích cực đến từ một khu vực trọng điểm, cho thấy hiệu quả từ chính sách thị thực thông thoáng và chuỗi hoạt động xúc tiến quảng bá du lịch Việt Nam tại các thị trường chính như Pháp, Đức, Italy, Nga. Theo sát xu hướng Từ phía doanh nghiệp, bà Thủy Trần - Tổng Giám đốc Vivu Journeys Việt Nam - chia sẻ với Lao Động rằng, khách quốc tế đến Việt Nam từ đầu năm 2024 có những thay đổi nhất định về xu hướng và hành vi, trong bối...

title: Πυροσβεστική: 34 φωτιές το τελευταίο 24ωρο – Συνελήφθη γυναίκα για πυρκαγιά στη Φωκίδα
creator: Άλκης Αποστολόπουλος
content: Σε 34 ανήλθαν οι αγροτοδασικές πυρκαγιές το τελευταίο 24ωρο σε όλη τη χώρα. Από αυτές, σύμφωνα με την Πυροσβεστική, οι 23 αντιμετωπίστηκαν άμεσα, στο αρχικό τους στάδιο, ενώ οι πυροσβεστικές δυνάμεις αντιμετωπίζουν ακόμη 11. Τα κατά τόπους ανακριτικά γραφεία, καθώς και κλιμάκια της διεύθυνσης Αντιμετώπισης Εγκλημάτων Εμπρησμού (Δ.Α.Ε.Ε.) διερευνούν τα αίτια εκδήλωσης των πυρκαγιών. Παράλληλα όπως ανακοινώθηκε από την Πυροσβεστική, στο πλαίσιο της αυτόφωρης διαδικασίας, από ανακριτικούς υπαλλήλους της Π.Υ. Ναυπάκτου, συνελήφθη την Τετάρτη μια γυναίκα για πυρκαγιά που προκλήθηκε σε ξηρά χόρτα εντός οικοπεδικού χώρου, στην περιοχή Ρούτσος, της Τ.Κ. Μανάγουλης, του δήμου Δωρίδας, στην Φωκίδα, και της επιβλήθηκε διοικητικό πρόστιμο 3.007,81 ευρώ.

title: Presenta el Cine Mexicano en Acción 2024 su programación
creator: Redacción/Quadratín
content: MORELIA, Mich., 14 de agosto de 2024.- El Cine Mexicano en Acción 2024 es un proyecto cultural de alto perfil e impacto tajante. Busca incrementar la cultura cinematográfica mexicana en espacios comunitarios y/o alternativos y casas de cultura de Pátzcuaro y la región lacustre, pero también expandiendo la programación en Morelia y en el centro y poniente de la Ciudad de México. En un comunicado se informó que el Cine Mexicano en Acción 2024 tiene como objetivo descentralizar el acceso al cine mexicano, activando el potencial de varios espacios para la difusión y divulgación de la cultura cinematográfica nacional, sin fines de lucro, con un exclusivo interés en la formación de públicos de escasos recursos, en zonas donde faltan opciones para ver películas mexicanas. Coincidimos con las autoridades culturales federales en su visión estratégica de desplegar la cultura como un antídoto al deterioro social que ha afectado demasiado al bello estado de Michoacán, entre otros. Las principales actividades a realizar serían la programación, promoción y difusión de 4 largometrajes y 4 cortometrajes mexicanos, durante agosto, en 5 sedes; la principal que es el Cine – Teatro Emperador Caltzontzin y 4 tenencias correspondientes al municipio de Pátzcuaro. Cine Mexicano en Acción 2024 busca la rehabilitación de la cultura cinematográfica mexicana en una escala más...

title: Lotofácil 3181: vejas as dezenas sorteadas nesta quarta-feira (14)
content: Nesta quarta-feira (14), a Caixa Econômica Federal acaba de realizar mais um sorteio da Lotofácil , válido pelo concurso 3181, no Espaço da Sorte, em São Paulo. Na ocasião, o prêmio em jogo está estimado novamente em R$ 1,7 milhão ao sortudo que cravar todos os 15 números. O prêmio principal é distribuído para os apostadores que acertarem as 15 dezenas, os demais valores são entregues a apostadores que acertarem 14, 13, 12 e 11 dezenas. Como funciona a Lotofácil? A Lotofácil é uma das modalidades de loteria mais populares administradas pela Caixa Econômica Federal no Brasil. Introduzida em setembro de 2003, sua proposta é ser um jogo simples e acessível, oferecendo grandes chances de vitória aos apostadores. Os sorteios da Lotofácil ocorrem às segundas, terças, quartas, quintas, sextas-feiras e sábados, sempre às 20h. As premiações são realizadas em São Paulo, com transmissão ao vivo pelo canal oficial da Caixa no YouTube . Os resultados simultâneos você pode acompanhar aqui no site do E-Investidor. Para ganhar o prêmio principal, é preciso acertar os 15 números sorteados. Entretanto, não precisa desanimar se não acertar todos, a Lotofácil também premia quem acerta 14, 13, 12 e 11 números. Não havendo acertadores das 15 dezenas, o valor se acumula para o concurso seguinte. Os ganhadores têm 90 dias para realizar o resgate dos valores....

title: '나는솔로', 돌싱 특집=레전드 공식 입증...'비주얼+스펙+매력' 역대급[종합]
creator: 김준석 기자
content: [스포츠조선닷컴 김준석 기자] '나는 SOLO(나는 솔로)'의 새로운 역사를 쓸 22기 돌싱남녀가 모두 공개됐다. 14일(수) 방송한 ENA와 SBS Plus의 리얼 데이팅 프로그램 '나는 SOLO'에서는 '솔로나라 22번지'가 1기 이후 처음으로 '솔로남 7: 솔로녀 7' 구도로 새로운 로맨스를 시작하는 모습이 펼쳐졌다. 특히 세 번째 돌싱 특집인 이번 22기는 아름다운 경남 통영에 위치한 '솔로나라 22번지'에서 그 화려한 서막을 열었으며, 무려 100분에 걸쳐 14인의 다채로운 이야기가 담겨 시청자들을 몰입시켰다. 또한 '나는 SOLO' 역사상 처음으로 '정희'라는 이름의 솔로녀가 등장해 호기심을 자극했다. '솔로나라 22번지'에 처음으로 입성한 영수는 경북 울진의 공공의료기관에서 근무 중인 마취과 전문의였다. 그는 "코로나19 확산 기간 동안 수술을 멈출 수 없다는 사명감으로 외출을 삼갔고, 재테크에도 집중한 끝에 남양주와 원주에 '자가' 4채를 마련할 수 있었다"고 밝혀 3MC 데프콘, 이이경, 송해나를 깜짝 놀라게 했다. 철두철미한 경제관념 때문에 전처와 갈등을 겪다 이혼했다는 그는 "당시의 제 모습을 후회한다"고 밝힌 뒤, 달라진 모습으로 새 인연을 찾고 싶다는 뜻을 내비쳤다. 해병대 출신 '상남자' 영호는 성격 차이로 혼인신고도 없이 결혼식 5개월 만에 이혼했다는 사연을 털어놨다. 그러면서 "착하고 성격이 안 센 분, 자녀가 없는 분을 찾고 있다"고...

title: Mike Hall Jr. practices for the Browns, then leaves with injury: Camp report
content: BEREA, Ohio — Browns rookie defensive tackle Mike Hall Jr. was on the practice field on Wednesday, a day after he was arrested and charged with domestic violence. He wasn’t on the practice field for long after suffering an injury and walking off with trainers. More Cleveland Browns coverage Kevin Stefanski on practicing versus Minnesota, Mike Hall Jr., Deshaun Watson, and more: Transcript Denzel Ward in concussion protocol, potentially with his 5th known concussion The Deshaun Watson-to-David Njoku connection grows stronger in Browns joint practices with Vikings Mary Kay Cabot, Ashley Bastock and Dan Labbe discuss Hall practicing and if he should have been on the practice field in the first place following his arrest. title: Daniel Zabala se quedó afuera del banco de suplentes de River frente a Talleres
creator: Gabriel Casazza
content: Poco antes del comienzo del trascendental partido en Córdoba frente a por la ida de los octavos de final de la , le puso punto final al misterio y confirmó los once titulares de para dar el primer paso hacia la clasificación. Y, tal como se esperaba, uno de los concentrados se quedó afuera de la nómina: . title: Japan Set for Highly Competitive PM Race as Kishida Bows Out
creator: Bloomberg
content: (Bloomberg) -- Japan’s next prime minister will face challenges from inflation, volatile financial markets, a worsening security environment and the transition to a new president in the US, Tokyo’s most important ally. Most Read from Bloomberg It’s set to be one of the most uncertain races in years, but one thing is clear for the long-dominant ruling party: The new leader isn’t likely to do things much differently than the old leader. Prime Minister Fumio Kishida said Wednesday he decided not to run for a second term as president of the Liberal Democratic Party to take responsibility for scandals that have dogged the LDP throughout his nearly three-year term. Kishida has also taken a hit from recent market chaos, including the biggest falls in the main stock indexes in decades. By choosing to bow out, Kishida is hoping a new face at the top can help the cabinet recover from approval ratings that have plunged to historic lows before the next national election, due by next year. The LDP’s election committee is due to meet on Aug. 20 and decide on a date for the vote, the Nikkei newspaper reported. “This will be very much a personality and style election rather than one with deep policy differences,” said Tobias Harris, the founder of Japan Foresight LLC, a political risk advisory. In announcing his decision, Kishida also took the chance to claim progress in ending Japan’s...

title: தமிழ்நாட்டில் 4 நாட்களுக்கு கனமழை பெய்யும்
content: சென்னை: தமிழகத்தில் 4 நாட்களுக்கு கனமழை பெய்யும் என்று சென்னை வானிலை ஆய்வுமையம் தெரிவித்துள்ளது. கேரளாவில் பெய்து வரும் தென்மேற்கு பருவமழை தமிழகத்தில் தற்போது மிகத் தீவிரம் அடையத் தொடங்கியுள்ளது. அதன் காரணமாக தமிழ்நாட்டில் அனேக இடங்களில் மழை பெய்து வருகிறது. குறிப்பாக கன்னியாகுமரி, தென்காசி, தேனி, திண்டுக்கல், மதுரை, திருப்பூர், நீலகிரி, ஈரோடு, தர்மபுரி, கிருஷ்ணகிரி, திருப்பத்தூர், வேலூர், கரூர், திருச்சி, சேலம், நாமக்கல், கோவை மற்றும் திருநெல்வேலி மாவட்டங்களின் மலைப் பகுதிகளில் நேற்று ஓரிரு இடங்களில் கனமழை பெய்துள்ளது. இந்நிலையில், தென் மேற்கு பருவ மழை மிகத் தீவிரம் அடைந்துள்ள நிலையில், தமிழகப் பகுதிகளின் கீழ் அடுக்கு சுழற்சியும், கேரளப் பகுதிகளின் மேல் ஒரு வளி மண்டல மேலடுக்கு சுழற்சியும் நிலை கொண்டுள்ளது. அதன் காரணமாக நீலகிரி, ஈரோடு, சேலம், தர்மபுரி, கிருஷ்ணகிரி, திருப்பத்தூர், வேலூர், ராணிப்பேட்டை, திருவண்ணாமலை, காஞ்சிபுரம், செங்கல்பட்டு, கள்ளக்குறிச்சி, கடலூர், விழுப்புரம், அரியலூர், பெரம்பலூர், ராமநாதபுரம், தஞ்சாவூர், திருவாரூர், நாகப்பட்டினம், மயிலாடுதுறை, புதுக்கோட்டை மாவட்டங்கள், கோவை மாவட்ட மலைப் பகுதிகளில் இன்று ஓரிரு இடங்களில் கனமழை பெய்யும். இதேநிலை 19ம் தேதி வரை நீடிக்கும் என்றும் எதிர்பார்க்கப்படுகிறது.

title: 'I'm not discriminating': Dutton defends Gazan ban
creator: Tess Ikonomou
content: Peter Dutton has doubled down on his call to ban Palestinians fleeing to Australia from Gaza, declaring he’s not discriminating. The Opposition leader on Wednesday made the captain’s call, which is understood to have surprised his colleagues. “My job is to protect all Australians and it’s exactly what I’m doing,” he told Channel Nine on Thursday. “I’m not discriminating on any basis. Happy to see people brought in from the Middle East, if they’ve been properly checked.” Muslim and Palestinian advocacy groups have labelled Mr Dutton’s comments racist and another attempt to stir up fear and hatred. Mr Dutton rejected that he had heightened tensions in the community just days after ASIO director-general Mike Burgess called for public figures to be mindful of their rhetoric. When asked if he had discussed the position with his colleagues beforehand, Mr Dutton said “it’s not an issue that goes to shadow cabinet”. “I’m not talking about internal discussions,” he said. “It’s a discussion with the national security team and I’ve done that.” Education Minister Jason Clare criticised the opposition leader’s decision to make the comments at a ceremony welcoming home returning Olympians. “That shows you something about what lies in the heart of Peter Dutton,” he told reporters in Canberra. “Every instinct in this bloke’s body, every calculation is about how he can divide the country. “It...

title: 【気象予報士解説】台風7号 予想進路 今後の見通しは
content: 台風7号は、発達しながら北上を続け、16日から17日土曜日にかけて関東や東北に接近するおそれがあります。 伊豆諸島では、一部の住宅が倒壊するような猛烈な風が吹くおそれがあるほか、関東など東日本や東北でも大荒れとなる見込みで暴風や高波、土砂災害などに厳重に警戒してください。 今後の見通しについて気象予報士の解説です。 (動画は3分00秒 15日 午前7時台のニュースで放送しました) ※データ放送ではご覧になれません。

title: In $36 billion deal, Mars to buy Pringles maker Kellanova
content: Family-owned candy giant Mars is buying Pringles maker Kellanova in a nearly $36-billion deal, bringing together brands from M&M's and Snickers to Kellogg's and Pop-Tarts in the year's biggest deal to date. Mars said on Wednesday it will pay $83.5 per share for Kellanova, representing about a 33% premium to its closing price on Aug 2. The packaged-food industry has been grappling with declining volumes, slowing growth and a weakening global consumer. Companies are looking at innovation and new markets to bolster sales as shoppers start to push back on price hikes - a trend that could lead to further consolidation. Mars' acquisition "would be the largest packaged-food deal in nearly a decade," a Bloomberg analyst said. agencies

title: Resultado Lotofácil: veja os números sorteados pelo concurso 3181
content: Nesta quarta-feira (14), a Caixa Econômica Federal realizou mais um sorteio da Lotofácil , válido pelo concurso 3181, às 20h no Espaço da Sorte, em São Paulo. Na ocasião, o prêmio em jogo está estimado em R$ 1,7 milhão ao sortudo que cravar todos os 15 números. O prêmio principal é distribuído para os apostadores que acertarem as 15 dezenas, os demais valores são entregues a apostadores que acertarem 14, 13, 12 e 11 dezenas. Como jogar na Lotofácil? O jogo da Lotofácil é bastante simples. Para participar, o jogador deve escolher entre 15 e 20 números de um total de 25 disponíveis no volante. Quanto mais números o jogador escolher, maior será o valor da aposta e também aumentam as chances de ganhar. Após escolher as dezenas, o jogador deve dirigir-se a uma casa lotérica credenciada ou realizar a aposta online, por meio do site oficial da Caixa Econômica Federal, empresa responsável pelas loterias no Brasil. Veja os números sorteados no concurso 3181 da Lotofácil: 03 – 06 – 20 – 24 – 11 – 07 – 18 – 08 – 22 – 19 – 13 – 16 – 23 – 10 – 21. O evento aconteceu no Espaço da Sorte em São Paulo e foi transmitido ao vivo no canal oficial da Caixa no YouTube . Confira abaixo: A instituição ainda não divulgou mais informações sobre os ganhadores desta edição, entretanto a Caixa deve liberar dentro das próximas horas no site oficial . O próximo...

title: Asesinato
creator: Carlos Jijón
content: Hernán Pérez Loose Guayaquil, Ecuador La semana pasada, por decisión del socialcristianismo, el correísmo y Pachakutik, la Asamblea Nacional no pudo rendirle un homenaje a Fernando Villavicencio a un año de su muerte. Parece increíble. Después de todo, si los asambleístas le dedicaron tiempo para rendirle homenaje al bizcocho, manjar y queso de hoja, resultó inexplicable esta negativa. Pero, por otro lado, también es verdad que para muchos asambleístas habría sido una tortura asistir a una sesión dedicada a rendirle homenaje a Villavicencio. ¿Qué habrían hecho los correístas que tienen a sus jefes sentenciados por corruptos precisamente por las denuncias de Villavicencio? ¿Cómo habrían reaccionado los asambleístas socialcristianos si uno de sus líderes más connotados hoy duerme en la Roca acusado de liderar una la que es probablemente la más grande y sofisticada red de corrupción judicial? ¿Y qué habrían dicho los simpatizantes de Pachakutik si una asambleísta de ese movimiento meses atrás aconsejó públicamente a sus coidearios que cuando roben lo hagan bien para que nadie los descubra? En el fondo, pensándolo bien, quizás fue mejor que la Asamblea no le rinda homenaje a Villavicencio. Su asesinato fue uno de los crímenes más execrables que registra nuestra historia. Asesinaron a un político que había dedicado buena parte de su vida a...

title: 大低壓帶影響中南部不定時雷陣雨 午後中部以北警戒
content: 在大 低壓帶 影響下,台灣吹偏西南風,今天(15日)至週六(17日),中南部將有不定時陣雨或雷雨,南部更有 局部大雨 ,其他地區午後也要留意,中部以北地區、東半部山區有局部大雨或豪雨。中央氣象署表示,周末雨勢最劇,不排除發布較大規模豪雨警告,而且適逢年度大潮,請低窪地區要注意預防淹水。白天沒有降雨前比較悶熱,高溫約攝氏32至35度。 在琉球南方海面的低氣壓,持續向東北東緩慢移動,受到影響,全台容易有 短延時強降雨 ,特別是中南部地區與澎湖、金門、馬祖,今天將有局部短暫陣雨或雷雨,南部地區也有局部大雨發生的機率,而馬祖、澎湖不排除有局部較大雨勢。 其他地區的天大多是多雲,午後有局部短暫雷陣雨。午後,中部以北地區與其他山區有局部大雨或豪雨發生的機率,清晨至上午時段,北部地區也有零星短暫陣雨。 至於輕度 颱風 「安比」凌晨2時的中心位置,在東京南方820公里海面上,距離台北東北東方1980公里,以每小時20公里速度,向北進行。 另一個輕颱「悟空」,則是在東京東南東方650公里海面上,距離台北東北東方2630公里,以每小時38公里速度,向北北東轉東北東進行。與安比颱風雙雙路徑預測,都將往日本東方海面前進,日本可能避過一劫,但提醒要去日本的民眾,還是要注意天氣變化。

title: Un poste de alta tensión en su terreno no le permitió construir en Sierra Grande y será indemnizada
creator: Carlos Morando
content: La empresa prestadora de energía eléctrica Edersa deberá indemnizar, por orden de la Justicia de Río Negro, a una usuaria por falta de respuestas adecuadas al pedido de trasladar un poste de electricidad de alta tensión en Sierra Grande. El proceso por menor cuantía se inició en el Juzgado de Paz de Sierra Grande y terminó con el pago de indemnización a la vecina que reclamó ante la Justicia. El poste estaba instalado desde 1995 y pertenece a la Línea Tensión que suministra energía eléctrica a las Comisiones de Fomento de Cona Niyeu, Arroyo Ventana y Los Berros. Luego, en ese sector se desarrolló un loteo. L a señora realizó reclamos contra Edersa desde enero de 2021. Solicitó, junto a otros vecinos, la conexión de electricidad en la manzana donde se encuentra su vivienda. Individualmente, además, solicitó el corrimiento de un poste de tendido eléctrico colocado al ras de su terreno. La respuesta de la distribuidora del servicio llegó un año después , en enero de 2022. Respecto al pedido colectivo, le pidieron a los vecinos que presenten la plancheta catastral o plano de mensura, avalador por el Consejo Municipal. La comuna completó esto en julio de 2023, por lo que poco después la mujer se presentó nuevamente haciendo el reclamo de conexión y corrimiento. En cuanto al corrimiento del poste, rechazó el pedido. Alegó que la responsabilidad era del...

title: 150.000 deseos para que atienda la Amatxu
creator: Gonzalo Ruiz

title: Salisbury PD nabs felony suspect after chase
content: SALISBURY — A man with multiple outstanding warrants, including kidnapping and other violent charges, was apprehended following a vehicle pursuit on Wednesday that extended from Salisbury to Charlotte. Kevin Antonio Smith Jr., 25, was taken into custody by law enforcement on Wednesday in Charlotte. According to a statement from the Salisbury Police Department public information officer, Major Justin Crews, at approximately 3:28 p.m., detectives located Smith at 525 W. Jake Alexander Blvd in Salisbury, while attempting to execute his arrest for a series of serious charges, including first-degree kidnapping, robbery with a dangerous weapon, child abuse, possession of a firearm by a felon and several traffic violations. Upon being approached by detectives, Smith reportedly fled the scene in a vehicle, initiating a pursuit that ultimately involved multiple law enforcement agencies. The pursuit spanned several counties, including Rowan, Cabarrus and Mecklenburg, before the pursuit concluded in Charlotte, where Smith was successfully apprehended. No injuries were reported during the pursuit. Smith’s charges stem from incidents across Rowan, Iredell and Forsyth counties. He is now in custody and facing additional charges related to the pursuit, including possession of a stolen vehicle. “The Salisbury Police Department commends the efforts of all officers and agencies involved in this...

title: Head of Theodore Roosevelt National Park departs North Dakota job
creator: By JACK DURA - Associated Press
content: BISMARCK, N.D. (AP) — The top official of Theodore Roosevelt National Park in North Dakota has left her position, but details regarding her departure remain uncertain. U.S. Sen. John Hoeven on Wednesday said he understands former Superintendent Angie Richman has a new position in New Mexico. The Associated Press emailed and left phone messages with Richman and Deputy Superintendent Maureen McGee-Ballinger.

title: वाराणसी में पहले पति फिर पत्नी की हुई थी हत्या:पोस्टमार्टम रिपोर्ट खुलासा, रस्सी से पति का गला कसा...फिर फावड़े से पत्नी को काटा
content: वाराणसी के चोलापुर थाना क्षेत्र के गुरवट गांव में मंगलवार रात दंपती का शव मिलने की तस्वीर पोस्टमॉर्टम रिपोर्ट के बाद साफ हो गई। पोस्टमॉर्टम रिपोर्ट में दोनों की हत्या होने की बात सामने आई है। इसके अनुसार हत्यारों ने पहले पति संतोष सिंह की लोअर के नाड़ हत्यारों ने वारदात को सफाई से अंजाम दिया और इसे पति पत्नी के झगड़े के बाद हत्या-आत्महत्या में बदल दिया। दोनों की हत्या के बाद घटनास्थलों से तीन-चार लोगों के फिंगर प्रिंट मिले हैं, अब पुलिस हत्यारोपियों की तलाश में जुट गई है। संपत्ति और पारिवारिक विवाद में हत्या की बात सामने आ रही है। वहीं, मृतका आरती के पिता ने पहले ही अपने दामाद संतोष के खिलाफ बेटी की हत्या करने की तहरीर देकर केस दर्ज कराया था, अब पोस्टमार्टम रिपोर्ट आने के बाद घटना में नया मोड़ आ गया है। डीसीपी वरुणा जोन चंद्रकांत मीणा ने दो टीमें बनाकर सभी के नंबर की कॉल डिटेल खंगाली है। चोलापुर थाना क्षेत्र में मंगलवार की सुबह दंपती के शव मिलने से हड़कंप मच गया। महिला का शव घर में मिला तो उसके पति का शव एक किमी. दूर खेत के पास सड़क पर बरामद हुआ। पहले बताया गया कि पति ने विवाद में महिला की हत्या कर दी और फिर खुद भी जान दे दी। पुलिस को मृतका के पिता बाबूलाल ने हत्या की तहरीर देकर केस दर्ज कराया और दामाद संतोष को नामजद किया। दोनों के शव पोस्टमार्टम के लिए भेजे तो बुधवार शाम आई रिपोर्ट ने पूरी कहानी ही बदल दी। इसमें साफ हो गया कि आरती की हत्या उसके पति ने नहीं बल्कि तीन-चार लोगों ने मिलकर की है। क्राइम ब्रांच की टीम ने संतोष और आरती की मोबाइल कॉल डिटेल भी खंगाल रही है। 2007 में...

title: ఆర్థిక సంస్కరణల కొత్త శకానికి పునాది
creator: bharath kumar
content: న్యూఢిల్లీ, ఆగస్టు 14: భారత్‌ను అభివృద్ధి చెందిన దేశంగా మార్చడమే లక్ష్యంగా ఆర్థిక సంస్కరణల కొత్త శకానికి పునాది పడిందని రాష్ట్రపతి ద్రౌపది ముర్ము పేర్కొన్నారు. 78వ స్వాతంత్య్ర దినోత్సవం సందర్భంగా బుధవారం ఆమె జాతినుద్దేశించి ప్రసంగించారు. ప్రపంచంలో ఐదో అతిపెద్ద ఆర్థిక వ్యవస్థగా భారత్‌ ఎదగడం గర్వించాల్సిన విషయమని, మొదటి మూడు ఆర్థిక వ్యవస్థల్లో ఒకటిగా ఎదిగే క్రమంలో దేశం ఉన్నట్టు పేర్కొన్నారు. 2047 నాటికి భారత్‌ను అభివృద్ధి చెందిన దేశంగా మార్చాలని ప్రభుత్వం లక్ష్యంగా పెట్టుకుందని తెలిపారు. మౌలిక సదుపాయాల అభివృద్ధి, ఏఐ, సెమి కండక్టర్లు, పటిష్టమైన బ్యాంకింగ్‌, ఆర్థిక రంగాలపై ప్రభుత్వం దృష్టిసారించిందని అన్నారు. సామాజిక న్యాయానికి ప్రభుత్వం ప్రథమ ప్రాధాన్యతను ఇస్తున్నదని, ఎస్సీ, ఎస్టీలు, ఇతర వెనుకబడిన సమాజాల సంక్షేమం కోసం అపారమైన చర్యలు తీసుకుంటున్నదని పేర్కొన్నారు. విభజిత ధోరణులను తిప్పికొట్టాలని ఆమె పిలుపునిచ్చారు. గత దశాబ్ద కాలంగా క్రీడా రంగంలో భారత్‌ అద్భుతంగా పురోగతి సాధించిందని ఆమె పేర్కొన్నారు. పారిస్‌ ఒలింపిక్స్‌లో భారతీయ క్రీడాకారుల ప్రదర్శనను, టీ20 ప్రపంచ కప్‌లో టీమిండియా విజయాన్ని ఆమె ప్రస్తావించారు. రాజధాని ఢిల్లీలో గురువారం జరిగే 78వ స్వాతంత్య్ర దినోత్సవ వేడుకలకు ఎర్రకోట సిద్ధమైంది. ఇటీవల పారిస్‌ ఒలింపిక్స్‌లో పాల్గొన్న భారత బృందం ఈ వేడుకల్లో పాల్గొంటున్నది. వీరే కాక అటల్‌ ఇన్నోవేషన్‌ మిషన్‌ (ఏఐఎం) విద్యార్థులు, బోర్డర్‌ రోడ్‌ ఆర్గనైజేషన్‌కు చెందిన కార్మికులు సహా మొత్తం 6,000 మంది ప్రత్యేక ఆహ్వానితులుగా విచ్చేస్తున్నారు. వికసిత్‌ భారత్‌ @2047 పేరిట నిర్వహిస్తున్న ఈ...

title: Bills Work Out Former First-Round Wide Receiver
content: The Buffalo Bills appear interested in adding to their wide receiver room before the 2024 season gets underway. On Wednesday, ESPN's Field Yates reported the Bills worked out former Tennessee Titans wide receiver Corey Davis. The former fifth overall pick in 2017 has unretired after a year away from the game and is now looking to return to the . Here’s an interesting one: the Bills tried out former Titans and Jets WR Corey Davis. The former 5th overall pick in draft unretired after a year away and is now seeking a return to the league. Davis is still just 29 years old. He was drafted in 2017 and spent four seasons with the Titans, before signing with the New York Jets on a three-year, $37.5 million deal. Davis spent two seasons with the Jets before announcing in Aug. 2023 that he was taking a break from football. "For some time now I've been contemplating stepping away from the sport of football. This decision has not been easy. Although I am a deep person, I am a man of few words. I've been searching my heart for what to do and I feel that stepping away from the game is the best path for me at this time," Davis said last year in a . "I have more blessings than I could have ever imagined — I have an amazing family, a beautiful wife and two healthy children that I look forward to spending more time with. I am truly grateful for all the opportunities I have had and will continue...

title: ‘Install Ambedkar statue in the middle of circle’
content: Mangaluru : The Federation of Scheduled Castes and Tribes has urged the district administration to install the statue of BR Ambedkar in the middle of the Dr BR Ambedkar Circle in the city, and not on the roadside. Federation president Lolaksha told reporters on Wednesday, that the authorities have scheduled the bhoomi puja for the construction of the statue in a hurried manner, without a proper plan, and hence it should be cancelled. He alleged that the authorities have planned to install the statue on the roadside at Ambedkar Circle, citing a lack of space, and warned that they will not tolerate it. Lolaksha said the statue of Ambedkar should also be installed in the middle of the circle, on the lines of the installation of statues like social reformer Brahmashri Narayana Guru, Rashtrakavi Manjeshwara Govinda Pai, and Sarvajna in the city. Meanwhile, the office-bearers of DK Zilla Dalita Sanghatanegala Samanvaya Samithi, a federation of Dalit organisations , met deputy commissioner Mullai Muhilan MP on Wednesday, and urged him not to cancel the scheduled bhoomi puja for the construction of Dr B R Ambedkar Circle in the city on Thursday. M Devadas, chief convener of the federation, said that the MCC has made all preparations for the bhoomi puja. The district administration and MCC should not consider any opposition to it and go ahead with the event as scheduled. He said the...

title: Vicepresidente Félix Ulloa arriba a República Dominicana para asistir a la toma de posesión de Luis Abinader
creator: Redacción ContraPunto
content: Vicepresidente Félix Ulloa hijo arriba en República Dominicana para participar, en representación del Presidente Nayib Bukele, a la Ceremonia de Juramentación del Jefe de Gobierno de dicho país, Sr. Luis Abinader. El Vicepresidente de la República de El Salvador, Sr. Félix Ulloa hijo arribó en la República Dominicana para asistir, en representación del Presidente, Sr. Nayib Bukele a la Ceremonia de Juramentación del segundo mandato del Jefe de Estado, Sr. Luis Abinader. A su llegada, el Vicemandatario fue recibido por el Director de Relaciones con Asia y Oceanía del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores dominicano, Sr. Reynaldo Espinal, y estuvo acompañado por la Embajadora de El Salvador en dicho país, Sra. Dania Tolentino. La presencia del Vicepresidente Ulloa en este acto solemne refuerza los lazos bilaterales entre ambas naciones, consolida la integración regional y fortalece los vínculos diplomáticos que, fundamentados en la amistad, colaboración y respeto mutuo, han perdurado por 142 años. Puedes cancelar tu suscripción en cualquier momento. ¡Gracias! Ahora revisa tu bandeja de entrada para confirmar tu suscripción.

title: ¿Cómo solicitar un reembolso de gastos médicos privados por una omisión en una institución de salud pública?
creator: Janet Gómez
content: Ya sea a causa de la alta demanda o del déficit de personal, equipo o insumos, algunas instituciones de salud pública no están en capacidad para atender a todos los pacientes , por lo que es común que algunos piensen que podría solicitar un reembolso de gastos médicos privados por una omisión. Te contamos cómo se lleva a cabo este proceso y en qué casos aplica. De acuerdo con datos de la Encuesta Nacional de Salud y Nutrición, publicada en 2022, menos del 50% de la población mexicana opta por usar servicios públicos cuando se enfrenta a una necesidad de salud. Dato que ha sido una constante al menos desde 2006. Esta situación plantea una posibilidad relevante respecto al incremento de la demanda de servicios médicos privados y por ende, de la deficiencia en la capacidad de las instituciones públicas para atención de los enfermos, al grado que pocos usuarios se atreven a utilizar los servicios. Dado que el grueso de la población no cuenta con la capacidad económica para pagar un servicio médico privado, la misma encuesta señala que en la última década, los consultorios adyacentes a farmacias se han convertido en una opción popular para un segmento considerable de la población. Lamentablemente, esta tendencia no está exenta de riesgos para la salud de las y los pacientes debido a una atención de mala calidad acompañada de incentivos para la...

title: Con 80 casos de Covid-19, Chihuahua se posiciona como tercer estado con menos contagios
content: Salud / miércoles 14 de agosto de 2024 Con 80 casos de Covid-19, Chihuahua se posiciona como tercer estado con menos contagios Al corte del 12 de agosto, la entidad reporta tres fallecimientos por esta enfermedad Foto: Anna Shvets / pexels.com Velvet González / El Heraldo de Chihuahua De acuerdo con la actualización semanal del Sistema de Vigilancia Epidemiológica de Enfermedad Respiratoria Viral (SISVER) hasta el 12 de agosto de 2024 , el estado de Chihuahua registró mil 456 casos de Infecciones Respiratorias Agudas , de las cuales 80 han dado positivo a Covid-19 , lo que significa un 5.5% del total de las IRAG. Además, la entidad reporta tres fallecimientos por dicha enfermedad , durante 2024. Con dichas cifras, Chihuahua se ubica como la tercera entidad con menos casos positivos y con menos fallecimientos por Covid-19 en el presente año. A nivel nacional se han reportado 118 mil 298 casos de IRAG y de éstos, 11 mil 692 han dado positivo a Covid-19 . Además, se registran 460 fallecimientos en el país. Te puede interesar: Parralense viaja a Argentina y se contagia de dengue; fue atendido con éxito Las entidades federativas que registran más casos y muertes este 2024 , son la Ciudad de México , con 19 mil 148 casos de enfermedades respiratorias virales, de las cuales 2 mil 855 son Covid-19, y se registran 70 muertes. El estado de Puebla reporta 9 mil 495 casos de...

Buscando ajudar você leitor com ótimas dicas de brilhantes projetos seriados, separamos abaixo uma grande lista com 10 dessas produções: (Netflix) Como é possível com a tecnologia de hoje um avião desaparecer e não ser mais encontrado? title: 홈플러스, '여름세일' 덕 톡톡히 봤다...매출 90%ᆞ멤버십 10만 명 '쑥'
creator: 배근미
배근미 (athena3507@etoday.co.kr)
content: 홈플러스가 지난달부터 진행한 ‘썸머 슈퍼세일! 썸머 홈플런’ 기간 동안 점포 매출이 최대 90% 신장된 것으로 집계됐다. 멤버십 회원 수 역시 10일여 만에 10만 명 이상 급증했다. 고물가 속 초특가로 선보인 휴가철 필수 먹거리 상품들이 뜨거운 관심을 받으며 매출 성장을 견인했다는 평가다. 홈플러스에 따르 7월 25일부터 8월 11일까지 주요 5개 점포 매출은 전년 대비 50% 이상 증가했고 점포별로는 매출이 최대 90% 뛰었다. 온라인 매출도 눈에 띄게 증가했다. 근거리 기반 퀵커머스 ‘즉시배송’ 매출은 전년 대비 약 33% 늘었고 홈플러스 온라인 전체 매출도 약 12% 뛰었다. 온라인 앱으로 주류를 주문해 원하는 날짜·시간대에 픽업할 수 있는 ‘주류 이지픽업’ 매출은 약 133% 급증했다. 마이홈플러스 멤버십 회원 수도 폭발적으로 증가했는데, 행사 시작 10여 일만에 10만 명 이상이 가입했다. 이는 전월 동기 대비 30% 가량 많은 수치다. 이 같은 흥행은 알뜰한 휴가를 추구하는 트렌드에 맞춰 ‘초저가’로 마련한 휴가철 먹거리 상품들이 이끌었다는 분석이다. 채소의 경우 여름 휴가철을 맞아 초특가로 마련한 ‘깐마늘’, ‘오이’, ‘파프리카’ 매출이 전년 대비 각각 248%, 106%, 92% 증가하는 등 폭발적인 매출 성장을 보였다. 과일은 최저 7990원에 선보인 ‘복숭아’가 약 11% 성장했고 자두(24%), 수박(5%), 무화과(65%), 사과(51%), 블루베리(10%) 등도...

title: Còn 15 giây, Nguyễn Trần Duy Nhất tung đòn thắng nhà vô địch S1, truyền thông Thái Lan khen ngợi là ‘màn ra mắt đẹp như mơ’
content: Nguyễn Trần Duy Nhất là huyền thoại của Muay Việt Nam với thành tích 7 lần vô địch thế giới. Nguyễn Trần Duy Nhất đã thượng đài ở giải đấu tỷ đô ONE Championship và đối mặt với những võ sĩ mạnh từ nhiều nơi trên thế giới. Gần đây nhất, Duy Nhất đã thắng võ sĩ Johan Ghazali, người mang 2 quốc tịch Malaysia và Mỹ ở sự kiện ONE 167: Tawanchai vs. Nattawut II diễn ra vào tháng 6/2024. Trước đó, Duy Nhất đã thắng 2 trận và thua 1 trận ở đấu trường ONE Championship. Đặc biệt, Duy Nhất đã giành chiến thắng vang dội khi ra mắt đấu trường ONE Championship bằng việc đánh bại Azwan Che Wil (Malaysia) vào năm 2019. Trang chủ ONE Championship viết về trận đấu của Duy Nhất và Azwan Che Wil Trang chủ ONE Championship tiếng Thái viết về trận đấu này: "Võ sĩ của chủ nhà (Nguyễn Trần Duy Nhất) đã bước lên sàn đấu Muay Thái hạng ruồi và tạo nên lịch sử cũng như những kỷ niệm đáng nhớ cho CĐV Việt Nam tại sự kiện ONE: IMMORTAL TRIUMPH. Tiếng reo hò của CĐV ở TP.HCM như sấm dậy, tiếp thêm sức mạnh cho Duy Nhất ngay từ khi tiếng chuông khai cuộc vang lên. Azwan cố gắng tấn công võ sĩ chủ nhà, nhưng những bước di chuyển và phản đòn của...

title: Bích Tuyền được vinh danh cùng với hoa khôi bóng chuyền Việt Nam sau khi làm nên lịch sử, CLB châu Á ngỏ lời với lương tiền tỷ
content: Theo trang , Bích Tuyền là đối chuyền hay nhất của bóng chuyền nữ Việt Nam trong năm 2024. Cụ thể, Bích Tuyền đứng ở vị trí số 1 của Việt Nam với 215,50 điểm theo cập nhật mới nhất của Volleybox hôm 14/8. Trong khi đó, hoa khôi bóng chuyền Kiều Trinh đứng thứ 2 với 63,50 điểm. Bích Tuyền được vinh danh là đối chuyền hay nhất Việt Nam trong năm 2024 Bích Tuyền đang có phong độ cao trong năm 2024. Hồi tháng 7, Bích Tuyền giúp ĐT bóng chuyền nữ Việt Nam giành hạng 3 ở FIVB Challenger Cup 2024 khi thắng ĐT Bỉ. Trong trận đấu đó, Bích Tuyền ghi 35 điểm. Đây cũng là thành tích đáng nể của Bích Tuyền khi mà ĐT Bỉ đang xếp hạng 13 thế giới. Trước đó, Bích Tuyền đã ghi 10 điểm khi ĐT bóng chuyền nữ Việt Nam gặp Séc ở FIVB Challenger Cup 2024. ĐT Séc đang xếp hạng 15 thế giới. Ở 2 chặng của SEA V.League 2024, Bích Tuyền tiếp tục chơi tốt. Bích Tuyền ghi tới 82 điểm ở chặng 1 của SEA V.League và 58 điểm ở chặng 2. Ở chặng 1 của SEA V.League 2024, Bích Tuyền ghi 41 điểm ở trận gặp Thái Lan, giúp ĐT bóng chuyền nữ Việt Nam lần đầu thắng 2 set trước ĐT xứ chùa vàng. Nhiều CĐV Việt Nam đang hy vọng Bích Tuyền sẽ xuất ngoại trong tương lai....

title: Трамп высказался об охватившей США эпидемии преступности
creator: Маргарита Пименова
content: Соединенные Штаты Америки охватила эпидемия преступности из-за провальной миграционной политики нынешнего руководства страны, убежден кандидат в президенты от Республиканской партии Дональд Трамп . Он заявил в ходе митинга в штате Северная Каролина, что ситуация «вышла из-под контроля». «Я предупреждал, что преступления, которые совершают [нелегальные] мигранты, достигнут масштаба эпидемии. Но все гораздо хуже эпидемии», — высказался политик, обвинив в случившемся вице-президента США Камалу Харрис. Ранее Трамп в интервью предпринимателю и миллиардеру Илону Маск назвал действующего главу государства Джо Байдена овощем. По его словам, он видел кадры отдыха Байдена на пляже, где тот «едва мог ходить». До этого политик рассказал , что президент США Джо Байден допустил глупость, заявив о возможном вступлении Украины в НАТО , что стало причиной начала конфликта на Украине. При этом Трамп назвал Путина «хорошим переговорщиком».

title: Veja os números sorteados na Lotofácil no concurso 3181, nesta quarta
