title: தமிழ்நாடு அரசு அறிவிப்பு 9 பேருக்கு நல்லாளுமை விருது
content: சென்னை: 78வது சுதந்திர தின விழாவை ஒட்டி 9 பேருக்கு நல்லாளுமை விருதுகள் வழங்கப்பட உள்ளது. விருது பெறுபவர்களின் விவரம்: தரவு தூய்மை திட்டம் வாயிலாக கலைஞர் மகளிர் உரிமை தொகை உள்ளிட்ட பல்வேறு திட்டங்களில் தகுதியுடைய பயனாளிகள் தேர்வு செய்யப்பட்டமைக்காக முதல்வரின் முகவரித்துறை தலைமை தொழில்நுட்ப அலுவலர் வனிதா, உயர்க்கல்வியில் மாணவர்களின் சேர்க்கை விகிதத்தை கணிசமாக உயர்த்தியமைக்காக விருதுநகர் மாவட்ட ஆட்சியர் ஜெயசீலன், சென்னை பன்னாட்டு புத்தக கண்காட்சிகளின் வாயிலாக தமிழ் இலக்கிய படைப்புகளை உலக மொழிகளுக்கு எடுத்து செல்ல வழிவகை செய்துள்ளமைக்காக பொது நூலகங்கள் துறை இயக்குநர் இளம்பகவத் ஆகியோருக்கு நல்லாளுமை விருதுகள் வழங்கப்பட உள்ளன. மூளைச்சாவு அடைந்த நபர்களிடம் இருந்து உறுப்பு கொடை பெற்று நடத்தப்படும் உறுப்பு மாற்று சிகிச்சை திட்டத்தை மிகச்சிறப்பாக நடத்தி வருவதற்காக தமிழ்நாடு உறுப்பு மாற்று ஆணையத்தின் உறுப்பினர் செயலர் கோபால கிருஷ்ணன், முதல்வரின் காலை உணவு திட்டத்தை அரசுப் பள்ளிகளில் பயிலும் மாணவர்களின் தாய்மார்களை உள்ளடக்கிய சுய உதவி குழுக்களை கொண்டு சிறப்பாக செயல்படுத்தியமைக்காக தமிழ்நாடு மகளிர் மேம்பாட்டு நிறுவனத்தின் நிர்வாக இயக்குனர் திவ்ய தர்சினி, நான் முதல்வன் திட்டத்தின் வாயிலாக இளைஞர்களுக்கான திறன் வளர்ப்பு பயிற்சி முறைகளில் புதுமையை புகுத்தியதற்காக தமிழ்நாடு திறன் மேம்பாட்டு கழகத்தின் மேலாண்மை இயக்குநர் இன்னசென்ட் திவ்யா ஆகியோருக்கும் நல்லாளுமை விருதுகள் வழங்கப்பட உள்ளன. தமிழ்நாடு மாதிரி பள்ளிகள் வாயிலாக அரசு பள்ளி மாணவர்களை தலைசிறந்த உயர்கல்வி நிறுவனங்களில் இடம்பெற...

title: Ở Lebanon cho biết sẽ không nổ ra cuộc chiến lớn trong những ngày đàm phán về Gaza
content: Amos Hochstein, cố vấn của Tổng thống Hoa Kỳ đã đến Beirut hôm thứ Tư, nơi ông gặp Chủ tịch Quốc hội Berri và quyền Thủ tướng nước này Najib Mikati. Đặc phái viên của Joe Biden đã thảo luận về khả năng ngăn chặn một cuộc chiến lớn giữa Lebanon-Israel và đạt được lệnh ngừng bắn ở Dải Gaza . Trước đó, Ai Cập, Qatar và Mỹ kêu gọi Israel và phong trào Hamas của Palestine nối lại các cuộc thảo luận về lệnh ngừng bắn vào ngày 14-15 tháng 8. Lãnh đạo ba nước cho biết họ sẵn sàng đưa ra đề xuất cuối cùng để đạt được thỏa thuận. Ông Berri cũng lưu ý rằng việc tuân thủ Nghị quyết 1701 của Hội đồng Bảo an Liên hợp quốc là cách duy nhất để giải quyết xung đột giữa Lebanon và Israel. Chủ tịch quốc hội Lebanon cho biết Hochstein đảm bảo với ông rằng các cuộc đàm phán sẽ diễn ra trên cơ sở sáng kiến được đề xuất trước đó của Tổng thống Mỹ Joe Biden mà không có bất kỳ sửa đổi nào. Chính trị gia Lebanon nói thêm trong cuộc phỏng vấn rằng nỗ lực đàm phán hòa bình sắp tới có thể sẽ là nỗ lực cuối cùng. Chính trị gia Lebanon lưu ý rằng cố vấn của Biden đã bay thẳng tới Beirut mà không dừng lại ở Tel Aviv để...

title: Casi nadie las compra, pero estas son las mejores marcas de jeans, según Profeco
content: Los jeans son una prenda indispensable en el guardarropa de cualquier persona, por ello conocer su calidad resulta importante para los consumidores. Debido a esto, la Procuraduría Federal del Consumidor ( Profeco ) en llevó a cabo en 2021 un análisis a algunos modelos de pantalones de mezclilla para caballero que se comercializan en el mercado mexicano, el cual arrojó que la mayoría de ellos cumple con los estándares de calidad; por lo cual se les otorgaron calificaciones de Excelente “E” y Muy Bueno “MB”, salvo algunos casos menores que presentaron costuras flojas y sus fibras varían un poco. A través de un comunicado la Profeco informó que el Estudio de Calidad que el Laboratorio Nacional de Protección al Consumidor fue publicado en La Revista del Consumidor, en su número 535, del mes de septiembre de 2021 , en el cual se analizaron siete modelos de ocho marcas de pantalones de mezclilla. El estudio incluyó un total de 204 pruebas (12 a cada uno de los modelos) para verificar cumplimiento de información al consumidor, determinar acabados en tela y confección, además de identificación y contenido de fibras, cambio de talla por efectos del lavado, verificación de tallas, peso de la tela, resistencia a la decoloración, distorsión de la prenda después del lavado y durabilidad. En general, todos los pantalones analizados cumplen completamente en cuanto a la...

title: Rehabilitan Parque Lineal del Libramiento de Tepic
content: Tepic, Nayarit (OEM- Informex).-Siguiendo las indicaciones del gobernador de Nayarit, Miguel Ángel Navarro Quintero , la Secretaría de Seguridad y Protección Ciudadana, llevó a cabo trabajos de rescate y mantenimiento en el Parque Lineal , ubicado en el Libramiento de Tepic. El secretario de dicha dependencia, Manasés Langarica Verdín, explicó que el personal realizó una limpieza exhaustiva de las áreas verdes a lo largo de esta vía, comenzando en el fraccionamiento Las Cumbres hasta el puente de la avenida Brasil. title: VIDEO: Prensan dedo de mujer en camión de Puebla; había exceso de pasajeros
creator: Redacción 24 Horas
content: El dedo de una mujer quedó prensado al abrirse la puerta de un camión en Puebla ; la unidad tenía exceso de pasajeros. Dicho suceso ocurrió este miércoles 14 de agosto al interior de una unidad de la Red Urbana de Transporte Articulado (RUTA) de la Línea 3 a la altura del paradero San Antonio , esto en la capital de Puebla. A través de las redes sociales se difundió el video en el que se aprecia el momento justo en que una mujer quedó con el dedo prensado al interior de la unidad. En las imágenes -captadas por la cámara de seguridad del camión- se aprecia en la puerta de entrada a tres mujeres, pero por el exceso de pasajeros se tienen que quedar en esa zona. Una de las pasajeras se sostiene de la puerta de entrada de la unida, pero en cuanto el conductor abre la puerta ahí la mujer quedó con el dedo prensado. La pasajera -identificada como Sara- quedó con la extremidad seccionada y tuvo que ser atendida toda vez que suplicó al operador cerrar la puerta y regresar al paradero para salir. Los testigos llamaron a una ambulancia del Sistema de Urgencias Médicas Avanzadas (SUMA) Puebla. Los paramédicos atendieron a la afectada quien supuestamente perdió la extremidad, pero no se ha confirmado. Además, la víctima aseguró que demandará al operador de la unidad 347 por lo ocurrido. En redes sociales señalaron de “negligente” a la mujer y no al conductor del...

creator: 변재훈 기자
content: [여수=뉴시스] 변재훈 기자 = 전남 여수 앞바다에서 화물선과 낚시어선이 충돌, 9명이 가벼운 부상을 입었다. 15일 여수해양경찰서에 따르면 전날 오후 5시27분께 여수시 삼산면 광도 남동쪽 11km 해상에서 9t급 낚시어선과 2600t급 화물선이 충돌했다. 이 사고로 어선에 타고 있던 승선원 18명(승객 16명·선원 2명) 중 9명이 가벼운 부상을 입었다. 이 중 응급 환자로 분류된 2명은 신고를 받고 출동한 해경 경비정으로 병원 이송됐다. 기름 유출 등 해양오염은 없었다고 해경은 전했다. 해경은 두 선박 선원들을 상대로 정확한 사고 경위를 조사하고 있다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Balcony fire forces brief evacuation of downtown Calgary apartment building
creator: Michael Ranger
content: Around 100 people needed to be evacuated as crews responded to a fire on a balcony in downtown Calgary on Wednesday afternoon. Fire crews were called to an apartment building om 5 Avenue SW near 8 Street around 4 p.m. for reports of smoke coming from a balcony. A Calgary Fire Department (CFD) spokesperson confirms crews encountered smoke coming from an upper floor unit. Firefighters made their way to the balcony and were able to quickly extinguish the fire. Images from the scene show a ladder truck leading to a balcony about seven or eight floors from the ground. Officials say around 100 residents from the 20 story building were evacuated and have since been allowed back in. The unit where the fire started was unoccupied when crews arrived. No injuries were reported. “The fact that it was a concrete building was really fortunate,” says a CFD spokesperson Alistair Robin. “Not a lot of heat damage or spread of fire to other units, but they were impacted by smoke.” Robin says a piece of furniture caught fire on the balcony. Investigators are still trying to determine the cause.

title: Habitantes de Paraparal 1 afectados por desborde de aguas residuales
creator: Redacción 2
content: || Luis Chunga || Fotos Rodolfo Gamarra Los más perjudicados con las enfermedades son los jóvenes, mujeres embarazadas y personas de la tercera edad En la comunidad de Paraparal, municipio Francisco Linares Alcántara del estado Aragua, continúan entre las anegaciones que dejaron las fuertes precipitaciones del pasado martes. Los más afectados son quienes habitan en la manzana 2, poligonal A, así como las zonas 14, 21, 23 y 25. En un recorrido por el lugar, residentes denunciaron que el problema se agrava con el desborde de las aguas residuales que desembocan en calles y avenidas de los mencionados sectores. Añadieron que la situación la viven desde hace años, con cuadros vitales que se hacen cada vez más recurrentes y severos. La señora Luz de Vivas, dijo que los más afectados son los menores de edad víctimas de fiebre, dolores estomacales y escoriaciones en la piel. “Lo peor de todo es que en el ambulatorio (de Paraparal) no tienen medicamentos, no tenemos dinero y hacemos lo posible para comprar por lo menos una medicina”, dijo. Asimismo, Luis Peñaloza aseguró que a diario respiran “toda esa contaminación de las aguas de cloacas que caen cerca de nuestras casas”. Reiteró que el problema lleva años “pero no hay autoridad que lo resuelva”. Reveló que para que baje el nivel de las aguas “tienen que pasar varias semanas”. Explicó que anteriormente lidiaban...

title: Rohtak News: क्लर्कों की हड़ताल का विधायक भारत भूषण बतरा व नवीन जयहिंद ने किया समर्थन
content: रोहतक। क्लेरिकल एसोसिएशन वेलफेयर सोसाइटी हरियाणा की हड़ताल बुधवार को तीसरे दिन भी जारी रही। इस कारण तहसील कार्यालय और अन्य कार्यालयों के कार्य प्रभावित रहे। इससे रजिस्ट्रियां, वाहनों की आरसी, प्रॉपर्टी आईडी, शादी, जन्म-मृत्यु प्रमाणपत्र बनाने के काम रुक गए हैं। इन कामों के लिए रोजाना सैकड़ों आवेदन आते हैं। हड़ताल के चलते यह सब कार्य अटके हैं। हड़ताल तो खत्म हो गई, किंतु 15 अगस्त को स्वतंत्रता दिवस के मौके पर कार्यालयों में अवकाश रहता है। ऐसे में अब शुक्रवार को ही कार्यालय खुलेंगे और लोगों के काम हो पाएंगे। बुधवार को लघु सचिवालय के सामने दिए जा रहे क्लर्कों के धरने पर शहर विधायक भारत भूषण बतरा पहुंचे। उन्होंने लिपिकों की मांग को कांग्रेस पार्टी के घोषणा पत्र में शामिल करने व कांग्रेस की सरकार आने पर लिपिकों को उनकी मांग मूल वेतन 35400 देने का आश्वासन दिया। साथ ही प्रदेश सरकार से कहा कि वो तुरंत लिपिकों की मांग जो की कार्य अनुसार बिलकुल जायज है पूरी करे। उन्होंने कहा आज की सरकार पोर्टल की सरकार है, वर्तमान सरकार की पॉलिसी के कारण लिपिक वर्ग का कार्य का प्रकार बदल गया है, इसलिए इनकी मांग भी जायज है। वर्तमान महंगाई में मूल वेतन 21700 ऊंट के मुख में जीरे के समान है। इसके उपरांत नवीन जयहिंद ने भी धरनास्थल पर पहुंच कर लिपिकों को समर्थन देने की घोषणा की। उन्होंने कहा कि सरकार को तुरंत यूनियन से बात करके मूल वेतन 35400 देना चाहिए। जिला प्रधान संदीप दांगी ने बताया कि सरकार से लिपिकों की कई बैठक हो चुकी है, लेकिन प्रदेश सरकार ने किया वादा नहीं निभाया। हड़ताल के कारण अनेक विभागों का...

title: LG헬로비전, ‘DX데이터스쿨 3기’ 개강...미래 미디어 인재 육성
creator: 김현아
content: [이데일리 김현아 기자] LG헬로비전이 디지털 전환(DX) 시대를 이끌어갈 미디어 인재 양성에 박차를 가하고 있다. 지난 9일, ‘LG헬로비전 DX DATA School 3기’가 본격적으로 개강해 28명의 교육생들이 참여했다. 이번 프로그램은 6개월간 1000시간의 집중 교육을 통해 실무형 전문 인력을 양성하는 과정으로, 무료 교육과 자격증 비용 지원, 취업 가산점 등의 혜택이 제공된다. LG헬로비전은 이를 통해 AI와 DX 시대의 방송 미디어 산업 혁신을 주도할 인재를 육성할 계획이다. ‘LG헬로비전 DX DATA School 3기’ 교육이 본격적으로 시작됐다. 사진은 지난 9일(금) LG헬로비전 본사에서 진행된 오리엔테이션 현장. ‘LG헬로비전 DX DATA School 3기’ 교육이 본격적으로 시작됐다. 사진은 배성호 LG헬로비전 고객가치혁신담당이 환영사를 하는 모습. 주요뉴스 하늘에선 웃으시길...처음 본 유관순 열사, 김구 선생의 '만세' ‘믿는다, 반도체'...대장주 3조 폭풍매수 나선 개미 55세에 출소...여친 살해 뒤 안마방서 알몸으로 자던 해경 [그해 오늘] 저작권자 © 이데일리 - 무단전재, 재배포 금지 뉴스레터 구독 | 지면 구독

title: Watch Wednesday's full episode of Fast Money — August 14, 2024
content: "Fast Money" is America's post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

title: Homicides have fallen in Portland, mirroring a nationwide decline in violent crimes
creator: Zaeem Shaikh
content: The number of violent crimes and homicides continues to fall in Portland two years after the city declared a gun violence emergency . Portland saw decreases in reports of robberies, homicides and aggravated assaults in the first half of the year compared to the same period last year, according to a violent crimes survey released last week from the Major Cities Chiefs Association representing police executives in the U.S. and Canada.

title: Propone Gobernador presupuesto pleno y democratización interna a la UMSNH
creator: Juan Pacheco/Quadratín
content: ZAMORA, Mich., 14 de agosto de 2024.- El gobernador de Michoacán, Alfredo Ramírez Bedolla, anunció que alentará una gran reforma a la Universidad Michoacana de San Nicolás, de manera tal que haya una profunda democratización en ella y se fortalezca el Consejo Universitario, máximo órgano de deliberación de la máxima casa de estudios en la entidad. Asimismo, el mandatario anunció que presentará ante el Congreso del Estado, una propuesta de presupuesto pleno, con el cual se busca garantizar la viabilidad financiera de la Universidad Michoacana y fortalezca sus áreas operativas y académicas. Luego de inaugurar el campus de la Universidad Michoacana en este municipio, el mandatario subrayó que se viene trabajando en el terreno constitucional para hacer las reformas en el Congreso local, a fin de que quede un presupuesto establecido en el presupuesto estatal, que permita atender y ampliar sus capacidades, y la mantenga con su nivel de excelencia. El mandatario apuntó que el Consejo Universitario también debe ser un órgano fuerte, representativo de todas las escuelas, facultades y áreas de la Universidad Michoacana de San Nicolás de Hidalgo.

title: 'I'm not discriminating': Dutton defends Gazan ban
creator: Tess Ikonomou
content: Peter Dutton has doubled down on his call to ban Palestinians fleeing to Australia from Gaza, declaring he's not discriminating. or signup to continue reading The opposition leader on Wednesday made the captain's call, which is understood to have surprised his colleagues. "My job is to protect all Australians and it's exactly what I'm doing," he told Channel Nine on Thursday. "I'm not discriminating on any basis. Happy to see people brought in from the Middle East, if they've been properly checked." Muslim and Palestinian advocacy groups have labelled Mr Dutton's comments racist and another attempt to stir up fear and hatred. Mr Dutton rejected that he had heightened tensions in the community just days after ASIO director-general Mike Burgess called for public figures to be mindful of their rhetoric. When asked if he had discussed the position with his colleagues beforehand, Mr Dutton said "it's not an issue that goes to shadow cabinet". "I'm not talking about internal discussions," he said. "It's a discussion with the national security team and I've done that." Education Minister Jason Clare criticised the opposition leader's decision to make the comments at a ceremony welcoming home returning Olympians. title: 'I'm not discriminating': Dutton defends Gazan ban
creator: Tess Ikonomou
content: Opposition Leader Peter Dutton has defended calls to ban Palestinians fleeing Gaza being issued with visas, with the comments being labelled as racist. Login or signup to continue reading Mr Dutton made the comments on Wednesday without consulting coalition frontbench members as a captain's call, which is understood to have surprised opposition MPs. On Thursday, the opposition leader doubled down and tried to suspend debate in parliament, as he said his position was not discriminatory. "My job is to protect all Australians and it's exactly what I'm doing," he told the Nine Network on Thursday. "I'm not discriminating on any basis. Happy to see people brought in from the Middle East, if they've been properly checked." In parliament, Mr Dutton sought to discuss the visa situation. "This is not against people of a particular religious belief. This is not against people of a particular political persuasion. This is about keeping our country safe," he told parliament. "Imagine if the Howard government or the Morrison government had suggested that we would bring people in who are sympathisers to Saddam Hussein or to al-Qaeda or to ISIL or to ISIS." Mr Dutton rejected claims he had heightened tensions in the community just days after ASIO director-general Mike Burgess called for public figures to be mindful of their rhetoric. Independent MP Zali Steggall said the comments from the...

title: 5 Pengakuan Armor Toreador, 5 Kali Lebih KDRT ke Cut Intan Nabila, Blak-blakan Ortu Tahu
content: - Selebgram menjadi korban kekerasan dalam rumah tangga atau KDRT. Ia dipukul hingga dicekik oleh suaminya sendiri, . Hal itu terkuak lewat bukti video yang diunggah di Instagram pada Selasa, 13 Agustus 2024. Intan dianiaya secara membabi buta oleh Armor padahal belum genap sebulan melahirkan anak ketiga. Parahnya lagi, si anak ketiga yang masih bayi turut menjadi korban. Armor tak sengaja menendang buah hatinya saat menganiaya Intan. Kini Intan telah menjalani visum dan melaporkan perbuatan Armor ke polisi. Armor pun berhasil ditangkap polisi di kawasan Jakarta Selatan. Bapak 3 anak tersebut juga telah ditetapkan sebagai tersangka. Saat dihadirkan ke hadapan awak media, Armor membeberkan sejumlah pengakuan mengejutkan. Apa saja? Berikut ini 5 pengakuan terkait KDRT yang dilakukannya kepada : Armor mengaku bukan kali ini saja menganiaya Intan. Ia ternyata sudah lima kali lebih melakukan KDRT pada wanita yang dinikahinya sejak 2019 itu.

title: Getting your home ready for an EV or plug-in hybrid
content: You’ve done your research on electric vehicles and hybrids and are ready to make the shift, knowing that living more sustainably is key to keeping our planet healthy. If you’re a homeowner, there are just a few more steps you need to take before you bring your new ride home. Creating a seamless and efficient home-charging experience requires some careful planning. Here are a few tips to get it done right: Choose the right charging equipment There are generally two types of EV chargers for home use: Consider your driving habits and charging needs when selecting a charger. Investing in a Level 2 charger can enhance convenience and efficiency. Evaluate your electrical system Before installing a home charging station, assess your current electrical system to ensure it can handle the additional load. EVs require a significant amount of power to charge efficiently, especially if you opt for a Level 2 charger. A licensed electrician can evaluate your home’s electrical capacity and recommend any necessary upgrades, such as a dedicated circuit or increased amperage, to accommodate the charging equipment. Explore incentives and rebates Many governments and utility companies offer incentives and rebates to encourage EV adoption and support home charging infrastructure. These incentives can help offset the cost of purchasing and installing a charging station. You can research available...

title: تحرض على طقوس الجن.. أغنية تُشعل مواقع التواصل بالمغرب
creator: غيث
content: اشتعلت مواقع التواصل بالمغرب بعد انتشار فيديو لمجموعة نسائية موسيقية تؤدي أغنية “فوفو الذنبة” المقتبسة من الفن الكناوي الشهير. وتصدرت أغنية “فوفو الذنبة”، “الطوندونس” المغربي حيث عرفت انتشارا واسعا على منصتي “تيك توك”، “والفيسبوك”. وأظهرت عددا من مقاطع الفيديو التي غزت مواقع التواصل، تفاعل روادها مع الأغنية الكناوية، التي رفضها البعض لأنها تحرض على طقوس السحر والجن. وعبر عدد من المغاربة عن استيائهم من انتشار فيديوهات لمستخدمي مواقع التواصل يضعون شموعا على الطاولة ويستعملون طقوس الشعوذة والسحر، فيما سخر آخرون من ذلك، مطالبين بتفسير كلماتها. وكتب أحد النشطاء قائلا: “هل يمكن اعتبار اغنية فوفو الذنبة مقولة للتأمل والنقاش، فعلا الحماق فيه المال”، وقال اخر “أنصح كل من يستمع إليها بأن يخفض الصوت لأن الأغنية ليست هادئة لأنها تذكر اسم جني”.

title: СМИ сообщили о предъявлении обвинений в домашнем насилии экс-лидеру Аргентины
creator: Степанова Виктория Владиславовна
content: Бывшему президенту Аргентины Альберто Фернандесу предъявлены обвинения в домашнем насилии, было возбуждено уголовное дело. Об этом 14 августа сообщила газета La Nacion . «Федеральный прокурор Рамиро Гонсалес официально предъявил бывшему президенту Альберто Фернандесу обвинение в преступлениях, связанных с «нанесением тяжких телесных повреждений при двойном отягчающем обстоятельстве» и «угрозами применения силы», за побои, которые он предположительно нанес своей бывшей возлюбленной Фабиоле Яньес», — говорится в публикации. Прокурор распорядился взять показания у нескольких бывших должностных лиц, бывшего лечащего врача президента, а также у друга Яньес. Также он запросил записи с видеокамер из загородной президентской виллы Кинта-де-Оливос и всю информацию о лечении Яньес в различных медучреждениях и в президентском медицинском подразделении. Ранее, 6 августа, стало известно, что бывшая возлюбленная экс-президента Аргентины Фернандеса Фабиола Яньес обвинила его в насилии . Женщина отметила, что экс-лидер страны, с которым она в прошлом состояла в отношениях, применял физическое и психологическое насилие. Судья назначил Фернандесу запрет на приближение к Яньес на расстояние меньше 500 м. Также экс-президент не должен покидать страну. Фернандес занимал пост главы государства в 2019–2023 годах. Хоть он и Яньес не состояли в официальном браке, фактически она воспринималась...

title: 中國國安部稱破獲千起台諜案 學者沈明室:非常可笑
content: 中國國安部在微信公眾號發文宣稱,面對台獨分裂勢力囂張氣焰,已連續破獲千餘起台灣間諜竊密案件,打掉一大批在「祖國大陸」佈建的間諜情報網絡。對此國安學者沈明室認為,非常可笑。 (美聯社資料照) 〔記者陳鈺馥/台北報導〕中國國安部13日在微信公眾號發文宣稱,面對台獨分裂勢力囂張氣焰,已連續破獲千餘起台灣間諜竊密案件,打掉一大批在「祖國大陸」佈建的間諜情報網絡。國安學者沈明室分析,無從證明是否真的抓到那麼多台諜,研判是爭績效想獲得最高層關愛的眼神,中國國安部把楊智淵列為「台獨頭目」,非常可笑。 中國大陸國安部聲稱,國家安全機關持續重拳出擊,以「反分裂、遏台獨、促統一」為主線,依法全面加強「懲獨遏獨」。對楊智淵等「台獨頭目」實施抓捕審查,創新以涉嫌分裂國家罪追究台獨份子刑事責任的執法司法實踐。 請繼續往下閱讀... 中國國安部更嗆言,凡是以身試法的台獨頑固份子,必將被採取刑事懲處措施,依法嚴懲不貸,終身追責。 值得注意的是,中國國安部今年1月在微信公眾號發文指稱,「近年國安機構破壞數百起台灣間諜竊密案件,打掉多個台灣情治部門針對中國佈建的間諜情報網」。僅半年時間,破獲台諜案已從數百起暴增到千餘起,但中共並未公布細節。 對此,國防院國家安全研究所所長沈明室接受本報訪問表示,中國國安部破獲台諜案件是數百起或千餘起,不是那麼重要。因為無法證實是否真的有抓到台諜,況且「反台獨」不是中國國安部業務,刻意提這些應該是有一些目的。 沈明室指出,中國國安部這次在凸顯它對反間諜、防止竊取機密、反台獨很有成效,中國國安部官員可能希望獲得最高層關愛的眼神,以利獲得更高升遷。 沈明室分析,過去有一段時間,中國國安部經常將不是屬於它的業務攬過來做,例如在網站上批判美國及相關國家,代表國安部可能覺得外交部或其他部會太過軟弱,或為求表現,想獲得上面青睞,「你不敢罵的,就由我來罵!」 沈明室談及,國台辦上次與三部二院聯合發布「懲治台獨22條」,負責兩岸交流的國台辦,對台都表現出強硬態度。中共幾個單位互相競爭,國安部就跳出來力求表現,但國安部公布的資訊非常奇怪,因為抓間諜和「反台獨」其實一點關係都沒有,卻將兩者掛勾在一起,凸顯國安部是想讓外界知道它工作績效很好。 關於楊智淵被指控是「台獨頭目」涉犯分裂國家罪。沈明室質疑,國台辦官網「懲獨」欄目列出10名台獨頑固份子,名單內都沒有楊智淵,楊怎會是「台獨頭目」?這項指控非常好笑,也無法成立。何況將人列入台獨份子,根本不是國安部的工作,國安部是反情報、反滲透及反間諜,爭著「反台獨」相當可笑。 陸委會此前表示,中共有關部門所謂「千餘起台灣間諜竊密案件」,如果不是為了誇大業績,吹牛膨風;就是再次公開宣示,中共國安部門運用模糊與不明確的法律,濫權羈押,把不符中共政治意識形態,主張民主自由的台灣人民,都當成「台獨分裂勢力」或「間諜」。 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: Judge tells Google to brace for shakeup of Android app store as punishment for running a monopoly
creator: News Staff
content: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — A federal judge on Wednesday indicated he will order major changes in Google’s Android app store to punish the company for engineering a system that a jury declared an illegal monopoly that has hurt millions of consumers and app developers. Over the course of a three-hour hearing in San Francisco, U.S. District Judge James Donato made it clear that the forthcoming shake-up he is contemplating will probably include a mandate requiring Google’s Play Store for Android phones offer consumers a choice to download alternative app stores Donato has been weighing how to punish the Google since last December when following a four-week trial. The verdict centered on Google’s nearly exclusive control over distribution of apps designed for Android phones and the billing systems for the digital commerce occurring within them — a system that generates billions of dollars in annual revenue for the company. In protesting the judge’s potential requirements, Google has raised the specter of consumers’ devices being infected by malicious software downloaded from third-party app stores, triggering “security chaos.” But Donato repeatedly hammered on the need for a major overhaul of the Play Store, even if it causes Google headaches and huge bills that the company has estimated could run as high as $600 million, depending on what the judge orders. “We are going to tear the...

Over the course of a three-hour hearing in San Francisco, U.S. District Judge James Donato made it clear that the forthcoming shake-up he is contemplating will probably include a mandate requiring Google's Play Store for Android phones offer consumers a choice to download alternative app stores Donato has been weighing how to punish the Google since last December when following a four-week trial. The verdict centered on Google's nearly exclusive control over distribution of apps designed for Android phones and the billing systems for the digital commerce occurring within them — a system that generates billions of dollars in annual revenue for the company. In protesting the judge's potential requirements, Google has raised the specter of consumers' devices being infected by malicious software downloaded from third-party app stores, triggering “security chaos.” But Donato repeatedly hammered on the need for a major overhaul of the Play Store, even if it causes Google headaches and huge bills that the company has estimated could run as high as $600 million, depending on what the judge orders. “We are going to tear the...

title: 3 drown during idol immersion in Gandhinagar
content: Ahmedabad: Three persons, including a minor girl , drowned in the Sabarmati in Gandhinagar, during the immersion of an idol of Goddess Dashama on Wednesday morning. The incident occurred near Sector 30 when a group of devotees from Ahmedabad formed a procession to immerse the idol. A 12-year-old girl, Poonam Prajapati, lost her balance and fell into the river. People jumped to save her, but they too drowned. The other victims were identified as Ajay Vanzara and Bharati Prajapati. tnn We also published the following articles recently Girl drowns in Vembanad Lake, body recovered 12 hours later A 16-year-old girl named Fidah, from Nilambur, Malappuram, drowned in Vembanad Lake on Friday morning while disposing of waste. After a nearly 12-hour search operation, her body was discovered in a fishing net by fire and rescue services. Fidah's family had recently moved to Nettoor, where her father has a fish shop. Three sisters drown in rainwater-filled pit in Madhya Pradesh In Rewa district, three young sisters aged between 6 and 9 years drowned in a shallow backyard water pit while trying to immerse an idol they had made for Nag Panchami. The tragic incident occurred on Friday when Sonali, Tanvi, and Jahnvi went without informing their parents, who would have otherwise prevented them, according to the village sarpanch. Two youths feared drowned while recording video Two adolescents...

SAN DIEGO (AP) — Martín Pérez beat his old team in his first victory since San Diego acquired him at the trade deadline, and the Padres defeated the Pittsburgh Pirates 8-2 on Wednesday for their 19th win in 22 games. Jake Cronenworth and David Peralta homered for the Padres, who swept six games from the Pirates this season. San Diego (69-53) improved to a season-high 16 games over .500, sweeping the three-game series and winning eight series in a row for the first time since 2007. Pittsburgh has lost 10 consecutive games for the first time since June 13-22 last year. The Pirates are 1-12 since July 31, the day after the trade deadline. title: При столкновении истребителей Rafale во Франции погибли два пилота
content: В результате столкновения двух истребителей Rafale на северо-востоке Франции 14 августа погибли два пилота, сообщил президент Эмманюэль Макрон. Они потерпели крушение над департаментом Мёрт и Мозель во время учебного полета. «С глубокой скорбью мы узнали о гибели капитана Себастьена Мабира и лейтенанта Матиса Лоранса в результате авиакатастрофы во время учебного полета на самолете Rafale»,— написал господин Макрон в соцсети X. На борту истребителей находились три человека. Как сообщали СМИ, при столкновении один из пилотов катапультировался, его доставили в больницу с травмами. Находившихся в другом истребителе инструктора и его ученика искали несколько часов. Истребители в рамках учебной миссии вылетали в Германию для отработки заправки в воздухе и столкнулись, возвращаясь во Францию. Причины произошедшего уточняются. На борту истребителей находились только французские граждане. Лусине Баласян

title: 인천항만공사, 여객터미널 근로자 '건강한 여름나기' 지원
creator: 김동영 기자
content: [인천=뉴시스] 김동영 기자 = 인천항만공사(IPA)는 인천항 국제여객터미널 및 부두 현장 근로자의 건강한 여름나기를 돕기 위해 지원 물품을 전달하고, 현장 안전점검을 실시했다고 15일 밝혔다. 이번 물품 지원은 올여름 폭염이 기승을 부리는 가운데 온열 질환을 예방하기 위해 마련됐다. IPA는 인천항 국제여객터미널을 이용하는 한·중 카페리 선박 승조원 및 국제여객부두 작업자 등 현장 근로자에게 아이스크림 550개를 전달했다. 이와 함께 IPA는 인천항 국제여객터미널 현장을 찾아 근로자에게 규칙적인 물 섭취 등 온열 질환 예방을 위한 가이드를 안내하고 온열 질환에 노출되지 않도록 안전작업을 당부했다. 앞서 IPA는 지난달 1일부터 연안여객터미널에서 ‘그늘막’, ‘여름쉼터’ 운영을 통해 안전한 여름나기 캠페인을 실시하고, 근로자에게 열사병 예방 물품을 지급하는 등 인천항 연안여객터미널 현장 근로자의 온열 질환 예방관리에도 힘쓰고 있다. 김상기 IPA 운영부문 부사장은 “이번 지원은 무더위 속에서도 인천항의 물류와 해양관광 발전을 위해 힘쓰는 근로자들을 위해 준비한 것”이라며, “인천항 여객터미널 현장 근로자들이 건강한 여름을 나는 데 조금이나마 도움이 되길 바란다”고 말했다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Tyler O’Neill back in the Red Sox clubhouse after ‘pretty scary’ leg infection that required hospital stays
creator: Alex Speier
content: Tyler O’Neill , who returned to the Red Sox clubhouse on Wednesday for the first time in more than a week, disclosed that his left leg infection proved so severe that he required two hospital stays. “I’m doing a lot better. Pretty scary there for a couple days,” said O’Neill. “Pretty crazy week to 10 days for me.” O’Neill last played on Aug. 2 against the Rangers but missed the rest of that series with what the Sox described as an illness. He traveled to Kansas City for a series that started Aug. 5, but woke up with so much swelling in his leg that he required hospitalization for two days. “I just woke up, my leg was blown up and totally unexpected, no idea how it happened,” said O’Neill. “Had to get on antibiotics right away, get on a drip for a little bit, and just thankful for everyone that was involved to help me get back on the right foot.” O’Neill traveled back to Boston with the team on Aug. 7. But two days later, the infection recurred in a fashion that convinced team doctors to have O’Neill admitted on Saturday to Massachusetts General Hospital, where he stayed until Tuesday. Advertisement O’Neill said he’d received conflicting opinions about whether the infection was related to his prior illness. He also declined to detail the nature of the infection. Instead, the 29-year-old expressed relief to be out of the hospital and with the team. “Been a lot better being back...

title: Entra en vigor reforma que endurece penas por uso de drones con fines criminales
content: El gobierno del estado de Guerrero reconoció a los legisladores federales la aprobación de la Ley para sancionar hasta con 40 años de prisión a quienes utilicen drones para cometer delitos, con lo que se fortalece el trabajo en materia de seguridad pública y las acciones emprendidas para inhibir los delitos en la ruta de la pacificación del estado. El pasado 8 de junio entró en vigor un decreto que reforma el Código Penal Federal y la Ley Federal de Armas de Fuego y Explosivos, el cual establece penas severas de hasta 40 años de prisión para quienes utilicen estos dispositivos para cometer delitos. La reforma, publicada en el Diario Oficial de la Federación (DOF), impone castigos de hasta 20 años de prisión a quienes, mediante el uso de drones, lancen objetos o artefactos explosivos, artefactos explosivos improvisados o armas sobre personas o bienes. El Artículo 163 Bis. Puntualiza que, “Se impondrá pena de prisión de diez a veinte años, sin perjuicio de las penas que correspondan por otros delitos que resulten, a quien mediante el uso de aeronaves pilotadas a distancia realice las conductas siguientes: Arroje cualquier objeto o artefacto explosivo, artefactos explosivos improvisados o armas, así como sustancias químicas que por sí solas o combinadas sean susceptibles de ser empleadas como explosivos sobre otras personas o bienes, e impacte a alguna persona...

title: 4 Weton Enteng Jodoh Menurut Primbon Jawa, Senin Pahing Sosok Idaman Banget & Sabtu Legi Berkarisma
content: Dalam , empat ini diyakini memiliki anugerah berupa enteng . Mereka yang lahir di tanggal berikikut ini pada umumnya tidak begitu sulit untuk mencari tambatan hati. Karismanya yang kuat membuatnya menjadi sosok yang mudah mencuri perhatian lawan jenis. Bahkan lawan jenis mudah jatuh cinta terhadap keempat berikut ini. Kehadiran dari empat ini seolah memiliki daya magnetis untuk mencuri perhatian banyak orang. Berikut empat weton yang diyakini enteng jodoh menurut Primbon Jawa yang dilansir TribunNewsmaker.com dari YouTube Tafsir Mimpi 21 pada Rabu, (9/8/2024): Mereka yang terlahir pada Sabtu Legi biasanya memiliki aura yang cukup memikat. Menurut , Sabtu Legi telah dianugerahi aura positif dalam hidupnya. Sejak lahir, Sabtu Legi memiliki aura yang teduh dalam dirinya. Aura mereka yang menenangkan sering kali membuat orang-orang merasa nyaman dan tenteram untuk berada di dekat mereka. Banyak lawan jenis yang jatuh hati dengan weton ini karena aura yang teduh dan menenangkan yang dimilikinya. Mereka yang memiliki Senin Pahing memiliki pesona yang mampu membuat lawan jenis terpikat.

title: Signorini cruzó a Adorni por ignorar a Maradona
creator: Página/12
content: El histórico preparador físico de Diego Maradona Fernando Signorini salió al cruce de Manuel Adorni, luego de que el vocero presidencial " ninguneara" al Diez en su habitual conferencia de prensa. "Uno está ya curado de tanto espanto ante tanta estupidez y vulgaridad" , afirmó Signorini en diálogo con la 750 . "Lo que me provoca es un impulso de desesperanza", agregó el preparador físico, al hacer hincapié en que " con gente tan ignorante" no se puede construir "una sociedad más digna" . "Cada vez se hace más complicado la posibilidad de un país mejor", insistió. Consultado acerca de qué cree que le molesta al Gobierno de Diego Maradona, Signorini recordó la "irreverencia y rebeldia" del Diez. "(Les molesta) El hecho de que no lo podían dominar . Estaba muy lejos de esto de la dialéctica del amo y el esclavo. Él jamás iba a ser esclavo como lo son ellos", remarcó. En esa línea, el preparador físico aseguró sentir "asco" con los "sumisos y alcahuetes del poder" . "Me dan asco, porque, además, pobre gente que se tienen que prestar a lo que se prestan por sus patrones, que los necesitan pero a la vez los desprecian", sostuvo. Por último, fue categórico con la actitud de Adorni: " A él mucha gente lo va a olvidar desde la casa velatoria al cementerio . Hay muchos que ni siquiera se van a dar cuenta y no les va a importar tampoco, porque pasan sin dejar...

title: 做“电商”当“行商” 企业出海办法多(子夜走笔)
content: 跨境电商市场,行情不断变化,“小单快反”成主流,企业迅速调整生产策略;外贸团队在海外争取到订单,工厂即刻组织生产......触网做“电商”,出海当“行商”,线上线下处处是外贸企业开拓市场的身影。 前7月,民营企业进出口实现两位数增长,比去年同期提升2.3个百分点。成绩背后,付出了哪些努力? 内外兼修,练好基本功。企业一方面加大研发投入、实施智能化改造,不断提高生产效率、推出更优产品;另一方面主动出击,以面对面的真诚拜访,与客户建立牢固的合作关系,有的经营者一年飞行超20万公里,赴10多个国家跑来近百家订单。 但要看到,外贸企业多为中小企业,独自出海风险大,政府部门、行业协会等要发挥好纽带作用。福建晋江组织上下游企业组团出海,免除参展费用;浙江义乌实施“品牌出海”行动,招引全球采购商超100万人次,组团出海成效显著。 我国稳外贸政策接连推出,政策协同效应不断增强,信息咨询、法律查明等服务完善,多方面共同努力,有力支撑着外贸企业稳订单、拓市场。即便国际贸易环境复杂多变,相信我国外贸企业定能继续不畏艰难、奋力前行。 吕 莉 《 人民日报 》( 2024年08月15日 第 02 版)

title: 发展乡村游,如何因地制宜
content: 立足特色资源,统筹保护与开发—— 发展乡村游,如何因地制宜(深阅读·文旅新观察) 习近平总书记强调,“发展乡村旅游不要搞大拆大建,要因地制宜、因势利导”。 自然风光和农耕文化是乡村旅游的富矿。近年来,重庆荆竹村立足特色地貌,江西篁岭村依托独特风俗,在科学保护与开发中推出多种旅游产品,有力促进了乡村旅游的兴旺繁荣。 近年来,我国乡村旅游蓬勃发展,但也存在粗放式开发、创意不足等现象。发展乡村游,如何因地制宜?记者走进联合国世界旅游组织评选出的“最佳旅游乡村”重庆荆竹村和江西篁岭村,看乡村如何立足特色资源、促进文旅发展。 劣势变优势—— 喀斯特地貌成为独特旅游风貌 重庆市武隆区仙女山街道荆竹村所处地带,是典型的喀斯特地貌,以传统农业视角评价,这里地块破碎、土壤贫瘠。这样的乡村,发展从何处破局? 荆竹村的答案是:变劣势为优势,打造特色旅游产业。 仙女山街道办事处主任李鹏程介绍,荆竹村位于武陵山片区,有许多喀斯特溶洞。经由专业团队评估策划,荆竹村从中选出了一些适宜开发的溶洞,来开发旅游。 一个占地面积5000多平方米的天然溶洞,被打造成了溶洞餐厅。“现在洞外温度近40摄氏度,洞内温度只有不到20摄氏度。”李鹏程介绍,溶洞天然清凉,还有千姿百态的钟乳石景观,吸引了许多游客。 名叫“老虎堡”的溶洞内落差较大,当地就开发了探险项目,逐渐成为研学旅游的热门选择。游客可以穿戴专业装备,从高达80米的洞顶垂直下降至洞底,体验一把探险的乐趣。 想要留住游客,旅游体验既要独特,也要丰富。在荆竹村寻梦园花果种植基地,蓝莓缀满枝头,游客们一边采摘、一边品尝。在专家指导下,本地果农用上了农家肥,对病虫害采取物理防治。“水果的口感和品质大幅提升,采摘水果成为许多游客来村度假的必选项目。”荆竹村党支部书记谌菊说。 荆竹村还引进民宿设计师、艺术家等,把果园建成景区,把烤烟房改成图书馆,把土瓦房变成茶馆...... 在精心设计与经营下,昔日荒凉的小山村,成为充满田园意趣的度假区。2023年,荆竹村接待游客55万人次。 风俗即风景—— 晒秋晒成标志性文旅品牌 高山梯田、徽派建筑,在我国南方,类似的风光并不少见。但江西省婺源县篁岭村在其中尤为突出,闻名遐迩。篁岭村的经验就是:风俗即风景,围绕农俗活动开发旅游项目。 2009年,当地引入婺源篁岭文旅股份有限公司,对篁岭村进行统一规划建设。“开发之初,我们就在思考,如何把篁岭村的特色风俗融入乡村旅游。游客不仅有美丽的乡景可看,还有独具特色的乡韵、乡俗、乡味可感。”婺源篁岭文旅股份有限公司董事长吴向阳说。 篁岭村依山而建,缺少平坦的晒场。数百年来,人们在屋檐下、平台上晾晒农产品,形成了独特的晒秋景观。晒秋并不限于秋天,“秋”在这里指收获的农产品。在篁岭村,只要出太阳,一年四季都有应季的农产品可晒——春晒竹笋,夏晒茄子,秋晒辣椒与玉米,冬晒红薯。 “我们第一次看到晒秋景象就非常震撼。百米落差的山坡上,民居白墙黛瓦、错落排布,窗外的晒架托举着圆圆的竹制大晒匾,晒匾里有红彤彤的辣椒、黄澄澄的玉米,远望就像一幅清淡山水画,却有着缤纷点缀,很独特。”吴向阳说。他们决定把晒秋作为篁岭旅游的关键元素。...

title: Hamas, Gazze'de ateşkes görüşmelerine ‘katılmayacak’
content: Kaynak, Getty Images Üst düzey bir Hamas yetkilisi BBC'ye, Perşembe günü Doha'da yeniden başlaması planlanan, Gazze’de ateşkes sağlanması ve rehinelerin serbest bırakılması amaçlı görüşmelere katılmayacaklarını söyledi. Filistinli silahlı grubun halihazırda üzerinde anlaşılan teklifin uygulanması için bir yol haritası talep ettiğini söyleyen yetkili, "İsrail'in sırf savaşı sürdürebilmek için düzenlemiş olmak adına düzenlediği müzakerelere katılmayacağız” dedi. Yol haritasının, ABD Başkanı Joe Biden’ın Mayıs sonunda önerdiği anlaşma maddelerine dayanması gerektiğini kaydetti ve İsrail'i "yeni koşullar" eklemekle suçladı. İsrail Başbakanı Binyamin Netanyahu bu iddiayı reddiyor ve değişiklik talep edenin Hamas olduğunu savunuyor. Bu makalede Google YouTube içeriği bulunmaktadır. Çerez ve diğer teknolojileri kullanıyor olabilirler, bilgisayarınıza herhangi bir şey yüklenmeden önce sizin rızanızı alırız. İzin vermeden önce çerez politikasını okumak ve gizlilik politikasına göz atmak isteyebilirsiniz. Bu içeriğe ulaşmak için lütfen "kabul et ve devam et" seçeneğine tıklayın. YouTube paylaşımının sonu, 1 İçerik bulunamadı Görüşmelerin Hamas olmadan da gerçekleşmesi bekleniyor, zira arabulucu ülkeler - ABD, Mısır ve Katar - kalan sorunları çözecek bir plan oluşturmak için bir araya gelebileceklerini söylüyor....

title: 夜市管理如何更规范
content: 夜市不仅是当地居民和游客休闲娱乐的好去处,更是城市经济活力的体现,对创新消费场景、释放消费潜力有着积极作用。近年来,我国日益重视夜间经济的发展,特别是夜间文旅消费,已出台多项政策扶持,国家级夜间文旅消费集聚区数量快速增长,夜间经济的发展正步入快车道。 传统夜市多以灯光夜市、小吃摊点为主,业态相对单一。随着消费升级和市场需求的变化,现代夜市逐渐转型升级,发展为食、游、购、娱、体、展、演等多元化、综合性的夜间消费市场,很多城市都培育了具有代表性的网红夜市,成为城市夜间经济地标。 夜市摊位的品类搭配宜丰富多样,满足不同消费者的需求。夜市经济生态的构建也至关重要,经营者之间应形成互补关系而非简单竞争,共同营造繁荣的夜间市场氛围。夜市里不同业态的培育也应该更加注重创新和特色,通过挖掘地方特色、结合历史文化、自然资源等元素,开发具有地域风情的夜间消费项目。主题式消费、交互式消费等新兴业态也逐渐成为发展的趋势,应通过加强数字技术在夜市当中的应用,比如通过VR(虚拟现实)、AR(增强现实)等技术,增强消费者的参与感和沉浸感。 违规占道、噪声扰民等问题是夜市管理中常见的难题。有些地方通过创新举措,设置集装箱摊位,有效解决占道经营问题,有些地方开通噪声自动监测系统,营造良好环境。此外,很多消费者在选择夜市摊位的时候并没有太多可供参考的评价数据,无论是本地消费者还是游客,消费质量只能靠运气,可以建立点评机制或红黑榜制度,提升消费质量。 夜市的发展,既要保持“烟火气”,也必须注重规范管理。通过丰富业态、构建良好生态,不断创新探索,让夜市成为城市经济的新增长点,也成为文化展示的新窗口。 (作者为云南大学工商管理与旅游管理学院教授,本报记者李茂颖整理) 杨 懿 《 人民日报 》( 2024年08月15日 第 07 版)

title: 工业和信息化部修订规范条件 针对废旧动力电池综合利用公开征求意见
content: 工业和信息化部修订规范条件 针对废旧动力电池综合利用公开征求意见 本报北京8月14日电 (记者刘温馨)为加强新能源汽车废旧动力电池综合利用行业管理,提高废旧动力电池综合利用水平,工业和信息化部近日修订形成《新能源汽车废旧动力电池综合利用行业规范条件(2024年本)》,并向社会公开征求意见。 规范条件从企业布局与项目选址、综合利用能力、产品质量、环境保护、安全生产和人身健康等方面对开展新能源汽车废旧动力电池梯次利用或再生利用业务的企业提出要求。其中综合能力部分提出,企业厂区条件、设施设备、技术工艺、溯源能力、资源利用、能源消耗等应满足相关要求,如梯次利用企业应核实废旧动力电池来源,确保用于梯次利用的废旧动力电池来自新能源汽车退役动力电池;开展新能源汽车动力电池综合利用的企业应按照新能源汽车动力电池溯源管理有关要求建立溯源系统,具备信息化溯源能力并开展溯源工作,将溯源信息及时准确地上传至新能源汽车国家监测与动力蓄电池回收利用溯源综合管理平台。 针对企业布局与项目选址,规范条件提出企业布局应当与本企业废旧动力电池处理规模相适应;新建综合利用企业应按要求进入开发区、工业园区等产业园区,建设用地应为工业用地,已经建成投用和在建的综合利用企业不符合上述要求的,应在两年内搬迁。 《 人民日报 》( 2024年08月15日 第 15 版)

title: Kotak Kosong Bisa Saja Terjadi, KPU Kalsel Ingatkan Pemilih Harus Tetap ke TPS
ביידן והאריס תודרכו על ההתפתחויות במזרח התיכון
医保支付改革,要“分组”更要协同(人民时评)
content: 前不久,国家医保局发布按病组(DRG)和病种分值(DIP)付费2.0版分组方案。这一被称为“医保改革升级版”的新方案,为医保高质量发展写下生动注脚。 我国传统的医保支付方式是按项目付费,诊疗过程中用到的药品、医疗服务项目、医用耗材,用多少结算多少,患者和医保基金根据实际费用分别承担各自需要支付的部分。随着时间推移,传统支付方式的弊端日渐显现:容易滋生“大处方”“大检查”等过度医疗行为,造成医疗资源的浪费,导致参保人多花钱、医保基金多支出。 国家医保局成立以后,推行以按病种付费为主的多元复合式医保支付方式,先后启动DRG和DIP支付方式国家试点,并在此基础上开展“DRG/DIP支付方式改革三年行动”。所谓DRG付费,即按疾病诊断相关分组付费,就是按照疾病诊断、病情严重程度、治疗方法等因素,把患者分入临床病症与资源消耗相似的诊断相关组。在此基础上,医保按照相应的付费标准进行支付。所谓DIP付费,即按病种分值付费,在总额预算机制下,根据年度医保支付总额、医保支付比例及各医疗机构病例的总分值计算点值,形成支付标准,对医疗机构每一病例实现标准化支付。截至2023年底,全国超九成统筹地区已开展这一改革。通过改革,医保基金为医疗结果买单,支付结算更加科学合理,在减轻群众负担、保障基金高效使用、规范医疗机构行为等方面取得了积极效果。 随着支付方式改革的深入,部分地方医保部门和医疗机构、医务人员反映现行分组存在不够精准、不够贴近临床等问题,希望对分组进行动态调整。此次发布的新方案,依据几千万条病例数据、通过几十场临床论证、广泛征求并吸收意见建议,相较于1.0版、1.1版,DRG2.0版分组方案对临床意见比较集中的重症医学、血液免疫等13个学科,以及联合手术、复合手术问题进行了优化完善,同时升级分组方法、完善分组规则;DIP2.0版还补充了常见缺失病种,让分组更加精细,覆盖更加全面。这样的“升级版”与时俱进、更加科学,有效回应了各方关切,为深化医保支付改革奠定了坚实基础。 应当看到,医疗问题具有复杂性。推进医保支付改革,仅有专业的分组还不够。支付方式改革的初衷是倒逼医院进行提质控费增效,但一些医疗机构简单地将控成本的任务分解到医务工作者头上,导致临床医生“一手拿听诊器,一手拿计算器”,影响正常诊疗。同时,少数医疗机构对政策吃不透,为获得医保支付后更多结余,不愿上新技术、新设备,不愿接疑难患者。凡此种种,反映出宣教培训不够、对医疗机构赋能不足、政策协同欠缺,让改革效能打了折扣。 深化医保支付改革,必须增强问题意识,直面问题、破解难题。国家医保局办公室在推出新分组的同时,要求深入推进相关工作,加强改革协同。具体措施包括:用特例单议机制,解决因住院时间长、医疗费用高、新药耗新技术使用、复杂危重症或多学科联合诊疗等病例不适合按DRG/DIP标准支付的问题;以培训促进相关参与方了解DRG/DIP支付方式改革,共同为完善改革出力;赋能医疗机构,提升结算清算水平,鼓励各地根据基金结余情况预付1个月左右的预付金,减轻医疗机构资金压力;等等。同时明确提出,医疗机构不得将DRG/DIP病组(病种)支付标准作为限额对医务人员进行考核,或与绩效分配指标挂钩;强调注重来自临床一线的意见,强化支付方式意见的收集反馈。落细落实各项举措,才能确保改革顺利推进,实现预期目标。...

title: 新藤経済再生相が靖国神社に参拝
content: 「終戦の日」の15日、新藤経済再生担当大臣が東京・九段の靖国神社に参拝しました。 新藤経済再生担当大臣は午前8時すぎ、靖国神社を訪れ、本殿に昇殿して参拝しました。 新藤大臣は参拝を終えたあと記者団に対し、「かつて国のために精魂込めて働いた方々に尊崇の念を込めてお参りをさせて頂いた」と述べました。 新藤大臣は去年9月の就任以降、秋の例大祭とことしの元日、それに春の例大祭にも靖国神社に参拝しています。 また、総務大臣だった平成25年と26年にも「終戦の日」や春と秋の例大祭に参拝しています。 また、木原防衛大臣が午前8時半ごろ参拝しました。

title: Fiscalía de Sinaloa investiga desaparición de presuntos escoltas de ‘El Mayo’
creator: Forbes Staff
content: La fiscalía de Sinaloa investiga la desaparición de dos escoltas de Ismael “El Mayo” Zambada, que no han sido localizados desde el día que el narcotraficante fue detenido en Estados Unidos junto con el hijo de Joaquín “El Chapo” Guzmán. José Heras, comandante de la policía estatal y Rodolfo Chaidez, un exagente de investigación, fueron reportados por sus familiares como desaparecidos, informó la fiscal estatal Sara Quiñonez. “Se presentó una denuncia por la desaparición (...) la última fue ayer”, explicó Quiñonez a periodistas. Sobre Heras, detalló, autoridades también abrieron un proceso legal en su contra y “en el caso de que él aparezca con vida” será detenido. “Actualmente está suspendido”, añadió. La funcionaria comentó que el agente estaba de vacaciones desde el 15 de julio y que sus familiares reportaron que el día de la desaparición iba a visitar a un pariente. Una fuente de la fiscalía confirmó a Reuters que Chaidez fue por varios años miembro activo de las fuerzas de seguridad, en el área de investigación, aunque no dio más detalles. Lee: ‘El Mayo’ reaviva la sombra del presunto nexo de autoridades con el narco: analistas El Gobierno de México afirma que desconoce las condiciones en que autoridades estadounidenses lograron la detención de Zambada el 25 de julio, junto con Joaquín Guzmán López, hijo del también fundador del Cártel...

title: TOUGH CONTEST
creator: Moffat Mamu
content: The Subway Joeys Under 17 of Australia are prepared ahead of their opening match of the PacificAus Sports Football Tour this evening. The boys had their training runs since their arrival on Sunday night at one of the newly built sports ground near KGVI School, opposite the SIFF Academy. Supported by the Australian Government through PacificAus Sports, the tour will see the Subway Joeys play two matches against Solomon Islands U-19 national team today and the second one on Sunday. Both matches will be played in the evening. From the Honiara, the youth side travels on to Port Vila for a one fixture against Vanuatu U-19s. Players and staff are expecting a tough match-up with humid conditions combined with the age of the opposition providing the Australian U-17 national team with a unique challenge that will act as preparation for the upcoming AFC U17 Asian Cup 2025TM Qualifiers, a statement issued by the visiting side said. Having recently won the ASEAN U-16 Championship, midfielder Alex Bolton said, this tour provides the perfect platform to build on that momentum. “This tournament is perfect timing, because coming off a win we want to get as many camps in as possible to build our bond stronger for tournaments such as the AFC U-17 Asian Cup and FIFA U-17 World Cup coming up next year,” said Bolton. “This tour is going to be better for us because in the previous tournament we’ve...

title: Ayuntamiento pide cuentas a Canaco por 4 mdp que les donó para evento empresarial
creator: Jorge López Landó
content: Fotografía: Archivo También llamará a cuentas a la Dirección de Promoción Económica, por no ejercer 5 mdp autorizados para madres emprendedoras jefas de familia con algún hijo con discapacidad Por Francisco Luján | 5:23 pm 14 agosto, 2024 El distanciamiento entre el Municipio y los representantes de la Cámara Nacional de Comercio (Canaco) en esta localidad, quienes este año cancelaron la Feria del Tequila por falta de apoyo del Ayuntamiento, subió de tono luego que en Cabildo autorizaron llamarlos a cuentas para que informen el destino de cuatro millones de pesos que les donaron para un evento nacional de empresarias. El acuerdo, autorizado por unanimidad de votos, fue promovido por el regidor Joob Quintín Flores Silva (PAN), coordinador de la Comisión de Desarrollo Económico del Ayuntamiento juarense. El edil recordó que se trató de un encuentro de negocios realizado en Cibeles que convocó a empresarias del país. En ese entonces este organismo del sector empresarial de la ciudad, estaba a cargo de Rogelio Ramos, cuya gestión fue siempre beneficiada por la administración que preside Cruz Pérez Cuéllar. Con el cambio de la mesa directiva este 2024, la representación de la Canaco quedó en manos de un grupo de empresarios distinto al que apoyó el alcalde y este año no pudieron celebrar el Festival del Tequila por falta de apoyos del Municipio. Aunque la...

title: அரசுக்கு கூடுதல் வருவாய் ஈட்டித்தந்த அலுவலர்களுக்கு ரூ.1 லட்சம்: அமைச்சர் மூர்த்தி வழங்கினார்
content: சென்னை: வணிகவரித் துறையில் வரி பகுத்தாய்வுப் பிரிவில் சிறப்பாக பணியாற்றி அரசுக்கு கூடுதல் வருவாய் ஈட்டித்தந்த 2 அலுவலர்களுக்கு தலா ரூ.1 லட்சம் ஊக்கத்தொகையை அமைச்சர் மூர்த்தி வழங்கினார். சென்னை நந்தனம் ஒருங்கிணைந்த வணிகவரி வளாகக் கூட்டரங்கில் 2024ம் ஆண்டு ஜுலை மாதத்திற்கான அனைத்து இணை ஆணையர்களின் பணித்திறன் குறித்த ஆய்வுக்கூட்டம் வணிகவரி மற்றும் பதிவுத்துறை அமைச்சர் மூர்த்தி தலைமையில் நேற்று நடைபெற்றது. கூட்டத்தின் போது வணிகவரித்துறை வரி பகுத்தாய்வுப் பிரிவில் சிறப்பாக பணியாற்றி அரசுக்கு கூடுதல் வருவாய் ஈட்டித்தந்த உதவி ஆணையர் ராம்குமார் மற்றும் மாநில வரி அலுவலர் முஹம்மது இர்பான், ஆகியோருக்கு ஊக்கத்தொகையாக ரூ.1,00,000 காசோலையை அமைச்சர் வழங்கினார். மேலும் அனைத்து இணை ஆணையர்களும் தங்கள் கோட்டங்களை சார்ந்த பகுதிகளில் அடிக்கடி ஆய்வு செய்து, போலி பில் தயாரித்து வணிகம் செய்யும் நிறுவனங்களை கண்டறிதல், ரூ.40 லட்சத்திற்கு மேல் தொழில் செய்வோர் விவரங்களை கண்டறிந்து ஜிஎஸ்டி வரம்பிற்குள் கொண்டுவருதல், தொடர்ந்து அரசுக்கு வருவாய் இழப்பு ஏற்படுத்தும் நிறுவனங்களின் பதிவை ரத்து செய்து உரிய சட்ட நடவடிக்கை எடுக்க பரிந்துரைத்தல் உள்ளிட்ட பணிகளை தொடர்ந்து மேற்கொள்ளுமாறு அறிவுறுத்தப்பட்டனர். இக்கூட்டத்தில் வணிகவரி மற்றும் பதிவுத்துறை அரசு செயலாளர் பிரஜேந்திர நவ்நீத், வணிகவரித்துறை ஆணையர் ஜகந்நாதன், இணை ஆணையர் (நிர்வாகம்) துர்காமூர்த்தி, வணிகவரித்துறை கூடுதல் ஆணையர்கள், இணை ஆணையர்கள் மற்றும் துறை உயர் அலுவலர்கள் கலந்துகொண்டனர்.

content: Jharsuguda : Jharsuguda’s additional district and sessions judge-cum-special judge (Pocso), Puja Sarangi, convicted a 22-year-old youth for raping a six-year-old girl and sentenced him to 20 years of rigorous imprisonment on Wednesday. title: Martin Perez, Padres crush slumping Pirates
creator: Field Level Media
content: Martin Perez picked up his first victory with San Diego, and it came against his former team this season, as the Padres routed the visiting Pittsburgh Pirates 8-2 on Wednesday to complete a three-game sweep. Jake Cronenworth and David Peralta homered for San Diego, which has won 19 of its last 22 games. Perez (3-5) lasted 5 1/3 innings, allowing five hits and a run with one walk and eight strikeouts. In three starts with San Diego, Perez has permitted just four runs in 18 1/3 innings. The left-hander was traded from Pittsburgh on July 30 for a minor-league prospect. Mitch Keller (10-7) was pounded for the second straight outing for Pittsburgh, which dropped its 10th consecutive game. Keller pitched five innings, permitting eight runs on eight hits while walking two and fanning two. The Padres did all their damage off Keller in the first three innings. Luis Arraez and Jurickson Profar led off the first with singles, followed by Cronenworth's 15th homer, a three-run blast that reached the front row of seats down the right-field line and traveled an estimated 348 feet. Arraez made it 4-0 in the second. After Tyler Wade singled with two outs, Arraez looped a liner to center that Michael A. Taylor dove for and missed. By the time left fielder Bryan Reynolds could retrieve the ball, Wade easily scored from first on the double. San Diego made it an 8-0 rout in the third. Walks to...

title: Más de 200 familias en León cuentan con nuevo servicio de agua potable
content: León, Gto.- Gerardo Fernández , diputado del Partido Verde en Guanajuato, dijo que hasta el momento han ayudado a que se reconecte el servicio de agua potable a más de 200 familias leonesas luego de tenerlo suspendido. El legislador aseguró que hasta el momento el Sistema de Agua Potable y Alcantarillado de León (Sapal) registra más de dos millones y medio de cortes ilegales y que en el municipio hay 200 mil familias que no cuentan con el servicio de agua potable. Local Tras lluvias, reviven presas de León, pero aún les falta agua “A pesar de que seguimos ganando todas las demandas que estamos haciendo, Sapal sigue aferrado en seguir violando este derecho fundamental, que es el derecho al agua en una ciudad, ya acumulan más o menos dos millones y medio de cortes ilegales que van en contra de lo que establece el reglamento, la ley, la constitución y en general los tratados internacionales” , dijo. El político recordó que este programa arrancó en las campañas donde ayudaron a más de 100 personas y en la actualidad ya acumulan otras 100 que se han visto beneficiadas. A la baja costos en los precios de la canasta básica “Hemos ayudado a más de 200 familias a que sean reconectadas, entonces todas las demandas han sido ganadas porque nos favorece la razón y la ley entonce vamos a seguir trabajando para garantizar que se dé cumplimiento al derecho humano y que se...

title: Incendios en la Amazonía brasileña superan récord en dos décadas
creator: Redacción 24 Horas
content: El Instituto Nacional de Investigaciones Espaciales (INPE), reportó que durante los ocho primeros meses de 2024, los incendios en la Amazonía de Brasil se duplicaron en comparación a los registrados en 2023, lo que marca un nuevo récord en casi dos décadas. De acuerdo con datos satelitales, entre el primero de enero y el 13 de agosto, se contabilizaron 37.835 incendios. Las cifras arrojan un aumento del 111 por ciento en comparación con el año anterior. Desde 1998 que el INPE empezó a recopilar estos datos, se destacó que la mayor selva tropical del mundo sufrió hechos similares en el mismo periodo en 2005, 2004 y 2003. Esta situación generó preocupación entre los habitantes de Manaos, capital del estado Amazonas. Ante la emergencia, el instituto de investigaciones, Fiocruz Amazonia señaló que la población debe utilizar mascarillas con filtro especial, especialmente aquellos con comorbilidades respiratorias. “Lo que más preocupa este año en relación con los anteriores es que no se sabe con certeza si lo que está sucediendo es una anticipación del período crítico o si, este año, tendremos un período más largo de exposición al humo tóxico, ya que el pico de contaminación en 2023 fue en octubre”, señaló el epidemiólogo Jesem Orellana. Además de sufrir los incendios, la región también enfrenta una sequía que podría ser más grave que la...

title: Perupetro convoca a inversionistas para operar Lote I y VI en Talara
content: 18:23 | Lima, ago. 14. Perupetro anunció hoy el proceso de convocatoria de inversionistas para los lotes I y VI, ubicados en la cuenca Talara (Piura), por un plazo de 30 años y, de esta manera, asegurar la continuidad de las operaciones petroleras en el Noroeste del país. Los lotes I y VI son operados actualmente por Petroperú mediante un Contrato de Licencia Temporal por un plazo de 24 meses o lo que ocurra primero (proceso de licitación). El Lote I tiene una producción promedio de 500 barriles diarios de petróleo (bdp), mientras que en el Lote VI la producción promedio asciende a 2,000 bdp. De acuerdo a las bases del proceso, el ganador de la buena pro será aquella empresa que ofrezca el mejor Programa de Trabajo sobre el mínimo establecido por Perupetro, es decir los mayores compromisos de inversión para la perforación de pozos de desarrollo y de exploración. En el caso del Lote I, Perupetro ha establecido un programa mínimo de 64 reacondicionamiento de pozos, 32 pozos de desarrollo y un pozo exploratorio y, para el Lote VI, 33 reacondicionamiento de pozos, 71 pozos de desarrollo y un pozo exploratorio. Además, las bases consideran un mayor peso a las ofertas cuando la inversión se realice en los primeros años del Contrato de Licencia. Perupetro indicó que se trata de un proceso público y transparente, en el que las empresas interesadas podrán presentar...

title: Rob Schneider's Response to Daughter Elle King's Comments About His Parenting
content: Rob Schneider has officially reached out to his daughter, Elle King, in an attempt to mend their strained relationship. The 60-year-old actor publicly apologized to the singer after she opened up about the challenges and toxicity while she was growing up on a recent podcast episode that was released on Monday, August 12. A few days later on August 14 during an appearance on the , for not being the father King needed when she was younger. When asked by Carlson what his daughter's comment was about, he responded by saying, "I love you and I wish I was the father in my 20s that you needed." He also added that he hopes she can forgive him for his shortcomings. The actor ended his apology by saying, "I love you entirely and I just want you to be well and happy... I wish you the best. I feel terrible and I just want you to know that I don't take anything you say personally." Schneider's apology follows King's revelations about her difficult childhood, which included being sent to "fat camp" by her father. In on Bunnie Xo's podcast, the "Jersey Giant" songstress described how being sent to the camp was a formative, albeit negative, experience. "I was, like, a really, really heavy child. My dad sent me to fat camp," she recalled, saying how "It was very toxic and very silly," and that she was punished for not losing weight. Their rift deepened over the years due to their contrasting...

title: Diamondbacks use Eugenio Suarez slam to sweep Rockies
creator: Field Level Media
content: Eugenio Suarez hit a grand slam, Jordan Montgomery logged a quality start and the Arizona Diamondbacks beat the Colorado Rockies 11-4 on Wednesday in Phoenix to complete a three-game sweep. Suarez also doubled twice and drove in five runs as Arizona won its season-best sixth straight game and improved to 18-3 since July 23. Lourdes Gurriel Jr. tallied two hits with two runs scored and Joc Pederson had two RBIs for the Diamondbacks while scoring twice. Montgomery (8-6) notched a season-high eight strikeouts over six innings. The left-hander allowed three runs on five hits and three walks in his first quality start since June 21. Colorado rookie Tanner Gordon (0-4) lasted just two-thirds of an inning in his sixth career start. The right-hander was tagged for four runs (three earned) on three hits, two walks and one hit batter. He threw 44 pitches and watched the Rockies commit two errors behind him in the first inning. Michael Toglia had two hits and an RBI for last-place Colorado, which fell to 2-8 this season against its National League West rival. Arizona sent 10 batters to the plate in the first inning and needed just three hits to take a 4-0 lead. Corbin Carroll walked and Jake McCarthy singled to start the frame before both scored on Pederson's double down the first base line. Pederson also scored on the play after Toglia's wild throw from first to second base rolled to...

title: Sodepur neighbourhood steps out to seek justice
content: Kolkata: The Sodepur, Khardah and Panihati areas, including the doctor’s neighbourhood, were taken over by women at midnight on Wednesday as thousands stepped out on the streets with posters and banners. There was a big gathering barely 200 m from the doctor’s house. A crowd later took out a procession from Sodepur’s Traffic More on BT Road till the doctor’s house. “We never thought that women in such large numbers would attend the assembly at such short notice. We did not even campaign for it,” said Agnihotri Gupta, a postgraduate student. Gupta was a student of Sodepur Chandrachur Vidyapith from where the victim was a passout. “After a condolence meeting in front of our school on Aug 12 some of us decided to be a part of ‘Women reclaim the night’. We thought that we, the women from the victim’s neighbourhood, should stand as a mark of solidarity in Sodepur only,” said Gupta. Aditi Das from Sadhur More came with her husband Sanjay to attend the night vigil. “I firmly stand against the heinous crime committed at RG Kar Hospital on Aug 9 night,” she said. Swapna Banerjee, a writer, held her own hand written placard ‘Antorale ki cholchhe jante chai...’ (What is going on behind the curtain....want to know). “We carried some placards of protest . Most of the women came today with all their family members,” said Esha Chakrabarty, a retired school teacher. The midnight assembly saw...

title: El insólito momento que vivió Luck Ra con un fan luego de chocar con su auto
creator: MDZ Show
content: Una situación por demás insólita protagonizó el cantante Luck Ra , cuando, luego de chocar su auto, se cruzó con un fanático. El increíble momento tras producirse el accidente se viralizó rápidamente en las redes sociales. Si bien los motivos del choque no quedaron del todo claro, en las redes sociales los usuarios comentan por estas horas el desopilante ida y vuelta que el artista y novio de La Joaqui mantuvo con un fanático, que le pidió grabar un video. En las imágenes se lo puede ver a Luck Ra sentado en su auto luego del accidente, en aparente buen estado físico, aunque con una evidente angustia por lo sucedido. Sin embargo, tuvo el buen gesto de atender el pedido del joven. “Guada, Mica, les mando un beso y un saludo muy grande”, dijo Luck Ra mirando a la cámara, aceptando el pedido del fanático que no quiso perderse la oportunidad de grabar un video con el joven cantante urbano. “Mal ahí que chocaste, compi, pero bueno, nos vemos. Un gusto igual conocerte, hermano. ¡Qué caramelo te estás comiendo, eh!”, le dijo el joven de manera sorprendente, haciendo referencia al noviazgo de Luck Ra con La Joaqui. "¡Qué caramelo te estás comiendo, eh!", le dijo el fan a Luck Ra, en referencia a La Joaqui. Foto: @luckra. Más allá de que el accidente no pareciera haberse sido de gravedad ni haber producido consecuencias significativas, el video se viralizó...

title: Luiz Araújo será aposta de Tite no Flamengo contra o Bolívar
creator: Jogada10
content: O técnico Tite terá desfalques importantes para partida do Flamengo contra o Bolívar pelo jogo de ida das oitavas da Libertadores. Afinal, Cebolinha e Matías Viña, lesionados, estão fora do confronto. Além deles, Bruno Henrique, suspenso, também não fica à disposição. No ataque, o treinador apostará em Luiz Araújo para substituir Cebolinha. O atacante, inclusive, pode ganhar nova sequência de jogos. Luiz Araújo em ação pelo Flamengo - Foto: Macelo Cortes/CRF Everton Cebolinha, que foi operado nesta quarta-feira para correção do tendão de Aquiles do tornozelo esquerdo e não joga mais em 2024, e Viña, que passará por cirurgia após lesão no joelho direito, são os desfalques de ordem médica. Bruno Henrique, suspenso, também está fora. Luiz Araújo, aliás, deixou de ser titular absoluto com a opção de Tite por Gerson na ponta direita. Ainda assim, foram 43 jogos (24 como titular) em 2024, mais que qualquer outro atleta do elenco. Em minutos jogados, aparece em sétimo, abaixo apenas de Rossi, Pedro, Fabrício Bruno, Léo Pereira, Ayrton Lucas e Gerson. Na atual temporada, Luiz Araújo marcou cinco gols e deu oito assistências. Com o atacante na provável escalação, o Flamengo enfrenta o Bolívar às 21h30 de quinta-feira, no Maracanã, pelo jogo de ida das oitavas de final da Libertadores. title: Çorum'da ağaca çarpan otomobildeki 1 kişi öldü, 1 kişi yaralandı
content: Ali Esmer (38) idaresindeki otomobil, Osmancık Caddesi Fen Edebiyat Fakültesi Kavşağı yakınlarında yol kenarındaki ağaca çarptı. İhbar üzerine kaza yerine polis, itfaiye ve sağlık ekipleri sevk edildi. Kazada araçta bulunan Şaban Bulcun (53) hayatını kaybetti. Yaralanan sürücü, Çorum Belediyesi itfaiye ekiplerince sıkıştığı yerden kurtarılarak, Hitit Üniversitesi Erol Olçok Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesi'ne kaldırıldı. Bulcun'un cenazesi de aynı hastanenin morguna götürüldü.

title: Onalaska man accused of shooting at man he says slashed his tires
content: A Chehalis man has been charged with a drive-by shooting and first-degree assault with a deadly weapon after allegedly shooting at a man he, after being arrested, accused of slashing his tires on Monday, Aug. 12. At approximately 6:04 a.m. on Monday Chehalis Police Department officers were dispatched to Southwest Sixth Street after reports of shots fired in the area. When officers arrived, witnesses reportedly claimed Michael Guy McCallum, 39, of Onalaska, had driven to a Chehalis residence in a blue Subaru when another man named James Hart allegedly arrived at the same residence and began to slash the tires on McCallum’s Subaru. This allegedly prompted McCallum to shoot at Hart. Officers found one shell casing outside the residence. Another witness reportedly saw a “man with no legs exit his neighbor’s house and shoot at a moving orange truck,” according to probable cause documents filed in Lewis County Superior Court. He then witnessed that man get into his Subaru to pursue the truck. A retired U.S. Army veteran, McCallum served in both Operation Iraqi Freedom and Operation Enduring Freedom in Afghanistan. He lost his legs at the end of 2011 when he unknowingly knelt down on a explosive pressure plate booby trap atop a roof during a firefight he found himself in with his unit while deployed in Afghanistan’s Kandahar Province. McCallum was previously featured in a 2015...

title: Cần quy định riêng về PCCC với chung cư cao tầng
Mưa lớn còn kéo dài, dồn dập ở miền Bắc?
content: Theo dự báo thời tiết, khu vực Bắc Bộ tiếp tục xảy ra mưa lớn. Cục bộ nhiều nơi có mưa rất to. Rãnh áp thấp dưới mặt đất và vùng hội tụ gió trên mực 5000m vẫn nằm ở khu vực Bắc Bộ gây ra mưa rào từng đợt. Hôm nay khu vực Bắc Bộ và Thanh Hóa tiếp tục có mưa rào rải rác, lượng mưa phổ biến từ 15-30mm, cục bộ có nơi mưa to vượt 80mm. Mưa không liên tục, tập trung chủ yếu về đêm và sáng sớm. Ban ngày khu vực Bắc Bộ vẫn có những khoảng nắng, nhiều thành phố oi nóng. Nhiệt độ cao nhất tại Hà Nội, Hòa Bình, Ninh Bình, Hạ Long, Tuyên Quang, Cao Bằng, Hà Giang, Lào Cai trong khoảng 32-33 độ. Thời tiết tại Trung Bộ vẫn nắng nóng diện rộng. Các thành phố từ Hà Tĩnh xuống đến Phan Rang – Tháp Chàm nhiệt độ cao nhất từ 35-37 độ. Độ ẩm tương đối thấp nhất phổ biến từ 50-55%. Cảnh báo nắng nóng ở Trung Bộ còn có thể kéo dài trong những ngày tới. Khu vực Tây Nguyên và Nam Bộ tiếp tục có mưa dông về chiều. Ban ngày TPHCM và nhiều nơi nắng nóng với mức nhiệt 35-36 độ. Nhiệt độ tại Tây Nguyên có xu hướng tăng lên từ 31-33 độ. GĐXH - Theo dự báo thời tiết, khả năng từ đêm 10/8, mưa lớn quay...

title: ROSEN, A LONGSTANDING LAW FIRM, Encourages Indivior PLC Investors to Secure Counsel Before Important Deadline in Securities Class Action – INDV
content: NEW YORK, Aug. 14, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WHY: Rosen Law Firm, a global investor rights law firm, reminds purchasers of securities of Indivior PLC (NASDAQ: INDV) between February 22, 2024 and July 8, 2024, both dates inclusive (the “Class Period”), of the important October 1, 2024 lead plaintiff deadline. SO WHAT: If you purchased Indivior securities during the Class Period you may be entitled to compensation without payment of any out of pocket fees or costs through a contingency fee arrangement. WHAT TO DO NEXT: To join the Indivior class action, go to https://rosenlegal.com/submit-form/?case_id=27690 or call Phillip Kim, Esq. toll-free at 866-767-3653 or email case@rosenlegal.com for information on the class action. A class action lawsuit has already been filed. If you wish to serve as lead plaintiff, you must move the Court no later than October 1, 2024 . A lead plaintiff is a representative party acting on behalf of other class members in directing the litigation. WHY ROSEN LAW: We encourage investors to select qualified counsel with a track record of success in leadership roles. Often, firms issuing notices do not have comparable experience, resources or any meaningful peer recognition. Many of these firms do not actually litigate securities class actions, but are merely middlemen that refer clients or partner with law firms that actually litigate the cases. Be wise in...

title: Кандидат в вице-президенты США Уолц согласился на дебаты 1 октября
content: Москва. 15 августа. INTERFAX.RU - Кандидат в вице-президенты США от Демократической партии Тим Уолц согласился принять участие в дебатах 1 октября на канале CBS News. "Увидимся 1 октября, Джей Ди (Джей Ди Вэнс, кандидат в вице-президенты от Республиканской партии - ИФ)", - написал Уолц в социальных сетях в ответ на приглашение телеканала CBS News. Ранее телеканал опубликовал в соцсетях приглашение Уолцу и Вэнсу, предложив кандидатам на выбор две даты в сентябре и две даты в октябре для проведения дебатов в Нью-Йорке. Представитель предвыборного штаба Камалы Харрис подтвердил согласие Уолца: "Кандидат в вице-президенты Харрис принял приглашение CBS на дебаты кандидата в вице-президенты 1 октября. Губернатор Уолц с нетерпением ждет дебатов с Джей Ди Вэнсом, если он появится".

title: Bị tố hiếp dâm, ca sĩ Nick Carter (Backstreet Boys) kiện ngược người tố cáo
柯文哲政治獻金涉做假! 端木正200萬、李文娟150萬交保受科技監控
content: 民眾黨主席 柯文哲 政治獻金 申報不實遭檢調偵辦,台北地檢署懷疑柯文哲競總與 木可公關 公司間約4千萬元帳務不清,約談柯競總簽證會計師 端木正 、助理陳韋瑄、時任競總財務長李文宗與李文宗妹妹、木可負責人 李文娟 、木可公關會計何璦廷、尼奧與時樂負責人戴利玲等6人,發現何璦廷曾在競總工作,支領薪獎約50萬元,並回捐10萬元,北檢檢察官今(15)天凌晨複訊後依 偽造文書 罪嫌諭令端木正、李文娟各交保100萬、150萬,2人限制出境出海並受電子監控,何璦廷交保50萬元。 柯文哲「義無反顧拚一次」參選2024年總統大選,依《政治獻金法》需申請設立專戶,用來收受政治獻金,並逐筆記錄收支內容,向監察院申報並接受公開查詢,但柯競總以「授權金」等名義支付木可公關近4千萬元,而被支出對象的尼奧創意、時樂股份公司則公開否認有收到柯競總申報的916萬元。民眾黨和柯文哲指稱,因擔任競總簽證會計師的端木正擅自將支出「調節」到相關公司名下,導致政治獻金申報錯誤。 台北地檢署向監察院調閱相關資料後,懷疑柯競總與木可間金流帳務不明,且負責木可公司記帳的何璦廷在2023年8月到2024年2月間,從柯競總收取約50萬元薪資、獎金,其中1個月支付總額高達20萬元,何璦廷也曾以個人名義捐贈柯競總10萬。台北地檢署檢察官唐仲慶、郭建鈺14日指揮調查局兵分7路搜索,並約談端木正等6人。除被告端木正、李文娟、何璦玲交保,李文宗、戴利玲、陳韋瑄都被請回。 李文忠供稱,因柯競總的財務部人力捉襟見肘,所以向監察院申報選舉款項的事務委託給端木正處理,沒想到漏報及誤報金額高達1817萬元,但他並不知情,檢方訊後請回;端木正將政治獻金申報資料轉由夥伴陳韋瑄繕打,陳韋瑄交代過程並強調,只是幫忙登錄,沒有竄改資料。北檢調閱資料後認為陳韋瑄、何璦廷涉有重嫌,將2人從證人身分轉為偽造文書被告,同時命端木正與李文娟接受科技監控部分,由檢方提供手機,每日定時跟監控中心聯繫。 何璦廷凌晨由親友辦理保釋,快步離開地檢署搭車離去。端木正與李文娟半夜籌不出大筆現金,要等早上銀行開門再辦理交保。檢察官原本諭令端木正200萬元交保,後來降保為100萬元。從檢方交保金額來看,端木正與李文娟偽造文書嫌疑重大,顯然被認定有作假帳弊端,全案持續朝偽造文書等罪嫌方向偵辦。為釐清柯競總的政治獻金記帳、申報過程,確認金錢流向,不排除視偵辦需要,再約談柯文哲與時任競選總幹事的黃珊珊到案,外界也關注案情是否會燒到柯文哲。 會計師端木正被帶往北檢複訊。 圖:張良一/攝 前柯文哲競辦財務長李文宗(中)、會計師端木正(右)被帶往北檢複訊。 圖:張良一/攝 時樂、尼奧負責人戴利玲被移送北檢複訊。 圖:張良一/攝 會計事務所員工陳韋瑄被送往北檢複訊。 圖:張良一/攝 木可公司負責人李文娟被調查局幹員帶往北檢複訊。 圖:張良一/攝

title: Se conoce video de la pelea del papá del futbolista Lamine Yamal antes de ser apuñalado y herido de gravedad
content: Mounir Nasraoui, papá del famoso futbolista del Barcelona, Lamine Yamal, tuvo que ser hospitalizado de manera urgente después de que fuera herido de gravedad tras ser apuñalado este miércoles, 14 de agosto. Poco después de que se conociera la noticia, salió a la luz un video que muestra al hombre discutiendo, al parecer, con sus vecinos, horas después recibiría la grave lesión. De acuerdo con medios de ese país, Nasraoui se encuentra internado en el hospital universitario Germans Trias i Pujol de Badalona, Can Ruti y presenta varias heridas de consideración, por lo que hasta el momento no se ha emitido algún informe sobre su estado de salud, aunque se apunta a que es muy delicado. Según el diario La Vanguardia , los hechos se presentaron en el parking de Mataró, la unidad de investigación de los Mossos d’Esquadra se encuentra al frente de la investigación y, en colaboración con la policía local del municipio, están intentando localizar a varios testigos del incidente. “Fuentes al corriente del incidente han asegurado a La Vanguardia que la policía está trabajando en el suceso, que es pronto todavía para determinar cómo se ha producido, pero que la agresión podría venir derivada de una pelea anterior por motivos que se desconocen en la que podría haberse visto involucrado el padre del joven futbolista del Barcelona ”, mencionó. El video que salió a...

title: LILLEY: Trudeau changed foreign workers program at your expense
creator: Brian Lilley
content: The Trudeau Liberals are channeling Captain Louis Renault as they react in shock to problems with Canada’s temporary foreign worker program. Movie fans will know Captain Renault as the corrupt police chief in Casablanca . After Captain Renault barges into Rick’s Cafe — more of a nightclub and casino — Rick Blaine, played by Humphrey Bogart, walks up and asks on what grounds his establishment is being shut down. “I’m shocked, shocked to find out that gambling is going on in here,” Captain Renault says. “Your winnings sir,” says a card dealer handing money to Renault, who thanks him and continues his bust. The Liberals are Captain Renault, guilty of gambling in the illegal casino and now threatening to throw everyone out. It was the Trudeau Liberals who changed the rules to ramp up Canada’s temporary foreign workers program and now they are promising to punish anyone abusing it, using the rules they changed. “Abuse and misuse of the TFW program must end,” Employment Minister Randy Boissonnault said last week. “Bad actors are taking advantage of people and compromising the program for legitimate businesses. We are putting more reforms in place to stop misuse and fraud from entering the TFW program.” The number of people coming in under the TFW program has been ramping up for years, especially under the Trudeau Liberals. Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre, who was employment...

title: Viruela del mono: Comienzan filtros en Aeropuerto Internacional de Toluca ante casos
content: Aun cuando en el boletín epidemiológico del sistema Nacional de Vigilancia Epidemiológica , se informa de un caso de viruela símica en territorio mexiquense , la Secretaría de Salud del Estado de México , Macarena Montoya negó que existan casos . “Bueno en el Estado de México no tenemos casos reportados verdad” El informe detalla que se trata de una mujer el caso registrado hasta la semana epidemiológica 31 del 2024. Local Por su parte, Marco Antonio Montes de Oca González, Subdirector de Epidemiología del ISEM, refirió que para evitar alguna amenaza inminente a partir de hoy se iniciaron filtros en el Aeropuerto Internacional Felipe Ángeles y en el Aeropuerto Internacional de Toluca . “Se reciben la información de las características del vuelo, cuantos tripulantes, de donde vienen, si alguno de ellos emite alguna declaración de esta sintomatología, llegando todos los vuelos se realiza una revisión visual por parte de nuestro personal capacitado” La autoridad de Salud, detalló que además a los pasajeros que provienen de territorio internacional deben pasar por unas cámaras de temperatura en caso de que se detecte alguna irregularidad, los pasajeros son dirigidos a unos cubículos aislados para posteriormente ser trasladados bajo condiciones de aislamiento. Local Disminuyen contagios por viruela símica en México El Subdirector de Epidemiología, resaltó...
