Alineaciones y hora para Liga de Quito vs. Lanús en Sudamericana
LTN經濟通》股神提高現金 預告還有低點?
content: 巴菲特大量出脫蘋果持股,引發市場廣泛討論。(美聯社) 波克夏投資蘋果報酬率近800% 歐祥義/核稿編輯 〔財經頻道/綜合報導〕眾所皆知,蘋果一直都是「股神」巴菲特的第一大持份股,且蘋果給他帶來了巨大的收益,不過,今年以來,他執掌的波克夏‧海瑟威公司(Berkshire Hathaway)已經出售了5.05億股蘋果股票,分別在第一季出售1.15億股,第二季出售3.9億股,截至6月30日,該公司持有的蘋果股份自今年初以來減少55.8%。 根據媒體統計,自波克夏‧海瑟威公司首次披露其投資以來,蘋果帶來的總投報率接近800%,因此這次大幅減持的舉動引發市場廣泛討論,市場猜測減持原因主要包括:投資組合比重平衡、節稅考慮、蘋果自身基本面、市場估值以及宏觀經濟等因素。 請繼續往下閱讀... 由於脫售將近一半的蘋果公司股票,波克夏公司現金水位升上歷史新高,達2769.4億美元,其最新財報顯示,公司第二季稅後營業利益躍增15%,達116億美元。雖然巴菲特在第一季就減持蘋果股票13%,並在5月暗示是基於稅務理由,稱小幅減碼蘋果長期而言對股東有利,以防美國政府將來為填補財政赤字缺口而調高資本利得稅,但第二季又再度脫售,引起市場遲疑。 值得注意的是,巴菲特公布減持蘋果大量股票後,8月5日就爆發全球性股災,引發市場高度關注,甚至有人責怪這次股災的元凶就是巴菲特,因其大砍蘋果股票消息一出,便在日本東京股市掀起騷動,隨後又影響華爾街。也就是說,在金融市場及美國經濟特別脆弱之際,傳出大賣持股消息,加劇市場看跌氣氛,在全球掀起恐慌情緒。 蘋果一直都是巴菲特的第一大重倉股,也為他帶來了巨大的收益。(路透) 外界認出售蘋果 停利並保留現金 根據巴菲特執掌的投資公司波克夏8月3日公布2024年第二季財報顯示,該公司持有的蘋果股票數量減少近一半,已連續3個季度出售蘋果股票,即便如此,蘋果仍是該公司持有佔比最多的,但蘋果股票在波克夏的股票投資組合中的比例已從3月底的4成迅速下降到6月底的3成。 報導指出,巴菲特加速減持蘋果的速度,引發市場對大型科技股估值過高的擔憂,其持股數量從第一季末的7.89億股大降,第二季僅剩4億股左右,據了解,他在第一季削減了13%,但當時巴菲特在年會上暗示是節稅之舉,並稱若美國政府希望彌補不斷攀升的財政赤字,提高資本利得稅,那「少量出售蘋果」將使波克夏股東長期受益。 但到了第二季,巴菲特再度減持蘋果大量股票,被外界認為不只是節稅這麼簡單,由於巴菲特不僅減持蘋果股票,自7月中以來,也減持其第二大持股的美國銀行,旗下波克夏已經連12個交易日減持,累計減持9千萬股,套現約38億美元。 專家認為,波克夏賣出蘋果股票不僅僅是及時鎖定利潤,也未立即把獲得的現金用於再投資,而是保留了現金,包括現金、美國短期債券持有額等在內,波克夏的廣義手頭資金在6月底達到2769.4億美元,與達到歷史最高水準的3月底相比,增加了近5成。 據了解,截至今年6月,波克夏股權投資的總公允價值中,有72%集中於美國運通、蘋果、美國銀行、雪佛龍和可口可樂,持股市值分別為351億美元、842億美元、411億美元、186億美元、255億美元;而目前市場都在推測巴菲特是否會在第三財季持續減持蘋果,甚至是否會完全清倉。 8月5日爆發全球股災,日股、台股、韓股全數爆跌。(美聯社) 波克夏賣蘋果 引發蝴蝶效應...

title: Debut Manis Mbappe di Real Madrid, Cetak Gol dan Juara Piala Super Eropa 2024
content: Kylian Mbappe menjalani debut yang manis di . Mabppe berhasil mencetak gol saat debut dan membawa juara . Real Madrid berhasil mengalahkan di Stadion Narodowy, Rabu (14/8/2024) atau Kamis dini hari WIB dengan skor 2-0. Gol pelengkap kemenangan si Putih dicetakFede Valverde. Laga kali menjadi momen spesial bagi yang baru saja bergabung bersama pasukan Los Blancos. Main perdana dalam balutan serangan Los Blancos, pria kelahiran Paris itu langsung mengukir gol. Pertandingan berjalan 14 menit ketika Madrid mengkreasi peluang emas pertama melalui kaki Mbappe. Si kapten timnas Prancis melepaskan sepakan mendatar untuk menyambut umpan kiriman Fede Valverde di depan gawang. Namun, usaha Mbappe gagal berbuah gol karena bola dapat diblok oleh Isak Hien. Atalanta balas menebar teror via aksi Marten de Roon pada menit ke-24. Gelandang asal Belanda itu meluncurkan bola dari sisi kanan kotak penalti yang kemudian membentur mistar. Menjelang istirahat, Rodrygo mencoba peruntungan dengan kaki kiri usai menerima bola muntah di dalam kotak penalti . Dasar apes, lesakkan dia hanya membuat si kulit bulat membentur mistar.

title: Ausência de Leila Pereira em Botafogo x Palmeiras cresce lista de atritos com Textor
creator: LANCE!
content: O Palmeiras enfrenta o Botafogo hoje (14) às 21h30 (hora de Brasília), no Estádio Nilton Santos (Rio de Janeiro) pelas oitavas de final da Libertadores. Ambos os times protagonizam embates dentro de campo. Fora dos gramados os conflitos entre dirigentes vem aumentando nas últimas temporadas. Leila Pereira, presidente do Palmeiras, entrou a fundo na política do clube em novembro de 2021, ano de sua eleição. John Textor, dirigente do Botafogo, têm 90% das ações da SAF do Glorioso. Ambos representam uma era de profissionalização nas gestões de clubes nacionais. Além de surgir como símbolos dessa nova fase. A relação entre os dois nem sempre foi conflituosa. Com a criação da Liga Independente do Brasil (Libra), que tinha como principal objetivo fortalecer o Campeonato Brasileiro e dividir as premiações e cotas de transmissão de forma mais igualitária entre as delegações participantes, e a entrada do Botafogo para o grupo, a relação entre ambos era pacifica. As intrigas começaram quando o Botafogo, em junho de 2023, anunciou que deixava a Libra e que negociaria os direitos de transmissão de forma independente, sem se associar a nenhum grupo. Porém, em novembro do mesmo ano, o Botafogo assinou um acordo com a oposição da Libra. Na época, o presidente botafoguense disse não concordar com a forma que a associação era conduzida . "Velhas discussões...

title: Vokkaliga entrepreneurs should provide employment to others: GTD
content: Mysuru: The Vokkaliga community is in a precarious situation, and there is a need for the community to organise itself on a large scale, said former minister and MLA GT Devegowda on Wednesday. Speaking at the inauguration of the two-day annual representatives and investors meet – Udyami Vokkaliga, organised by the First Circle Society, a forum for Vokkaliga entrepreneurs , the MLA said Vokkaligas are a majority community in Mysuru and owned land, but today land is not with them. Vokkaliga entrepreneurs should not only build their lives but also provide employment to others, Devegowda suggested. “Today, people from other states are running large businesses on our land. I feel that those (people) born here should establish businesses (here),” he said. He also called upon the community members that regardless of their party affiliation, Vokkaligas should unite for the betterment of the community. Nirmalanandanatha Swami, head of Adichunchanagiri Mutt, said today the country’s progress is measured by GDP. “Our (Vokkaliga) community needs to contribute to the growth of our economy. They need to contribute to building the nation,” the seer suggested. “In this changing era, it is difficult for any community to maintain its identity without growing economically strong. Economic strength enhances our self-respect. Some may think that Vokkaligas are working only for their community, but...

title: Kahveye rekor zam. 40 yılın hatrı tarihe karışacak
content: Türkiye'deki ekonomik zorluklar, vatandaşların yaşam tarzını derinden etkilerken, temel ihtiyaçlardan lüks tüketim ürünlerine kadar her şeyin fiyatında artış yaşanıyor. Zam dalgasının son kurbanı ise kahve oldu. Kahve fiyatları, son bir ayın en yüksek seviyesine çıkarak 244,85 dolara ulaştı. Özellikle en aktif ICE kontratı, %6'nın üzerinde bir artışla 249,45 dolara kadar yükseldi. Bu sert artış, kahve severler için yeni maliyetler anlamına geliyor. DON OLAYLARI BÜYÜK ETKİLEDİ Brezilya'da meydana gelen don olayları, kahve yetiştiricileri arasında ciddi endişelere yol açtı. Donların, kahve bitkilerinin yanı sıra şeker kamışı ve küçük tahıl ürünlerine de zarar verme ihtimali, piyasalarda belirsizlik yarattı ve fiyat dalgalanmalarına neden oldu. TÜRKİYE DE KÜRESEL FİYAT ARTIŞLARINDAN ETKİLENİYOR Türkiye, kahve ithalatında büyük ölçüde dışa bağımlı bir ülke olduğundan, küresel kahve fiyatlarındaki bu artışlar Türkiye'yi doğrudan etkiliyor. Kahve fiyatlarının yükselmesi, yerli tüketici için daha yüksek maliyetler anlamına gelirken, ekonomik zorlukların günlük hayattaki etkileri bir kez daha kendini hissettiriyor.

title: Deswita Maharani Ceritakan Kondisi Terakhir Ibunda Ferry Maryadi Sebelum Meninggal Dunia
content: - menjelaskan soal kondisi terakhir , ibunda sebelum meninggal dunia. Dikatakan Deswita, dua tahun terakhir ini kondisi ibu mertuanya itu sudah sakit sejak terjatuh di tahun 2022 lalu. Ditambah pada dua minggu belakangan ini kondisi fisik almarhumah juga mulai mengalami perubahan. Sempata ada beberapa bengkak di bagian tangan selama dua minggu belakangan ini, yang membuat keluarga harus segera membawanya ke rumah sakit. "Mamah itu kan emang sudah dua tahun sakit yaa, dan di tahun kedua ini udah menurun banget kesehatannya. Udah nggak bisa ngapa-ngapain dan udah di tempat tidur aja, dibantu sama perawat dan anak-anaknya juga," jelas di rumah duka kawasan Bintaro, Tangerang, Rabu (14/8/2024). "Terus dua minggu terakhir ini juga ada perubahan di fisiknya. Dari yang tadinya tangan gak bengkak sekarang udah bengkak, tadinya cuman disini (pergelangan) sampai kesini (lengan dekat bahu) bengkaknya," lanjutnya. Beberapa hari lalu kondisi terakhir dari almarhumah sudah mulai menurun drastis hingga keluarga segera membawa ke IGD. "Karena kondisinya udah drop banget jadinya kita mikir kalau ini harus dibawa ke IGD," ucap Deswita. "Kondisinya itu beliau udah nggak bereaksi ketika kita panggil, mata udah nggak kebuka, jadi kita buru-buru lariin pagi itu ke IGD, bahkan pas sampai ke IGD pun pihak rumah sakit langsung menyarankan ke ICU," terangnya. Sembari menahan tangis, Deswita merasa...

title: તપાસ:સચિનમાં બંધ ફ્લેટમાંથી દુર્ગંધ આવતા લોકોએ દરવાજો ખોલ્યો તો હત્યા કરાયેલી લાશ મળી
content: સચિનમાં એક ફલેટમાંથી દુર્ગંધ આવતા સ્થાનિકોએ ફલેટનો દરવાજો ખોલતા તેમાંથી કોહવાયેલી લાશ મળી હતી. સચિન પોલીસે લાશનું પીએમ કરાવતા હત્યાનો મામલો સામે આવ્યો છે. .મૃતક યુવકનું નામ રવિન્દ્ર સંતોષ પાટીલ(39) છે વધુમાં પોલીસે જણાવ્યું કે સચિનના શીલાલેખ એપાર્ટમે મૃતક રવિન્દ્રને સંતાનમાં એક બાળક છે અને તેની પત્ની 3 મહિના પહેલા તેની સાથે ઝઘડો કરી પિયર જતી રહી હતી. છેલ્લા 3 મહિનાથી રવિન્દ્ર એકલો રહેતો હતો. પોલીસે સીસીટીવીના આધારે તપાસ શરૂ કરી છે.

title: Water connections likely in PRN, Kho Nagoriyan homes
WBC Honorary Champion Bridger Walker Joins Inaugural Amazing Thailand Muay Thai Summer Camp 2024
creator: PR Newswire
content: LOS ANGELES, Aug. 14, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- The Amazing Thailand Muay Thai Summer Camp 2024, held from July 16 to 28, offered an enriching two-week program of Muay Thai training and cultural experiences. A key highlight was the participation of WBC Honorary Champion Bridger Walker, celebrated for his heroic act at age six. The camp was organized by the Tourism Authority of Thailand (TAT) in partnership with the World Boxing Council (WBC) MuayThai, EVA Air, and See My Thailand travel agency. It featured Muay Thai training sessions led by top trainers, allowing participants to enhance their skills through intensive practice and expert guidance.

title: ಅಕ್ರಮ ಬಿಪಿಎಲ್‌ ಕಾರ್ಡ್‌ ಹೊಂದಿದವರಿಗೆ ಢವ ಢವ ..!
content: ಸಂಪತ್ ತರೀಕೆರೆ ಬೆಂಗಳೂರು(ಆ.15): ರಾಜ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಬಿಪಿಎಲ್ ಕಾರ್ಡ್ ಹೊಂದಿರುವ ಅನರ್ಹ ಫಲಾನುಭವಿಗಳನ್ನು ಗುರುತಿಸುವ ಕೆಲಸಕ್ಕೆ ಆಹಾರ ಇಲಾಖೆ ಚುರುಕು ನೀಡಿದ್ದು, ಬಿಪಿಎಲ್ ಹೊಂದಿರುವ ಲಕ್ಷಾಂತರ ಕುಟುಂಬಗಳಿಗೆ ಸಂಕಷ್ಟ ಶುರುವಾಗಲಿದೆ. ಈ ನಡುವೆಯೇ ಬಿಪಿಎಲ್ ಕಾರ್ಡ್ ಪಡೆಯಲು ಈ ಹಿಂದೆ ನಿಗದಿ ಮಾಡಿರುವ ಅವೈಜ್ಞಾನಿಕ ಮಾನದಂಡ ಬದಲಾವಣೆ ಮಾಡಬೇಕೆಂಬ ಒತ್ತಾಯವೂ ಕೇಳಿಬಂದಿದೆ. ಯಾರು ಅನರ್ಹರು? ತೆರಿಗೆ ಪಾವತಿಸುವವರು, ಸರ್ಕಾರಿ ಮತ್ತು ಆರೆ ಸರ್ಕಾರಿ ನೌಕರರಿರುವ ಕುಟುಂಬ, ಮನೆಗಳನ್ನು ಬಾಡಿಗೆಗೆ ಕೊಟ್ಟಿ ರುವವರು, 7.5 ಎಕರೆಗಿಂತ ಹೆಚ್ಚು ಜಮೀನು ಹೊಂದಿರು ವವರು, ಸ್ವಂತಕ್ಕೆಂದು4 ಚಕ್ರದವಾಹನ ಹೊಂದಿರುವವರು ಬಿಪಿಎಲ್, ಅಂತ್ಯೋದಯ ಕಾರ್ಡು ಪಡೆಯುವಂತಿಲ್ಲ. ಅನ್ನಭಾಗ್ಯ ಅಕ್ಕಿ ಹಣ ಬಿಡುಗಡೆಗೆ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಮಹತ್ವದ ಮಾಹಿತಿ ನೀಡಿದ ಸಚಿವ ಮುನಿಯಪ್ಪ ಸಿಕ್ಕಿಬಿದ್ದರೆ ಏನು ಶಿಕ್ಷೆ? ವೇಳೆ ಸುಳ್ಳು ದಾಖಲೆ ನೀಡಿ ಬಿಪಿಎಲ್ ಕಾರ್ಡ್ ಪಡೆದಿದ್ದು ಸಾಬೀತಾದರೆ ಇದುವರೆಗೂ ನ್ಯಾಯಬೆಲೆ ಅಂಗಡಿ ಯಲ್ಲಿ ಪಡೆದ ಅಕ್ಕಿ ಅಥವಾ ಇತರೆ ಧಾನ್ಯಗಳ ಮೊತ್ತವನ್ನು (ಅಕ್ಕಿ ಕೆಜಿಗೆ ತಲಾ 35 ರು.ನಂತೆ) ಮರಳಿಸಬೇಕು. ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರೀಯ ಆಹಾರ ಭದ್ರತಾ ಕಾಯ್ದೆ (ಎನ್‌ಎಫ್‌ಎಸ್‌ಎ) ಪ್ರಕಾರ ಗ್ರಾಮೀಣ ಪ್ರದೇಶದಲ್ಲಿ ಶೇ.76.04, ನಗರ ಪ್ರದೇಶಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಶೇ.49.36 ಸೇರಿ ಒಟ್ಟು 3,58,87,666 ಫಲಾನುಭವಿಗಳಿಗೆ 1,03,70,666 2 ನೀಡಬೇಕೆಂಬ ನಿಯಮವಿದೆ. ಆದರೆ, ರಾಜ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಸದ್ಯ 3,93,29,981 1,16,51,209 ಬಿಪಿಎಲ್ ಕಾರ್ಡ್ ನೀಡಲಾಗಿದೆ. ನಿಗದಿಗಿಂತ ಹೆಚ್ಚುವರಿಯಾಗಿ 14 ಲಕ್ಷ ಬಿಪಿಎಲ್‌ ಕಾರ್ಡ್‌ಗಳಿವೆ. ಬಚಾವ್‌: ಅರ್ಹತೆ ಇಲ್ಲದೆ, ಸುಳ್ಳು ಮಾಹಿತಿ ನೀಡಿ ಬಿಪಿಎಲ್ ಅಥವಾ ಅಂತ್ಯೋದಯ ಕಾರ್ಡ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಪಡೆದಿ ರುವವರು ಹಿಂದಿರುಗಿಸುವಂತೆ ಆಹಾರ ಇಲಾಖೆ ಈಗಾಗಲೇ ಅನೇಕ ಬಾರಿ ಕಾಲಾವಕಾಶ ನೀಡಿತ್ತು. ನಿಗದಿತ ಅವಧಿ ಯಲ್ಲಿ ಅನರ್ಹರು ಪಡೆದ ಬಿಪಿಎಲ್ ಕಾರ್ಡುಗಳನ್ನು ಹಿಂದಿರುಗಿಸದಿದ್ದರೆ ಕ್ರಿಮಿನಲ್ ಕೇಸು ದಾಖಲಿಸುವ ಎಚ್ಚರಿಕೆ ಯನ್ನು...

title: Gempa Bumi Magnitudo 5.2 Guncang Bayah, Dirasakan dari Cianjur Hingga Garut
content: Gempa bumi 5.2 yang terjadi di Provinsi Kamis (15/8/2024) pukul 00:55:42 WIB dirasakan hingga , , Kabupaten Bandung, Kabupaten Bogor, dan . Lokasi tersebut berada di kedalaman 10 km 7.70 LS - 106.08 BT dengan pusat berada di laut 87 km barat daya . Berikut tindakan yang perlu kamu lakukan saat terjadi: 1. Tetap tenang Saat terjadi, berusahalah untuk tidak panik dan tetap tenang! Tarik napas dalam-dalamnya, lalu lihatlah keadaan sekitar dan pilihlah tempat yang aman untuk berlindung. 2. Di dalam rumah Jika pada saat sedang berada di dalam penginapan, berusahalah menyelamatkan diri dan orang yang ada di sekitarmu. Berlindung di bawah meja adalah tempat terbaik untuk melindungi diri dari benda-benda yang berjatuhan akibat . Setelah itu, lindungi kepala dengan benda empuk. Misalnya bantal, helm, papan, atau yang paling praktis kamu bisa menggunakan kedua tangan dengan posisi tertelungkup. 3. Di luar ruangan Jika pada saat terjadi kamu sedang berada di luar ruangan, tindakan pertama yang harus dilakukan adalah bergerak menjauhi gedung dan tiang lantas menuju daerah terbuka. Tetap tenang dengan menarik napas dalam-dalam dan jangan lakukan apapun.

title: Ernesto becomes hurricane after battering Puerto Rico
content: Tropical Storm Ernesto swept through Eastern Puerto Rico causing widespread flooding. The winds reached 75mph (120 km/h) at the time according to the National Hurricane Center. The weather front then turned into a Category 1 hurricane after leaving the island as it headed to the British Virgin Islands.

title: Tiago Abravanel atualiza estado de saúde de Silvio Santos: ‘Vai sair dessa logo’
creator: Thais Fonseca
content: O ator Tiago Abravanel , 36 anos, falou sobre o estado de saúde do avô, o apresentador Silvio Santos, 93, e contou por que não foi visitá-lo no hospital onde está internado desde o dia 1o de agosto. “É super restrito. Óbvio que a família está cuidando, mas graças a Deus ele está super bem assistido por todos os médicos, a equipe maravilhosa do hospital e, com a fé de todo mundo, ele vai sair dessa logo”, declarou Tiago em conversa para o site da revista Quem durante lançamento da autobiografia de Preta Gil no Rio de Janeiro, nesta quarta-feira, 14. +Glow News – Sem previsão de alta e infecção bacteriana: saiba tudo sobre o estado de saúde de Silvio Santos +Silvio Santos está melhor e até fazendo brincadeiras, garante Patrícia Abravanel Segundo o ator, a decisão da internação partiu do próprio dono do SBT: “Ele é muito preocupado com ele mesmo. Que bom, né? É importante”, declarou. O artista, que está atualmente em cartaz no Rio com o musical “Hairspray”, confessou que deveria ser mais como o avô quando o assunto é saúde. “Graças a Deus, eu sempre fui uma pessoa muito ativa e que fica prestando atenção na minha saúde, principalmente por fazer trabalhos que exigem do meu físico, como musical e show, sempre tem que estar ligado em tudo. Saúde é uma coisa que mesmo você cuidando, você tem que olhar sempre para que a gente possa fazer tudo...

title: Gas prices going up Thursday
content: Motorists will pay more for gas when they go to the pumps on Thursday. The state-owned oil refinery, Petrojam, says E-10 87 is to move up by $1.79 to sell for $177.46 per litre and a litre of E-10 90 will go up by $1.81 to sell for $$186.48. Automotive diesel oil will move up by $0.66 per litre to sell for $169.51. Ultra low sulphur diesel will sell for $177.59 per litre following an increase of $0.75. The price of Kerosene will go up by $0.15 per litre to sell for $164.21. In the meantime, propane cooking gas will sell for $0.25 cents more per litre at $71.28, while butane will move up by $0.35 to sell for $79.48 per litre. Retailers will add their mark-ups to the announced prices. Follow The Gleaner on X, formerly Twitter, and Instagram @JamaicaGleaner and on Facebook @GleanerJamaica. Send us a message on WhatsApp at 1-876-499-0169 or email us at onlinefeedback@gleanerjm.com or editors@gleanerjm.com .

title: Californians vote on an $18 minimum wage. Workers already want $25 and more
content: California touted a victory for working people in 2016 when it enacted a sweeping series of minimum hikes, making sure the lowest-wage workers would earn at least $15 an hour by 2022. Then-Gov. Jerry Brown, while signing the law , spoke of “giving people their due;” then-Senate leader Kevin de León spoke in Spanish of making it possible to achieve the American dream. Now, California voters are being asked to boost the statewide minimum wage again, just two years after the landmark $15 wage championed by unions and embraced by Democratic politicians nationwide took effect. But when Proposition 32 — the measure to raise the minimum wage to $18 next year — was confirmed for Californians’ ballots in November, it wasn’t with the same fanfare. That’s because a lot has changed: This year in the Legislature, business and labor groups focused on other fights, and it was uncertain whether the measure would even stay on the ballot. Some proponents argued it wasn’t nearly ambitious enough to help the working poor afford California, where MIT researchers estimate the average single, childless adult needs $27 an hour to be “self-sufficient.” One of them, the workers’ advocacy group One Fair Wage, asked the sponsor to pull it from the ballot in favor of advocating for a $20 wage; the organization’s president, Saru Jayaraman, now says Prop. 32 is needed but only a “first step.” And though...

title: Judge tells Google to brace for shakeup of Android app store as punishment for running a monopoly
creator: By MICHAEL LIEDTKE - AP Technology Writer
content: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — A federal judge on Wednesday indicated he will order major changes in Google’s Android app store to punish the company for engineering a system that a jury declared an illegal monopoly that has hurt millions of consumers and app developers. Over the course of a three-hour hearing in San Francisco, U.S. District Judge James Donato made it clear that the forthcoming shake-up he is contemplating will probably include a mandate requiring Google's Play Store for Android phones offer consumers a choice to download alternative app stores Javascript is required for you to be able to read premium content. title: Judge tells Google to brace for shakeup of Android app store as punishment for running a monopoly
creator: By MICHAEL LIEDTKE - AP Technology Writer
content: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — A federal judge on Wednesday indicated he will order major changes in Google’s Android app store to punish the company for engineering a system that a jury declared an illegal monopoly that has hurt millions of consumers and app developers. Over the course of a three-hour hearing in San Francisco, U.S. District Judge James Donato made it clear that the forthcoming shake-up he is contemplating will probably include a mandate requiring Google's Play Store for Android phones offer consumers a choice to download alternative app stores Donato has been weighing how to punish the Google since last December when a jury declared the Play Store a monopoly following a four-week trial. The verdict centered on Google's nearly exclusive control over distribution of apps designed for Android phones and the billing systems for the digital commerce occurring within them — a system that generates billions of dollars in annual revenue for the company. In protesting the judge's potential requirements, Google has raised the specter of consumers' devices being infected by malicious software downloaded from third-party app stores, triggering “security chaos.” But Donato repeatedly hammered on the need for a major overhaul of the Play Store, even if it causes Google headaches and huge bills that the company has estimated could run as high as $600 million, depending on what the...

title: Pérez beats Pirates following trade, San Diego's 19th win in 22 games and Pirates 10th straight loss
content: Jake Cronenworth and David Peralta homered for the Padres, who swept six games from the Pirates this season. San Diego (69-53) improved to a season-high 16 games over .500, sweeping the three-game series and winning eight series in a row for the first time since 2007. Pittsburgh has lost 10 consecutive games for the first time since June 13-22 last year. The Pirates are 1-12 since July 31, the day after the trade deadline. Pérez (3-5) didn't get a decision in his first two starts after San Diego obtained him on July 31 for Ronaldys Jimenez, an 18-year-old left-hander in his first professional season. Pérez allowed one run and five hits in 5 1/3 innings with eight strikeouts and a walk. Mitch Keller (10-7) gave up a season-high eight runs and eight hits in five innings. He is 0-2 in six starts since beating the New York Mets on July 8. Cronenworth followed singles by Luis Arraez and Jurickson Profar with a home run to right of a Keller sweeper, his 15th home run this season and first since July 20. Peralta homered on his 37th birthday, a two-run drive in the third for an 8-0 lead. Signed to a minor league contract in May, Peralta increased his season home run total to six by homering on consecutive days. Rookie Jackson Merrill hit a two-run triple in the third. Pittsburgh's Joey Bart homered in the sixth. TRAINER’S ROOM Pirates: RHP Colin Holderman (right wrist) threw his...

title: Pérez beats Pirates following trade, San Diego's 19th win in 22 games and Pirates 10th straight loss
creator: By JAY PARIS - Associated Press
content: SAN DIEGO (AP) — Martín Pérez beat his old team in his first victory since San Diego acquired him at the trade deadline, and the Padres defeated the Pittsburgh Pirates 8-2 on Wednesday for their 19th win in 22 games. Jake Cronenworth and David Peralta homered for the Padres, who swept six games from the Pirates this season. San Diego (69-53) improved to a season-high 16 games over .500, sweeping the three-game series and winning eight series in a row for the first time since 2007. title: Pérez beats Pirates following trade, San Diego's 19th win in 22 games and Pirates 10th straight loss
creator: By JAY PARIS - Associated Press
content: SAN DIEGO (AP) — Martín Pérez beat his old team in his first victory since San Diego acquired him at the trade deadline, and the Padres defeated the Pittsburgh Pirates 8-2 on Wednesday for their 19th win in 22 games. Jake Cronenworth and David Peralta homered for the Padres, who swept six games from the Pirates this season. San Diego (69-53) improved to a season-high 16 games over .500, sweeping the three-game series and winning eight series in a row for the first time since 2007. Pittsburgh has lost 10 consecutive games for the first time since June 13-22 last year. The Pirates are 1-12 since July 31, the day after the trade deadline. Pérez (3-5) didn’t get a decision in his first two starts after San Diego obtained him on July 31 for Ronaldys Jimenez, an 18-year-old left-hander in his first professional season. “He’s been huge,′′ Padres manager Mike Shildt said. “He’s just a real veteran guy with moxie and he has the stuff to match it.” Pérez allowed one run and five hits in 5 1/3 innings with eight strikeouts and a walk. “I’m pitching different and using different sequences,′′ he said. “I used to work too much with my fastball and everybody is ready for that. But I’m trying to slow things down and then go back to the (fastball). I think that’s working and I’m going to continue doing that.” Mitch Keller (10-7) gave up a season-high eight runs and eight hits in five...

title: Rob Lowe reveals the 'Brat Pack' label was 'designed to belittle us' though fans thought it 'sounds cool' even though the moniker hurt their careers
content: Rob Lowe reveals the 'Brat Pack' label was 'designed to belittle us' though fans thought it 'sounds cool' even though the moniker hurt their careers Have YOU got a story? Email tips@dailymail.com By Brian Gallagher For Dailymail.com Published: 00:22, 15 August 2024 | Updated: 01:54, 15 August 2024 e-mail 8 View comments Rob Lowe is looking back on his days as a member of the group known as the Brat Pack, a moniker which was coined nearly 40 years ago. A New York Magazine article by David Blum published on June 10, 1985 was entitled Hollywood's Brat Pack, a spin on the Rat Pack of the 1960s. The article followed members of the group such as Lowe, 60, Emilio Estevez, Demi Moore , Andrew McCarthy, Judd Nelson, Molly Ringwald and Ally Sheedy on a night out partying in New York City . Nearly four decades later, Lowe is opening up about the moniker and the article itself, which he said was, 'horrible.' 'It was a hit piece, there's no doubt about it. It was designed to belittle us, make us look small, with that journalistic trick of plausible deniability,' Lowe said. Rob Lowe is looking back on his days as a member of the group known as the Brat Pack, a moniker which was coined nearly 40 years ago A New York Magazine article by David Blum published on June 10, 1985 was entitled Hollywood's Brat Pack, a spin on the Rat Pack of the 1960s Lowe was just 21 at the time, having worked as...

title: Corea del Norte reabrirá fronteras a turismo internacional
creator: Redacción
content: Luego de cinco años, Corea del Norte reabrirá el turismo internacional limitado en diciembre de 2024, esto luego del cierre total a causa de la pandemia Covid_19; así lo anunciaron dos compañías de viajes que cuentan con conexiones con el país de Asia Oriental. Fueron las empresas Koryo Tours en Berlín y KTG en Shenyang, quienes a través de sus sitios web anunciaron a los turistas que podrán visitar la ciudad de Samjiyon cerca de la frontera con China y posteriormente es probable que para el resto del país señaló la empresa en su comunicado. Puedes leer: OMS declara brote de mpox como emergencia de salud pública internacional Las restricciones fronterizas impuestas por el régimen de Kim Jong Un, suavizó las restricciones fronterizas aproximadamente desde hace un año, sin embargo, no se habían abierto para los turistas pese a ser una fuente de ingresos importante para el Estado. Cabe señalar que las autoridades norcoreanas mantienen estrecha vigilancia a turistas extranjeros a quienes únicamente se les permite instalarse en alojamientos destinados a extranjeros y se restringe su paso por el país.

title: 「皆が死んだのだから、おまえも死ね」水木しげるさんに上官は言った。
creator: jp
ハフポスト日本版編集部
content: これは、「 水木しげるのラバウル戦記 」(ちくま文庫)に書かれた、漫画家の水木しげるさんの回想だ。 2015年に93歳で亡くなった水木さんは、太平洋戦争の最前線であるニューブリテン島のジャングルで、九死に一生を得た経験がある。ゲリラの襲撃で所属部隊が水木さんを残して全滅、命からがら生還したのだ。当時22歳だった。 しかし、上官は生還を喜ばず、むしろ戦死しなかったことを責めた。水木さんの強烈な戦争体験を、著書から振り返ろう。 オーストラリアの信託統治領だったニューブリテン島を日本軍が占領したのは1942年のことだった。東端のラバウルに航空隊の基地が作られ、陸海軍合わせて約10万人の兵士が配置された。難攻不落が予想されることから、連合軍側からは「ラバウル要塞」と呼ばれた。 しかし1943年2月、同じく南太平洋のガダルカナル島では激戦の末に 日本軍が撤退 。戦況は日本にとって不利になっていた。水木さんが陸軍の二等兵としてラバウルに送られたのは、その8カ月後のことだった。旧日本軍ではニューブリテン島全体を「ラバウル」と呼んでいた。 翌1944年2月中旬にはニューブリテン島の西半分は連合軍の手に落ちたが、アメリカ軍のマッカーサー大将が率いる連合国軍は、堅固なラバウルを敢えて攻略せず、周辺の島々を制圧して ラバウルを孤立させることにした 。ラバウルの日本軍は補給路を断たれるも、自給自足の生活を送りながら、連合軍との決戦を待っていたが、終戦まで大規模な戦いは起きなかった。 足立倫行さんの「 妖怪と歩く ドキュメント・水木しげる 」 (文春文庫)を元に、水木さんの足取りを辿ろう。水木さんはラバウルよりも前線に近いズンゲンの陣地にいたが、1944年5月ごろ、ズンゲンから100kmも離れたバイエンに送られた。わずか13人の分遣隊だった。連合軍の支配地域に近い「陸の孤島」のような場所だったという。 5月下旬の早朝のことだった。分遣隊は、水木さん1人を残して全滅する。オーストラリア軍の指揮を受けた現地人の兵隊の襲撃を受けたのだ。水木さんは当時、兵舎から50mほど晴れた海岸線で見張り番の担当をしていた。 「 水木サンの幸福論 」(角川文庫)の中で、当時の様子を以下のように振り返っている。 水木さんは、サンゴが群生する海岸線を逃げた。軍靴の底はなくなり、足の裏から血が出ていた。海を泳ぎ、ジャングルを駆け抜け、現地人の集落をびくびくしながら通りすぎた。川で水をすすり、やせたエビを食べる程度で、ほぼ飲まず食わずの逃避行だった。銃も軍服もなくし、ふんどし姿で5日後にズンゲンの陣地にたどり着いた。 しかし、水木さんを待っていたのは、上官の冷たい言葉だった。再び「水木サンの幸福論」から引こう。 冒頭で紹介した「水木しげるのラバウル戦記」とは、中隊長の台詞が微妙に違うが、水木さんの生還を喜ばなかったのは確実なようだ。 戦死で部隊が全滅することを「玉砕」と呼んで美化していた日本軍では、一人だけ生き残ることは「恥」だったのだ。...

title: วันนี้ทั่วไทยเจอฝนเฉลี่ย 40%ยกเว้นภาคเหนือหนักสุด 60%
creator: Thongsak
content: พฤหัส, 15 สิงหาคม 2567 สภาพอากาศวันนี้ THAILAND 34°C/28°C LINE : @THAIPOST พฤหัส, 15 สิงหาคม 2567 15 ส.ค.2567 - กรมอุตุนิยมวิทยาได้พยากรณ์อากาศ 24 ชั่วโมงข้างหน้าในลักษณะทั่วไป ว่าภาคเหนือ ภาคตะวันออกเฉียงเหนือตอนบน และภาคตะวันออกมีฝนตกหนักบางแห่ง ขอให้ประชาชนในบริเวณดังกล่าวระวังอันตรายจากฝนตกหนักและฝนที่ตกสะสม ซึ่งอาจทําให้เกิดน้ําท่วมฉับพลันและน้ําป่าไหลหลาก โดยเฉพาะพื้นที่ลาดเชิงเขาใกล้ทางน้ําไหลผ่านและพื้นที่ลุ่มไว้ด้วย ทั้งนี้เนื่องจากร่องมรสุมพาดผ่านภาคเหนือตอนบนและประเทศลาวตอนบนเข้าสู่หย่อมความกดอากาศต่ําบริเวณประเทศเวียดนามตอนบนและอ่าวตังเกี๋ย ประกอบกับมรสุมตะวันตกเฉียงใต้กําลังปานกลางพัดปกคลุมทะเลอันดามัน ประเทศไทย และอ่าวไทย สําหรับบริเวณทะเลอันดามันตอนบน และอ่าวไทยทะเลมีคลื่นสูง 1-2 เมตร บริเวณที่มีฝนฟ้าคะนองคลื่นสูงมากกว่า 2 เมตร ขอให้ชาวเรือหลีกเลี่ยงการเดินเรือในบริเวณที่มีฝนฟ้าคะนองไว้ด้วย อนึ่ง พายุโซนร้อนกําลังแรง “อ็อมปึล” มีศูนย์กลางบริเวณตอนใต้ของประเทศญี่ปุ่น ขอให้ผู้ที่จะเดินทางไปบริเวณดังกล่าวตรวจสอบสภาพอากาศก่อนออกเดินทางไว้ด้วย พยากรณ์อากาศสําหรับประเทศไทย 06:00 น. วันนี้ ถึง 06:00 น. วันพรุ่งนี้ ภาคเหนือ มีฝนฟ้าคะนอง ร้อยละ 60 ของพื้นที่ และมีฝนตกหนักบางแห่ง บริเวณจังหวัดแม่ฮ่องสอน เชียงใหม่ เชียงราย ลําปาง พะเยา น่าน แพร่ ตาก พิษณุโลก และเพชรบูรณ์ อุณหภูมิต่ําสุด 23-26 องศาเซลเซียส อุณหภูมิสูงสุด 32-35 องศาเซลเซียส ลมตะวันตกเฉียงใต้ ความเร็ว 5-15 กม./ชม. ภาคตะวันออกเฉียงเหนือ มีฝนฟ้าคะนอง ร้อยละ 40 ของพื้นที่ และมีฝนตกหนักบางแห่ง บริเวณจังหวัดเลย...

title: P.E.I. officials declare whooping cough outbreak - CTV News Atlantic
NFL analyst believes Miami Dolphins should put Erik Ezukanma on trade block | Sporting News
creator: Chris Spooner
content: When the Miami Dolphins drafted wide receiver Erik Ezukanma in the fourth round of the 2022 NFL Draft , the hope was that, with some development, they could round out their wide receiver corps. They already had the home-run speed threat in Tyreek Hill , and the all-around skill receiver with Jaylen Waddle. They were just missing a bigger-bodied possession receiver to even things out. Unfortunately for both Ezukanma and the Dolphins that hope has not been realized in the young receiver’s two seasons with the team. Injuries have seriously derailed the receiver’s development, and have led to him only seeing 19 total snaps over two seasons. Again this year, Ezukanma has been injured and has missed portions of the Dolphins’ training camp. With a lack of production and a lack of playing time, it may be time for the Dolphins and Ezukanma to part ways, and at least one NFL analyst agrees. The Athletic’s Ryan Fowler believes the Miami Dolphins should put Ezukanma on the trade block and try to get something back for their investment – as difficult a proposition as that might be. Fowler argues that if the Dolphins wait any longer to deal Ezukanma, they run the risk of further diminishing his already low trade value. With every game that Ezukanma doesn’t get snaps, and with every wide receiver who outperforms him, his value continues to decrease. The Dolphins should bite the bullet now...

title: AC avança nos anos iniciais do ensino fundamental, mas permanece abaixo da média nos indicadores do Ideb
content: Os dados foram divulgados nesta quarta-feira (14) pelo Ministério da Educação ( ) e o Anísio Teixeira (Inep). O Ideb é calculado a partir dos dados do Censo Escolar e do Sistema de Avaliação da Educação Básica (Saeb). A pontuação varia de 0 a 10, e quanto melhor o desempenho dos alunos e mais alto o número de aprovados, maior é o Ideb. Veja as notas do Acre Ideb 2023: Ideb em 2021: Os dados apontam que o estado acreano avançou entre 2021, último ano da avaliação, e 2023. Com a nota deste ano, o Acre ficou apenas 0,2 a menos que o índice do país, que foi 6. Ideb 2023: Ideb em 2021: O Acre não avançou nos anos finais do ensino fundamental e manteve a nota de 2021. Novamente, o estado acreano não alcançou a média nacional 5. Ideb 2023: Ideb em 2021: Em relação ao ensino médio, a nota do Acre também ficou abaixo da nacional, que foi 4,3, e manteve a mesma nota de 2021. 🔴O que compõe o Ideb? O índice cruza duas informações e apresenta resultados em uma escala que vai de 1 a 10: Como o Ideb é calculado? O cálculo do Ideb obedece a seguinte fórmula: os resultados dos testes de Língua Portuguesa e Matemática são padronizados em uma escala de 0 a 10. Depois, a média dessas duas notas é multiplicada pela média das taxas de aprovação das séries de cada etapa avaliada (anos iniciais, anos finais e ensino médio), que variam de zero a 100....

title: Happy Flint’s Park has the green light for housing development?
content: The Environmental Protection Authority's granted subdivision consent to a Queenstown developer planning 370 residential units - to house, roughly, 1000 people - on the northern side of Ladies Mile. It's the first residential development on the way for what's, till now, been farmland.

title: ఐరాస శాశ్వత ప్రతినిధిగా పర్వతనేని హరీశ్‌
creator: bharath kumar
content: న్యూఢిల్లీ: న్యూయార్క్‌లోని ఐక్యరాజ్యసమితి తదుపరి భారత శాశ్వత ప్రతినిధిగా తెలుగు వ్యక్తి పర్వతనేని హరీశ్‌ను కేంద్ర ప్రభుత్వం నియమించింది. ఆయన త్వరలోనే ఈ పదవిని చేపడతారని విదేశీ వ్యవహారాల మంత్రిత్వ శాఖ బుధవారం ప్రకటించింది. ఆయన 1990 బ్యాచ్‌ ఐఎఫ్‌ఎస్‌ అధికారి. ప్రస్తుతం జర్మనీకి భారత రాయబారిగా పని చేస్తున్నారు. జీ20, జీ7, బ్రిక్స్‌ సమావేశాల్లో కీలక పాత్ర పోషించారు. ఉప రాష్ట్రపతికి ఓఎస్‌డీగా కూడా పని చేశారు. రుచిర కాంభోజ్‌ జూన్‌లో పదవీ విరమణ చేయడంతో హరీశ్‌ను ఈ పదవిలో నియమించారు. రుచిర దాదాపు నాలుగు దశాబ్దాలపాటు దౌత్యవేత్తగా పని చేశారు. పర్వతనేని హరీశ్‌ హైదరాబాద్‌లోని ఉస్మానియా యూనివర్సిటీలో మెకానికల్‌ ఇంజినీరింగ్‌ పూర్తిచేశారు. గోల్డ్‌ మెడల్‌ కూడా పొందారు.

title: Two youths drown in Bhima River
content: Kalaburagi: Two young lives were tragically lost in the Bhima River in Ganagapur, Kalaburagi district, on Tuesday. The victims are Prakash Subhash Wagmore, an 18-year-old resident of Ganagapur, and Saksham Vinod Koli, a 15-year-old native of Gujarat. The incident occurred when the two boys went to take a holy bath in Ashta Teertha. Prakash unfortunately slipped into the river, and Saksham attempted to rescue him. However, both were swept away by the strong currents of the flooded river. The Gangapur police visited the spot and managed to recover the bodies on Wednesday. We also published the following articles recently Maha native falls in river at Khandola, dies Santosh Vaman Korgaonkar, 48, originally from Dombivali, Maharashtra, passed away after falling into a river in the Mandovi basin at Khandola. His body, found in a decomposed state near a sluice gate, was identified by his cousin Brijesh Haldankar. Police suspect he slipped while crossing the gate. An unnatural death case has been registered. Man swept away in Jodhpur's flooded road, body recovered After two days of continuous rain, several villages in Luni tehsil of Jodhpur district were submerged, leading to flooding and disruptions. A man named Bhagchand was swept away while crossing a flooded road, and his body was recovered after a 15-hour search. SDRF divers rescued 15 villagers trapped by water overflow from...

title: 5 early rookie standouts of preseason: Caleb Williams wasn't the only one who impressed
creator: Yahoo Sports
content: Preseason football was back in full force this past weekend, with a ton of rookies getting their first shot at being real NFL players. Unfortunately, one rookie quarterback is already with a meniscus tear after a strong debut, but there was still a lot to be excited about and look forward to this season as far as rookies are concerned. Here are five rookies who had performances that should make their fans excited for the upcoming season. Can’t have a list like this without starting with Williams. He looked every bit the part of a player who has been discussed as a potential No. 1 draft pick since he was a senior in high school. He was accurate, took chances down the field and made a couple of dazzling plays that should have every NFL fan excited to see where his rookie year takes off. Notable: a third-down throw to , the dart along the sideline as he was rolling right, the contorted motion on the screen to . In a very small sample of plays, NFL fans got their first taste of the Caleb Williams experience. He’s going to have some rough games along the way as he tests the limits of what’s possible in the NFL, but his first action couldn’t have gone better for him or the Bears. It’s not very often a 340-pound offensive tackle moves from right to left tackle, but that's exactly what the Titans are going to be asking from their first-round pick from this year. So far, so good for...

title: Cinépolis te sorprenderá: Descubre el regalo oculto en el reestreno de Coraline
creator: César Eduardo Torres Vargas
content: Suscríbete a Merca2.0. están por cumplir 15 años de su estreno en los cines, está obra clásica de la animación stop-motion llegará exclusivamente a , remasterizada y en 3D para que puedan los fanáticos vivir una experiencia de otra dimensión. Asimismo fue revelado que Ximena Sariñana asistió sorpresivamente a una proyección de la película, lo que sorprendió a sus fans, aunque mucho se habló si habría coleccionables, lo cierto es que no hay ninguno confirmado por la cadena de cines, sin embargo si habrá un recuerdo para los asistentes al reestreno el cuál estará disponible solo en algunas salas del país. Un usuario en TikTok conocido por mostrar spoilers de promocionales y otros cinepolitos revelaron que aquellos que asistan a las proyecciones del reestreno, se les otorgará una postal conmemorativa coleccionable, la cuál es muy llamativa por su diseño extraño pero llamativo, por lo que le piden a los asistentes que las pidan. Asimismo comentan que una vez que se compra el boleto en taquilla se debe entregar la postal y sino es así debe recordarse a la gente que atiende que proporcionen el coleccionable. En el año 2009, el mundo del cine de animación se maravilló con el estreno de “Coraline y la Puerta Secreta”, una película que nos invitaba a explorar un universo paralelo lleno de magia y misterio. title: Zelenski advierte que las tropas ucranianas se están adentrando cada vez más en Rusia
content: Las tropas ucranianas siguen su incursión en el territorio ruso de Kursk, por lo que el presidente ucraniano, Volodímir Zelenski, dijo que las tropas ucranianas se están adentrando más en Rusia, mientras el mayor ataque transfronterizo de Kiev se prolonga por segunda semana. El ejército ucraniano entró en la región rusa de Kursk el 6 de agosto, capturando decenas de asentamientos en la mayor ofensiva de un ejército extranjero en suelo ruso desde la Segunda Guerra Mundial. “En la región de Kursk, estamos avanzando más. De uno a dos kilómetros (0.6 a 1.2 millas) en diferentes áreas desde el comienzo del día” , dijo Zelenski, añadiendo que las fuerzas ucranianas habían capturado más de 100 soldados rusos. El Ministro del Interior, Igor Klymenko, dijo que Ucrania crearía una “zona de amortiguación” en la región para impedir ataques transfronterizos rusos. Meeting on the situation in the Kursk region. We discussed key issues: security, humanitarian aid, and, if necessary, the establishment of military commandant’s offices. Ukraine is defending itself and the lives of its people in border communities while also taking active steps... pic.twitter.com/fdECTBzhPD “La creación de una zona de amortiguamiento en la región de Kursk es un paso para proteger a nuestras comunidades fronterizas de los bombardeos hostiles diarios”, afirmó. title: East Bengal go down fighting
content: Kolkata: East Bengal FC ’s return to Asian football after nine years might not have gone according to the script, but Carles Cuadrat’s team did present a credible case of being a force in the days to come at the Salt Lake Stadium on Wednesday. East Bengal sparkled, took the lead, had a goal disallowed and fought tooth and nail before going down 2-3 to Turkmenistan’s Altyn Asyr FC in the AFC Champions League-2 ’s one-off preliminary qualifier. The city side is now slated to play in the Challengers Cup, the third tier of the AFC tournaments. When David Lalhlansanga gave the home team a seventh-minute lead, the stage looked set for East Bengal to script another odds-defying tale. But the visitors from Turkmenistan showed why they are a regular in Asian football, Myrat Annayev (18) and Nurmyradov Selim (27) scoring in quick succession to go into the break with a 2-1 lead. They swelled the lead further soon after the break, Annayev laying it for Mihail Titov to tap in and make it 3-1 in the 52nd minute. Game over? No way. Saul Crespo produced a moment of magic, dodging past three rivals before beating the rival goalkeeper with a sumptuous finish to reduce the margin to 2-3. The arrival of Dimitrios Diamantakos and Cleiton Silva injected more firepower in East Bengal’s ambitions and when Cleiton pushed the ball in after Altyn goalkeeper Batyr Babayev failed to control the ball...

title: गढूळ पाणी पुरवठय़ामुळे मुंबईकरांचे आरोग्य धोक्यात, आदित्य ठाकरेंकडून पोलखोल
creator: सामना ऑनलाईन
content: मुंबईत गेल्या अनेक दिवसांपासून मुंबईकरांना पालिकेकडून गढूळ आणि अशुद्ध पाणी पुरवठा केला जात आहे. यामुळे मुंबईकरांचे आरोग्य धोक्यात आले आहे. शिवाय काही ठिकाणी पाणी पुरवठाही विस्कळीत असल्यामुळे नागरिकांना मनस्ताप सहन करावा लागत आहे. त्यामुळे पालिकेने याबाबत तातडीने कार्यवाही करून मुंबईकरांना शुद्ध आणि पुरेशा पाण्याचा पुरवठा करावा, अशी मागणी शिवसेना नेते-युवासेना प्रमुख आदित्य ठाकरे यांनी केली. मुंबईत गेल्या अनेक दिवसांपासून काही भागात गढूळ आणि अशुद्ध पाणी येत आहे. याबाबत पालिकेसह लोकप्रतिनिधींकडे दररोज शेकडोंच्या संख्येने तक्रारी दाखल होत आहेत. एकतर उन्हाळय़ात मुंबईकरांना पाणी कमी मिळालेच. ऐन पावसाळ्यातही पाणी पुरवठा विस्कळीत झाल्याने पालिकेच्या कार्यक्षमेतवर प्रश्नचिन्ह निर्माण झाले आहे. त्यामुळे आता पालिका आयुक्त-प्रशासक भूषण गगराणी यांनी स्वतः याबाबत पत्रकार परिषद घेऊन खुलासा करावा, अशी मागणीही आदित्य ठाकरे यांनी ‘एक्स’वर केली आहे. शुद्ध पाणी पुरवठा आणि नियमित पाणी पुरवठा केला नाही तर संतप्त मुंबईकर पालिकेला जाब विचारल्याशिवाय राहणार नाही, असा इशाराही आदित्य ठाकरे यांनी दिला आहे.

title: 苹果 macOS 15 Sequoia 降低屏幕录制权限弹窗频率,改为每月一次
content: IT之家 8 月 15 日消息,苹果在最新版的 macOS 15 Sequoia 测试版中调整了屏幕录制权限的隐私提示弹窗频率。此前苹果计划每周向用户弹窗一次,要求授予屏幕录制权限。 但在 macOS Sequoia Beta 6 中,苹果改变了这一策略, 将弹窗频率调整为每月一次,并且不再要求用户在每次重启 Mac 后重新授权。 苹果最初的每周弹窗授权计划引发了大量 Mac 用户的反对,苹果似乎听取了这些反馈,决定将授权期限延长至一个月作为折中方案。 据IT之家了解,在 macOS Sequoia Beta 6 中,用户会看到一条新的弹窗提示:“[应用名称] 请求绕过系统隐私窗口选择器,直接访问您的屏幕和音频。这将允许 [应用名称] 录制您的屏幕和系统音频,包括可能可见或可听的个人或敏感信息。” 用户可以选择“允许一个月”或点击“打开系统设置”直接进入屏幕录制权限设置面板。 需要注意的是,这一变化目前仅限于 macOS Sequoia 15.0 Beta 6 和最新的公开测试版,尚未在 macOS Sequoia 15.1 测试版中实施。 苹果尚未详细说明开发者是否可以使用 API 或权限来阻止他们的应用每月显示此弹窗。多位开发者向 9to5Mac 表示,即使是使用 macOS 12 引入的新框架 ScreenCaptureKit 的应用也会受到影响。 这一变化将对众多应用产生影响,包括第三方截图工具(如 CleanShotX)以及 WebEx、Discord、Zoom 和 Slack 等共享屏幕的应用。使用屏幕录制权限的其他应用,如菜单栏工具 Bartender,也将受到影响。 广告声明:文内含有的对外跳转链接(包括不限于超链接、二维码、口令等形式),用于传递更多信息,节省甄选时间,结果仅供参考,IT之家所有文章均包含本声明。

title: oOh!media appoints Emmalee Crellin to head of data sales role
creator: Tess Connery
content: oOh!media has appointed Emmalee Crellin to the newly-created role of head of data sales. Crellin will be responsible for leading the company’s data-led campaign solutions, managing client interactions with the network, and helping brands achieve advertising objectives. Working within the sales support team and reporting to Ivan Gridchin , group director – product, data sales, and solutions, Crellin will be in-market championing oOh!’s exclusive out of home data agreement with Unpacked by Flybuys, as well as the partnership with Westpac DataX. Paul Sigaloff , chief revenue and growth officer at oOh!, said Crellin’s appointment “reinforces our leadership position in delivering measurable, data-led campaigns” as well as “our ongoing commitment to ensure advertising and agency partners have access to the most premium audience spending data and insights.” Crellin joins the company after more than five years at Yahoo , where she worked as a senior data and insights strategist, overseeing the commercial data strategy and key growth drivers for this business across Australia and New Zealand. “She brings a wealth of knowledge from her previous data strategy roles, and working collaboratively with our sales team, will guide clients towards effective, sophisticated, data-driven buying practices,” Sigaloff added. Speaking about her new role, Crellin said: “The opportunity to transform and...

title: बरकतउल्ला विश्वविद्यालय:नाम के पहले कोई संबोधन नहीं लगेगा
content: बरकतउल्ला विश्वविद्यालय आगामी जारी की जाने वाली मार्कशीट, उपाधि और अन्य सर्टिफिकेट में नाम के पहले लगाए जाने वाले संबोधन श्री, श्रीमती, कुमारी आदि को विलोपित कर दिया है। नोटिफिकेशन तारीख के पहले अगर को विद्यार्थी नाम के पहले लगे संबोधन विलोपित करवाना चाहें तो उन्हें ऑनलाइन आवेदन करना होगा। बीयू के अधिकारियों ने बताया कि संबोधन की वजह से वैरिफिकेशन में समस्या आती है। खासकर जो छात्र विदेश अध्ययन या नौकरी के लिए आवेदन करते हैं उन्हें परेशानी होती है। इस वजह से अब नाम के आगे कोई संबोधन नहीं लगाया जाएगा। संबोधन लगे नामों को सर्च करना भी मुश्किल होता है इस वजह से आवेदन करने वाले अभ्यर्थी को भी समस्या होती है।

title: 못 걷고 말투 어눌해지다 사망...‘4대째 저주’ 걸린 20대 女의 사연
creator: 매일경제
content: 4대째 내려오고 있는 유전병 ‘헌팅턴병’에 걸린 20대 영국 여성 사연이 전해졌다. 15일 영국 매체 더선에 따르면 영국에 사는 샬롯 컨(27)은 최근 증조할머니를 비롯 외할머니와 어머니까지 걸린 헌팅턴병 진단을 받았다. 이 병은 뇌 신경계에 영향을 줘 인지‧성격 장애, 어눌한 말투 등 증상이 나타나다가 결과적으로 사망에 이르게 되는 유전병이다. 샬롯의 외할머니는 2002년 진단 후 약 20년 동안 투병생활을 하다가 2021년 사망했다. 사망 전 그의 외할머니는 말하기, 먹기, 걷기 등 일상생활에 어려움을 겪었다. 샬롯의 어머니도 2004년에 같은 질병을 진단받은 상태다. 이 모든 모습을 지켜본 샬롯은 “나도 언젠가 이 병에 걸릴 것이란 생각이 들었다. 가족이 서서히 죽어가는 모습을 봐 왔는데, 이젠 내 차례인 것 같다”고 말했다. 결국 외할머니의 죽음 후 샬롯은 2023년 유전자 검사를 받았다. 그 결과 샬롯은 헌팅턴병을 유발하는 유전자가 양성인 것으로 나타났다. 당장 증상은 없지만 앞으로 헌팅턴병에 걸릴 가능성이 높다는 사실에 샬롯의 가족은 큰 충격을 받았다. 샬롯의 어머니는 비명을 지를 정도로 큰 충격을 받았고, 그의 약혼자는 눈물을 흘렸다. 샬롯은 “내 소식을 듣고 엄마가 지른 비명을 절대 잊을 수 없다”면서도 “진단 후 인생이 얼마나 아름다운지 알게 됐다”고 전했다. 그는 “아는 게 힘이라고 이...

title: Cómo recuperar la planta seca o marchita en simples pasos
creator: Napsix
content: Si sos amante del jardín, seguramente te pasó que se han muerto las plantas que más querías y daban flores en cualquier momento del año debido a que no le pudiste dedicar mucho tiempo. Si embargo, se pueden recuperar y volver a disfrutar de su vista. La falta de agua es uno de los motivos por las cuales suelen marchitarse. Si la tierra está demasiado seca, las raíces no pueden absorber los nutrientes necesarios y las hojas comienzan a marchitarse y secarse. Por otro lado, un suelo pobre en nutrientes o demasiado compacto dificulta la absorción de agua y nutrientes por parte de las raíces. Al mismo tiempo, muchas plantas no toleran la luz solar directa durante largas horas. El exceso de sol puede quemar las hojas y secar la planta . Así puedes revivir las plantas muertas en el jardín. Fuente: archivo. Existen diferentes maneras de revivir las plantas muertas o marchitas que están en el jardín, algunas de ellas son: El abono estimula la producción de flores y frutos, aumentando la cantidad y la calidad de la cosecha. Las plantas necesitan nutrientes para realizar sus funciones vitales como la fotosíntesis, el crecimiento de raíces, tallos y hojas, la producción de flores y frutos. title: Украинские ДРГ повсюду, а россияне стягивают резервы: как идут бои в Курской области (карты)
content: У россиян не получается выбить ВСУ из Курской области Бои в Курской области продолжаются, а диверсионные группы Сил обороны Украины продолжают наносить внезапные удары. При этом россияне не смогли отбросить ВСУ от Суджи и Коренево. Об этом сообщил военный корреспондент Богдан Мирошников в своем telegram-канале. По его словам, у украинцев успехов больше, чем у россиян. Журналист отметил, что российские оккупанты продолжают собирать резервы "отовсюду", но это не мешает ВСУ поддерживать фланги на основных участках прорыва. Мирошников также добавил, что ДРГ действуют в разных местах Курской области, однако не стоит их путать с основными силами. Вечером 14 августа в сети появились три карты возможной ситуации в Курской области, однако ко всем стоит относиться со скептицизмом. В частности консервативную оценку дал украинский ресурс DeepState, однако он публикует данные с задержкой в несколько дней. Еще две были обнародованы в Z-каналах, они оба сходятся на том, что украинские войска стоят под Коренево. Однако один из них утверждает, что ВСУ двигаются на северо-запад от Суджи в сторону Снагости, а второй уже отдал Украине населенный пункт Гирьи на юго-восток от изначального места начала операции и Большое Солдатское на северо-востоке. Напомним, что ВСУ прорвали российскую границу 6 августа, но официально атаку Украина признала лишь спустя почти неделю. 13 августа...

title: Ideb: rede estadual do RJ sofre queda em avaliação
content: Em 2021, o Ideb foi de 3,9 e, no ano passado, caiu para 3,3 - bem distante da meta estabelecida para essa faixa de ensino, que é de 4,6. Além disso, as escolas estaduais do Rio de Janeiro têm o pior Ideb no ensino médio da Região Sudeste, atrás de Minas Gerais, São Paulo e Espírito Santo. Situação da capital Já a rede municipal do Rio apresentou uma melhora, mas ainda sem atingir a meta. Para os anos iniciais, que vão do primeiro ao quinto do ensino fundamental, as escolas municipais estão com índice 6, acima dos 5,4 de 2021, mas ainda inferior à meta de 6,4 . As escolas que oferecem ensino fundamental dos anos finais, do sexto ao nono, ficaram com índice 5,2 - acima da nota 5 de três anos atrás, mas abaixo da meta de 5,7. A prefeitura ressaltou que obteve o maior crescimento percentual na nota (+12%) da avaliação que compõe o Ideb (Índice de Desenvolvimento da Educação Básica) entre todas as capitais do Brasil. (veja no fim da reportagem mais detalhes). Bom exemplo em Santa Cruz Entre as escolas com melhor desempenho na capital está a Escola Municipal Roberto Coelho, em Santa Cruz, que atende turmas do primeiro ao quinto ano do ensino fundamental. A unidade que tinha atingido nota 6,2 no ideb de 2021, agora conseguiu nota 8,5. Esse salto foi conquistado com o esforço de toda a comunidade escolar. Iniciativas que uniram professores, alunos e as...

title: Panipat News: डेंटल सर्जन दो घंटे की पेन डाउन हड़ताल पर रहे
content: पानीपत। डेंटल चिकित्सकों ने हरियाणा सिविल डेंटल सर्जन एसोसिएशन के बैनर तले ने बुधवार दो घंटे की पेन डाउन हड़ताल रखी। उन्होंने सुबह 11 से दोपहर एक बजे तक काम नहीं किया। डेंटल चिकित्सक 16 अगस्त को व्रत रखकर मरीजों का इलाज करेंगे। 17 अगस्त को प्रदेशभर के डेंटल सर्जन कुरुक्षेत्र में कैंडल मार्च निकालेंगे। 22 अगस्त को सामूहिक हड़ताल पर रहेंगे। 23 अगस्त को डेंटल सर्जन सिर्फ अपना काम करेंगे। 24 अगस्त को सिविल सर्जन कार्यालय के सामने डेंटल सर्जन हड़ताल पर बैठेंगे। एचसीडीएस के जिलाध्यक्ष डॉ. मनीष पासी ने कहा कि उन्होंने पिछले 16 सालों से लंबित मांगों को पूरा करवाने के लिए गांधीवादी तरीके से आवाज उठाई है। मेडिकल ऑफिसर और डेंटल सर्जन एक ही छत के नीचे एक जैसा काम करते हैं, लेकिन उनका वेतनमान अलग-अलग है। इसके साथ ही उन्होंने एसीपी में भेदभाव किया गया है। मेडिकल ऑफिसर को क्लास वन व डेंटल सर्जन को क्लास द्वितीय अधिकारी माना जाता है। डेंटल सर्जन को पांच साल में 100 प्रतिशत वेतन, 11 साल में 25 प्रतिशत वेतन तथा 17 साल बाद तीसरी एसीपी में मात्र 20 प्रतिशत वेतन मिल रहा है। उन्हें डॉक्टर ही नहीं माना जाता। उन्हें लगता है कि बीडीएस की पढ़ाई एमबीबीएस के मुकाबले काफी सरल है। हरियाणा के आसपास के सभी राज्यों जैसे दिल्ली, हिमाचल प्रदेश, पंजाब, राजस्थान आदि में मेडिकल ऑफिसर और डेंटल सर्जन एक ही वेतनमान पर काम कर रहे हैं, लेकिन हरियाणा में ऐसा नहीं है। डेंटल सर्जन के बाद प्रमोशन में सीनियर डेंटल सर्जन और डिप्टी सिविल सर्जन का ही पद है और उसके बाद डायरेक्टर, जबकि लंबे समय से मांग चल रही है कि उनके लिए...

title: Pedro Pierluisi responde: ¿cuándo empiezan las clases y cuándo los empleados públicos vuelven a sus labores?
creator: Gloria Ruiz Kuilan
content: Tras el paso de la tormenta tropical Ernesto, el gobernador indicó que aún permanecen 229 personas refugiadas en 48 escuelas 14 de agosto de 2024 - 7:22 PM Nota del editor: te invitamos a mantenerte bien informado. Accede libre de costo a las noticias y actualizaciones relacionadas con el huracán Ernesto. Gracias por apoyar el periodismo responsable. Suscríbete hoy. --- Lo que debes de saber: --- El gobernador Pedro Pierluisi anunció este miércoles que las clases en el sistema público de enseñanza, pospuestas por el paso de la tormenta tropical Ernesto, que ahora es huracán, comenzarán el viernes, pero el personal docente y no docente debe acudir a trabajar mañana, jueves. En el caso de los empleados públicos, solo deben acudir a trabajar el jueves aquellos que son de primera respuesta. “La decisión que hemos tomado en cuanto al gobierno es que en el día de mañana, el personal esencial, es decir, de respuesta, debe acudir a sus respectivos lugares de trabajo en el gobierno. De igual manera, el personal que se dedica a la conservación de facilidades debe acudir a trabajar mañana y los funcionarios gerenciales también están llamados a rendir servicios en el día de mañana”, sostuvo el primer ejecutivo, en una conferencia de prensa en el Centro de Operaciones de Emergencias del Negociado de Manejo de Emergencias y Administración de Desastres (NMEAD). “Esto lo...

title: Sekjen PDIP Tepis Anggapan Sulit Cari Mitra Koalisi di Pilkada 2024
creator: Erik Purnama Putra
content: REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, JAKARTA -- Sekretaris Jenderal DPP PDIP Hasto Kristiyanto membantah narasi yang mengungkap partai berlambang banteng moncong putih tersebut kesulitan mencari rekan parpol lain untuk diajak bekerja sama pada Pilkada Serentak 2024. Hal itu terjadi khususnya pada sejumlah pemilihan gubernur (pilgub). Hasto menyampaikan, PDIP sudah mengumumkan 305 calon kepala daerah (cakada) untuk kontestasi politik pada 2024. Hal itu menandakan tak ada masalah dengan PDIP "Buktinya hari ini 305 kami calonkan," kata Hasto di kantor DPP PDIP, Jalan Diponegoro, Jakarta Pusat, Rabu (14/8/2024). Hasto menyebut, PDIP percaya terhadap kekuatan arus balik dari rakyat bakal muncul ketika kekuasaan menghambat suara arus bawah dalam kontestasi politik. Dia mengeklaim, PDIP menerima aspirasi rakyat dalam menentukan calon. "Kalau ada yang menggunakan kekuasaan untuk menghambat suara rakyat, akan ada arus balik. Itu yang tidak diinginkan oleh PDI Perjuangan. Kami tetap menjaga persatuan, kesatuan bangsa, keharmonisan kita sebagai keluarga besar," kata Hasto. Dia pun menegaskan, kader PDIP diarahkan untuk berani dalam menegakkan kebenaran seperti menjadi ajaran Proklamator RI Sukarno dan Ketua Umum Megawati Soekarnoputri. Khusus Megawati, kata Hasto, selalu menggembleng untuk berani menegakkan kebenaran melawan intimidasi. "Dalam menegakkan kebenaran, kami diajarkan untuk berani. Tidak perlu...

title: ВООЗ оголосила глобальну надзвичайну ситуацію
content: Всесвітня організація охорони здоров'я визнала спалах мавпячої віспи (mpox) в Африці "надзвичайною ситуацією міжнародного значення в галузі охорони здоров'я". Про це у середу, 14 серпня, повідомляє Reuters . "Очевидно, що для припинення цих спалахів та порятунку життів необхідні скоординовані міжнародні заходи реагування", - заявив генеральний директор ВООЗ Тедрос Аданом Гебрейєсус. Він додав, що для боротьби з новим спалахом mpox ВООЗ вже виділила $1,5 млн і планує виділити ще найближчими днями. Загалом підготовлений організацією план боротьби з інфекцією вимагатиме $15 млн, у зв'язку з чим ВООЗ має намір звернутися за фінансуванням донорів. "Виявлення і швидке поширення нового штаму mpox на сході Демократичної Республіки Конго, його виявлення в сусідніх країнах, де раніше не повідомлялося про mpox, і потенційна можливість подальшого поширення в Африці та за її межами викликають велику тривогу", - зазначив Гебрейєсус. У Конго нещодавно було зафіксовано новий спалах віспи мавп, який незабаром поширився на сусідні країни, включаючи Бурунді, Кенію, Руанду та Уганду. Африканський центр з контролю та профілактики захворювань (Africa CDC) був змушений оголосити надзвичайну ситуацію в галузі охорони здоров'я на континенті (PHECS). Віспа мавп - це вірусне захворювання, вперше виявлене в 1958 році. Симптоми включають температуру, болі у м'язах, характерний висип та...

title: 【速報】自民総裁選で注目される小泉進次郎氏と小林鷹之氏が靖国に参拝
content: 終戦の日の15日、東京・九段北の靖国神社には、9月の自民党総裁選の対応が注目される小泉進次郎元環境相、小林鷹之前経済安保相が参拝した。 岸田首相が9月の総裁選に立候補しない方針を表明する中、自民党内では、小泉、小林両氏を推す声が出ている。 また、小林氏は参拝後、記者団に対し、岸田首相の不出馬表明を「重く受け止めている」とした上で、「党改革を後退させることがないよう一人一人が頑張っていかないといけない」と述べた自身の総裁選出馬については、「今は政治家としての力を高めることに尽きる」と述べ、明言しなかった。 フジテレビ報道局が全国、世界の重要ニュースから身近な話題まで様々な情報を速報・詳報含めて発信します。 日本の将来を占う政治の動向。内政問題、外交問題などを幅広く、かつ分かりやすく伝えることをモットーとしております。 総理大臣、官房長官の動向をフォローする官邸クラブ。平河クラブは自民党、公明党を、野党クラブは、立憲民主党、国民民主党、日本維新の会など野党勢を取材。内閣府担当は、少子化問題から、宇宙、化学問題まで、多岐に渡る分野を、細かくフォローする。外務省クラブは、日々刻々と変化する、外交問題を取材、人事院も取材対象となっている。政界から財界、官界まで、政治部の取材分野は広いと言えます。

title: Shares of Trump's media firm near record low following his return to X
content: (Reuters) - Shares of former U.S. President Donald Trump's media company dipped and neared record lows on Wednesday, following weak quarterly results and the Republican presidential candidate's return to social media platform X. Trump's dwindling lead in polls and election betting markets in recent weeks has also hit the stock, which has been seen by some retail traders as a bet on whether Trump would win a second term. Trump majority owns Trump Media & Technology Group, whose main asset is the Truth Social app popular among some conservatives. On Tuesday, Trump marked his return to X with an interview with the platform owner Elon Musk. Twitter suspended Trump's account in January 2021, but it was reinstated by Musk in 2022 after he bought the site and took it private. The former president has made several posts in recent days. As many as 1.3 million people tuned in to the lengthy conversation where the pair discussed topics ranging from the assassination attempt on Trump to geopolitics and the economy. The fact that the conversation took place on X instead of Trump's rival platform Truth Social highlighted to investors that the latter remains a niche player in the social media landscape, analysts said. "The decision to broadcast the chat with Musk on X was something of a slap in the face for Trump investors who must be feeling rather unloved and a little disrespected," said...

title: Nhiều dự án giao thông TPHCM về đích năm 2024
content: Cuối năm nay, người dân TPHCM được đi metro Theo Ban Quản lý đường sắt đô thị TPHCM (MAUR - chủ đầu tư), tuyến Metro số 1 (Bến Thành - Suối Tiên) đã thi công đạt hơn 98,31%. Mới đây, Phó Thủ tướng Trần Hồng Hà yêu cầu UBND TPHCM chịu trách nhiệm chỉ đạo các cơ quan, đơn vị liên quan tiếp tục chủ động, tích cực giải quyết tồn tại, vướng mắc, khiếu kiện của các nhà thầu, triển khai hoàn thành các công việc, nội dung, thủ tục, nỗ lực phấn đấu đưa tuyến Metro số 1 vào khai thác thương mại trong tháng 11 năm nay. Tuy vậy, ông Nguyễn Quốc Hiển - Phó Trưởng ban phụ trách MAUR - cho biết, tuyến Metro số 1 không thể đưa vào khai thác trong tháng 11 tới, bởi theo kế hoạch của nhà thầu Hitachi, đến tháng 11, đơn vị này mới có thể hoàn thành vận hành khai thác thử. Sau đó, bàn giao cho phía Việt Nam để phục vụ công tác nghiệm thu, rồi gửi hồ sơ lên Hội đồng thẩm định Nhà nước để thẩm định cấp chứng nhận an toàn hệ thống theo quy định. “Nhanh nhất, toàn bộ các công đoạn này cũng phải chiếm khoảng 1 tháng. Theo cam kết của các nhà thầu Nhật Bản, tuyến Metro số 1 sẽ hoàn thành vào tháng cuối cùng của năm 2024 và đưa vào...

title: Українські ДРГ всюди, а росіяни стягують резерви: як точаться бої в Курській області (мапи)
content: Росіянам не вдається вибити ЗСУ з Курської області Бої в Курській області продовжуються, а диверсійні групи Сил оборони України продовжують завдавати раптових ударів. При цьому росіяни не змогли відкинути ЗСУ від Суджі та Коренево. Про це повідомив воєнний кореспондент Богдан Мірошников у своєму telegram-каналі. За його словами, в українців успіхів більший, ніж у росіян. Журналіст зазначив, що російські окупанти продовжують збирати резерви "звідусіль", але це не заважає ЗСУ підтримувати фланги на основних ділянках прориву. Мірошников також додав, що ДРГ діють у різних місцях Курської області, проте не варто їх плутати з основними силами. Увечері 14 серпня у мережі з’явилися три карти можливої ситуації в Курській області, проте до всіх варто ставитись зі скептицизмом. Зокрема, консервативну оцінку дав український ресурс DeepState, проте він публікує дані із затримкою у кілька днів. Ще дві були оприлюднені у Z-каналах, вони обидва сходяться на тому, що українські війська стоять під Коренево. Однак один із них стверджує, що ЗСУ рухаються на північний захід від Суджі у бік Снагості, а другий уже віддав Україні населений пункт Гір’ї на південний схід від початкового місця початку операції та Велике Солдатське на північному сході. Нагадаємо, що ЗСУ прорвали російський кордон 6 серпня, але офіційно атаку Україна визнала лише майже через тиждень. 13...

title: State expanding wind energy terminal in New Bedford
creator: Colin A. Young
content: The quasi-public Massachusetts Clean Energy Center announced plans Wednesday to expand its offshore wind staging and deployment facility in New Bedford, including the acquisition of four abutting parcels to expand the working area and better organize the facility’s layout. MassCEC said it has committed $45 million in funding for the project at the 30-acre New Bedford Marine Commerce Terminal, which is currently in use as the staging and preassembly port for the Vineyard Wind 1 project. The center said the expansion project “is needed to maintain and increase Massachusetts’ competitiveness in the emerging offshore wind industry by providing facilities that will support the anticipated increased demand for port facilities that can deploy the larger, heavier turbine parts as proposed by offshore wind facilities.” “As the offshore wind industry grows and expands, so does Massachusetts’ port infrastructure. Throughout its history, the Port of New Bedford has served as a nexus of New England’s economy, from whaling, to fishing, to offshore wind,” Governor Maura Healey said. “The investments in and expansion of the port will help maintain Massachusetts’ global leadership in offshore wind.” Advertisement In addition to absorbing four next-door properties, the expansion project will include the relocation and construction of a new office and warehouse building, the redevelopment of an...

title: Ravi C. Shankar: A real community
creator: Letters To The Editor
content: As much as and as often as people complain about this and that in the city and community (including me sometimes!) a larger number of neighbors turned out at several well attended and organized National Night Out earlier this month. The Vallejo Police Department sent its representative officers, led by VPOA’s Capt. Ramrakha. Mayor McConnell and his key staff like the new Planning Commission Director attended at most locations. Candidates running for office like Dwight Munroe, myself, Pippin Dew and Andrea Source, and Cookie Gordon were greeted by Pastor Harris and his dedicated, passionate “Emmanuel Army” who made it all run smoothly, while children and youth played hoops and football. We need to come together as often as realistically possible, getting away from zoom, cell phones, iPads and social media for a couple of hours to be with and feel real community. Come enjoy all these with your family and friends. There is always something good happening in town. — Ravi C. Shankar/Vallejo

title: Northland Power Reports Second Quarter 2024 Results
creator: GlobeNewswire
content: Baltic Power, Hai Long and Oneida projects continue to make construction progress TORONTO, Aug. 14, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — Northland Power Inc. ( or the ) (TSX: ) reported today financial results for the three and six months ended June 30, 2024. All dollar amounts set out herein are in thousands of Canadian dollars, unless otherwise stated. “Northland’s strong performance in the second quarter has contributed to solid results for the first half of 2024, largely driven by high wind resource at our offshore wind facilities,” said John Brace, Northland’s Executive Chair. “We also continue to make progress on the construction of our two offshore wind projects in Taiwan and Poland, and our energy storage project in Canada. The execution of these three projects remains our top priority as we focus on their safe and successful delivery. At the same time, we remain active in pursuing various development opportunities in core markets across our 9GW development pipeline. We are also happy to report we completed the sale of our interest in the La Lucha Solar Facility in Mexico.” Financial results for the three months ended June 30, 2024, were higher compared to the same quarter of 2023, primarily due to higher wind resource across all offshore wind facilities, contribution from the New York onshore wind projects that achieved commercial operations in October 2023 and higher revenue from...

title: '13년째 선행' 송혜교X서경덕, 광복절 맞아 몽골에 '이태준 안내서' 기증 [공식]
creator: 정유나 기자
content: [스포츠조선닷컴 정유나 기자] 광복절을 맞아 배우 송혜교와 서경덕 성신여대 교수가 의기투합해 몽골 울란바토르에 위치한 '이태준 기념관'에 안내서 1만부를 기증했다고 밝혔다. 이번 안내서는 한국어와 몽골어로 제작됐으며, 현재는 이태준 임시 기념관에 비치가 되어 있고 향후 새롭게 오픈할 이태준 기념관에도 비치될 예정이다. 안내서의 주요 내용은 이태준의 항일독립운동 및 몽골에서의 활동, 이태준 기념공원, 이태준 가묘, 생애 등을 상세히 소개하고 있다. 이번 일을 기획한 서 교수는 "몽골을 방문하는 한국인 관광객이 늘어나는 요즘 독립운동가 이태준을 널리 알릴 수 있는 적기라고 판단해 안내서를 기증했다"고 전했다. 또한 그는 "해외에 남아있는 대한민국 독립운동 유적지의 보존 상황이 썩 좋은 편은 아니다"라며 "우리 국민들의 지속적인 관심과 방문만이 해외에 있는 독립운동 유적지를 보존할 수 있는 가장 큰 힘이 될 것"이라고 강조했다. 아울러 몽골 울란바토르의 현장 방문이 어려운 상황이라면 웹사이트 '해외에서 만난 우리 역사 이야기'에서 원본 파일을 내려받아 사용하면 된다. 지난 13년간 서경덕 기획·송혜교 후원으로 해외에 남아있는 대한민국 독립운동 유적지에 한국어 안내서, 한글 간판, 독립운동가 부조작품 등을 37곳에 기증해 왔다. 특히 최근에는 정정화, 윤희순 등 대중에게 잘 알려지지...

title: Prayagraj News: बैनामा होने के बाद दोबारा जमीन का मूल्यांकन कर स्टाम्प शुल्क वसूली आदेश रद्द
content: इलाहाबाद हाईकोर्ट ने बैनामा होने के बाद दोबारा जमीन का मूल्यांकन कर स्टाम्प शुल्क वसूली के आदेश को रद्द कर दिया। साथ ही जमा कराई गई रकम चार प्रतिशत ब्याज सहित वापस करने का निर्देश दिया है। न्यायमूर्ति पीयूष अग्रवाल की अदालत ने कुशलपाल सिंह की याचिका पर अधिवक्ता तनीशा जहांगीर मुनीर को सुनकर यह आदेश दिया है। अलीगढ़ के याची ने एक प्लॉट का बैनामा कराया और उसके लिए देय स्टाम्प शुल्क का भुगतान किया। इसके बाद गयासुद्दीन नामक व्यक्ति की शिकायत पर उप रजिस्ट्रार ने बैनामा होने के बाद दोबारा जमीन की मूल्यांकन रिपोर्ट तैयारी की। उसी के आधार पर डीएम के आदेश से स्टाम्प कमी की वसूली कार्यवाही की गई। इसके तहत याची पर 20 लाख दो हजार 50 रुपये स्टाम्प कमी व 1.5 प्रतिशत प्रतिमाह जुर्माना लगाया गया। इसके खिलाफ अपील राजस्व परिषद लखनऊ ने खारिज कर दी। इसे हाईकोर्ट में चुनौती दी गई। याची वकील ने दलील दी कि बैनामा के बाद दोबारा जमीन का मूल्यांकन कर स्टाम्प कमी की वसूली नहीं की जा सकती। इस कार्यवाही में उप्र स्टाम्प संपत्ति मूल्यांकन एक्ट के प्रावधानों का पालन नहीं किया गया है। कोर्ट ने याचिका स्वीकार करते हुए दोबारा मूल्यांकन कर स्टाम्प कमी की वसूली आदेश को रद्द कर दिया।

title: В четырех регионах РФ прогнозируются сильные дожди
content: В ближайшие дни в четырех регионах России прогнозируются сильные осадки. В Свердловской области возможны подтопления, так как реки региона и соседние водоемы могут выйти из берегов, сообщил научный руководитель Гидрометцентра России Роман Вильфанд. «В Свердловской области ожидаются интенсивные дожди, которые будут длительными. Это повлияет как на реки Свердловской области, так и на соседние реки в Татарстане, где ситуация будет серьезной», — отметил он. По словам Вильфанда, в Бурятии сейчас наблюдается жаркая погода, но также ожидаются сильные дожди и усиление ветра до 24 м/с. Сильные ливни также ожидаются в Томской области и других близлежащих регионах Западной Сибири.

title: Motorists suffer due to delayed concrete road works in Sai Nagar
「世界での日本の役割変えた」と岸田氏を称賛 バイデン大統領が声明
content: 首相が退任の意向を示したことを受け、 米大統領は14日、「 を新たな高みに進め、世界での日本の役割を変容させた」との声明を出した。ロシアの侵攻を受ける への支援や の改善、新たな安全保障戦略などを岸田氏の成果として挙げた。 声明は、岸田氏の首相としての指導力を「まさに歴史的だ」とし、3年近い在任期間にバイデン政権の確固たる「グローバル・パートナー」として「自由で開かれたインド太平洋」の構想の推進などに協力した点を評価。「世界における日本の役割を変容させた」とした。 中国の軍事的台頭を念頭に新たな安全保障戦略を立てたことや、ウクライナ支援の増強も成果として列挙。また、韓国との関係を改善し、「日米韓関係を新たな時代に導く歴史的な措置をとった」と指摘した。そのうえで「岸田政権下で日米関係の未来はより強く明るくなった」とした。 岸田氏は今年4月に国賓待遇で米国に招かれ、米 上下両院の合同会議で演説したばかりだった。 ※無料期間中に解約した場合、料金はかかりません

title: सीट चार्ट जारी:नीट यूजी काउंसलिंग-2024... 4 नए मेडिकल कॉलेज शामिल, एमबीबीएस में बढ़ी 200 सीटें
content: मप्र स्टेट कंबाइंड नीट यूजी काउंसलिंग-2024 के लिए तहत बुधवार को चिकित्सा शिक्षा विभाग (डीएमई) ने सीट चार्ट जारी कर दिया है। सीट चार्ट के अनुसार इस बार एमबीबीएस की 4 हजार 486 सीटों के लिए काउंसलिंग होगी। पिछले वर्ष की अपेक्षा इस बार 200 सीट का इजाफा ह काउंसलिंग में चार नए मेडिकल कॉलेज शामिल हुए हैं। इसमें तीन सरकारी और एक प्राइवेट कॉलेज हैं। वहीं डीएमई ने सीट चार्ट पर आपत्ति दर्ज करने का अवसर भी दिया है। गुरुवार को आपत्ति दर्ज की जा सकती हैै। इसके बाद फाइनल सीट चार्ट जारी कर दिया है। वहीं बीडीएस की 1220 सीट हैं। खास बात यह है कि सीट चार्ट में डीएमई ने सुप्रीम कोर्ट के आदेश पर सरकारी स्कूल (जीएस) कोटे के स्टूडेंट्स को प्रवेश देने 7 सीट सीट रिजर्व कर दी हैं। ये ऐसे छात्र हैं जिन्हें गलत आरक्षण लागू करने के कारण पिछले साल की काउंसलिंग में प्रवेश नहीं मिल सका था। सरकारी कॉलेज सीट चार्ट... ये नए मेडिकल कॉलेज इस साल काउंसलिंग में नए मेडिकल कॉलेज में सुंदरलाल पटवा शासकीय मेडिकल कॉलेज मंदसौर, शासकीय मेडिकल कॉलेज सिवनी, वीरेंद्र कुमार सखलेचा शासकीय मेडिकल कॉलेज नीमच हैं। इनमें एमबीबीएस की 50-50 सीट हैं। इसके अलावा स्कूल ऑफ मेडिकल साइंस, श्री सत्य साईं यूनिवर्सिटी ऑफ टेक्नोलॉजी एंड मेडिकल साइंस सीहोर में 50 सीट बढ़ी हैं।

title: Suburban New York county bans masks meant to hide people's identities
creator: Canadian Press
content: MINEOLA, N.Y. (AP) — Suburban New York officials looking to stop violent protesters from obscuring their identities have banned wearing masks in public except for health or religious reasons. Nassau County Executive Bruce Blakeman, a Republican, signed the legislation Wednesday, calling it a “bill that protects the public.” Nassau County is on Long Island just east of New York City. The county's Republican-controlled Legislature approved the ban on face coverings on Aug. 5. Legislator Howard Kopel said lawmakers were responding to “antisemitic incidents, often perpetrated by those in masks” since the Oct. 7 start of the Israel-Hamas war. The law makes it a misdemeanor punishable by up to a year in jail and a $1,000 fine for anyone in Nassau to wear a face covering to hide their identity in public. It exempts people who wear masks "for health, safety, religious or cultural purposes, or for the peaceful celebration of a holiday or similar religious or cultural event for which masks or facial coverings are customarily worn.” Blakeman said that while mask-wearing campus protesters were the impetus for the ban, he sees the new law as a tool to fight everyday crime as well. “This is a broad public safety measure,” Blakeman said at a news conference. “What we've seen is people using masks to shoplift, to carjack, to rob banks, and this is activity we want to stop.” Advocates for...

title: Goldman Sachs, Morgan Stanley took stakes in US spot bitcoin ETFs in Q2, filings show
creator: Reuters
content: By Suzanne McGee (Reuters) - Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley purchased a total of more than $600 million in spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) during the second quarter, regulatory filings showed on Wednesday. The two banks joined a group of hedge funds and financial advisers that have waded into the products, which began trading in January 2024. Goldman Sachs said in its quarterly disclosure to the Securities and Exchange Commission, known as a 13-F filing, that it had acquired about $418 million in several of the recently launched ETFs tied to the price of spot bitcoin. Most of that sum reflected a stake of nearly 7 million shares in the iShares Bitcoin Trust, valued at about $238 million as of the end of the quarter, June 30. Goldman also took sizeable stakes in the Fidelity Wise Origin Bitcoin ETF and the Invesco Galaxy Bitcoin ETF, and smaller positions in several other bitcoin ETFs launched in January. Morgan Stanley also favored BlackRock's iShares bitcoin ETF, disclosing a 5.5 million share stake that was valued at $188 million as of June 30. The bank also disclosed smaller holdings in the Ark 21Shares Bitcoin ETF and Grayscale Bitcoin Trust. The 13F filings are one of the few ways to get a snapshot of how institutional investors are positioned at the end of every quarter. The positions may not reveal current holdings. While the latest round of filings show the...

title: Impostergable solucionar problemática de carretera Monterrey – Saltillo y del tramo Los Chorros: IP
creator: Ángel Aguilar
content: El presidente de COPARMEX Coahuila Sureste Alfredo López Villarreal aseguró que es impostergable la puesta en marcha de soluciones que permitan resolver de manera efectiva la situación que presentan la carretera Saltillo – Monterrey, tanto la autopista como la libre, y también del tramo Los Chorros de la Carretera Federal 57, ante el severo impacto que representa para las empresas de la región los constantes cierres de esas importantes vías de comunicación. El directivo señaló que dicha problemática fue discutida ampliamente durante la sesión mensual de socios de ese organismo empresarial, en la que además se acordó llevar a cabo reuniones con el Gobierno de Coahuila para la búsqueda de alternativas que ayuden a solucionar estos temas y se eviten las cuantiosas pérdidas que provoca al sector industrial el colapso recurrente de estas carreteras. Indicó que entre estas alternativas destaca la propuesta de ampliación de la carretera libre a Monterrey, dados los altos costos que representa la construcción de una tercera vía hacia la vecina ciudad. “Queremos plantear al Gobierno del Estado lo que tiene que ver con la Carretera 57, específicamente el tramo Los Chorros, así como también en la Carretera Saltillo – Monterrey y la Carretera a Zacatecas que requieren de una inversión sustancial, hay ciertas áreas ahí primordiales que se tienen que atender, por...

title: Bravos vuelven a superar a Gigantes en 10 innings
content: Travis d’Arnaud bateó un cuadrangular en los albores del encuentro y añadió un sencillo productor en el décimo capítulo, para que los Bravos de Atlanta superaran el martes 4-3 a los Gigantes de San Francisco. El dominicano Ramón Laureano envió también la bola al otro lado de la barda, mientras que Austin Riley aportó un par de sencillos para que Atlanta lograra su segunda victoria consecutiva en innings extra sobre San Francisco. Los Bravos vencieron 1-0 a los Gigantes en 10 entradas el lunes, en el primer duelo de la serie, con un elevado de sacrificio de D’Arnaud. El emergente Luke Williams comenzó el décimo capítulo como corredor automático. Con un out, D’Arnaud pegó una roleta por la derecha del cuadro. La pelota se desvió en el guante de Brett Wisely, quien se zambulló en busca de alcanzarla pero no evitó que se fuera al jardín derecho. En la parte baja del noveno capítulo, los Gigantes intentaron tocar la bola para llevar al corredor automático a la antesala. Sin embargo, se marcó una interferencia del bateador. Globos de LaMonte Wade Jr. y del boricua Heliot Ramos pusieron fin a las hostilidades. Dylan Lee (4-2) retiró a tres adversarios para agenciarse el triunfo. El cubano Raisel Iglesias resolvió el décimo inning para llegar a 25 rescates. Los Bravos (63-56) ampliaron a dos juegos su ventaja sobre los Mets de Nueva York en la lucha por el...
