title: De porrista de Independiente a la TV chilena: así está Yamila Reyna, la hija del cuartetero Sebastián
creator: Rocío Ledesma
content: El cuartetero Sebastián representa un ícono de la música popular de Córdoba y su legado forma parte de la cultura local . Como era de esperarse, su hija Yamila Reyna siguió sus pasos y desde hace más de 20 años forma parte del mundo del espectáculo . La mujer de 45 años emigró y realizó su carrera en Chile . Allí se desempeñó como actriz, comediante, conductora de televisión y hasta participó en certámenes importantes como Bailando por un Sueño. A principio de la década de 2000 , Yamila se mudó a Buenos Aires para estudiar. Allí formó parte de Las Diablitas, un grupo de forristas que alentaba en los entretiempos de los partidos de Independiente . En una gira que hizo con las animadoras, conoció Chile y decidió mudarse al país vecino. La pasión que movía a Yamila era la actuación y al inicio, le fue muy difícil conseguir trabajo en ese ámbito. Comenzó como extra en una novela y luego consiguió algunos papeles pequeños . Sin embargo, el antes y después de su carrera fue en 2013 . Ese año protagonizó un personaje argentino en una novela que tuvo bastante reconocimiento en Chile. A partir de allí consiguió papeles más grandes e incluso una vez le tocó hacer de cordobesa. Antes de la pandemia, Yamila se aventuró con un unipersonal de humor , en el que cuestionaba la vida cotidiana, la maternidad y el lenguaje. En paralelo, en 2020 se sumó a...

title: OMS declara emergencia internacional por nueva variante más letal de viruela del mono
content: La Organización Mundial de la Salud ha implementado la medida debido a la identificación de una variante del virus mpox más peligrosa. La Organización Mundial de la Salud (OMS) ha declarado una emergencia sanitaria internacional debido a una variante más peligrosa de la viruela del mono , detectada en África. Esta decisión se tomó después de que se registraran 15.000 casos y 461 muertes en 2024, cifras que han aumentado notablemente en comparación con el año anterior. Es la segunda vez en dos años que la OMS emite una alerta de este tipo. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Declaración de emergencia y recomendaciones Adhanom Tedros Ghebreyesus, director general de la OMS, expresó su preocupación en una rueda de prensa: “La detección y rápida propagación de una nueva variante de mpox (viruela del mono) en el este de la República Democrática del Congo, su detección en países vecinos que no la habían reportado anteriormente, y el potencial de una mayor propagación dentro de África y más allá es muy preocupante». Ghebreyesus también destacó que, ante los brotes en África, «una respuesta internacional coordinada es esencial para detener estos brotes y salvar vidas». title: 風評:拒中央出資救房,中國經濟續低更長
creator: 主筆室
content: 國際貨幣基金(IMF)日前出具報告,建議中國以「中央出資」方式挽救房地產,中國官方則直接否決此議,外媒指官方此舉「削弱外界對中國政府重振房市的希望」。不過,中國官方拒絕中央出資救房市的利弊遠比此複雜,雖有長利但恐讓中國經濟繼續走低。 [啟動LINE推播] 每日重大新聞通知 根據IMF本月初的一份報告,建議中央出資解決房市問題。具體而言,中國房市低迷不振的主要原因在過去建商擴充過快、舉債過鉅,房市繁榮時可收良性循環擴張之效;但一旦房市不再快速成長時,就陷入另一種收縮性的惡性循環:新房難賣、資金萎縮、在建房越來越難有資金續建,影響所及讓民眾不敢進場購屋、甚至分期購屋者對續繳房款猶疑、最後建商連履行還債能力都出問題而紛紛違約。 那些陷入週轉不靈、債務違約的中國建商,基本上都不脫此模式。房地產一直是帶動中國經濟的重要動力,房市陷低迷,也拖累整體經濟;更且,那些繳了錢卻拿不到房子的民眾、違約的建商、倒閉的企業、因所失業的從業人員,都會帶來社會問題。 就是因為房市榮枯興衰,對中國是如此的重要,IMF提出由中央出資挽救房市,應該也是考量到房市對中國特殊的重要性。而其建議的方式,大體上就是由「政府承擔一切」,例如尚未完成的預售房屋,由政府出資接手完成,或是政府出資向購屋者提供損失補償,甚至可考慮向建商收購手上餘屋,預估需要的經費約1兆美元。 正面看,當然是這可讓購屋者與建商都同時解套,而可「得到新生」的機會;解決這些問題後,等於可讓中國房市按下「重啟」按紐重新開始,不會再拖累經濟。 不過,這個方式的代價實在太高昂、後遺症又實在太嚴重了;如果以IMF的估計而言,是超過中國GDP的5%以上。後遺症則除了所謂的「道德風險」問題外,更嚴重的惡化的社會公平性。 道德風險問題應該容易理解,政府等於拿錢挽救那些盲目擴張的建商,還有補償那些未自我控管購屋風險的民眾,這種作為只會讓建商與一般民眾更不注意風險控管問題。至於公平性,拿國家的錢支持扯爛污的建商及購屋(或投資)受損的民眾,當然在公平性上大有問題,這點其實就是金融海嘯時政府介入挽救大銀行時的批評:賺錢時是資本主義(錢都被個人拿走),貼錢時是社會主義(損失要國家負擔)。 中國官方拒絕接受此提議,理由也不脫這些考量,從專業上看有其道理,但實務上而言,卻可能拖長了房市不景氣時間,經濟也更難脫困。如果官方願意斷然投入鉅資、表達出「不惜一切代價」去挽救房市的態度,很可能在投入鉅資前就能讓房市得到支撐;即使需要投入龐大的資金,如果能解決房市問題,讓整體經濟得到拉抬,也可能是利多於弊。

title: Arrestan a policía de Guaymas por presunto homicidio de estadounidense
content: Policiaca / miércoles 14 de agosto de 2024 Arrestan a policía de Guaymas por presunto homicidio de estadounidense La Fiscalía de Sonora indicó a través de un comunicado que el elemento de Seguridad Pública Municipal de Guaymas contaba con orden de aprehensión El elemento de Seguridad Pública Municipal de Guaymas contaba con orden de aprehensión por homicidio / Foto: Cortesía | FGJE Gustavo Moreno / El Sol de Hermosillo José Guadalupe “N”, elemento activo de la Policía Municipal de Guaymas , fue capturado por elementos de la Agencia Ministerial de Investigación Criminal (AMIC) debido a su probable responsabilidad por el delito de homicidio calificado , en perjuicio de un ciudadano estadounidense. La Fiscalía de Sonora indicó a través de un comunicado que el elemento de Seguridad Pública Municipal de Guaymas contaba con orden de aprehensión, la cual fue ejecutada tras iniciarse la respectiva investigación por el homicidio de Kevin Ray “N”, en un club nocturno. Al respecto, el órgano procurador de justicia detalló que los hechos comenzaron en las instalaciones de dicho establecimiento, localizado en San Carlos Nuevo Guaymas, donde en un primer momento, Kevin Ray disparó contra una tercera persona, familiar del hoy detenido. title: Thái Sơn Nam TP.HCM chạm trán đối thủ mạnh đến từ châu Âu
content: Theo kế hoạch, giải năm nay sẽ có 6 đội tham gia và chia thành 2 bảng. Tuy nhiên, Ban tổ chức sau đó đã nhận được đơn xin rút lui của CLB Yarmouk FC (Kuwait). Giải futsal TP.HCM mở rộng 2024 chỉ còn 5 CLB tranh tài. Liên đoàn bóng đá TP.HCM (HFF) đã xếp lại lịch thi đấu, thay vì chia bảng sẽ đấu vòng tròn một lượt để xác định nhà vô địch. CLB Anderlecht (giữa) của Bỉ đã 7 lần VĐQG. Ảnh: CLB đáng chú ý nhất giải năm nay là Anderlecht (Bỉ). Đội bóng mạnh tới từ châu Âu sẽ giúp các đội trong nước cọ xát lý tưởng ngay trên sân nhà. CLB của Bỉ đã từng lọt Top 4 giải CLB mạnh nhất châu Âu. Các đội futsal mạnh trong nước như Thái Sơn Nam TPHCM hay Thái Sơn Bắc sẽ có cơ hội cọ xát tốt trên sân nhà. Ảnh: TSN Các đội bóng trong nước dự giải năm nay là Thái Sơn Nam TPHCM, Thái Sơn Bắc, Sahako, Khánh Hòa. Giải sẽ khai mạc vào chiều 19/8 với cặp đấu đầu tiên giữa Khánh Hòa gặp Anderlecht (vào lúc 14 giờ) và sau đó, Thái Sơn Nam TP.HCM gặp Sahako FC thi đấu vào lúc 17h15. Ngày 25/8, giải sẽ bế mạc với 2 cặp đấu giữa Sahako gặp Thái Sơn Bắc và Thái Sơn Nam TP.HCM gặp Anderlecht. title: આટલું જાણીએ તો જ એની યોગ્ય રીતે આરાધના થાય !
content: Updated: Aug 14th, 2024 - આકાશની ઓળખ-કુમારપાળ દેસાઈ - પર્વાધિરાજ પર્યુષણ પર્વાધિરાજ પર્યુષણની આરાધનાનો અવસર જેમ નજીક આવી રહ્યો છે, તે સમયે જૈન ધર્મની ભાવનાઓના હાર્દને જાણવો જરૂરી બને છે. આ સંદર્ભમાં અહીં જૈન ધર્મની પરિભાષાનાં શબ્દોનો અર્થ અને એની પાછળનો મર્મ આલેખવામાં આવ્યો છે. ધર્મમાં વપરાયેલી પરિભાષાની સાચી સમજ હોય તો જ આપણે સાચા અર્થમાં ધર્મપાલન કરી શકીએ છીએ. પર્વાધિરાજ પર્યુષણ : નમસ્કારમાં જેમ નવકાર મંત્ર મોટો છે, તીર્થમાં જેમ શ્રી શત્રુંજયતીર્થ મહાન છે, દાનમાં અભય મહાન છે, ધ્યાનમાં શુક્લધ્યાન મહાન છે, રત્નમાં ચિંતામણિરત્ન મહાન છે એમ સર્વ પર્વોમાં પર્યુષણ પર્વ મહાન છે. પર્યુષણનો અર્થ છે 'સમસ્ત પ્રકારે વસવું.' પર્યુષણ એ માત્ર પર્વ નથી, પરંતુ પર્વાધિરાજ છે. પર્યુષણનો અર્થ છે 'સમસ્ત પ્રકારે વસવું'. એટલે કે આ પર્વ સમયે સાધુજનો ચોમાસાના ચાર મહિના એક જ સ્થળે સ્થિર વાસ કરીને ધર્મની આરાધના કરતા હોય છે, પરંતુ પર્યુષણનો લાક્ષણિક અર્થ છે 'આત્માની સમીપ વસવું'. આત્મવિજય માટે આત્મઓળખ અનિવાર્ય છે. એ આત્મતત્ત્વને જોવા માટે એકાંત અને શાંતિ જોઈએ. બાહ્ય પ્રવૃત્તિથી નિવૃત્તિ જોઈએ અને એ નિવૃત્તિમાં આત્મવિશ્લેષણની આંતરપ્રવૃત્તિ જોઈએ. આત્માની સમીપ રહેવું એટલે શું ? અનંતકાળથી આત્મા મોહ અને મિથ્યાત્વમાં અથવા કષાય અને અજ્ઞાાનમાં જ વસતો આવ્યો છે. પોતાના સ્વ-ભાવને ભૂલીને વિભાવને જ નિજ સ્વરૂપ માની બેઠો છે. પરિણામે માનવી પારાવાર પીડા, દુ:ખ, કંકાસ અને કલેશમાં ડૂબેલો છે. ભૌતિક લાલસાના મૃગજળ તરફ આંધળી દોટ લગાવી રહ્યો છે. આવા માનવીને પર્યુષણ પર્વ પૂછે છે કે આ પર્વ સમયે વિચાર કર કે તું કોણ છે ? તે શું...

title: Governo federal investe R$ 222 milhões para estruturação modernização da Bahiafarma
creator: Redação
content: Por Redação O governo federal, por meio do programa Nova Indústria Brasil, inserido no novo Programa de Aceleração do Crescimento (PAC), anunciou que fará o investimento de R$ 222 milhões na Bahiafarma. O anúncio foi realizado nesta quarta-feira (14), durante o lançamento do Programa Mais Investimento para o Complexo Industrial da Saúde, em Brasília. O evento contou com a presença do presidente Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT), do governador Jerônimo Rodrigues (PT) e da secretária da Saúde do Estado da Bahia (Sesab), Roberta Santana. Segundo o governo, a iniciativa visa estruturar e modernizar a Bahiafarma em duas frentes principais: a criação de uma planta para a produção de kits diagnósticos, como testes rápidos para detecção de hepatites virais, e outra para a produção de sólidos orais via úmida, como medicamentos em comprimidos. "A Bahia dá um passo significativo no fortalecimento da sua capacidade produtiva na área da saúde, contribuindo diretamente para a descentralização da produção farmacêutica no Brasil. Este investimento não apenas reforça a Bahiafarma, mas também impulsiona a economia local e regional, garantindo acesso mais rápido e eficiente a medicamentos e diagnósticos para a população nordestina," afirmou a secretária Roberta Santana. A estruturação inicial permitirá que, já em setembro, a Bahiafarma inscreva...

title: Veja os números sorteados no Super Sete no concurso 583, nesta quarta
애플, 4분기부터 아이폰서 다른 결제 방식 이용 가능...한국은 언급 없어
creator: 이나영 (2or0@etoday.co.kr)
이나영
content: 애플이 이르면 4분기부터 미국 등 일부 국가에서 아이폰으로 애플페이 외 다른 결제 방식을 이용할 수 있게 한다. 다만, 한국과 유럽연합(EU)에서의 가능 여부에 대해서는 별다른 언급을 하지 않았다. 14일(현지시간) 로이터통신 등에 따르면 애플은 아이폰의 새 운영체제인 iOS 18.1 버전부터 아이폰의 결제 칩을 외부에 개방하기로 했다. 기술적으로는 삼성페이와 구글페이를 아이폰에서도 이용할 수 있게 되는 셈이다. 현재 아이폰은 '애플페이'만 지원하고 있다. 애플페이는 아이폰을 결제 단말기에 갖다 대면 결제가 되는 '탭앤고'(tap-and-go) 기술이다. 애플페이는 아이폰 속 근거리무선통신(NFCᆞNear Field Communication)을 통해 가능한데 애플은 보안 등을 이유로 이를 개방하지 않았다. 그러나 이날 애플은 NFC를 공개해 외부의 다른 결제 방식도 허용하겠다고 한 것이다. 이렇게 되면 결제 외에도 대중교통 카드, 업무 배지, 집과 호텔 키 등의 앱도 제작할 수 있게 된다. 애플의 새 운영체제(OS) iOS 18이 아이폰16과 함께 출시되는 만큼 첫 업데이트 버전인 iOS 18.1은 4분기에 출시할 것으로 예상한다. 이에 따라 새로운 결제 방식도 이르면 4분기부터 이용할 수 있게 될 것으로 보인다. 애플의 이번 조치는 미국과 유럽연합(EU)을 비롯한 각국의 압박에 따른 것이라고 로이터는 전했다. 앞서 EU 집행위원회는 지난달 "애플이 아이폰의 탭앤고 기술에 경쟁업체들의...

title: Bombeiros resgatam Bicho-preguiça em Porto Seguro
creator: Redação
content: Por Redação Um bicho-preguiça foi resgatado por uma guarnição do 6° Batalhão de Bombeiros Militar (6° BBM) em Porto Seguro. O animal estava em um muro quando foi avistado por populares que acionaram os bombeiros. Toda a ação de resgate foi realizada para que o animal não ficasse ainda mais estressado. Após o resgate, o bicho-preguiça foi colocado no caminhão dos bombeiros, de forma segura, e foi devolvido à natureza.

title: ભારતની સ્વતંત્રતા માટેના અદ્ભુત પર્યુષણા મહાપર્વ
content: Updated: Aug 14th, 2024 - આંખ છીપ, અંતર મોતી-આચાર્ય રાજહંસ - આગરાના ઉગ્ર પત્રકાર, નામે મહેન્દ્ર જૈન...પદ્માના પિતાજી અને અંગૂરીદેવીના પતિ. આગરાના આ પ્રસિદ્ધ પત્રકારની કલમમાં તેજાબ ભરેલો હતો. એ લખે એટલે આગ ભડકે. એમના લેખો વાંચ્યા પછી ભારતવાસીઓએ અંગ્રેજો પ્રત્યે ધિક્કાર વછૂટે. વાછૂટની જેમ વાતાવરણ ખળભળે. આંદોલન ઉગ્ર બન્યું. અને હિંસક બન્યું. આગરાના ચાર પોલીસ સ્ટેશન બોમ્બ નાખીને ઉડાવી દેવામાં આવ્યા. ૧૨ વર્ષની પદ્માદેવીનાં નેજા હેઠળ ચાલી રહેલા આ હિંસક આંદોલન આગળ અંગ્રેજો ઢીલા પડવા માંડયા હતા. આવા સમયે કોઈકે પદ્માદેવીને પૂછયું - 'પદ્મા, તને ખબર છે, આ પર્યુષણા મહાપર્વના દિવસો છે. પર્યુષણા મહાપર્વ એ આપણા ધર્મનું પવિત્ર પર્વ છે. આ પરમપવિત્ર દિવસોમાં 'અમારિ પ્રવર્તન'નું પાલન કરવાનું આપણા પરમપવિત્ર મહાપુરૂષોએ જણાવ્યું છે. નાનામાં નાના જીવોની હિંસા પણ આ આઠ દિવસો દરમ્યાન ન કરવી જોઈએ. જો કે હિંસા એ આપણો ધર્મ જ નથી. આપણો ધર્મ માને છે અહિંસામાં. ''અહિંસા પરમો ધર્મ:'' આ આપણું મહાન સૂત્ર છે. જ્યારે તું આ પરમ પવિત્ર અહિંસાના દિવસોમાં આવા હિંસક આંદોલનો ચલાવી રહી છે. તને કાંઈ ખબર પડે છે ?' 'જી, મને બધી ખબર છે. આપણે ક્યારેય, ક્યાંય, કોઈ પણ જીવની હિંસા ન કરવી જોઈએ. એમાં પણ પર્યુષણા મહાપર્વના પરમપવિત્ર દિવસોમાં તો જરા પણ હિંસા ન થાય તેનું ધ્યાન રાખવું જોઈએ.'ં આપણા ધર્મના અનેક મહાપુરુષોએ અનેક રાજા-બાદશાહો પાસે અહિંસાધર્મનુ પાલન કરાવ્યું હતું. જગદ્ગુરૂ હીર સૂરીશ્વરજી મહારાજજીએ તો મોગલ બાદશાહ અકબર પાસે વર્ષના છ મહિના જેટલો સમય અહિંસાનું પાલન કરાવડાવ્યું હતું. કતલખાના બંધ રખાવ્યા હતા.' 'તો પછી આરાધના...

title: EEUU | ¿Walmart abrirá más tiendas? Conozca dónde
creator: Dadniuska Aristigueta
content: Walmart informó que abrirá nuevas tiendas en lo que resta de 2024. Las nuevas sedes estarán ubicadas en Florida, Georgia, Missouri y Texas. La cadena de supermercados inaugurará un total de 25 locales orientados a la atención de los adultos mayores que viven en los referidos estados y llevarán por nombre Walmart Supercenter. Los establecimientos se crearán bajo los nombres corporativos CenterWell Senior Primary Care y Conviva Care Centers, en alianza con Seguros de Salud Humana. Estos nuevos locales de Walmart se instalarán juntos a los supermercados con el objetivo de brindar a las personas mayores más acceso a la atención primaria. Se conoció que los espacios tendrán secciones de panadería, frutas y verduras, carnes y productos lácteos. También contarán con entradas exclusivas y estacionamiento gratis . Además, dispondrá de restaurantes de comida rápida. Los dos primeros establecimientos estarán ubicados en Dune Lakes de Santa Rosa Beach, Florida. Habrá otro en el Vine City de Atlanta. Ambos locales tendrán un tamaño de 57.000 pies cuadrados. Se espera que para la primera mitad de 2025 todos los centros estén operativos, equipados y con el personal. Walmart no solo se enfoca en temas de salud, también pretende establecer locales de venta de alimentos denominados mercados de barrio con el que quieren ofrecer una mayor variedad de comida. title: S&P 500, Nasdaq eke out gains even as Alphabet weighs
content: NEW YORK: The S&P 500 ended higher on Wednesday, stretching its winning streak to five sessions, as the latest inflation data reassured investors betting the Federal Reserve would start cutting US interest rates next month. The Nasdaq Composite also posted its fifth straight daily gain, although it barely scraped into positive territory as Alphabet and some megacap tech stocks weighed. Moves were generally subdued with many investors away for August vacations, and new triggers for trading were absent, contributing to an overall listless picture among the benchmarks. The latest US consumer price data, released earlier on Wednesday, reinforced expectations that the Fed would start interest rate cuts in September. US consumer prices rose moderately in July, and the annual increase in inflation slowed to below 3% for the first time since early 2021. A day earlier, softer-than-expected producer prices data indicated inflation continued to moderate, although not yet all the way to the US central bank's 2% target. Money markets now see a 55% chance of a 25-basis point (bps) rate cut at the Fed's Sept. 17-18 meeting, as per the CME FedWatch Tool. Before the data, traders were nearly evenly split between a 25-bps and 50-bps cut. Scott Ladner, chief investment officer at Horizon Investments, said he called days such as this "markets violently going nowhere", adding with CPI painting a...

title: मॉर्निंग न्यूज ब्रीफ:विनेश फोगाट को सिल्वर मेडल नहीं मिलेगा; JK एनकाउंटर में कैप्टन शहीद; कोलकाता रेप केस, दावा- डॉक्टर से गैंगरेप हुआ
content: नमस्कार, कल की बड़ी खबर रेसलर विनेश फोगाट की सिल्वर मेडल की अपील से जुड़ी रही, जिसे स्पोर्ट्स कोर्ट ने खारिज कर दिया। एक खबर कोलकाता डॉक्टर रेप केस की रही, दावा किया गया है कि डॉक्टर का रेप नहीं, गैंगरेप हुआ था। लेकिन कल की बड़ी खबरों से पहले आज के प्रमुख इवेंट्स, जिन पर रहेगी नजर... अब कल की बड़ी खबरें... 1. विनेश की सिल्वर मेडल की अपील खारिज, 100 ग्राम ओवरवेट होने से फाइनल नहीं खेल पाई थीं रेसलर विनेश फोगाट को पेरिस ओलिंपिक में सिल्वर मेडल नहीं मिलेगा। कोर्ट ऑफ आर्बिट्रेशन फॉर स्पोटर्स (CAS) ने उनकी अपील खारिज कर दी। फाइनल मैच से पहले विनेश को 100 ग्राम ज्यादा वजन होने के चलते अयोग्य घोषित कर दिया गया था। जिसके बाद उन्होंने संयुक्त रूप से सिल्वर मेडल दिए जाने की मांग की थी। इस मामले पर CAS में 9 अगस्त को 3 घंटे सुनवाई हुई थी। इस दौरान विनेश भी वर्चुअली मौजूद थीं। भारतीय ओलंपिक संघ (IOA) की ओर से सीनियर वकील हरीश साल्वे ने उनका पक्ष रखा। पीटी उषा ने नाराजगी जताई: इंडियन ओलिंपिक एसोसिएशन (IOA) की प्रेसिडेंट पीटी उषा ने CAS के फैसले पर नाराजगी जताई। उन्होंने कहा कि यूनाइटेड वर्ल्ड रेसलिंग (UWW) और इंटरनेशनल ओलिंपिक कमेटी (IOC) के फैसले से उन्हें झटका लगा है। पूरी खबर यहां पढ़ें... 2. कोलकाता रेप-मर्डर केस, डॉक्टर्स एसोसिएशन के सेक्रेटरी का दावा- लड़की से गैंगरेप हुआ ऑल इंडिया गवर्नमेंट डॉक्टर्स एसोसिएशन के एडिशनल सेक्रेटरी डॉ. सुवर्ण गोस्वामी का दावा है कि कोलकाता में ट्रेनी डॉक्टर से रेप नहीं, गैंगरेप हुआ था। उन्होंने ये बात पोस्टमार्टम रिपोर्ट के हवाले से कही। गोस्वामी ने...

title: आज का वृषभ राशि का राशिफल 15 अगस्त 2024: खर्च का संयोग बना है, धैर्य से काम लें
content: Taurus Horoscope 15 August, 2024: आज वृषभ राशि का करियर राशिफल : आज का दिन वृषभ राशि के जातकों को जोश और उत्साह से काम करने का अवसर प्रदान करेगा। ऐसे में आपको आज आलस से बचना चाहिए। आर्थिक मामलों में दिन थोड़ा खर्चीला रहेगा। आप आज किसी बिजली के साधनों और उपकरणों पर धन खर्च कर सकते हैं। आपको कार्य में कुछ तकनीकी समस्या का भी आज सामना करना पड़ सकता है। ऐसे में आपको आज धैर्य से काम लेना होगा। वैसे आज विदेश क्षेत्र से लाभ का संयोग बन रहा है। आज वृषभ राशि का प्रेम और पारिवारिक राशिफल : आज वृषभ राशि के जातकों का दिन मिलाजुला रहेगा। दिन के दूसरे भाग में आज आपको वाणी को संयमित रखना होगा नहीं तो जीवनसाथी के साथ किसी न किसी बात को लेकर कहासुनी हो सकती है। वैवाहिक जीवन के मामले में दिन कुल मिलाकर अच्छा रहेगा। आप आज बच्चों और जीवनसाथी के साथ कहीं घूमने का प्लान बना सकते हैं। किसी मित्र या संबंधी का आपके घर आगमन भी हो सकता है। संतान के साथ आज आप खुशियों के पल बिताएंगे। आज वृषभ राशि की सेहत : आज वृषभ राशि के जातकों को दिन के दूसरे भाग में सेहत के प्रति अधिक सजग रहना चाहिए। जोखिम भरा काम करने से बचें नहीं तो चोट लग सकती है। जिन लोगों को बवासीर संबंधी समस्या है उन्हें खान-पान और परहेज का ध्यान रखना होगा क्योंकि आपकी परेशानी बढने की आशंका है। आज वृषभ राशि के उपाय : आपको आज शिवजी का शहद से अभिषेक करना चाहिए साथ ही केसर अथवा हल्दी से तिलक करना चाहिए।

title: Líder do governo propõe elevar imposto em juros sobre capital próprio para compensar desoneração
creator: Adriana Fernandes, Thaísa Oliveira
content: O relator do projeto que prorroga a desoneração para empresas e municípios, senador Jaques Wagner (PT-BA), incluiu em seu parecer o aumento de tributação no JCP (Juros sobre Capital Próprio) de 15% para 20% para compensar o impacto com a perda de arrecadação. A decisão ocorre um dia depois de o relator ter descartado a inclusão no relatório de uma elevação da alíquota da CSLL (Contribuição Social sobre Lucro Líquido) das empresas, medida que sofre resistências no Congresso, para ajudar a alcançar o valor necessário da compensação junto com outras propostas apresentadas pelos senadores . A retirada da CSLL foi decidida pelo presidente Luiz Inácio Lula (PT), mas a equipe econômica cobrou a compensação para ajudar a aumentar as receitas e fechar a proposta de Orçamento do ano que vem, que será encaminhada ao Congresso no final deste mês. O JCP é um mecanismo criado logo após o Plano Real com o fim da correção monetária sobre os balanços, mesma época em que se optou por isentar a distribuição de dividendos aos acionistas. Ele é usado por grandes empresas que permite que a remuneração (distribuição de lucros) aos acionistas seja enquadrada como despesa —e, assim, abatida do Imposto de Renda. Dessa forma, o pagamento de JCP estimula o uso de capital próprio das empresas, em vez da busca por empréstimos. Wagner afirmou à imprensa que a...

title: Sôi nổi lễ hội Việt Nam - Hàn Quốc lần thứ 5
Zelensky confirms more weapons for Ukraine as Kyiv strikes Putin’s airfields
creator: Lucy Leeson
content: Volodymyr Zelensky has confirmed more weapons for Ukrainian forces as Kyiv continues its strikes into Putin ’s airfields. The Ukraine President confirmed he met with government officials on Wednesday (14 August), to discuss support for military actions in the Kursk region. In a video message posted to X, formerly Twitter, Zelensky said: “Our Ukrainian drones are working exactly as needed. However, there are things that drones alone cannot achieve, unfortunately. We need other weapons—missile systems.” The president then confirmed more weapons will become available for troops.

title: Impacto en el US Open: Juan Martín del Potro y Gabriela Sabatini volverán a las pistas y se enfrentarán a otras dos leyendas
content: La comunidad del tenis argentino está entusiasmada con una noticia muy especial: Juan Martín Del Potro y Gabriela Sabatini volverán a las canchas en la edición 2024 del US Open . Se medirán en un duelo de exhibición a la dupla estadounidense integrada por Venus Williams y Andy Roddick . Ambos campeones del último Grand Slam del año, participarán en un emocionante partido de dobles mixto, que ya disparó la emoción de los fanáticos más nostálgicos. “Venus Williams, quien no se ha retirado oficialmente, pero no ha jugado ningún partido profesional desde marzo, jugará un partido exhibición de dobles mixtos en el US Open la próxima semana durante la clasificación. Venus formará equipo con Andy Rodick contra Gabriela Sabatini y Juan Martín del Potro”, escribió en su cuenta en X el periodista Ben Rothenberg , y la noticia corrió como reguero de pólvora, aunque ya había algunos indicios de que la dupla argentina podía reunirse en una cancha. La participación de estos dos íconos del tenis argentino no es una sorpresa. La presencia de Del Potro y Sabatini ya estaba confirmada para la Fan Week, una semana dedicada a los aficionados del tenis que se llevará a cabo del 19 al 25 de agosto en Nueva York. Durante ese período, se ofrecerán diversas experiencias para los fanáticos, incluyendo prácticas abiertas y eventos con tenistas en actividad. Este encuentro...

title: Samantha y Maicelo facturan juntos en evento de pelea en Huamachuco: “Vamos a boxear en mancha, ya aprendí”
creator: Redacción Farándula
content: INSEPARABLES. Samantha Batallanos y Jonathan Maicelo e stuvieron juntos en un evento de boxeo en Huamachuco, en La Libertad, esto luego de oficializar su reconciliación pese a la fuerte denuncia de maltrato contra el deportista. Mira también: Melissa Klug expone a jueces que fallaron a favor de Farfán y enfurece: “¡Ahora que salga a publicar!” Pamela López se comunica con Peluchín tras imágenes de Cueva y Pamela Franco: ¿Qué dijo? La exreina de belleza se mostró sonriente junto al empresario e incluso se animó a dar unas palabras a los presentes. “Hoy los esperamos, más tarzán (...) Vamos a boxear todos aquí, en mancha. Yo ya aprendí a boxear”, dijo la modelo. Samantha Batallanos advierte a Maicelo: “Al primer grito sabe que me regreso a mi casa y chau” En entrevista con Trome, Samantha Batallanos señaló que ya perdonó al boxeador Jonathan Maicelo, que está saliendo con él y que al primer grito regresa a su casa. “( ¿Crees que lo que él siente por ti es amor? Sí, lo que pasa es que él tiene muchos traumas y carencias que arrastra de la niñez, está yendo a terapia y yo también, pero sabe que al primer grito me regreso a mi casa y chau. Todo el mundo nos dice que nos separemos, pero las cosas se han dado así”, sostuvo. TE PUEDE INTERESAR Ana Paula Ganoza ROMPE SU SILENCIO por casa de S/. 3 millones: “Lo ven wao...tenemos derecho a una vivienda” Cueva y...

title: Lần đầu tổ chức ngày hội khinh khí cầu ở Hạ Long, du khách trải nghiệm bay như thế nào?
content: Ngày hội khinh khí cầu ở Hạ Long lần đầu tiên sẽ được tổ chức trong dịp Lễ Quốc khánh 2/9, du khách sẽ được trải nghiệm bay, tham quan khinh khí cầu.

title: Bill to make Google, Meta pay for news enters notorious political killing ground
creator: Ethan Baron
content: A bill to make Google and Facebook pay publishers for news presented on their platforms faces a do-or-die test Thursday in a state government chamber notorious as a killing ground for prospective laws. Assembly Bill 886 would force the technology giants to shell out negotiated annual, lump-sum fees into a fund for news outlets, or be forced into mediation or arbitration to negotiate paying media companies a share of their digital-ads revenue. On Thursday, the bill, called the California Journalism Preservation Act and introduced by East Bay state Assemblymember Buffy Wicks, will be taken up in the semi-annual “suspense file” hearing in the state Senate appropriations committee. It’s a secretive process that could see AB 886 spiked in the bloodbath that winnows down hundreds of pending bills before the annual Aug. 31 bill-passage deadline. “Usually bills that go to suspense go to suspense to die,” said David McCuan, a political science professor at Sonoma State University who has been tracking the bill. Although a majority of bills that end up in the suspense file die there, the fate of AB 886 remains uncertain, McCuan believes, and the bill’s status may be “more about pause and consideration than it is about killing.” Legislators and parties to the process — which include tech industry lobbyists, news publishers and digital-media startups — are negotiating a possible...

title: Atlet Peraih Medali Olimpiade Paris Diarak ke Istana, Ini Rutenya
content: Atlet Peraih Medali Olimpiade Paris Diarak ke Istana, Ini Rutenya Mei Amelia R - detikNews Kamis, 15 Agu 2024 06:19 WIB Foto: Rute pawai atlet peraih medali Olimpiade 2024 ke Istana hari ini (dok.TMC Polda Metro Jaya) Jakarta - Atlet peraih medali di Olimpiade Paris 2024 akan diarak ke Istana Negara untuk bertemu Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) pagi ini. Polisi melakukan rekayasa pengalihan arus di sepanjang rute pawai tersebut. "Adanya kegiatan pawai kemenangan peraih medali Olimpiade Paris," kata Kasat PJR Ditlantas Polda Metro Jaya Kompol Hasby Ristama dalam keterangannya kepada wartawan, Kamis (15/8/2024). Pawai kemenangan ini dilaksanakan mulai pukul 06.00 WIB sampai dengan pukul 10.00 WIB. Masyarakat diimbau untuk menghindari rute pawai. title: 'Ban the phones' in schools is a catchy political slogan but not everyone is convinced of the benefits
creator: Tegan Osborne
content: Mobile phones are now effectively banned in public schools across Australia, and politicians are spruiking big improvements in student behaviour since the change. But while teens say they've largely adapted to being phoneless at school — and some even say the bans have been positive — an education professor says real evidence of the benefits is still lacking. This month, South Australia has marked one year since . What do the rules look like where you live? SA Premier Peter Malinauskas says "the evidence is in", children are playing with each other and not on their phones and there has been "a reduction in inappropriate behaviour". School reporting data from the state indicates a 63 per cent decline in "critical incidents involving social media" in the first half of this year compared to the same period in 2023 before the ban. The government also says there's been a 54 per cent drop in behavioural issues, 44 per cent fewer "policy compliance issues" and 10 per cent fewer violent incidents. And when the ban began, principals reported "immediate changes" in student behaviour, according to authorities. So what do students think? When the new SA rules were introduced in term 3 last year, BTN High spoke to teens about their thoughts on the ban. There was , but a year in, anecdotally, most say they have adjusted. Brodie, 15, admits he wasn't keen on the ban initially. "I wasn't too...

Consejo Estudiantil de “El Mexe” toma las instalaciones en Hidalgo
content: El Consejo Estudiantil de la escuela normal rural Luis Villarrea l “El Mexe”, ubicada en el municipio de Francisco I. Madero, tomó el casco del instituto educativo, para exigir cumplimiento a su pliego petitorio. Los alumnos se apostaron frente a la escuela, donde colgaron cartulinas de protesta, con las siguientes leyendas: “Sólo la lucha nos da lo que el gobierno nos quita”, “Sólo la lucha nos da lo que la ley nos niega”, “Fragoso, entiende el Mexe no se vende”. En la fachada colgaron una manta color rojo con una araña en medio, señal de la resistencia. Regional Huejutla: Vecinos de Veracruz amarran a guardia de la CFE El Consejo Estudiantil, integrado por tres hombres y una mujer, indicó: “Nos encontramos en protesta debido a que ha existido represión hacia nuestros docentes, quienes han tenido un buen desempeño académico, no hay justificación para que sean despedidos, actualmente están involucrados en esta represión cinco docentes directamente y otros cinco que están obligando desde la partes directivas y las partes gubernamentales a renunciar”. “Sin embargo el día de hoy, como estudiantes normalistas, desde las diferentes academias primer año, segundo, tercero y cuarto, anunciamos que no vamos a permitir el despido de diez maestros, que aportan demasiado a nuestra formación académica”, dijeron. Además expusieron: “Exigimos directamente a Natividad...

title: Una estudiante de décimo grado, víctima de la violencia machista en Cuba
creator: DDC
content: La estudiante cubana Yenifer Vargas Gómez , de unos 15 años y que cursaba el décimo grado en el Instituto Preuniversitario Rafael María de Mendive y Daumy, de Santiago de Cuba, murió víctima de un crimen de violencia machista , reportó la plataforma independiente Yo Sí Te Creo en Cuba. De acuerdo con un reporte divulgado en las redes de esta iniciativa de la sociedad civil de la Isla, el feminicidio, que califica como el número 32 del actual año , tuvo "una connotación particularmente grave, al ser cometido contra una adolescente de décimo grado de la enseñanza preuniversitaria". Según la nota, Vargas Gómez falleció al mediodía del pasado martes 13 de agosto en el hospital infantil de la ciudad de Santiago de Cuba , "a causa de las heridas propinadas por su expareja en horas de la mañana de ese mismo día". El Instituto Preuniversitario Rafael María de Mendive, donde estudiaba la adolescente, sin mencionar las causas del deceso, se limitó a comunicar "el fallecimiento de la estudiante Yenifer Vargas Gómez al mediodía de hoy. Hacemos un llamado a docentes y estudiantes a acudir en horas de la mañana a la funeraria. Hacemos llegar nuestro más sentido pésame a familiares y amigos". Yo Sí Te Creo intento precisar la edad de la menor, aunque presume que esta tuviera 15 años. Lo sucedido, señaló la denuncia, fue verificado a través de fuentes...

title: 「お父さんとお母さんがもめている」娘の目の前で...30代女性を押し倒し首を絞めるなどの暴行 44歳の男「間違いありません」北海道美唄市(HBCニュース北海道)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 8/15(木) 8:19 配信 暴行容疑で44歳の男を逮捕、取り調べている美唄警察署 14日北海道美唄市で交際する30代の女性に対し、髪の毛を引っ張り首を絞めるなどの暴行を加えたとして、44歳の男が逮捕されました。暴行の疑いで逮捕されたのは、美唄市西3条南4丁目に住む44歳の自称会社員の男です。男は、14日午後10時15分ごろ、自宅で交際相手の30代女性をソファに押し倒したり、髪の毛を引っ張り首を絞めたりする暴行を加えた疑いがもたれています。現場には女性の娘2人もいて、長女から「お父さんとお母さんがもめている」と警察に通報し、駆け付けた警察官が状況を確認し、その場で男を逮捕しました。警察によりますと、当時、男は女性と何らかの理由で口論になり、犯行に及んだとみられています。取り調べに対し、44歳の自称会社員の男は「彼女を押し倒したり、髪を引っ張ったり、首を絞めたことに間違いありません」と容疑を認めているということです。2人をめぐるトラブルや相談歴はないということですが、警察は男の暴力が日常化していなかったかなど詳しい状況を調べています。 北海道放送(株) 「一時停止」を無視し交差点に進入、違反を確認したパトカーが免許証の提示を求めると...34歳の男「免許停止処分中で無免許」北海道小樽市 「帰宅したら、部屋が荒らされていた」留守中に侵入され家具破壊、被害者の“心当たり”から特定...15歳の女子中学生「勝手に入って壊した」 台風7号は15日「強い」勢力となる見込み 関東接近時は中心気圧950hPaか 予想される雨量、風の強さは 気象庁は暴風、高波、浸水、河川の氾濫に警戒を呼びかけ 大浴場の脱衣所に侵入 女性に抱きつき押し倒す 宿泊施設の元調理師の男を逮捕 北海道上川町 「お父さんとお母さんがもめている」娘の目の前で...30代女性を押し倒し首を絞めるなどの暴行 44歳の男「間違いありません」北海道美唄市 つなぐ #戦争の記憶 家族6人全員を失った女性など貴重な証言を紹介

title: 川遊びに来ていた30代の男性が行方不明に...知人が川底に沈んでいる状態の男性を見つけ消防に通報するも日没近く救助活動は15日に 北海道占冠村(HBCニュース北海道)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 8/15(木) 8:19 配信 川遊び中の30代男性が行方不明になった現場付近(北海道占冠村) 14日午後、北海道占冠村で、知人と川遊びに来ていた30代の男性が、川に入ったまま姿が見えなくなりました。その後、知人が川底に沈んでいる男性を見つけ、消防に通報しましたが、日没時間近くで暗くなったことなどから、消防や警察では、現場を確認するだけにとどまり、男性の救助活動は、15日から取りかかる見通しです。消防によりますと、14日午後3時ごろ、占冠村を流れる鵡川で、川遊びをしていた30代の男性が、滝つぼのような場所に入ったまま、しばらく戻ってこないなどと、一緒に遊びに来ていた知人から、消防に通報がありました。この通報を受け、消防は警察ともに現場に駆け付け、午後7時ごろまで周辺を捜索しましたが、日没時間近くだったこともあり、周囲が暗く、男性の発見には至りませんでした。男性が行方不明となった現場には、土砂をせき止めるための砂防用の堤防があったということで、川が流れ落ちる場所が、滝つぼのように水深が深くなっていた可能性もあるということです。警察と消防は、15日から、男性の救助活動に取りかかるとしています。 北海道放送(株) 「一時停止」を無視し交差点に進入、違反を確認したパトカーが免許証の提示を求めると...34歳の男「免許停止処分中で無免許」北海道小樽市 「帰宅したら、部屋が荒らされていた」留守中に侵入され家具破壊、被害者の“心当たり”から特定...15歳の女子中学生「勝手に入って壊した」 台風7号は15日「強い」勢力となる見込み 関東接近時は中心気圧950hPaか 予想される雨量、風の強さは 気象庁は暴風、高波、浸水、河川の氾濫に警戒を呼びかけ 大浴場の脱衣所に侵入 女性に抱きつき押し倒す 宿泊施設の元調理師の男を逮捕 北海道上川町 「お父さんとお母さんがもめている」娘の目の前で...30代女性を押し倒し首を絞めるなどの暴行 44歳の男「間違いありません」北海道美唄市 つなぐ #戦争の記憶 家族6人全員を失った女性など貴重な証言を紹介

title: CEO de MercadoLibre vende US$ 188 millones en acciones tras alza
creator: Agencia Bloomberg
content: Marcos Galperín, cofundador y director ejecutivo del gigante latinoamericano de comercio electrónico y pagos MercadoLibre Inc. , vendió acciones por primera vez este año después de que un sólido informe trimestral impulsara los valores. Meliga No. 1 Limited Partnership , que forma parte del fideicomiso Galperin , vendió 100,000 acciones el martes, según un documento, recaudando alrededor de US$ 188.4 millones. La última vez que vendió acciones fue entre marzo y diciembre de 2023, según el documento. La participación de Galperin se mantiene cerca del 7% en MercadoLibre , que recientemente superó al productor brasileño de energía Petróleo Brasileiro SA como la empresa más valiosa que cotiza en bolsa en América Latina. Las acciones de la firma con sede en Montevideo, Uruguay, han subido casi un 50% en el último año, elevando su valor de mercado a US$ 96,300 millones. Las acciones cerraron por encima de los US$ 1,916 el martes en las operaciones de Nueva York, un 19% más desde el 1 de agosto, cuando informó resultados del segundo trimestre que superaron las estimaciones de los analistas. Eso se compara con un máximo histórico de US$ 1,984 a principios de 2021 durante el pico de la pandemia. Inspirado por eBay Inc. , Galperin , de 52 años, fundó MercadoLibre hace 25 años después de estudiar en la Universidad de Stanford. El nativo argentino tiene un...

title: ఆర్మీ కెప్టెన్‌ వీరమరణం
creator: bharath kumar
content: జమ్ము : జమ్ముకశ్మీర్‌లోని దోడా జిల్లాలో బుధవారం జరిగిన ఎన్‌కౌంటర్‌లో ఒక ఉగ్రవాది హతమయ్యాడు. ఉగ్రవాదుల ఎదురు కాల్పుల్లో ఆర్మీ కెప్టెన్‌ దీపక్‌ సింగ్‌ వీర మరణం పొందాడు. స్వాతంత్య్ర దినోత్సవానికి ముందు రోజు జరిగిన ఈ ఎన్‌కౌంటర్‌లో ఒక పౌరుడికి కూడా గాయాలైనట్టు తెలుస్తున్నది. ఉగ్రవాదులు దాగి ఉన్నారన్న సమాచారంతో భద్రతా బలగాలు దోడాలోని శివఘడ్‌-అస్సార్‌ బెల్ట్‌ అటవీ ప్రాంతంలో సెర్చ్‌ ఆపరేషన్‌ చేపట్టాయి. తొలుత నలుగురు మరణించినట్టు భావించినప్పటికీ ఒక్క ఉగ్రవాదే హతమైనట్టు అధికారులు నిర్ధారించారు. అదనపు డీజీపీ ఆనంద్‌ జైన్‌ మాట్లాడుతూ ఆపరేషన్‌ కొనసాగుతున్నదని చెప్పారు. ఆర్మీ కెప్టెన్‌ మృతి పట్ల సంతాపం ప్రకటించారు. ఉదంపూర్‌-దోడా-కిష్తార్‌ రీజియన్‌లో ఇటీవల కాలంలో ఇది నాలుగో ఎన్‌కౌంటర్‌. గత నాలుగు నెలల్లో జమ్ముకశ్మీర్‌లో ఉగ్రదాడుల్లో సుమారు 20 మంది జవాన్లు ప్రాణాలు కోల్పోయారు.

title: 5 Fakta Kasus KDRT Cut Intan Nabila, Armor Toreador Lakukan 5 Kali Lebih, Pandawara Group Minta Maaf
content: - Kasus Kekerasan Dalam Rumah Tangga (KDRT) yang dilakukan terhadap selebgram asal Banda Aceh, hingga kini menjadi sorotan tajam publik. Video yang memuat aksi tersebut viral di media sosial dan menuai beragam komentar pedas warganet. Kasus yang menimpa selebgram sekaligus mantan atlet anggar pun mendadak viral. Diduga pelaku adalah suaminya, dan telah ditangkap polisi. Kasus tersebut mendadak viral setelah rekaman CCTV yang menampilkan dipukul berkali-kali diunggah sang selebgram di akun Instagram terverifikasi, Selasa (13/8/2024). Tak sedikit pihak yang mengecam kebrutalan yang dilakukan Armor Toreador terhadap Cut Intan Nabila, termasuk kelompok penggerak dan pemengaruh yang berfokus pada permasalahan sampah dan kebersihan lingkungan, Pandawara Gruop. Tak kuasa terus mendapatkan aksi , akhirnya memberanikan diri untuk memviralkan rekaman CCTV sebaagi bukti kekerasan suaminya. Cut Intan Nabila mengunggah rekaman CCTV tersebut ke akun Instagram pribadinya. Dalam video tersebut awalnya dan melakukan perdebatan sengit. Tak kunjung reda, perdebatan tersebut berujung pada aksi . Pada akhirnya mendadak memukul Intan secara brutal berkali-kali. Mirisnya, perbuatan keji itu dilakukan tepat di samping tempat tidur anak ketiga mereka.

title: "Ele sabia mais sobre filmes do que ninguém": Clint Eastwood elogia o diretor que mudou sua carreira para sempre
creator: Adoro Cinema
content: Clint Eastwood alcançou fama como ator, mas não demoraria muito para que ele desse o salto para trás das câmeras: Em 1971, estreou na direção com o suspense psicológico Perversa Paixão - e até abriu mão de grande parte de seu salário para isso . Antes do duas vezes vencedor do Oscar dirigir um filme pela primeira vez, ele teve a oportunidade de olhar por cima do ombro de vários grandes e talentosos diretores. Dois deles em particular tiveram uma grande influência sobre ele. Em entrevista ao The Guardian, Eastwood falou sobre o início de sua carreira de diretor e suas inspirações: "Sempre fui fascinado por dirigir e editar filmes", disse o vencedor do Oscar por Os Imperdoáveis e Menina de Ouro . "E quando estávamos fazendo Rawhide [uma série de faroeste que Clint Eastwood estrelou entre 1959 e 1965], eu estava constantemente nas salas de edição [...] Não tive permissão para dirigir a série em si, mas dirigi os trailers". "Depois fui para a Itália e filmei com Sergio Leone, e filmar lá me fascinou. Mais tarde trabalhei com Don Siegel , que é um grande fã do meu trabalho como diretor. Ele achou que eu definitivamente deveria fazer isso por causa da minha curiosidade. Então ele me encorajou - e em 1970, quando eu tinha um roteiro que queria fazer, ele disse: 'Você deveria dirigi-lo e eu o apoiarei'". A lendária trilogia dos Dólares de Sergio Leone...

title: Puerto Rico reanudará el inicio del curso escolar la semana que viene tras paso de Ernesto
content: San Juan, 14 ago (EFE).- El gobernador de Puerto Rico, Pedro Pierluisi, informó la tarde de este miércoles de que los funcionarios y el personal esencial volverán a trabajar mañana y se reanudará el inicio del curso escolar la semana que viene, tras el paso del huracán Ernesto por la isla. “Mañana el personal esencial debe acudir a sus respectivos lugares de trabajo en el gobierno y los funcionarios”, indicó Pierlusi, en una rueda de prensa. “En el sistema educativo será el viernes cuando esperamos a los docentes y no docentes y el inicio escolar será el lunes”, añadió el mandatario. Asimismo, el gobernador precisó que el transporte público de trenes urbanos y autobuses se restablecerá mañana y que las instalaciones de los puertos no han sufrido daños. Por otro lado, Pierluisi comentó que mantuvo una conversación telefónica con su homónimo de las Islas Vírgenes de Estados Unidos, Albert Bryan, y afirmó que al igual que Puerto Rico, este territorio insular sufrió cortes de luz, pero la situación está bajo control. Las precipitaciones y las ráfagas de viento provocaron cortes en la débil red eléctrica de la isla y un total de 730.000 clientes, están sin energía eléctrica a las 19:00 hora local (23:00 GMT), según los datos de la compañía LUMA Energy. Juan Saca, presidente de la empresa a cargo de la transmisión y distribución de la energía...

title: Karol Lucero lanza duros dardos contra Felipe Camiroaga: “Era súper egocéntrico”
creator: Cristián Meza
content: Karol Lucero, más conocido como Karol Dance tras su paso por Yingo , lanzó duros dardos contra el fallecido animador Felipe Camiroaga, tildándolo de “súper egocéntrico” y que “hoy estaría funadísimo”. El ex animador de TV compartió su visión en su podcast 1 día más , donde se refirió al otrora conductor de Buenos Días a Todos a propósito de su apariencia física. “¿Saben quién era un huevón muy egocéntrico?, Bueno, cuando mueren se les perdona todo, pero Camiroaga era un huevón súper egocéntrico , un huevón que se creía minazo”, partió declarando Lucero. Karol Lucero, quien aseguró ser admirador de Felipe Camiroaga, planteó que sus actitudes, como “negar parejas”, serían motivo de funa en la actualidad. “Se ha hablado en varios paneles, yo era un gran admirador de Felipe Camiroaga, pero vivo estaría funadísimo por miles de cosas, negaba sus parejas, andaba en huevás que a los que estamos vivos nos hacen bolsa”, aseveró. Junto con ello, el ex Yingo planteó que personajes como Luciano Bello o Washington, representado en diversos programas por el fallecido animador, serían cuestionados. “Tenía un humor parecido al de Don Francisco, hacía un personaje que se llamaba el Washington, donde se sacaba dientes, entonces la gente diría se burla de la gente que no tiene dientes . El alter ego de Camiroaga era Luciano Bello y las personas que trabajaban...

title: Big Lots expands store closures from 40 to 315, including more in NY, NJ, CT
creator: Theresa Braine, Jager Weatherby
content: The Big Lots discount chain is closing hundreds more stores than the 40 it announced in June , affecting locations in the tristate area previously believed to be unscathed. At the time of company’s June filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Big Lots expressed optimism, saying it planned to open three stores in 2024 even as it closed up to 40 of its nearly 1,400 locations . However, a subsequent regulatory notice increased the number of stores closing to 315 nationwide , CNN reported, as the company warned there was “substantial doubt” regarding its ability to stay afloat. While the retailer has not issued a full list of which locations will close, individual store websites have announced their status. In New York State, at least nine of 64 locations are shuttering, including two in Buffalo and one each in Canandaigua , Carle Place, Centereach, Ithaca, Plattsburgh, Poughkeepsie and Queensbury. The Woodbridge, N.J. location has proclaimed its imminent demise , though the rest of the state’s 26 Big Lots stores seem safe for now. In Connecticut , locations in Manchester, Milford, New Milford, Newington, Norwich, Torrington, Waterbury, Waterford and Windsor are all closing, leaving the state with just seven of its previous 16 stores. When exactly the stores will shutter has not been disclosed. Big Lots did not immediately return the Daily News’ request for comment....

title: Cony Capelli barrió con participantes de Gran Hermano: Angélica, Carlyn, y Chama fueron las aludidas

content: El último capítulo de Gran Hermano Chile estuvo cargado de polémicas y enfrentamientos entre algunos participantes. Por lo mismo, la ganadora de la primera temporada, Cony Capelli y quien actualmente forma parte del “panel” de Gran Hermano, no pudo quedarse callada ante los recientes conflictos que se desataron entre algunos de los jugadores actuales . PUBLICIDAD A través de sus redes sociales, C ony lanzó algunas críticas en contra de las actitudes de tres de las participantes: Angélica Sepúlveda, Carlyn Romero y Alexandra “Chama” Méndez . En una serie de stories publicadas en su cuenta de Instagram, Capelli comenzó su desahogo apuntando directamente a Angélica Sepúlveda. Según Cony, el comportamiento de Angélica en el reality fue totalmente inapropiado cuando decidió sacar a relucir un tema del pasado que, a su juicio, no tenía relevancia en el contexto del programa. “ Me parece muy desubicado lo que hizo de sacar un tema que no tiene nada que ver con el reality”, comentó respecto al encontrón de “La Fierecilla” con Chama . “Existen códigos...” Capelli no se quedó allí y continuó su crítica señalando que dentro de los reality shows, existen prácticas que netamente no se hacen. “ Yo creo que dentro de los reality existen códigos entre los participantes de, por favor, jugar con herramientas del presente y no de tu pasado, porque si fuese por el...

title: Mbappe tỏa sáng, Real Madrid phá thêm kỷ lục châu Âu
content: Mbappe về Real Madrid chính là thương vụ chuyển nhượng lớn nhất bóng đá thế giới mùa Hè 2024. Và ngay lập tức, siêu sao Pháp đã phát huy tác dụng tại Los Blancos. Phút 68, anh ghi bàn thắng ấn định tỷ số 2-0 cho Real Madrid trước Atalanta tại trận tranh Siêu cúp châu Âu. Trước đó ở phút 59, Valverde là người mở tỷ số cho Kền kền trắng. Đây đã là chức vô địch Siêu cúp châu Âu lần thứ sáu của Kền kền trắng. Real Madrid hiện là đội vô địch Siêu cúp châu Âu nhiều nhất, vượt lên trên Barca, AC Milan - hai đội đã có 5 lần vô địch. Trận này, không khác nhiều với những gì giới chuyên môn dự đoán, dù Atalanta rất nỗ lực nhưng họ thua kém nhiều Real Madrid về mặt thế trận. Los Blancos kiểm soát bóng tốt hơn, có nhiều tình huống vây hãm khung thành đối phương hơn và ghi bàn hiệu quả hơn. Đại diện của Italia cũng có các cơ hội dứt điểm nhưng đa phần không quá nguy hiểm. Chiến thắng 2-0 cùng chiếc Siêu cúp châu Âu là kết quả phù hợp cho Real Madrid, nó là pha chạy đà hoàn hảo cho mùa giải mới của thầy trò HLV Ancelotti. Đặc biệt, pha ghi bàn của Mbappe cũng như một sự chứng minh rằng, Los Blances vừa thực hiện một thương...

title: Renascer: José Inocêncio faz anúncio ousado após decidir ir viver com Aurora
creator: RD1
content: José Inocêncio (Marcos Palmeira) passará um bom tempo pensando em decisões que poderá tomar para mudar de vida. Nos próximos capítulos de Renascer , o produtor de cacau confirmará que irá morar no Espírito Santo junto com Aurora (Malu Mader). O fazendeiro ficou apaixonado pela mulher e agora acredita que o melhor é ver o que o destino prepara para os dois. Inclusive, o ricaço reunirá algumas pessoas para expor quem cuidará de suas coisas enquanto estiver longe por tempo indeterminado. Pegando a todos de surpresa, José Inocêncio revelará que quer Bento (Marcello Melo Jr) e Kika (Juliane Araújo) no comando de todos os negócios. Algumas pessoas irão ficar em choque com essa escolha ousada e completamente inesperada. O que ele não contava, é que João Pedro (Juan Paiva) seria o único a não aceitar a partida do patriarca. O rapaz será alertado por Mariana (Theresa Fonseca) sobre essa despedida e levará uma facada nas costas por ser deixado sozinho pelo pai naquela região. O personagem de Juan Paiva arderá em fúria e irá em busca do patriarca antes de sua partida para cobrar explicações. Inclusive, pontuará que todos foram alertados da maneira correta e ele precisou descobrir tudo através de outras pessoas. João Pedro também afirmará que sente como se José Inocêncio estivesse traindo Maria Santa (Duda Santos), sua mãe, para viver com Aurora....

title: Pixel 9 Pro ship dates slip as Pixel 9 Pro Fold faces stock issues
creator: Rishaj Upadhyay
content: At yesterday’s Made by Google event , the Mountain View giant officially unveiled the Google Pixel 9 series. It includes four flagship Android smartphones – the Pixel 9, the Pixel 9 Pro, the Pixel 9 Pro XL, and the Pixel 9 Pro Fold. Now that these Google Pixel 9 smartphones are here, you must be wondering about their shipping dates. Among all the four models, the most lauded is the Pixel 9 Pro . Well, it could be because it balances out in the price segment and offers almost the same features as the Pixel 9 Pro XL. If you are a small smartphone lover, the Pixel 9 Pro is just as good. And, for all these reasons the demand for Pixel 9 Pro is soaring high which has eventually pushed shipping dates into late September. The Google Pixel 9 Pro’s shipping dates are pushed back to late September Google announced that the Pixel 9 series will start shipping on August 22. However, it already seems there’s some delay going on with the highly-anticipated Pixel 9 Pro. Today, the folks over at 9to5Google reported that most variants of the Pixel 9 Pro are seeing delays of a week. That’s not all and in some cases two weeks as well. The publication reported that the biggest delay on the Pixel 9 Pro’s 128GB “Hazel” variant, which won’t ship until September 17 in North Carolina. That said, shipping dates of most variants of the Pixel 9 Pro vary somewhere between September 10-17, which converts to...

title: Delays expected during evening commute as DART network experiences temporary outage
content: DALLAS — Blaming a network communications issue, DART says its rail system is experiencing delays on Wednesday -- which could mean delays for drivers during their evening commute. The current delay for DART passengers is about 30 minutes, DART said in a release addressing the issue. The agency added that those delays could grow longer due to rush hour traffic. "The DART team is aware of the issue and is working as quickly and safely as possible to fix the problem," DART said. The agency said that DART's operations and police departments are working at major junctions of the system to move train traffic manually and keep them moving by taking such measures as checking that gate arms are working properly at train junctions. An update will be sent when the system has been resolved, DART said. Additional updates can also be found at DART.org . title: Ayelén Mazzina se presentó en la Justicia para desmentir a Fabiola Yañez y dio detalles de sus encuentros con la ex primera dama
content: Ayelén Mazzina, ex ministra de Mujeres, Género y Diversidad durante la gestión de Alberto Fernández, se presentó en la Justicia luego de quedar imputada en la causa por violencia de género que Fabiola Yañez inició contra Alberto Fernández. La ex ministra, en un escrito que acercó a la fiscalía de Ramiro González, desmintió los dichos de la ex primera dama y dio detalles de sus encuentros para sostener sus dichos. Según explicó, el primero contacto con Yañez fue “el 22 de abril de 2023, durante un almuerzo en la Quinta de Olivos, en el que también estuvo presente el ex presidente Fernández”. Y agregó: “Desde ese momento, la comunicación entre Yañez y yo se desarrolló exclusivamente a través de la aplicación WhatsApp, donde ella solía proponerme participar en algunas actividades en conjunto”. También se refirió al viaje a Brasil, en el cual la ex primera dama dijo que le contó a Mazzina sobre las agresiones del ex mandatario. La ex funcionaria ratifica ese vuelo, pero explica que en ningún momento Yañez le habló de violencia de género. “El 25 de julio de 2023, volvimos a vernos en persona durante un viaje a Brasil con motivo del Primer Encuentro de Integración de Mujeres Latinoamericanas, evento al que ambas fuimos invitadas por el Gobierno de Brasil. En ese viaje, viajamos en el mismo vuelo Yañez, Mariela (la custodia de ella), Jimena...

title: Obituary - Mr. Donald Wayne NeSmith
content: Mr. Donald Wayne NeSmith, age 71, passed away Monday, August 12, 2024, after an extended illness. He was preceded in death by his parents, Carter and Ruby Lee Fountain NeSmith; stepmother, Edith NeSmith; and stepbrother, Thomas Conley. Donald Wayne, affectionately known as “DW”, was born in Bulloch County, but he spent most of his adult life in Scarboro, Georgia. He joined the United States Army in 1970 and he served for seven years in Germany, Korea and Fort Stewart. He was known far and wide for his skills at repairing cotton pickers, and he worked for many years at Blanchard Equipment in Statesboro and Waynesboro. He had a knack for fixing things and he loved fishing and being outdoors. He especially loved spending time with his grandchildren, who were his pride and joy. He is survived by his loving wife, Gail Dailey NeSmith of Scarboro; one daughter and one son, Misty (Stephen) Harris of Millen and Matthew (Libby) NeSmith of Statesboro; three grandchildren, William “Case” Harris and Avery Claire Harris of Millen and Maddox NeSmith of Statesboro; sisters, Bonnie White and Donna Kay Edmonds; stepsisters, Faye Crosby, Nona Jane Martin, Tina Hart and Dianne Melancon. The family will receive visitors on Thursday, August 15, 2024, at 1 p.m. in the chapel of Joiner-Anderson Funeral Home in Statesboro. The funeral service will immediately follow at 2 p.m. There will be a private...

title: Pemprov Jabar Pastikan Tidak Ada Aturan Lepas Hijab untuk Paskibraka HUT Ke-79 RI
content: Pemerintah Provinsi Jabar memastikan tidak ada aturan bagi anggota Pasukan Pengibar Bendera Pusaka (Paskibraka) yang bertugas pada upacara peringatan Hari Ulang Tahun ke-79 RI, tingkat Provinsi. Kepala Kesbangpol Jabar, Rony Sukmaya mengatakan, pihaknya justru ikut mempertanyakan soal aturan lepas hijab bagi yang bertugas di Istana Negara, Ibu Kota Nusantara (IKN), Kalimantan Timur. "Kami juga mempertanyakan ke Pembinaan Ideologi Pancasila (BPIP), kebijakan dan sikap. Karena di seluruh kabupaten dan kota se-Jabar dan di tingkat provinsi gak ada kebijakan lepas jilbab," ujar Rony, Rabu (14/8/2024). Anggota yang akan bertugas pada di Jabar, kata dia, dipersilakan untuk mengenakan hijab. "Kita ikuti aturan BPIP, semuanya. (Jabar) Tidak ada diktum untuk lepas jilbab," katanya. Saat ini, 52 anggota yang akan bertugas pada upacara 17 Agustus di Lapangan Gasibu, Kota Bandung sudah dikukuhkan oleh Penjabat Gubernur Jabar, Bey Machmudin. 52 anggota ini berasal dari 27 kabupaten/kota yang telah menjalani berbagai proses seleksi, mulai dari tes wawasan kebangsaan, intelegensi umum, kesamaptaan, kesehatan, parade, PBB, wawancara hingga rangkaian tes lainnya. Sebelumnya, aturan Paskibra lepas jilbab oleh BPIP menuai polemik di masyarakat. Kepala BPIP, Yudian Wahyudi menegaskan, BPIP tak memaksa putri melepaskan jilbab saat acara tersebut. "Sehubungan berkembangnya wacana publik terkait...

title: S’patna Dasara to begin on Oct 4
content: Mandya : The historic Srirangapatna Dasara will be celebrated with great enthusiasm and grandeur this year. The district administration has planned a series of events to make the festivities more vibrant and enjoyable. N Cheluvarayaswamy, district minister of Mandya, said that the Srirangapatna Dasara celebrations will begin on Oct 4th. “Dasara will be celebrated either for three or five days,” he stated. The minister also instructed the officials to ensure that all the Dasara programmes are captivating and well-organised, leaving no room for any shortcomings. According to deputy commissioner Kumara, various committees such as the reception committee, cultural committee, stage committee, and others have been formed to ensure the smooth organisation of the Srirangapatna Dasara. He added, “Sports, yoga, children's Dasara, and other events will be organised as part of the Dasara celebrations.” The district administration is working diligently to make this year’s Srirangapatna Dasara a memorable experience for all, he added. tnn We also published the following articles recently Grand Mysuru Dasara from Oct 3: Karnataka CM Siddaramaiah The Karnataka government, pleased by recent rains, announced grand celebrations for the Mysuru Dasara festival. Chief Minister Siddaramaiah confirmed funds will be allocated for the event, which includes the renowned Jamboo Savari on Oct 12. An air...

title: Eleição na Venezuela teve irregularidades sem precedentes nas democracias contemporâneas, afirma ONU
content: Quatro especialistas da ONU, que acompanharam a eleição em Caracas escreveram o relatório. Segundo a ONU, o processo de gestão dos resultados do Conselho Nacional Eleitoral ficou aquém das medidas básicas de transparência e integridade que são essenciais para a realização de eleições confiáveis. Eleição na Venezuela teve irregularidades sem precedentes nas democracias contemporâneas, afirma ONU — Foto: Reprodução/TV Globo Jorge Rodríguez, presidente da Assembleia Nacional, controlada por Maduro, disse que vai propor um projeto proibindo observadores internacionais em eleições no país. Nos , a porta-voz da Casa Branca Karine Jean-Pierre disse que o conselho eleitoral não divulga os resultados detalhados porque eles mostrariam que Maduro perdeu a eleição. Na terça-feira (13), o deixou o grupo formado também por e , e que vinha negociando uma saída para a crise na Venezuela. O presidente Lula conversou nesta quarta-feira com o presidente colombiano para definir os próximos passos sem o México.

title: HC orders CBI inquiry into Peeplu murder
content: Jaipur: Rajasthan High Court on Wednesday ordered Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) to take over the probe into the death of 20-year-old Shankar Meena , who was allegedly killed by sand mafia in June 2023. The murder had sparked widespread protests in Peeplu village in Tonk district, where locals accused aides of a local bajri leaseholder of killing Meena. Justice Sameer Jain, presiding over a single bench, issued the order and asked CBI to culminate its investigation within 60 days. “This court is of the view that the investigation in the matter should be referred to the CBI, as the investigation carried out until now... cannot be acted upon, as the same is tainted, shoddy and incomplete,” the court said. We also published the following articles recently CBI takes over investigation into Kolkata doctor's rape-murder case after HC order The Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) took over the investigation into the rape and murder of a woman doctor at a state-run medical college in Kolkata. The Calcutta High Court ordered the state police to transfer the case documents. A civic volunteer was arrested, and preliminary autopsy report confirmed sexual abuse and murder. Doctor rape-murder case: CBI team arrives in Kolkata to begin investigation The Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) arrived in Kolkata to take over the investigation of a female trainee doctor's rape and...

title: Peer Ali: The lost hero of 1857 revolt
creator: Faryal Rumi
content: Patna: “There are some occasions on which it is good to give up life ... You can hang me or those like me every day, but thousands will come up in my place and your purpose will never succeed”: These were probably the last words of Peer Ali Khan before he turned down a clemency offer by then Patna commissioner W Taylor, with a broad smile. The year was 1857 when the first war of Indian Independence was fought. Though India remembers the likes of Mangal Pandey and Rani Laskhmibai, Peer Ali’s name lost in the pages of history. Peer Ali, who was arrested on the charges of mutiny and murder of an English nobleman, was brutally tortured before being hanged to death on July 7, 1857, in Patna at the spot just opposite the collector’s residence, where now stands a park named after him. The British officials believed that Peer Ali — a tall, lanky, kurta-pajama clad, bearded man in his late forties who would often be seen moving around in Bankipur area carrying newspapers and books — was one of the main conspirators of the revolt, having contacts with some sepoys at Danapur Cantonment. They suspected that his residence-cum-bookshop, a small thatched house in Patna City, was the meeting point of the revolutionaries. The British demolished his house and offered him to disclose details of his comrades if he wanted to escape death. But he chose otherwise. As was the practice, there was no...

title: Real Madrid thắng Atalanta trận Siêu cúp, Mbappe có danh hiệu châu Âu đầu tiên
content: Có thể nói cả châu Âu đã sốt ruột chờ những bước chạy đầu tiên của siêu sao Kylian Mbappe trong màu áo Real Madrid, ở cuộc chinh phục danh hiệu châu Âu đầu tiên ở cấp độ câu lạc bộ. Sự mong đợi này có lý do sau khi tiền đạo người Pháp "kéo" hơn 85.000 người hâm mộ đến sân Bernabeu chỉ để dự lễ ra mắt của anh tại đội bóng Hoàng gia cách đây chưa lâu. Ademola Lookman là nỗi đe dọa hàng thủ Real Madrid Không như dự báo của giới chuyên môn, ở cuộc thư hùng với Atalanta trên sân Stadion Naradowy, HLV Carlo Anceloti đã tung Kylian Mbappe ra sân từ đầu và cho anh đá cao nhất trên hàng công Real Madrid. Anh sát cánh cùng Vinicius và Rodrygo trong khi bộ ba tiền vệ Bellingham - Valverde - Tchouameni hỗ trợ ngay phía sau. Jude Bellingham đối mặt bất thành với thủ môn Juan Musso Atalanta trận này mất khá nhiều cầu thủ trụ cột, thế nhưng không vì thế mà đoàn quân của HLV Gian Piero Gasperini bị thất thế. Đội bóng Ý ngược lại còn chủ động dâng cao tấn công, dồn ép Real Madrid phải lùi sâu phòng ngự trên phần sân nhà trong hơn 20 phút đầu tiên. title: EVE Energy stellt fortschrittliche Omnicell 6C-Schnellladebatterie vor, die mit fünf Minuten Ladezeit eine Reichweite von 300 km erreichen kann
content: Mit einer aufgefrischten Markenvision wird EVE Energy die kommerziellen Anwendungen seiner Lithiumbatterien weiter ausbauen und dabei die Bereiche Smart Living, umweltfreundliche Transportmittel, Energieumwandlung und Zukunftserkundung einbeziehen. HUIZHOU, China , 15. August 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- EVE Energy , ein weltweit führendes Unternehmen für Lithium-Ionen-Batterien, brachte diesen Juni seine branchenführende Omnicell 6C-Schnelllade-Allzweckbatterie in großer zylindrischer Bauform auf den Markt, die speziell für High-End-Personenkraftwagen entwickelt wurde. Die innovative Batterie zeichnet sich durch vier wichtige Eigenschaften aus: schnelles Aufladen, niedrige Temperatur, physikalische Eigenschaften und eine nachhaltige Lebensdauer. Bei einer normalen Temperatur von 25 °C kann sie in neun Minuten von 10 % auf 80 % aufgeladen werden und erreicht nach fünfminütigem Aufladen eine Reichweite von 300 Kilometern. Bei einer niedrigen Umgebungstemperatur von -30 °C dauert das Aufladen von 10 % auf 80 % nur 25 Minuten. Johnson Feng , Produktdirektor beim EVE Energy Battery System Research Institute, gab Einblicke in die technischen Kernaspekte der Omnicell-Batterie und das Designkonzept ihres Produktzyklus, der die breitere Anwendung von Lithiumbatterien fördert. „Die Schwierigkeit beim Erreichen von 6C, wobei C das Maß für die Batterieentladung im Verhältnis zur...

title: Donald Trump bizarrely claims teachers and military personnel don't have 'proper jobs'
creator: Nelson Espinal
content: GOP candidate Donald Trump held a rally in North Carolina, which has recently become a battleground state and took aim at teachers and military people. Trump suggested that teachers and military personnel do not have proper jobs and are only held by those from the "private sector." The comment was meant to be a dig at Harris-Walz's ticket as both have served as teachers, and Walz served 24 years with the National Guard. JD Vance completely contradicts Donald Trump's abortion pill stance Donald Trump falsely claims Kamala Harris faked rally size with AI photo The comment is one of the many attacks he gave the democratic ticket, including sarcastically calling Walz a "beauty" and labeling both as socialists. "Neither [Kamala Harris] nor her running mate... have held a private sector job in their entire professional careers, and it's no wonder they're both socialists," Trump said at the rally. The comment did not explicitly refer to the broader teachers and military personnel population. Still, Trump gave the impression that jobs in the private sector are necessary to avoid being socialist. title: Recently Released Talisman Magical Quest Board Game Is On Sale At Amazon
creator: Brendan Hesse
Steven Petite
content: Talisman: The Magical Quest Game made a comeback in June, and if you haven't picked up a copy yet, the fantasy dungeon drawler is on sale for $49 (was $60) at Amazon . Manufactured by Avalon Hill, the developer responsible for hits such as Betrayal at House on the Hill and HeroQuest , Talisman was out of print for years and pricey on reseller marketplaces as a result. You can also preorder the first expansion, a cooperative experience dubbed Talisman Alliances: Fate Beckons . If you've never played Talisman before, it's an adventure board game with light RPG mechanics where up to six players compete to obtain the Crown of Command, slay the Elder Dragon and become the new ruler of the land. Each player chooses from one of 12 characters to play as, including the Thief, Elf, Wizard, and Prophetess. The original game launched back in 1983 and since then has seen multiple revisions, the last being the 4th edition in 2008. The game is typically quite pricey on the reseller market. This new 5th edition printing makes picking up a copy of the game much easier. Talisman Alliances: Fate Beckons is an exciting expansion, because for the first time in the board game's 40-year history, Talisman will offer a cooperative mode for two to six players. The $34 expansion set includes new characters, adventure cards, and spells. Teams will try to conquer five trials, which Avalon Hill describes...

title: In focus: Hula hooping among contests at Southwest Washington Fair
content: From hula hooping to pie eating, the Southwest Washington Fair has a variety of contests available for attendees to watch or participate in with some fun prizes awaiting the winners. On Thursday, Aug. 15, the annual KELA/KMNT Diaper Derby will be held on the Community Stage at 12 p.m. On Friday, Aug. 16, a pie eating contest will take place on the Community Stage at 3 p.m. Saturday’s contests will feature watermelon eating at 12:30 p.m. on the Community Stage and a mullet contest on the Saloon Stage at 4 p.m. All contests are free to enter for all attendees with fair admission. For more information visit https://southwestwashingtonfair.org/events/contests/ .

title: На Солнце зафиксировали вспышку высочайшего класса
content: Tекст: Антон Антонов Богачев сообщил, что «на Солнце новая вспышка X уровня – точно на линии Солнце – Земля». Вспышка произошла утром в среду. «Зарегистрирован новый взрыв высшего балла, по предварительной оценке – уровня X1.1», – приводит его слова РИА «Новости» . Отмечается, что вспышка зафиксирована в северном полушарии Солнца, что достаточно необычно для нынешнего солнечного цикла. Она произошла, «по сути, в центре видимого солнечного диска, откуда воздействие на Землю в случае выбросов массы является неизбежным и происходит с максимальной эффективностью», сказал Богачев. Солнечные вспышки в зависимости от мощности рентгеновского излучения делятся на пять классов: A, B, C, M и X. Минимальный класс – A0.0, передает ТАСС . Напомним, до этого вспышки самого высокого класса X на Солнце происходили в июне.

title: 富士山「お鉢巡り」静岡新聞社記者の登山ルポ 剣ケ峰周辺、1周3キロ(あなたの静岡新聞)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 8/15(木) 8:18 配信 富士山頂で「お鉢巡り」をする登山者。火口を囲むようにアップダウンのある道が続く=8月上旬、同山剣ケ峰付近 11日の「山の日」にお盆休みも重なり、山行を計画している人も多い時季だ。7月10日に富士宮、須走、御殿場の静岡県側3ルートが開通した富士山には、今夏も多くの登山者が足を運んでいる。8月初旬、日本一の霊峰を訪ね、にぎわう山頂一帯を巡った。 雲海から姿を現した御来光を眺める登山者=富士山吉田・須走口頂上付近 富士山頂は中央部に大きな火口があり、外縁部には標高3776メートルの国内最高地点「剣ケ峰」をはじめ、朝日岳や伊豆岳など、いくつかのピークが連なる。外縁部を1周する約3キロの「お鉢巡り」のルートが整備され、休憩せずに歩けば1時間半~2時間程度で回れる。雲がなければ静岡県側の眼下に富士、富士宮、御殿場各市の市街地や伊豆半島の絶景、山梨県側は富士五湖などが一望できる。時には房総半島辺りまで見えることも。雲が出ても一面に雲海が広がる様子が幻想的だ。 国内最高地点を示す石柱で記念撮影する登山者 剣ケ峰に立つ石柱の前には多くの登山者が行列をつくり、記念撮影を楽しんでいた。東京都板橋区から須走ルートを登って訪れた木村博昭さん(47)は2度目の富士登山。昨年は体力的に厳しく途中で断念したため、入念に準備して再チャレンジした。「山頂到達は念願だったのでうれしいし、日本一の山に登るのはやはり達成感が違う。次は別のルートにも挑戦してみたい」と笑顔を見せた。 剣ケ峰に続く「馬の背」を登る登山者。旧富士山測候所の建物が立つ お鉢巡りのルート上は見どころが多い。富士宮口の頂上には、富士山本宮浅間大社奥宮や富士山頂郵便局、山小屋の頂上富士館などがある。富士宮口から時計回りに進むと「馬の背」と呼ばれる急坂の先に剣ケ峰がそびえ、旧富士山測候所の建物が立つ。2004年まで有人で気象観測をしていたが、現在は高所を生かした科学研究の拠点になっている。 休憩の登山者でにぎわう山小屋前=富士山吉田・須走口頂上付近 荒々しい火口の風景や大沢崩れを横目にアップダウンを繰り返しながら北側を半周すると、本8合目で合流する吉田口と須走口共通の頂上に到着。山小屋に入って食事をとり、土産品を買い求める登山者でにぎやかだ。ここから御殿場口の頂上手前までは東方向が開けていて、御来光を拝むのに格好のポイントがあちこちにある。 1 / 2ページ 神奈川県で最大震度3 東京、埼玉、山梨、静岡で震度1 神奈川県西部が震源の地震 津波の心配なし【地震情報】 「車に幅寄せされている」交通トラブルか 軽乗用車殴りへこませた疑いでオートバイ運転の男逮捕=静岡県警 追突事故で孫と祖母の2人死亡 岐阜県関市の国道 車に追突→電柱に衝突、祖母と孫が死亡 岐阜・関市の国道 「子宝の湯」営業休止へ、経営悪化で9月29日 岐阜・郡上市内の温泉、立て続けに...

title: Dodgers activate RHP Buehler to face Brewers
content: MILWAUKEE -- Los Angeles Dodgers right-hander Walker Buehler returned from the injured list to start the NL West leaders' Wednesday night game against the Milwaukee Brewers . Buehler hadn't pitched since June 19 because of right hip inflammation. Entering Wednesday, the two-time All-Star had gone 1-4 with a 5.84 ERA in eight starts this year after missing the 2023 season while recovering from Tommy John surgery. In three rehabilitation appearances with Triple-A Oklahoma City, Buehler allowed nine earned runs over 122⁄3 innings. He struck out five while allowing one run, one hit and three walks over 51⁄3 innings Thursday. The Dodgers made room for Buehler by optioning right-hander Landon Knack , who had gone 2-2 with a 3.00 ERA in 10 appearances. Buehler's return comes at an ideal time for the Dodgers, who have been dealing with injuries to their starting rotation all season. The latest setback came with Tuesday's announcement that River Ryan will undergo Tommy John surgery next week. The Dodgers entered Wednesday's action with a 71-49 record that matched the Cleveland Guardians for the best in the majors.

title: ఐక్యరాజ్యసమితి శాశ్వత ప్రతినిధిగా తెలుగు వ్యక్తి
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: ఐక్యరాజ్యసమితిలో భారతదేశ శాశ్వత ప్రతినిధిగా తెలుగు వ్యక్తి పర్వతనేని హరీశ్‌ నియమితులయ్యారు. ఈ విషయాన్ని భారత విదేశాంగశాఖ బుధవారం ప్రకటించింది. 1990 క్యాడర్‌కు ఐఎ్‌ఫఎ్‌స(ఇండియన్‌ ఫారిన్‌ సర్వీసు) బ్యాచ్‌కు చెందిన హరీశ్‌... ప్రస్తుతం జర్మనీ రాయబారిగా పనిచేస్తున్నారు. ఐక్యరాజ్యసమితిలో భారత తొలి, శాశ్వత మహిళా రాయబారిగా సేవలందించిన సీనియర్‌ దౌత్యవేత్త రుచిరా కాంభోజ్‌ జూన్‌ 1న పదవీ విరమణ చేయడంతో ఆమె స్థానంలో హరీశ్‌ను కేంద్రం నియమించింది. త్వరలో ఆయన బాధ్యతలు చేపడతారని విదేశాంగశాఖ వెల్లడించింది. హైదరాబాద్‌లోని ఉస్మానియా యూనివర్సిటీలో మెకానికల్‌ ఇంజనీరింగ్‌, కోల్‌కత్తాలోని ఐఐఎంలో మేనేజ్‌మెంట్‌ కోర్సును పూర్తిచేశారు. విదేశాంగ మంత్రిత్వశాఖలో ఆర్థిక సంబంధాల అదనపు కార్యదర్శిగా బాఽధ్యతలు నిర్వర్తించారు. తూర్పు ఆసియాకి చెందిన పలు దేశాల్లో భారత రాయబారిగా, హ్యూస్టన్‌లో భారత కాన్సులేట్‌ జనరల్‌గా, వియత్నాంలో రాయబారిగా పనిచేసిన ఆయన... దాదాపు మూడు దశాబ్దాలకు పైగా దౌత్య సేవలందించారు. బహుళ దేశాల ఆర్థిక సంబంధాల విభాగానికి అధిపతిగా వ్యవహరించారు. జీ-20, జీ-7, బ్రిక్స్‌ సమావేశాల్లో దేశం తరపున పాల్గొన్నారు. అమెరికన్‌ కైరో యూనివర్సిటీలో అరబిక్‌ నేర్చుకున్న ఆయన... కైరో, రియాధ్‌లలో రాయబారిగా పనిచేశారు. గాజా నగరంలో పాలస్తీనియన్‌ అథారిటీలో భారత ప్రతినిధిగా ఉన్నారు. పాలస్తీనాలో ఐక్యరాజ్య సమితి తరపున సహాయ కార్యక్రమాలకు ఆధ్వర్యం వహించారు. 2007 నుంచి భారత ఉపరాష్ట్రపతికి జాయింట్‌ సెక్రటరీగా ఉన్నారు.

title: Aussie fans left devastated as Love Island UK star Molly-Mae Hague announces shock split from fiancé Tommy Fury after five years
content: Aussie fans left devastated as Love Island UK star Molly-Mae Hague announces shock split from fiancé Tommy Fury after five years READ MORE: Molly-Mae Hague is slammed for booking budget airline Ryanair By Jimmy Briggs For Daily Mail Australia Published: 00:18, 15 August 2024 | Updated: 00:33, 15 August 2024 e-mail 19 shares 1 View comments Heartbroken Australian fans of Love Island UK have gone online to express their sadness at the shock split of stars Molly-Mae Hague and her fiancé Tommy Fury . The couple, both 25, who met on the show in 2019 and went on to get engaged and welcome their daughter Bambi in 2023, announced their split on Wednesday, following months of speculation . Celebrity gossip page Keeping Up With Aussie Influencers shared Molly-Mae's heartbreaking break-up statement to Instagram, leading to many fans commenting their sadness. 'I'm actually devastated,' wrote the page as another fan chipped in: 'I am not okay'. 'Wow! That's awful. I wonder if she will have to move from that beautiful house,' a third person chipped in. Another user wrote,'Nooooo! why' while several other fans posted sad face emojis. On Wednesday, Molly-Mae took to Instagram Stories to share the bombshell news: 'Never in a million years did I think I'd ever have to write this. 'After five years of being together I never imagined our story would end, especially not this way. Heartbroken...

title: Sources: Pats deal Pro Bowl LB Judon to Falcons
content: The Atlanta Falcons have landed the pass rusher they sought for years. The New England Patriots are trading top edge rusher Matthew Judon to the Falcons for a third-round draft pick, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter on Wednesday night. Judon had been practicing after a brief absence from the team. The Falcons and Judon have not hammered out a contract for next season yet, but plan to work toward one before the start of the season, a source told ESPN's Dan Graziano. Judon, who turns 32 on Thursday, is a four-time Pro Bowler who had a career-high 15.5 sacks in 2022 following a 12.5-sack season in 2021. He missed most of last year with a torn bicep. The Falcons have not had a double-digit sack leader since Vic Beasley in 2016, which corresponds to their last Super Bowl appearance. Atlanta lost edge rusher Bralen Trice , a rookie third-round pick, for the season due to a knee injury suffered last Friday night in a preseason game against the Miami Dolphins .
