title: Kolkata : సామూహిక హత్యాచారమే?
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: : కోల్‌కతాలోని ఆర్జీ కార్‌ వైద్యకళాశాల ఆస్పత్రిలో విధుల్లో ఉన్న జూనియర్‌ వైద్యురాలి (31)పై అత్యాచారం, హత్య ఘటనకు దిగ్ర్భాంతికరమైన విషయం వెలుగులోకి వచ్చింది. ఆమెపై సామూహిక అత్యాచారం జరిగినట్లు తెలుస్తోంది. హతురాలి శరీరంలో పెద్ద పరిమాణంలో 150 మిల్లీగ్రాముల వీర్యాన్ని గుర్తించినట్లు పోస్టుమార్టం నివేదిక ద్వారా వెల్లడైంది. వైద్యురాలిపై హత్యాచారం కేసును సీబీఐకి అప్పగించాలంటూ హతురాలి తల్లిదండ్రులు కలకత్తా హైకోర్టును ఆశ్రయించడం... ఆ మేరకు కేసు దర్యాప్తును సీబీఐకి బదిలీ చేయాలని కోర్టు మంగళవారం ఉత్తర్వులు జారీ చేయడం తెలిసిందే. కాగా హైకోర్టులో వేసిన పిటిషన్‌లో హతురాలి తల్లిదండ్రులు.. పోస్టుమార్టం నివేదికలోని అంశాలను పేర్కొన్నారు. ‘‘హతురాలి శరీరంలో 150 మిల్లీ గ్రాముల పరిమాణంలో వీర్యం లభించినట్లు తేలింది. ఇది వ్యక్తి ద్వారా సాధ్యం కాదు. అత్యాచార ఘటనలో ఒకరిని మించి ఉన్నారని ఈ పరిమాణం సూచిస్తోంది. ఆమెపై సామూహిక అత్యాచారానికి పాల్పడి చంపేశారు’’ అని పిటిషన్‌లో పేర్కొన్నారు. తమ కూతురి శరీరంలో చెవులు, మెడ, పెదవులపై తీవ్ర గాయాలున్నాయని, అత్యాచారానికి పాల్పడే క్రమంలో ఆమెపై పాశవిక దాడికి పాల్పడ్డారని, ఇదంతా ఒక్కరితో అయ్యే పని కాదని పిటిషన్‌లో పేర్కొన్నారు. సామూహిక అత్యాచారం జరిగినట్లు పోస్టుమార్టం నివేదిక ద్వారా బలమైన ఆధారం లభించినా ఈ కేసులో మిగతా నిందితులను ఇప్పటిదాకా అరెస్టు చేయలేదని హతురాలి తల్లిదండ్రులు కోర్టు దృష్టికి తెచ్చారు. మరోవైపు.. కలకత్తా హైకోర్టు ఆదేశాల మేరకు కేసును సీబీఐ తమ చేతుల్లోకి తీసుకుంది. నిందితుడు సంజయ్‌ రాయ్‌ని కూడా కస్టడీలోకి తీసుకుంది. కాగా, ఈ కేసులో బాధిత...

title: Matsuyama's caddie returns home to Japan after passport stolen after Olympics
creator: The Canadian Press
content: MEMPHIS, Tenn. (AP) — Hideki Matsuyama is starting the PGA Tour’s lucrative post-season without his caddie and coach after they were victims of a robbery during a stopover in London from the Paris Olympics, Golf Digest Japan reported. The magazine said Matsuyama had his wallet stolen, but not his Olympic bronze medal or his passport. His caddie, Shota Hayato, and coach Mikihito Kuromiya, were not so fortunate. Golf Digest Japan said their passports and visas were stolen. They had to return to Japan and were working to get new documents expedited to return to the United States. Matsuyama, who won at Riviera in the Genesis Invitational this year, is No. 8 in the FedEx Cup and is assured of making it through two playoff events to reach the season-ending Tour Championship in Atlanta. The FedEx St. Jude Championship starts Thursday. The next stop is the BMW Championship outside Denver before the Tour Championship. Matsuyama told the magazine there was a chance they can make it to Atlanta, “but we have to go into it thinking it’s close to zero.” Taiga Tabuchi, who caddied for Ryo Hisatsune earlier this year, will work for Matsuyama at the TPC Southwind this week. --- AP golf: The Associated Press

title: BlackRock, Vanguard big purchasers of Trump Media shares in Q2, filings show
creator: Reuters
content: By David Randall NEW YORK (Reuters) - A handful of institutional investors bought large positions in former President Donald Trump’s media company in the second quarter ahead of the company's inclusion in two Russell indexes, regulatory filings released on Wednesday showed. Among the biggest purchasers of shares of Trump Media & Technology Group, the parent company of the Truth Social platform, were asset managers Vanguard, State Street and BlackRock, which are known for their passive investing businesses. Those include exchange traded funds that buy shares of companies included in a wide range of indexes that they track. Vanguard Group initiated a new position with the purchase of nearly 2.9 million shares of Trump Media, with a market value of approximately $94.3 million at the end of the quarter, the filings showed. BlackRock initiated a new position with the purchase of nearly 2.2 million shares, while State Street initiated a new position with just over 440,000 shares. Trump Media & Technology was added to the Russell 1000 and Russell 3000 at the end of June, the final day of the last regulatory disclosure period. Index-based firms often purchase shares of companies they expect to be added to an index prior to their official inclusion, market participants said. Other purchasers of Trump Media included hedge fund Greenwich Wealth Management, with a new position of 350,000...

title: Karol Lucero y polémica por dichos sobre Felipe Camiroaga: "No eran las palabras apropiadas"
creator: Constanza Suarez
content: Rápida polémica es la que se vive esta tarde en la televisión chilena y redes sociales. Esto tras unos dichos de Karol Lucero sobre Felipe Camiroaga. Y es que el animador, en su podcast Un Día + , se refirió a ciertas actitudes del fallecido rostro de TVN que hoy no serían bien vistas. Pero las críticas no se dejaron esperar contra Lucero , quien tuvo que salir a aclarar sus dichos en vivo en el programa de Canal 13, Hay que Decirlo!. ¿Qué dijo Karol Lucero? En contacto telefónico, Karol partió diciendo sobre esta opción de aclarar la polémica que “la verdad no sé si llamarlo derecho a réplica, estoy acostumbrado a este tipo de situaciones donde la prensa pone una declaración y lo transforman en una verdad “. “Lamentablemente, el día de hoy la generación de cristal lo tendría funadísimo si estuviese vivo (a Felipe) , eso fue lo que comenté, pero sin ningún ánimo de crítica”, añadió. ver también El animador se explayó hablando sobre Camiroaga que “si hay un referente que siempre admiré, es Camiroaga. Cuando dicen que lo critica, como Cooperativa o BioBio , yo no lo estaba criticando. La crítica es social , como hoy día a una persona con el talento que tenía, hoy esta generación no le dejaría pasar ninguna”. “Era innecesario, ese video ni siquiera lo subimos a las redes oficiales, lo subió otra persona. Por este tipo de cosas no me gusta llamar...

content: T res jóvenes perdieron la vida cuando dos motocicletas chocaron de frente mientras se movilizaban en horas de la noche por el área rural del municipio de Moñitos, en la zona costera de Córdoba. title: Taylor Swift set for emotional London return after terror threat
content: LONDON — Taylor Swift will take to the stage in London on Thursday, resuming the world's biggest ever concert tour amid tightened security after a foiled Islamic State-inspired attack forced the cancellation of her Vienna dates last week. British police have said there is nothing to indicate that events in Vienna would impact the five appearances at Wembley Stadium, where 90,000 "Swifties" are expected to cheer her on each evening. However, security is set to be tight. Tay-gating, the practise of gathering outside a Taylor Swift show without a ticket, like thousands did in Munich earlier in the summer, will not be allowed, as authorities try to reduce harder-to-control vulnerabilities outside the venue. Fans at Wembley will enter through metal detectors and are only allowed to bring one small bag. Glass and metal containers, laptops and umbrellas are all banned. "Anyone hanging around outside the stadium will be moved on by security," Wembley said on its website. Swift, 34, has previously said her biggest fear was the risk to her fans following two attacks at music events in 2017 -- a Las Vegas shooting and a suicide bombing at an Ariana Grande concert in Manchester, England, that prompted a rethink of the way British authorities police major shows. She said the attacks had made her "terrified" of going on tour and prompted additional planning and safety measures. "We have to...

title: 42년 삼성 역사 최초 100만 시대, 3연승까지 겹경사
content: 삼성 원태인이 14일 kt와 홈 경기에 선발 등판해 역투하고 있다. 삼성 라이온즈 프로야구 삼성이 구단 최초 한 시즌 홈 관중 100만 명 돌파의 경사를 누린 가운데 팀도 3연승을 달렸다. 삼성은 14일 대구 삼성 라이온즈 파크에서 열린 '2024 신한 SOL 뱅크 KBO 리그' kt와 홈 경기에서 3 대 1로 이겼다. 주중 3연전에서 위닝 시리즈를 확보했다. 지난 11일 KIA전부터 3연승이다. 삼성은 시즌 2번째로 60승 고지(51승 2패)를 밟으며 이날 한화 원정에서 5 대 9로 덜미를 잡힌 2위 LG에 0.5경기 차로 따라붙었다. 특히 삼성은 이날 1982년 프로 출범부터 이어온 구단 역사상 처음으로 한 시즌 홈 100만 관중을 넘어섰다. 이날 2만435명의 팬이 입장해 올해 누적 관중 101만4689명을 기록했다. 삼성은 1982년 이후 약 1만 석 규모의 대구 시민구장을 안방으로 썼으나 2016년 대구 삼성 라이온즈 파크로 이전했다. 선발 원태인이 72⁄3이닝 5탈삼진 무4사구 4피안타 1실점 쾌투로 시즌 11승째(6패)를 따냈다. 엔마누엘 데 헤이수스(키움)와 다승 공동 1위에 올랐다. 1번 타자 김지찬이 3타수 2안타 2득점으로 공격 첨병 역할을 톡톡히 해냈다. 3번 타자 구자욱도 1회말 1타점 2루타로 제몫을 해냈다. kt는 선발 윌리엄 쿠에바스가 6이닝 9탈삼진 4피안타 3볼넷 1실점 역투를 펼쳤지만 승리를 거두지 못했다. 1 대 1로 맞선 7회말 연속 실책 등으로 뼈아픈 2실점, 4연패에...

title: Cielo (CIEL3) deixará de ser negociada no Novo Mercado; veja quando
content: A B3 informou que as ações da Cielo (CIEL3) deixarão de ser negociadas no Novo Mercado a partir de quinta-feira (15), passando a ser negociadas no segmento Básico. A mudança decorre da oferta pública de aquisição (OPA) realizada nesta quarta-feira (14) pelos bancos controladores, Bradesco (BBDC4) e Banco do Brasil (BBAS3), que pretendem fechar o capital da companhia. O leilão da OPA foi encerrado com a compra de 736.857.044 papéis pelas ofertantes, subsidiárias do Bradesco e do BB. Por abranger 81,7% das ações objeto da oferta, permitirá a saída da Cielo tanto do Novo Mercado quanto da Bolsa. Cada um dos papéis foi comprado a R$ 5,82, valor oferecido pelos bancos em 1o de abril e ajustado pelo CDI acumulado desde então, mais os proventos distribuídos pela companhia. Ao todo, a oferta movimentou R$ 4,288 bilhões, valor que será pago na sexta. A Cielo deixará a Bolsa caso a Comissão de Valores Mobiliários (CVM) aprove a conversão de seu registro de companhia aberta de tipo A para o tipo B. Essa aprovação pode levar ao menos um mês para acontecer, de acordo com os prazos expressos no edital da OPA. Ações ciel3 mercado Oferta Pública de Aquisição (OPA)

title: Maskvoje sujudimas. „Spec. pulkai, OMON ir Rusijos gvardija“
content: Maskvoje sustiprintos saugumo priemonės. Jie tikisi galimo sabotažo grupuočių įsiskverbimo į sostinę. Kremliaus kontroliuojamas BAZA šaltinis apie tai pranešė rugpjūčio 13-osios vakarą, remdamasis informuotais šaltiniais, praneša Dialog.UA. Nauji darbuotojai į budėjimą išleidžiami tik poromis su patyrusiais kovotojais, kelių policijos ekipažai sustiprinti ginkluotomis specialiosiomis pajėgomis. Saugumo pajėgos buvo įspėtos apie grėsmę konfiskuoti jų ginklus. „Maskva nuolat stebi grėsmes, įskaitant galimą sabotažo grupuočių įsiskverbimą į Maskvą ir Maskvos sritį... Sustiprintas centre ir aplink Kremlių esančios teritorijos saugumas“, – pranešė šaltinis. Tokį saugumo priemonių padidinimą greičiausiai lėmė Ukrainos puolimas Kursko srityje. Kremlius baiminasi, kad per kovos zoną į Rusijos Federacijos teritoriją gali prasiskverbti sabotažo grupės, siekdamos sunaikinti Ukrainos priešus, tarp kurių yra aukščiausia Rusijos Federacijos vadovybė ir jos „tarnai“.

title: Se cumple el compromiso de llevar a la UMSNH a Zamora
content: Zamora, Michoacán La Universidad Michoacana de San Nicolás de Hidalgo (UMSNH) está formalmente en Zamora a través de la Unidad Profesional que puso en marcha el gobernador del estado Alfredo Ramírez Bedolla y la rectora Yarabí Ávila González. Ahí, el mandatario adelantó que se está trabajando para reformar la Constitución del Estado y darle a la Universidad Michoacana el nivel que merece, y reconoció que el Consejo Universitario está llevando a cabo todo un procedimiento para activar la fuerza viva, la fuerza democrática de la Universidad, adaptarse a los nuevos tiempos, y lograr un presupuesto digno, suficiente y pleno en la Constitución. Durante la inauguración de la Unidad Profesional de Zamora de la UMSNH y arranque del ciclo escolar 2024-2025, el gobernador manifestó su satisfacción por la apertura de este esperado campus, el segundo que ha inaugurado durante su gestión. “Este campus tiene una capacidad instalada de 2500 alumnos, tenemos seguramente en próximos años que ampliarlo, porque estamos calculando con la rectora que tendremos lleno total en un par de años”. Puedes leer: Planean autopista Agroexportación Uruapan-Zamora; conectará cuatro estados Señaló que en Zamora no había presencia de la UMSNH y esta Unidad viene a sumarse a la oferta educativa pública y privada del municipio, que dijo, viene a colaborar, no a competir con otras...

title: MLB owner sued for stealing sand from Malibu beach
content: FOX Sports' Derek Jeter joins Colin Cowherd to discuss Shohei Ohtani's toughness and what separates him from other of MLB's top talent. A lawsuit against Milwaukee Brewers billionaire owner Mark Attanasio claims he's been stealing sand from Malibu's Broad Beach and carrying it to his home for his personal use on a construction project, according to documents obtained by The Los Angeles Times . The lawsuit was filed by Attanasio's next-door neighbor James Kohlberg and claims the Brewers owner has been using excavators on a public natural resource, restricting public access to the beach while also exposing local marine life to the potentially hazardous byproducts of heavy machinery, causing public and private nuisance as well as violating the California Coastal Act. CLICK HERE FOR MORE SPORTS COVERAGE ON FOXNEWS.COM Milwaukee Brewers' Rhys Hoskins yells toward New York Mets' Jeff McNeil as benches cleared during the eighth inning of a baseball game Friday, March 29, 2024, in New York (AP Photo/Frank Franklin II) "This case is about a private property owner using a public beach as their own personal sandbox and the disturbing conversion of a public natural resource (i.e., sand from Broad Beach) for a nearby homeowner's personal, private use," the lawsuit says. title: Irving Jassiel está detenido por traer crystal; FGE busca relacionarlo a agresión sexual de estudiante
creator: Martinez Mariané
content: Los Mochis, Sin. Por el delito contra la salud en su modalidad de narcomenudeo es que fue puesto a disposición del agente del Ministerio Público del Fuero Común, Irving Jassiel “V” , de 34 años , vecino de la colonia Jardines de Villa, y de quien se sospecha es el posible agresor sexual de una jovencita de 14 años. Debes leer: Capturan al presunto agresor sexual de la estudiante de 14 años en Los Mochis De acuerdo a los datos recabados por Línea Directa , fueron elementos del Grupo de Operaciones Tácticas Especiales (GOTE), quienes al realizar un operativo de vigilancia la noche del martes a las 23:00 horas por la zona suroriente de Los Mochis, detectaron por la calle América y Guillermo Macías, en el fraccionamiento Nuevo Siglo , a un hombre que caminaba por la vía pública y se asomaba al interior de los vehículos estacionados. Estos operativos de vigilancia se reforzaron e intensificaron tras los hechos ocurridos el pasado lunes donde una menor de edad, estudiante de preparatoria, fue agredida sexualmente en el fraccionamiento Primavera. Sigue leyendo: “Se logró la detención”: SSPM confirma arresto de presunto agresor sexual de estudiante en Los Mochis La actitud sospechosa levantó recelo entre los agentes preventivos y más cuando intentó abrir un vehículo estacionado en un domicilio particular, pero al no poder llevárselo desistió y continuó caminando....

title: Semar crea el Grupo Aeroportuario Marina para controlar el AICM
creator: Guillermo Espinosa
content: La Secretaría de Marina ( Semar ) informó este miércoles sobre la fusión de dos empresas con participación estatal mayoritaria al Aeropuerto Internacional de la Ciudad de México ( AICM ). Esto con la f inalidad es de eliminar redundancias en la estructura corporativa de las entidades aeroportuarias a su cargo , la Semar llevó a cabo la presentación de los convenios de fusión firmados entre as empresas Grupo Aeroportuario de la Ciudad de México (GACM) y Servicios Aeroportuarios de la Ciudad de México (SACM) con el Aeropuerto Internacional de la Ciudad de México, S.A. de C.V. ( AICM ), para que sean coordinadas por la Secretaría de Marina . Por lo anterior, se implementaron acciones para eliminar redundancias en la estructura corporativa de dichas entidades, aeroportuarias, lo que permitirá “optimizar operaciones y recursos para mejorar la rentabilidad de la empresa, la seguridad en los aeropuertos y la conectividad aérea del país en beneficio de las personas usuarias”. De conformidad con lo establecido en las normas generales para la desincorporación por fusión de empresas de participación estatal mayoritaria , se contó con la resolución favorable de la Secretaría de Hacienda y Crédito Público (SHCP) sobre el proyecto de fusión presentado por la Secretaría de Marina , los órganos de gobierno de las entidades involucradas aprobaron dicha decisión. title: Free electricity for agri pumps of 1.63L farmers in Nagpur, Wardha
creator: Viraj Deshpande
content: Nagpur: The CM Baliraj Free Electricity Scheme is set to benefit 1.63 lakh farmers from Nagpur circle of MSEDCL, comprising Nagpur and Wardha districts. The state govt had recently issued a GR declaring free electricity to farmers who own agricultural pumps up to 7.5 HP capacity for the next five years. Around 90,654 farmers from Nagpur and 72,558 farmers from Wardha will be entitled to free electricity. The MSEDCL stated that in accordance with the GR, by the end of March 2024, a cumulative of 47.41 lakh agricultural pump consumers across the state were provided electricity through MSEDCL. We also published the following articles recently Ola Electric teases upcoming electric motorcycle, launch set for 15th August: Details Ola Electric had teased its first electric motorcycle which would debut on August 15th, India's Independence Day. The teaser indicated that this model wasn't one of the four previously revealed concept EVs of last year. Limited details were revealed, showcasing LED lights, tank shrouds, and an upright handlebar. Further specifics about design and powertrain remain undisclosed. title: BGE contractor killed in Harford County explosion set for Sunday funeral
content: A Baltimore Gas and Electric Co. contractor will be laid to rest Sunday, a week after he died in a gas explosion that rocked a Bel Air neighborhood. José Rodriguez-Alvarado’s funeral services are set to be held at Mt. Rainier Christian Church/Emanuel Spanish Seventh-day Adventist Church in Mount Rainier in Prince George’s County, with a visitation scheduled to start at noon and run to 5 p.m., when the funeral will begin. Rodriguez-Alvarado, a Columbia resident who worked with a crew of linemen at Arbutus-based Hammer’s Powerline Maintenance, died on the job Sunday in the gas explosion that leveled a house in Bel Air, also killing the homeowner and displacing roughly a dozen residents. Rodriguez-Alvarado, originally from El Salvador, was 35. The homeowner, Raymond C. Corkran Jr. , 73, was described by neighbors as an “anchor” of the Arthurs Woods Drive community. A fundraiser was set up by Rodriguez-Alvarado’s brother, Carlos Garcia, to bring Rodriguez-Alvarado back to El Salvador. There, the utility worker’s mother “who will be waiting to give her last farewell,” wrote Garcia, who did not return a request for comment. Colleagues remembered Rodriguez-Alvarado as a worker who could brighten their day with a friendly demeanor and a smile that spread. Eric Crawford, a lineman who knew Rodriguez-Alvarado through the industry, remembered the utility worker as also being a...

title: Brace for Hurricane Ernesto’s wrath as storm brings ‘life threatening’ currents to East Coast & knocks out power to 700k
creator: Kathleen Livingstone
content: EAST Coast residents have been warned to watch out for dangerous currents and ocean swells coming this week after Hurricane Ernesto plunged hundreds of thousands of people into darkness. Even before the storm reached its maximum strength, its wind and rain knocked power out for about half of the residents of Puerto Rico early on Wednesday. The US territory's biggest electricity provider, Luma Energy , reported that more than 700,000 of its nearly 1.5 million customers were without power as of Wednesday afternoon. Two smaller islands closer to the East Coast — Culebra and Vieques —are experiencing near-total blackouts . The storm was elevated to a Category 1 hurricane on Wednesday morning as it picked up power and speed in the Atlantic. The extreme weather has already crossed over the US and British Virgin Islands, Puerto Rico, Bermuda, and several smaller islands bringing torrential rain, dangerous currents, and violent winds that left some areas in near-total blackouts. Read more about weather The hurricane clocked sustained wind speeds of 75 mph by 2 pm, dumping ten inches of rain in some areas and prompting extreme weather alerts in others. “I know it was a long night listening to that wind howl,” U.S. Virgin Islands Governor Albert Bryan Jr. said in a news conference earlier in the day. The National Hurricane Center has warned East Coast residents that Hurricane Ernesto...

title: Puerto Rico reanudará el inicio del curso escolar la semana que viene tras paso de Ernesto
creator: Newsroom Infobae
content: San Juan, 14 ago (EFE).- El gobernador de Puerto Rico, Pedro Pierluisi, informó la tarde de este miércoles de que los funcionarios y el personal esencial volverán a trabajar mañana y se reanudará el inicio del curso escolar la semana que viene, tras el paso del huracán Ernesto por la isla. "Mañana el personal esencial debe acudir a sus respectivos lugares de trabajo en el gobierno y los funcionarios", indicó Pierlusi, en una rueda de prensa. "En el sistema educativo será el viernes cuando esperamos a los docentes y no docentes y el inicio escolar será el lunes", añadió el mandatario. Asimismo, el gobernador precisó que el transporte público de trenes urbanos y autobuses se restablecerá este jueves y que las instalaciones de los puertos no han sufrido daños. Por otro lado, Pierluisi comentó que mantuvo una conversación telefónica con su homónimo de las Islas Vírgenes de Estados Unidos, Albert Bryan, y afirmó que al igual que Puerto Rico, este territorio insular sufrió cortes de luz, pero la situación está bajo control. Las precipitaciones y las ráfagas de viento provocaron cortes en la débil red eléctrica de la isla y un total de 730.000 clientes, están sin energía eléctrica a las 19:00 hora local (23:00 GMT), según los datos de la compañía LUMA Energy. title: Begini Kondisi Ekonomi dan Kas Negara di Awal Kemerdekaan RI
content: Begini Kondisi Ekonomi dan Kas Negara di Awal Kemerdekaan RI ilham fikriansyah - detikFinance Kamis, 15 Agu 2024 06:15 WIB Ilustrasi ekonomi. Foto: Towfiqu Barbhuiya/Unsplash Daftar Isi Kondisi Ekonomi Indonesia di Awal Kemerdekaan 1. Inflasi yang Tinggi 2. Berlakunya Uang NICA 3. Blokade Ekonomi oleh Belanda Cara Indonesia Menghadapi Krisis Ekonomi Pasca Kemerdekaan Jakarta - Indonesia resmi menyatakan merdeka pada 17 Agustus 1945. Meski sudah merdeka, ternyata Indonesia masih harus menghadapi sejumlah tantangan berat, salah satunya keadaan ekonomi negara yang kacau. Ada sejumlah faktor yang menyebabkan ekonomi Indonesia kala itu kacau balau, mulai dari krisis yang berasal dari perang hingga berhentinya sistem ekonomi yang sudah dijalankan sebelum merdeka. Kondisi tersebut menyebabkan keadaan kas negara kosong. Lalu, bagaimana cara pemerintah mengatasi masalah ekonomi dan kas negara pasca kemerdekaan? Simak penjelasannya dalam artikel ini. title: Bán thứ 'nhà nào cũng cần' có giá chưa bằng cốc trà đá, một doanh nghiệp Việt báo lãi gần 6 tỷ đồng/tháng
content: Đó là pin con thỏ. Trên Shopee, một vỉ pin con thỏ (gồm 4 viên) có giá 10.000 đồng, tức là 1 cục pin chỉ có giá 2.500 đồng (chưa bằng một cốc trà đá). Tuy nhiên, trong 6 tháng đầu năm 2024, doanh nghiệp sản xuất loại pin này lại "ăn nên làm ra" với lãi gần 6 tỷ đồng/ngày. Cụ thể, theo báo cáo tài chính (BCTC) bán niên soát xét của CTCP Pin Hà Nội (Habaco – PHN), doanh thu thuần trong 6 tháng đầu năm đạt hơn 219 tỷ đồng, tức tăng 7,4%, do sản lượng bán hàng được cải thiện. Trong kỳ, do thị trường ngành pin ổn định dẫn tới sản lượng hàng hóa sản xuất cũng như tiêu thụ của công ty tăng. Hơn nữa, nhờ giá nguyên liệu chính đầu vào giảm làm cho giá vốn của công ty giảm so với cùng kỳ năm 2023. Vì giá vốn giảm và doanh thu tăng nên lợi nhuận gộp từ hoạt động kinh doanh của CTCP Pin Hà Nội đạt 60,8 tỷ đồng, tăng 43,9% so với 6 tháng đầu năm 2023. Sau khi trừ các chi phí, CTCP Pin Hà Nội có lợi nhuận sau thuế đạt hơn 33,9 tỷ đồng trong 6 tháng đầu năm 2024, tăng 70% so với nửa đầu năm 2023. Như vậy, trung bình mỗi tháng doanh nghiệp này có lãi 5,65 tỷ đồng. Với kết quả khả quan trong 6 tháng đầu năm, CTCP Pin Hà Nội đã hoàn thành được...

title: యాదయ్యకు రాష్ట్రపతి గ్యాలెంటరీ
creator: Velugu Babu
content: మన తెలంగాణ/హైదరాబాద్ : పంద్రాగస్ట్ ది నో త్సవాన్ని పురస్కరించుకుని కేంద్ర హోం శా ఖ, పోలీసు, ఫైర్ సర్వీస్, హోంగార్డ్, సివిల్ డిఫె న్స్ అధికారులకు వివిధ పోలీసు పతకాలను బు ధవారం ప్రకటించింది. దేశవ్యాప్తంగా మొత్తం 1037 మందికి ఈ పతకాలను ప్రదానం చేయ నున్నారు. ఇక, ఈసారి అత్యున్నత రాష్ట్రపతి గ్యాలంటరీ పోలీసు పతకం ఒకరికి మాత్రమే వరించింది. అది కూడా తెలంగాణ రాష్ట్రానికి చెందిన వ్యక్తి కావడం విశేషం. మాదాపూర్ సిసిఎస్‌కు చెందిన హెడ్ కానిస్టేబుల్ చదువు యాదయ్యకు రాష్ట్రపతి గ్యాలంటరీ మెడల్‌ను ప్రకటించారు. రాష్ట్రపతి గ్యాలంటరీ మెడల్ యాద య్యకు రావడంపై రాష్ట్ర డిజిపి డా.జితేందర్ హర్షం వ్యక్తం చేశారు. యాదయ్యను తన కార్యాలయంలో ఘనంగా సన్మానించారు. జూలై 25, 2022న చైన్ స్నాచింగ్‌లు, ఆయుధాల వ్యాపారంలో ప్రమేయం ఉన్న కరుడుగట్టిన నేరస్థులు ఇషాన్ నిరంజన్ నీలంనల్లి, రాహుల్ పాల్గొన్న ప్రమాదకరమైన దోపిడీ సంఘటనలో హెడ్ కానిస్టేబుల్ యాదయ్య అసాధారణ ధైర్యాన్ని ప్రదర్శించారు. 2022 జూలై 25 సాయంత్రం సైబరాబాద్ పోలీసు కమిషనరేట్ పరిధిలోని రామచంద్రాపురంలో 72 ఏళ్ల మహిళ కె. కాత్యాయని తన నివాసానికి వెళ్తున్నప్పుడు బైక్‌పై వచ్చిన ఇద్దరు గుర్తుతెలియని వ్యక్తులు ఆమె బంగారు గొలుసు లాగారు. ధైర్యంగా ఆమె గొలుసులో కొంత భాగం పట్టుకున్నప్పటికీ గాయపడ్డారు. దొంగలు ఎక్కువ భాగం గొలుసును దొంగిలించి పరారయ్యారు. పిటిషన్‌ను స్వీకరించిన వెంటనే హెడ్ కానిస్టేబుల్ యదయ్య, కానిస్టేబుళ్లు ఎం. రవి, ఏ.ధేబాష్ సహకారంతో నిందితులను అరెస్టు చేయడానికి ఒక ఆపరేషన్‌ను నిర్వహించారు. సిసిటివి ఫుటేజ్‌తో సహా సాక్ష్యాలను జాగ్రత్తగా సేకరించారు. దీని...

title: Newly wed man flies to Canada, blocks wife
content: Surat: A 27-year-old woman filed a complaint against her husband and in-laws alleging domestic violence and dowry demands at Mahila police station on Wednesday. According to the complaint, the woman’s husband allegedly fled to Canada just 20 days after their wedding and blocked her on the phone and social media. From there, he also allegedly demanded Rs 2 lakh from her father as dowry. The woman alleged that his family demanded more money and subjected her to cruelty and violence. Police have booked the husband and his parents. According to details, the victim was married on April 17, 2023. Ten days later, the victim went to Vrindavan with her husband and in-laws. During the trip, she learned that he had booked a ticket to Canada for May 9, 2023. As she was not told about this before the wedding, she asked what she would do in Surat without him. The family had a quarrel over the issue and the victim was allegedly abused by her in-laws. Her husband promised her he would take her to Canada in three months. When the issue was discussed with the victim’s parents, her husband promised them he would take care of her. He left for Canada on a student visa without initiating her visa process. Fifteen days later he called the victim’s father and allegedly asked for Rs 2 lakh as dowry. Her father transferred the sum online. Two months later, her in-laws allegedly demanded more money....

title: 「吹きそうになったwww」 “作画崩壊”を完全再現したガンプラが「激似」と話題 「立体化される日が来るとは......」(ねとらぼ)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 8/15(木) 8:15 配信 “作画崩壊”を再現したガンプラ “作画崩壊”バージョンとしてカスタムしたガンプラの写真がX(Twitter)に投稿されました。その再現度の高さが反響を呼び、記事執筆時点で12万回以上表示され、3000件のいいねを集めています。 【画像】“作画崩壊”を再現したガンプラ(全体) 投稿者は、ガンプラ旧キットが好きだという「ToMoS」さん。 「完成! 1/144 シャア専用ゲルググ 作画崩壊バージョンで作ってみましたw よかったら見てください」として投稿したのは、テレビアニメ「機動戦士ガンダム」(ファーストガンダム)の第37話「テキサスの攻防」にほんの一瞬登場するシャア専用ゲルググのプラモデルです。 微妙な作画になってしまったいわゆる“作画崩壊”のバランスの悪さをそのまま再現した姿は、アニメ版と比較しても見事な出来栄え。 さらに、アニメでは見ることのできない横からの写真や、裏からの写真も投稿しています。 さらに、モノアイの点灯に合わせて“ぐぽーん”と音がする「ぐぽーん動画」も公開しています。 作画崩壊バージョンのシャア専用ゲルググに対しリプライでは、「作画崩壊の再現素晴らしいです」「騙し絵みたいに歪んだ腹部がいい味出してます!」「やばい、吹きそうになったwww」「凄い、崩壊レベルが激似」「ぬぼーっとしてるのに目つきは凶悪なのがまたすばらしいです」「まさにあのゲルググではないですか 立体化される日が来るとは......」など絶賛の声が上がっています。画像提供:ToMoS(@ToMoS_Qkit)さん ねとらぼ 家に泊まりに来ることになった夫の友人たち 「妻がトイレに用意したあるもの」に共感の声 刺身の「つま」 食べるのはマナー違反? 添えられているのが理に適っている理由とは フランス人ママが仰天「『日本に留学したい』と言うように」 16歳の娘に影響を与えた、パリ五輪の日本人メダリストとは 釣れたキジハタを1年飼ったら......飼い主も驚きの姿に「もはや魚じゃない」「もう家族やね」 半年後の現在について飼い主に聞いた 「カレーがめちゃくちゃ美味しくなる」 料理長が教える裏技が目からウロコ 「これはブックマーク案件」 つなぐ #戦争の記憶 家族6人全員を失った女性など貴重な証言を紹介 「昼の1時間休憩」より効果的...精神科医が勧める"いっぱいいっぱい"にならない休み方のコツ 女子に嫌われる夏のダサオジアイテムNo.1はタンクトップとハーフパンツ!? その理由とは? 日本人の失明原因「緑内障」予防に食べるといいもの。目は脳の一部 【パリ五輪】メダリスト「珍しいレア名字ランキング」 3位体操・金「萱和磨」、2位柔道・銀「新添左季」...1位は?...

title: Gospel Sensation Teddy O.T Drops Powerful Afro Gospel Anthem ‘Commando’
creator: Newsghana
content: Ghanaian gospel artist Teddy O.T returns with his latest track, “Commando,” a powerful Afro gospel anthem for the moment. This new release blends soulful melodies with a vibrant Afrobeat rhythm, infused with elements of Nigerian language, creating a unique and uplifting worship experience. “Commando” is a testament to Teddy O.T’s ability to bridge cultures and inspire through music. Whether you’re a fan of gospel, Afrobeat, or contemporary Christian music, this track is a must-listen. Let the message of “Commando” resonate in your heart as you experience the fusion of West African sounds and praise. Don’t forget to like, share, and subscribe for more inspiring gospel music! #TeddyOT #Commando #AfroGospel #GhanaianGospel #NigerianGospel #GospelMusic2024 #ChristianMusic #Afrobeat #WorshipMusic

title: How do you age well? Ask this super fit Korean couple, 62 and 57, going viral on Instagram
creator: Erika Na
content: Married South Korean fitness influencers Kim Sunok, 57, and Kang Changdong, 62, are paragons of healthy ageing. Their social media appeal goes beyond their fun workout routines. The two have an undeniably young and stylish taste in fashion. When travelling, they often dress in matching baggy jeans and fitted tops. Kim works as director of overseas business development for the distribution and marketing company Kang founded in 2008. In the office, they wear crisp white dress shirts and suit jackets. Then there are photos and videos of their family. At their daughter’s recent wedding in California, in the US, Kim joins in their daughter’s first dance, while an emotional Kang hugs her after the wedding dress reveal. The couple agree that they are ageing well. They say they are healthier and happier now than when they were younger. That is not just because they have 292,000 followers on social media or because they are fitter and leaner than they ever were. These are unexpected by-products of what they say have been the most important elements of ageing well together – continuing to challenge themselves and developing a deeper understanding of each other. Their online journey began in 2022, when their daughter posted a video on TikTok of the family of four working out together in the backyard of an Airbnb in California. title: Marcos signs law adding more Shari'a judicial districts, circuit courts
creator: N/A (Argyll Cyrus Geducos)
content: The law, signed by the President on Aug. 12, amends Articles 138, 147, and 150 of Presidential Decree No. 1083. President Marcos has signed into law Republic Act (RA) No. 120181 creating three additional Shari'a Judicial Districts and 12 circuit courts across the country. The law, signed by the President on Aug. 12, amends Articles 138, 147, and 150 of Presidential Decree No. 1083. Previously, there were only five Shari'a judicial districts created under PD No. 1083: Under RA the new law, Bukidnon, Misamis Oriental, Misamis Occidental, Camiguin, Cagayan de Oro City, and the provinces in Regions XI and XIII will be under the sixth district. The seventh district covers the provinces within Regions VI, VII, and VIII; while the eighth district is for Metro Manila, and the provinces within the Cordillera Administrative Region (CAR), Ilocos Region, Cagayan Valley, III, Central Luzon, Calabarzon, Mimaropa, and the Bicol Region. LOOK: President Marcos signs law for more Shari'a judicial districts, circuit courts @manilabulletin pic.twitter.com/xXniC08NnO The new law also brings the number of Shari’a circuit courts from 51 to 63. The new 12 Shari’a circuit courts will service the newly-created Shari'a Judicial Districts. Five circuit courts will be situated in and for the sixth district, three in and for the seventh district, and four in the eighth Shari’a district. The law shall take...

title: Mahmud Abbas TBMM Genel Kurulu’na hitap edecek
content: Filistin Devlet Başkanı Mahmud Abbas , Türkiye'ye geldi. Cumhurbaşkanı Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, Abbas'ı Beştepe'de ağırladı. Mahmud Abbas, bugün Türkiye Büyük Millet Meclisi'ni de ziyaret edecek. İsrail'in Gazze'deki soykırımını Genel Kurul kürsüsünden anlatacak. Ankara önemli bir konuğu ağırlıyor. Filistin Devlet Başkanı Mahmud Abbas iki günlük ziyaret için Türkiye'ye geldi. Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan, Mahmud Abbas'ı 5 aylık aranın ardından Beştepe'de ağırladı. Filistin Devlet Başkanı Mahmud Abbas, bugün de Türkiye Büyük Millet Meclisi'ni ziyaret edecek. Önce Meclis Başkanı Numan Kurtulmuş ile bir araya gelecek. Daha sonra Abbas ve Kurtulmuş, Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan ile Meclis'te görüşecek. Odatv.com

title: Pasadena Unified says ‘Welcome Back’ to staff, faculty ahead of district’s first day
content: The Pasadena Unified School District gathered educators and staff for their annual “Welcome Back” school year kick-off event at Pasadena High School Wednesday morning, Aug. 14. Superintendent Elizabeth Blanco addressed the packed crowd at Pasadena High School auditorium in an event that also included a keynote speech from Jerell Hill, dean of Human Development and Education at Pacific Oaks College, a musical performance by PUSD students and staff, and the presentation of the annual PUSD awards. The back-to-school event comes in light of a difficult decision made by the Pasadena Unified School Board in March to reduce costs amid a decline in enrollment and a $38 billion state budget shortfall. The board voted to eliminate nearly 200 positions for the 2024-2025 school year. The decision is expected to save $9 million in one-time costs for the upcoming academic year. Despite the district’s financial issues, Superintendent Blanco said she remained committed to keeping students first as they begin their first day on Aug. 19. “Next month, the Superintendent’s Budget Advisory will begin meeting,” Dr. Blanco stated. “Students and our classrooms will be at the forefront of our budget decisions. Blanco also outlined her 100-day plan for the beginning of the school year, which focuses on five pillars: learner-focused instruction; outstanding and respected employees; quality learning...

title: FDP-Fraktionschef Dürr: Haben beim Haushalt noch etwas Zeit
Vonarstjarna City og Noregs fót­brotnaði
content: Jack Gaughan, blaðamaður Daily Mail, greindi frá þessu í kvöld og sagði auðvelt að kenna í brjósti um Bobb sem fór mikinn á undirbúningstímabilinu með City og leit vel út í leiknum um Samfélagsskjöldinn um síðustu helgi. Þar átti hann stoðsendingu á Bernardo Silva og var valinn maður leiksins en City vann í vítaspyrnukeppni. Gaughan segir ljóst að Bobb hefði getað tryggt sér hægri kantstöðuna hjá City í vetur en það verður þá varla fyrr en eftir áramót. Blaðamaðurinn Fabrizio Romano segir að Bobb verði frá keppni í nokkra mánuði en þessi 21 árs gamli leikmaður kom við sögu í 14 deildarleikjum á síðustu leiktíð og skoraði eitt mark. 🚨🔵 Bad news for Man City as Oscar Bobb has fractured a bone in his leg. He’ll be out for several months as Man City sources confirm, per . Fótbrotið er ekki bara áfall fyrir Bobb og City heldur einnig norska landsliðið en þjálfari þess Ståle Solbakken, sagði við VG í Noregi: „Það kom upp atvik á æfingu í dag sem því miður endaði illa fyrir Oscar. Ég bíð eftir endanlegri skýrslu en það bendir allt til þess að hann verði lengi frá,“ sagði Solbakken.

title: How Much Does Makita's MAC5200 Weigh & What Kind Of Oil Does It Take?
creator: staff@slashgear.com (Samantha Catalano)
content: An air compressor, a tool to complete your workshop pneumatic setup , can be the machine that makes or breaks your ability to get the job done. You want one powerful enough to run even your strongest top-rated air tools . Makita's MAC5200 is one choice amongst several of the tool company's air compressors. Besides being a strong candidate with a three HP motor that produces 6.5 CFM at 90 PSI, it's also portable — a nice feature for such a heavy tool. The single air tank Makita MAC5200 has a net weight of 88 pounds. However, you don't have to try to lug this heavy unit around without assistance. The product comes with rugged wheels and a folding handle, so you can easily drag it to the job instead of bringing the job to the air compressor or spending money on an unnecessary long hose. However, if you have a longer air hose, the tool also features an air hose wrap that can handle up to 50 feet of 3/8 inch hose. You can purchase this air compressor from Home Depot and Amazon for $459. It received a 4.6 out of five star rating from over 700 reviewers, many of which left positive written reviews. One reviewer even stated that the wheels are large enough to pull the air compressor up a set of stairs with no difficulty and down with a bit of practice. It is essential to keep air compressors maintained. Because the Makita MAC5200 has an oil-lubricated pump, maintenance includes...

title: Хельсинки сообщил о переговорах о продаже принадлежащей россиянам арены
creator: Татьяна Зыкина
content: Власти столицы Финляндии Хельсинки ведут переговоры о продаже арены Helsinki Hall (ранее Hartwall Arena), принадлежащей российским бизнесменам, сообщили «РИА Новости» в мэрии города. По данным газеты Helsingin Sanomat, арена принадлежит бизнесменам Геннадию Тимченко и Роману Ротенбергу, об этом же пишет Yle. «Что касается города, то переговоры [о продаже арены] уже начались», — сказал представитель городской администрации. В мэрии подчеркнули, что город предпринимает шаги для приобретения акций или имущества арены, необходимых для ее эксплуатации. Также власти намерены подготовиться и к другим шагам на случай, если сделку не удастся заключить в разумные сроки и разумными средствами, передает агентство. Арена не используется с весны 2022 года после того, как Евросоюз ввел санкции против России. Мэр Хельсинки Юхана Вартиайнен в октябре 2022 года сообщил Yle о наличии нескольких желающих выкупить объект. Однако, отмечал он, на тот момент городские власти не могли рассматривать продажу арены, поскольку ее владельцы оплатили аренду земли в соответствии с договором. Кроме того, для продажи потребовалось бы разрешение финского МИДа, который курирует систему международных санкций. Также на практике для проведения подобных сделок требуется получить согласие властей США из-за антироссийских санкций, пояснял Вартиайнен. После того, как в декабре 2023 года был принят 12-й...

title: Here's what to eat, drink and shop at the new Portland airport
content: PORTLAND, Ore. — It's official: Portland International Airport's (PDX) new main terminal is open, and with it comes the first wave of new shops, restaurants, bars and cafes visitors can experience. A second group of restaurants and shops will make their debut in 2026 when the final phase of the new main terminal opens. In the meantime, several of those shops have set up temporary kiosks until their new homes are ready for them. Here's a breakdown of all the new places open to eat, drink and shop now at PDX: With the opening of the new main terminal, pre-security shopping and dining has returned to Portland airport that people can enjoy — no ticket required. Portland Coffee Roasters Portland Coffee Roasters is opening two new locations at PDX: one will be available pre-security when visitors first walk in; the other is a new café opening in 2026. Until then, the coffee shop will be serving beverages at a kiosk in the North Hall past security, next door to Portland Gear. Loyal Legion Up on a mezzanine level overlooking the new main terminal is Loyal Legion. The beer hall is making its PDX debut with over 90 Oregon brews on tap, keeping it local, along with a speakeasy, a TV room and a kids play area. Orox Leather Company The family-owned leather shop combines Oaxacan craftmanship with a Portland flair. It can be found behind ticketing in the new market hall. Missionary...

title: 美元兌主要貨幣偏軟
creator: auto_generator
content: 美元兌主要貨幣偏軟,因美國消費物價指數反映通脹正在消退,強化聯儲局將減息的預期。 美元指數較早時微跌至102.59。 歐元兌美元上升0.18%,報1.1014美元。 美元兌日圓較早時報147.26日圓。英鎊下跌0.29%,報1.2825美元。 港股美國預託證券(ADR)普遍下跌。 騰訊、美團、小米及阿里巴巴ADR都較本港昨日收市價跌約1%或以上。 友邦ADR跌近0.8%,港交所ADR偏軟。 滙控ADR升逾1%。

title: Aseguran que ley de ciberseguridad tiene vacíos legales
creator: Luis Pablo Segundo
content: La nueva ley en materia de ciberseguridad presentada hoy en el Senado de la República mantiene vacíos legales y no aporta acciones concretas en contra de los delitos cibernéticos , afirmaron expertos.

title: ‘He is brilliant, so sharp’ —Bellingham sings Mbappe’s praises after dream Real Madrid debut
creator: The Telegraph

title: Ohtani llega a 37 jonrones para liderar la Nacional y Dodgers vencen a Cerveceros
content: Shohei Ohtani conectó su 37mo jonrón, con lo que lidera la Liga Nacional, y los Dodgers de Los Ángeles terminaron con cuatro cuadrangulares el martes en una victoria por 7-2 sobre los Cerveceros de Milwaukee, lo que extendió su seguidilla a cinco. Gavin Lux y el cubano Andy Pagés batearon sendos jonrones de dos carreras durante la cuarta entrada de cinco anotaciones que le dieron una ventaja de 7-1 a los Dodgers. Will Smith también conectó vuelacercas para que los Dodgers, líderes del Oeste de la Nacional, mejoraran su marca a 71-49 para igualar con los Guardianes de Cleveland con el mejor récord de las mayores. Gavin Stone (10-5), de los Dodgers, aceptó una carrera con tres imparables en cinco entradas, ponchando a seis y sin dar pasaportes en una labor de 86 lanzamientos. El dominicano Teoscar Hernández abrió la cuarta entrada con un sencillo y Lux le siguió con su séptimo cuadrangular. Smith bateó un sencillo, avanzó a tercera con doble del venezolano Miguel Rojas y anotó con elevado de sacrificio del boricua Kiké Hernández. Colin Rea (10-4) fue castigado con siete carreras y 10 imparables, incluidos los cuatro jonrones. Perdió por segunda vez en 14 salidas, incluidas 11 aperturas. Por los Dodgers, el puertorriqueño Enrique Hernández bateó de 3-1 con una producida. El venezolano Miguel Rojas de 4-1 con una anotada. El cubano Andy Pagés de 4-1 con una...

title: How Much Research You Should Actually Do Before a First Date
creator: Jordana Comiter
content: You've probably been there: innocently Googling someone you're about to meet for the first time and falling down a rabbit hole of full-on sleuthing. Before you've even met in person, you've uncovered their high school football stats, the price their childhood home sold for in 2012, and naked baby photos from their mom's Facebook. Almost everyone has a digital footprint attached to their name, and it's become increasingly easier to research someone before a date. "There's something sweet and innocent about the nostalgia of true blind dates and going in with no information, but this is the world we live in today," says relationship therapist Jaime Bronstein, LCSW. "There can be more positives than negatives to finding information, but you need to still go in with an open mind and not judge." Some details can be comforting early on, but others might be crossing boundaries. "When you find yourself gravitating way too far away from where you started, that's probably a sign you're doing a little too much research," says relationship expert Betsy Chung, PsyD. If you're wondering where to draw the line, read on for expert advice on how much pre-date research you should do before meeting someone new. Jaime Bronstein , LCSW, is a licensed relationship therapist and author of " MAN*ifesting ." Betsy Chung , PsyD, is a licensed clinical psychologist and relationship expert based in...

title: Sweet and salty deal worth $36 billion would put M&M’s and Snickers alongside Cheez-It and Pringles
creator: DEE-ANN DURBIN and MICHELLE CHAPMAN
content: M&M’s maker Mars is buying Kellanova, the maker of Cheez-Its and Pop-Tarts, for nearly $36 billion in an effort to broaden its snacking portfolio and expand globally. Kellanova was created last year when the Kellogg Co. split into two companies. Chicago-based Kellanova sells many of the former company’s most profitable brands, including Pringles, Eggo, Town House, MorningStar Farms, and Rice Krispies Treats. It had net sales of more than $13 billion last year and has about 23,000 employees. Mars Inc. said Wednesday that it will pay $83.50 per share in cash. The company put the total value of the transaction at $35.9 billion, including debt. The deal will give Mars significantly more buying power from suppliers and selling power in negotiations with grocers and other retailers, said Randal Kenworthy, a senior partner specializing in consumer products at the consulting firm West Monroe. Advertisement Mars and Kellanova combined would control around 8 percent of the US snack market, he said, compared to a 9 percent share for PepsiCo, which owns Frito-Lay. Kellanova also has a bigger international footprint, which will help Mars expand overseas, Kenworthy said. And Mars has made a lot of improvements in its organizational efficiency that it can apply to Kellanova, he said. “Strategically it makes a lot of sense,” Kenworthy said. It is the biggest deal in the sector since J.M....

title: 가족과 함께 해수욕장 찾은 70대女...물에 빠져 사망
creator: 김동영 기자
content: [인천=뉴시스] 김동영 기자 = 가족과 함께 물놀이에 나선 70대 여성이 바다에 빠져 숨졌다. 15일 인천소방본부와 인천해양경찰서에 따르면 전날 오후 1시17분께 인천 옹진군 영흥면 십리포 해수욕장에서 “70대 여성 A씨가 바다에 빠졌다”는 신고가 119에 접수됐다. 신고를 받고 출동한 소방 당국에 의해 A씨는 심폐소생술(CPR)을 받으며 병원으로 옮겨졌으나, 결국 숨졌다. 조사 결과 A씨는 가족과 함꼐 물놀이를 하기 위해 해수욕장을 찾았다가 사고를 당한 것으로 파악됐다. 해경은 A씨의 가족들을 상대로 정확한 사고 경위를 조사 중이다. 인천해경 관계자는 “범죄혐의점이 없는 것으로 확인돼 부검은 안하기로 했다”며 “구체적인 경위는 조사하고 있다”고 말했다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: 「お酒がぬけていないかもしれないけど大丈夫と思った」酒気帯び運転の疑いで31歳女逮捕(九州朝日放送)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 8/15(木) 8:15 配信 門司警察署 15日未明、北九州市門司区で酒を飲んで車を運転したとして、31歳の女が現行犯逮捕されました。警察によりますと、午前3時前、北九州市門司区畑で、ふらつきながら走行する軽乗用車を警察が発見し、停止させました。運転していた女から酒の臭いがしたため、調べたところ、吐いた息から基準値の4倍近いアルコールが検出され、警察は北九州市小倉南区の自称・フリーター、高原茜容疑者(31)を酒気帯び運転の疑いで現行犯逮捕しました。高原容疑者は警察の調べに対して、「街をぶらぶらして、お酒はぬけただろう、完全にはお酒は抜けていないかも知れないが、大丈夫だろうと思った」と、容疑を一部否認しているということです。また「午前1時ごろまで門司駅付近で焼酎のお湯割りを飲んだ」と話しているということで、警察で飲酒の経緯などを詳しく調べています。 九州朝日放送 【鹿児島県震度5強】専門家は震源地・日向灘に「割れ残り」があるとみる。南海トラフ地震臨時情報発出から1週間、巨大地震発生の可能性は続く。揺れ・津波への警戒怠らず防災の備えを 「億ションが売れる」不動産“バブル状態”の沖縄県民に将来不安 地価高騰で「良い家は建てられない...」 ふらつき走行車運転の女 “飲酒運転”逮捕 「酒は抜けてないかもしれないが 大丈夫だろうと思った」 「完全にお酒は抜けてないが大丈夫と思った」酒気帯び運転の疑いで31歳の女を逮捕 【時系列で詳しく】クイーンビートル「浸水隠し」航海日誌に「異常なし」浸水警報が鳴らないようセンサーを上にずらし運航続ける 国が抜き打ち監査で乗務員に聞き取り発覚 当時の社長の指示だった JR九州が初会見で謝罪 福岡 つなぐ #戦争の記憶 家族6人全員を失った女性など貴重な証言を紹介

title: 50代から!オシャレで歩きやすい楽ちんサンダル5選(ハルメク365)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 8/15(木) 8:15 配信 おしゃれでストレスフリー! 大人女性にぴったりなサンダル 開放的なデザイン、かつ涼しく過ごせるサンダルは、夏コーデに欠かせないアイテム。今回は、大人女性におすすめのサンダルを5点ピックアップします。気になるサンダルがあったら、ぜひチェックしてみてくださいね! ■【動画で学ぶ!】おしゃれ上級者のコーデ術 F-MODE RAW-EDGE LEATHER FLATFORM H-BAR SLIDES 2万6400 円(税込)/fitflop(フィットフロップ) 開放的なデザイン、かつ涼しく過ごせるサンダルは、夏コーデに欠かせないアイテム。デザイン性や機能性など、各ブランドでそれぞれ特徴が異なるので、着用シーンやお手持ちの洋服にマッチする一足を選ぶのが正解です。 今回は、大人女性におすすめのサンダルを5点ピックアップします。気になるサンダルがあったら、ぜひチェックしてみてくださいね! 【おすすめ夏サンダル1】「ミネトンカ」の「ポセイ」 1946年アメリカ・ミネソタ州で誕生したシューズブランド「MINNETONKA(ミネトンカ)」。人気を集めている柔らかいスエードを使用したモカシンやフリンジブーツなどは、職人が一つひとつ丁寧に作り上げており、そのオリジナリティと風合いによってファンを多く抱えています。 そんなミネトンカから、夏にぴったりなサンダルが登場。厚底のコルクソールが愛らしい「POSEY(ポセイ)」は、夏のワードローブを格上げしてくれること間違いなし。フレイドファブリックのクロスバンドのおかげで、快適に履くことができます。 【おすすめ夏サンダル2】「テバ」の「ハリケーンXLT2」 1984年にグランドキャニオンの岸で世界で初めてのスポーツサンダルを開発した「Teva(テバ)」。アドベンチャー精神からインスパイアされた、多用途で耐久性のあるモダンアウトドアシューズは、アクティブなライフスタイルを送る世界中の人々から支持を受けています。2020年に、テバは主要なサンダルのストラップを100%リサイクルプラスチック素材に切り変えました。次世代が自由に冒険し、自然を楽しめるよう、テバは地球環境への負荷削減に取り組んでいます。 こちらは、テバを代表するスポーツサンダルの定番モデル。軽量ミッドソールは衝撃を緩和してくれ、またアウトソールのおかげで履き心地が抜群。面ファスナーで、着脱とフィット感の調節が簡単なのがGOOD。 【おすすめ夏サンダル3】「イパネマ」の「ベラノ」...

title: Ukraine says it has taken more ground and prisoners during its advance into Russia border region
creator: ILLIA NOVIKOV and EMMA BURROWS Associated Press
content: KYIV, Ukraine — Ukrainian forces pushed on with their major cross-border advance into Russia's Kursk region for a second week Wednesday, claiming they took more ground, captured more Russian prisoners and destroyed a bomber in attacks on military airfields. Assault troops advanced about a mile farther into areas of Kursk on Wednesday, the commander of the Ukrainian military, Gen. Oleksandr Syrskyi, said in a video posted on President Volodymyr Zelenskyy's Telegram channel. Ukrainian troops also took more than 100 Russian soldiers prisoner, Syrskyi said. Zelenskyy said they would eventually be swapped for Ukrainian prisoners of war. Additionally, the troops destroyed a Russian Su-34 jet used to launch devastating glide bombs at Ukrainian front-line positions and cities, Ukraine's General Staff said. Ukrainian servicemen sit inside their APC Wednesday after returning from the Russian Kursk region, near the Russian-Ukrainian border in Ukraine. The surprise Ukrainian push into the Kursk region that began Aug. 6 rattled the Kremlin. The daring operation is the largest attack on Russia since World War II and could involve as many as 10,000 Ukrainian troops backed by armor and artillery, military analysts say. Syrskyi said Ukrainian forces advanced into about 390 square miles of the Kursk region, though it was not possible to independently verify that claim. If Ukraine actually...

title: Botorff at the center of it all: NAU offensive lineman part of hope for turnaround season
creator: ERIC NEWMAN Sun Sports Editor
content: Northern Arizona football coach Brian Wright has asked a lot of the Lumberjacks offensive line heading into the 2024 fall season. It’s a whole new offensive scheme with the new staff, and Northern Arizona has had position battles for nearly all of the skill positions. That leaves the line with a ton of responsibility to make the job easier for the rest of the unit. Javascript is required for you to be able to read premium content. Please enable it in your browser settings. Northern Arizona's Jonny Bottorff (62) anchors the Lumberjacks offensive line as he prepares to snap the ball during a recent preseason practice.

title: Coordinador de FEMA en Puerto Rico asegura que habrá fondos para atender la emergencia por Ernesto pese a déficit presupuestario de la agencia
creator: Manuel Guillama Capella
content: Orlando Olivera, sin embargo, reconoció que proyectos de obra permanente que no cuenten con dinero comprometido podrían enfrentar limitaciones en los desembolsos 14 de agosto de 2024 - 7:15 PM Nota del editor: te invitamos a mantenerte bien informado. Accede libre de costo a las noticias y actualizaciones relacionadas con la tormenta tropical Ernesto. Gracias por apoyar el periodismo responsable. Suscríbete hoy. --- El coordinador de la Agencia Federal para el Manejo de Emergencias (FEMA) para Puerto Rico y el Caribe, Orlando Olivera , rechazó que la restricción de fondos que impuso esa dependencia pueda impactar la asistencia directa autorizada más temprano el miércoles por el presidente Joe Biden en el marco de la tormenta tropical Ernesto . Pero aceptó que la limitación pudiera incidir sobre obras de reconstrucción asociadas a este evento o a los proyectos aprobados tras los huracanes María y Fiona o los terremotos de 2020 que aún no tengan dinero comprometido . “Tenemos un proceso de recuperación corriendo, que es la Oficina de Recuperación de María, que está trabajando junto al COR3 (Oficina Central de Recuperación, Reconstrucción y Resiliencia) y las otras entidades gubernamentales, y hay un dinero que ya ha sido obligado, y eso no se va a ver afectado. Lo del presupuesto es algo que no afecta ese proceso de recuperación ni lo que estamos actualmente...

title: વિશ્વશાંતિનો મૂલાધાર .
Экономист объяснил, в чем подвох с бензином по 70 рублей
content: МОСКВА, 16 авг - РИА Новости. Прогнозы о том, что бензин уже в сентябре подорожает до 70 рублей, не имеют под собой оснований — возобновление запрета на экспорт ставит на них крест, рассказал в интервью агентству "Прайм" специалист департамента стратегических исследований Total Research Николай Вавилов. Он напомнил, что запрет на экспорт бензина действовал с 1 марта по 31 августа, но был приостановлен с 20 мая по 30 июля на фоне насыщения рынка. После этого топливо в рознице начало дорожать из-за повышения сезонного спроса, плановых ремонтов на НПЗ и проблем с логистикой. Рост цен ускорился в конце июля. Тогда и появились подобные оценки в СМИ. "Решение о продлении запрета очень своевременно. Теперь все ранее высказанные экспертные опасения повышения цен на бензин марки АИ-95 до 70 рублей за литр на АЗС страны в ближайшем будущем по меньшей мере не обоснованы", — заключил эксперт.

title: Ukraine says it has taken more ground and prisoners during its advance into Russia border region
creator: ILLIA NOVIKOV and EMMA BURROWS Associated Press
content: KYIV, Ukraine — Ukrainian forces pushed on with their major cross-border advance into Russia's Kursk region for a second week Wednesday, claiming they took more ground, captured more Russian prisoners and destroyed a bomber in attacks on military airfields. Assault troops advanced about a mile farther into areas of Kursk on Wednesday, the commander of the Ukrainian military, Gen. Oleksandr Syrskyi, said in a video posted on President Volodymyr Zelenskyy's Telegram channel. Ukrainian troops also took more than 100 Russian soldiers prisoner, Syrskyi said. Zelenskyy said they would eventually be swapped for Ukrainian prisoners of war. Additionally, the troops destroyed a Russian Su-34 jet used to launch devastating glide bombs at Ukrainian front-line positions and cities, Ukraine's General Staff said. The surprise Ukrainian push into the Kursk region that began Aug. 6 rattled the Kremlin. The daring operation is the largest attack on Russia since World War II and could involve as many as 10,000 Ukrainian troops backed by armor and artillery, military analysts say. Syrskyi said Ukrainian forces advanced into about 390 square miles of the Kursk region, though it was not possible to independently verify that claim. If Ukraine actually controls all of that territory in the Kursk region, it would have captured in just one week almost as much Ukrainian land as Russian forces took — 450...

title: โค้งสุดท้ายชิงสุดยอด “ซีอีโอ” ด่วน! ปิดรับสมัครวันที่ 16 ส.ค.นี้
content: น.ส.ดวงพร อุดมทิพย์ นายกสมาคมผู้สื่อข่าวเศรษฐกิจ เปิดเผยว่า สมาคมได้ร่วมมือกับมหาวิทยาลัยหอการค้า คณะกรรมการร่วมภาคเอกชน 3 สถาบัน (กกร.) และสํานักงานคณะกรรมการนโยบายรัฐวิสาหกิจ (สคร.) เพื่อจัดทําโครงการสุดยอดผู้นําองค์กร (สุดยอดซีอีโอ) ประจําปี 2567 (CEO Econmass Awards 2024) โดยปีนี้เป็นปีที่ 3 ซึ่งจะคัดเลือกจากผู้ประกอบการ และรัฐวิสาหกิจ รวม 21 รางวัล สําหรับโครงการสุดยอดซีอีโอ มีวัตถุประสงค์เพื่อสร้างต้นแบบผู้นําองค์กร ที่เป็นแรงบันดาลใจในการสร้างแรงกระตุ้นสังคม การดําเนินธุรกิจที่ดี มีความรับผิดชอบต่อสังคมตามแนวทาง ESG เพื่อเสริมสร้างขีดความสามารถการแข่งขันของประเทศ ด้วยการส่งเสริมและสนับสนุน ผู้นําองค์กรที่เข้มแข็ง โครงการสุดยอดผู้นํา CEO Econmass Awards 2024 ได้เปิดรับสมัครผู้ประกอบการเข้าร่วมโครงการ มาตั้งแต่กลางเดือนก.ค.-16 ส.ค.นี้ จึงขอเชิญชวนผู้ประกอบการ ส่งใบสมัครเข้าร่วมโครงการ เพื่อเป็นต้นแบบให้กับเอสเอ็มอีและวิสาหกิจชุมชนอื่นๆต่อไป Facebook คณะกรรมการร่วมภาคเอกชน 3 สถาบัน, เว็บไซต์ www.jsccib.org , Facebook สมาคมผู้สื่อข่าวเศรษฐกิจ หรือเว็บไซต์ www.econmass.com หรือแอดไลน์ @ceoeconmassawards โทร.สอบถามได้ที่ 08-5587-4356. อ่าน “ คอลัมน์หนังสือพิมพ์ไทยรัฐ ” ทั้งหมดที่นี่

title: 「福岡ー韓国・釜山」結ぶ高速船「クイーンビートル」が浸水しながら運航 会社ぐるみで“偽装”...把握しながら「問題なし」記載
content: 福岡と韓国・釜山(プサン)を結ぶJR九州の高速船が、約4カ月にわたり船体の浸水を隠すなどして運航を続けたことがわかり、JR九州が謝罪しました。 JR九州によりますと、子会社である運営会社が、福岡と韓国・釜山を結ぶ高速船「クイーンビートル」の船首部分に、浸水があるのを把握しながら、約4カ月間、国への報告を行わず、航海日誌に「問題なし」と記載して、データを改ざんするなどの偽装をしていたということです。 JR九州は、当時の社長ら上層部も把握したうえで、会社ぐるみで行われていたとしています。 「クイーンビートル」は13日から運休していて、約2万2000人に影響が出るとしています。 山口・福岡の最新ニュース、身近な話題、災害や事故の速報などを発信します。

title: Xây dựng gói 30.000 tỉ cho nhà ở chính sách xã hội
Usher verschiebt Tour-Auftakt – wenige Stunden vor Konzertbeginn
content: Eigentlich hätte R'n'B-Superstar Usher am Mittwoch in Atlanta auf der Bühne stehen sollen – doch daraus wird nichts. Grund für die kurzfristige Absage: Der Sänger muss »ausruhen und heilen«.

title: Ukraine says it has taken more ground and prisoners during its advance into Russia border region
creator: ILLIA NOVIKOV and EMMA BURROWS Associated Press

title: Ukraine says it has taken more ground and prisoners during its advance into Russia border region
content: KYIV, Ukraine — Ukrainian forces pushed on with their major cross-border advance into Russia's Kursk region for a second week Wednesday, claiming they took more ground, captured more Russian prisoners and destroyed a bomber in attacks on military airfields. Assault troops advanced about a mile farther into areas of Kursk on Wednesday, the commander of the Ukrainian military, Gen. Oleksandr Syrskyi, said in a video posted on President Volodymyr Zelenskyy's Telegram channel. Ukrainian troops also took more than 100 Russian soldiers prisoner, Syrskyi said. Zelenskyy said they would eventually be swapped for Ukrainian prisoners of war. Additionally, the troops destroyed a Russian Su-34 jet used to launch devastating glide bombs at Ukrainian front-line positions and cities, Ukraine's General Staff said. Ukrainian servicemen sit inside their APC Wednesday after returning from the Russian Kursk region, near the Russian-Ukrainian border in Ukraine. The surprise Ukrainian push into the Kursk region that began Aug. 6 rattled the Kremlin. The daring operation is the largest attack on Russia since World War II and could involve as many as 10,000 Ukrainian troops backed by armor and artillery, military analysts say. Syrskyi said Ukrainian forces advanced into about 390 square miles of the Kursk region, though it was not possible to independently verify that claim. If Ukraine actually...

title: Siguen llegando a República Dominicana delegaciones para la investidura de Abinader
creator: EFE
content: Santo Domingo.- El primer ministro de Curazao, Gilmar Pisas, y el vicepresidente de El Salvador, Félix Ulloa, llegaron este miércoles a Santo Domingo con motivo de la investidura de Luis Abinader para un segundo mandato, ceremonia que se llevará a cabo el próximo viernes. Con cierto retraso a causa de los efectos indirectos del huracán Ernesto, localizado a unos 247 kilómetros al norte de Punta Cana (este de República Dominicana) y 257 kilómetros al noreste de Cabo Cabron Samaná (noreste), Ulloa llegó al aeropuerto Internacional de Las Américas en vuelo comercial junto a una delegación que fue recibida por autoridades de la Cancillería dominicana. Asimismo con algo de demora, Pisas arribó a la misma terminal junto a la delegación curazoleña, también en un vuelo comercial, y fue recibido en el Salón de Embajadores por el director de Ceremonial de Estado y Protocolo del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, Francisco Cantizano Nadal, y otros funcionarios de esa cartera. También te puede interesar: La primera autoridad extranjera en llegar al país con motivo de la investidura de Abinader fue el presidente de Surinam, Chandrikapersad Santokhi , que aterrizó en el aeropuerto de Las Américas, en Santo Domingo, la noche del martes. La ceremonia de investidura se desarrollará en el Teatro Nacional de Santo Domingo y no en el Congreso Nacional, como es costumbre,...

title: China Port Explosion Snarls Trans-Pacific Container Trade
creator: Tyler Durden
content: The closure of Ningbo Beilun’s Phase III Terminal is expected to have cascading effects on the main trans-Pacific trade lanes out of Asia, and the supply chain at large, in the midst of the peak shipping season. As Stuart Chris reports for FreightWaves , container traffic has been halted at Ningbo following a shipboard explosion involving hazardous materials at one of the world’s busiest intermodal hubs. The explosion aboard the Yang Ming vessel YM Mobility on Friday reportedly involved organic peroxide materials. There were no injuries in the blast, but the terminal has been closed until further notice. Ningbo is the world’s third-busiest container port, with volume of 33.35 million twenty-foot equivalent units in 2023. The shutdown couldn’t come at a worse time as record peak volumes for North American imports are forecast for August, after an “early peak” in June as shippers rushed to get holiday merchandise ahead of expected supply chain disruptions in the fall. “With this closure, Ningbo Port is no longer operational, compounding existing supply chain disruptions exacerbated by Typhoon Gaemi in July,” said Christian Roeloffs, co-founder and chief executive of Container xChange, an online container marketplace based in Hamburg, Germany, in a customer advisory. “For container trading companies and those involved in container leasing, this incident presents some...

title: Illinois Dems rally around progressive message ahead of national convention
creator: BRENDEN MOORE brenden.moore@lee.net
content: SPRINGFIELD — With their national convention days away, state Democrats seized on the party's annual Illinois State Fair rally day to highlight growing excitement about the candidacy of Vice President Kamala Harris. At the same time, they sought to remain clear-eyed about the hurdles ahead on the path to elect Harris, who would be the first woman and first Asian American to hold the office. This year's festivities in Springfield began with a brunch hosted by the Illinois Democratic County Chairs Association and ended with a 20-minute rally at the Illinois State Fairgrounds. The event effectively served as a prologue for the Democratic National Convention, which kicks off on Monday in Chicago. The state's top elected Democrats told nearly 1,500 party faithful gathered that it was "time to share Illinois’ success with the nation," alluding to the long list of progressive policy achievements the party racked up since Gov. J.B. Pritzker took office in 2019. The second-term Chicago Democrat, who was on the short list of potential vice presidential picks before Harris ultimately selected Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, touted several major policy victories as proof that "Democrats deliver" in Illinois. Among the governor's legislative wins: expanded reproductive rights following the overturning of Roe v. Wade, enactment of a capital construction program, investments in K-12 education and...

title: ‘♥사야’ 심형탁 “연년생 아이 셋이 목표” 아기방 만들기 성공 (신랑수업)[TV종합]
content: ‘신랑수업’ 심형탁이 아내 사야가 일본 친정으로 쉬러 간 사이, ‘새복이’(2세 태명)를 위한 아기방을 꾸미는 훈훈한 모습으로 안방에 따뜻한 웃음과 감동을 안겼다. 14일 채널A ‘요즘 남자 라이프-신랑수업’ 127회에서는 에녹이 데니안을 데리고 뮤지컬 배우이자 절친한 누나인 홍지민을 만나 살사 댄스 클럽에서 여심 사로잡기 대결을 벌이는 모습이 펼쳐졌다. 또 내년 1월 출산을 앞둔 심형탁은 입덧으로 고생하는 아내 사야가 일본 친정으로 가서 쉬는 동안, 동갑내기 친구이자 두 아들 아빠인 샘 해밍턴을 집으로 초대해 좋은 아빠가 되기 위한 조언을 받는 모습으로 시청자들의 열띤 응원을 받았다. 이날 방송은 닐슨코리아 집계 결과, 시청률 2.2%(유료방송가구 전국)의 시청률을 기록했다. 흰색 와이셔츠로 멋을 낸 에녹은 데니안을 이끌고 홍지민이 있는 ‘살사 댄스 클럽’으로 향했다. 에녹은 “예전에 홍지민 누나가 ‘노래방에서 90점 이상 점수를 받으면 새로운 만남의 기회를 주겠다’고 했는데 오늘이 그날!”이라며 ‘자만추’ 이벤트를 기대했다. 홍지민은 두 사람이 들어서자 반가워하면서도 “데니씨가 오는 줄 모르고, 지인을 한 명만 초대했다”고 말했다. 당황한 에녹은 “저는 살사바에 많은 여성분들이 있어서 그분들과 자연스럽게 만남을 갖는 줄 알았다”며 ‘동공지진’을 일으켰다. 이에 홍지민은 “왜 여자친구가 없는지 알겠다. 눈치가...

content: เตรียมมาจัดเต็มไปกับเทศกาลดนตรีที่จะให้คุณได้สัมผัสบรรยากาศที่อบอุ่น Chang Music Connection presents Season of Love Song ครั้งที่ 14 ต้อนรับฤดูหนาว โดยปีนี้ Create Intelligence ผู้จัดงาน จัดเต็มทั้งเพลงรัก เพลงร็อก จากศิลปินชั้นนํา มาในธีม “MONOPOLY” ความสนุก ล้นบนกระดานมหาสนุก ในวันเสาร์ที่ 16 พฤศจิกายน 2567 ณ เวเนโต้ อ.สวนผึ้ง จ.ราชบุรี เตรียมมาฟังเพลงข้ามคืนไปกับ 15 ศิลปิน ที่จะมาสร้างความสุขตลอด 15 ชั่วโมงเต็มอิ่ม เริ่มตั้งแต่สายร็อก นําโดย บอดี้สแลม, ค็อกเทล, พาราด็อกซ์, อีโบลา, เดอะริชแมนทอย เช่นเดียวกับสายรักที่ขนศิลปินชื่อดังหลากหลาย นําโดย ปาล์มมี่, วี วิโอเลต, โพลีแคต, โบกี้ไลอ้อน, เดอะทอยส์, โฟร์อีฟ, แอลลี่, สิงโต นําโชค, เพอพีช และยัวร์มู้ด สามารถซื้อบัตรได้ตั้งแต่วันนี้-31 สิงหาคม 2567 เท่านั้น ที่ Application : The Concert หรือ https://bit.ly/Sols14TicketPR ติดตามรายละเอียด SoLS14 : https://www.facebook.com/Seasonoflovesong อ่าน “ คอลัมน์หนังสือพิมพ์ไทยรัฐ ” ทั้งหมดที่นี่ ...

title: GOL announces 2Q24 Earnings Result
content: SÃO PAULO , Aug. 14, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- GOL Linhas Aéreas Inteligentes S.A. (B3: GOLL4), one of the leading airlines in Brazil and part of the ABRA Group, announced today its consolidated results for the second quarter of 2024 (2Q24). All information herein is presented in Reais (R$), in accordance with international accounting standards (IFRS) and with adjusted metrics, made available to enable comparison of this quarter with the same period of the previous year (2Q23 & 2H23). HIGHLIGHTS GOL – Passenger Business GOL was the most on-time airline in Brazil in the 2Q24, and was also recognized in June 2024 as the most on-time airline in Latin America and the number one "Low-Cost Carrier" in the world on punctuality, with an on-time performance index (OTP) of 90.5%. Announcement of GOL's 16th codeshare agreement, a partnership for exclusive domestic routes with Azul. GOL also reinstated the codeshare agreement with South African Airways. Announcement of two new international routes ( Guarulhos-San Jose and Guarulhos-Aruba ) and resumption of two other routes interrupted during the pandemic ( Fortaleza - Orlando and Brasília- Cancun ), with operations scheduled to begin by the end of 2024. GOL also announced its intention to establish the new Brasília-Bogotá route which, if approved, is scheduled to begin in the 4Q24. 21.1% increase in the seat kilometers flown (ASK) on the...

title: Ukraine says it has taken more ground and prisoners during its advance into Russia border region
creator: ILLIA NOVIKOV and EMMA BURROWS Associated Press
content: KYIV, Ukraine — Ukrainian forces pushed on with their major cross-border advance into Russia's Kursk region for a second week Wednesday, claiming they took more ground, captured more Russian prisoners and destroyed a bomber in attacks on military airfields. Assault troops advanced about a mile farther into areas of Kursk on Wednesday, the commander of the Ukrainian military, Gen. Oleksandr Syrskyi, said in a video posted on President Volodymyr Zelenskyy's Telegram channel. Ukrainian troops also took more than 100 Russian soldiers prisoner, Syrskyi said. Zelenskyy said they would eventually be swapped for Ukrainian prisoners of war. Additionally, the troops destroyed a Russian Su-34 jet used to launch devastating glide bombs at Ukrainian front-line positions and cities, Ukraine's General Staff said. Ukrainian servicemen sit inside their APC Wednesday after returning from the Russian Kursk region, near the Russian-Ukrainian border in Ukraine. The surprise Ukrainian push into the Kursk region that began Aug. 6 rattled the Kremlin. The daring operation is the largest attack on Russia since World War II and could involve as many as 10,000 Ukrainian troops backed by armor and artillery, military analysts say. Syrskyi said Ukrainian forces advanced into about 390 square miles of the Kursk region, though it was not possible to independently verify that claim. If Ukraine actually...

title: 木村拓哉談台灣!出道32年洩「來台心願」 400萬粉絲嗨爆
content: 木村拓哉昨晚獻出直播處女秀,並許願盼在台灣舉辦演唱會。(本報資料照) 〔記者邱奕欽/台北報導〕「日劇男神」木村拓哉昨(14日)在台灣時間晚間7點於IG罕見開直播,據了解是為了當日發行的第3張個人專輯,唱片公司因此規劃這場直播活動進行宣傳。沒想到,木村拓哉在直播過程中幾度提到台灣,他更希望未來能在台灣舉行演唱會,話音剛落便讓大批的台灣粉絲嗨爆。 木村拓哉至今已開通IG、微博以及YouTube頻道,其中IG擁有逾400萬粉絲追蹤,他的第3張個人專輯在昨日發行,唱片公司因此選定當晚請他開直播進行宣傳。對於首次在IG開直播,木村拓哉坦言自己早就想嘗試,「我是否也可以這樣做呢?」最後在工作人員的協助下,順利進行了這次的直播處女秀。 請繼續往下閱讀... 此外,出道32年的木村拓哉將於9月起在大阪、神奈川等城市展開巡演,他在直播中更幾度提到台灣,甚至許願盼將來能在台灣開唱,一席話讓台灣的粉絲們興奮不已。有粉絲詢問,如果在路上巧遇他,是否能向他打招呼?木村拓哉則親民說:「當然可以!主動跟我說Hello,我會很高興喔!」他熱情邀請大家主動向他打招呼,想要聊天對話也沒問題。 自由娛樂頻道脆脆好友大募集,手刀加入 脆脆小圈圈 娛樂頻道臉書粉絲團: 點這裡 娛樂頻道有IG囉: 點這裡 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: В Приморье задержали подозреваемого в мошенничестве гендиректора стройкомпании
creator: Александра Майданская
content: По подозрению в связанном с продажей недвижимости мошенничестве в Приморском крае был задержан генеральный директор строительной компании ОО «Стройзаказ». Об этом 15 августа сообщили в СКР по региону. «Следователями СКР по Приморскому краю задержан подозреваемый в мошенничестве при продаже недвижимости в новостройке на проспекте 100-летия Владивостока директор ООО «Стройзаказ» Олег Пикалов», — говорится в сообщении в Telegram-канале ведомства. Пикалов по версии следствия с апреля 2022 года по март 2024 года продавал различные помещения (100 квартир, два офиса и 80 парковочных мест) в сданном обманным путем доме. Он не был подключен к сетям электроснабжения, а также не имел надлежащего обеспечения отоплением. Общая сумма от продаж составила 467 мл рублей. Генеральному директору грозит наказание в соответствие с ч. 4 ст. 159 УК РФ («Мошенничество, совершенное организованной группой либо в особо крупном размере или повлекшее лишение права гражданина на жилое помещение»), главный инженер компании Виктор Дулицкий подозревается в пособничестве и мошенничестве. Отмечается, что ходатайство о необходимости заключения под стражу Пикалова и Дулицкого подготовлено следователем. Ранее, 13 августа, суд Астрахани арестовал экс-главу города Олега Полумордвинова , задержанного накануне по подозрению в мошенничестве в особо крупном размере. Согласно версии следствия, обвиняемый...

title: Quini 6: los números ganadores del sorteo 3.191 del miércoles 14 de agosto
creator: Redacción LAVOZ
content: Los miércoles y los domingos se sortea el Quini 6 en la Argentina . Conocé los resultados del sorteo, cuál fue el pozo millonario y todo lo que tenés que saber del juego que pertenece a la Caja de Asistencia Social de Santa Fe. Todo lo publicado sobre el Quini 6 Aniversario. El Quini 6 cumple 36 años: cuáles fueron los números del primer sorteo y otros datos curiosos Estos fueron los números ganadores del miércoles 14 de agosto : Quini 6: los resultados del sorteo del 14 de agosto Tradicional del Quini 6 24 - 10 - 16 - 33 - 43 - 27 El pozo quedó vacante con más de $ 1.560 millones. Una locura. Quini 6: de dónde es y cuántos millones se llevó el único ganador del sorteo de este domingo La Segunda del Quini 6 07 - 17 - 15 - 14 - 18 - 06 El pozo quedó vacante con más de $ 1.808 millones. La Revancha del Quini 6 22 - 43 - 19 - 11 - 01 - 35 Un solo ganador con 6 aciertos se llevará $ 554.849.481,60. Siempre Sale del Quini 6 29 - 41 - 28 - 08 - 23 - 13 Hubo 27 ganadores con 5 aciertos, cada uno se llevará $ 4.476.427,20. Con suerte. Río Tercero, ciudad en racha con el Quini 6: en un año tuvo cuatro ganadores ¿Qué es el QUINI 6? Se trata de un juego poceado. Esto quiere decir que el monto que se ofrece en premios (pozo) es variable, y corresponde a un porcentaje de lo recaudado. Pertenece a la Caja de Asistencia Social de Santa Fe y se desarrolla desde 1988,...
