title: 長崎の式典を巡る混乱、晴気誠少佐が嘆いていないか(Forbes JAPAN)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 8/15(木) 8:15 配信 晴気少佐慰霊碑 今年も「終戦の日」がやってきた。来年は戦後80年だが、今から80年前の1944年(昭和19年)8月15日、日本はすでに重苦しい空気に包まれていた。この年の7月、絶対国防圏としたサイパンが陥落した。東条英機内閣は倒れ、後を継いだ小磯国昭内閣も継戦の意志は示したが、「一撃講和論」しか描けず、もはや戦争で勝利をつかむことは不可能な状況だった。日本はそれでもなお1年、戦争を続けたが、広島・長崎への原爆投下、ソ連の対日参戦などに至り、最終的には軍が天皇の信頼を失い、終戦に至った。東京・市谷の防衛省の敷地内には、終戦に伴い命を断った軍人たちの慰霊碑が置かれている。「陸軍大臣 陸軍大将 阿南惟幾 荼毘之跡」は、終戦の聖断に反発する陸軍をまとめた後、陸相官邸で自決した阿南陸相を祀ったものだ。「杉山(元)元帥 吉本(貞一)大将 自決之跡」もある。杉山元帥は第1総軍司令官、吉本大将は同軍司令部付として、それぞれ敗戦の責任を感じ、45年9月12日に自決した。このなかで、異彩を放つのが「陸軍少佐 晴気(はるけ)誠 慰霊碑」だ。碑文によれば、陸軍大本営参謀だった晴気少佐はサイパン陥落の責任を痛感し、45年8月17日に自決した。晴気少佐の自決を気の毒に思った瀬島龍三氏ら、当時の参謀本部作戦課の有志が20年後の65年8月に慰霊碑を建立したという。晴気少佐はサイパン防衛の作戦立案を担い、米軍上陸部隊の戦力が海上と陸上に分離する弱点を捉える水際撃滅の方式を採用した。しかし、米軍の艦砲射撃や爆撃など、圧倒的な火力に対抗できなかった。米軍上陸の報告を受け取った晴気少佐は自ら、サイパンに赴こうとしたが、すでに米軍が制空権を握っていたため、断念したという。サイパン防衛作戦の失敗は晴気少佐だけの責任ではない。当時の日本軍は最前線のニューギニアやソロモン方面での対応に追われていた。サイパン防衛の中核を担う陸軍第43師団の主力が到着したのは、米軍の上陸開始まで1カ月を切った時点で、十分な陣地の構築もできなかった。水際撃滅作戦も、そもそも日本海軍が上陸部隊を含む米機動部隊を攻略することが前提の作戦だった。しかし、米軍が上陸を開始した直後の44年6月19、20の両日、日本海軍の空母機動部隊はマリアナ沖海戦で大敗北を喫し、事実上壊滅していた。サイパンの戦いでは、日本軍は総兵力約4万4千人のうち4万1千人余が戦死し、民間人約2万人のうち、8千人から1万人が死亡したと言われる。大勢の人々が亡くなった責任を、晴気少佐は自ら背負おうとしたのだろう。 1 / 2ページ 中国選手が早田選手フォロー外し 「特攻資料館に行きたい」発言 もがくトランプ氏、陰謀論に引き付けられる 周囲は目を覚ますよう懇願 米バイデン氏 岸田総理に賛辞「リーダーシップは歴史的と言うほかない」 人口とメダルの割合、最もコスパがいい国はどこだったのか...

title: Хочешь - плати. На Алтае не планируют проводить бесплатную вакцинацию от ковида
content: В Алтайском крае не будут проводить бесплатную вакцинацию от коронавируса в 2024 году. Об этом в ходе пресс-конференции 12 августа рассказала Ирина Переладова , комментируя возможный рост заболеваемости в сентябре. По ее словам, в постановлении главного санитарного врача указан только один вид обязательной вакцинации - от гриппа. Напомним, такая же ситуация была и в прошлом году. Тогда в Роспотребнадзоре проанализировали эпидситуацию и пришли к выводу, что масштабная вакцинация против коронавируса, которую проводили во время пандемии, не требуется. Точно такое же решение принято и в этом году. Поэтому те, кто всё равно хочет привиться от COVID-19, могут сделать это только за свой счет, сказала эпидемиолог. "Вакцина от ковида на рынке есть. Сегодня ее реализуют в негосударственных прививочных кабинетах. Но активность населения минимальная", - пояснила Переладова. Также эпидемиолог напомнила, что у работодателей также есть возможность проводить вакцинацию сотрудников за собственный счет. По словам Переладовой, организации, готовые тратить на это деньги, есть. "У нас есть предприятие "Сибирь-Полиметаллы". Крупное, серьезное, с большим количеством сотрудников, которые собираются со всем страны и работают вахтовым методом. И руководство заинтересовано в том, чтобы своих работников привить. Они закупают вакцину и проводят иммунизацию", - рассказала врач. Российские эксперты...

title: Ukraine says it has taken more ground and prisoners during its advance into Russia border region
creator: ILLIA NOVIKOV and EMMA BURROWS Associated Press
content: KYIV, Ukraine — Ukrainian forces pushed on with their major cross-border advance into Russia's Kursk region for a second week Wednesday, claiming they took more ground, captured more Russian prisoners and destroyed a bomber in attacks on military airfields. Assault troops advanced about a mile farther into areas of Kursk on Wednesday, the commander of the Ukrainian military, Gen. Oleksandr Syrskyi, said in a video posted on President Volodymyr Zelenskyy's Telegram channel. Ukrainian troops also took more than 100 Russian soldiers prisoner, Syrskyi said. Zelenskyy said they would eventually be swapped for Ukrainian prisoners of war. Additionally, the troops destroyed a Russian Su-34 jet used to launch devastating glide bombs at Ukrainian front-line positions and cities, Ukraine's General Staff said. Ukrainian servicemen sit inside their APC Wednesday after returning from the Russian Kursk region, near the Russian-Ukrainian border in Ukraine. The surprise Ukrainian push into the Kursk region that began Aug. 6 rattled the Kremlin. The daring operation is the largest attack on Russia since World War II and could involve as many as 10,000 Ukrainian troops backed by armor and artillery, military analysts say. Syrskyi said Ukrainian forces advanced into about 390 square miles of the Kursk region, though it was not possible to independently verify that claim. If Ukraine actually...

title: Illinois Dems rally around progressive message ahead of national convention
creator: BRENDEN MOORE brenden.moore@lee.net
content: Harris SPRINGFIELD — With their national convention days away, state Democrats seized on the party's annual Illinois State Fair rally day to highlight growing excitement about the candidacy of Vice President Kamala Harris. At the same time, they sought to remain clear-eyed about the hurdles ahead on the path to elect Harris, who would be the first woman and first Asian American to hold the office. This year's festivities in Springfield began with a brunch hosted by the Illinois Democratic County Chairs Association and ended with a 20-minute rally at the Illinois State Fairgrounds. The event effectively served as a prologue for the Democratic National Convention, which kicks off on Monday in Chicago. The state's top elected Democrats told nearly 1,500 party faithful gathered that it was "time to share Illinois’ success with the nation," alluding to the long list of progressive policy achievements the party racked up since Gov. J.B. Pritzker took office in 2019. Gov. J.B. Pritzker, third from left, and other Democratic elected leaders gather at the Illinois State Fair on Wednesday. The second-term Chicago Democrat, who was on the short list of potential vice presidential picks before Harris ultimately selected Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, touted several major policy victories as proof that "Democrats deliver" in Illinois. Among the governor's legislative wins: expanded reproductive...

title: Эрдоган призвал исламские страны активизировать усилия для прекращения огня в Газе
content: Президент Турции Реджеп Тайип Эрдоган Международное сообщество, прежде всего страны исламского мира, должны активизировать усилия для обеспечения немедленного прекращения огня в секторе Газа. Как передает со ссылкой на ТАСС, об этом заявил президент Турции Реджеп Тайип Эрдоган на встрече в Анкаре с лидером Палестины Махмудом Аббасом. "В ходе встречи обсуждались массовые убийства, совершаемые Израилем на палестинских территориях, шаги, которые необходимо предпринять для достижения прекращения огня . Президент Эрдоган заявил, что Турция продолжит поддерживать справедливое дело Палестины и добиваться того, чтобы остановить Израиль. Он подчеркнул, что все страны, особенно исламские государства, должны активизировать усилия для обеспечения немедленного прекращения огня в Газе и бесперебойной доставки гуманитарной помощи палестинцам", - отмечается в релизе департамента коммуникаций турецкого лидера по итогам встречи. Палестинский лидер прибыл 14 августа вечером из Москвы в Анкару с двухдневным визитом. В четверг он выступит в турецком парламенте, который созван на внеочередное заседание в поддержку Палестины. title: Mercato - OM : Transfert bouclé, De Zerbi en a fait une affaire personnelle !
content: Roberto De Zerbi est un élément plutôt persuasif visiblement pour les recrues estivales de l’OM. L’entraîneur italien serait la cause de plusieurs arrivées depuis le début du mercato et a été l’instigateur du bon déroulé de l’opération Valentin Carboni comme le milieu offensif argentin de 19 ans, arrivé en prêt de l’Inter. Valentin Carboni (19 ans) est devenu un joueur de l’ OM mercredi dernier. En effet, après diverses discussions entre les dirigeants marseillais et leurs homologues de l’ Inter, un prêt avec option d’achat a été convenue entre les parties concernées. Une victoire pour Roberto De Zerbi qui a très clairement poussé en coulisses pour que l’international argentin soit recruté par le tandem Pablo Longoria - Medhi Benatia à l’ Olympique de Marseille. Mercato : Après sa médaille olympique, l’OM le veut ! https://t.co/RRKyxEsDiF pic.twitter.com/ah6ciuE1Vs Et ce n’est pas le principal intéressé qui affirmera le contraire. En conférence de presse ce mercredi dans le cadre de sa présentation officielle en tant que joueur de l’ OM , Valentin Carboni n’a pas dissimulé les raisons de son choix de débarquer à l’ OM . « Avoir des Argentins ici c'est important, surtout pour un jeune joueur. L'entraîneur aussi, il m'a toujours voulu ». Dans des propos rapportés par Le Phocéen , Valentin Carboni a profité de l’exposition de la conférence de...

title: Lake County tourism has grown to $1.24 billion industry
content: The tourism industry in Northwest Indiana is thriving and has a bright future, South Shore Convention and Visitors Authority President and CEO Phil Taillon told the Lakeshore Chamber of Commerce at the Hard Rock Casino in Gary Wednesday. "The SSCVA is an official destination marketing organization for Lake County and beyond, increasing tourism and bringing new visitors, which brings new money to Lake County," he said. "Our success is important to each and every one of you that's in this room." Some people question whether Lake County, Indiana's second most populous county, has that many attractions to market, but it has many destinations like beaches, casinos, breweries, music venues and festivals like Pierogi Fest and Festival of the Lakes. "Tourism is very important for a lot of different reasons beyond just the hospitality industry. We also are big in the job creation world. A lot of younger people like to work in the hospitality industry so that's important," he said. "We talk a lot about quality of place. It's a term used a lot today. People want to live in places that have lots of energy and activity and as many family entertainment opportunities as possible. Sports, concerts and park events are important tourism-related activities that bring a lot of people into Lake County and some people may like the area enough they may consider buying a home and moving here."...

title: プロレスラーのジェフ・コブ、電車の座席にちょこんとおさまる 「かわいすぎる」「マナーのお手本」
content: 新日本プロレス所属のプロレスラー、ジェフ・コブさんが2024年8月13日にXを更新し、電車の座席に座る写真を公開した。大きな体を1人分の座席におさめるジェフさんの姿に、Xユーザーからは「かわいい」との声が上がっている。 ジェフ・コブさんのX(@RealJeffCobb)より ジェフ・コブさんのX(@RealJeffCobb)より。画像は編集部で一部加工 ジェフ・コブさんのX(@RealJeffCobb)より ジェフ・コブさんのX(@RealJeffCobb)より ジェフ・コブさんのX(@RealJeffCobb)より 「NO SPACE......」 身長178センチ、体重119キロ ジェフさんはハワイ出身で、熊本県出身の祖母を持つ。身長178センチ、体重119キロと大柄な体が特徴だ。 そんなジェフさんがXで「NO SPACE......」とこぼしながら、電車の座席の端にちょこんと座る自身の写真を公開した。 Xユーザーからは「おっちゃん可愛いな......と思ったら、ジェフ・コブ選手じゃないの!」「ジェフ・コブ、人並外れた巨体なのにちゃんとスペース作ってるの偉いな」「プロレスラーさんがマナーのお手本を示してくださってます」「コブが可愛すぎるw 試合じゃ怪力無双なのにこういうお茶目なところが好きなんだよなー」などのコメントが寄せられている。

title: आज का मेष राशि का राशिफल 15 अगस्त 2024 : सुख साधनों की प्राप्ति होगी, लेनदेन में सतर्क रहें
content: Aries Horoscope 15 August, 2024: आज मेष राशि का करियर राशिफल : कारोबार और करियर के मामले में आज सितारे बताते हैं कि, मेष राशि वालों के लिए आज का दिन लाभप्रद होगा। आपको आज बिजनेस में अपनी योजना और परिश्रम का लाभ मिलेगा। वैसे दिन के पहले भाग में कमाई अच्छी रहेगी। कारोबार में विस्तार का प्रयास भी आज आपका सफल हो सकता है। आर्थिक लेन-देन के मामलों में आज आपको संभलकर चलना होगा। आज घरेलू जरूरतों के ऊपर आपका धन खर्च हो सकता है। यात्रा और खान पान पर भी व्यय होने का योग है। आज मेष राशि का प्रेम और पारिवारिक राशिफल : घर परिवार और लव लाइफ के मामले में आज मेष राशि के जातकों को भाग्य का साथ मिलेगा। दिन के दूसरे भाग में आज आप प्रेमी और जीवनसाथी के कहीं यात्रा का प्लान बना सकते हैं। आपका कोई पारिवारिक काम जो लंबे समय से रुका हुआ था आज वह पूरा हो सकता है। पिता और घर के बड़ों से आपको आज सहयोग और आशीर्वाद प्राप्त होगा। किसी सामाजिक काम में भी आज आप भाग ले सकते है। ससुराल पक्ष की ओर से आपको आज लाभ मिल सकता है। आज मेष राशि की सेहत : गैस्ट्रिक की समस्या और अपच की वजह से आपको आज परेशानी हो सकती है। आपके लिए बेहतर होगा कि आज बाहरी खान पान से बचें। वैसे दिन के दूसरे भाग में स्थिति बेहतर रहेगी। आज मेष राशि के उपाय : हनुमान चालीसा का पाठ करना आज मेष राशि के जातकों के लिए लाभकारी रहेगा। पीले चंदन का तिलक भी लगाएं।

title: Ukraine says it has taken more ground and prisoners during its advance into Russia border region
creator: ILLIA NOVIKOV and EMMA BURROWS Associated Press
content: KYIV, Ukraine — Ukrainian forces pushed on with their major cross-border advance into Russia's Kursk region for a second week Wednesday, claiming they took more ground, captured more Russian prisoners and destroyed a bomber in attacks on military airfields. Assault troops advanced about a mile farther into areas of Kursk on Wednesday, the commander of the Ukrainian military, Gen. Oleksandr Syrskyi, said in a video posted on President Volodymyr Zelenskyy's Telegram channel. Ukrainian troops also took more than 100 Russian soldiers prisoner, Syrskyi said. Zelenskyy said they would eventually be swapped for Ukrainian prisoners of war. Additionally, the troops destroyed a Russian Su-34 jet used to launch devastating glide bombs at Ukrainian front-line positions and cities, Ukraine's General Staff said. Ukrainian servicemen sit inside their APC Wednesday after returning from the Russian Kursk region, near the Russian-Ukrainian border in Ukraine. The surprise Ukrainian push into the Kursk region that began Aug. 6 rattled the Kremlin. The daring operation is the largest attack on Russia since World War II and could involve as many as 10,000 Ukrainian troops backed by armor and artillery, military analysts say. Syrskyi said Ukrainian forces advanced into about 390 square miles of the Kursk region, though it was not possible to independently verify that claim. If Ukraine actually...

title: Britain to trial use of drones in deliveries, emergency services
creator: Reuters
content: LONDON (Reuters) - Britain's aviation regulator has selected six projects, including one by e-commerce giant Amazon, to test the use of drones in deliveries, inspection of infrastructure and emergency services, it said on Thursday. The UK's Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) had said earlier this year that it wanted to permit more drone flying for such uses. Currently drone users in Britain are only permitted to fly beyond the visual line of sight as part of trials with strict restrictions. As part of the trials announced by the CAA, selected projects would be able to fly their drones at distances beyond the flyer's ability to see them, using advanced technologies for navigation, control and to detect other aircraft. The projects include Amazon's drone delivery service, called Prime Air, Airspection to carry out inspections of offshore windfarms and Project Lifeline, which aims to deliver medical supplies. CAA said the trial would help the regulator's ongoing efforts to develop policy and regulations so drone flights can be "fully integrated" with other airspace users. "These innovative trials mark a significant step forward in integrating drones safely into UK airspace," said CAA director Sophie O'Sullivan. "Our goal is to make drone operations beyond visual line of sight a safe and everyday reality." Amazon said in October last year it was planning to begin delivering packages...

title: Red-tapism drives tourism investors from pillar to post
¿Por qué los espejos son ‘enemigos’ del wifi?
creator: J.C
content: Básicamente porque reflejan la señal. A grandes rasgos, el cristal contiene una fina capa de metal (generalmente óxidos metálicos) que refleja las ondas del wifi y provoca interferencia. Es poco probable que tu router esté colocado sobre una mesa de cristal, sin embargo, creemos que es un poco más probable que lo tengas cerca de una ventana o quizá frente a un espejo. Si es el caso, lo ideal es que lo cambies de lugar. ( )

title: nCino Announces Timing of its Second Quarter Fiscal Year 2025 Financial Results Conference Call
creator: Korea Bizwire
content: nCino is the worldwide leader in cloud banking. (Image courtesy of nCino) WILMINGTON, N.C., Aug. 14 (Korea Bizwire) – nCino, Inc. (NASDAQ: NCNO), a pioneer in cloud banking for the global financial services industry, will report financial results for its second quarter ended July 31, 2024, after the market close on Tuesday, August 27, 2024. nCino will host a conference call and webcast that day at 4:30 p.m. ET to discuss its financial results. Event: nCino’s Second Quarter Fiscal Year 2025 Financial Results Conference Call Date and Time: Tuesday, August 27, 2024 at 4:30 p.m. ET Webcast Link: https://investor.ncino.com/ Replay: A webcast replay will be available on the Investor Relations section of nCino’s website following the call. About nCino nCino (NASDAQ: NCNO) is the worldwide leader in cloud banking. Through its single software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform, nCino helps financial institutions serving corporate and commercial, small business, consumer, and mortgage customers modernize and more effectively onboard clients, make loans, manage the loan lifecycle, and open accounts. Transforming how financial institutions operate through innovation, reputation and speed, nCino is partnered with more than 1,800 financial services providers globally. creator: Sophie Haslett

title: Carlo Ancelotti Cetak Rekor Baru Usai Bawa Real Madrid Juara Piala Super Eropa, Guardiola Lewat!
content: Pelatih , Carlo berhasil mencetak rekor baru setelah meraih trofi , Kamis (15/8/2024) dini hari WIB. Rekor tersebut membuat jadi pelatih tersukses di ajang . Ya, memang baru saja mengantar juara Piala Eropa setelah mengalahkan klub Serie A, Atalanta. Adapun hasil Real Madrid vs Atalanta yang berlangsung di National Stadium Warsaw, Polandia, berakhir dengan skor 2-0. Sejatinya pada pertandingan ini pertandingan cukup sengit. Terbukti 45 menit pertama berakhir 0-0 tanpa gol. Barulah di babak kedua Madrid bisa memecah kebuntuan. Federico Valverde mencetak gol pembuka di menit ke-59, lalu Kylian Mbappe menggandakannya di menit ke-68. Kemenangan ini mengantar skuad Carlo meraih trofi pertama memasuki musim 2024/2025. Selain itu, Kylian Mbappe juga merebut trofi pertamanya dalam kostum . Di sisi lain, kemenangan ini rupanya juga menjadi rekor tersendiri bagi Carlo . Pelatih kawakan asal Italia itu berhasil menjadi pelatih terbanyak yang mengoleksi trofi di ajang . Ancelotti kini telah lima kali juara dan sukses melampaui torehan Pep , yang mengumpulkan empat medali juara. Sebanyak dua diraih saat masih menukangi AC Milan pada 2003 dan 2007. Kemudian tiga medali juara lain yang dimenangi Ancelotti bersama Real Madrid pada 2014, 2022, dan 2024.

title: Các golfer thi đấu dưới mưa, tranh giải Vô địch Golf Quốc gia 2024
content: Ngày thi đấu đầu tiên của giải Vô Địch Golf Quốc Gia 2024, Cúp Vinfast - Hải Phòng đã chính thức khai màn tại sân Vinpearl Golf Hải Phòng với sự tham gia của 150 vận động viên. Trong điều kiện thời tiết không thuận lợi với mưa và gió nhẹ, các tay golf đã phải đối mặt với nhiều thử thách trong suốt vòng 1. Kết thúc ngày thi đấu, Nguyễn Đức Sơn hiện đang dẫn đầu bảng xếp hạng nam, trong khi Nguyễn Viết Gia Hân đứng đầu bảng xếp hạng nữ. Cả hai tay golf trẻ thuộc Đội tuyển Quốc gia đều kết thúc vòng đầu tiên với 70 gậy, tổng điểm (-2). Ở bảng nam, Nguyễn Đức Sơn đã có một màn trình diễn ấn tượng khi ghi tới 7 birdie, trong đó có những hố anh thực hiện 3 birdie liên tiếp ở các hố 12, 13 và 14. Mặc dù mắc 1 bogey và 2 double bogey, kết quả của anh vẫn đủ để giúp anh dẫn đầu bảng xếp hạng với tổng điểm (-2). Trong một tình huống đáng tiếc, Nguyễn Đức Sơn đã suýt ghi được hole in one ở hố số 4, nhưng bóng đã đập vào cán cờ và "bay" ra ngoài. Các vị trí tiếp theo trong bảng nam lần lượt thuộc về Phạm Thế Nam với điểm (-1), Nguyễn Tuấn Anh với điểm E, Nguyễn Chí Thanh với điểm (+1) và Nguyễn Ngọc Bảo cùng...

title: Croquetón 2024: el evento que apoya a perros y gatos en situación de calle
content: El incremento de perros y gatos en situación de calle e s una problemática que se vive en varios países y México no es la excepción . Con la finalidad de apoyar a estos animalitos que carecen de un hogar y cuidados básicos, Croquetón llevará a cabo su cuarta edición este mes de agosto. El 1er Croqueton de Kon-fusión Musikal surgió en 2019 con la necesidad de apoyar a los perros en situación de calle, ya que México se ubica en el tercer lugar a nivel mundial con la mayor tasa de perros callejeros en el mundo. Te recomendamos: Doble Vía Martes de Glamour: La función de Lucha Libre que une a chicos y grandes en Guadalajara La razones por las que a diario vemos perros y gatos sin un hogar se debe a la falta de información de nuestra sociedad, ya que en muchos hogares las mascotas se obsequian en navidad y cumpleaños como si se tratarán de un juguete, al dejar de ser cachorros, muchos de estos animales terminan abandonados en las calles. Después del gran apoyo y la respuesta de los involucrados para sacar adelante Croquetón, este 2024 se retoma el proyecto para apoyar albergues en específico que no cuentan con apoyo del gobierno y que deben sustentar el alimento, tratamiento veterinario y los gastos que provoca cuidar y rescatar animalitos de la calle. Así también, se retomará la campaña de la familia de Kon-fusión Musikal que, a través de fotografías de...
